ṛṣaya ūcuḥkathaṃ sanatkumārastu nāradāya mahātmane proktavānsakalāndharmānkathaṃ tau militāvubhau  NarP kasminsthāne sthitau sūta tāvubhau brahmavādinau harigītasamudgāne cakratustadvadasva naḥ  NarP sūta uvācasanakādyā mahātmāno brahmaṇo mānasāḥ sutāḥ nirmamā nirahaṃkārāḥ sarve te hyūdhvaretasaḥ  NarP teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi samakaśca sanandanaḥ sanasphumāraśca vibhuḥ sanātama iti smṛtaḥ  NarP viṣṇubhaktā mahātmāno brahmadhyānaparāyaṇāḥ sahasrasūryasaṃkāśāḥ satyasandhā mumukṣavaḥ  NarP ekadā meruśṛṅgaṃ te prasthitā brahmaṇaḥ sabhām iṣṭaṃ mārge tha dadṛśuḥ gaṅgāṃ viṣṇipadīṃ dvijāḥ  NarP tāṃ nirīkṣya samudyuktāḥ strātuṃ sītājale bhavan etasminnantare tatra devarṣirnārado muniḥ  NarP ājagāma dvijaśreṣṭhā dṛṣṭvā bhrāntṝnsvakāgrajān tāndṛṣṭvā strātumudyuktānnamaskṛtya kṛtāñjitiḥ  NarP guṇannāmāni sapremabhaktiyukto madhudviṣaḥ nārāyaṇācyutānanta vāsudeva janārdana  NarP yajñeśa yajñapuruṣa kṛṣṇa viṣṇo namo stu te padmākṣa kamalākānta gaṅgājanaka keśava kṣirodaśāyindeveśa dāmodara namo stu te  NarP śrīrāma viṣṇo narasiṃha vāmana pradyumnasaṃkarpaṇa vātpadeva ajāniruddhāmalaruṅmurāraṃ tvaṃ pāhi naḥ sarvabhayādajastram  NarP ityucca ranharernāma natvā tānsvāgrajānmunīn upāsīnaśca taiḥ sārddhaṃ sasnau prītisamanvitaḥ  NarP te ṣāṃ cāpi tu sītāyā jale lokamalāpa he strātvā saṃtartya devarṣipitanvigatakalmaṣāḥ  NarP uttīryya saṃdhyopāstyādi kṛtvācāraṃ svakaṃ dvijāḥ kathāṃ pracakrurvividhāḥ nārāyaṇa guṇāśritāḥ  NarP kṛtatriyeṣu muniṣu gaṅgātīre manorame cakāranāradaḥ praśnaṃ nānākhyānakayāntare  NarP nārada uvācasarvajñāḥ stha muniśreṣṭhāḥ bhagavadbhaktitatparāḥ yūyaṃ sarve jagannāthā bhagavantaḥ sanātanāḥ  NarP lokoddhāraparānyuṣmāndīneṣu kṛtasauhṛdān pṛcche tato vadata me bhagavallakṣaṇaṃ budhāḥ  NarP yenedamakhilaṃ jātaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam gaṅgāpādodakaṃ yasya sa kathaṃ jñāyate hariḥ  NarP kathaṃ ca trividhaṃ karma saphalaṃ jāyate nṛṇām jñānasya lakṣaṇa brūta tapasaścāpi mānadāḥ  NarP atitheḥ pūjanaṃ vāpi yena viṣṇuḥ prasīdati evamādīni guhyāni harituṣṭikarāṇi ca anugṛhya ca māṃ nāthāstattvato vaktumarhatha  NarP  śaunaka uvācanamaḥ parāya devāya parasmātparamātra ca parāvara nivāsāya saguṇāyāguṇāya ca  NarP amāyāyātmasaṃjñāya mācine viśvarupiṇe yogīśvarāya yogāya yogagamyāya viṣṇave  NarP jñānāya jñānagamyāya sarvajñānaikahetave jñāceśvarāya jñeyāya jñātre vijñānasaṃpade  NarP dhyānāya dhyānagamyāya dhyātṛpātaharāya ca dhyāneśvarāya sudhiyedhyeyadhyātṛsvarupiṇe  NarP ādityavacandrāgnividhātṛdevāḥ siddhāśca yakṣāsuranāgasaṅghāḥ yacchaktiyuktāstamajaṃ purāṇaṃ satyaṃ stutīśaṃ satataṃ nato smi  NarP yo brahmarupī jagatāṃ vidhātā sa eva pātā dvijaviṣṇurupī kalpāntarudrākhyatamuḥ sa devaḥ śeteṃghripānastamajaṃ bhajāmi  NarP yannāmasaṃkīrttanato gajendro grāhograbandhānmumuce sa devaḥ virājamānaḥ svapade parākhye taṃ viṣṇumādyaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye  NarP śivasvarupī śivabhakti bhājāṃ yo viṣṇurupī haribhāvitānām saṃkalpapūrvātmakadehahetustaṃstameva nityaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye  NarP yaḥ keśihantā narakāntakaśca bālo bhujāgreṇa dadhāra gotram devaṃ ca bhūmāravinodaśīlaṃ taṃ vāsudevaṃ satataṃ nato smi  NarP lebhe vatīryogranṛsiṃharupīyodaityavakṣaḥ kaṭhinaṃ śilāvat vidāryasaṃrākṣitavānsvabhaktaṃ prahlādamīśaṃ tamajaṃ manāmi  NarP vyomādibhirmūṣitamātmasaṃjñaṃ nirañjanaṃ nityamameyatattvam jagadvidhātāramakarmakaṃ ca paraṃ purāṇaṃ puruṣama nato smi  NarP brahmendrarudrānilavāyumartyagandharvayakṣāsuradevasaṃghaiḥ svamūrtibhedaiḥ sthita eka īśastamādimātmā namahaṃ bhajāmi  NarP yato bhinnamidaṃ sarvaṃ samudbhūtaṃ sthitaṃ ca vai yasminneṣyati paścācca tamasti śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  NarP yaḥ sthito viśvarupeṇa saṅgīvātra pratīyate asaṅgī paripūrṇaśca tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  NarP hṛdi sthito pi yo devo māyayā mohitātmanām na jñāyate paraḥ śuddhastamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  NarP sarvasaṃganivṛttānāṃ dhyānayogaratātmanām sarvatra bhāti jñānātmā tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  NarP dadhāra mandāraṃ pṛṣṭe nirode mṛtamanthane devatānāṃ hitārthāya taṃ kūrmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  NarP draṣṭrāṅkureṇa yo nantaḥ samuddhṛtyārṇavāddharām tasthāvidaṃ jagatkṛtsnaṃ vārāhaṃ taṃ nato smyaham  NarP prahlādaṃ gopayandaityaṃ śilātikaṭhinorasam vidārya hatavānyo hi taṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ nato smyaham  NarP labdhvā vairocanerbhūmiṃ dvābhyāṃ padbhyāmatītya yaḥ ābrahmabhuvanaṃ pādātsurebhyastaṃ nato jitam  NarP haihayasyāparādhena hyekaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā kṣatriyānvayabhettā yo jāmadagnyaṃ nato smi tam  NarP āvirbhūtaścaturddhā yaḥ kapibhiḥ parivāritaḥ hatavānrākṣasānīkaṃ rāmacandraṃ nato smyaham  NarP mūrtidvayaṃ samāśritya bhūbhāramapahṛtya ca saṃjahāra kulaṃ svaṃ yastaṃ śrīkṛṣṇapyahaṃ bhaje  NarP bhūmyādilokatritayaṃ saṃtṛtpātmānamātmani paśyanti nirmalaṃ śuddhaṃ tamīśānaṃ bhajāmyaham  NarP yugānte pāpino śuddhānbhittvā tīkṣṇasudhārayā sthāpayāmāsa yo dharmaṃ kṛtādau tannamāmyaham  NarP evamādīnyanekāni yasya rupāṇi pāṇḍavāḥ na śakyaṃ tena saṃkhyātuṃ koṭyabdairapi taṃ bhaje  NarP mahimānaṃ tu yannāmnaḥ paraṃ gantuṃ munīśvarāḥ devāsurāśca manavaḥ kathaṃ taṃ śrullako bhaje  NarP yannāmaśravaṇenāpi mahāpātakino narāḥ pavitratāṃ prapadyante ta kathaṃ staumi cālpadhīḥ  NarP yathākathañcidyannamni kīrtite vā śrute pi vā pāpinastu viśuddhāḥ syuḥ śaddhā mokṣamavānpuyuḥ  NarP ātmanyātmānamādhāya yogino gatakalmaśāḥ paśyanti yaṃ jñānarupaṃ tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  NarP sāṅkhyāḥ sarveṣu paśyanti paripūraṇāntakaṃ harim tamādidevamajaraṃ jñānarupaṃ bhajāmyaham  NarP sarvasattvamayaṃ śāntaṃ sarvadraṣṭāramīśvaram sahasraśīrṣakaṃ devaṃ vande bhāvātmakaṃ harim  NarP yadbhūtaṃ yacca vai bhāvyaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ jagat daśāṅgulaṃ yo tsyatiṣṭattamīśamajaraṃ bhade  NarP aṇoraṇīyāṃsamajaṃ mahataśca mahattaram guhyādguhyatamaṃ devaṃ praṇamāmi punaḥ punaḥ  NarP dhyātaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā śṛtaḥ praṇamito pi vā svapadaṃ yo dadātīśastaṃ vande puruṣottamam  NarP iti stuvantaṃ paramaṃ pereśaṃ harṣāmbusaṃruddhavilocanāste munīśvarā nāradasaṃyutāstu sanandanādyāḥ prapudaṃ prajagmuḥ  NarP ya idaṃ prātarutyāya pāṭhedvai paurupaṃ stavam sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sanatkumāranāradasaṃvāde nāradakṛtaviṣṇustutirnāma dvitīyodhyāyaḥnārada uvācakathaṃ sasarja brahmādīnādidevaḥ purā vibhuḥ tanmamākhyāhi sanaka sarvajño sti yato bhavān  NarP śrīsanaka uvācānārāyaṇo kṣaro nantaḥ sarvavyāpī nirañjanaḥ tenedamakhilaṃ vyātpaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam  NarP ādisarge mahāviṣṇuḥ svaprakāśo jaganmayaḥ guṇabhedamadhiṣṭhāya mūrttitrikamavāsṛjat  NarP sṛṣṭyarthaṃ tu purā devo dakṣiṇāṅgātprajāpatim madhyerudrākhyamīthānaṃ jagadantakaraṃ mune  NarP pālanāyāsya jagato vāmāṅgādviṣṇumavyayam tamādidevamajaraṃ kecidāhuḥ śivābhidham kecidviṣṇuṃ sadā satyaṃ brahmāṇaṃ kecidūcire  NarP tasya śaktiḥ parā viṣṇorjagatkāryapravartinī bhāvābhāvasvarupā sā vidyāvidyeti gīyate  NarP yadā viśvaṃ mahāviṣṇorbhinnatvena pratīyate tadā hyavidyā saṃsiddhā bhavedduḥkhasya sādhanam  NarP jñātṛjñeyādyupādhiste yadā naśyati nārada sarvaikabhāvanā buddhiḥ sā vidyetyabhidhīyate  NarP eṣaṃ māyā mahāviṣṇorbhinnā saṃsāradāyinī abhedabuddhyā dṛṣṭā cetsaṃsārakṣayakāriṇī  NarP viṣṇuśaktisamudbhūtametatsarvaṃ varācaṃm yasmādbhinnamidaṃ sarvaṃ yacceṅgedyaccaneṅgati  NarP upādhibhiryathākāśo bhinnatvena pratīyate avidyopādhiyogenatathedamakhilaṃ jagat  NarP yathā harirjagadyāpī tasya śaktistathā mune dāhaśaktiryathāṅgāre svāśrayaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭati  NarP umeti kecidāhustāṃ śaktiṃ lakṣmīṃ tathā pare bhāratītyapare caināṃ girijetyambiketi ca  NarP durgeti bhadrakālīti caṇḍī māheśvarītyapi kaumārī vaiṣṇavī ceti vārāhyendrī ca śāmbhavī  NarP brāhmīti vidyāvidyeti māyeti ca tathā pare prakṛtiśca parā ceti vadanti paramarṣasyaḥ  NarP śeṣaśaktiḥ parā viṣṇorjagatsargādikāriṇī vyaktāvyaktasvarupeṇa jagahyāpya vyavasthitā  NarP prakṛtiścapumāṃścaiva kālaśceti vidhisthitiḥ sṛṣṭisthitivināśānāmekaḥ kāraṇatāṃ gataḥ  NarP yenedamakhilaṃ jātaṃ brahmarupadhareṇa vai tasmātparataro devo nityaityabhidhīyate  NarP rakṣāṃ karoti yo devo nitya ityabhidhīyate rakṣāṃ karoti yo devo jagatāṃ parataḥ pumān  NarP tasmātparataraṃ yattadavyayaṃ paramaṃ padam  NarP akṣaro nirguṇaḥ śuddhaḥ paripūrṇaḥ sanātanaḥ yaḥ paraḥ kālapupākhyo yogidhyeyaḥ parātparaḥ  NarP paramātmā parānandaḥ sarvopādhivivarjitaḥ jñānaikavedyaḥ paramaḥ sañcidānandavigrahaḥ  NarP yo sau śuddho pi paramo hyahṝṅkāreṇa saṃyutaḥ dehīti procyate mūḍhairaho jñānaviḍambanam  NarP sa devaḥ paramaḥ śuddhaḥ sattvadiguṇabhedataḥ mūrtitrayaṃ samāpannaḥ sṛṣṭisthityantakāraṇam  NarP yo sau brahmā jagatkartā yannābhikamalodbhavaḥ sa evānandarupātmā tasmānnāstyaparo mune  NarP antaryāmī jagadyāpī sarvasākṣī nirañjanaḥ bhinnābhinnasvarupeṇa sthito vai parameśvaraḥ  NarP yasya śaktirmahāmāyā jagadvistrambhadhāriṇī viśvotpatternidānatvātprakṛtiḥ procyate budhaiḥ  NarP ādisarge mahāviṣṇorlokānkarttuṃ samudyataḥ prakṛtiḥ puruṣaśceti kālaśceti tridhā bhavet  NarP paśyanti bhāvitātmāno yaṃ brahmatyabhisaṃjñitam śuddhaṃ yatparamaṃ dhāma tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam  NarP evaṃ śuddho kṣaro nantaḥ kālarupī maheśvaraḥ guṇarupīguṇādhārojagatāmādikṛdvibhuḥ  NarP pratṛtiḥ kṣobhamāpannā puruṣākhye jagadgurau mahānprādurabhūddhuddhistato haṃ samavarttata  NarP ahṝṅkārāśca sūkṣmāṇi tanmātrāṇīndriyāṇi ca tanmātrebhyo hi jātāni bhūtāni jagataḥ kṛte  NarP ākāśavāyyagrijalabhūmayo bjabhāvātmaja yathākramaṃ kāraṇatāmekaikasyopayānti ca  NarP tato brahmā jagaddhātā tāmasānasṛjatprabhuḥ tiryagyonigatāñjantūnpaśupakṣimṛgādikān  NarP tamapyasādhakaṃ matvā devasargaṃ sanātanāt tato vaimānuṣaṃ sargaṃ kalpayāmāsa pahmajaḥ  NarP tato dakṣādikānputrānsṛṣṭisādhanatatparān ebhiḥ putrairidaṃ vyāptaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣam  NarP bhurbhuvaśca tathā svaśca mahaśvaiva janastathā tapaśca satyamityevaṃ lokāḥ satyopari sthitāḥ  NarP atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva sutalaṃ ca talātalam mahātalaṃ ca viprendra tato dhacca rasātalam  NarP pātālaṃ ceti saptaiva pātālāni kramādadhaḥ eṣa sarveṣu lokeṣu lokanāthāṃśca sṛṣṭavān  NarP kulācalānnadīścāsau tattallokanivāsinām varttanādīni sarvāṇi yathāyogyaṃmakalpayat  NarP bhūtale madhyago meruḥ sarvadevasamāśrayaḥ lokālokaśca bhūmyante tanmadhye satpa sāgarāḥ  NarP dvīpāśca satpa viprendra dvīpe kulācalāḥ bāhyā nadyaśca vikhyātā janāścāmarasannibhāḥ  NarP jambūplakṣābhidhānau ca śālmalaśca kuśastathā krauñcaśākau puṣkaraśca te sarve devabhūmayaḥ  NarP ete dvīpāḥ samudraistu satpasatpabhirāvṛtāḥ lavaṇekṣusurāsarpirdadhikṣīrajalaiḥ samam  NarP ete dvīpāḥ samudrāśca pūrvasmāduttarerāḥ jñeyā dviguṇavistarā lokālokāñca parvatāt  NarP kṣārodadherupattaraṃ yaddhi mādreścaiva dakṣiṇām jñeyaṃ tadbhārataṃ varṣaṃ sarvakarmaphalapradam  NarP atra karmāṇi kurvanti trividhāni tu nārada tatphalaṃ bhujyate caiva bhogabhūmidhanakramāt  NarP bhārate tu kṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vāśubhameva ca tatphalaṃ kṣayi viprendra bhujyate nyatrajantubhiḥ  NarP adyāpi devā icchanti janma bhāratabhūtale saṃcitaṃ sumahatpuṇyamakṣayyamamalaṃ śubham  NarP kadā labhāmahe janma varṣabhāratabhūmiṣu kadā puṇyena mahatā yāsyāma paramaṃ padam  NarP dānairvāvividhairyajñaistapobhirvāthavā harim jagadīśaṃsameṣyāmo nityānandamanāmayam  NarP yo bhāratabhuvaṃ prāpya viṣṇupūjāparo bhavet na tasya sadṛśo nyo sti triṣu lokeṣu nāradā  NarP harikīrtanaśīlo vā tadbhaktānāṃ piyo pi vā śukṣaṣurvāpi mahataḥ savedyo divijairapi  NarP haripūjārato nityaṃ bhaktaḥ pūjāsto ṣi vā bhaktocchiṣṭānnasevī ca yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam  NarP nārāyaṇeti kṛṣṇeti vāsudeveti yo vadet ahiṃsādiparaḥ śantiḥ so pi vandyaḥ surottamaiḥ  NarP śiveti nīlakaṇṭheti śaṅkaretica yaḥ smaret sarvabhūtahito nityaṃ so bhyarcyo divijaiḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP gurubhaktaḥ śivadhyānī svāśramācāratatparaḥ anasūyuḥśucirdakṣo yaḥ so pyarcyaḥsureśvaraiḥ  NarP brāhmaṇānāṃ hitakaraḥ śradhdāvānvarṇadharmayoḥ vedavādarato nityaṃ sa jñeyaḥ paṅkipāvanaḥ  NarP abhedadarśī deveśe nārāyaṇaśivātmake sarvaṃ yo brahmaṇa nityamasmadādiṣu kā kathā  NarP goṣu kṣānto brahmacārī paranindāvivarjitaḥ aparigrahaśī laśca devapūjyaḥ sa nārada  NarP steyādidoṣavimukhaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ paropakāranirataḥ pūjanīyaḥ surāsuraiḥ  NarP vedārthaśravaṇe buddhiḥ purāṇaśravaṇe tathā satsaṃge pi ca yasyāsti so pi vandyaḥ surottamaiḥ  NarP evamādīnyanekāni karmāṇi śraddhayānvitaḥ karoti bhārate varṣe saṃbandho smābhireva ca  NarP eteṣvanyatamo vipramātmānaṃ nārabhettu yaḥ sa eva duṣkṛtirmūḍho nāstyanyo smādacetanaḥ  NarP saṃprāpya bhārate janma satkarma suparāṅmukhaḥ pīyūṣakalaśaṃ suktvā viṣabhāṇḍamupāśritaḥ  NarP śrutismṛtyuditairddharmairnātmānaṃ pāvayettu yaḥ sa evātmavidhātī syātpāpināmagraṇīrmune  NarP karmabhūmiṃ samāsādya yo na dharmaṃ samācaret sa ca sarvādhamaḥ prokto vedavidbhirmunīśvara  NarP śubhaṃ karma samutsṛjya duṣkarmāṇi karoti yaḥ kāmadhenuṃ parityajya arkakṣīraṃ saṃ mārgati  NarP evaṃ bhāratabhūbhāgaṃ praśaṃsanti divaukasaḥ brahmādyā api viprendra svabhogakṣayabhīravaḥ  NarP tasmātpuṇyatamaṃ jñeyaṃ bhārataṃ varṣamuttamam devānāṃ durlabhaṃ vāpi sarvakarmaphalapradam  NarP asminpuṇye ca bhūbhāge yastu satkarmasūdyataḥ na tasya sadṛśaṃ kaścitriṣu vidyate  NarP asmiñjāto naro yastu svaṅkarmakṣapaṇodyataḥ nararupaparicchannaḥ sa harirnātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP paraṃ lokaphalaṃ prepsuḥ kiryātkarmāṇyatandritaḥ nivedya haraye bhaktyā tatphalaṃ hyakṣayaṃ smṛtam  NarP virāgī cetkarmaphaleṣvapi kiñcitra kārayet arpayetsukṛtaṃ karma prīyatāmitiṃ me hariḥ  NarP ābrahmabhuvanāllokāḥ punarutpattidāyakāḥ phalāgṛdhnuḥ karmaṇāṃ tatprātproti paramaṃ padam  NarP vedoditāni karmāṇi kuryādīśvaratuṣṭaye yathāśramaṃ tyaktukāmaḥ prānpoti padamavyayam  NarP niṣkāmo vā sakāmo vā kuryātkarma yathāvidhi svāśramācāraśūnyaśca patitaḥ procyate budhaiḥ  NarP sadācāraparo vipro varddhate brahmatejasā tasya viṣṇuśca tuṣṭaḥ syādbhaktiyuktasya nārada  NarP bhārate janma saṃprāpya nātmānaṃ tārayetu yaḥ pacyate niraye dhore sa tvācandrākratārakam  NarP vāsadevaparo dharmo vāsudevaparaṃ tapaḥ vāsudevaparaṃ jñānaṃ vāsudevaparā gatiḥ  NarP vāsudevātmakaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ tasmādanyatra vidyate  NarP sa eva dhātā tripurāntakaśca sa eva devāsurayajñarupaḥ sa evabrahmāṇḍamidaṃ tato nyanna kiñcidasti vyatiriktarupam  NarP asmātparaṃ nāparamasti kiñcidyasmādaṇīyānnatathā mahīyān vyātpaṃ hi tenedamidaṃ vicitraṃ taṃ devadevaṃ praṇametsamīṅyam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sṛṣṭibharatakhaṇḍaprāśastyabhūgolānāṃ varṇanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo dhyāyaḥsanaka uvācaśraddhāpūrvāḥ sarvadharmā manorathaphalapradāḥ śraddhayāsādhyate sarvaṃ śraddhayā tuṣyate hariḥ  NarP bhaktirbhaktyaiva karttavyātathā karmāṇi bhaktitaḥ karmaścaddhāvihīnāni na sidhyantiṃ dvijo tamāḥ  NarP yathāloko hi jantūnāṃ ceṣṭākāraṇatāṃ gataḥ tathaiva sarvasiddhīnāṃ bhaktiḥ paramakāraṇam  NarP yathā samasta lokānāṃ jīvanaṃ salilaṃ smṛtam tathā samastasiddhīnāṃ jīvanaṃ bhaktiriṣyate  NarP yathā bhūmiṃ samāśritya sarve jīvanti jantavaḥ tathā bhaktiṃ samāśritya sarvakāryyāṇi sādhayet  NarP śraddhāvāṃllabhate dharṃmaṃ śraddhāvātarthamāpnuyāt śraddhayā sādhyate kāmaḥ śraddhāvānmokṣamānpuyāt  NarP na dānairna tapobhirvā yajñairvā bahudakṣiṇaiḥ bhaktihīnermuniśceṣṭha tuṣyate bhagavānhariḥ  NarP merumātrasuvarṇānāṃ koṭikoṭisahasraśaḥ dattā cāpyarthanāśāya yatobhaktivivarjitā  NarP abhaktyā yattapastaptaiḥ kevalaṃ kāyaśoṣaṇam abhaktyā yaddhutaṃ havyaṃ bhasmani nyastahavyavat  NarP yatkiñcitkurute karṃmaśraddhayāpyaṇumātrumātrakam tannāma pibantyajñāḥ saṃsāragaralaṃ hyaho  NarP asārabhūte saṃsāre sārametadajātmaja bhagavadbhaktasaṅgaśca haribhaktistitikṣutā  NarP asūyopetamanasāṃ bhaktidānādikarṃma yat avehi niṣphalaṃ brahaṃsteṣāṃ dūrataro hariḥ  NarP pariśriyābhitatpānāṃ dambhācāraratātmanām mṛṣā tu kurvatāṃ karma teṣāṃ dūrataro hariḥ  NarP pṛcchatāṃ ca mahādharṃmānvadatāṃ vai mṛṣā ca tān dharmeṣvabhaktimanasāṃ teṣāṃ dūrataro hariḥ  NarP vedapraṇihito dharṃmo dharṃmo vedo nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ tatrāśraddhāparā ye tu teṣāṃ dūrataro hariḥ  NarP yasya dharṃmavihīnāni dinānyāyānti yānti ca sa lohakārabhastreva śvasannapi na jīvati  NarP dharmārthakāmamokṣākhyāḥ puruṣārthāḥ sanātanāḥ śraddhāvatāṃ hi sidhyanti nānyathā brahmanandanā  NarP svācāramanatikramya haribhaktiparo hi yaḥ sa yāti viṣṇubhavanaṃ yadvai paśyanti sūrayaḥ  NarP kurvanvedoditāndharṃmānmunīndra svāśramocitān haridhyānaparoyastu sa yāti paramaṃ padam  NarP ācāraprabhavo dharmaḥ dharṃmasya prabhuracyutaḥ āśramācārayuktena pūjitaḥ sarvadā hariḥ  NarP yaḥ svācāraparibhraṣṭaḥ sāṅgavedāntago pi vā sa eva patito jñeyo yataḥ karmabahiṣkṛtaḥ  NarP haribhaktipari vāpi haridhyānaparo pi vā bhraṣṭo yaḥ svāśramācārātpatitaḥ so bhidhīyate  NarP vedo vā brahmanna labhyetākṛtātmanām yadi labhyeta vijñeyaṃ puṇyaṃ janmāntarārjitam  NarP pūrvārjitāni pāpāni nāśamāyānti yasya vai satsaṅgatirbhavettasya nānyathā ghaṭate hi sā  NarP ravirhi raśimajālena divā hantibahistamaḥ santaḥ sūktimarīcyoścāntardhvāntaṃ hi sarvadā  NarP durlabhāḥ puruṣā loke bhagavadbhaktilālasāḥ teṣāṃ saṅgo bhavedyasya tasya śāntirhi śāśvatī  NarP nārada uvācakiṃlakṣaṇā bhāgavatāste ca kiṃ karṃma kurvate teṣāṃ loko bhavetkīdṛktatsarvaṃ brūhi tattvataḥ  NarP tvaṃ hi bhakto rameśasya devadevasya citriṇaḥ etānnigadituṃ śaktastvato nāstyadhiko paraḥ  NarP sanaka uvācaśṛṇu brahmanparaṃ guhyaṃ mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmanaḥ ña yamuvāca jagannātho yoganidrāvimocitaḥ  NarP yo sau viṣṇuḥ paraṃ jyotirdevadevaḥ sanātanaḥ jagatkarttā śivabrahma svarupavān  NarP yugānte NarP candanāni manojñāni baliṃ yatsarvadā janāḥ bhūṣitā bhūṣaṇaurdivyaistadrāṣṭre sukhino mune  NarP akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī phalapuṣpasamanvitā  NarP vavarṣa bhūmau devendraḥ kāle kāle muniśvaraḥ mattaḥ pūjyo sti ko paraḥ  NarP ahaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ śrīmāñjitāḥ sarve mayarayaḥ vedavedāṅgatattvajño nītiśāstra viśāradaḥ  NarP ajeyo vyāhataiśvaryo mattaḥ ko nyo dhiko bhuvi ahṝṅkāraparasyaivaṃ jātāsūyā tasyāsūyā nu mahatī jātā lokavirodhinī svadehanāśinī vigra sarvasaṃpadvināśinī  NarP asūyāviṣṭamanasi yadi saṃpatpravarttate tuṣāgniṃ vāyusaṃyogamiva jānīhi suvrata  NarP asūyopetamanasāṃ ślādhyā bhavanti viprendra prekṣitā mādhavena ye  NarP saubhāgyaṃ tasya hīyeta yasyāsūyādilāñchanam jāyate nātra saṃdeho jantudveṣo viśeṣataḥ  NarP satataṃ yasya kasyāpi yo dveṣaṃ kurute naraḥ tasya NarP brahmahatyādipāpānāṃ proktā niṣkṛtiruttamaiḥ dāmbhinonindakasyāpi bhrūṇaghrasya na niṣkṛtiḥ  NarP nāstikasya kṛtanghasya dharmopekṣākarasya ca viśvāsaghātakasyāpi niṣkṛtirnāsti suvrate  NarP apatyārthaṃ mahābhāge vṛṇutāṃ ca yathepsitam  NarP atha śrutvā vacastasya muneraurvasya nārada keśinyekaṃ sutaṃ vavre vaṃśasantānakāraṇam  NarP ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi sumatyā hyabhavansutāḥ nāmnāsamañjāḥ keśinyāstanayo munisattama  NarP asamañjāstu karmāṇi cakāronmattaceṣṭitaḥ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sāgarāḥ sarve hyāsandurvṛttacetasaḥ  NarP tadvālabhāvaṃ saṃduṣṭaṃ jñātvā bāhusuto nṛpaḥ cintayāmāsa vidhivatputrakarma vigarhinam  NarP aho kaṣṭatarā loke durjanānāṃ hi saṃgatiḥ kārukaistāḍyate vahṇirayaḥsaṃyogamātrataḥ  NarP aṃśumānnāma tanayo babhūva hyasamañjasaḥ śāstrajño guṇavāndharmī pitāmahahite rataḥ  NarP durvṛttāḥ sāgarāḥ sarve lokopadrava kāriṇaḥ anuṣṭānavatāṃ nityamantarāyā bhavanti te  NarP hutāni yāni yajñeṣu havīṃṣi vidhitraddijaiḥ bubhuje tāni sarvāṇi nirākṛtya divaukasaḥ  NarP svargādāhṛtya savataṃ rambhādyā devayoṣitaḥ bhajanti sāgarāstā vai kacagrahabalātkṛtāḥ  NarP pārijātādivṛkṣāṇāṃ puṣpāṇyāhṛtya te khalāḥ bhūṣayanti svadehāni madyapānaparāyaṇāḥ  NarP sādhuvṛttīḥ samājahnuḥ sadācārānanāśayan mitraiśca yodrumārabdhā balino tyantapāpinaḥ  NarP etaddṛṣṭvātiduḥkhārtā devā indrapurogamāḥ vicāraṃ paramaṃ cakrureteṣuṃ nāśahetave  NarP niścitya vivudhāḥ sarve pātālāntaragocaram kapilaṃ devadeveśaṃ yayuḥ pracchannarupiṇaḥ  NarP dhyāyantamātmanātmānaṃ parānaidaikavigraham prāṇamya daṇḍavadrūmau tuṣṭuvuvridaśāstataḥ  NarP devā ūcuḥnamaste yogine tubhyāṃ sāṅkhyayogaratāya ca nararupapraticchinnaviṣṇave jiṣṇave namaḥ  NarP namaḥ pareśabhaktāya lokānugrahahetave saṃsārāraṇyadāvāgre dharmapālanasetave  NarP mahate vītarāgāya tubhyaṃ bhūyo namo namaḥ sāgaraiḥ pīḍitānasmāṃstrāyasva śaraṇāgatān  NarP kapila uvācaye tu nāśamihecchanti yaśobaladhanāyuṣām ta eva lokānbādhante nātrāśvāryaṃ sugetamāḥ  NarP yastu bādhitumiccheta janānniraparādhinaḥ taṃ vidyātsarvalokeṣu pāpabhogarataṃ surāḥ  NarP karmaṇā manasā vācā yastvanyānbādhate sadā taṃ hanti daivamevāśu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  NarP alpairahobhire vaite nāśameṣyanti sāgarāḥ ityuktaṃ muninā tena kapilena mahātmanā praṇamya taṃ yathānyāyaṃ gatā nākaṃ divaukasaḥ  NarP atrāntare tu sagarovasiṣṭādyairmaharṣibhiḥ ārebhe hayamedhākhyaṃ yajñaṃ karttumanuttamam  NarP tadyajñe yojitaṃ satpimapahṛtya sureśvaraḥ pātāle sthāpayāmāsa kapilo yatra tiṣṭati  NarP gūḍhavigrahaśakreṇa hṛtamaśvaṃ tu sāgarāḥ anveṣṭuṃ babhrabhurlokān bhūrādīṃśca suvismitāḥ  NarP ahaṣṭasatpayaste ca pātālaṃ gantu mudyatāḥ cakhnurmahītalaṃ sarvamekaiko yojanaṃ pṛthak  NarP mṛttikāṃ khanitāṃ te caudadhitīre samākiran tadvāreṇa gatāḥ sarve pātālaṃ sagarātmajāḥ  NarP vicinvanti hayaṃ tatra madonmattā vicetasaḥ  NarP tatrāpaśyanmahātmānaṃ koṭisūryasamaprabham kapilaṃ dhyānanirataṃ vājinaṃ ca tadantike  NarP tataḥ sarve tu saṃrabdhā muniṃ dṛṣṭvātivegataḥ hantumudyuktamanaso vidravantaḥ samāsadan  NarP hanyatāṃ hanyatāmeṣa vadhyatāṃ vadhyatāmayam guhyatāṃ gṛhyatāmāśu ityūcuste parasparam  NarP hṛtāśvaṃ sādhubhāvena bakavaddhyānatatparam santi cāro khalā loke kurvantyāḍambaraṃ mahat  NarP ityuccaranto jahasuḥ kapilaṃ te munīśvaram samastendriyasaṃdohaṃ niyamyātmānamātmani  NarP āsthitaḥ kapilasteṣāṃ tatkarma jñātavānnahi  NarP āsannamṛtyavaste tu vinaṣṭamatayo munim padbhiḥ saṃtāḍayāmāsurbuhūṃ ca jagṛhuḥ pare  NarP tatastyaktasamādhistu sa munirvismitastadā uvāca bhāvagambhīraṃ lokopadravakāriṇaḥ  NarP aiśvaryamadamattānāṃ kṣudhitānāṃ ca kāminām ahṝṅkāravimūḍhānāṃ viveko naiva jāyate  NarP nidherādhāramātreṇa mahī jvalati sarvadā tadeva mānavā bhuktvā jvalantīti kimadbhutam  NarP kimatra citraṃ sujanaṃ bādhante yadi durjanāḥ mahīruhāṃ ścānutaṭe pātayanti nadīrayāḥ  NarP yatra śrīryauṃvanaṃ vāpi śāradā vāpi tiṣṭati tatrāśrīrvṛddhatā nityaṃ murkhatvaṃ cāpi jāyate  NarP aho kanakamāhātmyamākhyātuṃ kena śakyate nāmasāmyādaho citraṃ dhattūro pimadapradaḥ  NarP bhavedyadi khalasya śrīḥ saiva lokavināśinī yathā sakhāgneḥ pavanaḥ pannagasya yathā viṣam  NarP aho dhanamadāndastu paśyannapi na paśyati yadi paśyatyāmahitaṃ sa paśyati na saṃśayaḥ  NarP ityuktvā kapilaḥ kruddho netrābhyāṃ sasṛje nalam sa vahniḥ sāgarānsarvānbhasmasādakarotkṣaṇāt  NarP yannetrajānalaṃ dṛṣṭvā pātālatalavāsinaḥ akālapralayaṃ matvā cukruśuḥ śokalālasāḥ  NarP tadagnitāpitāḥ sarve dandaśūkāśca rākṣasāḥ sāgaraṃ viviśuḥ śīghraṃ satāṃ kopo hi duḥsahaḥ  NarP atha tasya mahīpasya samāgamyādhvaraṃ tadā devadūta uvācedaṃ sarvaṃ vṛttaṃ hi yakṣate  NarP etatsamākarṇya vacaḥ sagaraḥ sarvavitprabhuḥ daivena śikṣitā duṣṭā ityuvācāti harṣitaḥ  NarP mātā vā janako vāpi bhrātā vā tanayo pi vā adharmaṃ kurute yastu sa eva ripuriṣyate  NarP yastvadharmeṣu nirataḥ sarvalokavirodhakṛt taṃ ripuṃ paramaṃ vidyācchāstrāṇāmeṣa nirṇayaḥ  NarP sagaraḥ putranāśe pi na śuśoca munīśvaraḥ durvṛttanidhanaṃ yasmātsatāmutsāha kāraṇam  NarP yajñeṣvanadhikāratvādaputrāṇāmiti smṛteḥ pautraṃ tamaṃśumantaṃ hi putratve katavānprabhuḥ  NarP asamañjaḥsutaṃ tu sudhīyaṃ vāgvidāṃvaram yuyoja sāravidbhūyo hyaścānayanakarmaṇi  NarP sa gatastadviladvāre dṛṣṭvā taṃ munipuṅgavam kapilaṃ tejasāṃrāśiṃ sāṣṭāṅgaṃpraṇanāmahā  NarP kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā vinaye nāgrataḥ sthitaḥ uvāca śāntamanasaṃ devadevaṃ sanātanam  NarP aṃśumānuvācadauḥśīlyaṃ yatkṛtaṃ brahmanmatpitṛvyaiḥ kṣamasvatat paropakāraniratāḥ kṣamāsārā hi sādhavaḥ  NarP durjaneṣvapi sattveṣu dayāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ nahi saṃharatejyotsnāṃ candraścāṇḍālaveśmanaḥ  NarP bādhyamāno pi sujanaḥ sarveṣāṃ sukhakṛdbhavet dadāti paramāṃ tuṣṭiṃ bhakṣyamāṇo maraiḥ śaśī  NarP dāritaśchinna evāpi hyāmodenaiva candanaḥ saurabhaṃ kurute sarvaṃ tathaiva sujanojanaḥ  NarP kṣāntyā ca tapasā cāraistadguṇajñā munīśvarāḥ saṃjātaṃ śāsituṃ lokāṃstvāṃ viduḥ puruṣottama  NarP namo brahmanmune tubhyaṃ namaste brahmamūrttaye namo brahmaṇyaśīlāya brahmadhyānaparāya ca  NarP iti stuto munistena prasannavadanastadā varaṃ varaya cetyāha prasanno smi tavānagha  NarP evamukte tu muninā hyaṃśumānpraṇipatyatam prāpayāsmatpitṝnbrāhmaṃ lokamityabhyabhāṣata  NarP tatastasyādisaṃtuṣṭo muniḥ provāca sādaram gaṅgāmānīya pautraste nayiṣyati pitṝndivam  NarP tvatpautreṇa samānītā gaṅgā puṇyajalā nadī kṛtvaitāndhūtapāpānvai nayiṣyati paraṃ padam  NarP prāpayainaṃ hayaṃ vatsa yataḥ syātpūrṇamadhvaram pitāmahāntikaṃ prāpya sāśvaṃ vṛttaṃ nyavedayat  NarP sagarastena paśunā taṃ yajñaṃ brahmaṇaiḥ saha vidhāya tapasā viṣṇumārādhyāpapadaṃhareḥ  NarP jajñe hyaṃśumataḥ putro dilīpa iti viśrutaḥ tasmādbhagīratho jāto yo gaṅgāmānayaddivaḥ  NarP bhagīrathasya tapasā tuṣṭo brahmā dadau mune gaṅgāṃ bhagīrathāyāḥ cintayāmā sa dhāraṇe  NarP tataśca śivamārādhya taddvārā svarṇadīṃ bhuvam ānīya tajjalaiḥ spṛṣṭvā pūtānninye divaṃ pitṝn  NarP bhagīrathānvaye jātaḥ sudaso nāma bhūpatiḥ yasya putro mitrasahaḥ sarvalokeṣu viśrutaḥ  NarP vaśiṣṭaśāpātprātpaḥ sa saudāso rākṣasīṃ tanum gaṅgābinduniṣeveṇaṃpunarmukto nṛpo bhavat  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde gaṅgāmāhātmyaṃ nāma aṣṭamo dhyāyaḥnārada uvācaśatpaḥ kathaṃ vasiṣṭena saundāso nṛpasattamaḥ gaṅgābindūbhiṣekeṇa punaḥ śuddho bayatkatham  NarP sarvametadaśeṣeṇa bhrātarme vaktumahrasi śṛṇvatāṃ vadatāṃ caiva gaṅgākhyānaṃ śubhāvaham  NarP sanaka uvācasaudāsaḥ sarvadharmajñaḥ sarvajño guṇavāñchuciḥ bubhuje pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ pitṛvadrañjayanprajāḥ  NarP sageraṇa yathā pūrvaṃ mahīyaṃ satpasāgarā rakṣitā tadvadamunā sarvadharmāvirodhinā  NarP putrapautrasamāyuktaḥ sarvaiśvaryasamanvitaḥ triṃśadaṣṭasahasrāṇi bubhuje pṛthivīṃ yuvā  NarP saudāsastvekadā rājā mṛgayābhiratirvanam viveśva sabalaḥ samyak śodhitaṃ hyāsamantribhiḥ  NarP niṣādaiḥ saditastatra vinighranmūgalañcayam āsasāda nadīṃ revāṃ dharmajñaḥ sa pipāsitaḥ  NarP sudāsatanayastatra snātvā kṛtvāhnikaṃ mune bhuktvā ca mantribhiḥ sārdhdaṃ tāṃ niśāṃ tatra cāvasat  NarP tataḥ prātaḥ samuthāya kṛtvā paurvāhnikīṃ kriyām babhrāma mantrisahito narmadātīraje vane  NarP vanādvanāntaraṃ gacchanneka eva mahīpattiḥ ākarṇakṛṣṭabāṇaḥ sat kṛṣṇasāraṃ samanvagāt  NarP dūrasainyo śvamārūḍhaḥ sa rājānuvrajanmṛgam vyāghradvayaṃ guhāsaṃsthamapaśthamapaśyatsurate ratam  NarP mṛgapṛṣṭaṃ parityajya vyāghrayoḥ saṃmukhaṃ yayau dhanuḥsaṃhitabāṇena tenāsau śaraśāstravit  NarP tāṃ vyāghrīṃ pātayāmāsa tīkṣṇāgranataparvaṇā patamānā tu sāvyāghrī ṣaṭratriṃśadyojanāyatā  NarP taḍitvaddhoranirghoṣā rākṣasī vikṛtābhavat patitāṃ svapriyāṃ vīkṣya dviṣansa vyāghrarākṣasaḥ  NarP pratikriyāṃ kariṣyāmītyuktavā cāntardadhe tadā rājā tu bhayasaṃvigno vanesainyaṃ sametya ca  NarP tadrṛttaṃ kathayansarvānsvāṃ purīṃ sa nyavarttata śaṅkamānastu tadrakṣaḥkṛtyā drājā sudāsajaḥ  NarP paritatyāja mṛgayāṃ tataḥ prabhṛti nārada gate bahutithe kāle hayamedhamakhaṃ nṛpaḥ  NarP samārebhe prasannātmā vaśiṣṭādyamunīśvaraiḥ tatra brahmādidevebhyo havirdattvā yathāvidhi  NarP samāpya yajñaniṣkrānto vaśiṣṭaḥ strātako pi ca atrāntare rākṣaso sau nṛpahisitabhāryakaḥ kartuṃ pratikriyāṃ rājñe samāyātoruṣānvitaḥ  NarP sa rākṣasastasya gurau prayāte vaśiṣṭaveṣaṃ tu tadaiva dhṛtvā rājānamabhyetya jagāda bhokṣye māṃsaṃ samicchāmyahamityuvāca  NarP bhūyaḥ samāsthāya sa sūdavaṣaṃ paktvāmiṣaṃ mānupamasya vādāt sthitaśca rājāpi hari yapātre dhṛtvā gurorāgamanaṃ pratīkṣan  NarP tanmāṃsaṃ hemapātrasthaṃ saudāso vinayānvitaḥ samāgatāya guruve dadau tasmau sasādaram  NarP taṃ dṛṣṭvā cintayāmāsa guruḥ kimiti vismitaḥ  NarP apaśyanmānuṣaṃ māsaṃ parameṇa samādhinā aho sya rājño dauḥśīlyamabhakṣyaṃ dattavānmama  NarP iti viramayamāpannaḥ pramanyurabhavanmuniḥ abho jyaṃ madvighātāya datta hi pṛthivīpate  NarP tasmāttavāpi bhavatu hyetadeva hi bhojanam nṛmāṃsaṃ rakṣasāmeva bhojyaṃ dattaṃ mama tvayā  NarP tadyāhi rākṣasatvaṃ tvaṃ tadāhārocitaṃ nṛpā iti śāpaṃ dadatyasminsaudāso bhayavihvūlaḥ  NarP ājñatpo bhavataiveti sakaṃpo sma vyajijñapat bhūrāśṛ cintayāmāsa vaśiṣṭastena noditaḥ  NarP rakṣasā vañcitaṃ bhūpaṃ jñātavān divyacakṣuṣā rājāpi jalamādāya vaśiṣṭaṃ śaptumudyataḥ  NarP samudyataṃ guruṃ śaptaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo ruṣānvitam madayantī priyātasya pratyuvācātha suvratā  NarP madayantyuvācabho bho kṣatriyadāyāda kopa saṃhartumarhasi tvayā yatkarma bhoktavyaṃ tatprātpaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP guru tukṛtya huṅkṛtya yo vadenmṛḍhadhīrnaraḥ araṇye nirjale deśa sa bhaveddhahyarākṣasaḥ  NarP jitendriyā jitakrodhā guru śuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ prayānti brahmasadanamiti śāstreṣu niścayaḥ  NarP tayokto bhūpatiḥ kopaṃ tyaktvā bhāryāṃ nananda ca jalaṃ kutra kṣipāmīti cintayāmāsa cātmanā  NarP tajjalaṃ yatra saṃsiktaṃ tadbhavedbhasma niścitam iti matvā jalaṃ tattu pādayornyakṣipatsvayam  NarP tajjalaspaśimātreṇa pādau kalmāṣatāṃ gatau kalmāṣapāda ityevaṃ tataḥ prabhṛti vistṛtaḥ  NarP kalmāṣapādo matimān priyayāścāsitastadā manasā so tibhītastu vavande caraṇaṃ guroḥ  NarP uvāca ca prapannastaṃ prāñjalirnayakovidaḥ kṣamasva bhagavansarvaṃ nāparādhaḥ kṛto mayā  NarP tacchutvovāca bhūpālaṃ munirniḥśvasya duḥkhitaḥ ātmānaṃ garhayāmāsa hyavivekaparāyaṇam  NarP avivero hi sarveṣāmāpadāṃ paramaṃ padam vivekarahito loke paśureva na saṃśayaḥ  NarP rājñā tvajānatā nūnametatkarmocitaṃ kṛtam vivekarahito jño haṃ yataḥ pāpaṃ samācaret  NarP vivekaniyato yāti yo vā ko vāpi nirvṛttim vivekahīnamānpoti ko vā yo vāpyanirvṛtim  NarP ityuktavā cātmanātmānaṃ pratyuvāca munirnṛpam nātyantiṅkaṃ bhavedetaddādaśābdaṃ bhaviṣyati  NarP gaṅgābindūbhiṣiktastu tyakttvā vai rākṣasīṃ tanum pūrvarupaṃ tvamāpanno bhokṣyase medinīmimām  NarP tadvindusekasaṃbhūtajñānena gatakalmaṣaḥ harisevāparo bhūtvā parāṃ śāntiṃ gamiṣyasi śubhāvahamityuktvātharvavidbhūpaṃ vaśiṣṭaḥ svāśramaṃ yayau rājāpi duḥkhasaṃpanno rākṣasīṃ tānumāśritaḥ  NarP kṣutpapāsāviśeṣārto nityaṃ krodhaparāyaṇaḥ kṛṣṇakṣapādyutirbhīmo babhrāma vijane vane  NarP mṛgāṃśca vividhāṃstatra mānuṣāṃśca sarīsṛpān vihaṅgamānplavaṅgāṃśca praśastāṃstānabhakṣayat  NarP asthibhirbahubhirbhūyaḥ pītaraktakalevaraiḥ raktāntapretakeśaiśaaca citrāsīdbhūrbhayaṅkarī  NarP ṛtutraye sa pṛthivīṃ śatayo janavistṛtām kṛtvātiduḥkhitāṃ paścādvanāntaramupāgamat  NarP tatrāpi kṛtavānnityaṃ naramāṃsāśanaṃ sadā jagāma narmadātīraṃ munisiddhaniṣevitam  NarP vicarannarmadātīre sarvalokabhayaṅkaraḥ apaśyatkañcana muniṃ ramantaṃ priyayā saha  NarP kṣudhānalena saṃtatpastaṃ muniṃ samupādravat jāgrāha cātivegena vyādho mṛgaśiśaṃ yathā  NarP brāhmaṇī svapatiṃ vīkṣya niśācarakarasthitam śirasyañjalimādhāya provāca bhayavihvālā  NarP brāhmaṇyuvācabho bho nṛpatiśārdūla trāhi māṃ bhayavihvalām prāṇapriya pradānena kuru pūrṇaṃ manoratham  NarP nānmā mitrasahastvaṃ hi sūryavaṃśasamudbhavaḥ na rākṣasastato nāthāṃ pāhi māṃ vijane vane  NarP yā nārī bharttṛrahitā jīvatyapi mṛtopamā tathāpi bālavaidhavyaṃ kiṃ vakṣyāmyarimardana  NarP na mātāpitarau jāne nāpi bandhuṃ ca kañcana patireva paro bandhuḥ paramaṃ jīvanaṃ mama  NarP bhavānyettyakhilāndharmānyoṣitāṃ varttanaṃ yathā trāyasva bandhurahitāṃ bālāpatyāṃ janeśvara  NarP kathaṃ jīvāmi patyāsminhīnā hi vijane vane duhitāhaṃ bhagavatastrāhi māṃ patidānataḥ  NarP praṇadānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati vadantīti mahāprājñāḥ prāṇadānaṃ kuruṣva me  NarP ityuktāvā sā papātāsya rākṣasasya padāgrataḥ evaṃ saṃprārthyamāno pi brāhmaṇyā rākṣaso dvijam  NarP abhakṣayakṛṣṇasāraśiśuṃ vyāghro yathā balāt  NarP tato vilapya bahudhā tasya patnī pativratā pūrvaśāpahataṃ bhūpamaśapatkrodhitā punaḥ  NarP patiṃ me suratāsaktaṃ yasmāddhiṃsitavānbalāt tasmātstrīsaṅgamaṃ prātpastvamapi prāpsyase mṛtim  NarP śatvaivaṃ brāhmaṇī kruddhā punaḥ śāpāntaraṃ dadau rākṣasatvaṃ dhruvaṃ te stu matpatirbhakṣito yataḥ  NarP so pi śāpadvayaṃ śrutvā tayā dattaṃ niśācaraḥ pramanyuḥ prāhi visṛjankopādaṅgārasaṃcayam  NarP duṣṭe kasmātpradattaṃ mevṛthā śāpadvayaṃ tvayā ekasyaivāparādhasya śāpastveko mamocitaḥ  NarP yasmātkṣipasi duṣṭāgyemayi śāpantaraṃ tataḥ piśācayonimadyaiva yāhi putrasamanvitā  NarP tenaivaṃ brahmaṇī śatpā piśācatvaṃ tadā gatā kṣudhārtā susvaraṃ bhīmārurodāpatyasaṃyutā  NarP rākṣasaśca piśācī ca krośantau nirjane vane jagmaturnarmadātīre vanaṃ rākṣasasevitam  NarP audāsīnyaṃ gurau kṛtvā rākṣasīṃ tanumā śritaḥ tatrāste duḥkhasaṃtatpaḥ kaścillokavirodhakṛt  NarP rākṣasaṃ ca piśācīṃ ca dṛṣṭvā ravavaṭamāgatau uvāca krodhabahulo vaṭastho brahmarākṣasaḥ  NarP kimarthamāgatau bhīmau yuvāṃ matsthānamīpsitam īdṛśau kena pāpena jātau me bruvatāṃ dhruvam  NarP saudāsastadvacaḥ śrutvātayā yaccātmanā kṛtam sarvaṃ nivedayitvāsmai paścādetaduvāca ha  NarP saudāsa uvācakastvaṃ vada mahābhāga tvayā vai kiṃ kṛtaṃ purā sakhyurmamāti snehena tatsarvaṃ vaktumarhasi  NarP karoti vañcanaṃ mitre yo vā ko vāpi duṣṭadhīḥ sa hi pāpapālaṃ bhuṅkte yātanāstu yugāyutam  NarP jantūnāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni kṣīyante mitradarśanāt tasmānmitreṣu matimānna kuryādvaṃyanaṃ kadā  NarP kalmāṣapādenetyukto vaṭastho brahmarākṣasaḥ uvāca audāsīnyaṃ guroḥ kṛtvā prātpavānīdṛśīṃ gatim  NarP nalabhe haṃ sukhaṃ kiṃ cijjitāhāro tiduḥkhitaḥ mayā tu bhakṣitā viprāḥ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥ  NarP kṣutpipāsāparo nityamantastāpena pīḍitaḥ jagatrāsakaro nityaṃ māṃsāśanaparāyaṇaḥ  NarP gurvavajñā manuṣyāṇāṃ rākṣasatvapradāyinī mayānubhūtametaddhi tataḥ śrīmānna cācaret  NarP kalmāṣapāda uvācagurustu kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ kastvayāślāghitaḥ purā tadvadasva sarave sarvaṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me  NarP brahmarākṣasa uvācaguravaḥ santi bahavaḥ pūjyā vandyāśca sādaram yātānahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvaikamanāḥ sarave  NarP adhyāpakaśca vedānāṃ vedārthayutibaidhakaḥ śāstravaktā dharmavaktā nītiśāstropadeśakaḥ  NarP mantropadeśavyākhyākhyākṛdvedasadaṃhṛttathā vratopadeśakaścaiva bhayatrātānnado hi ca  NarP śvaśuro mātulaścaiva jyeṣṭhabhrātā tadyathāvaddhi brūhi me  NarP brahmarākṣasa uvācasādhu sādhu mahāprājña yatpṛṣṭaṃ tadvadāmi te gurumāhātmyakathanaṃ śravaṇaṃ cānumodanam  NarP sarveṣāṃ śreya ādhatte tasmādvakṣyāmi sāṃpratam ete śṛṇoti purāṇāni satataṃ bhaktisaṃyutaḥ tasya syānnirmalā buddhirbhūyo dharmaparāyaṇaḥ  NarP purāṇaśravaṇādbhaktirjāyate śrīpatau śubhā viṣṇubhaktanṛṇāṃ bhūpa dharme buddhiḥ pravarttate  NarP dharmātpāpāni naśyanti jñānaṃ śuddhaṃ ca jāyate dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ ye phalānyabhilipsavaḥ  NarP śruṇuyuste purāṇāni prāhuritthaṃ purāvidaḥ ahaṃ tu gautamamuneḥ sarvajñādrūhyavādinaḥ  NarP śrutavānsarvadharmārtha gaṅgātīre manorame kadācitparameśasya pūjāṃ karttumahaṃ gataḥ  NarP upasthitāyāpi tasmai praṇāmaṃ na hyakāriṣam sa tu śānto mahābuddhirgauntamastejasāṃ nidhiḥ  NarP mantroditāni karmaṇi karotītimudaṃ ya yau yastvarcito mayā devaḥ śivaḥ sarvajagadguruḥ  NarP gurvavajñā kṛtāyena rākṣasaṃtve niyuktavān jñānato jñānato vāpi yo vajñāṃ kurute guroḥ  NarP tasyaivāśu kaliṅgadeśasaṃbhūto nānmrā garga iti smṛtaḥ vahangaṅgājalaṃ skandhe stuvan viśveśvaraṃ prabhum  NarP gāyannāmāni tasyaiva mudā hṛṣṭatan ruhaḥ tamāgataṃ muniṃ dṛṣṭvā piśācīrākṣasau ca tau  NarP prātpā naḥ pāraṇetyuktvā prādvavannūrdhvabāhavaḥ tena kīrtitanāmāni śrutvā dūre vyavasthitāḥ aśaktāstaṃ dharṣayitumidamūcuśca rākṣasāḥ  NarP aho vipra mahābhāga namastubhya mahātmane nāmakīrtanamāhātmyādrākṣasā dūragāvayam  NarP asmābhirbhakṣitāḥ pūrvaṃ viprāḥ koṭisahasraḥ nāmaprāvaraṇaṃ vipra rakṣati tvāṃ mahābhayayāt  NarP nāmaśravaṇamātreṇa rākṣasā api bho vayam parāṃ śāntiṃ NarP adyaināṃ baddhavaprāṃ ca karttuṃ jātā matirmama tadbhavānmodatāṃ deva dattādājñāṃ ca me nagha  NarP iti śrutvā vacastasya mantriṇo nṛpasattamaḥ mumude titarāṃ bhūpaḥ svayaṃ kartuṃ samudyataḥ  NarP tameva mantriṇāṃ tatra yuyoja śubhakarmaṇi tato rājājñayā so pi buddhisāgarako mudā  NarP sarasīṃ sāgaraṃ karttumudyataḥ puṇyakṛttamaḥ dhanuṣāṃ caiva pañcāśatsarvato vistṛtāyatām  NarP sarasīṃ baddhasu śilāṃ cakārāgādhaśambarām tāṃ vinirmāya sarasīṃ rājñe sarvaṃ nyavedayat  NarP tasyāṃ tataḥ prabhṛti vai sarve pi vanacāriṇaḥ pānthāḥ pipāsitā bhūpa labhante sma jalaṃ śubham  NarP kadācitsvāyuṣaścānte sa mantrī buddhisāgaraḥ pramṛto gatavāṃllokaṃ lokaśāsturmama prabho  NarP tadarthaṃ tu mayā pṛṣṭo dharmo dharmalipiṅkaraḥ citragutpastu tatkarma mahyaṃ sarvaṃ nyavedayat  NarP upadeṣṭā svayaṃ cāsau dharmakāryasya bhūpateḥ tasmāddharmavimānaṃ tu samāroḍhumihārhati  NarP ityukte citragutpena samājñatpo mayā nṛpa vimānaṃ dharmasaṃjñaṃ tu āroḍhuṃ buddhisāgaraḥ  NarP atha kālāntare rājansarājā vīrabhadrakaḥ mṛto gato mama sthānaṃ namaścakre mudānvitaḥ  NarP mayā tu tatra tasyāpi pṛṣṭaṃ karmākhilaṃ nṛpa kathitaṃ citragutpena dharmaṃ sarasisaṃbhavam  NarP tadā samyaṅmayā rājā bodhito bhūdyathāśṛṇu adhityakāyāṃ bhūpāla saikatasya gireḥ parā  NarP lāvakenāmunācañcvā khātaṃ dvyaṃṅguprambuni tataḥ kālāntare tena vārāheṇa nṛpottama  NarP khanitaṃ hastamātraṃ tu jalaṃ tuṇḍena cātmanaḥ tato nyadāmuyā kālyāhasta yugmamitaḥ kṛtaḥ  NarP khāto jale mahārāja toyaṃ māsadvayaṃ sthitam pītaṃ kṣudrairvanacaraiḥ sattvaistṛṣṇāsamākulaiḥ  NarP tato varṣatrāyānte tu gajatānena suvrata hastatrayamitaḥ khātaḥ kṛtastatrādhikaṃ jalam  NarP māsatraye sthitaṃ tacca payo jīvairvanecaraiḥ bhavāṃstatra samāyāto jalaśoṣāda nantaram  NarP māse tatra tu saṃprātpaṃ hastaṃ khātvā jalaṃ nṛpa tatastasyopadeśena mantriṇo nṛpate tvayā  NarP pañcāśaddhanurutkhātaṃ jātaṃ tatatra mahājalam punaḥ śilābhiḥ sudṛḍhaṃ baddhaṃ jātaṃ mahatsaraḥ vṛkṣāśca ropitāstatra sarvalokopakāriṇaḥ  NarP tena svasvena puṇyena pañcaite jagatīpate vimānaṃ dharmyamāruḍhāstvamāṇyenaṃ samāruha  NarP iti vākyaṃ samākarṇya mama rājā sa bhūmipa āruroha vimānaṃ tatṣaṣṭho rājā samāṃśabhāk  NarP iti te sarvamākhyātaṃ taḍāgajanitaṃ phalam śrutvaitanmucyate pāpādājanmamaraṇāntikāt  NarP yo naraḥ śraddhayo yukto vyākhyātaṃ śruṇuyātpaṭhet so pyāpnotyakhilaṃ puṇyaṃ saronirmāṇasaṃbhavam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde dharmākhyāne dvādaśo dhyāyaḥdharmarāja uvācadevatāyatanaṃ yastu kurute kārayatyapi śivasyāpi harervāpi tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu  NarP mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaścaiva lakṣakoṭikulānvitaḥ kalpatrayaṃ viṣṇupade tiṣṭatyeva na saṃśayaḥ  NarP mṛdaiva kurute yastu devatāyatanaṃ niraḥ mṛdaiva kurute yastu devatāyatanaṃ naraḥ yāvatpuṇyaṃ bhavettasya tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu  NarP divyadehadharo bhūtvā vimānavaramāsthitaḥ kalpatrayaṃ viṣṇupade tiṣṭatyeva na saṃśayaḥ  NarP mṛdaiva kurute yastu devatāyatanaṃ naraḥ yāvatpuṇyaṃ bhavettasya tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu  NarP divyadehadharo bhūtvā vimānavaramāsthitaḥ kalpatrayaṃ viṣṇupade sthitvā brahmapuraṃ vrajet  NarP kalpavadvayaṃ sthitastatra punaḥ kalpaṃ vaseddivi tatastu yogināmeva kule jāto dayonvitāḥ  NarP vaiṣṇavaṃ yogamāsthāya muktiṃ vrajati śāśvatīm dārubhiḥ kurute yastu tasya syāddiguṇaṃ phalam  NarP triguṇaṃ ceṣṭakābhistu śilābhistaccaturgaṇam sphuṭikābhiḥ śilābhistu jñeyaṃ daśaguṇottaram  NarP tānmībhistacchataguṇaṃ hemnā koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet devālayaṃ taḍāgaṃ vā grāmaṃ vā pālayettu yaḥ  NarP kartuḥ śataguṇaṃ tasya puṇyaṃ bhavati bhūpate devālayasya śuśrūṣāṃ lepasecanamaṇḍanaiḥ  NarP kuryādyatsatataṃ bhaktyā tasya puṇyamanantakam vetanādviṣṭito vāpi puṇyakarmapravarttitāḥ  NarP te gacchanti dharādhārāḥ śāścataṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ padam tāḍāgārddhaphalaṃ rājankāsāre parikīrtitam  NarP kūpe pādaphalaṃ jñeyaṃ vāpyāṃ padmākaronmitam vāpīśataguṇaṃ proktaṃ kulyāyāṃ bhūpateḥ phalam  NarP dṛṣadbhistudhanīḥkuryānmṛdā niṣkiñcano janaḥ tayoḥ phalaṃ samānaṃ syādityāha kamalodbhavaḥ  NarP dadyādāḍhyāstu nagaraṃ hastamātramakiñcanaḥ bhuvaṃ tayoḥ samaphalaṃ prāhurvedavido janāḥ  NarP dhanāḍhyaḥ kurute yastu taḍāgaṃ phalasādhanam daridraḥ kurute kūpaṃ samaṃ puṇyaṃ prakīrtitam  NarP āśramaṃ kārayedyastu bahujantūpakārakam sa yāti brahmabhuvanaṃ kulatrayasamanvitaḥ  NarP dhenurvā brahmaṇo vāpi yo vā ko vāpi bhūpate kṣaṇārddhaṃ tasya chāyāyāṃ tiṣṭansvargaṃ nayatyamum  NarP ārāmakārakā rājandevatāgṛhakāriṇaḥ taḍāgagrāmakarttāraḥ pūjyante hariṇā saha  NarP sarvalokopakārārthaṃ puṣpārāmaṃ janeśvarā kurvate devatārthaṃ vā teṣāṃ puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu  NarP tatra yāvanti parṇāni kusumāni bhavanti ca tāvadvarṣāṇi nākastho modate kulakoṭibhiḥ  NarP prākārakāriṇastasya kaṇṭakāvaraṇapradāḥ prayānti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yugānāmekasatpatim  NarP tulasīropaṇaṃ ye tu kurtate manuje śvara teṣāṃ puṇyaphalaṃ rājanvadato me niśāmaya  NarP satpakoṭikulairyukto mātṛtaḥ pitṛtastathā vasetkalpaśataṃ sāgraṃ nārāyaṇapadaṃ nṛpa  NarP ūrddhapuṇḍradharo yastu tulasīmūlamṛtstrayā gopikācandanenāpi citrakūṭamṛdāpi vā gaṅgāmṛtikayā caiva tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu  NarP vimānavaramāruḍho gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ saṃgīyamānacarito modate viṣṇuṃmadire  NarP patrāṇi tulasīmūlādyāvanti patitāni vai tāvanti brahmahatyādipātakāni hatāni ca  NarP tulasyāṃ secayedyastu jalaṃ culukamātrakam kṣīrodavāsinā sārddhaṃ vasedācandratārakam  NarP dadāti brāhmaṇānāṃ yaḥ komalaṃ tulasīdalam sa yāti brahmasadane kulatritayatasaṃyutaḥ  NarP śālaprāmerpayedyastu tulasyāstu dalāni ca sa vasedviṣṇubhavane yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam  NarP kaṇṭakāvaraṇaṃ yastu prākāraṃ vāpi kārayet so pyekaviṃśatikulairmodate viṣṇumandire  NarP yo rccayeddharipādābjaṃ tulasyāḥ komalairdalaiḥ na tasya punarāvṛttirviṣṇulokānnareśvara  NarP dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ yaḥ kṣīreṇa snāpayeddharim kulāyutayutaḥ so pi modate vaiṣṇave pade  NarP prasthamātreṇa payasā yaḥ snāpayati keśavam kulāyutāyutayutaḥ so pi viṣṇupure vaset  NarP ghṛtaprasthena yo viṣṇuṃ dvādaśyāṃ snāpayennaraḥ kulakoṭiyuto rājansāyujyaṃ labhate hareḥ  NarP pañcāmṛtena yaḥ snānamekādaśyāṃ tu kārayet viṣṇoḥ sāyujyakaṃ tasya bhavetyulaśatāyutaiḥ  NarP ekādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ vā nṛpottama nālikerodakairviṣṇuṃ snāpayettatphalaṃ śṛṇu  NarP daśajanmārjitaiḥ pāpairvimukto nṛpasattama śatadvayakulairyukto modate viṣṇunā saha  NarP ikṣutoyena deveśaṃ yaḥ snāpayati bhūpate keśavaṃ lakṣapitṛbhiḥ sārddhaṃ viṣṇupadaṃ vrajet  NarP puṣpodakena govindaṃ tathā gandhodakena ca snāpayitvā hariṃ bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaṃ padamānpuyāt  NarP jalena vastrapūtena yaḥ snāpayati mādhavam sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇunā saha modate  NarP kṣīrādyaiḥ snāpayedyastu ravisaṃkramaṇe harim sa vasedviṣṇusadane trisatpapuruṣaiḥ saha  NarP śuklapakṣe caturddaśyāmaṣṭamyāṃ pūrṇimādine  NarP ekādaśyāṃ bhānuvāre dvādaśyāṃ pañcamītithau somasūryoparāge ca manvādiṣuyugādiṣu  NarP arddhodaye ca sūryasya puṣyārke rohiṇībudhe tathaiva śaniro hiṇyāṃ bhaumāśvinyāṃ tathaiva ca  NarP śanyāṃ bhṛvabhṛge caivabhṛgurevurevatisaṅgame tathā budhānurādhāyāṃ śravaṇārke tathaiva ca  NarP tathā ca somaśravaṇe hastayukte bṛhaspatau budhāṣṭamyāṃ budhāṣāḍhe puṇye vine tathā  NarP strāpaye tpayasā viṣṇuṃ śāntimān vāgyataḥ śuciḥ ghṛtena madhunā vāpi dadhnā vā tatphalaṃ śṛṇu  NarP sarvayajñaphalaṃ prāpye sarvapāpavivaparjitaḥ vaseṣṭiṣṇupure sārdaṃ trisatpapuruṣairmṛpa  NarP tatraiva jñānamāsādya yogināmapi durlabham mokṣamāproti nṛpate punarāvṛttidurlabham  NarP kṛṣṇapakṣe caturdaśaayāṃ somavāre ca bhūpate śivaṃ saṃstrāpya dugdhena śivasāyujyamānpuyāt  NarP nālikerodakenāpi śivaṃ saṃstrāpya bhaktitaḥ aṣṭamyāminduvāre vā śivasāyujyamaśnute  NarP śuklapakṣe caturdaśyāmaṣyamyāṃ vāpi bhūpate ghṛtena madhunā strāpya śivāṃ tatsāmyatāṃ vrajet  NarP tilatailena saṃstrāpya viṣṇuṃ vā śivamevaṃ ca sa yāti tattatsārupyaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha satpabhiḥ  NarP śivamiśrurasenāpi yaḥ snāpayati bhaghaktitaḥ śivaloke vasetkalpaṃ sasatpapuruṣaiḥ saha  NarP ghṛtena snāpayelliṅgamutthāne dvādaśīdine kṣīreṇa vā mahābhāga tatphalaṃ śṛṇu madgirā  NarP janmāyutakṛtakaiḥ pāpairdarmukto manujo nṛpa koṭi saṃkhyaṃ samuddhṛkatya svakulaṃ śivatāṃ vrajet  NarP sampūjya gandhakusumairviṣṇuṃ viṣṇutithau nṛpa janmāyutārjitaiḥ pāpairmukto vrajati tatpadam  NarP padmapuṣpeṇa yo viṣṇuṃ śivāṃ vā pūjayennaraḥ sa yāti viṣṇubhavanaṃ kulakoṭisamanvitaḥ  NarP hariṃ ca ketakīpuṣpaiḥ śivaṃ dhattūrajairniśi saṃpūjya pāpanirmukto vasedbhiṣṇupure yugam  NarP hariṃ tu cāmpakaiḥ purṣperarkaṣpaiśca śaṅkaram samabhyarcya mahārāja tattatsālokyamānpuyāt  NarP śaṅkara syāthavā viṣṇorghṛtayuktaṃ ca gugagulum dattvā dhūpe naro bhaktyā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate  NarP tilatailānvitaṃ dīpaṃ viṣṇorvā śaṅkarasya vā dattvā naraḥ sarvakāmānmaṃprāpnoti nṛpottama  NarP ghṛtena dīpaṃ yo dadyācchaṅkarāyātha viṣṇave sa muktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo gaṅgāsnānaphalaṃ labhet  NarP grāmayena vāpi tailena rājannanyena vā punaḥ dīpaṃ tattvā mahāviṣṇoḥ śivasyāpi phalaṃ śṛṇu  NarP sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sarvaiśvaryasamanvitaḥ tattatsālokyamāpnoti triḥbhatpapuruṣānvitaḥ  NarP yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ bhojyaṃ tattadīśāya viṣṇave dattvā tattatpadaṃ yāti catvāriśatkulānvitaḥ  NarP yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ vastu natadviprāya dāpayet sa yāti viṣṇubhavanaṃ punarāvṛttidurlabham  NarP bhrūṇahāsvarṇadānena śuddho bhavati bhūpate annatoyasamandānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati  NarP annadaḥ prāṇadaḥ proktaḥ prāṇadaścāpi sarvadaḥ sarvadānaphalaṃ yasmādannadasya nṛpottama  NarP annado brahmasadanaṃ yātivaṃśāyutānvitaḥ na tasya punarāvṛttiriti śāstreṣu niścitam  NarP sadyastuṣṭikaraṃ jñeyaṃ jaladānaṃ yato dhikam annadānānnṛpaśreṣṭha nirdiṣṭaṃ śrahmavādibhiḥ  NarP mahāpātakayukto vā yukto vāpyupapātakaiḥ jalado mucyate tebhya ityāha kamalodbhavaḥ  NarP śarīramannājaṃ prāhuḥ prāṇāmapyannajānviduḥ tasmādannaprado jñeyaḥ prāṇadaḥ pṛthivīpate  NarP yadyatuṣṭikaraṃ dānaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam tasmādannasamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti bhūpāla bhūpale  NarP annadasya kule jātā āsahaṃstra nṛpotma napakaṃ te na paśaayanti tasmādannaprado varaḥ  NarP pādābhyaṅgaṃbhaktiyukto yo titheḥ kurute naraḥ sa snātaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu gaṅgāsnānapuraḥsaram  NarP tailābhyaṅgaṃ mahārāja brāhmaṇānāṃ karoti yaḥ sa strāto ṣṭaśataṃ sāgraṃ gaṅgāyāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP rogitānbrahmāṇānyastu premṇā rakṣati rakṣakaḥ sa koṭikulasaṃyukto vasedvūhyapure yugam  NarP yo rakṣetpṛthivīpāla raṅgaṃ vā rogiṇaṃ naram tasya viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā sarvānkāmānprayacchati  NarP manasā karmaṇā vācā yo rakṣedāmayānvitam sarvānkāmānavānpoti sarvepāpavivārjitaḥ  NarP yo dadāti mahīpāla nivāsaṃ brāhmaṇāya vai tasya prasanno deveśaḥ svalokaṃ saṃprayacchati  NarP brāhmaṇāyaṃ brahmavide yo dadyādgāṃ payasvinīm sa yātibrahmasadanamanyeṣāmatidurlabham  NarP anyebhyaḥ pratigṛhyāpi yo ddyādgāṃ payasvinīm tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nāhaṃ śakto smi paṇḍita  NarP kapilāṃ vedaviduṣe yo dadāti payasvinīm sa eva rudro bhūpāla sarvapāpavivarjitaḥ  NarP viprāya vedaviduṣe dadyādubhayatomukhīm yastasya puṇyaṃ saṃkhyātu na śakto bdaśatairapi  NarP tasya puṇyaphalaṃ rājañśṛṇu vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ ekataḥ kratavaḥ sarve samagravaradakṣiṇāḥ  NarP ekato bhayabhītasyata prāṇinaḥ prāṇarakṣaṇam saṃrakṣati mahīpāla yo vipraṃ bhayavihvalam  NarP sa snātaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu sarvayajñeṣu dīkṣitaḥ vastrado rudrabhavanaṃ samutsṛjet  NarP na tasya yātanāloko bhavennṛpatisattam tāmbūladānaṃ yaḥ kuryācchaktito nṛpasattama  NarP tasya viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā dadātyāyuryaśaḥ śriyam kṣīrodo ghṛtadaścaiva madhudo dadhidastathā  NarPdivyābdāyutaparyantaṃsvargaloke mahīyate prayāti brahmasadanamikṣudātā nṛpottama  NarP gandhadaḥ puṇyaphaladaḥ prayāti brahmaṇaḥ padam guḍekṣurasadaścaiva prayāti kṣīrasāgaram  NarP bhaṭānāṃ jalado yāti sūryalokamanuttamam vidyādānena sāyujyaṃ mādhavasya vrajennaraḥ  NarP vidyādānaṃ mahīdānaṃ godānaṃ cottamottamam narakāduddharantyeva japavāhanadohanāt  NarP sarveṣāmapi dānānāṃ vidyādānaṃ brahmāṇḍa koṭidānena yatphalaṃ labhate naraḥ  NarP tatphalaṃ samavānpoti liṅgadānānna saṃśayaḥ śālagrāmaśilādāne tato pi dviguṇaṃ phalam  NarP śāla grāmaśilārūpī viṣṇureveti viśrutaḥ yo dadāti naro mokṣamavānpuyāt  NarP ghruvalokamavānpoti vajradānena mānavaḥ svargaṃ vidrumadānena rudralokamavānpuyāt  NarP prayāti yānadānena muktādānena caindavam vaiḍūryado rudralokaṃ puṣparāgapradastathā  NarP puṣparāgapradānena sarvatra sukhamaśnute aśvasāṃnidhyaṃ ciraṃ vrajati bhūmipa  NarP gajadānena mahatā sarvānkāmānavānpuyāt prayāti yānadānena svargaṃ svaryānamāsthitaḥ  NarP mahiṣīdo jayatyeva hyapamṛkatyuṃ na saṃśayaḥ gavāṃ tṛṇapradānena rudralokamavānpuyāt  NarP vāruṇaṃ lokamānpoti mahīśa lavaṇapradaḥ svaśramācāraniratāḥ sarvabhūtahiteratāḥ  NarP adāmbhikā gatāsūyāḥ prayānti bagrahmaṇaḥ padam paropadeśa niratā vītarāgā vimatsārāḥ  NarP haripādārcanaratāḥ prayānti sadanaṃ hareḥ satsaṅgāhlādaniratāḥ satkarmasu sadodyatāḥ  NarP parāpavādavimukhāḥ prāyānti harimandiram nityaṃ hitakarā ye tu brāhmaṇeṣu ca goṣu ca  NarP parastrīsaṅgavimukhā na paśyanti yamālayam jitendriyā jitāhārā goṣu kṣāntāḥ suśīlinaḥ  NarP brāhmaṇeṣu kṣamāśīlāḥ prayānti bhavanaṃ hareḥ agniśuśrūṣavaścaiva guruśuśrūṣakāstathā  NarP patiśuśrūṣaṇaratā na vai saṃsṛtibhāginaḥ sadā devārcanaratā harinamaparāyaṇāḥ  NarP pratigrahanivṛttāśca prayānti paramaṃ padam anāthaṃ viprakuṇapaṃ ye daheyurnṛpottama  NarP aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ phalamaśnuvate sadā patraiḥ purṣpeḥ phalairvāpi jalairvā manujeśvara  NarP pūjayā rahitaṃ liṅgamacaryattetphalaṃ śṛṇu apsarogaṇagandharvaiḥ stūyamāno vimānagaḥ  NarP prayāti śivasānnidhyamityāha kamalodbhavaḥ culukodakamātreṇa liṅgaṃ saṃsnāpya bhūmipa  NarP lakṣāśvamedhajaṃ puṇyaṃ saṃprānpoti na saṃśayaḥ pūjayā rahitaṃ liṅgaṃ kusumairyorcayetsudhīḥ  NarP aśvamedhāyutaphalaṃ bhavettasya janeśvara bhakṣyairbhojyaiḥ phalairvāpi śūnyaṃ liṅgaṃ prapūjya ca  NarP śivasāyujyamānpoti punarāvṛttivarjitam pūjayā rahitaṃ viṣṇuṃ yorcayedakarvaṃśaja  NarP jalenāpi sa sālokyaṃ viṣṇoryāti narottama devatāyatane yastu kuryātsaṃmārjanaṃ sudhīḥ  NarP yāvatpāṃsu yugāvāsaṃ vaiṣṇave mandirelabhet śīrṇaṃ sphaṭikaliṅgantu yaḥ saṃdadhyānnṛpottama  NarP śatajanmārjitaiḥ pāpairmucyate sa tu mānavaḥ yastu devālaye rājannapi gocarmamātrakam  NarP jalena siñcidbhūbhāgaṃ so pi svargaṃ labhennaraḥ gandhodakena yaḥ siñceddevatāyatane bhuvam  NarP yāvatkaṇānukalpaṃ tu tiṣṭheta devasannidhau mṛdā dhātuvikārairvā yo limpeddevatāgṛham  NarP sa koṭikulamuddhṛtya yāti sāmyaṃ madhudviṣaḥ śilācūrṇena yo martyo devāgāraṃ tu lopayet  NarP svastikādīni vā kuryāttasya puṇyamanantakam yaḥ kuryāddīparacanāṃ devatāyatane nṛpa  NarP tasya puṇyaṃ prasaṃkhyātuṃ notsahe bdaśatairapi akhaṇḍadīpaṃ yaḥ kuryādviṣṇorvā śaṅkarasya ca  NarP kṣaṇe kṣaṇe śvamedhasya phalaṃ tasya na durlabham arcitaṃ śaṅkaraṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣṇuṃ vāpi namettu yaḥ  NarP sa viṣṇubhavanaṃ prāpya modate ca yugāyutam devyāḥ pradakṣiṇāmekāṃ satpa sūryasya bhūmipa  NarP tistro vināyakasyāpi catastro viṣṇumandire kṛtvā tattadgṛhaṃ prāpya modate yugalakṣakam  NarP yo viṣṇorbhaktibhāvena tathaiva godvijasya ca pradakṣiṇāṃ cararettasya hyaśvamedhaḥ pade pade  NarP kāśyāṃ maheśvaraṃ māheśvaraṃ liṅgaṃ saṃpūjya praṇamettu yaḥ na tasya vidyate kṛtyaṃ saṃsṛtirnaiva jāyate  NarP śivaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā savyenaiva vidhānataḥ naro na cyavate svargācchaṅkarasya prasādataḥ  NarP stutvā stotrairjagannāthaṃ nārāyaṇamanāmayam sarvānkāmānavānpoti manasā yadyadicchati  NarP devatāyatane yastu bhaktiyuktaḥ pranṛtyati gāyate vā sa bhūpāla rudraloke ca muktibhāk  NarP ye tu vādyaṃ prakurvanti devatāyatane narāḥ te haṃsayānamāruḍhā vrajanti brahmaṇaḥ padam  NarP karatālaṃ prakurvanti devatāyatane tu yete sarvapāpanirmuktā vimānasthā yugāyutam  NarP devatāyatane ye tu ghaṇṭānādaṃ prakurvate teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ nigadituṃ na samarthaḥ śivaḥ svayam  NarP bherīmṛdaṅgapaṭahamurajaiśva saḍiṇḍimaiḥ saṃprīṇayanti deveśaṃ teṣāṃ puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu  NarP devastrīgaṇasaṃyuktāḥ sarvakāmaiḥ samarcitāḥ svargalokamanuprāpya modante kalpapañcakam  NarP devatāmandire kurvannaraḥ śaṅkharavaṃ nṛpa sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇunā saha modate  NarP tālakāṃsyādininadaṃ kurvan viṣṇugṛhe naraḥ sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇulokamavānpuyāt  NarP yo devaḥ sarvadṛgviṣṇurjñānarupī nirañjanaḥ sarvadharmaphalaṃ pūrṇaṃ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pradadāti ca  NarP yasya smaraṇamātreṇa devadevasya cakriṇaḥ saphalāni bhavantyeva sarvakarmāṇi bhūpate  NarP paramātmā jagannāthaḥ sarvakarṃmaphalapradaḥ satkarmakartṛbhirnityaṃ smṛtaḥ sarvārtināśanaḥ tamuddiśya kṛtaṃ yacca tadānantyāya kalpate  NarP dharmāṇi viṣṇuśca phalāni viṣṇuḥ karmāṇi viṣṇuśca phalāni bhoktā kāryaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ karaṇāni viṣṇurasmānna kiñcivdyatiriktamasti  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde dharmānukathanaṃ nāma trayodaśo dhyāyaḥdharmarāja uvācaśrutismṛtyuditaṃ dharmaṃ varṇānāmanupūrvaśaḥ prabravīmi nṛpaśreṣṭha taṃ śṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ  NarP yo bhuñjāno śuciṃ vāpi cāṇḍālaṃ patitaṃ spṛśet krodhādajñānato vāpiṃ tasya vakṣyāmi niṣkṛtim  NarP trirātraṃ vātha ṣaḍrātraṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ samācaret snānaṃ triṣavaṇaṃ viprapañcagavyena śudhyati  NarP bhuñjānasya tu viprasya kadācajitstravate gudam ucchiṣṭatve śucitve ca tasya śuddhiṃ vadāmi te  NarP pūrvaṃ kṛtvā dvijaḥ śaucaṃ paścādapa upaspṛśet ahorātroṣito bhūtvā pañcagavyena śudhyati  NarP nigiranyadi meheta bhuktvā vā mehane kṛte ahorātroṣito bhūtvā juhuyātsarpiṣānalam  NarP yadā bhojanakāle syādaśucirbrāhmaṇaḥ kvacit bhūmau nidhāya taṃ grāsaṃ strātvā śuddhimavānpuyāt  NarP bhakṣayitvā tu tad āsamupavālena śuddhyati aśitvā caiva tatsarvaṃ trirātramaśucirbhavet  NarP aśrataścedvamiḥ syādvai hyasvasthastriśrataṃ japet svasthastrīṇi sahasrāṇi gāyatryāḥ śodhanaṃ param  NarP cāṇḍālaiḥ śvaparcaiḥ spṛṣṭo viṇmūtre ca kṛte dvijaḥ  NarP trirātraṃ tu prakurvīta bhuktocchiṣṭaḥ ṣahācaret udakyāṃ sūtikāṃvāpi saṃspṛśedantyajo yadi  NarP trirātreṇa viśuddhiḥ syāditi śātātapo bravīt rajasvalā tu saṃspṛṣṭā śvabhirmātaṅgavāyasaiḥ  NarP nirāhārā śucistiṣṭetkāle snānena śuddhyati rajasvale yadā nāryāvanyonyaṃ spṛśataḥ kvacit  NarP śuddhete brahmakūrcena brahmakūrcena copari ucchiṣṭena ca saṃspṛṣṭo yo na snānaṃ samācaret  NarP ṛtau tu garbhaṃ śaṅkitvā snānaṃ maithuninaḥ smṛtam anṝtau tu striyaṃ gatvā śaucaṃ mūtrapurūṣavat  NarP ubhāvapyaśucī syātāṃ dampatī yābhasaṃgatau śayanādutthitā nārī śuciḥ syādaśuciḥ pumān  NarP bharttuḥ śarīraśuśrūṣāṃ daurātmyādaprakurvatī daṇḍyā dvādaśakaṃ nārī varṣaṃ tyājyā dhanaṃ vinā  NarP tyajanto patitānbagandhūndaṇḍyānuttamasāhasam pitā hi patitaḥ kāmaṃ na tu mātā kadācana  NarP ātmānaṃ ghātayedyastu rajjvādibhirupakramaiḥ mṛte medhyena letpavyo jīvato dviśataṃ damaḥ  NarP daṇḍyāstatputramitrāṇi pratyekaṃ pāṇikaṃ damam prāyaścittaṃ tataḥ kuryuryathāśāstrapracoditam  NarP jalāgnyudvandhanabhraṣṭāḥ pravrajyānāśakacyutāḥ viṣaprapatanadhvastāḥ śastraghātahatāśca ye  NarP na caite pravratyavasitāḥ sarvalokabahiṣkṛtāḥ cāndrāyaṇena śuddhyaṃnti tatpakṛcchradvayena vā  NarP ubhayāvasitaḥ pāpaśyāmacchabalakāccyutaḥ cāndrāyaṇābhyāṃ śuddhyeta dattvā dhenuṃ tathā vṛṣam  NarP svaśṛgālaplavaṅgādyairmānuṣaiśca ratiṃ vinā spṛṣṭaḥ strātvā śuciḥ sadyo divā saṃdhyāsu rātriṣu  NarP ajñānādvā tu yo bhuktvā cāṇḍālānnaṃ kathañcana gomūtrayāvakāhāro māsārddhena viśuddhyati  NarP gobrāhmaṇagṛhaṃ dagdhvā mṛtaṃ codvandhanādinā pāśaṃ chitvā tathā tasya kṛcchramekaṃ careddijaḥ  NarP cāṇḍālapulpasānāṃ ca bhuktvā hatvā ca yoṣitam kṛcchrārdhdamācarejjñānādajñānādaindavadvayam  NarP kopālikānnabhoktṛāṇāṃ tannārīgāmināṃ tathā agamyāgamane vipro madyago māṃsabhakṣaṇe  NarP tatpakṛcchraparikṣitpo maurvīhomena śuddhyati mahāpātakakarttāraścatvāro tha viśeṣataḥ  NarP agniṃ praviśya śuddhyantisthitvāvā mahati kratau rahasyakaraṇo pyevaṃ māsamabhyasya puruṣaḥ  NarP aghamarṣaṇasūktaṃ vā śuddhyedantarjale japan rajakaścarmakāraśca naṭo buruḍa eva ca  NarP kaivarttamedabhillāśva satpaite hyantyajāḥ smṛtāḥ bhuktvā caiṣāṃ striyo gatvā pītvā yaḥpratigṛhyate  NarP kṛcchrārddhamācarejjñānādaindavadvayam mātaraṃ gurupatnīṃ ca duhitṛbhaginīsnuṣāḥ  NarP saṃgamya praviśedagniṃ nānyāśuddhirvidhīyate rājñīṃ pravrajitāṃ dhātrīṃ tathāvarṇottamāmapi  NarP gatvākṛcchradvayaṃ kuryātsagotrāmabhigamya ca amūṣu pitṛgotrāsu mātṛgotragatāsu ca  NarP padadāreṣu sarveṣu kṛcchrārddhaṃ tapanaṃ caret veśyābhigamane pāpaṃ vyapohanti dvijā stathā  NarP pītvā sakṛtsutatpaṃ ca pañcarātraṃ kuśodakam gurutalpagato kuryārdbāhmaṇo vidhivadrūtam  NarP gonghasya kecidicchanti keciccaivāvakīrṇinaḥ daṇḍādūrdhvaṃ prahāreṇa yastu gāṃ vinipātayet  NarP dviguṇaṃ govrataṃ tasya prāyaścitaṃ viśodhayet aṅguṣṭhamātrasthūlastu bāhumātraghapramāṇakaḥ  NarP sārdrakaḥsapālāśca godaṇḍaḥ parikīrttitaḥ gavāṃ nipātane caiva garbho pi saṃbhavedyadi  NarP ekaikaśaśvaretkṛcchraṃ eṣā gonghasya niṣkṛtiḥ bandhane rodhane caiva poṣaṇe vā gavāṃ rujām  NarP saṃpadyate cenmaraṇaṃ nimittenaiva lipyate mūrcchitaḥ patito vāpi daṇḍenābhihatastataḥ  NarP utthāya ṣaṭpadaṃ gacchetsatpa pañcadaśāpi vā grāsaṃ vā yadi gṛhṇīyāttoyaṃ vāpi pibedyadi  NarP sarvavyādhipranaṣṭānāṃ prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate kaṣṭaloṣṭāśmabhirgāvaḥ śastrairvā nihatā yadi  NarP prāyaścittaṃ smṛtaṃ tatra śastre nigadyate kāṣṭe sāntapanaṃ proktaṃ prājāpatyaṃ tu loṣṭake  NarP tatpakṛcchraṃ tu pāṣāṇe śastre cāpyatikṛcchrakam auṣadhaṃ snehamāhāraṃ dadyādgobrāhmaṇeṣu ca  NarP dīyamāne vipattiḥ syātprāyaścittaṃ tadā nahi tailabheṣajapāne ca bheṣajānāṃ ca bhakṣaṇe  NarP niśalyakaraṇe caiva prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate vatsānāṃ kaṇṭhabandhena kriyayābheṣajena tu  NarP sāyaṃ saṃgopanārthaṃ ca tvadoṣo roṣabandhayoḥ pāde caivāsya romāṇi dvipāde śmaśru kevalam  NarP tripāde tu śikhāvartaṃ mūle sarvaṃ samācaret sarvānkeśānsamuddhṛtya chedayedaṅguladvayam  NarP evameva tu nārīṇāṃ muṇḍanaṃ śirasaḥ smṛtam na stiyā vapanaṃ kāryaṃ na ca vīrāsanaṃ smṛtam  NarP na ca goṣṭe nivāso sti na gacchantīmanuvrajet rājā vā rājaputragho vā brāhmaṇo vā bahuśrutaḥ  NarP akṛtvā vapanaṃ teṣāṃ prāyaścittaṃ vinirddiśet keśānāṃ rakṣaghaṇārthaṃ ca dviguṇaṃ vratamādiśet  NarP dviguṇe gatu vrate cīrṇe dviguṇā vratadakṣiṇā  NarP pāpaṃ na kṣīyate hanturdātā ca narakaṃ vrajet aśrautasmārtavihitaṃ prāyaścittaṃ vadanti ye  NarP tāndharmavinghakartṝṃśca rājā daṇḍena pīḍayet na caitānpīḍayedrājā kathañcitkāmamohitaḥ  NarP tatpāpaṃ śatadhābhūtvā tameva parisarpati prāyaścitte tataścīrṇe kuryādbrāhmaṇabhojanam  NarP viṃśatirgā vṛṣaṃ caikaṃ dadyātteṣāṃ ca dakṣiṇām krimibhistṛṇa saṃbhūtairmakṣikādinipātitaiḥ  NarP kṛcchrārddhaṃ sa prakurvīta śaktyā dadyāñca dakṣiṇām prāyaścittaṃ ca kṛtvā vai bhojayitvā dvijottamān  NarP suvarṇamānikaṃ dadyāttataḥ śuddhirvidhīyate cāṇḍālaśvapacaiḥ spṛṣṭe niśi snānaṃ vidhīyate  NarP na vasettatra rātrau tu sadyaḥ snānena śuddhyati vasedatha yadā rātrāvajñānādavicakṣaṇaḥ  NarP tadā tasya tu tatpāpaṃ śatadhā parivartate udgacchanti ca nakṣatrāṇyupariṣṭācca ye grahāḥ  NarP saṃspṛṣṭe raśmibhisteṣāmudakasnānamācaret yāścāntarjalavalmīkamūṣikoṣaravartmasu  NarP śmaśāne śaucaśeṣe ca na grāhyāḥ satpa mṛttikāḥ iṣṭāpūrtaṃ tu karttavyaṃ brāhmaṇena prayatnataḥ  NarP iṣṭena labhate svargaṃ mokṣaṃ pūrttena cānpuyāt vittakṣepo bhavediṣṭaṃ taḍāgaṃ pūrttamucyate  NarP ārāmaśca viśeṣeṇa devadroṇyastathaiva ca vāpīkūpataḍāgāni devatāyatanāni ca  NarP patitānyuddharedyastu sa pūrvaphalamaśnute śuklāyā āharenmūtraṃ kṛṣṇāyā goḥ śakṛttathā  NarP tāmrāyāśca payo grāhyaṃ śvetāyāśca dadhi smṛtam kapilāyā ghṛtaṃ grāhyaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam  NarP kuśaistīrthanadītauyaiḥ sarvadravyaṃ pṛthak pṛthak āhṛtya praṇavenaiva utthāpya praṇavena ca  NarP praṇavena samāloḍya praṇavenaiva saṃpibet pālāśe madhyame parṇe bhāṇḍe tāmramaye śubhe  NarP pibetpuṣkaraparṇe vā mṛnmaye vā kuśodakam sūtake tu samutpanne dvitīye samupasthite  NarP dvitīye nāsti doṣastu prathamenaiva śudhyati jātena śudhyate jātaṃ mṛtena mṛtakaṃ tathā  NarP garbhasaṃstravaṇe māse trīṇyahāni vinirdiśet  NarP rātribhirmāsatulyābhirgarbhastrāve viśuddhyati rajasyuparate sādhvī snanena strī rajasvalā  NarP svagotrādbhṛśyate nārī vivāhātsatpame pade svāmigotreṇa karttavyāstasyāḥ piṇḍodakakriyāḥ  NarP uddeśyaṃ piṇḍadāne syātpiṇḍe piṇḍe dvināmataḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ deyāstrayaḥ piṇḍā evaṃ dātā na muhyati  NarP svena bhartrā sahasrābdaṃ mātābhuktā sudaivatam pitāmahyapi svenaiva svenaiva prapitāmahī  NarP varṣe tu kurvīta mātāpitrostu satkṛtim adaivaṃ bhojayecchrāddhaṃ piṇḍamekaṃ tu nirvapet  NarP nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ vṛddhiśrāddhamathāparam pārvaṇaṃ ceti vijñeyaṃ śrāddhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ budhaiḥ  NarP grahoparāge saṃkrāntau parvotsa vamalālaye nirvapertrīnnaraḥ piṇḍānekameva mṛte hani  NarP anūḍha na pṛthakkanyā piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake pāṇigrahaṇamantrābhyāṃ svagotrādbhraśyate tataḥ  NarP yena yena tu varṇena yā kānyā pariṇīyate tatsamaṃ sūtakaṃ yāti tathāpiṇḍodake pi ca  NarP vivāhe caiva saṃvṛtte caturthe hanirātriṣu ekatvaṃ sā vrajedbhartuḥ piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake  NarP prathame ṅni dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā caturthake asthisaṃcayanaṃ kāryaṃ bandhubhirhitabuddhibhiḥ  NarP caturthe pañcame caiva satpame navame tathā asthisaṃcayanaṃ proktaṃ varṇānāmanupūrvaśaḥ  NarP ekādaśāhe pretasya yasya cotsṛjyate vṛṣaḥ mucyate pretalokātsa svargaloke mahīyate  NarP nābhimātre jale sthitvā hṛdayena tu cintayet āgacchantu me pitaro gṛhṇantvetāājāñjalīn  NarP hastau kṛtvā tu saṃyuktau pūracitvā jalena ca gośṛṅgamātramuddhṛtya jalamadhye viniḥ kṣipet  NarP ākāśe ca kṣipedvāri vāristho dakṣaghiṇāmukhaḥ pitṝṇāṃ sthānamākāśaṃ dakṣiṇādik tathaiva ca  NarP āpo devagaṇāḥ proktā āpaḥ pitṛgaṇāstathā tasmādasya jalaṃ deyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ hitamicchatā  NarP divāsūryāṃśusaṃtatpaṃ rātrau nakṣatramārutaiḥ madhyayorapyubhābhyāṃ ca pavitraṃ sarvadā jalam  NarP svabhāvayuktamavyaktamamedhyena sadā śuciḥ bhāṇḍasthaṃ dharaṇīsthaṃ vā pavitraṃ sarvadā jalam  NarP devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca jalaṃ dadyājjalāñjalīn asaṃskṛtapramītānāṃ sthale dadyādvicakṣaṇaḥ  NarP śraddhe havanakāle ca dadyādekena pāṇinā ubhābhyāṃ tarpaṇe dadyādeṣa dharmo vyavasthitaḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde dharmaśāntinirdeśo nāma caturdaśo dhyāyaḥdharmarāja uvācapāpa bhedānpravakṣyāmi yathā sthūlāśca yātanāḥ śṛṇuṣva dhairyamāsthāya raudrā ye narakā yataḥ  NarP pāpino ye durātmāno narakāgniṣu santatam pacyante yeṣu tānvakṣye bhayaṅkaraphalapradān  NarP tapanovālukākumbhaumahārauravarauravau kumbhaghīpāko nirucchvāsaḥ kālasūtraḥ pramardanaḥ  NarP asipatravanaṃ ghoraṃ lālābhakṣohimotkaṭaḥ mūṣāvasthā vasākūpastathā vaitaraṇī nadī  NarP bhakṣyante mūtrapānaṃ ca purīṣahlada eva ca tatpaśūlaṃ tatpaśilā śālmalīdruma eva ca  NarP tathā śoṇitakūpaśca ghoraḥ śoṇitabhojanaḥ svamāṃsabhojanaṃ caiva vahnijvālāniveśanam  NarP śilāvṛṣṭiḥ śastravṛṣṭirvahnivṛṣṭistathaiva ca kṣārodakaṃ coṣṇatoyaṃ tatpāyaḥ piṇḍabhabhaṇam  NarP atha śiraḥśoṣaṇaṃ ca marutprapatanaṃ tathā tathā pāśāṇavarṇaṃ ca kṛmibhojanameva ca  NarP kṣāro dapānaṃ bhramaṇaṃ tathā krakacadāraṇam purīṣalepanaṃ caiva purīṣasya ca bhojanam  NarP retaḥ pānaṃ mahāghoraṃ sarvasandhiṣudāhanam dhūmapānaṃ pāśabandhaṃ nānāśūlānulepanam  NarP aṅgāraśayanaṃ caiva tathā musalamarddanam bahūni kāṣṭhayantrāṇi kaṣaṇaṃ chedanaṃ tathā  NarP patanotpatanaṃ caiva gadādaṇḍādipīhanam gajadantapraharaṇaṃ nānāsarpaiśca daṃśanam  NarP śītāmbusecanaṃ caiva nāsāyāṃ ca mukhe tathā ghorakṣārāmbupānaṃ ca tathā lavaṇabhakṣaṇam  NarP strāyucchedaṃ snāyubandhamasthicchedaṃ tathaiva ca kṣārāmbupūrṇarandhrāṇāṃ praveśaṃ māṃsabhojanam  NarP pittapānaṃ mahāghoraṃ tathaivaḥśleṣmabhojanam vṛkṣāgrātpātanañcaiva jalāntarmajjanaṃ tathā  NarP pāṣāṇadhāraṇaṃ caiva śayanaṃ kaṇṭakopari pipīlikādaṃśanaṃ ca vṛścikaiścāpi pīḍanam  NarP vyāghrapīḍā śivāpīḍā tathā mahiṣamīḍanam karddame śayanaṃ caiva durgandhaparipūraṇam  NarP bahuśaścārdhaśayanaṃ mahātiktaniṣevaṇam atyuṣṇatailapānaṃ ca mahākaṭuniṣevaṇam  NarP kaṣāyodakapānaṃ ca tatpapāṣāṇatakṣaṇam atyuṣṇaśītasnānaṃ ca tathā daśanaśīrṇanam  NarP tatpāyaḥ śayanaṃ caiva hyayobhārasya bandhanam evamādyāmahābhāga yātanāḥ koṭikoṭiśaḥ  NarP api varṣasahasreṇa nāhaṃ nigadituṃ kṣamaḥ eteṣu yasya yatprātpaṃ pāpinaḥ kṣitirakṣaka  NarP tatsarvaṃ saṃprapakṣyāmi tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu brahmahā ca surāpī ca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ  NarP mahāpātakinastvete tatsaṃsargī ca pañcamaḥ pantibhedīvṛthāpākī nityaṃ brahmaṇadūṣakaḥ  NarP ādeśī vedavikretā pañcaite brahmadhātakāḥ brahmaṇaṃ yaḥ samāhūya dāsyāmīti dhanādikam eścānnāstīti yo bruyāttamāhurbrahmaghātinam  NarP snānārthaṃ pūjanārthaṃ vā gacchato brāhmaṇasya yaḥ samāyātyantarāyatvaṃ tamāhurbrahmadhātinam  NarP pasnindāsu nirataścātmotkarṣarataśva yaḥ asatyanirataśvacaiva brahmahā parikīrtitaḥ  NarP adharmasyānumantā ca brahmahā parikīrtitaḥ anyodvegarataścaiva anyeṣāṃ doṣasūvakaḥ  NarP dambhācārarataśvaiva brahmahetyabhidhīyate nityaṃ pratigraharatastathā prāṇivadhe rataḥ  NarP adharmasyānumamantā ca brahmahā parikīrtitaḥ brahmahatyā samaṃ pāpameva bahuvidhaṃ nṛpa  NarP surāpānasamaṃ pāpaṃ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ gaṇānnabhojanaṃ caiva gaṇikānāṃ niṣevaṇam  NarP patitānnādanaṃ caiva surāpānasamaṃ smṛtam upāsamāparityāgo devalānāṃ ca bhojanam  NarP surāpayoṣitsaṃyogaḥ surāpānasamaḥ smṛtaḥ yaḥ śūdreṇa samāhato bhojanaṃ kurute dvijaḥ  NarP surāpī sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ yaḥ śūdreṇābhyanujñātaḥ preṣyakarma kariti ca  NarP surāpāna samaṃ pāpaṃ labhate sa narādhamaḥ evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ pāpaṃ surāpānasamaṃ smṛtam  NarP hemasteyasamaṃ pāpaṃ pravakṣyāmi niśāmaya kandamūlaphalānāṃ ca kastūrī paṭavāsasām  NarP sadā steyaṃ ca ratnānāṃ svarṇasteyasamaṃ smṛtam tāmrāyastrapukāṃsyānāmājyasya madhunastathā  NarP steyaṃ sugandhadravyāṇṇāṃ svarṇasteyasamaṃ smṛtam kramukasyāpiharaṇamambhasāṃ candanasya ca  NarP parṇarasāpaharaṇaṃ svarṇasteyasamaṃ smṛtam pitṛyajñaparityāgo dharmakāryavilopanam  NarP yatīrnāṃ nindataṃ caiva svarṇasteyasamaṃ smṛtam bhakṣyāṇāṃ cāpaharaṇaṃ dhānyānāṃ haraṇaṃ tathā  NarP rudrākṣaharaṇaṃ caiva svarṇasteyasamaṃ smṛtam bhāgīnīgamanaṃ caiva putrastrīgamanaṃ tathā  NarP rajasvalādigamanaṃ gurutalpasamaṃ smṛtam hīnajātyābhigamanaṃ madyapastrīniṣevaṇam  NarP parastrīgamanaṃ caiva gurutalpasamaṃ smṛtam bhrātṛstrīgamanaṃ caiva vayasyastrīniṣevaṇam  NarP viśvastāgamanaṃ caiva gurutalpasamaṃ smṛtam akāle karmakaraṇaṃ putrīgamana meva ca  NarP dharmalopaḥ śāstranindā gurutalpasamaṃ smṛtam ityevamādayo rājanmahāpātakasaṃjñitāḥ  NarP eteṣvekatamenāpi saṅgakṛttatsamo bhavet yathākathañcitpāpānāmeteṣāṃ paramarṣibhiḥ  NarP śāntaistu niṣkṛtirdṛṣṭā prāyaścitādikalpanaiḥ prāyaścittavihīnāni pāpāni śṛṇu bhūpate  NarP samastapāpatulyāni mahānarakadāni ca brahmahatyādipāpānāṃ kathañcinniṣkṛtirbhavet  NarP brahmaṇaṃ dveṣṭi yastasya niṣkṛtirnāsti kutracit viśvastaghātinaṃ caiva kṛtanghānāṃ nareśvara  NarP śūdrastrīsaṅgināṃ caiva niṣkṛtirnāsti kutracit śūdrānnapuṣṭadehānāṃ vedanindāratātmanām  NarP satkathānindakānāñca nehāmutracaniṣkṛtiḥ  NarP bauddhālayaṃ viśedyastu mahāpadyapi vaidvijaḥ natasyaniṣkṛtirdṛṣṭāprāyaścitaśatairapi  NarP bauddhāḥ pāṣaṃṇḍinaḥ proktā yato vedavinindakāḥ tasmādvijastānnekṣeta yato dharmabahiṣkṛtāḥ  NarP jñānato jñānato vāpi dvijo boddhālayaṃ viśet jñātvā cenniṣkṛtirnāsti śāstrāṇāmiti niśvayaḥ  NarP eteṣāṃ pāpabāhulyānnarakaṃ koṭikalpakam prāyaścittavihīnāni proktānyanyāni ca prabho  NarP pāpāni teṣāṃ narakāngadato me niśāmaya  NarP mahāpātakinasteṣu pratyekaṃ yugavāsinaḥ tadante pṛthivīmetya satpajanmasu gardabhāḥ  NarP tataḥ śvāno viddhadehā bhaveyurdaśajanmasu āśatābdaṃ viṭkṛmayaḥ sarpā dvādaśajanmasu  NarP tataḥ sahasrajanmāni mṛgādyāḥ paśavo nṛpa śatābdaṃ sthāvarāścaiva tato godhāśarīriṇaḥ  NarP tatastu satpajanmāni caṇḍālāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ tataḥ ṣoḍaśa janmāni śūdrādyā hīnajātayaḥ  NarP tatastu janmadvitaye daridrāvyādhipīḍitāḥ pratigrahaparā nityaṃ tato nirayagāḥ punaḥ  NarP asūyāviṣṭamanaso raurave narake smṛtam tatra kalpadvayaṃ sthitvā cāṇḍālāḥ śatajanmasu  NarP mā dadasveti yo brūyādgavāngibrāhmaṇeṣu ca śunāṃ yoniśataṃ gatvā cāṇḍāleṣūpajāyate  NarP tato viṣṭhākṛtimiścaiva tato vyāghrastrijanmasu tadante narakaṃ yāti yugānāmekaviṃśatim  NarP paranindāparā ye ca ye ca niṣṭhurabhāṣiṇaḥ dānānāṃ vinghakarttārasteṣāṃ pāpaphalaṃ śṛṇu  NarP muśalolū khalābhyāṃ tu cūrṇyante taskarā bhṛśam tadante tatpapāṣāṇagrahaṇaṃ vatsaratraghayam  NarP tataśca kālasūtreṇa bhidyante satpa vatsarān śocantaḥ svṛnikarmāṇi paradravyāpahārakāḥ  NarP karmaṇā tatra pacyante narakāngiṣu santatam  NarP parasvasūcakānāṃ ca narakaṃ śṛṇu dāruṇam yāvadyugasahasraṃ tu tatpāyaḥ piṇḍabhakṣaṇam  NarP saṃpīḍyate ca rasanā saṃdaṃśairbhṛśadāruṇaiḥ nirucchvāsaṃ mahāghore kalpārddhaṃ nivasanti te  NarP parastrīlolupānāṃ ca narakaṃ kathayāmi te tatpatāmrastriyastena surupābharaṇairyutāḥ  NarP yādṛśīstādṛśīstāśca ramante prasabhaṃ bahu vidvavantaṃ bhayenāsāṃ gṛhṇanti prasabhaṃ ca tam  NarP kathayantaśca tatkarma nayante narakānkramāt anyaṃ bhajante bhūpāla patiṃ tyaktvā ca yāḥ striyaḥ  NarP tatpāyaḥpuruśāstāstu tatpāyaḥśayanebalāt pātayitvā ramante ca bahukālaṃ balānvitāḥ  NarP tatastairyoṣito muktā hutāśanasamojjvalam a yaḥ stambhaṃ samāśsiṣya tiṣṭhantyabdasahasrakam  NarP tataḥ kṣārodakasnānaṃ kṣārodakaniṣevaṇam tadante narakān sarvān bhuñjate bdaśataṃ śatam  NarP yo hanti brāhmaṇaṃ gāṃ ca kṣatriyaṃ ca nṛpottamam sa cāpi yātanāḥ sarvā bhuṅkte kalpeṣu pañcasu  NarP yaḥ śṛṇoti mahannindāṃ sādaraṃ tatphalaṃ śṛṇu teṣāṃ karṇeṣu dāpyante tatpāyaḥ kīlasaṃcayāḥ  NarP tataśca teṣu chidreṣu tailamatyuṣṇamulbaṇam pūryate ca tataścāpiṃ kumbhīpākaṃ prapadyate  NarP nāstikānāṃ pravakṣyāmi vimukhānāṃ hare harau abdānāṃ koṭiparyantaṃ lavaṇaṃ bhuñjate hi te  NarP tataśca kalpaparyantaṃ raurave tatpasaikate bhajyante pāpakarmaṇo nyepyevaṃ pāpakarṃmaṇaḥ  NarP viśvāsaghātināṃ caiva maryādābhedināṃ tathā parānnalollupānāṃ ca narakaṃ śṛṇu dāruṇam  NarP svamāṃsabhojino nityaṃ bhakṣamāṇāḥ śvabhistu te narakeṣu samasteṣu pratyekaṃ hyabdavāsinaḥ  NarP pratigraharatā ye ca ye vai nakṣatrapāṭhakāḥ ye ca devalakānnānāṃ bhojinastāñśṛṇuṣva me  NarP rājannākalpaparyantaṃ yātanāsvāsu duḥkhitāḥ pacyante satataṃ pāpāviṣṭā bhogaratāḥ sadā  NarP tatastailena pūryante kālasūtraprapīḍitāḥ tataḥ kṣārodakasnānaṃ mūtraviṣṭāniṣevaṇam  NarP tadante bhuvamāsādya bhavanti mlecchajātayaḥ anyodvegaratā ye tu yānti vaitaraṇīṃ nadīm  NarP tyaktapañcamahāyajñā lālābhakṣaṃ vrajanti hi upāsanāparityāgī rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet  NarP vipragrāmakarādānaṃ kurvatāṃ śṛṇu bhūpate yātanāsvāsu pacyante vāvadācandratārakam  NarP grāmeṣu bhūpālavaro yaḥ kuryādadhikaṃ karam sa sahasrakulo bhuṅktenarakaṃ kalpapañcasu  NarP vipragrāmakarādāne yo numantātu pāpakṛt sa eva kṛtavān rājanbrahmahatyāsahasrakam  NarP kālasūtre mahāghore sa vaseddicaturyugam ayonau ca viyonau ca paśuyonau ca yo naraḥ  NarP tyajedreto mahāpāpī saretobhojanaṃ labhet vasākūpaṃ tataḥ prāpya sthitvā divyābdasatpakam  NarP retobhojī bhavenmartyaḥ sarvalokeṣu ninditaḥ upavāsadine rājandantadhāvanakṛnnaraḥ  NarP sa ghoraṃ narakaṃ yātivyāghrapakṣaṃ caturyugam yaḥ svakarmaparityāgī pāṣaṇḍītyucyate budhaiḥ  NarP tatsaṃgakṛtamoghaḥ syāttāvubhāvatipāpinau kalpakoṭisahasreṣu prānputo narakānkramāt  NarP devadravyāpaharttāro gurudravyāpahārakāḥ brahmahatyāvratasamaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ bhuñjate nṛpa  NarP anāthadhanaharttāro hyanāthaṃ ye dviṣanti ca kalpakoṭisahasrāṇi narake te vasanti ca  NarP strīśūdrāṇāṃ samīpe tu ye vedādhyayane ratāḥ teṣāṃ pāpaphalaṃ vakṣye śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ  NarP adhaḥśīrṣordhvapādāśca kīlitāḥ stambhaghakadvaye dhrūmrapānaratā nityaṃ tiṣṭhantyābrahmavatsaram  NarP jale devālaye vāpi yastyajeddehajaṃ malam bhrūṇahatyāsamaṃ pāpaṃ saṃprānpotyatidāruṇam  NarP dantāsthikeśanakharānye tyajyantyamarālaye jale vā gandhakāṣṭaṃ tathaiva ca  NarP sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ yāvadācandratārakam brahmasvaharaṇaṃ rājannihāmātra ca duḥkhadam  NarP ihasaṃpadvināśāyaparatranarakāya ca kūṭasākṣyaṃvadedyastu tasya NarP teṣāṃ sukhe jalaukā stu pūryyante pannagopamāḥ evaṃ ṣaṣṭisahasrābde tataḥ kṣārāmbagusecanam  NarP ye vṛthāmāṃsaniratatāste yānti kṣārakardamam tato gajairnipātatyante marutprapatanaṃ yathā  NarP tadante bhavamāsādya hīnāṅgāḥ prabhavanti ca yastvṛtau nābhigaccheta svastriṃya manujeśvara  NarP sa yāti rauravaṃ ghoraṃ brahmahakatyāṃ ca vindati anyācārarataṃ dṛṣṭvā yaḥ śakto na nivārayet  NarP tatpāpaṃ samavānpoti narakaṃ tāvubhāvapi pāpināṃ pāpagaṇanāṃ kṛtvānyebhyo diśanti vindati  NarP astitve tulyapāpāste mithyātve dviguṇā nṛpa apāpe pātakaṃ yastu samaropya vinindati  NarP sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ yāvañcardrārkatārakam pāpināṃ nindyamānānāṃ pāpārddhaṃ kṣayameti ca  NarP yastu vratāni saṃgṛhya asamāpya parityajyet so sipatre nubhūyārtiṃ hīnāṅgojāyate bhuvi  NarP anyaiḥ saṃgṛhyamāṇānāṃvratānāṃ vinghakṛnnaraḥ atīva duḥkhadaṃraudraṃ sa yāti śloṣmabhojanam  NarP nyāye ca dharmaśikṣāyāṃ pakṣapātaṃ karoti yaḥ na tasya niṣkṛtirbhūyaḥ prāyaścittāyutairapi  NarP abhojyabhojī saṃprāpyaṃ viṅbhojyaṃ tu samāyutam tataścaṇḍālayonau tu gomāṃsāśī sadā bhavet  NarP avamānya dvijānvāgbhirbrahmahatyāṃ ca vindati sarvāścayātanā bhuktvā cāṇḍālo daśajanmasu  NarP vigrāya dīyamāne tu yastu vinghaṃ samācaret brahmahatyāsamaṃ tena karttavyaṃ vratameva ca  NarP apahṛtya paḥsyārthaṃ yaḥ parebhyaḥ prayacchati apaharttā tu nirayī yasyārthastasya tatphalam  NarP pratiśrutyāpradānena lālābhakṣaṃ vrajennaraḥ yatinindāparo rājan śilānamātre prayāti hi  NarP ārāmacchedino yānti yugānāmekaviṃśatim śvabhojanaṃ tataḥ sarvā bhuñjate yātanāḥ kramāt  NarP devatāgṛhabhettārastaḍāgānāṃ ca bhūpate puṣpārāmabhidaścaiva yāṃ gatiṃ yānti tacchṛṇu  NarP yātanāsvāsu sarvāsu pacyante vai pṛthak pṛthak tataśca viṣṭākṛmayaḥ kalpānāmekaviṃśatim  NarP tataścāṇḍālayonau tu śatajanmāni bhūpate grāmavidhvaṃ sakānāṃ tu dāhakānāṃ ca lumpatām  NarP mahatpāpaṃ tadādeṣṭuṃ na kṣamo haṃ nijāyuṣā ucchiṣṭabhojino ye ca mitradrohaparāśva ye  NarP eteṣāṃ yātanāstīvrā bhavantyācandratārakam ucchinnapitṝdevejyā vendamārgabahiḥsthitāḥ  NarP pāpānāṃ yātānānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ cāpi bhūpate evaṃ bahuvidhā bhūpa yātanāḥ pāpakāriṇaṇām  NarP teṣāṃ tāsāṃ ca saṃkhyānaṃ karttuṃ nāsamahaṃ prabho pāpānāṃ yātanānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ cāpi bhūpate  NarP saṃkhyāṃ nigadituṃ loke kaḥ kṣamo viṣṇunā vinā eteṣāṃ sarvapāpānāṃ dharmaśāstravidhānataḥ  NarP prāyaścitteṣu cīrṇeṣu pāparāśiḥ praṇaśyati prāyaścittāni kāryāṇi samīpe kamalāpateḥ  NarP nyūnātiriktakṛtyānāṃ saṃpūrtikaraṇāya ca gaṅgā catulasī caiva satsaṅgo harikīrttanam  NarP anasūyā hyahiṃsā ca sarvepyete hi pāpahāḥ viṣṇvarpitāni karmāṇi saphalāni bhavanti hi  NarP anarppitāni karmāṇi bhasmavinyastadravyavat nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ yaccānyanmokṣamādhanam  NarP viṣṇau samārpitaṃ sarvaṃ sāttvikaṃ saphalaṃ bhavet haribhaktiḥ parā nṛṇāṃ sarvaṃ pāpaprāṇāśinī  NarP sā bhaktidraśadhā jñeyā pāpāraṇyadavopamā tāmasai rājasaiśvaiva sāttvikaiśca nṛpottama  NarP yaccānyasya vināśārthaṃ bhajanaṃ śrīpaternṛpa sā tāmasyadhamā bhaktiḥ khalabhāvadharā yataḥ  NarP yorcayetkaitavadhiyā svairiṇī svapatiṃ yathā nārāyaṇaṃ jagannāthaṃ tāmasī madhyamā tu sā  NarP devāpūjāparāndṛṣṭvā mātsaryādyorcayeddhīram sā bhaktiḥ pṛthivīpāla tāmasī cottamā smṛtā  NarP dhanadhānyādikaṃ yastu prārthayannarcayedvarim śraddhayā parayā yuktaḥ sā rājasyadhamā smṛtā  NarP yaḥ sarvalokavikhyātakīrtimuddiśya mādhavam arcayetparayā bhaktyā sā madhyā rājasī matā  NarP sālokyādi padaṃ yastu samuddiśyārcayeddharim sā rājasyuttamā bhaktiḥ kīrtitā pṛthivīpate  NarP yastu svakṛtapāpānāṃ kṣayārthaṃ prārcayedvarim śraddhayā parayopetaḥ sā sāttvikyadhamā smṛtā  NarP hareridaṃ priyamiti śuśrūṣāṃ kurute tu yaḥ śraddhayā saṃyuto bhūyaḥ sāttvikī madhyamā tu sā  NarP vidhibuddhyārcayedyastu dāsavacchrīpatiṃ nṛpa bhaktīnāṃ pravarā sā tu uttamā sāttvikī smṛtā  NarP mahīmānaṃ hareryastu kiñcitkṛtvā priyo naraḥ tanmayatvena saṃtuṣṭaḥ sā bhaktiruttamottamā  NarP ahameva paro viṣṇurmayisarvamidaṃ jagat iti yaḥ satataṃ paśyettaṃ vidyāduttamottamam  NarP evaṃ daśavidhā bhaktiḥ saṃsāracchedakāriṇī tatrāpi sāttvikī bhaktiḥ sarvakāmaphala pradā  NarP tasmācchṛṇuṣva bhūpāla saṃsāravijigīṣathuṇā svakarmaṇo virodhena bhaktiḥ kāryā janārdane  NarP yaḥ svadharmaṃ parityajya bhaktimātreṇa jīvati na tasya tuṣyate viṣṇurācāreṇaiva tuṣyate  NarP sarvāgamānāmācāraḥ prathamaṃ parikalpate ācāraprabhavo dharmo dharmasya prabhuracyutaḥ  NarP tasmātkāryā harerbhaktiḥ svardhamasyāvirodhinī sadācāravihīnānāṃ dharmā apyasukhapradāḥ  NarP svadharmahīnā bhaktiśvāpyakṛtaiva prakīrtitā yattu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhūyastatsarvaṃ gaditaṃ mayā  NarP tasmāddharmaparo bhūtvā pūjayasva janārdanam nārāyaṇamaṇīyāṃsaṃ sukhameṣyasi śāśvakatam  NarP śiva eva hariḥ sākṣāddharireva śivaḥ svayam dvayorantaradṛgyāti narakārankoṭiśaḥ khalaḥ  NarP tasmādviṣṇuṃ śivaṃ vāpi samaṃ buddhā samarcaya bhedakṛdduḥkhamāpnoti iha loke paratragha ca  NarP yadarthamahamāyātastvatsamīpaṃ janādhipa tatte vakṣyāmi sumate sāvadhānaṃ niśāmaya  NarP ātmaghātakapāpmāno dagdhāḥ kapilakopataḥ vasanti narake te tu rājaṃstava pitāmahāḥ  NarP tānuddhara mahābhāga gaṅgānayanakarmaṇā gaṅgā sarvāṇi pāpāni nāśayatyeva bhūpate  NarP keśāsthinakhadandāśca bhasmāpira nṛpasattama nayati viṣṇusadanaṃ spṛṣṭā gāṅgenara vāriṇā  NarP yasyāsthi bhasma vā rājan gaṅgāyāṃ kṣipyate naraiḥ sa sarvapāpanirmuktaḥ prayāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ  NarP yāni kāni ca pāpāni proktāni tava bhūpate tāni karmāṇira naśyanti gaṅgābindvabhiṣecanāt  NarP sanaka uvācaityuktvā muniśārdūla mahārājaṃ bhagīratham dharmātmānaṃ dharmarājaḥ sadyaśvāntardadhetadā  NarP sa tu rājā mahāprājñaḥ sarvaśāstrārthapāragāḥ nikṣipya pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ saciveṣu yayau vanam  NarP tuhinādrau tato gatvā naranārāyaṇāśramāt paścime tuhinākrānte śṛṅgeṣoḍaśayojane  NarP tapastaptvānayāmāsa gaṅgāṃ trailokyapāvanīm  NarP  iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde dharmākhyāne dharmarājopadeśena bhagīrathasya gaṅgānayanodyamavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcadaśo dhyāyaḥ nārada uvācahimavadgirimāsādya kiṃ cakāra mahīpatiḥ kathamānītavāngaṅgāmetanme NarP śālatālatamālāḍhyaṃ nūnahintālamaṇḍitam mālatīyūthikākundacampakāśaavatthabhūṣitam  NarP utpullakusumopeta mṛṣisaṅghaniṣevitam vedaśāstramahāghoṣamāśramaṃ prāviśadbhugoḥ  NarP gṛṇantaṃ parama brahma vṛttaṃ śiṣyagaṇairmunim tejasā sūryasadṛśaṃ bhṛguṃ tatra dadarśa saḥ  NarP praṇanāmātha viprendraṃ pādasaṃgrahaṇādinā ātithyaṃ bhṛgurapyasya cakre sanmānapūrvakam  NarP kṛtātithyakriyo rājā karmaṇā munisattama tanmamākhyāhi sarvajña anugrāhyo smi te yati  NarP bhṛguruvācarājaṃstavepsitaṃ jñātaṃ tvaṃ hi puṇyavatāṃ varaḥ anyathā svakulaṃ sarvaṃ kathamuddharttumarhasi  NarP yo vā ko vāpi bhūpāla svakulaṃ śubhakarmaṇā uddharttakāmastaṃ vidyānnararupadharaṃ harim  NarP karmaṇā yena deveśo nṛṇāmiṣṭaphalapradaḥ tatpravakṣyāmi rājendra śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ  NarP bhava satyaparo rājanna hiṃsāniratastathā sarvabhūtahito nityaṃ mānṛtaṃ vada vai kvacit  NarP tyaja durjanasaṃsargaṃ bhaja sādhusamāgamam kuru puṇyamahorātraṃ smara viṣṇuṃ sanātanam  NarP kuru pūjāṃ mahāviṣṇoryāhi śānti manuttamām dvādaśāṣṭākṣaraṃ mantraṃ jaya śreyo bhaviṣyati  NarP bhagīrathā uvācasatyaṃ tu kīdṛśaṃ proktaṃ sarvabhūtahitaṃ mune anṛtaṃ kīdṛśaṃ proktaṃ durjanāścāpi kīdṛśāḥ  NarP sādhavaḥ kīdṛśāḥ proktāstathā puṇyaṃ ca kīdṛśam smartavyaśca kathaṃ viṣṇustasya pūjā ca kīdṛśī  NarP śāntiśca kīdṛśī proktā ko mantro ṣṭākṣaro mune ko vā dvādaśavarṇaśca mune tattvārthakovida  NarP kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mayi parāṃ sarvaṃ vyākhyātamarhasi bhṛguruvācasādhu sādhumahāprājña tava buddhiranuttamā  NarP yatpṛṣṭo haṃ tvayā bhūpa tatsarvaṃ pravadāmi te yathārthakathanaṃ yattatsatyamāhurvipaścitaḥ  NarP dharmāvirodhato vācyaṃ taddhi dharmaparāyaṇaiḥ deśakālādi vijñāya svayamasyāvirodhataḥ  NarP yadvacaḥ procyate sadbhistastatyamabhidhīyate sarveṣāmeva jantūnāmakleṣajananaṃ hi tat  NarP ahiṃsā sā nṛpa parikīrttitāḥ hari bhaktikaraṃ yattatsadbhiśca parirañcitam  NarP ātmanaḥ prītijanakaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ parikīrttitam sarvaṃ jagadidaṃ viṣṇurvaṣṇuḥ sarvasya kāraṇam  NarP ahaṃ ca viṣṇuryajjñānaṃ tadviṣṇusma raṇaṃ viduḥ sarvadevamayo viṣṇurvidhinā pūjayāmi tam  NarP iti yā bhavati śraddhā sā tadbhaktiḥ prakīrtitāḥ sarvabhūtamayo viṣṇuḥ paripūrṇaḥ sanātanaḥ  NarP ityabhedena yā buddhiḥ samatā sā prakīrttitā samatā śatrumitreṣu vaśitvaṃ ca tathā nṛpa  NarP yadṛcchālābhasaṃtuṣṭiḥ sā śāntiḥ parikīrtitā ete sarve samākhyātāstapaḥ siddhipradā nṛṇām  NarP samastapāparāśīnāṃ tarasā nāśahetavaḥ aṣṭākṣaraṃ mahāmantraṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam  NarP vakṣyāmi tava rājendra puruṣārthaikasādhanam viṣṇoḥ priyakaraṃ caiva sarvasiddhipradāyakam  NarP namo nārāyaṇāyeti japetpraṇakpūrvakam namo bhagavate yanannāmasaṃkīrttanato khalānāṃ samasta pāpāni layaṃ prayānti tamīśamīḍyaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ natāḥ sma viṣṇuṃ puruṣāthasiddhyai  NarP yattejasā bhānti divākarādyā nātikramaṃ tyasya kadāpi śikṣāḥ NarP namaḥ pinākahastāya śūlahastāya te namaḥ namaḥ kapālahastāya pāśamudgaradhāriṇe  NarP namaste sarvabhūtāya ghaṇṭāhastāya te namaḥ namaḥ pañcāsyadevāya kṣetrāṇāṃ pataye namaḥ  NarP namaḥ samastabhūtānāmādibhṛtāya bhūbhṛte anekaruparupāya nirguṇāya parātmane  NarP namo daṇādhidevāya gaṇānāṃ pataye namaḥ namo hiraṇyagarbhāya hiraṇyapataye namaḥ  NarP hiraṇyaretase tubhyaṃnamo NarP svaprakāśaṃ mahātmānaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam yamāmananti tattvajñāḥ savitāraṃ nṛcakṣuṣām  NarP umākāntanandikeśantaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ sadāśivam mṛtyuñjayaṃ mahādevaṃ parātparataraṃ vibhum  NarP paraṃ nato smi taṃ yoginatāṅghripadmaṃ sarvāntarātmānamarupamīśam svatantramekaṃ guṇunāṃ guṇaṃ ca namāmi bhūyaḥ praṇamāmi bhūyaḥ  NarP itthaṃ stuto mahādevaḥ śaṅkaro lokaśaṅkaraḥ āvirbabhūva bhṛpasya
