śaśiśekharaḥ  NarP uvāca rājñe tuṣṭo smi varaṃ varaya vāñchitam toṣito smi tvayā samyak stotreṇa tapasā tathā  NarP evamuktaḥ sa devena rājā saṃtuṣṭamānasaḥ uvāca prāñjalirbhūtvā jagatāmīśvareśvareśvaram  NarP bhagīratha uvācaanugrāhyo smi yadi te varadānānmaheśvara tadā gaṅgāṃ prayacchāsmatpitṝṇāṃ muktihetave  NarP śrīśiva uvācadattā gaṅgā mayā tubhyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ te gatiḥ parā tubhyaṃ mokṣaṃ paraśceti tamuktvāntardadhe śivaḥ  NarP parardino jaṭāstrastā gaṅgā lokaikapāvirnī pāvayantī jagatsarvamanvagacchadbhagīratham  NarP tataḥ prabhṛti sā devī nirmalā malahāriṇī bhāgīrathīti vikhyātā triṣu lokeṣvabhūnmune  NarP sagarasyātmajāḥ pūrvaṃ yatra dagdhāḥ svapāpmanā taṃ deśaṃ plāvayāmāsa gaṅgā sarvasaridvarā  NarP yadā saṃplāvitaṃ bhasma sāgarāṇāṃ tu gaṅgāyā tadaiva narake magnā uddhṛtāśca gatainasaḥ  NarP purā saṃkruśyamānena ye yamenātipūḍitāḥ ta eva pūcitāstena gaṅgājalapariplutāḥ  NarP gatapāpānya vijñāya yamaḥ sagarasaṃbhavān praṇamyābhyarcya vidhivatprāha tānprītamānasaḥ  NarP bho bho rājasutā yūyaṃ narakād bhṛśadāruṇāt muktā vimānamāruhya gacchadhvaṃ viṣṇumandiram  NarP ityuktāste mahātmāno yamena gatakalmaṣāḥ divyadehadharā bhūtvā viṣṇulokaṃ prapedire  NarP evaṃprabhāvā sā gaṅgā viṣṇupādāgrasaṃbhavā sarvalokeṣu vikhyātā mahāpātakanāśinī  NarP ya idaṃ puṇyamākhyānaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam paṭhecca śṛṇuyādvāpi gaṅgāsnānaphalaṃ labhet  NarP yastve tatpuṇyamākhyānaṃ kathayedrvāhyaṇāgrataḥ sa yāti viṣṇubhavanaṃ punarāvṛttivarjitam  NarP iti śrūbṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde gaṅgāmāhātmye bhagīrathagaṅgānayanaṃ nāma ṣoḍaṣo dhyāyaḥṛṣaya ūcuḥsādhu sūta mahābhāga tvayātikaruṇātmanā śrāvitaṃ sarvapāpanghaṃ gaṅgāmāhātmya muttamam  NarP śrutvā tu gaṅgāmāhātmyaṃ nārado devadarśanaḥ kiṃ papraccha punaḥ sūta sanakaṃ munisattamam  NarP sūta uvācaśṛṇudhvamṛṣayaḥ sarve nāradena surarṣiṇā pṛṣṭaṃ punaryathā prāha pravakṣyāmi tathaiva tat  NarP nānākhyānetihāsāḍyaṃ gaṅgāmāhātmyamuttamam śrutvā brahmasuto bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭavānidamādarāt  NarP nārada uvācaaho tidhanyaṃ sukṛtaikasāraṃ śrutaṃ mayā puṇyamasaṃvṛtārtham gāṅgeyamāhātmyamaghapraṇāśi tvatto mune kāruṇikādabhīṣṭam  NarP ye sādhavaḥ sādhu bhajanti viṣṇuṃ svārthaṃ parārthaṃ ca yatanta eva nānopadeśaiḥ suvimugdhacittaṃ prabodhayanti prasabhaṃ prasannam  NarP tataḥ samākhyāhi harervratāni kṛtaiśca yaiḥ prītimupaiti viṣṇuḥ dadāti bhaktiṃ bhajatāṃ dayālurmuktistu tasyā viditā hi dāsī  NarP dadāti muktiṃ bhajatāṃ mukundo vratārcanadhyānaparāyaṇānām bhaktānusevāsu mahāprayāsaṃ vimṛśya kasyāpi na bhaktiyogam  NarP pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca yatkarma harito ṣaṇam tadā khyāhi muniśreṣṭha viṣṇubhakto si mānada  NarP sanaka uvācasādhu sādhu muniśreṣṭha bhaktastvaṃ puruṣottameḥ bhūyo bhūyo yataḥ puccheścaritraṃ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ  NarP vratāni te pravakṣyāmi lokopakṛtimanti ca prasīdati hariryaistu prayacchatyabhayaṃ tathā  NarP yasya prasanno bhagavānyajñaliṅgo janārdanaḥ ihāmutra sukhaṃ tasya tapovṛddhiśca jāyate  NarP yena kenāpyupāyena haripūjāparāyaṇāḥ prayānti paramaṃ sthānamiti prāhurmaharṣayaḥ  NarP mārga śīrṣe site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ jalaśāyinam upoṣito ḍarcayetsamyaṅ naraḥ śraddhāsamanvitaḥ  NarP snātvā śuklāmbaradharo dantadhāvanapūrvakam gandhapuṣpākṣatairdhūpair dīpairnaivedyapūrvakaiḥ  NarP vāgyato bhaktibhāvena muniśreṣṭhārcayeddharim keśavāya namastubhyamiti viṣṇuṃ ca pūjayet  NarP aṣṭottaraśataṃ hutvā vanhau ghṛtatilāhutīḥ rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kuryācchālagrāmasamīpataḥ  NarP snāpayetprasthapayasā nārāyaṇamanāmayam gītairvādyaiśca naivedyairbhakṣyairbhojyaiśca keśavam  NarP trikālaṃ pūjayedbhaktyā mahālakṣmyā samanvitam punaḥ kalye samutthāya kṛtvā karma yathocitam  NarP pūrvavatpūjayedvevaṃ vāgyato niyataḥ śuciḥ pāyasaṃ ghṛtasaṃmiśraṃ nālikeraphalānvitam  NarP mantreṇānena viprāya dadyādbhaktyā sadakṣiṇam keśavaḥ keśihā devaḥ sarvasaṃpatpradāyakaḥ  NarP paramānnapradānena mama syādiṣṭadāyakaḥ brahmaṇānbhojayetpaścācchaktito bandhubhiḥ saha  NarP nārāyaṇa paro bhūtvā svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ iti yaḥ kurute bhaktyā keśavārcanamuttamam  NarP sa paiṇḍarīkayajñasya phalamaṣṭaguṇaṃ labhet pauṣamāse site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣitaḥ  NarP namo nārāyaṇāyeti pūjayetprayato harim payasā snāpya naivedyaṃ pāyasaṃ ca samarpayet  NarP rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kuryātrrikālārcanatatparaḥ dhūpairdīpaiśca naivedyairgandhaiḥ puṣpairmanoramaiḥ  NarP tṛṇaiśca gītavādyādyaiḥ stotraiścāpyaryayeddharim kṛśarānnaṃ ca viprāya dadyātsaghṛtadakṣiṇam  NarP sarvātmā sarvalokeśaḥ sarvavyāpī sanātanaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ prasannaḥ syātkṛśarānnapradānataḥ  NarP mantreṇānena viprāya dattvā vai dānamuttamam dvijāṃśca bhojeyacchaktyā svayamadyātsabāndhavaḥ  NarP evaṃ saṃpūjayedbhaktyā devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum agniṣṭomāṣṭakaphalaṃ sa saṃpūrṇamavāpnuyāt  NarP māghasya śukladvādaśyāṃ pūrvavatsamupoṣitaḥ namaste mādhavāyeti hutvāṣṭau ca ghṛtāhutīḥ  NarP pūrvamānena payasā snāpayenmādhavaṃ tadā puṣpagandhākṣatairarcetsāvadhānena cetasā  NarP rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kuryātpūrvavadbhaghaktisaṃyutaḥ kalyakarma ca nirvartya mādhavaṃ punararcayet  NarP prasthaṃ tilānāṃ viprāya dadyādvai mantrapūrvakam sadakṣiṇaṃ savāstrañca sarvapāpavimuktaye  NarP mādhavaḥ sarvabhūtātmā sarvakarmaphalapradaḥ tiladānena mahatā sarvānkāmānprayacchatu  NarP mantreṇānena viprāya dattvā bhaktisamanvitaḥ brahmaṇānbhojayecchaktyā saṃsmaranmādhavaṃ prabhum  NarP evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā tiladāne vrataṃ mune vājapeya śatasyāsau saṃpūrṇaṃ phalamāpnuyāt  NarP phaālgunasya site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣitaḥ govindāya namastubhyamiti saṃpūjayedvratī  NarP aṣṭottagaraśataṃ dṛtvā ghṛtamiśratilāhutīḥ pūrvamānena payasā govindaṃ snāpayecchuciḥ  NarP rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kuryātrrikālaṃ pūjayaittathā prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpyātha govindaṃ pūjayetpunaḥ  NarP vrīhyāḍhakaṃ ca viprāya dadyādvastraṃ sadakṣiṇam namo govinda sarveśa gopikājanavallabha  NarP anena dhānya dānena prīto bhava jagadguro evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ samyak sarvapāpavivarjitaḥ  NarP gomedhamakhajaṃ puṇyaṃ sampūrṇaṃ labhate naraḥ caitramāse site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣitaḥ  NarP namo stu viṣṇave tubhyamiti pūrvavadarcayet kṣīreṇa snāpayedviṣṇuṃ pūrvamānena śaktitaḥ  NarP tathaiva snāpayedvipra ghṛtaprasthena sādanam kṛtvā jāgaraṇaṃ rātrau pūjayetpūrvavadrūtī  NarP tatakaḥ kalye samutthāya prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpya ca aṣṭottaraśataṃ hutvā madhaavājyatilamiśritam  NarP sadakṣiṇaṃ ca viprāya dadyādvai taṇḍulāḍhakam prāṇarupī mahāviṣṇuḥ prāṇadaḥ sarvavallabhaḥ  NarP taṇḍulāḍhakadānena prīyatāṃ me janārdanaḥ evaṃ kṛtvā naro bhaktyā sarvapāpavivarjitaḥ  NarP atyangiṣṭomayajñasya phalamaṣṭaguṇaṃ labhet vaiśākhaśukladvādaśyāmupoṣya madhusūdanam  NarP droṇakṣīreṇa deveśaṃ snāpayedbhaktiṃsaṃyutaḥ jāgaraṃ tatragha karttavyaṃ trikālārcanasaṃyutam  NarP namaste madhuhantre ca juhuyācchaktito ghṛtam aṣṭottaraśataṃ prorcya vidhivanmadhusūdanam  NarP vipāpo hyaśvamedhānāmaṣṭānāṃ phalamānpuyāt jyeṣṭamāse site pakṣe dvādaśyāmupavāsakṛt  NarP kṣīreṇāḍhakamānena snāpayedyastriviktamam namastriviktamāyeti pūjayedbhaktisaṃyutaḥ  NarP juhuyātpāyasenaiva hyaṣṭottaraśatāhutīḥ kṛtvā jāgaraṇaṃ rātrau punaḥ pūjāṃ prakalpayet  NarP apūpaviṃśatiṃ dattvā brāhmaṇāya sadakṣiṇam devadeva jagannāta prasīda parameśvara  NarP upāyanaṃ ca saṃgṛhya mamābhīṣṭaprado bhava brāhmaṇānbhojayecchaktyā svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ  NarP evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra vrataṃ traivikramaṃ param so ṣṭānāṃ naramedhānāṃ vipāpaḥ phalamānpuyāt  NarP āṣāḍhaśukladvādaśyāmupavāsī jitendriyaḥ vāmanaṃ pūrvamānena snāpayetpayasā vratī  NarP namaste vāmanāyeti dūrvājyāṣṭottaraṃ śatam hutvā ca jāgaraṃ kuryādvāmanaṃ cārcayetpunaḥ  NarP sadākṣiṇaṃ ca dadhyannaṃ nālikeraphalānvitam bhaktyā pradadyādviprāya vāmanārcanaśīline  NarP vāmano vuddhido hotā dravyastho vāmanaḥ sadā vāmanastārako smācca vāmanāya namo namaḥ  NarP anena dattvā dadhyannaṃ śaktito bhojayeddijān kṛtvai vamagriṣṭomānāṃ śatasya phalamāpnuyāt  NarP śrāvaṇasya site pakṣe dvādaśyāmupavāsakṛt kṣīreṇa madhumiśreṇa snāpayecchrīdharaṃ vratī  NarP namo stu śrīdharāyeti gandhādyaiḥ pūjayetkramāt juhuyātpṛṣadājyena śatamaṣṭottaraṃ mune  NarP kṛtvā ca jāgaraṃ rātrau punaḥ pūjāṃ prakalpayet dātavyaṃ caiva viprāya kṣīrāḍhakamanuttamam  NarP dakṣiṇāṃ ca savastrāṃ vai pradadyāddhemakuṇḍale mantreṇānena viprendru sarvakāmāśrasiddhaye  NarP kṣīrābdhiśāyindeveśa ramākānta jagatpate kṣīradānena suprīto bhava sarvasukhapradaḥ  NarP sukhapradattvādviprāṃśca bhojayecchaktito vratī eva kṛtvā śvamedhānāṃ sahasrasya phalaṃ labhet  NarP māsi bhādrapade śukle dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣitaḥ snāpayeddroṇapayasā hṛṣīkeśaṃ jagadgurum  NarP hṛṣīkeśa namastubhyamiti saṃpūjayennaraḥ caruṇā madhuyuktena śatamaṣṭottaraṃ hunet  NarP jāgarādīnini nirvartya dadyādātmavide tataḥ sārdhāḍhakaṃ ca godhūmāndakṣiṇāṃ hema śaktitaḥ  NarP hṛṣīkeśa namastubhyaṃ sarvalokaikahetave mahyaṃ sarvasukhaṃ dehi godhūmasya pradānataḥ  NarP bhojayedvrāhmāñśaktyā svayaṃ cāśrītavāgyataḥ sarvapāpavinirmukto brahmamedhaphalaṃ labhet  NarP āśvine māsiśuklāyāṃ dvādaśyāṃsamupoṣitaḥ padmanābhaṃ capayasā snāpayedbhaktitaḥ śuciḥ  NarP namaste padmanābhāya homaṃ kuyārtsvaśaktitaḥ tilabrīhiyavājyaiśca pūjayecca vidhānataḥ  NarP jāmaraṃ niśi nirvartya punaḥ pūjāṃ samācaret dadyādviprāya kuḍavaṃ madhunastu sadakṣiṇam  NarP padmanābhagha namastubhyaṃ sarvalokapitāmaha madhudānena suprīto bhavasarvasukhapradaḥ  NarP evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā padmanābhavrataṃ sudhīḥ brahmamedhasahasrasya phalamānpoti niścitam  NarP dvādaśyāṃ kārtike śukle upavāsī jitendriyaḥ kṣīreṇākaḍhakamānena dandhā vājyena tāvatā  NarP namo dāmodarāyeti snāpayedbhaktibhāvataḥ aṣṭottaraśataṃ hutvā maghvājyāktatilāhutīḥ  NarP jāgaraṃ niyataḥ kuryāttrikālārcanatatparaḥ prātaḥ saṃpūjayeddevaṃ padmapuṣpairmanoramaiḥ  NarP punaraṣṭottaraśataṃ juhuyātsaghṛtai stilaiḥ pañcabhakṣyayutaṃ cānnaṃ dadyādviprāya bhaktitaḥ  NarP dāmodara jagannātha sarvakāraṇakāraṇa trāhimāṃ kṛpayā deva śāraṇāgatapālakaḥ  NarP anena dattvā dānaṃ ca śrotriyāya kuṭumbine dakṣiṇāñca yathāśaktyā brāhmaṇāṃśvāpi bhojayet  NarP evaṅkṛtvā vrataṃ samyagaśrīyādvūndhubhiḥ saha aśvamegha sahasrāṇāṃ dviguṇaṃ phalamaśnute  NarP evaṃ kuryādvratī yastu dvādaśīvratamuttamam saṃvatsaraṃ muniśreṣṭha sa yāti parama padam  NarP ekamāse dvimāse vāyaḥ kuryādbhaktitatparaḥ tattatphalamavānpoti prānpoti ca hareḥ padam  NarP pūrṇaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtvā kuryādudyāpanaṃ vratī mārgaśīrṣāsite pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ ca munīśvara  NarP snātvā prātaryathācāraṃ dantadhāvanapūrvakam śuklamālyāmbaradharaḥ śuklagandhānulepanaḥ  NarP maṇḍapaṃ kārayeddivyaṃ caturastraṃ suśībhanam ghaṇṭācāmarasaṃyuktaṃ kiṅkiṇīravaśobhitam  NarP alaṅkṛtaṃ puṣpamālyairvitānaghvajarājitān chāditaṃ śuklavastreṇa dīpamālāvibhūṣitam  NarP tanmadhye sarvatobhadraṃ kuryātsamyagalaṅkṛtam tasyoparinyasetkumbhāndvādaśāmbuprapūritān  NarP ekena śulkavanastreṇa samyaksaṃśodhitena ca sarvānācchādayetkumbhānpañcaratnasamanvitān  NarP lakṣmīnārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ kārayedbhaktimānvratī henmā vā rājatenāpi tathā tāmreṇa vā dvijā  NarP sthāpayetpratimāṃ tāṃ ca kumbhopari susaṃyamī tanmūlyaṃ vā dvijaśreṣṭha kāñcanaṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ  NarP sarvavrateṣu matimānvittaśāṭhyaṃ vivarja yet yadi kuryātkṣayaṃ yānti tasyāyurddhanasaṃpadaḥ  NarP anantaśāyinaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇamanāmayaṭam pañcāmṛtena prathamaṃ snāpayedbhaktisaṃyutaḥ  NarP nāṃmabhiḥ keśavādyaiśca hyupacārānmakalpayet rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kuryātpurāṇaśravaṇādibhaghiḥ  NarP jitanidro bhavetsamyaksopavāso jitendriyaḥ trikālamarcayeddevaṃ yathāvibhavavistaram  NarP tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpya ca tilahomānvyāhṛtibhiḥ sahasraṃra kāvyeddvijaiḥ  NarP tataḥ saṃpūjayeddevaṃ gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ kramāt devasya purataḥ kuryātpurāṇaśravaṇaṃ tataḥ  NarP dadyāddvādaśaviprebhyo dadhyannaṃ pāyasaṃ pāyasaṃ tathā apūpairdaśa bhiryuktaṃ saghṛtaṃ ca sadakṣiṇam  NarP devadevajagannātha bhaktānugrahavigraha gṛhāṇopāyanaṃ kṛṣṇa sarvābhīṣṭaprado bhava  NarP anenopāyanaṃ dattvā prārthaye māñjaliḥ sthitaḥ ādhāya jānunī bhūmau vinayāvananato vratī  NarP namo namaste surarājarāja namo stute devaṃ jagannivāsa kuruṣva saṃpṛrṇaphalaṃ mamādya namo stu tubhyaṃ puruṣottamāya  NarP iti saṃprārthayedviprāndevaṃ ca puruṣottamam dadyādarghyaṃ ca devāya mahālakṣmīyutāya vai  NarP lakṣmīpate namastubhyaṃ kṣīrārṇavanivāsine arghyaṃ gṛhāṇa deveśa lakṣmyā ca sahitaḥ prakṣo  NarP yasya smṛtyā ca nāmoktyā tapoyajñakriyādiṣu nyūnaṃ saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti sadyo vande tamacyutam  NarP iti vijñāpya deveśaṃ tatsarvaṃ saṃyamī vrate pratimāṃ dakṣiṇāyuktāmācāryāya nivedayet  NarP brāhmaṇānbhojayetpaścīcchaktyā dadyāja dakṣiṇām bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ paścātsvayaṃ bevṛjanairvṛtaḥ  NarP āsāyaṃ śṛduyādviṣṇoḥ kathāṃ vidvajjanaiḥ saha ityevaṃ kurute yastu manujo dvādaśīvratam  NarP sarvānkāmānsa ānpoti paraghatreha ca nārada trisatakulasaṃyuktaḥ sarvapāpavivarjitaḥ tapāti viṣṇubhavanaṃ yatra yattvā na śocati  NarP ya idaṃ śṛṇuyādvipra dvādaśīvratamuttamam vācayedvāpi sa naro vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde vratākhyāne mārgaśīrṣaśukladvādaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma satpadaśo dhyāyaḥsanaka uvācaanyadvratavaraṃ vakṣya śṛṇuṣva munisattama sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvaduḥkhanibarhaṇam  NarP brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ yoṣitāṃ tathā samastakāmaphaladaṃ sarvavratamyaphalapradam  NarP duḥsvanpanāśane dharmyaṃ duṣṭagrahanivāraṇam sarvalokeṣu vikhyātaṃ pūrṇimāvratamam yena cīrṇena pāpānāṃ rāśikoṭiḥra praśāmyati  NarP mārgaśīrṣe sitepakṣe pūrṇāyāṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ snānaṃ kuryādyathācāraṃ dantadhāvanapūrvakam  NarP śuklāmbaradharaḥ śuddho gṛhamāgagatya vāgyataḥ prakṣālya pādāvācamya smaratrārāyaṇaṃ prabhum  NarP nityaṃ devārcanaṃ kṛtvā paśvātsaṃkalpapūrvakam lakṣmī nārāyaṇaṃ devamarcayedbhaktibhāvataḥ  NarP āvāhanāsanādyaiśca gandhapuṣpādibhirvratī namo nārāyaṇāyeti pūjayedbhaktitatparaḥ  NarP gītairvādyaiśca nṛtyaiśca saṃpadāmādikāraṇam apāpe pāpadhīryastu taṃ vidyātpuruṣādhamam  NarP pāpe tvapāpadhīryastu taṃ vidyādadhamādhamam  NarP yamadūtā ūcuḥyuṣmābhiḥ satyamevoktaṃ kiṃ tvetau pāpisattamau yamena pāpino daṇḍyāstanneṣyāmo vayaṃ tvimau  NarP śrutipraṇihito dharmo hyadharmastadviparyayaḥ dharmādharmaviveko yaṃ tanneṣyāmo yamāntikam  NarP etactchuvātikupitā viṣṇudūtā mahaujasaḥ pratyūcūstānyamabhaṭānadharme dharmamāninaḥ  NarP viṣṇadūtā ūcuḥaho kaṣṭaṃ dharmadṛśāmadharmaḥ spṛśate sabhām samyagvivekaśūnyānāṃ nidānaṃ hyāpadāṃ mahat  NarP tarkāṇādyaviśeṣeṇa narakādhyakṣatāṃ gatāḥ yūyaṃ kimarthamadyāpi karttuṃ pāpāni sodyamāḥ  NarP svakarmakṣayaparyantaṃ mahāpātakino pi ca tiṣṭanti narake ghore yāvaccandrārkatārakam  NarP pūrvasaṃcitapāpānāmadṛṣṭvā niṣkṛtiṃ vṛthā kimarthaṃ pāpakarmāṇi kariṣye tha punaḥ punaḥ  NarP śrutipraṇihito dharmaḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ kintvābhyāṃ caritāndharmānpravakṣyāmo yathātatham  NarP etau pāpavinirmuktau hariśuśrūṣaṇe ratau hariṇā trāyamāṇau ca muñcadhvamavilambitam  NarP eṣā ca nartanaṃ cakre tathaiva dhvajaroṣaṇam antakāle viṣṇugṛhe tena niṣpāpatāṃ gatau  NarP antakāle tu yannāma śrutvoktvāpi ca vai sakṛt labhate paramaṃ sthānaṃ kimu śūśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ  NarP mahāpātakayukto vā yukto vāpyupapātakaiḥ kṛṣṇasevī naro nte pi labhate paramāṃ gatim  NarP yatīnāṃ viṣṇubhaktānāṃ paricaryā parāyaṇāḥ te dūtāḥ sahasā yānti pāpino pi parāṃ gatim  NarP muhurtaṃ vā muhurtārddhaṃ yastiṣṭoddharimandire so pi yāti paraṃ sthānaṃ kimudvātraghiṃśavatsarān  NarP upalepanakarttārau saṃmārjanaparāyaṇau etau harigṛhe nityaṃ paraṃ padam  NarP tatra sāmīpyamāpannau devadevasya cakriṇaḥ divyānbhogānbhuktavantau tāvatkālaṃ munīśvara  NarP divyānbhogāṃstu tatrāpi bhuktvā yātau mahīmimām atrāpi saṃpadatulā harisevāprasādataḥ  NarP anicchayā kṛtenāpi sevanena harermune prātpamīdṛk phalaṃ vipra devānāmapi durlabham  NarP icchayārādhya viśveśaṃ bhaktibhāvena mādhavam prāpsyāvaḥ paramaṃ śreya iti heturnirupitaḥ  NarP avaśenāpi yatkarma kṛtaṃ syātsumahatphalam jāyate bhūmidevendra kiṃ punaḥ śraddhayā kṛtam  NarP etaduktaṃ niśamyāsau sa munīndro vibhaṇḍakaḥ praśasya dampatī tau tu prayayau svatapevanam  NarP tasmājjānīhi devarṣe devadevasya cakriṇaḥ paricaryā tu sarveṣāṃ kāmadhenūpamā smṛtā  NarP haripūjāparāṇāṃ tu harireva sanātanaḥ dadāti paramaṃ śreyaḥ sarvakāmaphalamapradaḥ  NarP ya idaṃ puṇyamākhyānaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam paṭhecca śṛṇuyādvāpi so pi yāti parāṃ rātim  NarP iti śrabṛhannāradīyaparāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sumatibhūpakathāvarṇanaṃ nāma viṃśadhyāyaḥsanaka uvācaanyadvūtaṃ pravakṣyāmi niyamamāsthitāḥ tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya hyekādaśyāṃ munīśvaraḥ  NarP snānaṃ kṛtvā yathācāraṃ hariṃ caivāryadṛhe snāpayeddevadeveśaṃ pañcāmṛtavidhānataḥ  NarP arcayetparayā bhaktyā gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ ṛmāt dhūpairdīpeśca naivaidyaistāmbūlaiśca pradakṣiṇaiḥ  NarP saṃpūjya devadeveśamimaṃ mantramudīrayet namaste ghajñānarupāya jñānadāya namo stute  NarP namaste sravaparupāya sarvasiddhipradāyine evaṃ praṇamya deveśaṃ vāsudevaṃ janārjanam  NarP vakṣyamāṇena mantreṇa hyupavāsaṃ samarpayet pañcarātraṃ nirāhāro hyadyaprabhṛti keśava  NarP tvadajñayā jagatsvāminmamābhīṣṭaprado bhava evaṃ samapya devasya upavāsaṃ jitendriyaḥ  NarP rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kuryādekādaśyāmatho dvija dvādaśyāṃ ca trayodaśyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ jitendriyaḥ  NarP paurṇanamāsyāṃ ca karttavyamevaṃ viṣṇvarcanaṃ mune ekādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ karttavyaṃ jāgaraṃ tathā  NarP pañcāmṛtādipūjā tu sāmānyā dinapañcasu kṣīreṇa snāpayedviṣṇuṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu śaktitaḥ tilahomaśca karttavyastiladānaṃ tathaiva ca  NarP tataḥ ṣaṣṭe dine prātpe nirvatyaṃ svāśramakriyām saṃprāśya pañcagavyaṃ ca pūjayedvidhibaddharim  NarP brāhmaṇānbhojayetpaścādvibhave satyavāritam tataḥ svabandhubhiḥ sārddhaṃ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ  NarP evaṃ paupādimāseṣu kārttikānteṣu nārada śuklapakṣe vrataṃ kuryātpūrvamivavidhinā naraḥ  NarP evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kāryaṃ vrataṃ pāpapraṇāśanam punaḥ prātpe mārgaśīrṣe kuryādudyapanaṃ vratī  NarP dvija ekādaśyāṃ nirāhāro bhavetpūrvamiva dvija dvādaśyāṃ pañcagavyaṃ ca prāśayetsusamāhitaḥ  NarP gandhapuṣpā dibhiḥ samyagdevadevaṃ janārdanam abhyarcyopāyanaṃ dadyādrūhyaṇāya jitendriyaḥ  NarP pāyasaṃ madhusaṃmiśraṃ ghṛtayuktaṃ phalānvitam sugandhaja lasaṃyuktaṃ pūrṇakumbhaṃ sadakṣiṇam  NarP vastreṇācchāditaṃ kumbhaṃ pañcarantasamanvitam dadyādadhyātmaviduṣe brāhmaṇāya munīśvara  NarP sarvātman sarvabhūteśa sarvavyāpinsanātana paramānnapradānena suprīto bhava mādhava  NarP anena pāyasaṃ dattvā brāhmaṇānbhojayettataḥ śaktito bandhubhiḥ sārddhaṃ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ  NarP vratametattu yaḥ kuryāddharipañcakasaṃjñitam na tasya punarāvṛttirbrahmalokātkadācana  NarP vratametatprakarttavya micchadbhirmokṣamuttam samastapāpakāntāradāvānalasamaṃ dvija  NarP gavāṃ koṭisahasrāṇi dattvā pūrvabhāge prathamapāde vratākhyāne mārgaśīrṣaśulkaikādaśīmāsabhya paurṇimāparyantaṃ pañcarātrivrataṃ nāmaikaviṃśo sanaka uvācaanyad vratavaraṃ vakṣye tacchṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ sarvāpāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ kṣiṇam  NarP svayaṃ ca bandhubhiḥ sārddhaṃ bhuñjīta prayatendriyaḥ evaṃ māsopavāsāṃśca vratī kuryāt trayodaśa  NarP varṣānte vedaviduṣe gāṃ pradadyātsa dakṣiṇām bhojayedvrāhmāṇāṃstatra dvādaśaiva jyotiṣṭo syanga yajñasya phalaṃ so ṣṭaguṇaṃ labhet  NarP nirāhāraḥ satpakṛtvo naro māsopavāsakān aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalamaṣṭaguṇaṃ labhet  NarP māso pāvāsānyaḥ kuryādaṣṭakṛtvo munīśvara brahmamedhayajñasya triguṇaṃ phalamaśnute  NarP ekādaśa parākāṃśca yaḥ kuryātsaṃyatendriyaḥ sa yāti harisārupyaṃ sarvabhogasamanvitam  NarP trayodaśa parākāṃśca yaḥ kuryātprayato naraḥ sa yāti śrutvaitanmokṣabhāgbhavet  NarP idaṃ puṇyaṃ vratākhyānaṃ nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ śṛṇuyādvācayedvāpi sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde vratākhyāne brahmahatyādikāni ca ca annamāśritya tiṣṭanti tāni vipra harerdine  NarP brahmahatyādipāpānāṃ kathañcinniṣkṛtirbhavet ekādaśyāṃ tu yo bhuṅkte tasya naivāsti niṣkṛtiḥ  NarP mahāpātakayukto vāyukto vā nāsti kṣamāsamā mātā nāsti kīrtisamaṃ dhanam nāsti jñānasamo lābho lābho na ca dharma samaḥ pitā  NarP na vivekasamo bandhurmaikādaśyāḥ paraṃ vratam atrāpyudāharantīmamitihāsaṃ purātanam  NarP apṛcchadvismayāviṣṭaḥ samāliṅgya taponidhiḥ  NarP gālava uvācabhadraśīla mahābhāga bhadraśīlo si suvrata caritaṃ maṅgalaṃ yatte yogināmapi durlabham  NarP haripūjāparo nityaṃ sarvabhūtahiterataḥ ekādaśīvrataparo niṣiddhācāravarjitaḥ nirddhandvo nirmamaḥ śānto haridhyānaparāyāṇaḥ  NarP evametādṛśī buddhiḥ kathaṃ jātārbhakasyate vināpi mahatāṃ sevāṃ haribhaktirhi durlabhā  NarP svabhāvato janasyāsya hyavidyākāmakarmasu pravarttate matirvatsa kathaṃ te laukikī kṛtiḥ  NarP satsaṅge pi manuṣyāṇāṃ pūrvapuṇyātirekataḥ jāyate bhagavadbhaktistadahaṃ vismayaṃ gataḥ  NarP pṛcchāmi prītimāpannastadbhavānvaktumarhati bhadraśīlo muniśreṣṭhaḥ pitraivaṃ suvikalpitaiḥ  NarP jātismaraḥ sukṛtātmā hṛṣathṭaprahasitānanaḥ svānabhrutaṃ yathāvrataṃ sarvaṃ pitre nyavedayat  NarP bhadraśīla uvācaśṛṇu tāta muniśreṣṭha hyanubhūtaṃ mayā purā jātismaratvājjānāmi yamena paribhāṣitam  NarP etacchatvā mahābhāgo gālavo vismayonvitaḥ uvāca prītimāpanno bhadraśīlaṃ mahāmatim  NarP gālava uvācakastvaṃ pūrvaṃ mahābhāga kimuktaṃ ca yamena te kasya vā kena vā hetostatsarvaṃ vaktumarhasi  NarP bhadraśīla uvācaahamāsaṃ purā tāta rājā somakulodbhavaḥ dharmakīrtiriti khyāto dattātragheyeṇa śāsitaḥ  NarP nava varṣasahasrāṇi mahīṃ kṛtstramapālayam adharmāśca tathā dharmā mayā tu bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ  NarP tataḥ śriyā pramatto haṃ bahvadharmama kāripam pāpaṇḍajanasaṃsargātpāpaṇḍacarito bhavam  NarP purārjitāni puṇyāni mayā tu subahūnyapi pāpaṇḍairbādhito haṃ tu vedamārgaṃ samatyajam  NarP makhāśca sarve vidhvastā kūṭayuktividā mayā adharmanirataṃ māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā maheśajāḥ  NarP sadaiva duṣkṛtaṃ cakruḥ ṣaṣṭāṃśastatrame bhavat evaṃ pāpasamācāro vyasanābhirataḥ sadā  NarP mṛgayābhirarato bhūtvā hyakadā prāviśaṃ vanam sasainyo haṃ vane tatra hatvā bahuvidhānmṛgān  NarP kṣuttṛṭparivṛtaḥ śrānto revātīramupāgamam ravitīkṣṇātapalkānto revāyāṃ snānamācaram  NarP ahaṣṭasainya ekākī pīḍyamānaḥ kṣudhā bhṛśam  NarP sametāstatragha ye kecidrevātīranivāsinaḥ ekādaśīvrataparā mayā dṛṣṭvā niśāmukhe  NarP nirāhāraśca tatrāhame kākī katajjanaiḥ saha jāgaraṃ kṛtavāṃśvāpi senayā rahito niśi  NarP adhvaśramapariśrāntaḥ kṣutpipāsāprapīḍitaḥ tatraiva jāgarānte haṃ tātapañcatvamāgataḥ  NarP tato yamabhaṭairbaddho mahādaṃṣṭrābhayaṅkaraiḥ anekalkeśasaṃpannamārgeṇātpo yamāntikam daṃṣṭrākarālavadanamapaśyaṃ samavartinam  NarP atha kāliścitragutpamāhūyedamabhāṣata asya śikṣāvidhānaṃ ca yathāvadvada paṇḍitaṃ  NarP evamuktaścitragutpo dharmarājena sattama ciraṃ vicārayāmāsa punaścedamabhāpata  NarP asau pāparataḥ satyaṃ tathāpi śṛṇu dharmapa ekādaśyāṃ nirāhāraḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate  NarP eṣa revātaṭe ramye nirāhāro harerdine jāgaraṃ copavāsaṃ ca kṛtvā niṣaapāpatāṃ gataḥ  NarP yāni kāni ca pāpāni kṛtāni subahūni ca tāni sarvāṇi naṣṭāni hyupavāsaprabhāvataḥ  NarP evamukto dharmarājaścitragutpena dhīmatā nānāma daṇḍavadbhūmau mamāgre so nukaṃpitaḥ  NarP pūjayāmāsa māṃ tatra bhaktibhāvena dhairmarāṭ tataśca svabhaṭānsarvānāhūyedamuvāca ha  NarP dharmarāja uvācaśṛṇudhvaṃ madvaco dūtā hitaṃ vakṣyāmyanuttamamam dharmamārgaratā nmartyānmānayadhvaṃ mamāntikam  NarP ye viṣṇupūjanaratāḥ prayatāḥ kṛtajñāścaikādaśīvrataparā vijitendriyāśca nārāyaṇācyutahare śaraṇaṃ bhaveti śāntā vadanti satataṃ tarasātyajadhvam  NarP nārāyaṇācyuta janārdana kṛṣṇa viṣṇo padmeśa padmajapitaḥ śiva śaṅkareti nityaṃ vadantyakhilaloka hitāḥ praśāntā dūradbhaṭāstyajatā tānna mamaiṣu śikṣā  NarP nārāyaṇārpitakṛtānharibhaktibhajaḥ svācāramārganiratān gurusevakāṃśca satpātradāna niratāṃśca sudīnapāllāndūtāstyajadhvamaniśaṃ harināmasaktān  NarP pāṣaṇḍasaṅgarahitāndvijabhaktiniṣṭhānsatsaṃgalollupatarāṃśca tathātitheyān śaṃbhau harau ca samabuddhimatastathaiva dūtāstyajadhvamupakāraparāñjanānām  NarP ye varjitā harikathāmṛtasevanaiśca nārāyaṇasmṛtiparāyaṇamānasaiśca virpandrapādajalasecanato prahṛṣṭāṃstānpāpino mama bhaṭā gṛhamānayadhvam  NarP ye mātṛtātaparibhartsanaśīlinaśca lokadviṣo hitajanāhitakarmaṇaśca devasvalobhaniratāñjananāśakartṛānatrānayadhvamaparādhaparāṃśca dūtāḥ  NarP ekādaśīvrataparāṅmukhamugraśīlaṃ lokāpavādanirataṃ paranindakaṃ ca grāmasya nāśakaramuttamavairayuktaṃ dūtāḥ samānayata vipradhaneṣu lubdham  NarP ye viṣṇubhaktivimukhāḥ praṇamanti naiva nārāyaṇaṃ hi śaraṇāgatapālakaṃ ca viṣṇavālayaṃ ca nahi yānti narāḥ sumūrkhāstānānayadhvamatipāparatānprasāhya  NarP evaṃ śrutaṃ yadā tatra yamena paribhāṣitam mayānutāpadagdhena smṛtaṃ tatkarma ninditam  NarP asatkarmānutāpena saddharmaśravaṇena ca tatraiva sarvapāpāni niḥśeṣāṇi gatāni me  NarP pāpaśeṣādvinirmuktaṃ harisārupyatāṃ gatam sahasrasūryasaṃkāśaṃ praṇanāma yamaśca tam  NarP evaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāste yamadūtā bhayotkaṭāḥ viśvāsaṃ paramaṃ cakruryamena paribhāṣite  NarP tataḥ saṃpūjya māṃ kālo vimānaśatasaṃkulam sadyaḥ saṃpreṣayāmāsa tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam  NarP vimānakoṭibhiḥ sārddhaṃ sarvabhogasamanvitaiḥ karmaṇā tena viprarṣe viṣṇuloke mayoṣitam  NarP kalpakoṭisahasrāṇi kalpakoṭiśatāni ca sthitvā viṣṇupadaṃ paścādindralokamupagamam  NarP tatrāpi sarvabhogāḍhyaḥ sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ tāvatkālaṃ divisthitvā tato bhūmimupāgataḥ  NarP atrāpi viṣṇubhaktānāṃ jāto haṃ bhavatāṃ kule jātismaratvāḍajjānāmi sarvametanmunīśaavara  NarP tasmādviṣṇvarcanodyogaṃ karomi saha bālakaiḥ ekādaśīvratamidamiti na jñātavānpurā  NarP jātismṛtiprabhāveṇa tajjñātaṃ sāṃprataṃ mayā atra svenāpi yatkarma kṛtaṃ tasya phalaṃ tvidam  NarP ekādaśīvrataṃ bhaktyā kurvatāṃ kimuta prabho tasmāccariṣye viprendra śubhamekādaśīvratam  NarP viṣṇupūjāṃ cāharahaḥ paramasthānakāṅkṣayā ekādaśīvrataṃ yattu kurvanti śraddhayā narāḥ  NarP teṣāṃ tu viṣṇubhavanaṃ paramānandadāyakam evaṃ putravacaḥ śrutvā saṃtuṣṭo gālavo muniḥ  NarP avāpa paramāṃ tuṣṭiṃ manasā cātiharṣitaḥ majjanma saphalaṃ jātaṃ maddhaṃśaḥ pāvanīkṛtaḥ  NarP yatastvaṃ madagṛhe jāto viṣṇubhaktiparāyaṇaḥ iti saṃtuṣṭacittastu tasya putrasya karmaṇā  NarP haripūjāvidhānaṃ ca yathāvatsamabodhayat ityetatte muniśreṣṭha yathāvatkathitaṃ mayā saṃkocavistarābhyāṃ ca kimanyacchrotumicchasi  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīye purāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde vratākhyāne ekādaśīvratamahimānuvarṇanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśo yāyaḥsūta uvācaetanniśamya sanakoditamaprameyaṃ puṇyaṃ harerdinabhavaṃ nikhilottamaṃ ca pāpaughaśāntikaraṇaṃ vratasāramevaṃ brahmātmajaḥ punarabhāṣata harṣayuktaḥ  NarP nārada uvācakathitaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ mune tattvārthakovida vratākhyānaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ yathāvaddharibhaktidam  NarP idānīṃ śrotumicchāmi varṇācacāravidhiṃ mune tathā sarvāśramācāraṃ prāyaścittavidhiṃ tathā  NarP etatsarvaṃ mahābhāga sarvatattvārthakovida kṛpayā parayā mahyaṃ yathāvadvaktumarhasi  NarP sanaka uvācaśṛṇuṣva muniśārdūla yathā bhaktapriyaṅkaraḥ varṇāśramācāraparaiḥ pūjyate hariravyayaḥ  NarP manvādyairuditaṃ yacca varṇāśramanibandhanam tatte vakṣyāmi vidhivadbhakto si tvamadhokṣaje  NarP brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāścatvāra eva te varṇā iti samākhyātā eteṣu brāhmaṇo dhikaḥ  NarP brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā dvijāḥ proktāstrayastāthā mātṛtaścopanayanāddi jatvaṃ prāpyate tribhiḥ  NarP etairvarṇaiḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāryā varṇānurupataḥ svavarṇadharmatyagena pāṣaṇḍaḥ procyate budhaiḥ  NarP svagṛhyacoditaṃ karmadvijaḥ kurvankṛtī bhavet anyathā patito bhūyātsarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ  NarP yugadharmaḥ parigāryā verṇairetairyathocitam deśācārāstathāgrāhyāḥ smṛtidharmāvirodhataḥ  NarP karmaṇā manasā vācā yatnāddharṃmaṃ samācaret asvargyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ dharmyamapyācarennatu  NarP samudrayātrāsvīkāraḥ kamaṇḍaluvidhāraṇam dvijānāmasavarṇāsu kanyā sūpayamastathā  NarP devarācca sutotpattirmadhuparke paśorvadhaḥ māṃsādanaṃ tathā śrāddhe vānaprasthaāśramastathā  NarP dattākṣatāyāḥ kanyāyāḥ punardānaṃ varāya ca naiṣṭikaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca naramedhāścamedhakau  NarP mahāprasthānagamanaṃ gomedhaśca tathā makhaḥ etāndharmānkaliyuke varjyānāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ  NarP deśācārāḥ parigrāhyāstattaddeśagatairnaraiḥ anyathā patito jñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ  NarP brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ ca dvijottamā kriyāḥ sāmānyato vakṣye tacchṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ  NarP dānaṃ dadyārdvahmaṇebhyastathā yajñairyajetsurān vṛttyarthaṃ yācayeccaiva anyānadhyāpayettathā  NarP yājayedyajane yogyānvipro nityodakī bhavet kuryyācca vedagrahaṇaṃ tathāgreśca parigraham  NarP grāhyer dvye ca pārakye samabuddhirbhavettathā sarvalokahitaṃ kṛryānmṛduvākyamudīrayet  NarP ṛtāvabhigamaḥ patnyāṃ śasyate brāhmaṇasya vai na kasyāpyahitaṃ brūyādviṣṇupūjāparo bhavet  NarP dadyāddānāni viprebhyaḥ kṣatriyo pi dvijottama kuryyācca vedagrahaṇaṃ yajñairddevānyajettathā  NarP śastrājīvī bhaveccaiva pālayeddharmato mahīm duṣṭānāṃ śāsanaṃ kuryyācchiṣṭānāṃ pālanaṃ tathā  NarP pāśupālyaṃ ca vāṇijyaṃ kṛṃṣiśca dvijasattama vedasyādhyayanaṃ caiva vaiśyasyāpi prakīrttitam  NarP kuryācca dāragrahaṇaṃ dharmāścaiva samācaret krayavikrayajarvāpi dhanaiḥ kārukriyodbhavaiḥ  NarP dadyāddānāni śūdro pi pākayajñairyajenna ca brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śuśrūṣāni rato bhavet  NarP ṛtukālābhigāmīca svadāreṣu bhavettathā sarvalokahitoṣitvaṃ maṅgalaṃ priyavāditā  NarP anāyāso manoharṣastitikṣā nātimānitā sāmānyaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ munibhiḥ parikīrtitam  NarP sarve ca munitāṃ yānti svāśramocitakarmaṇā brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyācāramāśrayedāpadi dvija  NarP kṣatriyo pi ca viḍvṛttimatyāpadi samāśrayet nāśrayecchūdravṛttiṃ tu atyāpadyapi vai dvijaḥ  NarP yadyāśrayeddijo mūḍhastadā cāṇḍāsatāṃ vrajet brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ trayāṇāṃ munisattama  NarP catvāra āśramāḥ proktāḥ pañcamo nopapadyate brahmacārī gṛhī vānaprastho bhikṣuśca sattama  NarP caturbhirāśramairebhiḥ sādhyate dharma uttamaḥ viṣṇustuṣyati viprendra karmayogaratātmanaḥ  NarP niḥspṛhāśāntamanasaḥ svakarmaniratasya ca tato yāti paraṃ sthānaṃ yato nāvarttate punaḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannārāyaṇapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sadācāro nāma caturviśo dhyāyaḥsanaka uvācavarṇāśramācāravidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi viśeṣataḥ śṛṇuṣva tanmuniśreṣṭha sāvadhānena cetasā  NarP yaḥ svadharmaṃ parityajya paradharmaṃ samācaret pāṣaṇḍaḥ sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ  NarP garbhādhānādisaṃskārāḥ kāryā mantravidhānataḥ strīṇāmamantrataḥ kāryā yathākālaṃ yathāvidhi  NarP sīmantakarma prathamaṃ caturthe māsi śasyate ṣaṣṭe vā satpame vāpi aṣṭame vāpi kārayet  NarP jāte putre pitā snātvā sacailaṃ jātakarma ca kuryyācca nāndīśrāddhaṃ ca svastivācanapūrvakam  NarP hemnā vā rajatenāpi vṛddhiśrāddhaṃ prakalpayet annena kārayedyastu sa caṇḍāla samo bhavet  NarP kṛtvābhyudayikaṃ śrāddhaṃ pitā putraghasya vāgyataḥ kurvīta nāmanirddeśaṃ sūtakānte yathāvidhi  NarP aspaṣṭamarthahīnaṃ ca hyatigurva kṣarānvitam na dadyānnāma viprenda tathā ca viṣathamākṣaram  NarP tṛtīyavarṣe caulaṃ ca pañcame ṣaṣṭasaṃmite satpame cāṣṭame vāpi kuryād gṛhyoktamārgataḥ  NarP daivayogādatikrānte garbhādhānādikarmaṇi kartavyaḥ pādakṛcchro vai caule tvarddhaṃ prakalpayet  NarP garbhāṣṭame ṣṭame vābde baṭukasyopanāyanam āṣoḍaśābdaparyantaṃ gauṇaṃ kālamuśanti ca  NarP garbhaikādaśame bde tu rājanyasyopanāyanam ādvāviṃśābdaparyantaṃ kālamāhurvipaścitaḥ  NarP vaiśvopanayanaṃ proktaṃ garbhāddvādaśame tathā caturviṃśābdaparyantaṃ gauṇamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ  NarP etatkālāvadheryasya dvijasyātikramo bhavet sāvitrīpatitaṃ vidyāttaṃ tu naivālapetkadā  NarP dvijopanayane vipra mukhyakālavyatikrame dvādaśābdaṃ caretkṛcchraṃ paścājcāndrāyaṇaṃ tathā sāṃtapanadvayaṃ caiva kṛtvā karma samācaret  NarP anyathaā patitaṃ vidyātkarttāpi brahmahā bhavet rmauñjī viprasya vijñeyā dhanurjyā kṣattriyasya tu  NarP āvī vaiśyasya vijñeyā śrūyatāmajine tathā viprasya coktamaiṇeyaṃ rauravaṃ kṣatriyasya tu  NarP ājaṃ veśyasya vijñeyaṃ daṇḍānvakṣye yathākramam pālāśaṃ brāhmaṇasyoktaṃ nṛpasyaudumbaraṃ tathā  NarP bailvaṃ vaiśyasya vijñeya tatpramāṇaṃ śṛṇuṣva me viprasya keśamānaṃ syādālalāṭaṃ nṛpasya ca  NarP nāsāgrasaṃmitaṃ daṇḍaṃ vaiśyasyāhurvipaścitaḥ tathā vāsāṃsi vakṣaghyāmi viprādīnāṃ yathākramam  NarP kaṣāyaṃ caiva māñjiṣṭaṃ hāridraṃ ca prakīrtitam upanīto dvijo vipra paricaryāparo guroḥ  NarP vedagrahaṇaparyantaṃ nivasedguruveśmani prātaḥ snāyī bhavedvarṇī samitkuśaphalādikān  NarP gurvarthamāharennityaṃ kalye kalye munīśvara yajñopavītamajinaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca munisattama  NarP naṣṭe bhraṣṭe navaṃ mantrāddhṛtvā bhraṣṭaṃ jale kṣipet varṇino varttanaṃ prāhurbhikṣānnenaiva kevalam  NarP bhikṣā ca śrotriyāgārādāharetprayatendriyaḥ bhavatpūrvaṃ brāhmaṇasya bhavanmadhyaṃ nṛpasya ca  NarP bhavadatyaṃ viśaḥ proktaṃ bhikṣāharaṇakaṃ vacaḥ sāṃyaprātarvahnikāryaṃ yathācāraṃ jitendriyaḥ  NarP kuryātpratidinaṃ varṇīṃ brahmayajñaṃ ca tarpaṇam agnikāryaparityāgī patitaḥ procyate budhaiḥ  NarP brahmayajñavihīnaśca brahmahā parikīrtitaḥ devatābhyarccanaṃ kuryācchuśrūṣānupadaṃ guroḥ  NarP bhikṣānnaṃ bhojayennityaṃ naikānnāśī kadācana ānīyānindyaviprāṇāṃ gṛhādbhikṣāṃ jitendriyaḥ  NarP nivedya gurave śrīyādvāgyatastadanughajñayā madhustrīmāṃsalavaṇaṃ tāmbūlaṃ dantadhāvanam  NarP ucchiṣṭabhojanaṃ caiva divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet chātraghapāduka gandhāṃśca tathā mālyānulepanam  NarP jalakeliṃ nṛtyagītavādyaṃ tu parivarjayet parivādaṃ copatāpaṃ vipralāpaṃ tathāñjanam  NarP pāṣaṇḍa janasaṃyogaṃ śūdrasaṃgaṃ ca varjayet abhivādanaśīlaḥ syād vṛddheṣu ca yathākramam  NarP jñānavṛddhāstapovṛddhā vayovṛddhā iti trayaḥ ādhyātmikā diduḥkhāni nivārayati yo guruḥ  NarP vedaśāstropadeśena taṃ pūrvamabhivādayet asāvahamiti brūyāddijo vai hyabhivādane  NarP nābhivādyāśca vipreṇa kṣaghatriyādyāḥ kathañcana nāstikaṃ bhinnamaryādaṃ kṛtanghaṃ grāmayājakam  NarP stenaṃ ca kitavaṃ caiva kadācinnābhivādayet pāṣaṇḍaṃ patitaṃ vrātyaṃ tathā nakṣaghatrajīvinam  NarP tathā pātakinaṃ caiva kadācinnābhivādayet unmattaṃ ca śaṭhaṃ dhūrttaṃ dhāvantamaśuciṃ tathā  NarP abhyaktaśirasaṃ caiva japantaṃ nābhivādayet vivādaśīlinaṃ cañjaṃ vamantaṃ jalamadhyagam  NarP bhikṣānnadhāriṇaṃ caiva śayānaṃ nābhivādayet bhartṛnghīṃ puṣpiṇīṃ jārāṃ sūtikāṃ garbhapātinīm  NarP kṛtanghīṃ ca tathā caṇḍīṃ kadācinnābhivādayet sabhāyāṃ yajñaśālāyāṃ devatāyataneṣvapi  NarP pratyekaṃ tu namaskāro hṝnti puṇyaṃ purākṛtam śrāddhaṃ vrataṃ tathā dānaṃ devatābhyārcanaṃ tathā  NarP yajñaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ caiva kurvantaṃ nābhivādayet kṛte bhivādane yastu na kuryā tprativādanam  NarP nābhivādyaḥ sa vijñeyo yayā śūdrastathaiva saḥ prakṣālya pādāvācamya gurorabhimukhaḥ sadā  NarP tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya adhīyīta vicakṣaṇaḥ aṣṭakāsu caturdaśyāṃ pratipatparvaṇostathā  NarP mahābharaṇyāṃ vipredraṃ śravaṇadvādaśīdine bhādrapadāparapakṣe dvitīyāyāṃ tathaiva ca  NarP māghasya śuklasatpamyāṃ navamyāmāśrinasya ca pariveṣaṃ gate sūrye śrotriye gṛhamāgate  NarP bandhite brahmaṇe caiva pravṛddhakalahe tathā saṃdhyāyāṃ garjite meghe hyakāle parivarṣaṇe  NarP ulkāśaniprapāte ca tathā vipre vamānite manvādiṣu ca devarṣe yugādiṣu caturṣvapi  NarP nādhīyīta dvijaḥ kaścitsarvakarmaphalotsukaḥ tṛtīyā prādhave śuklā bhādre kṛṣṇā traghayodaśī  NarP kārttike navamī śuddhā māghe pañcadaśī tithiḥ etā yugādyāḥ kathitā dattasyākṣayakārikāḥ  NarP manvādīṃśca pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ akṣayukchuklanavamī kārtike dvādaśī sitā  NarP tṛtīyā caighatramāsasya tathā bhādrapadasya ca āṣāḍhaśukladaśamī sitā māghasya satpamī  NarP śrāvaṇasyāṣṭamī kṛṣṇā tathāṣāḍhī ca pūrṇamā phaālgunasya tvamāvāsyā pauṣasyaikādaśī sitā  NarP kārtikī phaālgunī caighatrīṃ jyaiṣṭhī pañcadaśī sitā manvādayaḥ samākhyātā dattasyākṣayakārikāḥ  NarP dvijaiḥ śraddhaṃ cakarttavyaṃ manvādiṣu yugādiṣu śrāddhe nimantrite caivagrahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ  NarP ayanadvitaye caiva tathā bhūkaṃpane mune galagrahe durddine ca nādhīyīta kadācanā  NarP evamādiṣu sarveṣu anadhyāyeṣu nārada adhīyatāṃ sumūḍhānāṃprajāṃprajñāṃyaśaḥ śriyam  NarP āyuṣyaṃ balamārogyaṃ nikṛntati yamaḥ svayam anadhyāye tu yo dhīte taṃ vidyādvrahmaghātakam  NarP na taṃ saṃbhāṣayedviprana tena saha saṃvaset kuṇḍagolakayoḥ kecijjaḍādīnāṃ ca nārada  NarP vadanti copanayanaṃ tatputrādiṣu kecana anadhītya tu yo vedamanyatra kurute śramam  NarP śūdratulyaḥ sa vijñeyo narakasya priyo tithiḥ anadhītaśrutirvipra ācāra pratipadyate  NarP nācāraphalamānpoti yathā śūdrastathaiva saḥ nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam  NarP anadhītasya viprasya sarvaṃ bhavati niṣphalam śabdabrahmamayo viṣṇurvedaḥ sākṣāddhāri smṛkataḥ  NarP vedādhyāyī tato vipraḥ sarvānkāmānavānpuyāt  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārtācāreṣu varṇāśramadharmeṣvadhyayanādidharmanirupaṇaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo dhyāyaḥsanaka uvācavedagrahaṇaparyantaṃ śuśrūṣāniyato guroḥ anujñātastatastena kuryādagniparigraham  NarP vedāśca dharmaśāstrāṇi vedāṅgānyapi ca dvijaḥ adhītya gurave dattvā dakṣiṇāṃ saṃviśedvṛham  NarP rupalāvaṇyasaṃpannāṃ saguṇāṃ sukulodbhavām dvijaḥ samudvahetkanyāṃ suśīlāṃ dharma cāriṇīm  NarP mātṛtaḥ pañcamīṃ dhīmānpitataḥ satpamīṃ tathā dvijaḥ samudvahetkanyathā gurutalparāḥ  NarP rogiṇīṃ caiva vṛttākṣīṃ sarogakulasaṃbhavām atikeśāmakeśāmakeśāṃ ca vācālāṃ nodvahedvudhaḥ  NarP kopānāṃ vāmanāṃ caiva dīrghadehāṃ virupiṇīm nyānādhikāṅgīmunmattāṃ piśunāṃ nodvahed budhaḥ  NarP sthūlagulphaāṃ dīrghajaṅghāṃ tathaiva puruṣākṛtim śmaśruvyañjanasaṃyuktāṃ kubjāṃ caivādvahenna ca  NarP vṛthāhāsyamukhīṃ caiva sadānyagṛha vāsinīm vivādaśīlāṃ bhramitāṃ niṣṭhurāṃ nodvahedrudhaḥ  NarP bahvaśinīṃ sthīladantāṃ sthūloṣṭhīṃ ghurghurasvanām atikṛṣṇāṃ raktavarṇāṃ dhūrtāṃ naivodvahe dvudhaḥ  NarP sadā rodanaśīlāṃ ca pāṇḍurābhāṃ ca kutsitām tāsaśvāsādisaṃyuktāṃ nidrāśīlāṃ ca nodvahet  NarP anarthabhāṣiṇīṃ caiva lokadveṣa parāyaṇām parāpavādaniratāṃ taskārāṃ nodvahedvudhaḥ  NarP dīrghanāsāṃ ca kitavāṃ tanūruhavibhūṣigatām garvitāṃ bakavṛttiṃ ca sarvathā nodvahedvudhaḥ  NarP bālabhāvādavijñātasvabhāvāmudvahedyadi pragalbhāṃ vāguṇāṃ jñātvā sarvathā tāṃ parityajet  NarP bharttṛputreṣu yā nārī sarvadā niṣṭhurā bhavet parānukūlinī yā ca sarvathā tāṃ parityajet  NarP vivāhāścāṣṭadhā jñeyā brāhmādyā munisattama pūrvaḥ pūrvo varo jñeyaḥ pūrvābhāve paraḥ paraḥ  NarP brāhno daivastathaivārṣaḥ prājāpatyastathāsuraḥ gāndharvo rākṣasaścaiva paiśācaścāṣṭamo mataḥ  NarP brāhmeṇa ca vivāhena vaivāhyo vai dvijottamaḥ daivenāpyathavā vipra kecidārṣaṃ pracakṣate  NarP prājāpatyādayo vipra vivāhāḥ pañcaja garhitāḥ abhāveṣu tu pūrveṣāṃ kuryādeva parānbudhaḥ  NarP yajñopavītadvitayaṃ sottarīyaṃ ca dhārayet suvarṇakuṇḍale caiva dhautavastradvayaṃ tathā  NarP anulepanalitpāṅgaḥ kṛttakeśanakhaḥ śuciḥ dhārayedvaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ sodakaṃ ca kamaṇḍalum  NarP uṣṇīṣamamalaṃ chatraṃ pāduke cāpyupānahau dhārayetpuṣpamālye ca sugandhaṃ priyadarśanaḥ  NarP nityaṃ svādhyāyaśīlaḥ syādyathācāraṃ samācaret parānnaṃ naiva bhuñjīta paravādaṃ ca varjayet  NarP pādena nākrametpādamucchiṣṭaṃ naiva laṅghayet na saṃhatābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ kaṇḍūyedātmanaḥ śiraḥ  NarP pūjyaṃ devālayaṃ caiva nāpasavyaṃ vrajeddijaḥ devārcācamanasnānavrataśrāddhakriyādiṣu  NarP na bhavenmuktakeśaśca naikavastradharastathā nāroheduṣṭrayānaṃ ca śuṣkavādaṃ ca varjayet  NarP anya striyaṃ na gacchecca paiśunyaṃ parivarjayet nāpasavyaṃ vrajedvipra goścatthānalaparvatān  NarP catuṣpathaṃ caityavṛkṣarṃ devakhātaṃ nṛpaṃ tathā asūyāṃ matsaratvaṃ ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet  NarP na vadetparapāpāni svapuṇyaṃ na prakāśayet svakaṃ nāma svanakṣatraṃ mānaṃ caivātigopayet  NarP na durjanaiḥ saha vase nnāśāstraṃ śṛṇuyāttathā āsavadyūtagīteṣu dvijastu na rartiṃ caret  NarP ārdrāsthi ca tathocchiṣṭaṃ śūdraṃ ca patitaṃ tathā sarpaṃ ca bhaṣaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snānamācaret  NarP citiṃ ca citikāṣṭaṃ ca yūpaṃ cāṇḍālameva ca spṛṣṭvā devalakaṃ caiva savāsā jalamāviśet  NarP dīpakhaṭvātanucchāyākeśavas trakaṭodakam ajāmārjaṃnimārjārareṇurddaivaṃ śubhaṃ haret  NarP śūrppavātaṃ pretadhūmaṃ tathā śūdrānnabhojanam vṛṣalīpatisaṅgaṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet  NarP asacchārstrārthamananaṃ khādanaṃ nakhakeśayoḥ tathaiva nagnaśayanaṃ sarvadā parivarjayet  NarP śirobhyaṅgāvaśiṣṭena tailenāṅgaṃ na lepayet tāṃbūlamaśuciṃ nādyāttathā suptaṃ na bodhayet  NarP nāśuddho gniṃ paricaretpūjayedgurudevatāḥ na vāmahastenaikena pibedvakreṇa vā jalam  NarP na cākramedgurośchāyāṃ tadājñāṃ ca munīśvara na nindedyogino viprānvratino pi yatīṃstathā  NarP parasparasya marmāṇi na kadāpi vadeddvijaḥ darśe ca paurṇamāsyāṃ ca yāgaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi  NarP upasanaṃ ca hotavyaṃ sāyaṃ prātardvijātibhiḥ upāsanaparityāgī surāpītyucyate budhaiḥ  NarP ayane viṣuve caiva yugādiṣu caturṣvapi darśe ca pretapakṣe ca śrāddhaṃ kuryādgṛhī dvijaḥ  NarP manvādiṣu mṛdāhe ca aṣṭakāsu ca nārada nāvadhānye samāyāte gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret  NarP śrotriye gṛhamāyāte grahaṇe candrasūryoḥ puṇyakṣetreṣu tīrtheṣu gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret  NarP yajño dānaṃ tapo homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam vṛthā bhavati tatsarvamūrddhapuṇḍraṃ vinā kṛtam  NarP urddhapuṇḍraṃ ca tulasīṃ śrāddhe necchanti kecana vṛthācāraḥ parityājyastasmācchreyo rthibhirdvijaiḥ  NarP ityevamādayo dharmāḥ smṛtimārgapracoditāḥ kāryā dvijātibhiḥ samyaksarvakarmaphalapradāḥ  NarP sadā cāraparā ye tu teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasīdati viṣṇau prasannatāṃ yāte kimasādhyaṃ dvijottama  NarP  iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārttadhermaṣu vedādhyayanādikasya gṛhasthadharmasya ca nirupaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo dhyāyaḥ sanaka uvācagṛhasthasya sadācāraṃ vakṣyāmi munisattama yadrūtāṃ sarvapāpāni naśyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ  NarP brāhne muhūrte cotthāya puruṣārthāvirodhinīm vṛttiṃ saṃcintayedvipra kṛtakeśaprasādhanaḥ  NarP divāsaṃdhyāsu karṇasthabrahmasūtra udaḍmukhaḥ kuryānmūtrapurīṣe tu rātrau ceddakṣiṇāmukhaḥ  NarP śiraḥ prāvṛtya vastreṇa hyantarddhāya tṛṇairmahīm vahankāṣṭaṃ kareṇaikaṃ tāvanmaunī bhaveddvijaḥ  NarP pathi goṣṭe nadītīre taḍāgagṛhasannidhau tathā vṛkṣasya cchāyāyāṃ kāntāre vahnisannidhau  NarP devālaye tathodyāne kṛṣṭabhūmau catuṣpathe brāhmaṇānāṃ samīpe ca tathā goguruyoṣitām  NarP tuṣāṅgārakapāleṣu jalamadhye tathaiva ca evamādiṣu deśeṣu malamūtraṃ na kārayet  NarP śauce yatnaḥ sadā kāryaḥ śaucamūlo dvijaḥ smṛtaḥ śaucācāravihīnasya samastaṃ karma niṣphalam  NarP śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ brāhmamābhyāntaraṃ tathā mṛjjalābhyāṃ bahiḥ śuddhirbhāvaśuddhistathāntaram  NarP gṛhītaśiśraścotthāya śaucārthaṃ mṛdamāharet na mūṣakādikhanitāṃ phaālotkṛṣṭāṃ tathaiva ca  NarP vāpīkūpataḍāgebhyo nāharedapi mṛttikām śaucaṃ kuryātprayatnena samādāya śubhāṃ mṛdam  NarP liṅge mṛdekā dātavyā tisro vā meḍhrayordvayoḥ etanmūtramutsarge śaucamāhūrmanīṣiṇaḥ  NarP ekā liṅge gude pañca daśa vāme tathobhayoḥ satpa tisraḥ pradātavyāḥ pādayormṛttikāḥ pṛthak  NarP etacchaucaṃ viḍutsarge gandhalepāpanuttaye etacchaucaṃ gṛhasthasya dviguṇaṃ brahmacāriṇām  NarP triguṇāṃ tu vanasthānāṃ yatīnāṃ taccarguṇam svasthāne pūrṇaśaucaṃ syātpathyarddhaṃ munisattama  NarP āture niyamo nāsti mahāpadi tathaiva ca gandhalepakṣayakaraṃ śaurcaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ  NarP strīṇāmanupanītānāṃ gandhalepakṣayāvadhi vratasthānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ yativacchaucamiṣyate  NarP vidhavānāṃ ca virpendra etadeva nigadyate evaṃ śaucaṃ tu nirvartya paścādvai susamāhitaḥ  NarP prāgāsya udagāsyo vāpyācāmetprayartendriyaḥ triścaturdhā pibedāpo gandhaphenādivarjitāḥ  NarP dvirmārjayetkapolaṃ ca talenoṣṭhau ca sattama tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayogena nāsārandhradvayaṃ spṛśet  NarP aguṃṣṭānāmikābhyāṃ ca cakṣuḥ śrotre yathākramam kaniṣṭāṅguṣṭayogena nābhideśe spṛśeddvijaḥ  NarP talenoraḥsthalaṃ caiva aṅgulyagraiḥ śiraḥ spṛśet talena cāṅgulāgrairvā spṛśedaṃsau vicakṣaṇaḥ  NarP evamācamya vipredra śuddhimānpotyanuttamām dantakāṣṭaṃ tataḥ khādetsatvacaṃ śastavṛkṣajam  NarP bilvāsanāpāmārgaṇāṃ nimbānmārkādiśākhinām prakṣālya vāriṇā caiva mantreṇāpyabhimantritam  NarP āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca brahma prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvanno dhehi vanaspate  NarP kaniṣṭāgrasamaṃ sthaulye vipraḥ khādeddaśāṅgulam navāṅgulaṃ kṣatriyaśca vaiśyaścāṣṭāṅgulonmitam  NarP śūdro vedāṅgulamitaṃ vanitā ca munīśvara alābhe daitakāṣṭānāṃ gaṇḍūṣairbhānusaṃmitaiḥ  NarP muthaśuddhirvidhīyeta tṛṇapatrasamanvitaiḥ kareṇādāya vāmena saṃcarvedvāmadaṃṣṭrayā  NarP dvijānsaṃgharṣya godohaṃ tataḥ prakṣālya pāṭayet jihvāmullikhya tābhyāṃ tu dalubhyāṃ niyatendriyaḥ  NarP prakṣālya prakṣipedū dūre bhūyaścācamya pūrvavat tataḥ snānaṃ prakurvīta nadyādau vimale jale  NarP taṭaṃ prakṣālya darbhāśca vinyasya praviśejjalam praṇamya tatra tīrthāni āvāhya ravimaṇḍalāt  NarP gandhādyairmaṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā dhyātvā devaṃ janārdanam snāyānmantrānsmaranpuṇyāṃstīrthāni ca viriñcija  NarP gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati narmade siṃdhukāveri jale sminsannidhiṃ kuru  NarP puṣkarādyāni tīrthāni gaṅgādyāḥ saritastathā āgacchantu mahābhāgāḥ snānakāle sadā mama  NarP ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśīṃ kāñcī hyavantikā purī dvārāvatī jñeyā satpaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ  NarP tato dhamarṣaṇa japtvā yatāsurvārisaṃplutaḥ snānāṅgaṃ tarpaṇaṃ kṛtvācamyārdhyaṃ bhānaverpayet  NarP tato dhyātvā vivasvantaṃ jalānnirgatya nārada paridhāyāhataṃ dhautaṃ dvitīyaṃ parivīya ca  NarP kuśāsane samāviśya saṃdhyākarma samārabhet īśānābhimukho vipra gāyatryācamya vai dvija  NarP ṛtamityabhimantryārtha punarevāmed budhaḥ tatastu vāriṇātmānaṃ veṣṭayitvā samukṣya ca  NarP saṃkalpya praṇavānte tu ṛṣicchandaḥ surānsmaran bhūrādibhirvyāhṛtibhiḥ satpabhiḥ prokṣya mastakam  NarP nyāsaṃ samācarenmantrī pṛthageva karāṅgayoḥ vinyasya hṛdaye tāraṃ bhūḥ śirasyatha vinyaset  NarP bhuvaḥ śikhāyāṃ svaścaiva kavaye bhūrbhuvo kṣiṣu bhūrbhuvaḥ svastathātrāstraṃ dikṣu tālatrayaṃ nyaset  NarP tata āvāhayetsaṃdhyāṃ prātaḥ kokanasthitām āgaccha varade devi tryakṣare brahmavādini  NarP gāyatri cchandasāṃ mātarbrahmayone namo stu te madhyāhne vṛṣabhāruḍhāṃ śuklāṃbarasamāvṛtām  NarP sāvitrīṃ rudrayoniṃ cāvāhayedrudravādinīm sāyaṃ tu garuḍāruḍhāṃ pītāṃbarasamāvṛttām  NarP sarasvatīṃ viṣṇuyonimāhvayedviṣṇuvādinīm tāraṃ ca vyāhṛtīḥ satpa tripadāṃ ca samuccaran  NarP śiraḥ śikhāṃ ca saṃpūrya kubhayitvā virecayet vāmamadhyātparairvāyuṃ krameṇa prāṇasaṃyame  NarP dvirācāmettataḥ paścātprātaḥ sūryaścameti ca āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne sāyamagniścameti ca  NarP āpo hiṣṭheti tisṛbhirmārjanaṃ ca tataścaret sumutriyā na ityuktvā nāsāspṛṣṭajalena ca  NarP dviṣadvargaṃ samutsārya drupadāṃ śirasi kṣipet ṛtaṃ ca satyametena kṛtvā caivādhamarṣaṇam  NarP antaścarasi mantreṇa sakṛdeva pibedapaḥ tataḥ sūryāya vidhivadgandhaṃ puṣpaṃ jalāñjalim  NarP kṣiptvopatiṣṭheddevarṣe bhāskaraṃ svastikāñjalim ūrddhūbāhuradhobāhuḥ kramātkalyādike trike  NarP uhutyaṃ citraṃ taccakṣurityetattritayaṃ japet saurāñchaivānvaiṣṇavāṃśca mantrānanyāṃśca nārada  NarP tejo si gāyatryasīti prārthayetsaviturmahaḥ tato ṅgāni trirāvartya dhyāyecchaktīstadātmikāḥ  NarP brahmaṇī caturānanākṣavalayā kumbhaṃ karaiḥ srukstravau bibhrāṇā tvaruṇendukāntivadanā ṛgrūpiṇī bālikā haṃsārohaṇakelikhaṇkhaṇmaṇerbibārcitā bhūṣitā gāyatrī paribhāvitā bhavatu naḥ saṃpatsamṛddhyai sadā  NarP rudrāṇī navayauvanā trinayanā vaiyāghnacarmāṃbarā khaṭvāṅgatraghiśikhākṣasūtravalayābhītiśriyai cāstu naḥ vidyuddāmajaṭākalāpavilasadvārledumaulirmudā sāvitrī vṛṣavāhanā sitatanurdhyeyā yajūrūpiṇī  NarP dhyeyā sā ca sarasvatī bhagavatī pītāṃbarālaṅkṛtā śyāmā śyāmatanurjaroparilasadgātrāñcitā vaiṣṇavī tārkṣyasthā maṇinūpurāṅgadalasadgraiveyabhūṣojjvalā hastālaṅkṛtaśaṅkhacakrasugadāpahmāśriyai cāstu naḥ  NarP evaṃ dhyātvā japettiṣṭhanprātarmadhyāhnake tathā sāyaṅkāle samāsīno bhaktyā tadgatamānasaḥ  NarP sahasraparamāṃ devīṃ śatamadhyāṃ daśāvarām tripadāṃ praṇavopetāṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svarupakramām  NarP ṣaṭtāraḥ saṃpuṭo vāpi vratinaśca yaterjapaḥ gṛhasthasya sattāraḥ syājjapya evaṃvidho mune  NarP tato japtvā yathāśakti savitre vinivedya ca gāyatryai ca savitre ca prakṣipedañjalidrūyam  NarP tato visṛjya tāṃ vipra uttare iti mantrataḥ brahmaṇeśena hariṇānujñātā gaccha sādaram  NarP dirabhyo digdevatābhyaśca namaskṛtya kṛtāñjaliḥ prātarādeḥ paraṃ karma kuryādapi vidhānataḥ  NarP prātarmadhyandine caiva gṛhasthaḥ snānamācaret vānaprasthaśca devarṣe snāyātrniṣavaṇaṃ yatiḥ  NarP āturāṇāṃ tu rogadyaiḥ pānthānāṃ ca sakṛnmatam brahmayajñaṃ tataḥ kuryāddarbhapāṇirmunīśvara  NarP divoditāni karmāṇi pramādādakṛtāni cet śarvaryāḥ prathame yāme tāni kuryādyathākramam  NarP nopāste yo dvijaḥ saṃdhyāṃ dhūrtabuddhiranāpadi pāṣaṇḍaḥ sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ  NarP yastu saṃdhyādikarmāṇi kūṭayuktiviśāradaḥ parityajati taṃ vidyānmahāpātakināṃ varam  NarP ye dvijā abhibhāṣante tyaktasaṃdhyādikarmaṇaḥ te yānti narakānghorānyāvaccandrārkatārakam  NarP devārcanaṃ tataḥ kuryādvaiśvadevaṃ yathāvidhi tatrātyamatithiṃ samyagannādyaiśca prapūjayet  NarP vaktavyā madhurā vāṇī teṣvapyabhyāgateṣu tu jalānnakandamūlairvā gṛhadānena cārcayet  NarP atithiryasya bhagnāśo gṛhatpratinivartite satasmaiduṣkṛtaṃ dattvā puṇyamādāya gacchati  NarP ajñātagotranāmānamanyagrāmādupāgatam vipaścito tithiṃ prāhurviṣṇuvattaṃ prapūjayet  NarP svagrāmavāsinaṃ tvekaṃ śrotriyaṃ viṣṇutatparam annādyaiḥ pratyahaṃ viprapitṝnuddiśya tarpayet  NarP pañcayajñaparityāgī brahmāhetyucyate budhaiḥ kuryādaharahastasmātpañcayajñānprayantataḥ  NarP devayajño bhūtayajñaḥ titṛyajñastathaiva ca nṛpajño brahmayajñaśca pañcayajñānpracakṣate  NarP bhṛtyamitrādisaṃyuktaḥ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ dvijānāṃ bhojyamaśrī yātpātraṃ naiva parityajet  NarP saṃsthāpya svāsame pādau vastrārddhaṃ paridhāya ca mukhena vamitaṃ bhuktvā surāpītyucyate budhaiḥ  NarP khāditārddhaṃ punaḥ khādenmodakāṃśca phalāni ca pratyakṣaṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva gomāṃsaśīti gadyate  NarP apośāne vācamane adyadravyeṣu ca dvijaḥ śabda na kārayedviprastaṃ kurvannārakī bhavet  NarP pathyamannaṃ prabhuñjīta vāgyato nnamasutsayanam amṛtopastaraṇamasi apośānaṃ bhujeḥ puraḥ  NarP amṛtāpidhānamasi bhojyānte paḥ sakṛtpibet prāṇādyā āhutīrdattvācamya bhojanamācaret  NarP tataścācamya viprendra śāstracintāparo bhavet rātrāvapi yathāśakti śayanāsanabhojanaiḥ  NarP evaṃ gṛhī sadācāraṃ kuryātpratidinaṃ mune yadācāraparityāgī prāyaścittī tadā bhavet  NarP dūṣitāṃ svatanuṃ dṛṣṭvā pālitādyaiśca sattama putreṣu bhāryāṃ niḥkṣipya vanaṃ gacchetsahaiva vā  NarP bhavetriṣavaṇasnāyī nakhaśmaśrujaṭādharaḥ adhaḥ śāyī brahmacārī pañcayajñaparāyaṇaḥ  NarP phalamūlāśano nityaṃ svādhyāyaniratāstathā dayāvānsarvabhūteṣu nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ  NarP varjaye dgrāmajātāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca aṣṭau grāsāṃśca bhuñjīta na kuryādrātribhojanam  NarP atyantaṃ varjayettailaṃ vānaprasthasamāśramī vyavāyaṃ varjayeccaiva nidrālasye tathaiva ca  NarP śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiṃ nityaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ smaret vānaprasthaḥ prakurvīta tapaścāndrāyaṇādikam  NarP saheta śītatāpādivahniṃ paricaretsadā yadā manasi vairāgyaṃ jātaṃ sarveṣu vastuṣu  NarP tadaiva saṃnyasedvipra patitastvanyathā bhavet vedāntābhyāsanirataḥ śānto dānto jitendriyaḥ  NarP nirdvedvo nirahṝṅkāro nirmamaḥ sarvadā bhavet śamādiguṇasaṃyuktaḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitaḥ  NarP nagno vā jīrṇakaupīnau bhavenmuṇḍo yatirdvijaḥ samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ  NarP ekarātraṃ vasedgrāme trirātraṃ nagare tathā bhaikṣeṇa varttayennityaṃ naikānnādībhavedyatiḥ  NarP aninditadvijagṛhe vyaṅgāre bhuktivarjite vivādarahite caiva bhikṣārthaṃ paryaṭedyatiḥ  NarP bhavetriṣavaṇasnāyī nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ japecca praṇavaṃ nityaṃ jitātmā vijitendriyaḥ  NarP ekānnādī bhavedyastu kadācillaṃpaṭo yatiḥ na tasya niṣkṛtirddaṣṭā prāyaścittāyutairapi  NarP lobhādyadi yatirvipra tanupoṣaparo bhavet sa caṇḍālasamo jñeyo varṇāśramavigarhitaḥ  NarP ātmānāṃ cintayeddrevaṃ nārāyaṇamanāmayam nirdvandraṃ nirmamaṃśāntaṃ māyātītamamatsaram  NarP avyayaṃ paripūrṇaṃ ca sadānandaikavigraham jñānasvarupamamalaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam  NarP avikāramanādyantaṃ jagaccaitanyakāraṇam nirguṇaṃ paramaṃ dhyāyedātmānaṃ parataḥ param  NarP paṭhedupaniṣadvākyaṃ vedāntārthāṃśca cintayet sahasraśīrṣaṃ devaṃ ca sadā dhyāyejjitendriyaḥ  NarP evaṃ dhyānaparo yastu yatirvigatamatsaraḥ sa yāti paramānandaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam  NarP ityevamāśramācārānyaḥ karoti dvijaḥ kramāt sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra gatvā na śocayati  NarP varṇāśramācāraratāḥ sarvapāpavivarjitāḥ nārāyaṇaparā yānti tadviṣṇaḥ paramaṃ padam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sadācāreṣu gṛhasthaāvānaprasthayatidharmnirupaṇaṃ nāma satpaviṃśo dhyāyaḥsanaka uvācaśṛṇuṣva muniśārdūla śrāddhasya vidhimuttamam yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP kṣayāhapūrvadivase snātvā caikāśano bhavet adhaḥ śāyī brahmacārī niśi viprānnimantrayet  NarP dantadhāvanatāṃbūle tailābhyaṅgaṃ tathaiva ca ratyoṣadhiparānnāni śrāddhakarttāvivarjayet  NarP adhvānaṃ kalahaṃ krodhaṃ vyavāyaṃ ca dhuraṃ tathā śrāddhakarttā ca bhoktā ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet  NarP śrāddhe nimantrito yastu vyavāyaṃ kurute yadi brahmahatyāmavānpoti narakaṃ cāpi gacchati  NarP śrāddhe niyojayedvipraṃ śrotriya viṣṇutatparam yathāsvācāranirataṃ praśāntaṃ satkulodbagavam  NarP rāgadveṣavihīnaṃ ca purāṇārthaviśāradam trimadhutrisuparṇajñaṃ sarvabhūtadayāparam  NarP devapūjārataṃ caiva smṛtitattvaviśāradam vedāntatattvasaṃpannaṃ sarvalokahite ratam  NarP kṛtajñaṃ guṇasaṃpannaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratam paropadeśanirataṃ sacchāstrakathanaistathā  NarP ete niyojitavyā vai śrāddhe viprā munīśvara śrāddhe varjyānmavakṣyāmi śṛṇu tānmusamāhitaḥ  NarP npūnāṅgaścādhikāṅgaśca kadaryo rogitastathā kuṣṭī ca kunakhī caiva laṃbakarṇaḥ kṣatavrataḥ  NarP nakṣatrapāṭhajīvī ca tathā ca śavadāhakaḥ kuvādī parirvattā ca tathā devalakaḥ khalaḥ  NarP nindako marṣaṇo dhūrtastathaiva grāmayājakaḥ asacchāstrābhinirataḥ parānnanigatastathā  NarP vṛṣalīsūti poṣṭā ca vṛṣalīpatireva ca kuṇḍaśca golakaścaiva hyayājyānāṃ ca yājakaḥ  NarP daṃbhācāro vṛthāmuṇḍī hyanyastrīdhanatatparaḥ viṣṇubhaktivihīnaśca śivabhaktiparāḍmukhaḥ  NarP vedavikrayiṇaścaiva vratavikrayiṇastathā smṛtivikrayiṇaścaiva mantravikrayiṇastathā  NarP gāyakāḥ kāvyakarttāro bhiṣakchāstropajīvinaḥ vedanindāparaścaiva grāmāpaṇyapradāhakaḥ  NarP tathātikāmukaścaiva rasavikrayakārakaḥ kūṭayuktirataścaiva śrāddhe varjyāḥ prayatnataḥ  NarP niṃmatrayīta pūrvedyustasminneva dine thavā nimantrito bhavedvipro brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ  NarP śrāddhe kṣaṇastu karttavyaḥ prasādaśceti sattama nimantrayeddvijaṃ prājñaṃ darbhapāṇirjitendriyaḥ  NarP tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpya ca śrāddhaṃ samācaredvidvānkāle kutapasaṃjñite  NarP divasasyāṣṭame kāle yadā mandāyate raviḥ sa kālaḥ kutapastatra pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam  NarP aparāhnaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tu dattaḥ kālaḥ svayaṃbhuvā tatkāla eva dātavyaṃ kavyaṃ tasmāddvijottamaiḥ  NarP yatkāvyaṃ dīyate dvavyairakāle munisattama rākṣasaṃ taddhi vijñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ nopatiṣṭati  NarP kāvyaṃ prattaṃ tu sāyāhne rākṣasaṃ tadbhavedapi dātā narakamānpoti bhoktā ca narakaṃ vrajet  NarP kṣayāhasya tithairvipra yadi daṇḍamitirbhavet viddhāparāhni kāyāṃ tu śrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ vijānatā  NarP kṣayāhasya tithiryā tu hyaparāhnadvaye yadi pūrvā kṣaye tu karttavyā vṛdvau kāryā tathottarā  NarP muhūrtta dvitaye pūrvadine syādapare hani tithiḥ sāyāhnagā yatra parā kāvyasya viśrutā  NarP kiñcitpūrvadine prāhurmuhūrttadvitaye sati naitanmataṃ hi sarveṣāṃ kāvyadāne munīśvara  NarP nimantriteṣau vipreṣu militeṣu dvijottama prāyaścittaviśuddhātmā tebhyo nujñāṃ samāharet  NarP śrāddhārthaṃ samanujñāto viprānbhūyo nimantrayet uubhau ca viśvedevārthaṃ pighatrarthaṃ trīnyathāvidhi  NarP devatārthaṃ ca pitrarthamekaikaṃ vā nimantrayet śrāddhārthaṃ samanujñātaḥ kārayenmaṇḍaladvayam  NarP caturastraṃ brāhmaṇasya trikoṇaṃ kṣatriyasya vai vaiśyasya vartulaṃ jñeyaṃ śūdrasyābhyābhyukṣaṇaṃ bhavet  NarP brāhmaṇānāmabhāve tu bhrātaraṃ putrameva ca ātmānaṃ vā niyuñjīta na vipraṃ vedavarjitam  NarP prakṣālya viprapādāṃśaaca hyācāṃnānupaveśya ca yathāvadarcanaṃ kuryātsmarannārāyaṇaṃ prabhum  NarP brāhmaṇānāṃ tu madhye ca dvāradeśe tathaiva ca apahatā ityṛcā vai karttā tu vikirettilān  NarP yavairdarbhaghaiśca viśveṣāṃ devānāmidamāsanam dattveti bhūyo dadyacca daive kṣaṇapratīkṣaṇam  NarP akṣayyāsanayoḥ ṣaṣṭī dvitīyāvāhane smṛtā annadāne caturthī syāccheṣāḥ saṃpuddhayaḥ smṛtāḥ  NarP āsādya pātradvitayaṃ darbhaśākhāsamanvitam tatpātre secayettoyaṃ śannodevītyṛcā tataḥ  NarP yavosīti ti yavān kṣitpvā gandhapuṣpe ca vāgyataḥ āvāhayettato devānviśve devāḥsa ityṛcā  NarP yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ samāhitaḥ gandhaiśca patrapuṣpaiśca dhūpairdīpairyajettataḥ  NarP devaiśca samanujñāto yajetpitṛgaṇāṃstathā tilasaṃyuktadarbhaiśca dadyātteṣāṃ sadāsanam  NarP pātrāṇyāsādayettrīṇi hyarghātha pūrvavaddvijaḥ śannodevyā jalaṃ kṣiptvā tilosīti tilānkṣaghipet  NarP uśanta ityṛcāvāhya pitṝnvipraḥ samāhitaḥ yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ ca pūrvavat  NarP gandhaiśca patrapuṣpaiśca dhūpairdīpaiśaaca sattama vāsorbhibhūṣaṇaiśvaiva yathāvibhavamarcayet  NarP tato nnāgraṃ samādāya ghṛtayuktaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ agnau kariṣya ityuktvā tebhyo nujñāṃ samāharet  NarP karavai karavāṇīti cāpṛṣṭā brāhmaṇā mune kuruṣva kriyatāṃ veti kurviti brūyureva ca  NarP upāsanāgnimādhāya svagṛhyoktavidhānataḥ sāmāya ca pitṛmate svadhā nama itīrayet  NarP agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama itīha vā svāhāntenāpi vā prājño juhuyātpitṛyajñavat  NarP ābhyāmevāhutibhyāṃ tu pitṝṇāṃ tṛtpirakṣayā agnyabhāve tu viprasya pāṇau homo vidhīyate  NarP yathācāraṃ prakurvīta pāṇāvagnau ca vā dvija nahyagnirdūragaḥ kāryaḥ pārvaṇe samupasthaite  NarP saṃdhāyāgniṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ kṛtvā taṃ visṛjetkṛtī yadyāgnirdūrago vipra pārvaṇe samupasthite  NarP bhrātṛbhiḥ kārayecchrāddhaṃ sāgnikairvidhivaddvijaiḥ kṣayāhe caiva saṃprātpe svasyāgnirdūrago yadi  NarP tathaiva bhrātarastatra laukikāgnāvapi sthitāḥ upāsanāngau dūrasthe samīpebhrātari sthaite  NarP yadyagnau juhuyādvāpi pāṇau vā sa hi pātakī upāsanāgnā dūrasthe kecidicchanti vai dvijāḥ  NarP tacchaṣa viprapātreṣu vikiretsaṃsmaranharim bhakṣyairbhojyaiśaaca lehyaiśca svādyairviprānprapūjayat  NarP annatyāgaṃ tataḥ kuryyādubhayatra samāhitaḥ āgacchantu mahābhāgāviśvedevā mahābalāḥ  NarP ye yatra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānāṃ bhavantu te iti saṃprārthayeddevānye devāsa ṛcā nu vai  NarP tathāsaṃprārthayadviprānye ca heti ṛcā pitṝn amūrtānāṃ mūrtānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ dītpatejasām  NarP namasyāmi sadā teṣāṃ dhvānināṃ yogacajakṣuṣām evaṃ pitṝnnamaskṛtya nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ  NarP dattaṃ haviśca tatkarṇa viṣṇave vinivedayet tataste brāhmaṇāḥ sarve bhuñjīranvāgyatā dvijāḥ  NarP hasato vadate ko pi rākṣaghasaṃ tadbhaveddhaviḥ yathaācāra pradeyaṃ ca madhunāṃsādikaṃ tathā  NarP pākādiṃ ca praśaṃseran vāgyatā dhṛtabhaghājanāḥ yadi pātraṃ tyajetko pi brāhmaṇaḥ śrāddhayojitaḥ  NarP śrāddhahṝntā sa vijñeyo narakāyopapadyate bhañjāneṣu ca vipreṣu hyanyonyaṃ saṃspuśedyadi  NarP tadannamatyajanbhuktvā gāyatryaṣṭaśataṃ japet bhujyamāneṣu vipreṣu karttā śraddhāparāyaṇaḥ  NarP smarennārāyaṇaṃ devamanantamaparājitam rakṣoghnānvaiṣṇavāṃścaiva paitṛkāṃścaviśeṣataḥ  NarP japecca pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ nāciketatrayaṃ tathā trimadhu trisuparṇaṃ ca pāvamānaṃ yajūṃṣi ca  NarP sāmānyapitathoktāni vadetpuṇyapradāṃ stathā itihāsapurāṇāni dharmaśāstrāṇi caiva hi  NarP bhuñjīranbrahmaṇā yāvattāvadetāñjapeddvija brāhmaṇeṣu ca bhukteṣu vikiraṃ vikṣipettathā  NarP śeṣamannaṃ vadeccaiva madhusūktaṃ ca vai japet svayaṃ ca pādau prakṣaghālya samyagācamya nārada  NarP ācānteṣu ca vipreṣu piṇḍaṃ nirvāpayettataḥ svastivā canakaṃ kuryādakṣayyodakameva ca  NarP dattvā samāhitaḥ kuryāttathā viprābhivādanam acālayitvā pātraṃ tu svasti kurvanti ye dvijāḥ  NarP vatsaraṃ pitarasteṣāṃ bhavantyucchiṣṭabhojinaḥ dātāro no bhivarddhantāmityādyaiḥ smṛtibhāṣitaiḥ  NarP āśīrvaco labhettebhyo namaskāraṃ carettataḥ dadyācca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā tāṃbūlaṃ gandhasaṃyutam  NarP nyubjapātramathānīya svadhākāramudīrayet vājevāje iti ṛcā pitṝndevānvisarjayet  NarP bhoktā ca śrāddhakṛttasyāṃ rajanyāṃ maithunaṃ tyajet tathā svādhyāyamadhvānaṃ prayatnena parityajet  NarP adhvagaścāturaścaiva vihīnaśca dhanaistathā āmaśrāddhaṃ prakurvīta hemnā vāstṛśyabhāryakaḥ  NarP dravyābhāve dvijābhāve hyannamātraṃ ca pācayet paitṛkena tu sūktena homaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ  NarP atyanta havyaśūnyaścaitsvaśaktyā tu tṛṇaṃ gavām snātvā ca vidhivadvipra kuryādvā tilataparṇam  NarP athavā rodanaṃ kuryādatyuccairvijane vane daridro haṃ mahāpāpī vadanniti vicakṣaṇaḥ  NarP paredyuḥ śrāddhakṛnmartyo yo na tarpayate pitṝn tatkulaṃ nāśamāyāti brahmahatyāṃ ca vindati  NarP śrāddhaṃ kurvanti ye martyāḥ śraddhāvanto munīśvara na teṣāṃ saṃtaticchedaḥ saṃpannāste bhavanti ca  NarP pitṝnyañjati yeṃ śrāddhe taistu viṣṇuḥ prapūjitaḥ tasmiṃstuṣṭe jagannāthe sarvāstuṣyanti devatāḥ  NarP pitaro devatāścaiva gandharvāpsarasastathā yakṣāśca siddhā manujā harireva sanātanaḥ  NarP yenedamakhilaṃ jātaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam tasmāddātā ca bhoktā ca sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ  NarP yadasti vipra yannāsti dṛśyaṃ cādṛśyameva ca sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jñeyaṃ tasmādanyanna vidyate  NarP ādhārabhūto viśvasya sarvabhūtātmako vyayaḥ anaupamyasvabhāvaśca bhagavānhavyakavyabhuk  NarP parabrahmābhidheyo ya eka eva janārdanaḥ karttā kārayitā caiva sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ  NarP ityevaṃ te muniśreṣṭha śrāddhāsya vidhiruttamaḥ kathitaḥ kurvatāmevaṃ pāpaṃ sadyo vilīyate  NarP ya idaṃ paṭhate bhaktyā śrāddhakāle dvijottamaḥ pitarastasya tuṣyanti saṃtatiścaiva varddhate  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde śrāddhakriyāvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo dhyāyaḥsanaka uvācatithīnāṃ nirṇayaṃ vakṣye prācaścittavidhiṃ tathā śṛṇuṣva tanmuniśreṣṭha karmasiddhiryato bhavet  NarP śrautaṃ smārttaṃ vrataṃ dānaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam anirṇītāsu tithiṣu na kiñcitphalati dvija  NarP ekādaśyaṣṭamī ṣaṣṭī paurṇamāsī caturddaśī amāvāsyā tṛtīyā ca hyupavāsavratādiṣu  NarP paraviddhāḥ praśastāḥ syurna grāhyāḥ pūrvasaṃyutāḥ nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭī śivaviddhā tu satpamī  NarP daśamyekādaśīviddhā nopoṣyāḥ syuḥ kadācana darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsīṃ ca satpamīṃ pitṛvāsaram  NarP pūrvaviddhaṃ prakurvāṇo narakāyopadyate kṛṣṇapakṣe pūrvaviddhāṃ satpamīṃ ca caturdaśīm  NarP praśastāṃ kecidāhuśca tṛtīyāṃ navamīṃ tathā vratādīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śuklapakṣo viśiṣyate  NarP aparāhnācca pūrvohṇaṃ grāhyaṃ śreṣṭhattaraṃ yataḥ asaṃbhave vratādīnāṃ yadi paurvāhnikī tithiḥ  NarP muhūrtadvitayaṃ grāhyaṃ bhagavatyudite ravau pradoṣavyāpinī grāhyā tithirnaktavrate sadā  NarP upoṣitavyaṃ nakṣatraṃ yenāstaṃ yāti bhāskaraḥ tithinakṣatrasaṃyogavihitavratakarmaṇi  NarP pradoṣavyāpinī grāhyā tvanyathā niṣphalaṃ bhavet arddharātrādadho yā tu nakṣatravyāpinī tithiḥ  NarP saiva grāhyā muniśreṣṭha nakṣatravihitavrate yadyarddharātraghagayorvyātpaṃ nakṣatraṃ tu dinadvaye  NarP tatpuṇyaṃ tithisaṃyuktaṃ nakṣatraṃ grāhyamucyate arddharātradvaye syātāṃ nakṣatraṃ ca tithiryadi  NarP kṣaye pūrvā praśastā syādrṛddhau kāryā tathottarā ardhdarātradvayavyātpā tithirnakṣatraghasaṃyutā  NarP hnāsavṛddhiviśūnyā cet grāhyāpūrvā tathā parā jyeṣṭhāsaṃmiśritaṃ mūlaṃ rohiṇī vahniṃsaṃyutā  NarP maitreṇa saṃyutā jyeṣṭā saṃtānādivināśainī tataḥ syustithayaḥ puṇyāḥ karmānuṣṭānato divā  NarP rātrivrateṣu sarveṣu rātriyogo viśiṣyate tithirnakṣaghatrayogena yā puṇyā parikīrtitā  NarP tasyāṃ tu tadvataṃ kāryaṃ saiva kāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ udayavyāpinī grāhyā śravaṇadvādaśī vrate  NarP sūryendugrahaṇe yāvattāvad grāhyā japādiṣu saṃkrāntiṣu tu sarvāsu puṇyakālonigadyate  NarP snānadānajapādīnāṃ kurvatāmakṣaya phalam tatra karkaṭako jñeyo dakṣiṇāyanasaṃkramaḥ  NarP pūrvato ghaṭikāstriṃśatpuṇyakālaṃ vidurbudhāḥ vṛṣabhe vṛścike caiva siṃhe kumbhe tathaiva ca  NarP pūrvamaṣṭamuhūrtāstu grāhyāḥ snānajapādiṣu tulāyāṃ caiva meṣe ca pūrvataḥ paratastathā  NarP jñeyā daśaiva ghaṭikā dattasyākṣayatāvahāḥ kanyāyāṃ mithune caiva mīne dhanuṣi ca dvija  NarP ghaṭikāḥ ṣoḍaśa jñeyā parataḥ puṇyadāyikāḥ mākaraṃ saṃkramaṃ prāhuruttarāyaṇasaṃjñakam  NarP parāstriṃśaśca ghaṭikāścatvāriṃśacca pūrvavat ādityaśītakiraṇau grāhyāvastaṅgatau yadi  NarP snātvā bhuñjīta viprendra paredyuḥ śuddhamaṇḍalam dṛṣṭacandrā sinīvālī naṣṭacandrā kuhūḥ smṛtā  NarP amāvāsyā dvidhā proktā vidvadbhirdharmālipsubhiḥ sinīvālīṃ dvijairgrāhyā sāgnikaiḥ śrāddhakarmaṇi  NarP kahūḥ strībhistathā śūdraipari vānagrikaistathā aparāhnadvayavyāpinyamāvāsyātithiryadi  NarP kṣaye pūrvā tu karttavyā vṛddhau kāryā tathottarā amāvāsyā pratītā cenmadhyāhnātparato yadi  NarP bhūtaviddheti vikhyātāsradbhiḥ śāstraviśāradaiḥ atyantakṣayapakṣe tu paredyurnāparāhnagā  NarP tatra grāhyā sinīvālī sāyāhnavyāpinī tithiḥ arvācīnakṣaye cacaiva sāyāhnavyāpinī tathā  NarP sinīvālī parā grāhyā sarvathā śrāddhakarmaṇi atyantatithivṛddhau tu bhūtaviddhāṃ parityajet  NarP grāhyā syādaparāhnasthā kuhūḥ paitṛkakarmaṇi yathārvācīnavṛddhau tu saṃtyājyā bhūtasaṃyutāḥ  NarP paredyurvibudhaśreṣṭhaiḥ kuhūrgrāhyā parāhnagā madhyāhnadvitaye vyātpā hyamāvāsyā tithiryadi  NarP tatrecchayā ca saṃgrāhyā pūrvā vātha parāthavā anvādhānaṃ pravakṣyāmi saṃtaḥ saṃpūrṇavarvaṇi  NarP pratipaddivase kuryādyāgaṃ ca munisattama parvaṇo yaścaturthāṃśa ādyāḥ pratipadastrayaḥ  NarP yāgakālaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ prātarukto manīṣibhiḥ madhyāhnadvitaye syātāmamāvāsyā ca pūrṇimā  NarP paredyureva viprendra sadyaḥ kālo vidhīyate  NarP pūrvadvaye paredyuḥ syātsaṃgavātparato manīṣibhiḥ sadyaḥ kālaḥ paredyuḥ syājjñeyamevaṃ tithikṣaye  NarP sarvairekādaśī grāhyā daśamīparivarjitā daśamīsaṃyutā hṝntipuṇyaṃ janmatrayārjitam  NarP ekādaśī kalāmātrā dvādaśyāṃ tu pratīyate dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti cetsā parā smṛtā  NarP saṃpūrṇaikādaśī śuddhā dvādaśyāṃ ca pratīyate traghayodaśī ca rātryante tatra vakṣyāmi nirṇayam  NarP pūrvā gṛhasthaiḥ sā kāryyā hyuttarā yatibhistathā gṛhasthāḥ siddhimicchanti yato mokṣaṃ yatīśvarāḥ  NarP dvādaśyāṃ tu kalāyāṃ vā yadi labhyeta pāraṇā tadānīṃ daśamīviddhāpyupoṣyaikādaśī tithiḥ  NarP śulke vā yadi vā kṛṣṇe bhavedekādaśīdvayam gṛhasthānāṃ tu pūrvoktā yatīnāmuttarā smṛtā  NarP dvādaśyāṃ vidyate kiñciddaśamīsaṃyutā yadi dinakṣaye dvitīyaiva sarveṣāṃ parikīrtitāṃ  NarP viddhāpyekādaśī grāhyā parato dvādaśī na cet aviddhāpi niṣiddhaiva parato dvādaśī yadi  NarP ekādaśī dvādaśī ca rātraghiśeṣe trayodaśī dvādaśadvādaśīpuṇyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṇe  NarP ekādaśī kalāmātrā vidyate dvādaśīdine dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāṃ nāsti vā vidyate thavā  NarP vidvāpyekādaśī tatra pūrvā syādgṛhaṇāṃ tadā yadibhiścottarā grāhyā hyavīrābhistathaiva ca  NarP saṃpūrṇaikādaśī śuddhā dvādaśyāṃ nāsti kiñcana dvādaśī ca trayodaśayāmasti tatra kathaṃ bhavet  NarP pūrvā gṛhasthaiḥ kāryātra yatibhiścottarā tithiḥ upoṣyaiva dvitīyeti kecidāhuśca bhaktitaḥ  NarP ekādaśī yadāviddhā dvādaśyāṃ na pratīyate dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti tatraiva cāpare  NarP upoṣyā dvādaśī śuddhā sarvaireva na saṃśayaḥ kecidāhuśca pūrvāṃ tu tanmataṃ na samañjasam  NarP saṃkrātau ravivāre ca pātagrahaṇayostathā pāraṇaṃ copavāsaṃ ca na kuryātputravāngṛhī  NarP arke hni parvarātraghau ca caturdaśyaṣṭamī divā ekādaśyāmahorātraṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret  NarP ādityagrahaṇe prātpe pūrvayāmatraye tathā nādyādvai yadi bhuñjīta surāpena samo bhavet  NarP anvādhāneṣṭimadhye tu grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ prāyaścittaṃ muniśreṣṭha karttavyaṃ tatra yājñikaiḥ  NarP cadroparāge juhuyāddaśame soma ityṛcā āpyāyasva ṛcā caiva somapāsta iti dvija  NarP sūryoparāge juhuyādudutyaṃ jātavedasam āsatyeṃnodvayaṃ caiva trayomantrā udāhṛtāḥ  NarP evaṃ tithiṃ viniścitya smṛtimārgeṇa paṇḍitaḥ yaḥ karoti vratādīni tasya syādakṣayaṃ phalam  NarP vedapraṇihito dharmo dharmaistuṣyati keśavaḥ tasmāddharmaparā yānti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam  NarP dharmānye karttumicchanti te vai kṛṣṇasvarupiṇaḥ tasmāttāṃstu bhavavyādhiḥ kadācinnaiva bādhate  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde tithyādinirṇayo nāma ekonatriṃśo dhyāyaḥsanaka uvācaprāyaścittavidhiṃ vakṣye śṛṇu nārada sāṃpratam prāyaścittaviśuddhātmā sarvakarmaphalaṃ labhet  NarP prāyaścittavihīnaistu yatkarma kriyate mune tatsarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ proktaṃ rākṣasaiḥ parisevitam  NarP kāmakrodhavihīnaiśca dharmaśāstraviśāradaiḥ praṣṭavyā brāhmaṇā dharmaṃ sarvadharmaphalecchubhiḥ  NarP prāyaścittāni cīrṇāni nārāyaṇaparāṅmukhaiḥ na niṣpunanti viprendra surābhāṇḍamivāpagāḥ  NarP brahmahā ca surāpī ca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ mahāpātakinanastvete tatsaṃsargī ca pañcamaḥ  NarP yastu saṃvatsaraṃ hyataiḥ śayanāsanabhojanaiḥ saṃvasetsaha taṃ vidyātpatitaṃ sarvakarmasu  NarP ajñānādvāhmaṇaṃ hatvā cīravāsā jaṭī bhavet svenaiva hataviprasya kapālamapi dhārayet  NarP tadabhāve muniśraṣṭa kapālaṃ vānyameva vā taddravyaṃ dhvajadaṇḍe tu dhṛtvā vanacaro bhavet  NarP vanyāhāro vasetatra vāramekaṃ mitāśanaḥ samyaksaṃdhyāmupāsīta trikālaṃ snānamācaret  NarP adhyayanādhyāpanādūnvarjayetsaṃsmareddharim brahmacārī bhavennityaṃ gandhamālyādi varjayet  NarP tīrthānyanuvaseccaiva puṇyāścāvāśramāṃstathā yadi vanyairna jīveta grāme bhikṣāṃ samācaret  NarP dvādaśābdaṃ vrataṃ kuryādevaṃ hariparāyaṇaḥ brahmahā śuddhimānpoti karmārhaścaiva jāyate  NarP vratamadhye mṛgairvāpi rogairvāpi niṣūditaḥ gonimittaṃ dvijārthaṃ vā prāṇānvāpi parityajet  NarP yadvā dadyāddvijendrāṇāṃ gavāmayutamuttasam eteṣvanyatamaṃ kṛtvā brahmahā śuddhimānpuyāt  NarP dīkṣitaṃ kṣatriyaṃ hatvā careddhi brahmahavratam agnipraveśanaṃ vāpi marutprapatanaṃ tathā  NarP dīkṣītaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ hatvā dviguṇaṃ vratamācaret ācāryādivadhe caiva vratamuktaṃ caturguṇam  NarP hatvā tu vipramātraṃ ca caretsaṃvatsaraṃ vratam evaṃ viprasya gaditaḥ prāyaścittavidhirdvija  NarP dviguṇaṃ kṣatriyasyoktaṃ triguṇaṃ tu viśaḥ smṛtam brāhmaṇaṃ hṝnti yaḥ śūdrastaṃ muśalyaṃ virdurbudhāḥ  NarP rājñaiva śikṣā kartavyā iti śāsteṣu niścayaḥ brāhmaṇīnāṃ vadhe tvarddhaṃ pādaḥ syātkanyakāvadhe  NarP hatvā tvanupanītāṃśca tathā pādavrataṃ caret hatvā tu kṣatriyaṃ vipraḥ ṣaḍabdaṃ kucchramācaret  NarP saṃvatsaraṃ trayaṃ veśyaṃ śūrdraṃ hatvā tu vatsaram dīkṣitasya striyaṃ hatvā brāhmaṇī cāṣṭavatsarān  NarP brahmahatyāvrataṃ kṛtvā śuddho bhavati niścitam prāvaścittaṃ vidhānaṃ tu sarvatra munisattama  NarP vṛddhāturastrībālānāmarddhamuktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā  NarP cāturvarṇyārapeyā syāttathā strībhiśca nārada kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ vā gomūtrameteṣvanyatamaṃ mune  NarP snātvardravāsā niyato nārāyaṇamanusmaran pakvāyasanibhaṃ kṛtvā pibejcaivodakaṃ tataḥ  NarP tattu lauhena pātreṇa hyāyasenāthavā pibet tāmreṇa vāthaṃ pātreṇa tatpītvā maraṇaṃ vrajet  NarP surāpī śuddhimānpoti nānyathā śuddhiriṣyate ajñānādātmabuddyā tu surāṃ pītvā dvijaścaret  NarP brahmahatyāvrataṃ samyaktaccihnaparivarjitaḥ yadi rogānivṛttyarthamauṣadhārthaṃ surāṃ pibet  NarP tasyopanayanaṃ bhūyastathā cāndrāyaṇadvayam surāsaṃspṛṣṭapātraṃ tu surābhāṇḍodakaṃ tathā  NarP surāpānasamaṃ prāhustathā candrasya bhakṣaṇam tālaṃ ca pānasaṃ caiva drākṣaṃ khārjūrasaṃbhavam  NarP mādhuka śailamāriṣṭaṃ maireyaṃ nālikerajam gauḍī mādhvī surā madyamevamekādaśa smṛtāḥ  NarP eteṣvanyatamaṃ vipro na pibedvai kadācana eteṣvanyatamaṃ yastu pivedajñānato dvijaḥ  NarP tasyopanayanaṃ bhūyastatpakṛcchraṃ carettathā samakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā balāccauyaṇa vā tathā  NarP parasvānāmupādānaṃ steyamityucyate budhaiḥ suvarṇasya pramāṇaṃ tu manvādyaiḥ paribhāṣitam  NarP vakṣye śṛṇuṣva viprendra prāyaścajitoktisādhanam gavākṣāgatamārtaṇḍaraśmimadhye pradṛśyate  NarP trasareṇupramāṇaṃ tu raja ityucyate budhaiḥ trasareṇvaṣṭakaṃ niṣkastatrayaṃ rājasarṣapaḥ  NarP maurasarṣapastartrayaṃ syāttatṣaṭkaṃ yava ucyate yavatrayaṃ kṛṣṇalaḥ syānmāṣastatpañcakaṃ smṛtaḥ  NarP māṣaṣoḍaṣamānaṃ syātsuvarṇamiti nārada hatvā brahmasvamajñānāddvādaśāṃbdaṃ tu pūrvavat  NarP kapāladhvajahīnaṃ tu brahmahatyāvrataṃ caret guruṇāṃ yajñakatṝṇāṃ dhārmiṣṭānāṃ tathaiva ca  NarP śrotriyāṇāṃ dvijānāṃ tu hṛtvā hemaivamācaret kṛtānutāpo dehe ca saṃpūrṇe lepayed dhṛtam  NarP karīṣacchādito dagdhaḥ steyapāpādvimucyate brahmasvaṃ kṣatriyo hṛtvā paścāttāpamavāpya ca  NarP punardadāti tatraiva tadvidhānaṃ śṛṇuṣva me tatra sāṃtapanaṃ kṛtvā dvādaśāhopavāsataḥ  NarP śuddhimāpnoti devarṣe hyanyathā patito bhavet rantāsanamanuṣyastrīdhenubhūmyādikeṣu ca  NarP suvarṇasahṛśeṣveṣu prāyaścitārddhamucyate trasareṇusamaṃ hema hṛtvā kuryātsamāhitaḥ  NarP prāṇāyāmadvayaṃ samyak tena śuddhaccati mānavaḥ prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kuryāddhṛtvā niṣkapramāṇakam  NarP prāṇāyāmāśca catvāro rājasarṣa pamātrake gaurasarṣapamānaṃ tu hṛtvā hema vicakṣaṇaḥ  NarP snātvā ca vidhivajjapyādgāyatryaṣṭasahasrakam yavamātrasuvarṇasya steyācchuddho bhaveddijaḥ  NarP āsāyaṃ prātarārabhya japtvā vai vedamātaram hema kṛṣṇalamātraṃ tu hṛtvā sāṃtapanaṃ caret  NarP māṣapramāṇe hemnastu prāyaścittaṃ nigadyate gomūtrapakvayavabhugvarṣeṇaikena śuddhyati  NarP saṃpūrṇasya suvarṇasya steyaṃ kṛtvā munīśvara brahmahatyāvrataṃ kuryāddvādaśābdaṃ samāhitaḥ  NarP suvarṇamānānnyūne tu rajatasteyakarmaṇi kuryātsāṃtapanaṃ samyaganyathā patito bhavet  NarP daśaniṣkāntaparyantamūrddhūṃ niṣkacatuṣṭayāt hatvā ca rajataṃ vidvānkuryāccāndrāyaṇaṃ mune  NarP daśādiśatiṣkāntaṃ yaḥ steyī rajatasya tu cāndrāyaṇadvayaṃ tasya proktaṃ pāpaviśodhakam  NarP śatādūrddhūṃ sahasrāntaṃ proktaṃ cāndrāyaṇatrayam sahasrādadhikasteye brahmahatyāvrataṃ caret  NarP kāṃsyapittalamukhyeṣu hyayaskānte tathaiva ca sahasraniṣkamāne tu parākaṃ parikīrtitam  NarP prāyaścittaṃ tu rantānāṃ steye rājatavatsmṛtam gurutalpagatānāṃ ca prāyaścittamudīryate  NarP ajñānānmātaraṃ gatvā tatsapatnīmathāpi vā svayameva svamuṣkaṃ tu cchindyātpāpamudīrayan  NarP haste gṛhītvā muṣkaṃ tu gacchandvai naiṛtīṃ diśam gacchanmārgai sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācidvicārayet  NarP apaśyangacchato gacchetpāṇāntaṃ yaḥ sa śuddhyati marutprapatanaṃ vāpi kuryātpāpamudāharan  NarP svavarṇottamavarṇastrīgamane tvavicārataḥ brāhmahatyāvrataṃ kuryādvādaśābdaṃ samāhitaḥ  NarP amatyābhyāsato gacchetsavarṇāṃ cottamāṃ tathā kārīṣavahninā dagdhaḥ śuddhiṃ yāti dvijottama  NarP retaḥsekātpūrvameva nivṛtto yadi mātari brahmahatyāvrataṃ kuryādretaḥ seke gnidāhanam  NarP savarṇottamavarṇāsu nivṛtto vīryasecanāt brahmahatyāvrataṃ kuryānnavābdānviṣṇutatparaḥ  NarP vaiśyāyāṃ pitṛpatnyāṃ tu ṣaḍabdaṃ vratamācaret gatvā śūdvāṃ gurorbhāryāṃ trivarṣaṃ vratamācaret  NarP mātṛṣvasāraṃ ca pitṛṣvasāramācāryabhāryāṃ śvaśurasya patnīm pitṛvyabhāryāmatha mātulānīṃ putrīṃ ca gacchedyadi kāmamugdhaḥ  NarP dinadvaye brahmahatyāvrataṃ kuryādyathāvidhi ekasminneva divase bahuvāraṃ trivārṣikam  NarP ekavāraṃ gate hyabdaṃvrataṃ kṛtvā viśuddhyati dinatraye gate vahnidagdhaḥ śudhyeta nānyathā  NarP cāñjālīṃ puṣkasīṃ caiva snuṣāṃ ca bhaginīṃ tathā mitrastriyaṃ śiṣyapatnīṃ yastu vai kāmato vrajet  NarP brahmahatyāvrataṃ kuryātsa ṣaḍabdaṃ munīśvara akāmato vrajedyastu so bdakṛcchraṃ samācaret  NarP mahāpātakisaṃsarge prāyaścittaṃ nigadyate prāyaścittaviśuddhātmā sarvakarmaphalaṃ labhet  NarP yasya yena bhavetsaṃgo brahmahāndicaturṣvapi tattadvrataṃ sa nivrartya śuddhimānpotyasaṃśayam  NarP ajñānātpañcarātraṃ tu saṃgamebhiḥ karotiyaḥ kāyakṛcchraṃ caretsamyaganyathā patito bhavet  NarP dvādaśāhetu saṃsarge mahāsāṃtapanaṃ smṛtam saṃgaṅkṛtvārddhamāsaṃ tu dvādaśāhamupāvaset  NarP parāko māsasaṃsarge cāndramāsatrayesmṛtam kṛtvā saṃgaṃ tu ṣaṇmāsaṃ careccāndrāyaṇadvayam  NarP kiñcinnyūnābdasaṃge tu ṣaṇmāsavratamācaret etacca triguṇaṃ proktaṃ jñānātsaṃge yathākramam  NarP maṇḍūkaṃ nakulaṃ kākaṃ varāhaṃ mūṣakaṃ tathā mārjārājāvikaṃ śvānaṃ hatvā kukkuṭakaṃ tathā  NarP kṛcchrārddhamācaredvipro tikṛcchraṃ cāśvaha caret jatpakṛcchraṃ karivadhe parākaṃ govadhe smṛtam  NarP kāmato govadhe naiva śuddhirddaṣṭā manīṣibhiḥ pānaśayyāsanādyeṣu puṣpamūlaphaleṣu ca  NarP bhakṣyabhojyāpahāreṣu pañcagavyaviśodhanam śuṣkakāṣṭatṛṇānāṃ ca drumāṇāṃ ca guḍasya ca  NarP carmavastrāmiṣāṇāṃ ca trirātraṃ syādabhojanam ṭiṭṭibhaṃ cakravākaṃ ca haṃsaṃ kāraṇḍavaṃ tathā  NarP ulūkaṃ sārasaṃ caiva pakotaṃ jalapādakam śukaṃ cāṣaṃ balākaṃ ca śiśumāraṃ ca kacchapam  NarP eteṣvanyatamaṃ hatvā dvādaśāhamabhojanam prājāpatyavrataṃ kuryādretoviṇmūtrabhojane  NarP cāndrāyaṇatrayaṃ proktaṃ śūdrocchiṣṭasya bhojane rajasvalāṃ ca cāṇḍālaṃ mahāpātakinaṃ tathā  NarP sūtikāṃ patitaṃ caiva ucchiṣṭaṃ rajakādikam spṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snāyīta ghṛtaṃ saṃprāśeyattathā  NarP gāyatrīṃ ca viśuddhātmā japedaṣṭaśataṃ dvija eteṣvanyatamaṃ spṛṣṭvā ajñānādhadyadi bhojane  NarP trirātro poṣaṇācchuddhye tpañcagavyāśanādvija snānadānajapādau ca bhojanādau ca nārada  NarP eṣāmanyatamasyāpi śabdaṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyādvadet udvameddhuktamaṃnnatatstrātvā copavasettathā  NarP dvitīye hni ghṛtaṃ prāśya śuddhimānpoti nārada vratādimadhye yadyeṣā śṛṇuyāddhūnimapyuta  NarP aṣṭottarasahasraṃ tu japedrai vedamātaram pāpānāmadhikaṃ pāpaṃ dvijadaivatanindanam  NarP na dṛṣṭvā niṣkṛtistasya sarvaśāstreṣu nārada mahāpātakatulyāni yāni proktāni sūribhiḥ  NarP prāyaścittaṃ tu teṣāṃ ca kuryādevaṃ yathāvidhi prāyaścittāni yaḥ kuryānnārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ  NarP tasya pāpāni naśyantihyanyathā patito bhavet yastu rāgādinirmukto hyanutāpasamanvitaḥ  NarP sarvabhūtayayāyukto viṣṇusmaraṇatatparaḥ mahāpātakayukto vā yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ  NarP vimukta eva pāpebhyo jñeyo viṣṇuparo yataḥ nārāyaṇamanāndyantaṃ viśvākāramanāmayam  NarP yastu saṃsmarate martyaḥ sa muktaḥ pāpakoṭibhiḥ smṛto vā pūjito vāpi dhyātaḥ praṇamito pi vā  NarP nāśayatyeva pāpāni viṣṇurhṛdgamanaḥ satām saṃparkādyadi vā mohādyastu pūjayate harim  NarP sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sa prayāti hareḥ padam sakṛtsaṃsmaraṇādviṣṇornaśyanti kleśasaṃcayāḥ  NarP svargādibhogaprātpistu tasya viprānumīyate mānuṣaṃ durlabhaṃ janma manaḥśuddhiśca jāyate  NarP paraṃ mokṣaṃ labheścaiva pūjite tu janārdane dharmārthakāmokṣākhyāḥ puruṣārthāḥ sanātanāḥ  NarP haripūjāparāṇāṃ tu sidhyanti nātra saṃśayaḥ putradāragṛhakṣetradhanadhānyābhidhāvatīm  NarP labdhvemāṃ mānuṣīṃ vṛttiṃ rere darpaṃ tu mā kṛthāḥ saṃtyajya kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ mohaṃ madaṃ tathā  NarP parāpavādaṃ nindāṃ ca bhajadhvaṃ bhaktito harim vyāpārānsakalāṃstktvā pūjayadhvaṃ janārdanam  NarP nikaṭā eva dṛśyante kṛtāntanagaradrumāḥ yāvannāyāti maraṇaṃ yāvannāyāti vai jarā  NarP yāvannendriyavaikalyaṃ tāvadevācaryeddharim dhīmānnakuryādviśvāsaṃ śarīre sminvinaśvare  NarP nityaṃ sannihito mṛtyuḥ saṃpadatyantacañcalā āsannamaraṇo dehastasmāddarppaṃ vimucata  NarP saṃyogā viprayogāntāḥ sarvaṃ ca ghakṣaṇabhaṅguram etajjñātvā mahābhāga pūjayasva janārdanam  NarP āśayā vyathate caiva mokṣastvatyantadurlabhaḥ bhaktyā yajati yo viṣṇuṃ mahāpātakavānapi  NarP so pi yāti paraṃ sthānaṃ yatragha gatvā na śocati sarvatīrthāni yajñāśca sāṃgā vedāśca sattama  NarP nārāyaṇārcanasyaite kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm kiṃ vai vedairmakhaiḥ śāstraiḥ kiṃvā tīrthaniṣevaṇaiḥ  NarP viṣṇubhaktivihīnānāṃ kiṃ tapobhirvratairapi  NarP yajanti ye viṣṇumanantamṛrtiṃ nirīkṣya cākāragataṃ vareṇyam vedāntavedyaṃ bhavarogavaidyaṃ te yānti martyāḥ padamacyutasya  NarP anādimātmānamanantaśaktimādhārabhūtaṃ jagataḥ sureḍyam jyotiḥ svarupaṃ paramacyutākhyaṃ smṛtvā samabhyeti naraḥ sakhāyam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde prāyaścittavidhirnāma ghatriṃśo dhyāyaḥnārada uvācakathito bhavatā samyagvarṇāśramavidhirmune idānīṃ śrotumicchāmi yamamārgaṃ sudurgamam  NarP sanaka uvācaśṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi yamamārgaṃ sudurgamam sukhadaṃ puṇyaśīlānāṃ pāpināṃ bhayadāyakam  NarP ṣaḍaśītisahasrāṇi yojanārnini munīśvara yamamārgasya vistāraḥ kathaitaḥ pūrvasūribhiḥ  NarP ye narā dānaśīlāstu te yānti sukhino dvija dharmaśūnyā narā yānti duḥkhena bhṛśamarditāḥ  NarP atibhītā vivaśtrāśca śuṣkakaṇṭhauṣṭhatālukāḥ kradanto vistaraṃ dīnāḥ pāpino yānti tatpathi  NarP hanyamānā yamabhaṭaiḥ pratodādyaistathāyudhaiḥ  NarP itastataḥ pradhāvanto yānti duḥkhena tatpathi kvacitpaṅkaḥ kvacidūhniḥ kandarasya praveśanam śarkarāśca tathā loṣṭāḥ sūcītulyāśca kaṇṭakāḥ  NarP śaivālaṃ ca kvacinmārge kvacitkīcakapaṅktayaḥ kvacivdyāvrāśca garjante vardhante ca kvacijjvarāḥ  NarP evaṃ bahuvidhakleśāḥ pāpino yānti nārada krośantaśca rudantaśca mlāyantaścaiva pāpinaḥ  NarP pāśena yantritāḥ kecitkṛṣyamāṇāstathāṅkuśaiḥ śāstrāstraistāḍyamānāśca pṛṣṭato yānti pāpinaḥ  NarP nāsāgrapāśakṛṣṭāśca kecidantraiśca badhitāḥ vahṝntaścāyasāṃ bhāraṃ śiśrāgreṇa prayānti vai  NarP ayobhāradvayaṃ kecinnāsāgreṇa tathāpare karṇābhyāṃ ca tathā kecidvahṝnto yānti pāpinaḥ  NarP kecicca skhalitā yānti subuddhayaḥ atīva sukhasaṃpannāste yānti dharmamandiram  NarP annadāstu munuśreṣṭha bhuñjantaḥ svādu yānti vai nīradā yānti sukhinaḥ pibantaḥ kṣīramuttamamam takradā dadhidāścaiva tattadbhogaṃ divyāmbarāvṛtaḥ purākaraprado yāti stūyamāno maraiḥ pathi  NarP godānena naro yāti sarvasaukhyasamanvitaḥ bhūmido gṛhadaścaiva vimāne sarvasaṃpadi  NarP apsarogaṇasaṃkīrṇe krīḍanyāti vṛṣālayam hayado yātvatisukhānvitaḥ  NarP sarvabhūtadayāyuktaḥ pūjyamāno marairdvijaḥ sarvabhogānvitenāsau vimānena prayāti ca  NarP vidyādānarato yāti pūjyamāno bjasūnubhiḥ purāṇapaṭhako yāti stūyamāno munīśvaraiḥ  NarP evaṃ dharmaparā yānti sukhaṃ dharmasya mandiram yamaścaturmukho bhūtvā śaṅkhacakragadāsibhṛt  NarP puṇyakarmarataṃ samyaksnehānmitramivārcati bho bho buddhimatāṃ śreṣṭhānarakakleṣabhīravaḥ  NarP yuṣmābhiḥ sādhitaṃ puṇyamatrāmutrasukhāvaham manuṣathya janma yaḥ prāpya sukṛtaṃ na karoti ca  NarP sa eva pāpināṃ śreṣṭha ātmaghātaṃ karoti ca anityaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ nityaṃ yastu na sādhayet  NarP sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ ko nyastasmādacetanaḥ śarīraṃ yātanārupaṃ malādyaiḥ paridūṣitam  NarP tasminyo yāti viśvāsaṃ taṃ vidyādātmaghātakam sarveṣu prāṇinaḥ śreṣṭhāsteṣu vai buddhijīvinaḥ  NarP buddhimastu narāḥ śreṣṭhā nareṣu brāhmaṇāstathā brāhmaṇeṣu ca vidvāṃso vidvatsu kṛtabuddhayaḥ  NarP kṛtabuddhiṣu karttāraḥ kartṛṣu brahmavādinaḥ brahmavādiṣvapi tathā śreṣṭho nirmama ucyate  NarP etebhyo pi paro jñeyo nityaṃ dhyānaparāyaṇaḥ tasmātsarvaprayatnena karttavyo dharmasaṃgrahaḥ  NarP sarvatra pūjyate janturdharmavānnātra saṃśayaḥ gaccha svapuṇyairmatsthānaṃ sarvabhogasamanvitam  NarP asti cedduṣkṛtaṃ kiñcitpaścādatraiva bhokṣyase evaṃ yamastamabhyarcya prāpayitvā ca sadgatim  NarP āhūya pāpinaścaiva kāladaṇḍena tarjayet pralayāṃbudanirghoṣo hyañjanādrisamaprabhaḥ  NarP vidyutpra susaṃskārasāmagrīvaśādantaruṣmaprapācitānyucchūnatvamāpadyatato mūlabhāvaṃ tanmūlādaṅkurotpattistasmādapi parṇakāṇḍanālādikaṃ kāṇḍeṣu ca prasavamāpadyanteteṣu ca puṣpasaṃbhavaḥ  NarP tāni puṣpāṇi kānicidaphalāni kānicitphalahetubhūtāni teṣu puṣpeṣu vṛddhabhāveṣu satsutatpuṣpamūlatastuṣotpattirjāyate teṣu tuṣu bhoktṝṇāṃ prāṇināṃ
