rāgadveṣavihīno yaḥ śamādiguṇasaṃyutaḥ haridhyānaparo nityaṃ mumukṣurabhidhīyate  NarP caturbhiḥ sādhanairebhirviśuddhamatirucyate sarvagaṃ bhāvayedviṣṇuṃ sarvabhūtadayāparaḥ  NarP kṣarākṣarātmakaṃ viśvaṃ vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ iti jānāti yo vipratajjñānaṃ yogajaṃ viduḥ  NarP yogopāyamato vakṣye saṃsāravinivarttakam yogo jñānaṃ viśuddhaṃ syāttajjñānaṃ mokṣadaṃ viduḥ  NarP ātmānaṃ dvividhaṃ prāhuḥ parāparavibhedataḥ dve brahmaṇī veditavye iti cātharvarṇī śrutiḥ  NarP parastu nirguṇaḥ prokto hyahṝṅkārayuto paraḥ tayorabhedavijñānaṃ yoga ityabhidhīyate  NarP pañcabhūtātmake dehe yaḥ sākṣī hṛdaye sthitaḥ aparaḥ procyate sadbhiḥ paramātmā paraḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP śarīraṃ kṣevramityāhustatsthaḥ kṣetrajña ucyate avyaktaḥ paramaḥ śuddhaḥ paripūrṇa udāhṛtaḥ  NarP yadā tvabhedavijñānaṃ jīvātmaparamātmanoḥ bhavettadā muniśreṣṭha pāśacchedo parātmanaḥ  NarP ekaḥ śuddho kṣaro nityaḥ paramātmā jaganmayaḥ nṛṇāṃ vijñānabhedena bhedavāniva lakṣyate  NarP ekamevādvitīyaṃ yatparaṃ brahma sanātanam gīyamānaṃ ca vedāntaistasmānnāsti paraṃ dvija  NarP na tasya karma kāryaṃ vā rupaṃ varṇamathāpi vā karttṛtvaṃ vāpi bhoktṛtvaṃ nirguṇasya parātmanaḥ  NarP nidānaṃ sarvahetūnāṃ tejo yattejasāṃ param kimapyanyadyato nāsti tajjñeyaṃ muktihetave  NarP śabdabrahmamayaṃ yattanmahāvākyādikaṃ dvija tadvicārodbhavaṃ jñānaṃ paraṃ mokṣasya sādhanam  NarP samyagjñānavihīnānāṃ dṛśyate vividhaṃ jagatag paramajñānināmetatparabrahmātmakaṃ dvija  NarP eka eva parānando nirguṇaḥ parataḥ paraḥ bhāti vijñānabhedena bahurupadharo vyayaḥ  NarP māyino māyayā bhedaṃ paśyanti paramātmani tasmānmāyāṃ tyajedyogānmumukṣurdvijasattam  NarP nāsadrūpāna sadrūpā māyā naivobhayātmikā anirvācyā tato jñeyā bhedabuddhipradāryinī  NarP māyaiva jñānaśabdena buddhyate munisattama tasmādajñānavicchedo bhavedraujitamāyinām  NarP sanātanaṃ paraṃ brahma jñānaśabdena kathyate jñānināṃ paramātmā vai hṛdi bhāti nirantaram  NarP ajñānaṃ nāśayedyogī yogena munisattama aṣṭāṅgaiḥ siddhyate yogastāni vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ  NarP yamāśca niyamāścaiva āsanāni ca sattama prāṇāyāmaḥ pratyāhāro dhāraṇā dhyānameva ca  NarP samādhiśca muniśreṣṭha yogāṅgāni yathākramam eṣāṃ saṃkṣepato vakṣye lakṣaṇāni munīśvara  NarP ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryāparigrahau akrodhaścānasūyā ca proktāḥ saṃkṣepato yamāḥ  NarP sarveṣāmeva bhūtānāmakleśajananaṃ hi yat ahiṃsā kathitā sadbhiryogasiddhipradāyinī  NarP yathārthakathanaṃ yañca dharmādharmavivekataḥ satyaṃ prāhurmuniśreṣṭha asteyaṃ śṛṇu sāmpratam  NarP cauryeṇa vā balenāpi parasvaharaṇaṃ hi yat steyamityucyate sadbhirasteyaṃ tadviparyayam  NarP sarvatra maithunatyāgo brahmacaryaṃ prakīrttitam brahmacaryaparityāgājjñānavānapi pātakī  NarP sarvasaṃgaparityāgī maithuneyastu varttate sa caṇḍālasamo jñeyaḥ sarvavarṇabahiṣkṛtaḥ  NarP yastu yogarato vipra viṣayeṣu spṛhānvitaḥ tatsaṃbhāṣaṇamātreṇa brahmahatyā bhavennṛṇām  NarP sarvasaṃgaparityāgī punaḥ saṃgī bhavedyadi tatsaṃgasaṃgināṃ saṃgānmahāpātakadoṣabhāk  NarP anādānaṃ hi dravyāṇāmāpadyapi munīśvara aparigraha ityukto yogasaṃsiddhikārakaḥ  NarP ātmanastu samutkarṣādatiniṣṭhurabhāṣaṇam krodhamāhurdharmavido hyakrodhastadviparyayaḥ  NarP dhanādyairadhikaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhṛśaṃ manasi tāpanam asūyā kīrtitā sadbhistattyāgo hyanasūyatā  NarP evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktā yamā vibudhasattama niyamānapi vakṣyāmitubhyaṃ tāñchṛṇu nārada  NarP tapaḥsvādhyāyasaṃtoṣāḥ śaucaṃ ca haripūjanam saṃdhyopāsanamukhyāśca niyamāḥ parikīrttitāḥ  NarP cāndrāyaṇādibhiryatra śarīrasya viśoṣaṇam tapo nigaditaṃ sadbhiryogasādhanamuttamam  NarP praṇavasyopaniṣadāṃ dvādaśārṇasya ca dvija aṣṭākṣarasya mantrasya mahāvākyacayasya ca  NarP japaḥ svādhyāya udito yogasādhanamuttamam svādhyāyaṃ yastyajenmūḍhastasya yogo na sidhyati  NarP yogaṃ vināpi svādhyāyātpāpanāśo bhavennṛṇām svādhyāyaistoṣyamāṇāśca prasīdanti hi devatāḥ  NarP japastu trividhaḥ prokto vācikopāṃśumānasaḥ trividhe pi ca viprendra pūrvātpūrvātparo varaḥ  NarP mantrasyoccāraṇaṃ samyaksphuṭākṣarapadaṃ yathā japastu vācikaḥ proktaḥ sarvayajñaphalapradaḥ  NarP mantrasyoccāraṇe kiñcitpadātpadavivecanam sa tūpāṃśurjapaḥ proktaḥ pūrvasmāddviguṇo dhikaḥ  NarP vidhāya hyakṣaraśreṇyāṃ tattadarthavicāraṇam sa japomānasaḥ prokto yogasiddhipradāyakaḥ  NarP japena devatā nityaṃ stuvataḥ saṃprasīdati tasmātsvādhyāyasaṃpanno labhetsarvānmanorathān  NarP yadṛcchālābhasaṃtuṣṭiḥ saṃtoṣa iti gīyate saṃtoṣahīnaḥ puruṣo na labheccharma kutracit  NarP na jātukāmaḥ kāmānāmupabhogena śāmyati ito dhikaṃ kadā lapsya iti kāmastu varddhate  NarP tasmātkāmaṃ parityajya dehasaṃśoṣakāraṇam yadṛcchālābhasaṃtuṣṭo bhaveddharmaparāyaṇaḥ  NarP bāhyābhyantarabhedena śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ smṛtam mṛjjalābhyāṃ bahiḥ śuddhirbhāvaśuddhistathāntaram  NarP antaḥśuddhivihīnaistu ye dhvarā vividhāḥ kṛtāḥ na phalanti munīśreṣṭha bhasmani nyastahavyavat  NarP bhāvaśuddhivihīnānāṃ samastaṃ karmaniṣphalam tasmādrāgādikaṃ sarvaṃ parityajya sukhī bhavet  NarP mṛdābhārasahasraistu kumbhakoṭijalaistathā kṛtaśauco pi duṣṭātmā caṇḍālasadṛśaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP antaḥśuddhivihīnastu devapūjāparo yadi tameva daivataṃ hṝnti narakaṃ ca prapadyate  NarP antaḥśuddhivihīnaśca bahiḥśuddhiṃ karoti yaḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ surābhāṇḍa iva śāntiṃ na gacchati  NarP manaḥśuddhivihīnā ye tīrthayātrāṃ prakurvate na tānpuṃnati tīrthāni surābhāṇḍamivāpagā  NarP vācā dharmānpravaladati manasā pāpamicchati jānīyāttaṃ muniśreṣṭha mahāpātakināṃ varam  NarP viśuddhamānasā ye tu dharmamātramanuttamam kurvanti tatphalaṃ vidyādakṣayaṃ sukhadāyakam  NarP karmaṇā manasā vācā stutiśravaṇa pūjanaiḥ haribhaktirdṛḍhā yasya haripūjeti gīyate  NarP yamāśca niyamāścaiva saṃkṣepeṇa prabodhitāḥ ebhirviśuddhamanasāṃ mokṣaṃ hastagataṃ viduḥ  NarP yamaiśca niyamaiścaiva sthirabuddhirjitendriyaḥ abhyasedāsanaṃsamyagyogasādhanamuttamam  NarP padmakaṃ svastikaṃ pīṭhaṃ saiṃhaṃ kaukkuṭakaiñjare kaurmaṃvajrāsanaṃ caiva vārāhaṃ mṛgacailikam  NarP krauñcaṃ ca nālikaṃ caiva sarvatobhadrameva ca vārṣabhaṃ nāgamātsye ca vaiyānghaṃ cārddhacandrakam  NarP daṇḍavātāsanaṃ śailaṃ svabhraṃ maudgarameva ca mākaraṃ traipathaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ sthāṇuṃ vaikarṇikaṃ tathā  NarP bhaumaṃ vīrāsanaṃ caiva yogasādhanakāraṇam triṃśatsaṃkhyānyāsanāni munīndraiḥ kathitāni vai  NarP eṣāmekatamaṃ baddhā gurubhaktiparāyaṇaḥ upāsako jayetprāṇāndvandvātīto vimatsaraḥ  NarP prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi tathā pratyaṅmukho pi vā abhyāsena jayetprāṇānniḥśabde janavarjite  NarP prāṇo vāyuḥ śarīrastha āyāmastasya nigrahaḥ prāṇāyāma iti prokto dvividhaḥ sa prakīrttitaḥ  NarP agarbhaśca sagarbhaśca dvitīyastu tayorvaraḥ jayadhyānaṃ vināgarbhaḥ sagarbhastatsamanvitaḥ  NarP recakaḥ pūrakaścaiva kuṃbhakaḥ śūnyakastathā evaṃ caturvidhaḥ proktaḥ prāṇāyāmo manīṣibhiḥ  NarP jantūnāṃ dakṣiṇā nāḍī piṅgalā parikīrtitā sūryadaivatakā caiva pitṛyoniriti śrutā  NarP devayoniriti khyātā iḍā nāḍī tvadakṣiṇā tatrādhidaivata candraṃ jānīhi munisattamaṃ  NarP etayorubhayormadhye suṣumṇā nāḍikā smṛtā atisūkṣmā guhyatamā jñeyā sā brahmadaivatā  NarP vāmena recayedvāyuṃ recanādrecakaḥ smṛtaḥ pūrayeddakṣiṇenaiva pūraṇātpūrakaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP svadehapūritaṃ vāyaṃ nigṛhya na vimṛñcati saṃpūrṇakuṃbhavattiṣṭetkumbhakaḥ sa hi viśrutaḥ  NarP na gṛhṇāti na tyajati vāyumantarbahiḥ sthitam viddhi tacchūnyakaṃ nāma prāṇāyāmaṃ yathāsthitam  NarP śanaiḥśanairvijetavyaḥ prāṇo mattagajendravat anyathā khalu jāyante mahārogā bhayaṅkarāḥ  NarP krameṇa yojayedvāyuṃ yogī vigatakalmaṣaḥ sa sarvapāpanirmukto brahmaṇaḥ padamānpuyāt  NarP viṣayeṣu prasaktāni cendriyāṇi munīśvaraḥ samāmāhṛtya nigṛhṇāti pratyāhārastu sa smṛtaḥ  NarP jitendriyā mahātmāno dhyānaśūnyā api dvija prayānti paramaṃ brahma punarāvṛttidurlabham  NarP anirjitendriyagrāmaṃ yastu dhyānaparo bhavet mūḍhātmānaṃ ca taṃ vidyāddhyānaṃ cāsya na sidhyati  NarP yadyatpaśyati tatsarvaṃ paśyedātmavadātmani pratyāhṛtānīndriyāṇi dhārayetsā tu dhāraṇā  NarP yogājjitendriyagrāmastāni hṛtvā dṛḍhaṃ hṛdi ātmānaṃ paramaṃ dhyāyetsarvadhātāramacyutam  NarP sarvaviśvātmakaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvasokaikakāraṇam vikasatpadyapatrākṣaṃ cārukuṇḍalabhūṣitam  NarP dīrghabāhumudārāṅgaṃ sarvālaṅkārabhṛṣitam pītāmbaradharaṃ devaṃ hemayajñopavītinam  NarP bibhrataṃ tulasīmālāṃ kaustubhena virājitam śrīvatsavakṣasaṃ devaṃ surāsuranamaskṛtam  NarP aṣṭāre hṛtsaroje tu dvādaśāṅgulavistṛte dhyāyedātmānamavyaktaṃ parātparataraṃ vibhumaṭ  NarP dhyānaṃ sadbhinirgaditaṃ pratyayasyaikatānatā dhyānaṃ kṛtvā muhurttaṃ vā paraṃ mokṣaṃ labhennaraḥ  NarP dhyānātpāpāni naśyanti dhyānānmokṣaṃ ca vindati dhyānātprasīdati hariddharyānātsarvārthasādhanam  NarP yadyadrūpaṃ mahāviṣṇostattaddhyāyetsamāhitam tena dhyānena tuṣṭātmā harirmokṣaṃ dadāti vai  NarP acañcalaṃ manaḥ kuryāddhyeye vastuni sattama dhyānaṃ dhyeyaṃ dhyātṛbhāvaṃ yathā naśyati nirbharam  NarP tato mṛtatvaṃ bhavati jñānāmṛtaniṣevaṇāt bhavennirantaraṃ dhyānādabhedapratipādanam  NarP suṣutpivatparānandayuktaścoparatendriyaḥ nirvātadīpavatsaṃsthaḥ samādhirabhidhīyate  NarP yogī samādhyavasthāyāṃ na śṛṇoti na paśyati na jighrati na spṛśati na kiñcadvakti sattama  NarP ātmā tu nirmalaḥ śuddhaḥ sañcidānandavigrahaḥ sarvopādhivinirmukto yogināṃ bhātyacañcalaḥ  NarP nirguṇo pi paro devo hyajñānādguṇavāniva vibhātyajñānanāśe tu yathāpūrvaṃ vyavasthitam  NarP paraṃ jyotirameyātmā māyāvāniva māyinām tannāśe nirmalaṃ brahma prakāśayati paṇḍitaṃ  NarP ekamevādvitīyaṃ ca paraṃ jyotirnirañjanam sarveṣāmeva bhūtānāmantaryāmitayā sthitam  NarP aṇoraṇīyānmahato mahīyānsanātanātmākhilaviśvahetuḥ paśyanti yajjñānavidāṃ variṣṭāḥ parātparasmātparamaṃ pavitram  NarP akārādikṣakārāntavarṇabhedavyavasthitaḥ purāṇapuruṣo nādiḥ śabdabrahmeti gīyate  NarP viśuddamakṣaraṃ nityaṃ pūrṇamākāśamadhyagam ānandaṃ nirmalaśāntaṃ paraṃ brahmeti gīyate  NarP yogino hṛdi paśyanti parātmānaṃ sanātanam avikāramajaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ brahmeti gīyate  NarP dhyānamanyatpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva muni sattama saṃsāratāpatatpānāṃ sudhāvṛṣṭisamaṃ nṛṇām  NarP nārāyaṇaṃ parānandaṃ smaretpraṇavasaṃsthitam nādarupamanaupamyamarddhamātroparisthitam  NarP akāraṃ brahmaṇo rupamukāraṃ viṣṇurupavat makāraṃ rudrarupaṃ syādardhdamātraṃ parātmakam  NarP mātrāstistraḥ samākhyātā brahmaviṣṇu śivādhipāḥ teṣāṃ samuccayaṃ vipra parabrahmaprabodhakam  NarP vācyaṃ tu paramaṃ brahma vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ vācyavācakasaṃbandho hyupacārāttayordvijā  NarP japantaḥ praṇavaṃ nityaṃ mucyante sarvapātakaiḥ tadabhyāsena saṃyuktāḥ paraṃ mokṣaṃ labhanti ca  NarP japaṃśca praṇavaṃ mantraṃ brahmaviṣṇuśivātmakam koṭisūryasamaṃ tejo dhyāyedātmani nirmalam  NarP śālagrāmaśilārupaṃ pratimārupameva vā yadyatpāpaharaṃ vastu tattadvā cintayeddhṛdi  NarP yadetaddaiṣṇavaṃ jñānaṃ kathitaṃ te munīśvara etadviditvā yogīndro labhate mokṣamuttamam  NarP yastvetacchṛāṇuyādvāpi paṭhedvāpi samāhitaḥ sa sarvapāpanirmukto harisālokyamānpuyāt  NarP iti śrībṛnnāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde yoganirupaṇaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo dhyāyaḥnārada uvācasamākhyātāni sarvāṇi yogāṅgāni mahāmune idānīmapi sarvajña yatpṛcchāmi taducyatām  NarP yogobhaktimatāmeva sidhyatīti tvayoditam yasya tuṣyati sarveśastasya bhaktiśca śāśvatam  NarP yathā tuṣyati sarveśo devadevo janārdanaḥ tanmamākhyāhi sarvajña mune kāruṇyavāridhe  NarP sanaka uvācanārāyaṇaṃ paraṃ devaṃ saccidānandavigraham bhaja sarvātmanā vipra yadi muktimabhīpsasi  NarP ripavastaṃ na hiṃsanti na bādhante grahāścatam rākṣasāśca na cekṣante naraṃ viṣṇuparāyaṇam  NarP bhaktardṛḍhā bhavedyasya devadeve janārdane śreyāṃsi tasya sidhyanti bhaktimanto dhikāstataḥ  NarP pādau tau saphalau puṃsāṃ yau viṣṇugṛhagāminau tau karau laphalau jñeyau viṣṇupūjāparau tu yau  NarP te netre suphale puṃsāṃ paśyato ye danārdanam sā jihvā procyate sadbhirharināmaparā tu yā  NarP satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ satyamuddhṛtya bhujamutyate tattvaṃ gurusamaṃ nārita nata devaḥ keśavātparaḥ  NarP satyaṃ vacmihitaṃ vācmi sāraṃ vacmi punaḥ punaḥ asāre smiṃsta saṃsāre satyaṃ harisamarcanam  NarP saṃsārapāśaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ mahāmohapradāyakam haribhaktikuṭāreṇa cchittvātyantasukhī bhava  NarP tanmanaḥ saṃyutaṃ viṣṇau sā vāṇī yatparāyaṇā te śrotre tatkathāsārapūrite lokavandite  NarP ānandamakṣaraṃ śūnyamavasthātritayairapi ākāśamadhyagaṃ devaṃ bhaja nārada saṃtatam  NarP sthānaṃ na śakyate yasya svarupaṃ vā kadācana nirdeṣṭuṃ muniśārdūla draṣṭuṃ vāpyakṛtātmabhiḥ  NarP samastaiḥ karaṇairyukto vartte sau yadā tadā jāgradityucyate sadbhirantaryāmī sanātanaḥ  NarP yadāntaḥ karaṇairṃyuktaḥ svecchayā vicaratyasau svapannicyucyate hyātmā yadā svāpavivarjitaḥ  NarP na bāhyakaraṇairyukto na cāntaḥ karaṇaistathā asvarupo yadātmāsau puṇyāpuṇyavivarjitaḥ  NarP sarvopādhivinirmukto hyānando nirguṇo vibhuḥ parabrahmamayo devaḥ suṣutpa iti gīyate  NarP bhāvanāmayametadvai jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam vidyudvilolaṃ viprendra bhaghaja tasmājjanārdanam  NarP ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryāparigrahau vartate yasya tasyaiva tuṣyate jagatāṃ patiḥ  NarP sarvabhaghūtadayāyukto viprapūjāparāyaṇaḥ tasya tuṣṭo jagannātho madhukaiṭabhamarddanaḥ  NarP satkathāyāṃ ca ramate satkathāṃ ca karoti yaḥ satsaṅgo nirahaṃ kārastasya prīto ramāpatiḥ  NarP nāmasaṃkīrttanaṃ viṣṇo kṣuttṛṭpraskhalitādiṣu karoti satataṃ yastu tasya prīto hyadhokṣajaḥ  NarP yātu nārīpatiprāṇā patipūjāparāyaṇā tasyāstuṣṭo jagannātho dadāti svapadaṃ mune  NarP asūyārahitā ye tu hyahaṅkāravivarjitāḥ devapūjāparāścaiva teṣāṃ tuṣyati keśavaḥ  NarP tasmācchṛṇuṣva devarśe bhajasvaṃ satataṃ harim mā kuruṣva hyahaṅkāraṃ vidyullolaśriyā vṛthā  NarP śarīraṃ mṛtyusaṃyuktaṃ jīvitaṃ cāti cañcalam rājādibhirdhanaṃ bādhyaṃ sampadaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāḥ  NarP kiṃ na paśyasi devarṣe hyāyuṣārddhaṃ tu nidrayā hataṃ ca bhojanādyaiśca kiyadāyuḥ samāhṛtam  NarP kiyadāyurbālabhāvātkiyadvṛthā kiyadviṣayabhogaiśca kadā dharmānkariṣyati  NarP bālabhāve ca vārddhakyena ghaṭetācyutārcanam vayasyeva tato dharmānkuru tvamanahaṅkṛtaḥ  NarP mā vināśaṃ vraja mune magnaḥ saṃsāragahvare NarP dhyātaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā praṇato vā janārdanaḥ saṃsārapāśavicchedīkastaṃ na pratipūjayet  NarP yannāmoccāṃraṇādeva mahāpātakanāśanam yaṃ samabhyarcya viprarṣe mokṣabhāgī bhavennaraḥ  NarP aho sadrūpaṃ tamasadrūpaṃ sadasadrūpamavyayam tattadvilakṣaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhācchraṣṭhataraṃ bhaje  NarP nirañjanaṃ nirākāraṃ pūrṇamākāśamadhyagam paraṃ ca vidyāvidyābhyāṃ hṛdaṃbujanivāsinam  NarP svaprakāśamanirdeṣyaṃ mahatāṃ ca mahattaram aṇoraṇīyāṃsamajaṃ sarvopādhivivarjitam  NarP yannityaṃ paramānandaṃ paraṃ brahma sanātanam viṣṇusaṃjñaṃ jagaddhāma tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ  NarP yaṃ bhajanti kriyāniṣṭāyaṃ paśyanti ca yoginaḥ pūjyātpūjyataraṃ śāntaṃ gato smi śaraṇaṃ prabhum  NarP yaṃ na paśyanti vidvāṃso ya etadvyāvya tiṣṭati sarvasmādadhikaṃ nityaṃ nato smi vibhumavyayam  NarP antaḥ karaṇasaṃyogājjīva ityucyate ca yaḥ avidyākārya rahitaḥ paramātmeti gīyate  NarP sarvātmakaṃ sarvahetuṃ sravakarmaphalappadam varaṃ vareṇyamajanaṃ praṇato smi parātparam  NarP sarvajñaṃ sarvagaṃ śāntaṃ sarvāntayā miṇaṃ harim jñānātmakaṃ jñānanidhiṃ jñānasaṃsthaṃ vibhuṃ bhaje  NarP namāmyahaṃ vedanidhiṃ murāriṃ vedānta vijñānasuniścitārtham sūryeduvatprojjvalane tramindraṃ ravagasvarupaṃ vapatisvarūpam  NarP sarveśvaraṃ sarvagataṃ mahāntaṃ vedātmakaṃ vedavidāṃvariṣṭam taṃvāṅmano cintyamanantaśaktiṃ jñānaikavedyaṃ puruṣaṃ bhajāmi  NarP indrāgnikālāsurapāśivāyusomeṣamārttaṇḍapurandarādyaiḥ yaḥ pāti lokānparipūrṇabhāvastamaprameyaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye  NarP sahasraśīrṣaṃ ca sahasrapādaṃ sahasrabāhuḥ ca sahasranetram samastayajñaiḥ parijuṣṭamādyaṃ nato smi tuṣṭipradamugravīryam  NarP kālātmakaṃ kālavibhāgahetuṃ guṇatrayātītamahaṃ guṇajñam guṇapriyaṃ kāmadamastasaṃgamatīndriyaṃ viśvabhaghujaṃ vitṛṣṇam  NarP nirīhamagryaṃ manasāpyagamyaṃ manomayaṃ cānnamayaṃ nirūḍham vijñānabhedaṃ pratipannakalpaṃ na vāṅmayaṃ prāṇamayaṃ bhajāmi  NarP na yasya rūpaṃ na balaprabhāvo na yasya karmāṇi na yatpramāṇam jānanti devā kamalodbhavādyastoṣyāmyahaṃ taṃ kathamātmarūpam  NarP saṃsārasidhau patitaṃ kadaryaṃ mohākulaṃ kāmaśatena baddham akīrtibhājaṃ piśunaṃ kṛtaghnaṃ sadāśuciṃ pāparataṃ pramanyum dayāṃbudhe pāhi bhayākulaṃ māṃ punaḥ punastvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye  NarP iti prasāditastena dayālasuḥ kamalāpatiḥ pratyakṣatāmagāttasya bhagavāṃstejasāṃ nidhiḥ  NarP atasī puṣpasaṃkāśaṃ phullapaṅkajalocanan kirīṭinaṃ tulasīkomaladalairarcitāṅghniṃ mahādyutim  NarP kiṅkiṇīnūpurā dyaiśca śobhitaṃ garuḍadhvajam dṛṣṭvā nānāma viprendro daṇḍavatkṣitimaṇḍale  NarP abhyaṣiñcaddhareḥ pādāvuttaṅko harṣavāribhiḥ murāre rakṣa rakṣeti vyāharannānyadhīstadā  NarP tamutthāpya mahāviṣṇurāliliṅga dayāparaḥ varaṃ vṛṇuṣva vatseti provāca munipuṅgavam  NarP asādhyaṃ nāsti kiñcitte prasanne mayi sattama itīritaṃ samākarṇya hyuttaṅkaścakrapāṇinā punaḥ praṇamya taṃ prāha devadevaṃ janārddanam  NarP kiṃ māṃ mohayasīśa tvaṃ kimanyairdeva me varaiḥ tvayi bhaktirdṛḍhā me stu janmajanmāntareṣvapi  NarP  kīṭeṣu pakṣiṣu mṛgeṣu sarīsṛpeṣu rakṣaḥ piśācamanujeṣvapi yatra tatrajajātasya me bhavatu keśava te prasāddāttvayyeva bhaktiracalāvyabhicāraṇī  ca  NarP  evamastviti lokeśaḥ śaṅkhaprāntena saṃspṛśan divyajñānaṃ dadau tasmai yogināmapidurlamabhagham  NarP puḥ stuvantaṃ viprendraṃ devadevo janārddanaḥ idamāha smitamukho hastaṃ tacchirasi nyasan  NarP śrībhagavānuvāca ārādhaya kriyāyogairmāṃ sadā dvijasattam naranārāyaṇasthānaṃ vraja mokṣaṃ gamiṣyasi  NarP tvayā kṛtamidaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsatataṃ naraḥ sarvānkāmānavāpyānte mokṣabhāgī bhavettataḥ  NarP ityuktvā bhādhavo vipraṃ tatraivāntardadhe mune naranarāyaṇasthānamuttaṅko pi tato yayau  NarP kasmādbhaktiḥ sadā kāryā devadevasya cakriṇaḥ haribhaktiḥ parā proktā sarvakāmapalapradā  NarP utaṅko bhāktibhāvena kriyāyogaparo mune pūjayanmādhayavaṃ nityaṃ naranārāyaṇāśrame  NarP jñānavijñānasaṃpannaḥ saṃcchinnadvaitasaṃśayaḥ āvāpa duravāpaṃ vai tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam  NarP pūjito namito vāpi saṃsmṛto vāpi mokṣadaḥ nārāyaṇo jagannātho bhaktānāṃ mānavarddhanaḥ  NarP tasmānnārāyaṇaṃ devamanantamaparājitam ihāmutra sukhaprepsuḥ pūjayedbhaktisaṃyutaḥ  NarP yaḥ paṭhedidamākhyānaṃ śṛṇuyādvāsamāhitaḥ so pi sarvāghanirmuktaḥ prayāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo dhyāyaḥsanaka uvācabhūyaḥ śṛṇuṣva viprendra māhātmyaṃ parameṣṭinaḥ sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṛṇām  NarP aho harikathā loke pāpaghnī puṇyadāyinī śṛṇvatāṃ vadatāṃ caiva tadbhaktānāṃ viśeṣataḥ  NarP haribhaktirasāsvādamuditā ye narottamāḥ namaskaromyahaṃ tebhyo yatsaṃgānmukti bhāgnaraḥ  NarP haribhaktiparā ye tu harināmaparāyaṇāḥ durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā tebhyo nityaṃ namonamaḥ  NarP saṃsārasāgaraṃ tartuṃ ya icchenmu nipuṅgava sa bhajeddharibhaktānāṃ bhaktānvai pāpahāriṇaḥ  NarP dṛṣṭaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā dhyātaḥ praṇamito pi vā samuddharati govindo dustarādbhava sāgarāt  NarP svapanbhuñjan vrajaṃstiṣṭannatiṣṭaśca vadaṃstathā cintayedyo harernāma tasmai nityaṃ namo namaḥ  NarP aho bhāgyamaho bhāgyaṃ viṣṇu bhaktiratātmanām yeṣāṃ muktiḥ karasthaiva yogināmapi durlabhā  NarP atrāpyudāharantīmamitihāsaṃ purātanam vadatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpa praṇāśanam  NarP āsītpurā mahīpālaḥ somavaṃśasamudbhavaḥ jayadhvaja iti khyāto nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ  NarP viṣṇordevālaye nityaṃ saṃmār janaparāyaṇaḥ dīpadānarataścaiva sarvabhūtadayāparaḥ  NarP sa kadācinmahīpālo revātīre manorame vicitrakusumopetaṃ kṛtavānviṣṇumandiram  NarP sa tatra nṛpaśārdūlaḥ sadā saṃmārjane rataḥ dīpadānaparaścaiva viśeṣeṇa haripriyaḥ  NarP harināmaparo nityaṃ harisaṃsaktamānasaḥ paripraṇāmanirato haribhaktajanapriyaḥ  NarP vītihotra iti khyāto hyāsīttasya purohitaḥ jayadhvajasya caritaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayamāgataḥ  NarP kadācidupaviṣṭaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ viṣṇutatparam apṛcchadvītihotrastu tvayā viditaṃ phalam  NarP saṃpādanena varttīnāṃ tailasaṃpalādanena ca saṃyukto si sadā bhadrayadviṣṇorgṛhamārjane  NarP karmāṇyanyāni saṃtyeva viṣṇoḥ prītikarāṇi ca tathāpi kiṃ mahābhāga etayoḥ satatodyataḥ  NarP sarvātmanā mahāpuṇyaṃ nareśa vidita ca yat tad brūhi me guhyatamaṃ prītirmayi tavāsti cet  NarP purodhasaivamuktastu prahasansa jayadhvajaḥ vinayāvanato bhūtvā provācejaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ  NarP jayadhvaja uvācaśṛṇuṣva vipraśārdūla mayaivācaritaṃ purā jātismaratvājjānāmi śrotṝṇāṃ vismayapradam  NarP āsītpurā kṛtayuge brahmansvārociṣeṃtare raivato nāma viprendro vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ  NarP ayājyayājakaścaiva sadaiva grāmayojakaḥ piśuno niṣṭhuraścaiva hyapaṇyānāṃ ca vikrayī  NarP niṣiddhakarmācaraṇātparityaktaḥ sa bandhubhiḥ daridro duḥkhitaścaiva śīrṇāṅgo vyādhito bhavat  NarP sa NarP śālagrāmaśilārūpī yatra tiṣṭati keśavaḥ na bādhante grahāstatra bhūtavetāla kādayaḥ  NarP śālagrāmaśilā yatra tattīrthaṃ tattapovanam yataḥ saṃnihitastatra bhagavānmadhusūdanaḥ  NarP yadgṛhe kurvanti ye viṣṇoḥ pradakṣiṇacatuṣṭayam te pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ sarvakarmanibarhaṇam  NarP iti bṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathama pāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśo dhyāyaḥsanaka uvācaataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vibhūtiṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ mune yāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ kīrtayatāṃ sadyaḥ pāpakṣayo bhavet  NarP vaivasvateṃtare pūrvaṃ śakrasya ca bṛhaspateḥ saṃvādaḥ sumahānāsīttaṃ vakṣyāmi niśāmaya  NarP ekadā sarvabhogāḍhyo vibudhaiḥ parivāritaḥ apsarogaṇasaṃkīrṇo bṛhaspatimabhāṣata  NarP indra uvācabṛhaspate mahābhāga sarvatattvārthakovida atītabrahmaṇaḥ kalpe sṛṣṭiḥ kīdṛgvidhā prabho  NarP indrastu manavaḥ samatītāśca tānvaktumapi na kṣamaḥ yo vijānāti taṃ te dya kathayāmi niśāmaya  NarP sudharma iti vikhyātaḥ kaścidāste pure tava bhuñjāno divyabhogāṃśca brahmalokādihāgataḥ  NarP sa vā eta NarP ityukto devarājena sudharmā prahasaṃstadā provāca vinayāviṣṭaḥ pūrvavṛttaṃ yathāvidhi  NarP sudharma uvācacaturyugasahasrāṇi brahmaṇo dinamucyate ekasmin divase śakra manavaśca caturdaśa  NarP indrāścaturdaśa proktā devāśca vividhāḥ pṛthak indrāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ manvādīnāṃ ca vāsava  NarP tulyatā tejasā lakṣmyā prabhāveṇa balena ca teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ  NarP svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ pūrvaṃ tataḥ svārociṣastathā uttamastāmasaścaiva raivataścākṣuṣastathā  NarP vaivasvato manuścaiva sūryasāvarṇiraṣṭamaḥ navamo dakṣasāvarṇiḥ sarvadevahite rataḥ  NarP daśamo brahmasāvarṇirddharmasāvarṇikastataḥ tatastu rudrasāvarṇī rocamānastataḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP bhautyaścaturdaśaḥ prokta ete hi manavaḥ smṛtāḥ devānindrāṃśca vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva vibudharṣabha  NarP yāmā iti samākhyātā devāḥ svāyaṃbhuveṃtare śacīpatiḥ samākhyātasteṣāmindro mahāpatiḥ  NarP pārāvatāśca tuṣitā devāḥ svārociṣeṃtare vipaścinnāma devendraṃ sarvasaṃpatsamanvitaḥ  NarP sudhāmānastathā satyāḥ śivāścāya prartadanāḥ teṣāmindraḥ suśāntiśca tṛtīye parikīrtitaḥ  NarP sutāḥ pārāharāścaiva sutyāścāsudhiyastathā teṣāmindraḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ śakrastāmasakeṃtare vibhānāmā devapatiḥ pañcamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ  NarP amitābhādayo devāḥ ṣaṣṭhe pi ca tathā śṛṇu āryādyā vibudhāḥ proktāsteṣā mindro manojavaḥ  NarP ādityavasurudrādyā devā vaivasvataṃtare indraḥ purandaraḥ proktaḥ sarvakāmasamanvitaḥ  NarP aprameyāśca vibudhāḥ sutapādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ viṣṇupūjāprabhāveṇa teṣāmindro baliḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP pārādyā navame devā indraścādbhuta ucyate suvāsanādyā vibudhā daśame parikīrtitāḥ  NarP śāntirnāma ca tatrendraḥ sarvabhogasamanvitaḥ vihṝṅgṝmādyā devāśca teṣāmindro vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP ekādaśe dvādaśe tu nibodhakathāyāmi te krabhuvanāmā ca devendro harinābhāstathā surāḥ  NarP sutrāmādyāstathā devāstrayodaśatame ntare divaspatirmahāvīryasteṣāmindraḥ prakīrtitaḥ  NarP caturdaśe cākṣupādyā devā indraḥ śuciḥ smṛtaḥ evaṃ te manavaḥ proktā indrā devāśca tattvataḥ  NarP ekasminbrahmadivase svādhikāraṃ prabhuñjate  NarP lekeṣu sarvasargeṣu sṛṣṭirekavidhā smṛtā karttāro bahavaḥ saṃti tatsaṃkhyāṃ vetti kovidaḥ  NarP mayi sthite brahmaloke brahmāṇāṃ bahavo gatāḥ teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na saṃkhyātu śakto smyadya dvijottama  NarP svargalokamapi prāpya yāvatkālaṃ śṛṇuṣva me catvāro manavo tītā mama śrīścātivistarā  NarP sthātavyaṃ ca mayātraiva yugakoṭiśataṃ prabho tataḥ paraṃ gamiṣyāmi karmabhūmiṃ śṛṇuṣva me  NarP mayā kṛtaṃ purā karma vakṣyāmi tava suvrata vadatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpapraṇāśanam  NarP ahamāṃsa purā śakra gṛdhraḥ pāpo viśeṣataḥ sthitaśca bhūmibhāge vai amedhyāmiṣabhojanaḥ  NarP ekadāhaṃ viṣṇugṛhe prākāre saṃsthitaḥ prabho patito vyādhaśastreṇa sāyaṃ viṣṇorgṛhāṅgaṇe  NarP mayi kaṇṭhagataprāṇe bhaṣaṇo māṃsalolupaḥ jagrāha māṃ svavakreṇa śvabhiranyaiścarandrutaḥ  NarP vahanmāṃ svamukhenaiva bhīto nyairbhaṣaṇaistathā gataḥ pradakṣiṇā kāraṃ viṣṇostanmandiraṃ prabho  NarP tenaiva tuṣṭimāpanno hyantarātmā jaganmayaḥ mama cāpi śunaścāpi dattāvanparamaṃ padam  NarP pradakṣiṇā kāratayā gatasyāpīdṛṃ phalam saṃprāptaṃ vibudhaśreṣṭha kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt  NarP ityukto devarājastu sudharmeṇa mahātmanā manasā prītimāpanno haripūjā rato bhavat  NarP tathāpi nirjarāḥ sarve bhārate janmalipsavaḥ samarcayanti deveśaṃ nārāyaṇamanāmayam tānarcayanti satataṃ brahmādyā devatāgaṇāḥ  NarP nārāyaṇānusmaraṇodyatānāṃ mahātmanāṃ tyaktaparigrahaṇām kathaṃ bhavatyugrabhavasya bandhastatsaṅgalubdhā yadi muktibhājaḥ  NarP ye mānavāḥ pratidinaṃ parimuktasaṅgā nārāyaṇaṃ garuḍavāhanamarcayanti te sarvapāpanikaraiḥ parito vimuktā viṣṇoḥ padaṃ śubhataraṃ pratiyānti hṛṣṭāḥ  NarP ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāvarajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti dhyānena tena hatakilbiṣacetanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti  NarP ye mānavā harikathāśravaṇāstadoṣāḥ kṛṣṇāṅghrapadmabhajane ratacetanāśca te vā puṃnati ca jaganti śarīrasaṃgāt saṃbhāṣaṇādapi tato harireva pūjyaḥ  NarP haripūjāparā yatra mahāntaḥ śuddhabuddhayaḥ tatraiva sakalaṃ bhadraṃ yathā nimne jalaṃ dvija  NarP harireva paro bandhurharireva parā gatiḥ harireva tataḥ pūjyo yataścetanyakāraṇam  NarP svargāpavargaphaladaṃ sadānandaṃ nirāmayam pṛjyasya muniśreṣṭha paraṃ śreyo bhaviṣyati  NarP pūjayanti hariṃ ye tu niṣkāmāḥ śuddhamānasāḥ teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā sarvānkāmān prayacchati  NarP yastvetacchṛṇuyādvāpi paṭhedvā susamāhitaḥ sa prāpnotyaśvamedhasya phalaṃ munivarottama  NarP ityetatte samākhyātaṃ haripūjāphalaṃ dvija saṃkocavistarābhyāṃ tu kimanyatkathayāmi te  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmye catvāriṃśo dhyāyaḥnārada uvācaākhyātaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ mune tattvārtha kovida idānīṃ śrotumicchāmi yugānāṃ sthitilakṣaṇam  NarP sanaka uvācasādhu sādhu mahāprājña mune lokopakāraka yugadharmānprabakṣyāmi sarvalokopakārakān  NarP dharmo vivṛddhimāyāti kāle kasmiṃściduttama tathā vināsamāyāti dharṃma eva mahītale  NarP kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti caturyugam divyairdvādaśabhirjñeyaṃ vatsaraistatra sattama  NarP saṃdhyāsandhyāṃśayuktāni yugāni sadṛśāni vai kālato veditavyāni ityuktaṃ tattvā darśibhiḥ  NarP ādye kṛtayugaṃ prāhustatastretāvidhānakam tataśca dvāparaṃ prāhuḥ kalimantyaṃ viduḥ kramāt  NarP devadānavagandharvā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ nāsankṛtayuge vipra sarve devasamāḥ smṛtāḥ  NarP sarve hṛṣṭāśca dharmiṣṭā na tatra krayavikrayau vedānāṃ ca vibhāgaśca na yuge kṛtasaṃjñake  NarP brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ svācāratatparāḥ sadā nārāyaṇaparāstapodhyānaparāyaṇāḥ  NarP kāmādidoṣanirmuktāḥ śamādiguṇatatparāḥ dharmasādhanacittāśca gatāsūyā adāṃbhikāḥ  NarP satyavākyaratāḥ sarve caturāśramadharmiṇaḥ vedādhyayanasaṃpannāḥ sarvaśāstravicakṣaṇāḥ  NarP caturāśramayuktena karmaṇā kālayoninā akāmaphalasaṃyogāḥ prayānti paramāṃ gatim  NarP nārāyaṇaḥ kṛtayuge śuklavarṇaḥ sunirmalaḥ tretādharmānpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ  NarP dharmaḥ pāṇḍuratāṃ yāti tretāyāṃ munisattama haristu raktātāṃ yāti kiñcitkleśānvitā janāḥ  NarP kriyāyogaratāḥ sarve yajñakarmasu niṣṭitāḥ satyavratā dhyānaparāḥ sadādhyānaparāyaṇāḥ  NarP dvipādo vartate dharmo dvāpare ca munīśvara hariḥ pītatvamāyāti vedaścāpi vibhajyate  NarP asatyaniratāścāpi kecittatra dvijottamāḥ brāhmaṇādyāśca varṇāḥ syuḥ kecidrāgādidurguṇāḥ  NarP kecitsvargāpavargārthaṃ viprayajñānprakurvate keciddhanādikāmāśca kecitkalmaṣacetasaḥ  NarP dharmādharmauṃ samau syātāṃ dvāpare viprasattama adharmasya prabhāveṇa kṣīyante ca prajāstathā  NarP alpāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti keciñcāpi munīśvara kecitpuṇyaratān dṛṣṭvā asūyāṃ vipra kurvate  NarP kalisthitiṃ pravakṣyāmi tacchṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ dharmaḥ kaliyuge prāpte pādenaikena vartate  NarP tāmasaṃ yugamāsādya hariḥ kṛṣṇatvameti ca yaḥ kaścidapi dharmātmā yajñācārānkaroti ca  NarP yaḥ kaścidapi puṇyātmā kriyāyogarato bhavet naraṃ dharmarataṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve sūyāṃ prakurvate  NarP vratācārāḥ praṇaśyanti jñānayajñādayastathā upadravā bhaviṣyanti hyadharmasya pravatanāt  NarP asūyāniratāḥ sarve daṃbhācāraparāyaṇāḥ prajāścālpāyuṣaḥ sarvā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge  NarP nārada uvācayugadharmāḥ samākhyātāstvayā saṃkṣepato mune kaliṃ vistarato brūhi tvaṃ hi dharmavidāṃ varaḥ  NarP brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāścamunisattama kimāhārāḥ kimācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge  NarP sanaka uvācaśṛṇuṣva muniśārdūla sarvalokopakāraka kalidharmānpravakṣyāmi vistareṇa yathātatham  NarP sarve dharmā vinaśyanti kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇatvamāgate tasmātkalirmahāghoraḥ sarvapātakasaṃkaraḥ  NarP brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā dharmaparāṅmukhāḥ ghore kaliyuge prāpte dvijā vedaparāṅmukhāḥ  NarP vyājadharmaratāḥ sarve asūyāniratāstathā vṛthāhṝṅkāraduṣṭāśca satyahīnāśca paṇḍitāḥ  NarP ahamevādhika iti sarve pi vivadanti ca adharmalolupāḥ sarvale tathā vaitaṃhikā narāḥ  NarP ataḥ svalpāyuṣaḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge alpāyuṣṭvānmanuṣyāṇāṃ na vidyāgrahaṇaṃ dvija  NarP vidyāgrahaṇaśūnyatvādadharmo vartate punaḥ vyātkrameṇa prajāḥ sarvā mniyante pāpatatparāḥ  NarP brāhmaṇādyāstathā varṇāḥ saṃkīryante parasparam kāmakrodhaparā mūḍhā vṛthāsaṃtāpapīḍitāḥ  NarP śūdratulyā bhaviṣyanti sarve varṇā kalau yuge uttamā nīcatāṃ yānti nīcāścottamatāṃ tathā  NarP rājano dravyaniratāstathā hyanyāyavarttinaḥ pīḍayanti prajāścaiva karairatyarthayojitaiḥ  NarP śavavāhābhaviṣyanti śūdrāṇāṃ ca dvijātayaḥ dharmastrīṣvapi gacchanti patayo jāradharmiṇaḥ  NarP dviṣanti pitaraṃ putrā bhartāraṃ ca striyo khilāḥ paristrīnirataḥ sarve paradravyaparāyaṇāḥ  NarP matsyāmiṣeṇa jīvanti duhṝntaścāpyajīvikām ghore kaliyuge vipra sarve pāparatā janāḥ  NarP satāmasūyāniratāṃ upahāsaṃ prakurvate sarittīreṣu kuddālairvāpayiṣyanti cauṣadhīḥ  NarP pṛthvī niṣphalatāṃ yāti bījaṃ puṣpaṃ vinaśyati veśyālāvaṃyaśīleṣu spṛhā kurvanti yoṣitaḥ  NarP dharmavikrayiṇo viprāḥ striyaśca bhagavikrayāḥ vedavikrayakāścānye śūdrācāraratā dvijāḥ  NarP sādhūnāṃ vidhavānāṃ ca vittānya paharanti ca na vratāni cariṣyanti brāhmaṇā dravyalolupāḥ  NarP dharmācāraṃ parityajya vṛthāvādairviṣajjitāḥ dvijāḥ kurvanti daṃbhārthaṃ pitṛśrāddhādikāḥ kriyāḥ  NarP apātreṣveva dānāni prayacchanti narādhamāḥ dugdhalobhanimittena goṣu prītiṃ ca kurvate  NarP na kurvanti tathā viprāḥ snānaśaucādikāḥ kriyāḥ apātreṣveva dānāni prayacchanti narādhamāḥ  NarP sādhunindāparāścaiva vipranindāparāstathā na kasyāpi mano vipra viṣṇubhaktiparaṃ bhavet  NarP yajvinaśca dvijānaiva dhanārtharājakiṅkarāḥ tāḍayanti dvijānduṣṭāḥ kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇatvamāgate  NarP dānahīnā narāḥ sarve ghore kaliyuge mune pratigrahaṃ prakurvanti patitānāmapi dvijāḥ  NarP kaleḥ prathamapāde pi viṃnindanti hariṃ narāḥ yugānte ca harernāma naivakaścidvadiṣyati  NarP śūdrastrīsaṃganiratā vidhavāsaṃgalolupāḥ śūdrānnabhoganiratā bhaviṣyanti kalau dvijāḥ  NarP vihāya vedasanmārgaṃ kupathācārasaṃgatāḥ pāṣaṇḍāścabhaviśaṣyanticaturāśramanindakāḥ  NarP na cadvijā tiśuśrūṣāṃ kurvanti caraṇodbhavāḥ dvijātidharmāngṛhṇanti pākhaṇḍaliṅgino dhamāḥ  NarP kāṣāyaparivītāśca jaṭilā bhasmadhūlitāḥ śūdrādharmānpravakṣyantī kūṭayuktaparāyaṇāḥ  NarP dvijāḥsvācāramutḥsṛjyacaparapākānnabhojinaḥ bhaviṣyantidurātmānaḥ śūdrāḥ pravrajitāstathā  NarP utkocajīvinastatra bhaviṣyanti kalau mune dharmaṭīnāstu pāṣaṇḍā kāpālā bhikṣavo dhamāḥ  NarP dharmavidhvaṃsaśīlānāṃ dvijānāṃ dvijasattama śūdrā dharmānpravakṣyantihyadhiruhyottamāsanam  NarP ete cānyeca bahavo nagnaraktapaṭādikāḥ pāṣaṇḍāḥ pracāriṣyanti prāyo vedavidūṣakāḥ  NarP gītavāditrakuśalāḥ kṣudradharmasamāśrayāḥ bhaviṣyantikalau prāyo dharmavidhvaṃsakā narāḥ  NarP alpadravyā vṛthāliṅgā vṛthāhṝṅkāradūṣitāḥ hartāraṃ paravittānāṃ bhavitāro narādhamāḥ  NarP pratigrahaparā nityaṃ jagadunmārgaśīlinaḥ ātmastutiparāḥ sarve paranindāparāstathā  NarP viśvastaghātinaḥ krūrā dayādharmavivarjitāḥ bhaviṣyanti narā vipra kalau cādharmabāndhavāḥ  NarP paramāyuśca bhavitā tadā varṣāṇi ṣoḍaśa ghore kaliyuge vipra pañcavarṣā prasūyate  NarP saptavarṣāṣṭavarṣāśca yuvāno taḥ pare jarā svakarmatyāginaḥ sarve kṛtaghnābhinnavṛttayaḥ  NarP yācakāścadvijā nityaṃ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge parāvamānaniratāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ paraveśmani  NarP tatraiva nindāniratā vṛthāviśraṃbhiṇo janāḥ nidāṃ kurvanti satataṃ pitṛmātṛsuteṣu ca  NarP vadanti vācā dharmāṃśca cetasā pāpalolupāḥ dhanavidyāvayomattāḥ sarvaduḥkhaparāyaṇāḥ  NarP vyādhitaskaradurbhikṣaiḥ pīḍitā atimāṃyinaḥ prapuṣyanti vṛthaivāmī na vicārya ca duṣkṛtam  NarP dharmamārgapraṇetāraṃ tiraskurvanti pāpinaḥ dharmakārye rataṃ caiva vṛthāviśraṃbhiṇo janāḥ  NarP bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpte rājāno mlecchajātayaḥ śūdrā bhaikṣyaratāścaiva teṣāṃ śuśrūṣaṇe dvijāḥ  NarP na śiṣyo na guruḥ kaścinna putro lana pitā tathā na bhāryā na patiścaiva bhavitāro tra saṃkare  NarP kalau gate bhaviṣyanti dhanāḍhyā api yācakāḥ rasa vikrayiṇaścāpi bhaviṣyanti dvijātayaḥ  NarP dharmakañcukasaṃvītā muniveṣadharā dvijāḥ apaṇyavikrayaratā agamyāgāminastathā  NarP vedanindāparāścaiva dharmaśāstravinindukāḥ śūdravṛttyaiva jīvanti narakārhā dvijā mune  NarP anāvṛṣṭabhayaṃ prāptā gaganāsaktadṛṣṭayaḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau martyāsarve kṣudbhayakātarāḥ  NarP kandaparṇaphalāhārāstāpaṃsā iva mānavāḥ ātmānaṃ tārayiṣyanti anāvṛṣṭyātidukhitāḥ  NarP kāmārtā hrasvadehāśca lubdhā ścādharmatatparāḥ kalau sarve bhaviṣyanti svalpabhāgyā bahuprajāḥ  NarP striyaḥ svapoṣaṇaparā veśyā lāvaṇyaśīlikāḥ pativākyamanādṛtya sadānyagṛhatatparāḥ  NarP duḥśīlā duṣṭaśīleṣu kariṣyinti sadā spṛhām asadvṛttā bhaviṣyanti puruṣeṣu kulāṅganāḥ  NarP caurādibhayabhītāśca kāṣṭayantrāṇi kurvate durbhikṣakarapīḍābhiratīvopadrutā janāḥ  NarP godhūmānnayavānnāḍhye deśe yāsyanti duḥkhitāḥ nidhāya hṛdyakarmaṇi prerayanti vacaḥ śubham  NarP svakāryasiddhiparyantaṃ bandhutāṃ kurvate janāḥ bhikṣavaścāva mitrādisnehasaṃbandhayantritāḥ  NarP annopādhinimittena śiṣyāngṛhṇanti bhikṣavaḥ  NarP ubhābhyāmatha pāṇibhyāṃ śiraḥkaṇḍūyanaṃ striyaḥ kurvantyo gurubhartṛāṇāmājñāmullaṅghayanti ca  NarP pāṣaṇḍālāpaniratāḥ pāṣaṇḍajanasaṃginaḥ yadā dvijā bhaviṣyanti tadā vṛddhiṃ kalirvrajet  NarP yadā prajā na yakṣyanti na hoṣyanti dvijātayaḥ tadaiva tu kalervṛddhiranumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ  NarP adharmavṛddhirbhavitā bāsamṛtyurapi dvijā sarvadharmeṣu naṣṭeṣu yāti niḥśrīkatāṃ jagat  NarP evaṃ kaleḥ svarūpaṃ te kathitaṃ viprasattama haribhaktiparāneṣa na kalirbādhate kvacit  NarP tataḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyuge tretāyāṃ dhyānameva ca dvāpare yajñamevāhurdānamekaṃ kalau yuge  NarP yatkṛte daśabhirvarṣaistretāyāṃ śaradā ca yat dvāpare yañca māsena hyahorātreṇa tatkalau  NarP dhyāyankṛte jayanyajñaistretāyāṃ dvāparercayan yadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam  NarP ahorātraṃ harernāma kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ kurvanti haripūjāṃ vā na kalirbādhate ca tān  NarP namo nārāyaṇāyeti kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ niṣkāmā vā sakāmā vā na kalirbādhate ca tān  NarP harināmaparā ye tu ghore kaliyuge dvija ta eva kṛtakṛtyāśca na kalirbādhate hi tān  NarPharipūjāparā ye ca harināmaparāyaṇāḥ ta eva śivatulyāśca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  NarP samastajagadādhāraṃ paramārthasvarupiṇam ghore kaliyuge prāpte viṣṇuṃ dhyāyanna sīdati  NarP aho ati subhāgyāste sakṛdvai keśavārcakāḥ ghore kaliyuge prāpte sarvadharmavivarjite  NarP nyūnātiriktadoṣāṇāṃ kalau vedoktakarmaṇām harismaraṇamevātra saṃpūrṇatvavidhāyakam  NarP hare keśava govinda vāsudeva jaganmaya itīrayanti ye nityaṃ nahi tānbādhate kaliḥ  NarP śiva śaṅkara rudreśa nīlakaṇṭha trilocana iti jalpanti ye vāpi kalistānnāpi bādhate  NarP mahādeva virūpākṣa gaṅgādhara mṛḍāvyaya itthaṃ vadanti ye vipra te kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ  NarP janārdana jagannāta pītāṃbaradharācyuta iti vāpyuñcarantīha na ca teṣāṃ kalerbhayam  NarP saṃsāre sulabhāḥ puṃsāṃ putradāradhanādayaḥ ghore kaliyuge vipra haribhaktastu durlabhā  NarP karmaśraddhāvihīnā ye pāṣaṇḍā vedanindakāḥ adharmaniratā naiva narakārhā harismṛteḥ  NarP vedamārgabahiṣṭānāṃ janānāṃ pāpakarmaṇām manaḥ śuddhivihīnānāṃ harināmnaiva niṣkṛtiḥ  NarP daivādhīnaṃ jagatsarvamidaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam yathāpreritametena tathaiva kuruteṃ dvija  NarP śaktitaḥ sarvakarmāṇi vedoktāni vidhāya ca samarpayenmahāviṣṇau nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ  NarP samarpitāni karmāṇi mahaviṣṇau parātmani saṃpūrṇatāṃ prayāntyeva harismaraṇamātrataḥ  NarP haribhaktiratānāṃ ca pāpabandho na jāyate ato tidurlabhā loke haribhaktirdurātmanām  NarP aho hariparā ye tu kalau ghore bhayaṅkare te subhāgyā mahātmānaḥ satsaṃgara hitā api  NarP harismaraṇaniṣṭānāṃ śivanāmaratātmanām satyaṃ samastakarmāṇi yānti saṃpūrṇatāṃ dvija  NarP aho bhāgyamaho bhāgyaṃ harināma ratātmanām tridarśerapi te pūjyāḥ kimanyairbahubhāṣitaiḥ  NarP tasmātsamastalokānāṃ hitameva mayocyate harināmaparānmartyānna kalirbādhartakvacit  NarP harernāmaiva nāmaiva nāmaiva mama jīvanam kalau nāstyeva nāstyeva gatiranyathā  NarP sūta uvācaevaṃ sa nārado viprāḥ sanakena prabodhitaḥ parāṃ nirvṛttimāpannaḥ punaretaduvāca ha  NarP nārada uvācabhagavansarvaśāstrajña svayātikaruṇātmanā prakāśitaṃ jagajjyotiḥ paraṃ brahma sanātanam  NarP etadeva paraṃ puṇyametadeva paraṃ tapaḥ yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sarvapāpavināśanam  NarP brahmannānājagañcaitadekacitsaṃprakāśitam tvayoktaṃ tatpratīye haṃ kathaṃ dṛṣṭāntamantarā  NarP tasmādyena yathā brahma pratītaṃ bodhitena tu tadākhyāhi yathā cittaṃ sīdatsthitimavāpnuyāt  NarP etacchrutvā vaco viprā nāradasya mahātmanaḥ sanakaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ smarannārāyaṇaṃ param  NarP sanaka uvācabrahmannahaṃ dhyānaparo bhaveyaṃ sanandanaṃ pṛccha yathābhilāṣam vedāntaśāstre kuśalastavāyaṃ nivartayedvā paramāryavandyaḥ  NarP itīritaṃ samākarṇya sanakasya sa nāradaḥ sanandanaṃ mokṣadharmānpraṣṭuṃ samupacakrame  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde nāmamahātmyannāmaikacatvāriṃśo dhyāyaḥśrīnārada uvācakutaḥ sṛṣṭamidaṃ brahmañjagatsthāvarajaṅgamam pralaye ca kamabhyeti tanme brūhi sanandana  NarP sasāgaraḥ sagaganaḥ saśailaḥ sabalāhakaḥ sabhūmiḥ sāgnipavano loko yaṃ kena nirmitaḥ  NarP kathaṃ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni kathaṃ varṇavibhaktayaḥ śaucāśaucaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ dharmādharmavidhiḥ katham  NarP kīdṛśo jīvatāṃ jīvaḥ kva vā gacchanti ye mṛtāḥ asmāllokādamuṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃsatu me bhavān  NarP sanandana uvācaśṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi cetihāsaṃ purātanam bhṛguṇābhihitaṃ śāstraṃ bharadvājāya pṛcchate  NarP kailāsaśikhare dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṃ mahaujasam bhṛgumaharṣimāsīnaṃ bharadvājo nvapṛcchata  NarP bharadvāja uvācakathaṃ jīvo vicarati nānāyoniṣu saṃtatam kathaṃ muktiśca saṃsārājjāyate tasya mānada  NarP yaśca nārāyaṇaḥ sraṣṭā svayaṃbhūrbhagavansvayam sevyasevakabhāvena vartete iti tau sadā  NarP praviśanti laye sarve yamīśaṃ sacarācarāḥ lokānāṃ ramaṇaḥ so yaṃ nirguṇaśca nirañjanaḥ  NarP anīrdaśyo pratarkyaśca kathaṃ jñāyeta kairmune kathamenaṃ parātmānaṃ kālaśaktiduranvayam  NarP atarkyacaritaṃ vedāḥ stuvanti kathamādarāt jīvo jīvatvamullaṅghya kathaṃ brahma samanvayāt  NarP etadicchāmyahaṃ śrotuṃ tanme brūhi kṛpānirgha evaṃ sa bhagavānpṛṣṭo bharadvājena saṃśayam  NarP maharṣirbrahmasaṃkāśaḥ sarvaṃ tasmai tato bravīt bhṛguruvācamānaso nāma yaḥ pūrvo viśruto ve maharṣibhiḥ  NarP anādinidhano devastathā tebhyo jarāmaraḥ avyakta iti vikhyātaḥ śāśvato thākṣayo vyayaḥ  NarP yataḥ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni jāyante ca mriyanti ca so mṛjatprathamaṃ devo mahāntaṃ nāma nāmataḥ  NarP ākāśamiti vikhyātaṃ sarvabhūtadharaḥ prabhuḥ ākāśādabhavadvāri salilādagnimārutau  NarP agnimārutasaṃyogāttataḥ samabhavanmahī tatastejo mayaṃ divyaṃ padmaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā  NarP tasmātpadmātsamabhavadvrahmā vedamayo vidhiḥ ahṝṅkāra iti khyātaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhūtakṛt  NarP brahmā vai sa mahātejā ya ete pañca dhātavaḥ śailāstasyāsthisaṃdhāstu medo masiṃ ca medinī  NarP samudrāstasya rudhiramākāśamudaraṃ tathā pavanaścaiva niśvāsastejo gnirnimnagāḥ śirāḥ  NarP agnīṣomau ca candrākārai nayane tasya viśrute nabhaścordhvaśirastasya kṣitiḥ padau bhujau diśaḥ  NarP durvijñeyo hyacintyātmā siddhairapi na saṃśayaḥ sa eṣa bhagavānviṣṇurananta iti viśrutaḥ  NarP sarvabhūtātmabhūtastho durvijñeyo kṛtātmabhiḥ ahṝṅkārasya yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtabhaghavāyavai tataḥ samabhavadviśvaṃ pṛṣṭo haṃ yadiha tvayā  NarP bhagdvāja uvācagaganasya diśāṃ caiva bhūtalasvānilasya ca kānyatra parimāṇāni saṃśayaṃ chindhi tattvataḥ  NarP bhṛguruvācaanantametadākāśaṃ siddhadaivatasovitam ramyaṃ nānāśrayākīrṇaṃ yasyāṃ to nādhigamyate  NarP ūrdhvaṃ gateradhastāttu candrādityau na paśyataḥ tatra devāḥ svayaṃ dīptā bhāskarābhāgnivarcasaḥ  NarP te cāpyantaṃ na paśyanti nabhasaḥ prathitaujasaḥ durgamatvādanantatvāditi me vada mānada  NarP upariṣṭopariṣṭāttu pjvaladbhiḥ svayaṃprabhaghaiḥ niruddhametadākāśaṃ hyaprameyaṃ surairapi  NarP prathivyante samudrāstu samudrānte tamaḥ smṛtam tamasoṃte jalaṃ prāhurjalasyānte gnireva ca  NarP rasātalānte salilaṃ jalānte pannagādhipāḥ tadante punarākāśamākāśānte punarjalam  NarP evamantaṃ bhagavataḥ pramāṇaṃ salilasya ca agnimārutatoyebhyo durjñeyaṃ daivatairapi  NarP agnimārutatoyānāṃ varṇā kṣititalasya ca ākāśasadṛśā hyete bhidyante tattvadaśanāt  NarP paṭhanti caiva munayaḥ śāstreṣu vividheṣu ca trailokye sāgare caiva pramāṇaṃ vihitaṃ yathā  NarP adṛśyo yastvagamyo yaḥ kaḥ pramāṇa mudīrayet siddhānāṃ devatānāṃ ca parimītā yadā gatiḥ  NarP tadāgaṇyamanantasya nāmānanteti viśrutam nāmadheyānurupasya mānasasya mahātmanaḥ  NarP yadā tu divyaṃ yadrūpaṃ hrasate varddhate punaḥ ko nyastadvedituṃ śakyo yo pi syāttadvidho paraḥ  NarP tataḥ puṣkarataḥ saṣṭaḥ sarvajño mūrtimānprabhuḥ brahmā dharmamayaḥ pūrvaḥ prajāpatiranuttamaḥ  NarP bharadvāja uvācapuṣkaro yadi saṃbhūto jyeṣṭaṃ bhavati puṣkaram brahmāṇaṃ pūrvajaṃ cāha bhavānsaṃdeha eva me  NarP bhṛguruvācamānasasyeha yā mūrtirbrahmatvaṃ samupāgatā tasyāsanavidhānārthaṃ pṛthivī padmamucyate  NarP karṇikā tasya padmasya merurgaganamucchritaḥ tasya madhye sthito lokānsṛjatyeṣa jagadvidhiḥ  NarP bharadvāja uvācaprajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ kathaṃ sa sṛjati prabhuḥ merumadhye sthito brahmā tadvahirdvijasattama  NarP bhṛguruvācaprajāvisargaṃ na śyanti tenadaṃ sarvamāvṛttam pṛthivī parvatā meghā mūrtimantaśca ye pare sarvaṃ tadvāruṇaṃ jñeyamāpastastaṃbhire punaḥ  NarP bharadvāja uvācakathaṃ salilamutpannaṃ kathaṃ caivāgnimārutau kathaṃ vā NarP saṃdhiṣvapi ca sarveṣu saṃniviṣṭastathānilaḥ śarīreṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ vyāna ityupadiśyate  NarP bāhuṣvagnistu vitataḥ samānena samīritaḥ rasānvāru doṣāṃśca vartayannati ceṣṭate  NarP apānaprāṇayormadhye prāṇāpānasamīhitaḥ samanvitastvadhiṣṭānaṃ samyak pacati pāvakaḥ  NarP āspaṃhi pāyuparyantamante syādgudasaṃjñite retastasmātprajāyante sarvasrotāṃsi dehinām  NarP prāṇānāṃ sannipātāśca sannipātaḥ prajāyate ūṣmā cāgirīti jñeyo yo nnaṃ pacati dehinām  NarP agnivegavahaḥ prāṇo gudānte pratihanyate sa ūrdhvamāgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakam  NarP pakvāśayastvadho nābhyā ūrdhvamāmāśayaḥ smṛtaḥ nābhimūle śarīrasya sarve prāṇāśca saṃsthitāḥ  NarP prasthitā hṛdayātsarve tiryagūrdhdamadhastathā vahṝntyannarasānnāḍyo daśaprāṇapracoditāḥ  NarP eṣa mārgo pi yogānāṃ yena gacchanti tatpadam jitaklamāḥ samā dhīrā mūrddhanyātmānamādadhan  NarP evaṃ sarveṣu vihitaprāṇāpāneṣu dehinām tasminsamidhyate nityamagniḥ sthālyāmivāhitaḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde jagadutpattivarṇanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo dhyāyaḥbharadvāja uvācayadi prāṇapatirvāyurvāyureva viceṣcate śvasityābhāṣate caiva tato jīvo nirarthakaḥ  NarP ya ūṣmabhāva āgneyo vahninaivopalabhyate agnirjarayate caitattadā jīvo nirarthakaḥ  NarP jantoḥ pramniyamāṇasya jīvo naivopalabhyate vāyureva jahātyenamūṣmabhāvaśca naśyati  NarP yadi vāthumayo jīvaḥ saṃśleṣo yadi vāyunā vāyumañjalavatpaśyedgacchetsaha marudguṇaiḥ  NarP saṃśleṣo yadi vā tena yadi tasmātpraṇaśyati mahārṇavavimuktatvādanyatsalilabhājanam  NarP kṛpe vā salilaṃ dadyātpradīpaṃ vā hutāśane kṣipraṃ praviśya naśyeta yathā naśyatyasau tathā  NarP pañcadhāraṇake hyasmiñcharīre jīvitaṃ kṛtam yeṣāmanyatarābhāvāñcaturṇāṃ nāsti saṃśayaḥ  NarP naśyantyāpo hyanāhārādvāyurucchvāsanigrahāt naśyate koṣṭabhedārthamagrirnaśyatyabhojanāt  NarP vyādhitraṇaparikleśairmedinī caiva śīryate pīḍite nyatare hyeṣāṃ saṃghāto yāti pañcatām  NarP tasminpañcatvamāpanne jīvaḥ kimanudhāvati kiṃ khedayati vā jīvaḥ kiṃ śṛṇoti bravīti ca  NarP eṣā gauḥ paralokasthaṃ tārayiṣyatimāmiti yo dattvā mriyate jantuḥ sā gauḥ kaṃ tārayiṣyati  NarP gauścapratigrahītā ca dātā caiva samaṃ yadā ihaiva vilayaṃ yānti kutasteṣāṃ samāgamaḥ  NarP vihagairupabhuktasya śailāgrātpatitasya ca agninā copayuktasya kutaḥ saṃjīvanaṃ punaḥ  NarP chinnasya yadi vṛkṣasya na mūlaṃ pratirohati jīvanyasya pravartante mṛtaḥ kva punareṣyati  NarP jīvamātraṃ purā sṛṣṭaṃ yadetatparivartate mṛtāḥ praṇaśyanti bījādbījaṃ praṇaśyati  NarP iti me saṃśayo brahmanhṛdaye paridhāvati ta nivartaya sarvajña yatastvāmāśrito hyaham  NarP sanandana uvācaevaṃ pṛṣṭastadānena sa bhṛgarbrahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ punarāhu muniśreṣṭha tatsaṃdehanivṛttaye  NarP bhṛguruvācana prāṇāḥ santi jīvasya dattasya ca kṛtasya ca yāti dehāntaraṃ prāṇī śarīraṃ tu śāntamagnimanindhanam  NarP gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate samidhāmupayogānte yathāgnirnopalabhyate  NarP ākāśānugatatvāddhi durgrāhyo hi nirāśrayaḥ tathā śarīrasaṃtyāge jīvo hyākāśavatsthitaḥ  NarP na naśyate susūkṣmatvādyathā jyotirna saṃśayaḥ prāṇāndhārayate hyagniḥ sa jīva upadhāryatām  NarP vāyusaṃdhāraṇo hyagnirnaśyatyucchvāsanigrahāt tasminnaṣṭe śarīrāgnau tato tu jīvo naivopalabhyate  NarP yadyajīvaśarīraṃ tu pañcabhūtasamanvitam śarīre mānase duḥkha kastāṃ vedayate rujam  NarP śṛṇoti kathitaṃ jīvaḥ karṇābhyāṃna śṛṇoti tat maharṣe manasi vyagre tasmājjīvo nirarthakaḥ  NarP sarve paśyanti yadṛśyaṃ manoyuktena cakṣuṣā manasi vyākule cakṣuḥ paśyannapi na paśyati  NarP na paśyati na cāghrāti na śṛṇoti na bhāṣate na ca smarśamasau vetti nidrāvaśagataḥ punaḥ  NarP hṛṣyati kruddhyate ko tra śocatyudvijate ca kaḥ icchati dhyāyati dveṣṭi vākyaṃ vācayate ca kaḥ  NarP bhṛguruvācataṃ pañcasādhāraṇamatra kiñciccharīrameko vahateṃtarātmā sa vetti gandhāṃśca rasāñchutīśca sparśaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca guṇāṃśca ye lye  NarP pañcātmake pañcaguṇapradarśī sa sarvagātrānugatoṃtarātmā saveti duḥkhāni sukhāni cātra tadviprayogāttu na vetti deham  NarP yadā na rūpaṃ na sparśo noṣyabhavaśca pāvake tadā śānte śarīrāgnau dehatyāgena naśyati  NarP āpomayamidaṃ sarvamāpomūrtiḥ śarīriṇām tatrātmā mānaso brahmā sarvabhūteṣu lokakṛt  NarP ātmānaṃ taṃ vijānīhi sarvalokahitātmakam tasminyaḥ saṃśrito dehe hyabbinduriva puṣkare  NarP kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ lokahitātmakam tamorajaśca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇānimām  NarP acetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti sa śarīrabhedaḥ  NarP evaṃ bhūteṣu sarveṣu gūḍhaścarati sarvadā dṛśyate tvagryā budhyāsūkṣmayā tattvadarśibhiḥ  NarP taṃ pūrvāpararātreṣu yuñjānaḥ satataṃ budhaḥ labdhāhāro viśuddhātmā NarP tasmādbhūmau na tu mahātmabhirañjayati gṛhīto na tveṣa tāvadviśiṣṭo guṇaviśeṣa iti  NarP  naitadbhagavataḥ pratyemi bhavatā tūktaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti lokapravādo hi dvividhaḥ phalodayaḥ gacchati  NarP  api cātra yajñakriyābhirdevatāḥ prīyante nivāpena pitaro vidyābhyāsaśravaṇadhāraṇena ṛṣayaḥ apatyotpādanena prajāpatiriti  NarP lokau cātra bhavataḥvātsalyāḥ sarvabhūtebhyo vāyoḥ na mayi prahariṣyati mṛgānāṃ vada pṛṣṭeṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinaṃ na kim  NarP yeṣāṃ matvā vṛthā cogrāḥ prahitāḥ śitasāyakāḥ sa tvāmahaṃ haniṣyāmi na me jīvanvimokṣyase  NarP ātatāyyasi durbuddhe mama rājyaharo ripuḥ keśidhvaja uvācakhāṇḍikya saṃśayaṃ praṣṭuṃ bhavantamahamāgataḥ  NarP na tvāṃ hṝntuṃ vicāryataitkopaṃ bāṇaṃ ca muñca vā tataḥ sa mantribhiḥ sārddhamekānte sapurohitaḥ  NarP mantrayāmāsa khāṇḍikyaḥ sarvaireva mahāmatiḥ tamūrmantriṇo vadhyo ripureṣa vaśaṅgataḥ  NarP hate tra pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati khāṇḍikyaścāha tānsarvāneva meva na saṃśayaḥ  NarP hate tu pṛthivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati paralokajayastasya pṛthivī sakalā mama  NarP na hanmi cellokajayo mama vayatvaḥsuṃdharā paralokajayo nantaḥ svalpakālo mahījayaḥ  NarP tasmānnainaṃ haniṣye haṃ yatpṛcchati vadāmi tat tatastamabhyupetyāha khāṇḍikyo janako ripum  NarP praṣṭavyaṃ yattvayā sarvaṃ tatpṛccha tvaṃ vadāmyaham tataḥ prāha yathāvṛttaṃ homadhenuvadhaṃ mune  NarP tataśca taṃ sa papraccha prāyaścittaṃ hi tadrūtam sa cācaṣṭa yathānyāyaṃ mune keśidhvajāya tat  NarP prāyaścittamaśeṣaṃ hi yadvai tatra vidhīyate viditārthaḥ sa tenaivamanujñāto mahātmanā  NarP yāgabhūmimupāgatya cakre sarvāṃ kriyāṃ kramat krameṇa vidhivadyāgaṃ nītvā so vabhṛthāplutaḥ  NarP kṛtakṛtyastato bhūtvā cintayāmāsa pārthivaḥ pūjitā ṛtvijaḥ sarve sadasyā mānitā mayā  NarP tathaivārthijano pyarthojito bhimatairmayā yathāhaṃ martyalokasya mayā sarvaṃ vicaṣṭitam  NarP aniṣpannakriyaṃ cetastathā na mama kiṃ yathā itthaṃ tu cintayanneva saṃmāra sa mahīpatiḥ  NarP khāṇḍikyāya na datteti mayā vaigurudakṣiṇā sa jagāma tato bhūyo rathamāruhya pārthivaḥ  NarP svāyaṃbhuvaḥ sthito yatra khāṇḍikyo raṇyadurgamam khāṇḍikyo pi punarddaṣṭvā tamāyāntaṃ dhṛtāyudhaḥ  NarP tasthau hṝntuṃ kṛtamatismamāha sa punarnṛpaḥ ahaṃ tu nāpakārāya prāptaḥ khāṇḍikya mā krudhaḥ  NarP gurorniṣkṛtidānāya māmavehi semāgatam niṣpādito mayā yāgaḥ samyak tvadupadeśataḥ  NarP so haṃ te dātumicchāmi vṛṇīṣva gurudakṣiṇām ityukto mantrayāmāsa sa bhūyo mantribhiḥ saha  NarP gurorniṣkṛtikāmo ya kimayaṃ prārthyatāṃ mayā tamūcurmantriṇo gajyamaśeṣaṃ yācyatāmayam  NarP kṛtābhiḥ prārthyate rājyamanāyāsitasainikaiḥ prāhasya tānāha nṛpaḥ sa khāṇḍikyo mahāpatiḥ  NarP svalpakālaṃ mahīrājyaṃ mādṛśaiḥ prārthyate katham etametadbhaṃvato tra svārtha sādhanamantriṇaḥ  NarP paramārthaḥ kathaṃ ko tra yūyaṃ nātra vicakṣaṇāḥ ityuktvā samupetyaiṃnaṃ sa tu keśidhvajaṃ nṛpam  NarP uvāca kimavaśyaṃ tvaṃ dāsyasi gurudakṣiṇām bāḍhamityeva tenoktaḥ khāṇḍikyastamathābravīt  NarP bhavānadhyātmavijñānaparamārthavicakṣaṇaḥ yadi ceddīyate mahyaṃ bhavatā guruniṣkrayaḥ  NarP tatkleśapraśamāyālaṃ yatkarma tadudīraya keśidhvaja uvācana prārthitaṃ tvayā kasmānmama rājyamakaṇṭakam  NarP rājyalābhāḥ ddhi nāstyanyatkṣatriyāṇāmatipriyam khāṇḍikya uvācakeśidhvaja nibodha tvaṃ mayā na prārthitaṃ yataḥ  NarP rājyametadaśeṣeṇa yanna gṛghranti paṇḍitāḥ kṣatriyāṇāmayaṃ dharmo yatprajāparipālanam  NarP vadhaśca dharmayuddhena svarājyaparipanthinām yatrāśaktasya me doṣo naivāstyapakṛte tvayā  NarP bandhāyaiva bhavatyeṣā hyavidyā cākramojjhitā janmoparbhāgalipsārthamiyaṃ gajyaspṛhā mama  NarP anyeṣāṃ dopajāneva dharmamevānurudhyate na yācñā kṣatrabandhūnāṃ dharmāyaitatsatāṃ matam  NarP ato na yācita rājyamavidyāntargataṃ tava rājyaṃ gṛdhnanti vidvāṃso mamatvākṛṣṭacetasaḥ  NarP ahaṃmānamahya pānamadamattā na mādṛśāḥ keśidhvaja uvācaahaṃ ca vidyayā mṛtyuṃ tartukāmaḥ karomi vai  NarP rājyaṃ yajñāṃśca vividhānbhoge puṇyakṣayaṃ tathā tadidaṃ te mano diṣṭyā vivekaiścaryatāṃ gatam  NarP śrūyatāṃ cāpyavidyāyāḥ svarūpaṃ kulanandana anātmanyātmabuddhiryā hyasve svaviṣayā matiḥ  NarP avidyātarusaṃnbhūtaṃ bījametaddvidhā sthitam pañcabhūtātmake dehe dehī mohatamovṛttaḥ  NarP ahametaditītyuñcaiḥ kurute kumatirmatim ākāśavāyvagrijalapṛthivībhiḥ pṛthak sthite  NarP ātmanyātmamayaṃ bhāvaṃ kaḥ karoti kalevare kalevaropabhogyaṃ hi gṛhakṣetrādikaṃ ca yat  NarP adehe hyātmani prājño mamedamiti manyate itthaṃ ca putrapautreṣu taddehotpāditeṣu ca  NarP karoti paṇḍitaḥ svāmyamanātmani kalevare sarvadehopabhogāya kurute karma mānavaḥ  NarP dehaṃ cānyadyadā puṃsaḥsadā bandhāya tatparam mṛṇmayaṃ hi yathā gehaṃ lipyate vai mṛdaṃ bhasā  NarP pārthivo yaṃ tathā deho mṛdaṃbholepanasthitiḥ pañcabhogātmakairbhogaiḥ pañcabhogātmakaṃ vapuḥ  NarP āpyāyate yadi tataḥ puṃso garvo tra kiṅkṛtaḥ anekajanmasāhastraṃ sasārapadavīṃ vrajan  NarP mohaśramaṃ prayāto sau vāsanāreṇuguṇṭhitaḥ prakṣālyate yadā saumya reṇurjñānoṣṇavāriṇā  NarP tadā saṃsārapānthasya yāti mohaśramaḥ śamam mohaśrame śamaṃ yāte svacchāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān  NarP ananyātiśayādhāraḥ paraṃ nirvāṇamṛcchati nirvāṇamaya evāyamātmā jñānamayo malaḥ  NarP duḥkhājñānamayā dharmāḥ prakṛteste tunātmanaḥ jalasya nāgninā saṃgaḥ sthālīsaṃgāttathāpi hi  NarP śabdodrekādikāndharmānkaroti hi yathā budhaḥ tathātmā prakṛteḥ saṃgādahaṃmānādidūṣitaḥ  NarP bhajate prākṛtāndharmānnyastastaṃbho hi so vyayaḥ tadetatkathitaṃ bījamavidyāyā mayā tava  NarP kleśānāṃ ca kṣayakaraṃ yogādanyanna vidyate  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ṣaṭcatvāriṃśattamo dhyāyaḥsanandana uvācaetadadhyātmamānāḍhyaṃ vacaḥ keśidhvajasya saḥ khāṇḍikyo mṛtavacchratvā punarāha tamīrayan  NarP khāṇḍikya uvācatad brūhi tvaṃ mahābhāga yogaṃ yogaviduttama vijñātayo gaśāstrārthastvamasyāṃ nimisaṃtatau  NarP keśidhvaja uvācayogasvarūpaṃ khāṇḍikya śrūyatāṃ gadato mama yatra sthito na cyavate prāpya brahmalayaṃ muniḥ  NarP mana eva manuṣyāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bandhamokṣayoḥ bandhasya viṣayāsaṃgi mukternirviṣayaṃ tathā  NarP viṣayebhyaḥ samāhṛtya vijñānātmā budho manaḥ cintayenmuktaye tena brahmabhūtaṃ pareśvaram  NarP ātmabhāvaṃ nayettena tadbrīhyadhyāpanaṃ manaḥ vikāryamātmanaḥ śaktyā lohamākarṣako yathā  NarP ātmaprayatnasāpekṣā viśiṣṭā yā manogatiḥ tasyā brahmaṇi saṃyogo yoga ityabhidhīyate  NarP evamatyantavaiśiṣṭyayuktadharmopalakṣaṇam yasya yogaḥ sa vai yogī mumukṣuramidhīyate  NarP yogayuk prathamaṃ yogī yuñjamāno bhidhīyate viniṣyannasamādhistu parabrahmopalabdhimān  NarP yadyantarāyadoṣeṇa dūṣyate nāsya mānasam janmāntarairabhyasanānmuktiḥ pūrvasya jāyate  NarP viniṣpannasamādhistu muktistatraiva janmani prāpnoti yogī yogāgnidagdhakarmacayo cirāt  NarP brahmacaryamahiṃsāṃ ca satyāsteyāparigrahān seveta yogī niṣkāmo yigitāṃ svamano nayan  NarP svādhyāyaśaucasaṃtoṣatapāṃsi niyamānyamān kurvvīta brahmaṇi tathā parisminpravaṇaṃ manaḥ  NarP ete yamāśca niyamāḥ pañca pañcaprakīrtitāḥ viśiṣṭaphaladāḥ kāmyā niṣkāmānāṃ vimuktidāḥ  NarP evaṃ bhadrāsanādīnāṃ samāsthāya guṇairyutaḥ yamākhyairniyamākhyaiśca yuñjīta niyato yatiḥ  NarP prāṇākhyamavalaṃbasthamabhyāsātkurute tu yat prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sabījo bīja eva ca  NarP paraspareṇābhibhavaṃ prāṇāpānau yadā nilau kurutaḥ sadvidhānena tṛtīyaḥ saṃyamāttayoḥ  NarP tasya cāṃlabanavatsthūlaṃ rūpaṃ dviṣatpate ālaṃbanamanantasya yogino bhyasataḥ smṛtam  NarP śabdādiṣvanuraktāni nigṛhyākṣāṇi yogavit kuryyāñcittānukārīṇi pratyāhāraparāyaṇaḥ  NarP vaśyatā paramā tena jāyate niścalā tmanām indriyāṇāmavaśyaistairna yogī yogasādhakaḥ  NarP prāṇāyāmena pavanaiḥ pratyāhareṇa cendriyaiḥ vaśīkṛtaistataḥ kuryātsthiraṃ cetaḥ śubhāśraye  NarP khāṇḍikya uvācakathyatāṃ me mahābhāga cetaso yaḥ śubhāśrayaḥ yadādhāramaśeṣaṃ tu hṝnti doṣasamudbhavam  NarP keśidhvaja uvācaāśrayaścetaso jñānin dvidhā tañca svarūpataḥ rūpaṃ mūrtamamūrtaṃ ca paraṃ cāparameva ca  NarP trividhā bhāvanā rūpaṃ viśvametattridhocyate brahmākhyā karmasaṃjñā ca tathā caivobhayātmikā  NarP karmabhāvātmikā hyekā brahmabhāvātmikāparā ubhayātmikā tathaivānyā trividhā bhāvabhāvanā  NarP sanakādyā sadā jñānin brahmabhāvanayā yutāḥ karmabhāvanayā cānye devādyāḥ sthāvarāścarāḥ  NarP hiraṇyagarbhādiṣu ca brahmakarmātmikā dvidhā adhikārabodhayukteṣu vidyate bhāvabhāvanā  NarP akṣīṇeṣu samasteṣu viśeṣajñānakarmasu viśvametatparaṃ cānyadbhedabhinnadṛśāṃ nṛpa  NarP pratyastamitabhedaṃ
