uvāca harṣasaṃyuktaḥ smaranbhagharataceṣṭitam  NarP sanandana uvācaatra te kathayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam yaṃ śrutvā tvanmano bhrāntamāsthānaṃ labhate bhūśam  NarP āsītpurā muniśreṣṭha bharato nāma bhūpatiḥ ārṣabho yasya nāmnedaṃ bhārataṃ khaṇḍamucyate  NarP sa rājā prāptarājyastu pitṛpaitāmahaṃ kramāt pālayāmāsa dharmeṇa pitṛbadrañjayan prajāḥ  NarP rddaje ca vividhairyajñairbhagavantamadhokṣajam sarvadevātmakaṃ dhyāyannānākarmasu tanmatiḥ  NarP tataḥ samutpādya sutānvirakto viṣayeṣu saḥ muktvā rājyaṃ yayau vidvānpulastyapuhāśramam  NarP śālagrāmaṃ mahākṣetraṃ mumukṣujanasevitam tatrāsau tāpaso tāpaso bhūtvā viṣṇorārādhanaṃ mune  NarP cakāra bhaktibhāvena yathālabdhasaparyayā nityaṃ prātaḥ samāplutya nirmale bhali nārada  NarP upatiṣṭedraviṃ bhaktyā gṛṇanbrahmākṣaraṃ param athāśrame samāgatya vāsudevaṃ jagatpatim  NarP samāhṛtaiḥ svayaṃ dravyaiḥ samitkuśamṛdādibhiḥ phalaiḥ puṣpaiṃstathā patraistulasyāḥ svacchavāribhiḥ  NarP pūjayanprayato bhūtvā bhaktiprasarasaṃplutaḥ sacaikadā mahābhāgaḥ snātvā prātaḥ samāhitaḥ  NarP cakranadyāṃ japaṃstasthau muhurtatrayamaṃbuni athājagāma tattīraṃ jalaṃ pātuṃ pipāsitā  NarP āsannapsavā brahmannaikaiva hiṇī vanāt tataḥ samabhavattatra pītaprāye jale tayā  NarP siṃhasya nādaḥ sumahān sarvaprāṇibhayaṅkaraḥ tataḥ sā siṃhasannādādutplutā nimnagātaṭam  NarP atyuñcārohaṇenāsyā nadyāṃ garbhaḥ papāta ha tamuhyamānaṃ vegena vīcimālāpariplutam  NarP jagrāha bharato garbhātpatitaṃ mṛgapotakam garbhapracyutiduḥkhena prottuṅgākraṇena ca  NarP munīndra sā tu hariṇī nipapāta mamāra ca hariṇīṃ tāṃ vilokyātha vipannāṃ nṛpatāpasaḥ  NarP mṛgapotaṃ samāgṛhya svamāśramamupāgataḥ cakārānudinaṃ cāsau mṛgapotasya vai nṛpaḥ  NarP poṣaṇaṃ puṣyamāṇaśca sa tena vavṛdhe mune cacārāśramaparyantaṃ tṛṇāni gahaneṣu saḥ  NarP dūraṃ gatvā ca śārdūlatrāsādabhyāyayau punaḥ prātargatvādidūraṃ ca sāyamāyātyathāśramam  NarP punaśca bharatasyābhūdāśramasyoṭajāntare tasyatasminmṛge dūrasamīpaparivartini  NarP āsīñcetaḥ samāsaktaṃ na tathā hyacyute mune vimuktarājyatanayaḥ projjhitāśeṣabāndhavaḥ  NarP mamatva sa cakāroñcaistasminhariṇapotake kiṃ vṛkaibhakṣito vyāghnaiḥ kiṃ siṃhena nipātitaḥ  NarP cirāyamāṇe niṣkānte tasyāsīditi mānasam prītiprasannavadanaḥ pārśvasthe cābhavanmṛge  NarP samādhibhaṅgastasyāsīnmamatvākṛṣṭamānasaḥ kālena gacchatā so tha kālaṃ cakre mahīpatiḥ  NarP piteva sāstraṃ putreṇa mṛgapotena vīkṣitaḥ mṛgameva tadādrākṣīttyajanprāṇānasāvapi  NarP mṛgo babhūva sa mune tādṛśīṃ bhāvanāṃ gataḥ jāti smaratvādudvignaḥ saṃsārasya dvijottama  NarP vihāya mātaraṃ bhūyaḥ śālagrāmamupāyayau śuṣkaistṛṇaistathā parṇaiḥ sa kurvannātmapoṣaṇam  NarP mṛgatvahetubhūtasya karmaṇo niṣkṛtiṃ yayau tatra cotsṛṣṭadeho sau jajñe jātismaro dvijaḥ  NarP sadācāravatāṃ śuddhe yāgināṃ pravare kule sarvavijñāna saṃpannaḥ sarvaśāstrārthatattvavit  NarP apaśyatsa muniśreṣṭhaḥ svātmānaṃ prakṛteḥ param ātmanodhigatajñānāddvevādīni mahāmune  NarP sarvabhūtānyabhe dena dadarśa sa mahāmatiḥ na papāṭha guruproktaṃ kṛtopanayanaḥ śrutam  NarP na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca ukto pi bahuśaḥ kiñcijjaṇḍa vākyamabhāṣata  NarP tadapyasaṃskāraguṇaṃ grāmabhāṣoktisaṃyutam apaddhastavapuḥ so pi malināṃbaradhṛṅ mune  NarP klinnadantāntaraḥ sarvaiḥ paribhūtaḥ sa nāgaraiḥ saṃmānena parāṃ hāniṃ yogarddheḥ kurute yataḥ  NarP janenāvamato yogī yogasiddhiṃ ca vindati tasmāñcareta vai yogī satāṃ dharmamadūṣayan  NarP janā yathāvamanyeyurgaccheyurnaiva saṃgatim hiraṇyagarbhavacanaṃ vicintyetthaṃ mahāmatiḥ  NarP ātmānaṃ darśayāmāsa jaḍonmattākṛtiṃ jane bhuṅkte kulmāṣavaṭakān śākaṃ tranyaphalaṃ kaṇān  NarP yadyadāpnoti sa bahūnatti vai kālasaṃbhavam pitaryuparate so tha bhrātṛbhrātṛvyabāndhavaiḥ  NarP kāritaḥ kṣetrakarmādi kadannāhārapoṣitaḥ sarūkṣapīnāvayavo jaḍakārī ca karmaṇi  NarP sarvalokopakaraṇaṃ babhūvāhāravetanaḥ taṃ tādṛśamasaṃskāraṃ viprākṛtiviceṣṭitam  NarP kṣattā sauvīrarājyasya viṣṭiyogyamamanyata sa rājā śibikārūḍho gantuṃ kṛtamatirdvija  NarP babhūvekṣumatītīre kapilarṣervarāśramam śreyaḥ kimatra saṃsāre duḥkhaprāye nṛṇāmiti  NarP praṣṭuṃ taṃ mokṣadharmajñaṃ kapilākhyaṃ mahāmunim uvāha śibikāmasya kṣatturvacanacoditaḥ  NarP nṛṇāṃ viṣṭigṛhītānāmanyeṣāṃ so pi madhyagaḥ gṛhīto viṣṭinā vipra sarvajñānaikabhājanam  NarP jātismaro sau pāpasya kṣayakāma uvāha tām yayau jaḍagatistatra yugamātrāvalokanam  NarP kurvanmatimatāṃ śreṣṭhaste tvanye tvaritaṃ yayuḥ vilokya nṛpatiḥ so tha viṣamaṃ śibikāgatam  NarP kimetadityāha samaṃ gamyatāṃ śibikāvahāḥ punastathaiva śibikāṃ vilokya viṣamāṃ hasan  NarP nṛpaḥ kime tadityāha bhavadbhirgamyate nyathā bhūpatervadatastasya śrutvetthaṃ bahuśo vacaḥ śibikāvāhakāḥ procurayaṃ yātītyasatvaram  NarP rājovācakiṃ śrānto syalpamadhvānaṃ tvayoḍhā śibikā mama kimāyāsasaho na tvaṃ pīvā nāsi nirīkṣyase  NarP brāhmaṇa uvācanāhaṃ pīvā na caivoḍhā śibikā bhavato mayā na śrānto smi na cāyāso voḍhānyo sti mahīpate  NarP rājovācapratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate pīvātvadyāpi śibikā tvayi śramaśca bhāro dvahane bhavatyeva hi dehinām  NarP brāhmaṇa uvācapratyakṣaṃ bhavatā bhūpa yaddṛṣṭaṃ mama tadvada balavānabalaśceti vācyaṃ paścādviśeṣaṇam  NarP tvayoḍhā śibikā ceti tvayyadyāpi ca saṃsthitā mithyā tadapyatra bhavān śṛṇotu vacanaṃ mama  NarP bhūmau pādayugaṃ cātha jaṅghe pādadvaye sthite ūru jaṅghādvayāvasthau tadādhāraṃ tathodaram  NarP vakṣasthalaṃ tathā bāhū skandhau codarasaṃsthitau skandhāśritayeṃ śibikā mamādhāro tra kiṅkṛtaḥ  NarP śibikāyāṃ sthitaṃ cedaṃ dehaṃ tvadupalakṣitam tatra tvamahamapyatretyucyate cedamanyathā  NarP ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye ca bhūtairuhyāśca pārthiva guṇapravāhapatito bhūtavargo pi yātyayam  NarP karmavaśyā guṇaścaite sattvādyāḥ pṛthivīpate avidyāsaṃcitaṃ karmataścāśeṣeṣu jantuṣu  NarP ātmā śuddho kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛte paraḥ pravṛddhyapacayau na sta ekasyākhilajantuṣu  NarP yadā nopacayastasya nacaivāpacayo nṛpa tadāpi bāliśo si tvaṃ kayā yuktyā tvayeritam  NarPbhūpādajaṅghākaṭyūrujaṭharādiṣu saṃsthitā śibikeyaṃ yadā skandhe tadā bhāraḥ samastvayā  NarP tathānyajantubhirbhūpa śibikoḍhāna kevalam śailadrumagṛhottho pi pṛthivīsaṃbhavo pi ca  NarP yathā puṃsaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ prākṛtaiḥ karaṇairnṛpa soḍhavyaḥ sumahānbhāraḥ katamo nṛpa te mayā  NarP yaddravyo śibikā ceyaṃ taddravyo bhūtasaṃgrahaḥ bhavato me khilasyāsya samatvenopabṛṃhitaḥ  NarP sanandana uvācaevamuktvābhavaṃnmaunī sa vahañśibikāṃ dvijaḥ so pi rājāvatīryorvyāṃ tatpādau jagṛhe tvaran  NarP rājovācabho bho visṛjya śibikāṃ prasādaṃ kuru me dvija kathyatāṃ ko bhavānatra jālmarupadharaḥ sthitaḥ  NarP yo bhavānyadapatyaṃ vā yadāgamanakāraṇam tatsarvaṃ kathyatāṃ vidvanmahyaṃ śuśrūṣave tvayā  NarP brāhmaṇa uvācaśrūyatāṃ ko hamityetadvaktuṃ bhūpa na śakyate upayoganimittaṃ ca sarvatrāgamanakriyā  NarP sukhaduḥkhopabhogau tu tau dehādyupapādakau dharmādharmodbhavau bhoktuṃ janturdehādimṛcchati  NarP sarvasyaiva hi bhūpāla jantoḥ sarvatra kāraṇam dharmādharmauṃ yatastasmātkāraṇaṃ pṛcchyate kutaḥ  NarP rājovācadharmādharmauṃ na saṃdehaḥ sarvakāryeṣu kāraṇam upabhoganimittaṃ ca dehāddehāntarāgamaḥ  NarP yattvetadbhavatā proktaṃ ko hamityetadātmanaḥ vaktuṃ na śakyate śrotuṃ tanmameccā pravartate  NarP yo sti yo hamiti brahmankathaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate ātmanyeva na doṣāya śabdo hamiti yo dvijā  NarP brāhmaṇa uvācaśabdo hamiti doṣāya nātmanyevaṃ tathaiva tat anātmanyātmavijñānaṃ śabdo vā śrutilakṣaṇaḥ  NarP jihvā bravītyahamiti dantauṣṭatāluka nṛpa etenāhaṃ yataḥ sarve vāṅniṣpādanahetavaḥ  NarP kiṃ hetubhirvadūtyeṣā vāgevāhamiti svayam tathāpi vāgahamedvaktumitthaṃ na yujyate  NarP piṇḍaḥ pṛthagyataḥ puṃsaḥ śiraḥpāṇyādilakṣaṇaḥ tato hamiti kutraināṃ saṃjñāṃ rājankaromyaham  NarP yadyanyo sti paraḥ ko pi mattaḥ pārthivasattam na deho hamayaṃ cānye vaktumevamapīṣyate  NarP yadā samastadeheṣu pumāneko vyavasthitaḥ tadadā hi ko bhavānko hamityetadviphalaṃ vacaḥ  NarP tvaṃ rājā śibikā ceyaṃ vayaṃ vāhāḥ puraḥ sarāḥ ayaṃ ca bhavato loko na sadetannṛpocyate  NarP vṛkṣāddāru tataśceyaṃ śibikā tvadadhiṣṭitā kva vṛkṣasaṃjñā vai tasyā dārusaṃjñāthavā nṛpa  NarP vṛkṣārūḍho mahārājo nāyaṃ vadati te janaḥ na ca dāruṇi sarvastvāṃ bravīti śibikāgatam  NarP śibikādārusaṃghāto svanāmasthitisaṃsthitaḥ anviṣyatāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭhānandadāśibikā tvayā  NarP evaṃ chatraṃ śalākābhyaḥ pṛthagbhāvo vimṛśyatām kva jātaṃ chatramityeṣa nyāyastvayi tathā mayi  NarP pumānstrī gaurajā bājī kuñjaro vihagastaruḥ deheṣu lokasaṃjñeyaṃ vijñeyā karmahetuṣu  NarP pumānna devo na naro na paśurna ca pādapaḥ śarīrākṛtibhedāstu bhūpaite karmayonayaḥ  NarP vastu rājeti yalleke yañca rājabhaṭātmakam tathānyaśca nṛpetthaṃ tanna satyaṃ kalpanāmayam  NarP yastu kālāntareṇāpi nāśasaṃjñāmupaiti vai pariṇāmādisaṃbhūtaṃ tadvastu nṛpa tañca kim  NarP tvaṃ rājā sarvasokasya pituḥ putro ripo ripuḥ patnyāḥ patiḥ pitā sūnoḥ kastvaṃ bhūpa vadāmyaham  NarP tvaṃ kimetacciraḥ kiṃ tu śirastava tatho daram kimu pādādikaṃ tvetannaiva kiṃ te mahīpate  NarP samastāvayavebhyastvaṃ pṛthagbhūto vyavasthitaḥ ko hamityatra nipuṇaṃ bhūtvā cintaya pārthiva  NarP evaṃ vyavasthite tattve mayāhamiti bhāvitum pṛthakūcaraṇaniṣpādyaṃ śakyaṃ tu nṛpate katham  NarP iti śṛbṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvipāṣṭacatvāriṃśo dhyāyaḥsanandana uvācaniśamya tasyeti vacaḥ paramārthasamanvitam praśrayāvanato bhūtvā tamāha nṛpatirdvijam  NarP rājovācabhagavanyattvayā prokta paramārthamayaṃ vacaḥ śrute tasminbhramantīva manaso mama vṛttayaḥ  NarP etadvivekavijñānaṃ yadi śeṣeṣu jantuṣu bhavatā darśitaṃ vipra tatparaṃ prakṛtermahat  NarP nāhaṃ vahāmi śibikāṃ śibikā mayi na sthitā śarīramanyadasmatto yeneyaṃ śibikā dhṛtā  NarP guṇa pravṛttirbhūtānāṃ pravṛttiḥ karmacoditā pravartante guṇāścaite kiṃ mameti tvayoditam  NarP etasminparamārthajña mama śrotrapathaṃ gate mano vihvalatāmeti paramārthārthatāṃ gatam  NarP pūrvameva mahābhāga kapilarṣimahaṃ dvija praṣṭumabhyudyato gatvā śreyaḥ kintvatra saṃśaye  NarP tadantare ca bhavatā yadidaṃ vākyamīritam tenaiva paramārthārthaṃ tvayi cetaḥ pradhāvati  NarP kapilarṣirbhagavataḥ sarvabhūtasya vai kila viṣṇoraṃśo jaganmohanāśāya samupāgataḥ  NarP sa eva bhagavānnūnamasmākaṃ hitakāmyayā pratyakṣatāmanugatastathaitadbhavatocyate  NarP tanmahyaṃ mohanāśāya yacchreyaḥ paramaṃ dvija tadvadākhila vijñānajalavīcyujadhirbhavān  NarP brāhmaṇa uvācabhūyaḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ śreyaḥ paramārthena pṛcchasi śreyāṃsi paramārthāni hyaśeṣāṇyena bhūpate  NarP devatārādhanaṃ kṛtvā dhanasaṃpadamicchati putrānicchati rājyaṃ ca śreyastasyaiva tannṛpa  NarP vivakinastu saṃyogaḥ śreyo sau paramātmanā karmayajñādikaṃ śreyaḥ svarlokapaladāyi yat  NarP śreyaḥ pradhānaṃ ca phale tadevānabhisaṃhite ātmā dhyeyaḥ sadā bhūpa yogayuktaistathā paraiḥ  NarP śreya stasyaiva saṃyogaḥ śreyo yaḥ paramātmanaḥ śreyāṃsyevamanekāni śataśo tha sahasraśaḥ  NarP saṃtyatra paramārthāstu na tvete śrūyatāṃ ca me dharmo yaṃ tyajate kiṃ tu paramārtho dhanaṃ yadi  NarP vyayaścakriyata kasmātkāmaprāptyupalakṣaṇaḥ mutraścetparamārthākhyaḥ so pyanyasya nareśvara  NarP paramārthabhūtaḥ so nyasya paramārtho hi naḥ pitā evaṃ na paramārtho sti jagatyatra carācare  NarP paramārtho hi kāryāṇi karaṇānāmaśeṣataḥ rājyādiprāptiratroktā paramārthatayā yadi  NarP paramārthā bhavantyatra na bhavanti ca vai tataḥ ṛgyajuḥsāmaniṣpādyaṃ yajñakarma mataṃ tava  NarP paramārthabhūtaṃ tatrāpi śrūyatāṃ gadato mama yattu niṣpādyate kāryaṃ mṛdā kāraṇabhūtayā  NarP tatkāraṇānugamanājjāyate nṛpa mṛnmayam evaṃ vināśibhirdravyaiḥ samidājyakuśādibhiḥ  NarP niṣpādyate kriyā yā tu sā bhavitrī vināśinī anāśī paramārthastu prājñairabhyupagamyate  NarP yattuṃ nāśi na saṃdeho nāśidravyopapāditam tadevāpaladaṃ karma paramārtho mato mama  NarP muktisādhanabhūtatvātparamārtho na sādhanam dhyānamevātmano bhūpaparamārthārthaśabditam  NarP bhedakāri parebhyastu paramārtho na bhedavān paramārthātmanoryogaḥ paramārtha itīṣyate  NarP mithyaitadanyaddravyaṃ hi naitaddravyamayaṃ yataḥ tasmācchreyāṃsyaśeṣāṇi nṛpaitāni na saṃśayaḥ  NarP paramārthastu bhūpāla saṃkṣepācchrūyatāṃ mama eko vyāpī samaḥ śuddho nirguṇa prakṛteḥ paraḥ  NarP janmavṛddhyādirahita ātmā sarvagato nṛpa parijñānamayo sadbhirnāmajātyādibhivibhuḥ  NarP na yogavānna yukto bhūnnaiva pārthivaḥ yokṣyati tasyātmaparadeheṣu sato pyekamayaṃ hi tat  NarP vijñānaṃ paramārtho sau vetti no tathyadarśanaḥ veṇuraṅghravibhedena bhedaḥ ṣaṅjādisaṃjñitaḥ  NarP abhedo vyāpino vāyostathā tasya mahātmanaḥ ekatvaṃ rūpabhedaśca vāhyakarmapravṛttijaḥ  NarP devādibhedamadhyāste nāstyevācaraṇo hi saḥ śṛṇvatra bhūpa prāgvṛttaṃ yadgītamṛbhuṇā bhavet  NarP avabodhaṃ janayato nidādhasya dvijanmanaḥ ṛbhurnāmābavatputro brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭinaḥ  NarP vijñāta tattvasadbhāvo nisargādeva bhūpate tasya śiṣyo nidāgho bhūtpulastyatanayaḥ purā  NarP prādādaśeṣavijñānaṃ sa tasmai parayā mudā avāptajñāna tattvasya na tasyādvaitavāsanā  NarP sa ṛbhustarkayāmāsa nidāghasya nareśvara devikāyāstaṭe vīra nāgaraṃ nāma vai puram  NarP samṛddhamatiramyaṃ ca pulastyena niveśitam ramyopavanaparyantaṃ sa tasminpārthavottama  NarP nidādhanāmāyogajñastasya śiṣyo bhavatpurā divye varṣasahasre tu samatīte sya tatpuram  NarP jagāma sa ṛbhuḥ śiṣyaṃ nidāghamavalokitum sa tasya vaiśvadevanti dvārālokanagocaraḥ  NarP sthita stena gṛhītārtho nijaveśma praveśitaḥ prakṣālitāṅghripāṇiṃ ca kṛtāsanaparigraham  NarP uvāca sa dvijaśreṣṭho bhujyatāmiti sādaram ṛbhuruvācabho vipravarya bhoktavyaṃ yadatra bhavato gṛhe  NarP tatkathyatāṃ kadanneṣu na prītiḥ satataṃ mama nidāgha uvācasaktuyāvakavrīhīnāmapūpānāṃ ca me gṛhe  NarP yadrocate dvijaśreṣṭha tāvadbhuṅkṣva yathecchayā ṛbhuruvācakadannāni dijaitāni miṣṭamannaṃ prayaccha me  NarP saṃyāvapāyasādīni cekṣukā rasavanti ca nidāgha uvācagṛhe śālini madgehe yatkiñcidati śobhanam  NarP bhojyeṣu sādhanaṃ miṣṭaṃ tenāsyānnaṃ prasādhaya ityuktā tena sā patnī miṣṭamannaṃ dvijasya tat  NarP prasādhitavatī tadvai bharturvacanagauravāt na bhuktavantamicchāto miṣṭamannaṃ mahāmunim  NarP nidāghaḥ prāhabhūpāla praśrayāvanataḥ sthitaḥ nidāgha uvācaapi te paramā tṛptirutpannā puṣṭireva  NarP api te mānasaṃ svasthamāhāreṇa kṛtaṃ dvija kva nivāsī bhavānvipra kva vā gantuṃ samudyataḥ  NarP āgamyate ca bhavatā yatastaśca nivedyatām ṛmuruvācakṣudhitasya ca bhukte nne tṛptirbrahmanvijāyate  NarP na me kṣudhā bhavettṝptiḥ kasmānmāṃ dvija pṛcchati vahninā pārthivenādau dagdhe vai kṣurāpīśvaḥ  NarP bhavatyaṃbhasi ca kṣīṇe nṛṇāṃ tṛṣṇāsamudbhavaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija  NarP tataḥ kṣutsaṃbhavābhāvāttṛptirastyeva me sadā manasaḥ svasthatā tuṣṭiścittadharmāvimau dvija  NarP cetaso yasya yatpṛṣṭaṃ pumānebhirna yujyate kva nivāsastavetyuktaṃ kva gantāsi ca yattvayā  NarP kutaścāgamyate tvetātrritaye pi nibodha me pumānsavargato vyāpītyākāśavadayaṃ yataḥ  NarP kutaḥ kutra kva gantāsītyetadapyarthavatkatham so haṃ gantā na cāgantā naikadeśaniketanaḥ  NarP tvaṃ cānye ca na ca tvaṃ tvaṃ nānye naivāhamapyaham miṣṭanne miṣṭamityeṣā jihvā sā me kṛtā tava  NarP kiṃ vakṣyatīti tatrāpi śrūyatāṃ dvijasattamā miṣṭameva yadāmiṣṭaṃ tadevodvegakāraṇam  NarP amiṣṭaṃ jāyate miṣṭaṃ miṣṭādudvijate janaḥ ādimadhyāvasāneṣu kimannaṃ rucikāraṇam  NarP mṛṇmayaṃ hi mṛdā yadvadgṛhaṃ liptaṃ sthirībhavet pārthivo yaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ  NarP yavagodhūmamudgādir ghṛtaṃ tailaṃ payo dadhi guḍaḥ phalānīti tathā pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ  NarP tadetadbhavatā jñātvā miṣṭāmiṣṭavicāri yat tanmanaḥ śamanālabi kāryaṃ prāpyaṃ hi muktaye  NarP ityākarṇya vacastasya paramārthāśritaṃ nṛpa praṇipatya mahābhāgo nidāgho vākyamabravīt  NarP prasīda maddhitārthāya kathyatāṃ yastvamāgataḥ naṣṭo mohastavākarṇya vacāṃsyetāni me dvija  NarP ṛbhuruvācaṛbhurasmi tavācāryaḥ prajñādānāya te dvija ihāgato haṃ dāsyāmi paramārthaṃ subodhitam  NarP eka evamidaṃ viddhi na bhedi sakalaṃ jagat vāsudevābhidheyasya svarupaṃ parātmanaḥ  NarP brahmaṇa uvācatathetyuktvā nidādhena praṇipātapuraḥ saram pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyānicchitaḥ prayayau vibhuḥ  NarP punavaṣasahasrante samāyāto nareśvara nidāghajñānadānāya tadeva nagaraṃ guruḥ  NarP nagarasya bahiḥ so tha nidāghaṃ dṛṣṭavān munim mahābalaparīvāre puraṃ viśati pārthive  NarP dūrasthitaṃ mahābhāge janasaṃmardavarjakam kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhamāyāntamaraṇyātsasamitkuśam  NarP dṛṣṭvā nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhurupāgatyābhivādya ca uvāca kasmādekāntaṃ sthīyata bhavatā dvija  NarP  nidāgha uvācabho vipra janasaṃmarddo mahāneṣa janeśvare pravivakṣau pure ramye tenātra sthīyate mayā  NarP ṛbhuruvācanarādhipo tra katamaḥ katamaścetaro janaḥ kathyatāṃ me dvijaśreṣṭha tvamabhijño mato mama  NarP nidāgha uvācayo yaṃ gajendramunmattamadriśṛṅgasamucchrayam adhiruḍho narendro yaṃ parito yastathetaraḥ  NarP ṛbhuruvācaetau hi gajarājānau dṛṣṭau hi yugapanmayā bhavatā nirviśeṣeṇa pṛthagvedopalakṣitau  NarP tatkathyatāṃ mahābhāga viśeṣo bhavatānayoḥ jñātumicchāmyahaṃ ko tra gajaḥ ko vā narādhipaḥ  NarP nidādha uvācagajoyo yamadho brahmannuparyasyaiṣa bhūpatiḥ vāhyavāhakasaṃbandhaṃ ko na jānāti vai dvija  NarP ṛbhuruvācabrahmanyathāhaṃ jānīyāṃ tathā māmavabodhaya adhaḥ sattvavibhāgaṃ kiṃ kiṃ corddhamabhidhīyate  NarP brāhmaṇa uvācaityuktvā sahasāruhya nidāghaḥ prāha taṃ ṛbhum śrayatāṃ kathayāmyeṣa yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi  NarP uparyahaṃ yathā rājā tvamadhaḥkuñjaro yathā avabodhāya te brahmandṛṣṭānto darśito mayā  NarP ṛbhuruvācatvaṃ rājeva dvijaśreṣṭha sthito haṃ gajavadyadi tadevaṃ tvaṃ samācakṣva katamastvamahaṃ tathā  NarP brāhmaṇa uvācaityuktaḥ satvarastasya caraṇāvabhivandya saḥ nidādhaḥ prāha bhagavannācāryastvamṛbhurmam  NarP nānyasyādvai vasaṃskārasaṃskṛtaṃ mānasaṃ tathā yathācāryasya tena tvāṃ manye prāptamahaṃ gurum  NarP ṛbhuruvācatavopadeśadānāya pūrvaśuśrūṣaṇāttava gurusnehādṛbhurnāmanidāghaṃ samupāgataḥ  NarP tadetadupadiṣṭaṃ te saṃkṣepeṇa mahāmate paramārthasārabhūtaṃ yattadadvaitamaśeṣataḥ  NarP brāhmaṇa uvācaevamuktvā dadau vidyāṃ nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhurguruḥ nidāgho pyupadeśena tenādvaitaparo bhavat  NarP sarvabhūtānyabhedena dadṛśe sa tadātmanaḥ tathā brahmatanau muktimavāca paramādvijaḥ  NarP tathā tvamapi dharmajña tulyātmaripubāndhavaḥ bhava sarvagataṃ jñānamātmānamavanīpate  NarP sitanīlādibhedena yathaikaṃ dṛśyate nabhaḥ bhrāntadṛṣṭibhirātmāpi tathaikaḥ sanpṛthak pṛthak  NarP ekaḥ samastaṃ yadihāsti kiñcittadacyuto nāsti paraṃ tato nyat so haṃ sa ca tvaṃ sa ca sarvametadātmāṃsvayaṃ bhātyapabhedamohaḥ  NarP sanandana uvācaitīritastena sa rājavaryastatyāja bhedaṃ paramārthadṛṣṭiḥ sa cāpi jātismaraṇāvabodastatraiva janmanyapavargamāpa  NarP paramārthādhyātmametattubhyamuktaṃ munīśvara brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śrortṛāṇāṃ cāpi muktidam  NarP yathā pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā brahmaṃstathā te gaditaṃ mayā brahmajñānamidaṃ śuddhaṃ kimanyatkathayāmi vai  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvipāekonapañcāśattamodhyāyaḥsūta uvācaśrutvā sanandanasyetthaṃ vacanaṃ nārado muniḥ asaṃtuṣṭa iva prāha bhrātaraṃ taṃ sanandanam  NarP nārada uvācabhagavansarvamākhyātaṃ yatpṛṣṭaṃ bhavato mayā tathāpi nātmā prīyeta śṛṇvanharikathāṃ muhuḥ  NarP śrūyate vyāsaputrastu śukaḥ paramadharmavit siddhiṃ sumahatīṃ prāpto nirviṇṇo vāntaraṃ bahiḥ  NarP brahmanpuṃsastu vijñānaṃ mahatāṃ sevanaṃ vinā na jāyate kathaṃ prāpto jñānaṃ vyāsātmajaḥ śiśuḥ  NarP tasya janmarahasyaṃ me kamacāpyasya śṛṇvate samākhyāhi mahābhāga mośāstrārthavidbhavān  NarP sanandana uvācaśṛṇu viprapravakṣyāmi śukotpattiṃ samāsataḥ yāṃ śrutvā brahmatattvajño jāyate mānavo mune  NarP na hāyanairna palitairna vittena na bandhubhiḥ ṛṣayaścakrire dharmaṃ yo nūcānaḥ sa no mahān  NarP nārada uvācaanūcānaḥ kathaṃbrahmanpumānbhavati mānada tanme karma samācakṣva śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ mama  NarP sanandana uvācaśṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi hyanūcānasya lakṣaṇam yajjñātvā sāṅgavedānāmabhijño jāyate naraḥ  NarP śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ jyotiṣaṃ tathā chandaḥśāstraṃ ṣaḍetāni vādāṅgāni vidurbudhāḥ  NarP ṛgvedro tha yadurvedaḥ sāmavedo hyatharvaṇaḥ vedāścatvāra evaite proktā dharmanirūpaṇe  NarP sāṃgānvedānguroryastu samadhīte dvijottamaḥ so nūcānaḥ prabhavati nānyathā granthakoṭibhiḥ  NarP nārada uvācaaṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi vedānāṃ cāpi vistarāt tvaṃmasmāsu mahāvijñaḥ sāṃgeṣveteṣu mānada  NarP sanandana uvācapraśnabhāro yamatulastvayā mama kṛto dvija saṃkṣepātkathayiṣyāmi sārameṣāṃ suniścitam  NarP svaraḥ pradhānaḥ śikṣāyāṃ kīrttito munibhirdijaiḥ vedānāṃ vedavidbhistu tacchṛṇuṣva vadāmi te  NarP ārcikaṃ gāthikaṃ caiva sāmikaṃ ca svarāntaram kṛtānte svaraśāstrāṇāṃ prayoktavya viśeṣataḥ  NarP ekāntaraḥ svaro hyapsu gāthāsudvyantaraḥ svaraḥ sāmasu tryantaraṃ vidyādetāvatsvarato ntaram  NarP ṛksāmayajuraṅgāni ye yajñeṣu prayuñjate avijñānāddhi śikṣāyāsteṣāṃ bhavati visvaraḥ  NarP mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato vā mithyāprayukto na tamarthamāha sa vāgvajro yajamānaṃ hirnāsti yathendraśatruḥ svarato parādhāt  NarP uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraścaiva sthānāni trīṇi vāṅkye savanānyāhuretāni sāma vāpyarddhatoṃtaram  NarP uraḥ saptavivāraṃ syāttathā kaṇṭhastathā śiraḥ na ca śakto si vyaktastu tathā prāvacanā vidhiḥ  NarP kaṭhakālāpavṛtteṣu taittirāhvarakeṣu ca ṛgvede sāmavede ca vaktavyaḥ prathamaḥ svaraḥ  NarP ṛgvedastu dvitīyena tṛtīyena ca vartate uccamadhyamasaṃghātaḥ svaro bhavati pārthivaḥ  NarP tṛtīya prathamakruṣṭā kurvantyāhvarakān svarān dvitīyādyāstu madrāntāstaittirīyāścatuḥsvarān  NarP prathamaśca dvitīyaśca tṛtīyo tha caturthakaḥ mandraḥ kruṣṭo munīśvara etānkurvanti sāmagāḥ  NarP dvitīyaprathamāvetau nāṇḍibhāllavinau svarau tathā śātapathāvetau svarau vājasaneyinām  NarP ete viśeṣataḥ proktāḥ svarā vai sārvavaidikāḥ ityetañcaritaṃ sarvaṃ svarāṇāṃ sārvavaidikam  NarP sāmavede tu vakṣyāmi svarāṇāṃ caritaṃ yathā alpagranthaṃ prabhūtārthaṃ sāmavedāṅgamuttamam  NarP tānarāgasvaragrāmamūrcchanānāṃ tu lakṣaṇam pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyaṃ yathā tubhyaṃ prakīrtitam  NarP śikṣāmāhurdvijātīnāmṛgyajuḥ sāmalakṣaṇam sapta svarāsrayo grāmā mṛrchanāstvekaviṃśatiḥ  NarP tānā ekonapañcāśadityetaḥsvaramaṇḍalam ṣaṅjaśca ṛṣabhaścaiva gāndhāro madhyamastathā  NarP pañcamo dhaivataścaivaṃ niṣādaḥ saptamaḥ svaraḥ ṣaṅjamadhyamagāndhārāsrarayo grāmāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  NarP bhūrllokājjāyate ṣaṅjo bhuvarlokāñca madhyamaḥ svargābhrāñcaiva gāndhāro grāmasthānāni trīṇi hi  NarP svarāṇāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa grāmarāgā iti smṛtāḥ viṃśatirmadhyamagrāme ṣaṅjagrāme caturdaśa  NarP tānānpaṃ cadaśecchanti gāndhāre sāmagāyinām nadī viśālā sumukhī citrā citravatī mukhā  NarP balā cāpyatha vijñeyā devānāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ āpyāyinī viśvabhṛtā candrā hemā kapardinī  NarP maitrī ca bārhatī caiva pitṝṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ ṣaṅje tūttaramandrā syādṛṣabhe cābhirūhatā  NarP aśvakrāntā tu gāndhāre tṛtīyā mūrcchanā smṛtā madhyame khalu sauvīrā hṛṣikā pañcame svare  NarP dhaivate cāpi vijñeyā mūrchanā tūttarā matā niṣāde rajanīṃ vidyādṛṣīṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ  NarP upajīvanti gandharvā devānāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ pitṝṇāṃ mūrcchānāḥ sapta tathā yakṣā na saṃśayaḥ  NarP ṛṣīṇāṃ mūrchanāḥ sapta yāstvimā laukikāḥ smṛtāḥ ṣaṅjaḥ prīṇāti vai devānṛṣīnprīṇāti carṣabhaḥ  NarP pitṝn prīṇāti gāndhāro gandharvānmadhyamaḥ svaraḥ devānpitṝnṛṣīṃścaiva svaraḥ prīṇāti pañcamaḥ  NarP yakṣānniṣādaḥ prīṇāti bhūtagrāmaṃ ca dhaivataḥ gānasya tu daśavidhā guṇavṛttistu tadyathā  NarP raktaṃ pūrṇamalaṅkṛtaṃ prasannaṃ vyaktaṃ vikruṣṭaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ samaṃ sukumāraṃ madhuramitiguṇāstatra raktaṃ nāma veṇuvīṇāsvarāṇāmekībhāvaṃ raktamityucyate pūrṇaṃ nāma svaraśrutipūraṇācchandaḥpādākṣaraṃ saṃyogātpūrṇamityucyate alaṅkṛtaṃ nāmorasi śirasi kaṇṭhayuktamityalaṅkṛtaṃ prasannaṃ nāmāpagatāgadgadanirviśaṅkaṃ prasannamityucyate vyaktaṃ nāma padapadārthaprakṛtivikārāgamanopakṛttaddhitasamāsadhātunipātopasargasvaraliṅgaṃ vṛttivārttikavibhaktyarthavacanānāṃ samyagupapādanaṃ vyaktamityucyate vikruṣṭaṃ nāmoñcairuñcāritaṃvyaktapadākṣaraṃ vikruṣṭamityucyate ślekṣṇaṃ nāma drutamavilaṃbitamuccanīcaplutasamāhārahelatālopanayādibhirupapādanābhiḥślakṣṇamityucyate samaṃ nāmāvāpanirvāpapradeśe pratyantarasthānānāṃ samāsaḥ samamityucyatesukumāraṃ nāma mṛdupadavarṇasvarakuhagaraṇayuktaṃ sukumāramityucyate madhuraṃ nāmasvabhāvopanītalalitapadākṣaraguṇasamṛddhaṃ madhuramityucyate evametairdaśabhirguṇairyuktaṃgānaṃ bhavati   bavanti cātra ślokāḥśaṅkitaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ bhītamuddhuṣṭamanunāsikam kākasvaraṃ mūrddhagataṃ tathā sthānavivarjitam  NarP vistaraṃ virasaṃ caiva viśliṣṭaṃ viṣamāhatam vyākulaṃ tālahīnaṃ ca gītidoṣāścaturdaśa  NarP ācāryāḥ samamicchanti padacchedaṃ tu paṇḍitāḥ sriyo madhuramicchanti vikruṣṭamitare janāḥ  NarP padmapatraprabhaḥ ṣaṅja ṛṣabhaḥ śukapiñjaraḥ kanakābhastu gāndhāro madhyamaḥ kundasannibhaḥ  NarP pañcamastu bhavetkṛṣṇaḥ pītakaṃ dhaivataṃ viduḥ niṣādaḥ sarvavarṇaḥ syādityetāḥ svaravarṇatāḥ  NarP pacamo madhyamaḥ ṣaṅja ityete brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ṛṣabho dhaivataścāpītyetau vai kṣatriyāvubhau  NarP gāndhāraśca niṣādaśca vaiśyāvarddhena vai smṛto śūdratvaṃ vidhinārddhena patitatvānna saṃśayaḥ  NarP ṛṣabho mūrchitavarjito dhaivatasahitaśca pañcamo yatra nipatati madhyamarāge sa niṣādaṃ ṣāṅjavaṃ vidyāt  NarP yadi pañcamo viramate gāndhāraścāntarasvaro bhavati ṛṣabho niṣādasahitastaṃ pañcamamīdṛśaṃ vidyāt  NarP gāndhārasyādhipatyena niṣādasya gatāgataiḥ dhaivatasya ca daurbalyānmadhyamagrāma ucyate  NarP īṣatpṛṣṭo niṣādastu gāndhāraścādhiko bhavet dhaivataḥ kaṃpito yatra sa ṣaṅgayāma īritaḥ  NarP antarasvarasaṃyuktaḥ kākaliryatra dṛśyate taṃ tu sādhāritaṃ vidyātpañcamasthaṃ tu kaiśikam  NarP kaiśikaṃ bhāvayitvā tu svaraiḥ sarvaiḥ samantataḥ yasmā ttu madhyame nyāsastasmātkaiśikamadhyamaḥ  NarP kākalirdṛśyate yatra prādhānyaṃ pañcamasya tu kaśyapaḥ kaiśikaṃ prāha madhyamagrāmasaṃbhavam  NarP geti geyaṃ viduḥ prājñā dheti kārupravādanam veti vādyasya saṃjñeyaṃ gandharvasya prarocanam  NarP yaḥ sāmagānāṃ prathamaḥ sa veṇormadhyamaḥ svaraḥ yo dvitīyaḥ sa gāndhārastṛtīyastvṛṣabhaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP caturthaḥ ṣaṅja ityāhuḥ pañcamo dhaivato bhavet ṣaṣṭho niṣādo vijñeyaḥ saptamaḥ pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP ṣaṅjaṃ mayūro vadati gāvo raṃbhanti carṣabham ajāvike tu gāndhāraṃ kraiñco vadati madhyamam  NarP puṣpasādhāraṇe kāle kokilā vakti pañcamam aśvastu dhaivataṃ vakti niṣaādaṃ vakti kuñjaraḥ  NarP kaṇṭhāduttiṣṭate ṣaṅjaḥ śirasastvṛṣabhaḥ smṛtaḥ gāndhārastvanunāsikya uraso madhyamaḥ svaraḥ  NarP urasaḥ śirasaḥ kaṇṭhādutthitaḥ pañcamaḥ svaraḥ lalāṭāddhaivataṃ vidyānniṣādaṃ sarvasandhijam  NarP nāsā kaṇṭhamurastālujihvādatāṃśca saṃśritaḥ ṣaṅbhiḥ saṃ jāyate yasmāttasmātṣaṅja iti smṛtaḥ  NarP vāyuḥ samutthito nābheḥ kaṇṭhaśīrṣasamāhataḥ nardatyṛṣabhavadyasmāttasmādṛṣerbha ucyate  NarP vāyuḥ samutthito nābheḥ kaṇṭhaśīrṣasamāhataḥ vāti gandhavahaḥ puṇyo gāndhārastena hetunā  NarP vāyuḥ samutthito nābherurau hṛdi samāhataḥ nābhiprāpto madhyavartī madhyamatvaṃ samarśnute  NarP vāyuḥ samutthito nābherurohṛtkaṇṭhakāhṛtaḥ pañcasthānotthitasyāsya pañcamatvaṃ vidhīyate  NarP dhaivataṃ ca niṣādaṃ ca varjayitvā tu tāvubhau śeṣānpañca svarāṃstvanye pañcasthānotthitānviduḥ  NarP pañcasthānasthitatvena sarvasthānāni dhāryate agnigītasvaraḥ ṣaṅja ṛṣabho brahmaṇocyate  NarP somena gīto gāndhāro viṣṇunā madhyamaḥ svaraḥ pañcamastu svaro gītastvayaiveti nidhāraya  NarP dhaivataśca niṣādaśca gītau tuṃburuṇā svarau ādyaṃsya daivataṃ brahmā ṣaṅjasyāpyucyate budhaiḥ  NarP tīkṣṇadīptaprakāśatvādṛṣabhasya hutāśanaḥ gāvaḥ praṇīte tuṣyanti gāndhārastena hetunā  NarP śrutvā caivopatiṣṭanti saurabheyā na saṃśayaḥ somastu pañcamasyāpi daivataṃ brahmarādrasmṛtam  NarP nihrāso yasya vṛddhiśca grāmamāsādya somavat atisaṃdhīyate yasmādetānpūrvotthitānsvarān  NarP tasmādasya svarasyāpi dhaivatatvaṃ vidhīyate niṣīdanti svarā yasmānniṣādastena hetunā  NarP sarvāṃścābhibhavatyeṣa yadādityo sya daivatam  NarP dāravī gātravīṇā ca dve vīṇe gānajātiṣu  NarP sāmanī gātravīṇā tu tasyāstvaṃ śṛṇu lakṣaṇam gātravīṇā tu sā proktā yasyāṃ gāyanti sāmaṅgāḥ  NarP svaravyañjanasaṃyuktā aṅgulyaṅguṣṭarañjitā hastau tu saṃyatau dhāryauṃ jānubhyāmuparisthitau  NarP guroranukṛtiṃ kuryādyathānyā na matirbhavet praṇavaṃ prākprayuñjīta vyāhṛtīstadanantaram  NarP sāvitrīṃ cānuvacanaṃ tato vai gānamārabhet prasārya cāṅgulīḥ sarvā ropayetsvaramaṇḍalam  NarP na cāṅgulībhiraṅguṣṭamaṅguṣṭenāgulīḥ spṛśet viralā nāṅgulīḥ kuryānmūle caitāṃ na saṃspṛśet  NarP aṅguṣṭhāgreṇa tā nityaṃ madhyame parvaṇi spṛśet mātrādvimātravṛddhānāṃ vibhāgārthe vibhāgavit  NarP aṅgulībhirdvimātraṃ tu pāṇeḥ savyasya darśayet trirekhā yasya dṛśyate siddhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet  NarP sa parva iti vijñeyaḥ śeṣamantaramantaram parvāntaraṃ sāmasu ca ṛkṣu kuryāttilāntaram  NarP svarānmadhyamaparvasu suniviṣṭaṃ niveśayet na cātra kaṃpayetkiñcidaṅgasyāvayavaṃ budhaḥ  NarP adhastanaṃ mṛdaṃ nyasya hastamātre yathākramam abhramadhye yathā vidyudṛśyate maṇisūtravat  NarP pṛṣacchedavivṛttīnāṃ yathā bāleṣukartarī kūrmo gāni ca saṃhṛtya cetodṛṣṭiṃ diśanmanaḥ  NarP svasthaḥ praśānto nirbhīko varṇānuñcārayedbudhaḥ nāsikāyāstu pūrveṇa hastaṃ gokarṇavaddharet  NarP niveśya dṛṣṭiṃ hastāgre śāstrārthamanucintayet samyakpracārayedvākyaṃ hastena ca mukhena ca  NarP yathaivoccārayedvarṇāṃstathaivaināṃ samāpayet nātyāhanyānna nirhaṇyānna pragāyenna kaṃpayet  NarP samaṃ sāmāni gāyeta vyomni svena gātiryathā yathā sucaratāṃ mārgo mīnānāṃ nopalabhyate  NarP ākāśe vā vihṝṅgānāṃ tadvatsvaragatā śrutiḥ yathā dadhini sarpiḥ syātkāṣṭastho vā yathānalaḥ  NarP prayatnenopalabhyeta tadvatsvaragatā śrutiḥ svarātsvarasya saṃkrāmaṃsvarasaṃdhimanulbaṇam  NarP avicchinnaṃ samaṃ kuryātsūkṣmacchāyātapopamam anāgatamatikrāntaṃ vicchinnaṃ viṣamāhatam  NarP tanvantamasthitāntaṃ ca varjayetkarṣaṇaṃ budhaḥ svaraḥ sthānāccyuto yastu svaṃ sthānamativartate  NarP vistaraṃ sāmagā brūyurviraktamiti vīṇinaḥ abhyāsārthe drutāṃ vṛttiṃ prayogārthe tu madhyamām  NarP śiṣyaṇāmupadeśārthaṃ kuryādvṛttiṃ vilaṃbitām gṛhītagrantha evaṃ tu granthoñcāraṇaśaikṣakān  NarP haste nādhyāpayecchiṣyān śaikṣeṇa vidhinā dvijaḥ kruṣṭasya mūrddhani sthānaṃ lalāṭe prathamasya tu  NarP bhruvormadhya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya tu karṇayoḥ kaṇṭhasthānaṃ caturthasya mandrasya rasanocyate  NarP atisvarasya nīcasya hṛdi sthānaṃ vidhīyate aṅguṣṭasyottame vruṣṭo hyaṅguṣṭaṃ prathamaḥ svaraḥ  NarP pradeśinyāṃ tu gāndhāra ṛṣabhastadanantaram anāmikāyāṃ ṣaṅgastu kaniṣṭāyāṃ tu dhaivataḥ  NarP tasyādhastāñca yonyāstu niṣādaṃ tatra nirdiśet aparvatvādamadhyatvā davyayatvāñca nityaśaḥ  NarP mandro hi mandībhūtastu parisvāra iti smṛtaḥ kruṣṭena devā jīvanti prathamena tu mānuṣāḥ  NarP paśavastu dvitīyena gandharvāpsarasastvanu andhajāḥ pitaraścaiva caturthasvarajīvinaḥ  NarP mandratvenopajīvanti piśācāsurarākṣasāḥ atisvareṇa nīcena jagatsthāvarajaṅgamāḥ  NarP sarvāṇi khalu bhūtāni dhāryante sāmikaiḥ svaraiḥ dīptāyatākaruṇānāṃ mṛdumadhyamayostathā  NarP śrutīnāṃ yo viśeṣajño na sa ācārya ucyate dīptā mandre dvitīya ca pracaturthe tathaiva ca  NarP atisvare tṛtīye ca kruṣṭe tu karuṇā śrutiḥ śrutayo yā dvitīyasya mṛdumadhyāyatāḥ smṛtāḥ  NarP tāsāmapi tu vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni pṛthak pṛthak āyatātvaṃ bhavennīce mṛdutā tu viparyaye  NarP sve svare madhyamātvaṃ tu tatsamīkṣya prayojayet dvitīye viratā yā tu kruṣṭaśca parato bhavet  NarP dīptāṃ tāṃ tu vijānīyātprāthamyena mṛduḥ smṛtaḥ atraiva viratā yā tu caturthena pravartate  NarP tathā mandre bhaveddīptā sāmnaścaiva samāpane nātitāraśrutiṃ kuryātsvarayornāpi cāntare  NarP taṃ ca hrasve ca dīrghe ca na cāpi ghuṭisajñake dvividhā gatiḥ padāntasthitasaṃdhiḥ sahoṣmabhiḥ  NarP sthāneṣu pañcasveteṣu vijñeya ghuṭisaṃjñakam svarāntarāviratāni hrasvadīrghaghuṭāni ca  NarP sthitisthāneṣvaśeṣāṇi śrutivatsvarato vadet dīptāmudātte jānīyāddīptāṃ ca svarite viduḥ  NarP anudātte mṛdurjñeyā gandharvāḥ śrutisaṃpade udāttaścānudāttaśca svaritapracite tathā  NarP nighātaśceti vijñeyaḥ svarabhedaśca pañcadhā ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi ācikasya svaratrayam  NarP udāttaścānudāttaśca tṛtīyaḥ svaritaḥ svaraḥ ya evodātta ityuktaḥ sa eva svaritātparaḥ  NarP pracayaḥ procyate tajjñairna cātrānyatsvarāntaram varṇasvaro tītasvaraḥ svarito dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP mātriko varṇa evaṃ tu dīrghastūñcaritādanu sa tu saptavidho jñeyaḥ svaraḥ pratyayadarśanāt  NarP padena tu sa vijñeyo bhavedyo yatra yādṛśaḥ saptasvarānprayuñjīta dakṣiṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ prati  NarP ācāryairvihitaṃ śāstraṃ putraśiṣyahitaiṣibhiḥ uccāduñcataraṃ nāsti nīcānnīcataraṃ tathā  NarP vaisvaryasvārasaṃjñāyāṃ kiṃsthānaḥ svāra ucyate uccanīcasya yanmadhye sādhāraṇamiti śrutiḥ  NarP taṃ svāraṃ svārasaṃjñāyāṃ pratijānanti śaikṣikāḥ udātte niṣādagāndhārāvanudātteṃ ṛṣabhadhaivato  NarP svaritaprabhavā hyete ṣaṅjamadhyamapañcamāḥ yatra kakhaparā ūṣmā jihvāmūlaprayojanāḥ  NarP tānapyājñāpayenmātrāprakṛtyaiva tu sā kalā jātyaḥ kṣaipro bhinihita stairavyañjana eva ca  NarP tirovirāmaḥ praśliṣṭo pādavṛttaśca saptamaḥ svarāṇāmahameteṣāṃ pṛthagvakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam  NarP uddiṣṭānāṃ tathā nyāyamudāharaṇameva ca sapakāraṃ savaṃ vāpi hyakṣaraṃ svaritaṃ bhavet  NarP na codāttaṃ puro yasya jātyaḥ svāraḥ sa ucyate iuvarṇo yadodāttāvāpadyete pavau kvacit  NarP anudāttaṃ pratyaye tu vidyātkṣaiprasya lakṣaṇam eo ābhyāmudāttābhyāmakāro nihitaśca yaḥ  NarP akāro yatra luṃpati tamabhinihitaṃ viduḥ udāttapūrve yatkiñcicchandasi svaritaṃ bhavet  NarP eṣa sarvabahusvārastairavyañjana ucyate avagrahātparaṃ yatra svaritaṃ syādanantaram  NarP tirovirāmaṃ taṃ vidyādudātto yadyavagrahaḥ ikāraṃ yatra paśyeyurikāreṇaiva saṃyutam  NarP udāttamanudāttena praśliṣṭaṃ taṃ vicāraya svare cetsvaritaṃ yatra vivṛtā yatra saṃhitā  NarP etatpādāntavṛttasya lakṣaṇaṃ śāstranoditam tānyaḥ svāraḥ sa jātyena śrutyagre kṣaipra ucyate  NarP te manvatābhinitastairavyañjana ūtaye tirovirāmo viṣkaṣite praśliṣṭo hīīgovarṇaḥ  NarP pādavṛttaḥ kandavidesvarāḥ saptaivamādayaḥ uñcādekākṣarātpūrvātsvaraṃ yadyadihākṣaram  NarP svārāṇāṃ jātyavarjānāmeṣā prakṛtirucyate catvārastvāditaḥ svārāḥ kaṃṣaṃpuṃśphutiśāstrataḥ  NarP udātte caikanīce vā juhvo gnistannidarśanam ikārānte pade pūrva ukāre parataḥ sthite  NarP hrasvaṃ kaṃpaṃ vijānīyānmedhāvī nātra saṃśayaḥ ikārānte pade caivokāradvayaṃ pare pade  NarP dīrghaṃ kaṃpaṃ vijānīyācchāgdhūṣviti nidarśanam trayo dīrghāstu vijñeyā ye ca saṃdhyakṣareṣu vai  NarP manyā yathā na indrābhyāṃ śeṣā hrasvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ anekānāmudāttānāmanudāttaḥ pratyayo yadi  NarP śivakaṃpaṃ vijānīyādudāttaḥ pratyayo yadi yatra dviprabhṛtīni syurudāttānyakṣarāṇi tu  NarP nīcaṃ voñcaṃ ca paratastatrodāttaṃ vidurbudhāḥ na rephe vā hakāre vā dvirbhāvo jāyate kvacit  NarP na ca vargadvitīyeṣu na caturthe kadācana caturthaṃ tu tṛtīyena dvitīyaḥ prathamena tu  NarP ādyamantyaṃ ca madhyaṃ ca svārākṣareṇa pīḍayet anantyaśca bhavetpūrvo hyantaśca parato yadi  NarP tatra madhye yamastiṣṭhetsvavarṇaḥ pūrvavaṇayoḥ vargāntyān śaṣasaiḥ sārddhamantasthairvāpi saṃyutān  NarP dṛṣṭvā yamā nivartante adeśikamivādhvagāḥ tṛtīyaśca caturthaśca caturthādiparaṃ padam  NarP dvau tṛtīyau hakāraśca hakārādiparaṃ padam anusvāropadhāmūlā tān kvacitkramataḥ param  NarP rahapūrvasaṃyute cāpyuttaraṃ kramate kṣaram saṃyogo yatra dṛśyeta rvyañjanaṃ virate pade  NarP pūrvāṅgamāditaḥ kṛtvā parāṅgādau niveśayet saṃyoge svaritaṃ yatra udvātaḥ pratanaṃ tathā  NarP pūrvāṅgaṃ tadvijānīyādyenāraṃbhaḥ paraṃ hi tat saṃyogāttu vijānīyātparaṃ saṃyoganāyakam  NarP saṃyuktasya tu varṇasya tatparaṃ pūrvamakṣaram anusvāraḥ padāntaśca kramajaṃ pratyaye svake  NarP svarabhaktistathārephaḥ pūrvapūrvāṅgamucyate pādādau cāpādādau saṃyogāvagraheṣu ca  NarP yaśabda iti vijñeyo yo nyaḥsaya iti smṛtaḥ pādādāvapyavicchedesaṃyogānte ca tiṣṭatām  NarP varjayitvā rahapāṇāmupādeśaḥ pradṛśyate svasaṃyukto gururjñeyaḥ sānusvārā grimaḥ sphuṭaḥ aṇuśeṣo hrigo vāpi yugalādiravisphuṭaḥ  NarP yadudāttamudāttaṃ tadyatsvaritaṃ tatpade bhavati yannīcaṃ nīcameva tadyatpracayasthaṃ tadapi nīcam  NarP agniḥ suto mitramidaṃ tathā vayamayāvahāḥ priyaṃ dūtaṃ ghṛtaṃ cittamatiśabdastu nīcataḥ  NarP akveṣveva suteṣveva yajñeṣu kalaśeṣu ca śateṣu sapavitreṣu nīcāduñcāryate śrutiḥ  NarP hārivaruṇavareṇyeṣu dhārāpuruṣeṣu svaratirephaḥ viśvānaronakāraśca śeṣāstusvaritā narāḥ  NarP dvau varuṇau vasvarata uduttamantvaṃ varuṇadhāra caurudhārāmurudhāresvadohate mātrikaṃ vā dvimātraṃ vā svaryate yadihākṣaram tasyāditorddhamātraṃ vai śeṣaṃ tu parato bhavet adīrghaṃ dīrghavatkuryāddvisvaraṃ yatprayujyate  NarP kaṃpotsvaritābhigītaṃ hrasvakarṣaṇameva ca nimeṣakālo mātrā syādvidyutkāleti cāpare  NarP ṛksvarā tulyayogā vā kaiścidevamudīryate  NarP samāse vagrahaṃ kuryātpadaṃ cātrānusaṃhitam yetīkṣarādikaraṇaṃ padāntasyeti taṃ viduḥ  NarP sarvatra mitraputrasakhiśabdā ahiśatakratoravagrāhyāḥ ādityaviprajātavedāśca satpatigopativṛtrahāsamudrāśca svarayupuvodevayavaścāritaṃ devatātape cikitiśca dhacaiva nāvagṛhṇanti paṇḍitāḥ vivṛtayaścatasro vai vijñeyā iti me matam  NarP akṣarāṇāṃ niyogena tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu hrasvādivatsānusṛtā vatsānusāriṇī cāgre  NarP pākavatyubhayorhrasvā dīrghā vṛddhā pipīlikāḥ catasṛṇāṃ vivṛtīnā mantaraṃ mātrikaṃ bhavet  NarP arddhamātrikamanyeṣāmanyeṣāmaṇumātrikam  NarP āpadyate makāro rephoṣmasu pratyaye pyanusvāram paveṣu parasavarṇaṃ sparśeṣu cottamāpatim  NarP nakārānte padā pūrve svare ca parataḥ sthite akāraṃ raktamityāhustakāreṇa tu rajyate  NarP nakārānte pade pūrve vyañjanaiśca yavohiṣu arddhamātrā tu pūrvasya rajyate tvaṇumātrayā  NarP nakārasvarasaṃyuktaścaturyukto vidhīyate repho raṅgaśca lopaśca sānusvaro pi vā kvacit  NarP hṛdayāduttiṣṭateraṅgaḥ kāṃsyena tu samanvitaḥ mṛduścaiva dvimātraśca dadhanvāṃ iti nidarśanam  NarP yathā saurāṣṭrikā nārī arāṃ ityabhibhāṣate evaṃ raṅgaḥ prayoktavyo nāradaitanmataṃ mama  NarP svarā gaḍadabāścaiva ṅaṇanamāḥ sahoṣmabhiḥ caturṇāṃ padajātīnāṃ padāntā daśa kīrtitāḥ  NarP svara uccaḥ svaro nīcaḥ svaraḥ svarita eva ca vyañjanā na tu vartante yatra tiṣṭati sa svaraḥ  NarP svarapradhānaṃ traisvaryamācāryāḥ pratijānate maṇivadvyañjanaṃ vidyātsūtra vañca svaraṃ viduḥ  NarP durbalasya yathā rāṣṭraṃ harate balavānnṛpaḥ durbalaṃ vyajanaṃ tadvaddhareta balavānsvaraḥ  NarP ubhāvaśca vivṛttiśca śaṣasārepha eva ca jihvāmūlamupadhmā ca gatiraṣṭavidhoṣmaṇaḥ  NarP svarapratyayāvivṛtiḥ saṃhitāyāṃ tu yā bhavet visargastatra mantavyaratālavyaścātra jāyate  NarP saṃdhyakṣare pare saṃdhau prāptasuptau yavau yadi vyañjanākhyā vivṛttistu svarākhyā pratisaṃhitā  NarP ūṣmāntaṃ virate yatra saṃbhāvo bhavati kvacit vivṛttiryā bhavettatra svarākhyāṃ tāṃ vinirddiśet  NarP yadyobhāvaprasaṃdhānamṛkārādiparaṃ padam svarāntaṃ tādṛśaṃ vidyādyadanyavdyaktamūṣmaṇaḥ  NarP prathamā uttamāścaiva padānteṣu yadi sthitāḥ dvitīyaṃ sthānamāpannāḥ śaṣasapratyayā yadi  NarP prathamānūṣmasaṃyuktān dvitīyāniva darśayet na caitānpratijānīyādyathā matsyaḥ kṣuropsarāḥ  NarP chandomānaṃ ca vṛttaṃ ca pādasthānaṃ trikāraṇam ṛcaḥ svacchandavṛttāstu pādāstvakṣaramānataḥ  NarP ṛgvaryyān svarabhaktiṃ ca chandomānena nirddiśet pratyayeta sahārephamimīte svarabhaktayā  NarP ṛvarṇe tu pṛthagrephaḥ pratyayastu vṛthā bhaveta vidyāllaghumṛkāraṃ tu yadi tūṣmāṇasaṃyutaḥ  NarP ūṣmaṇaiva hi saṃyukta ṛkāro yatra pīḍyate guruvarṇaḥ sa vijñeyastṛcaṃ cātra nidarśanam  NarP ṛṣabhaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ ca bṛhaspatiṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca nirṛtipañcamā hyatra ṛkārā nātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP śaṣasaha rādau rephaḥ sparabhaktirjāyate dvipadasaṃdhau iuvarṇābhyāṃ hīnā kvacidekapadākramaviyuktā  NarP svarabhaktirdvidhā proktāṛkāre repha eva ca svarodā vyañjanodā ca vihitākṣaracintakaiḥ  NarP śaṣaseṣu svarodayāṃ hakāre vyañjanodayām śaṣaseṣu vivṛtāṃ tu hakāre saṃvṛtāṃ viduḥ  NarP svarabhaktiṃ prayuñjāna srīndoṣānparivarjayet ikāraṃ cāpyukāraṃ grastadoṣaṃ tathaiva ca  NarP saṃyogaparaṃ chaparaṃ visarjanīyaṃ dvimātrakaṃ caiva atha sāntika ca naṅmasānusvāraṃ ghuṭataṃ ca  NarP yasyāḥ pādaḥ prathamo dvādaśamātrastathā tṛtīyo pi aṣṭādaśo dvitīyaḥ samāpannaḥ pañcadaśamātraḥ yasyā lakṣaṇamuktaṃ yā tvanyā sā smṛtā vipulā  NarP akṣarāṇāṃ laghuhrasvamasaṃyogaparaṃ yadi tatsaṃyogottaraṃ vidyādgurudārghākṣarāṇi tu  NarP vivṛttir yatra dṛśyate svārasyaivāgrataḥ sthitaḥ  NarP gurusvāraḥ savijñeyaḥ kṣaiprastatra na vidyate aaṣṭaprakāraṃ vijñeyaṃ padānāṃ svaralakṣaṇam  NarP anto dāttamādyudāttamudāttamanudāttaṃ nīcasvaritam madhyodāttaṃ svaritaṃ dvirudāttamityetā aṣṭau padasaṃjñāḥ  NarP agniḥ somaḥ pravo vīryaṃ haviṣā svarvanaspatiḥ antarmadhyamayotāmyudamanunipātya ādyātsvaritamupasarge dvirnnīcamākhyāta iti svaritātparāṇi yāni syurddhārāpakṣarāṇi tu sarvāṇi pracayasthānyupodāttaṃ nihanyate  NarP pracayo yatra dṛśyeta tatra hanyātsvaraṃ budhaḥ svaritaḥ kevalo yatra mṛdustatra nipātayet  NarP pañcavidhamācāryakaṃ nāma sukhaṃ nyāsaḥ karaṇaṃ pratijñoccāraṇā  atrocyate śreyaḥ khalu vaiśyāḥ pratijñātoccāraṇā yasya kasyacidvarṇasya karaṇaṃ nopalabhyate pratijñā tatra voḍhavyākaraṇaṃ hi tadātmakam  tuṃburubhavadviśiṣṭaviśvāvasvādayaśca gandharvāḥ sāmasu nibhṛtaṃ karaṇaṃ svarasaukṣmyānnaiva jānīyuḥ  NarP kaukṣeyāgniṃ sadā rakṣedaśrīpādarśanaṃ hetum jīrṇo hāraḥ prabuddhaḥ khalūṣasinbrahma cintayet  NarP śaradviṣuvatotītāduṣasyutthānamiṣyate yāvadvāsaṃtikī rātrirmadhyamā paryupasthitā  NarP āmrapālāśabilvānāmapāmārgaśirīṣayoḥ vāgyataḥ prātarutthāya bhakṣayeddvatadhāvanam  NarP khādiraśca kadambaśca karavīrakarañjayoḥ sarve kaṇṭakinaḥ puṇyāḥ kṣīriṇaśca yaśasvinaḥ  NarP tenāsya karaṇe saukṣmyaṃ mādhuryaṃ copa jāyate varṇāṃśca kurute samyakprācīnaudavatiryathā  NarP triphalāṃ lavaṇākhyena bhakṣayecchiṣaayakaḥ sadā agnimedhājananyeṣā svaravarṇakarī tathā  NarP kṛtvā cāvaśyakāndharmāñjāṭharaṃ paryupāsya ca pītvā madhuṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva śucirbhūtvā tato vadet  NarP mandreṇopakrametpūrvaṃ sarvaśākhāsvayaṃ vidhiḥ saptamantrānatikramya yatheṣṭāṃ vācamutsṛjet  NarP na tāṃ samīrayedvācaṃ na prāṇamuparodhayet prāṇānāmuparodhena vaisvaryaṃ copajāyate svaravyaṇḍajanamādhuryaṃ lupyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP kutīrthādāgataṃ dagdhamapavarṇaiśca bhakṣitam  NarP na tasya parimokṣo sti pāpāheriva kilbiṣāt  NarP sutīrthādāgataṃ jagdhuṃ svāmnātaṃ supratiṣṭitam susvareṇa svavakreṇa prayuktaṃ brahma rājati  NarP na takālo na laṃboṣṭo na ca sarvānunāsikaḥ  NarP gadgado baddhajihvaśca prayogānvaktumarhati  NarP ekacitto niruddhāntaḥ snāto gānavivarjjitaḥ sa tu varṇānprayuñjīta detoṣṭhaṃ yasya śobhanam  NarP pañcavidyāṃ na gṛhṇanti caṇḍā stabdhāśca ye narāḥ alasāśca sarogāśca yeṣāṃ ca visṛtaṃ manaḥ  NarP śanairvidyāṃ śanairarthānārohetparvataṃ śanaiḥ śanairadhvasu varteta yojanānna paraṃ vrajet  NarP yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ tu śanairyāti pipīlikā agacchanvainateyo pi padamekaṃ na gacchati  NarP nahi pāpahatā vāṇī prayogānvaktumarhati badhirasyeva jalpasya vidagdhā vāmalocanā  NarP upāṃśucaritaṃ caiva yo dhīte vitrasanniva api rūpasahasreṣu saṃdeheṣveva vartate  NarP pustakapratyayādhītaṃ nādhītaṃ gurusannidhau rājate na sabhāmadhyejāragarbheva kāminī  NarP añjanasya kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā valmīkasya tu saṃcayam avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryāddānādhyayanakarmasu  NarP yatkīṭaiḥ pāṃśubhiḥ ślakṣṇairvalmīkaḥ kriyate mahān na tatra balasāmarthyamudyogasgatatra kāraṇam  NarP sahasraguṇitā vidyā śataśaḥ parikīrtitā āgamiṣyati jihvāgre sthalānnimnamivodakam  NarP hayanāmiva jātyānāmarddharātrārddhaśāyinām nahi vādyārthināṃ sāphalyavati bhavati  NarP iti diṅmātramuddiṣṭaṃ śikṣāgranthaṃ mayā tava jñātvā vedāṅgamādyaṃ tu brahmabhūyāya kalpate  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde NarP śāntikalpe tu divyānāṃ bhaumānāṃ munisattama tathāntarikṣotpātānāṃ śāntayo hyuditāḥ pṛthak  NarP saṃkṣepeṇaitaduddiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kalpalakṣaṇe viśeṣaḥ pṛthageteṣāṃ sthitaḥ śaṅkhāntareṣu ca  NarP gṛhyakalpe tu sarveṣāmupayogitayādhunā vakṣyāmi te dvijaśreṣṭha sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu  NarP oṅkāraścātha śabdaśca dvāvetau brahmaṇaḥ purā kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā viniryātau tasmānmāṅgalyakāvimau  NarP kṛtvā proktāni karmāṇi tadvarddhvāni karoti yaḥ so tha śabdaṃ praṃyujīta tadānantyārthamiṣyate  NarP kuśāḥ parisamūhāya vyastaśākhāḥ prakīrtitāḥ nyūnādhikā niṣphalāya karmaṇo bhimatasya ca  NarP kṛmikīṭapataṅgādyā bhramanti vasudhātale teṣāṃ saṃrakṣaṇārthāya proktaṃ parisamūhanam  NarP rekhāḥ proktāśca yāstisraḥ kartavyāstāḥ samā dvija nyūnādhikā na karttavyā ityeva paribhāṣitam  NarP medinī medasā vyāptā madhukaiṭabhadaityayoḥ gomayenopalepyeyaṃ tadarthamiti nārada  NarP vandhyā duṣṭā ca dīnāṅgī mṛtavatsā ca yā bhavet yajñārthaṃ gomayaṃ tasyā nāharediti bhāṣitam  NarP ye bhramanti sadākāśe pataṅgādyā bhayaṅkarāḥ taṣāṃ praharaṇārthāya mataṃ proddharaṇaṃ dvija  NarP sruveṇa ca kuśenāpi kuryādullekhanaṃ bhuvaḥ asthikaṇṭakasiddhyarthaṃ brahmaṇā paribhāṣitam  NarP āpo devagaṇāḥ sarve tathā pitṛgaṇā dvija tenādbhirukṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ munibhirvidhi kovidaiḥ  NarP agneṃrānayanaṃ proktaṃ saubhāgyasrībhireva ca śubhade mṛṇmaye pātre prokṣyādbhistaṃ nidhāyapayet  NarP amṛtasya kṣayaṃ NarP tenopasṛṣṭo labhate na rājyaṃ rājanandanaḥ kumārī na ca bhartāramapatyaṃ garbhamaṅganā ācāryatvaṃ śrotriyaśca na śiṣyo dhyayanaṃ tathā  NarP vaṇiglābhaṃ na cānpoti kṛṣiṃ cāpi kṛṣibalaḥ snapana grāhyavarjitam tatsvacchannaṃ ca mānaikyārddhāṃśaṣaṣṭaṃ daśāhatam  NarP channaghnamasmānmūlaṃ tu khāṅgonaglauvapurhṛtam sthityarddhaṃ ghaṭikādisyādvyaṅgabāhvaṃśasaṃmitaiḥ  NarP iṣṭaiḥ palaistadūnāḍhyaṃ vyagāvūnerkaṣaṅguṇaḥ tadanyathādhike tasminnevaṃ spaṣṭe sukhāntyage  NarP grāsena svāhate cchādyamānāme syurviśopakāḥ pūrṇāntaṃ madhyamatra syāddarśānteñjaṃ tribhonakam  NarP pṛthak tatkrāntyakṣabhāgasaṃskṛtau syurnatāṃśakāḥ taddighnāṃśakṛtidvyūnārddhārkayutā hariḥ  NarP tribhānāṅgārkaviśleṣāṃśo ḥṃśonaghnāḥ purandarāḥharāptālaṃbanaṃ svarṇavitribherkādhikonake  NarP viśvaghnalaṃbanakalāḍhyonastu tithivadyaguḥ śaronolaṃbanaṣaḍaghne tallavāḍhyonavitribhāt  NarP natāṃśāstajāṃsāne prādhṛtastadvivarjita śabdenduliptaiḥ ṣaḍbhistu bhaktānatirnatirnatāṃśadik  NarP tayornāṭyohabhinnaikadik śaraḥ sphuṭatāṃ vrajet tataśchannasthitidale sādhye sthityarddhaṣaṭtribhiḥ  NarP aṃśastairvintribhandvisthaṃlaṃbanetayoḥ pūrvavat saṃskṛtestābhyāṃ sthityarddhe bhavataḥ sphuṭe  NarP tābhyāṃ hīnayuto madhyadarśaḥ kālau mukhāntagau arkādyūnā viśva īśā navapañcadaśāṃśakāḥ  NarP kālāṃśāstairūnayukte ravau hyastodayau vidhoḥ dṛṣṭvā hyādau kheṭabiṃbaṃ dṛgauñcye laṃbamīkṣya ca  NarP talluṃbapāpabiṃbāntardṛṇau vyāptaravighnabhāḥ aste sāvayavā jñeyā gataiṣyāstithayo budhaiḥ  NarP vyaste yuktāntibhāgaiśca dvighnatithyāhṛtā sphuṭam saṃskāradikalaṃbanamaṅgulādyaṃ prajāyate  NarP seṣvaśonāḥ sitaṃ tithyo balannāśonnataṃ vidhoḥ śṛṅgamanyatra udvācyaṃ balanāṅgulalekhanāt  NarP pañcatve goṅkaviśikhāḥ śeṣakarṇahatāḥ pṛthak vikṛjyakāṅgasiddhāgnibhaktālabdhonasaṃyutāḥ  NarP trijyādhikone śravaṇe vapūṃṣi syurhṛtāḥ kujāt ṛjvoranṛjvorvivaraṃ gatyantaravibhājitam  NarP vakrartvorgatiyogāmaṃ gamyetīte dinādikam khanatyāsaṃskṛtauvveṣūdaksāmyenyentaraṃ yutiḥ  NarP yāmyodakkheṭavivaraṃ mānaukyāddholpakaṃ yadā yadā bhedolaṃbanādyaṃ sphuṭārthaṃ sūryaparvavat  NarP ekāyanagatau syātāṃ sūryācandramasau yadā tayute maṇḍale krāntyau tulyatve vai dhṛtābhidhaḥ  NarP vipaṭītāyanagatau candrākārai krāntiliptikāḥ samāstadā vyatīpāto bhagaṇārddhe tapoyutau  NarP bhāskaredvor bhacakrānta cakrārddhāvadhisaṃsthayoḥ dṛkkalpasādhitāṃśādiyuktayoḥ svāvapakramau  NarP athojapadagamyendoḥ krāntirvikṣepasaṃskṛtāḥ yadi syādadhikā bhānoḥ krānteḥ pāto gatastadā  NarP nyūnā cetsyāttadā bhāvī vāmaṃ yugmapadasya ca yadānyatvaṃ vidhoḥ krāntiḥ kṣepāccedyadi śuddhyati  NarP tadūcchaśāṅkapātasya phalaṃ deyaṃ viparyayāt karmaitadasakṛttāvatkrāntī yāvatsametayoḥ  NarP krāntyoḥ samatve pāto tha prakṣiptāṃśonite vidhau hīnerdvarātraghikāghato bhāvī tātkālike dhikā  NarP sthirīkṛtārddharā trārddhau dvayorvivaraliptakāḥ ṣaṣṭiścācandrabhuktāptā pātakālasya nāḍikāḥ  NarP ravīndvormānayogārddhaṃ ṣaṣṭyā saṃguṇya bhājayet tayorbhuktayantareṇāptaṃ sthityamarddhāṃ nāḍikādivat  NarP pātakālaḥ sphuṭo madhyaḥ so pi sthityarddhavarjitaḥ tasya saṃbhavakālaḥ syāttatsaṃyogektasaṃjñakaḥ  NarP ādyantakālayormadhye kālo jñeyo tidāruṇaḥ prajvalajjvalanākāraḥ sarvakarmasu garhitaḥ  NarP ityetadgaṇito kiñcitproktaṃ saṃkṣepato dvija jātakaṃ vācmi samayādrāśisaṃjñāpuraḥsaram  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde jyotiṣavarṇanaṃ nāma  NarP kriyaṇataulikarkādyā meṣādiṣu navāṃśakāḥ svabhāddvādaśabhāgeśāḥ ṣarḍgaṃ rāśipūrvakam  NarP gojāśca karkayugmena rātryākhyā pṛṣṭakodayāḥ śeṣā dinākhyāstūbhayaṃ timiḥ krūraḥ saumyaḥ pumān  NarP pumān srī ca klībaścarasthiradviḥsvabhāvakāḥ meṣādyāḥ pūrvatodiksthāḥ svasvasthānacarāstathā  NarP ajokṣeṇāṅganākīṭajhaṣajūkā ināditaḥ uccāni dvitrimanuyuktithīṣubhanakhāṃśakaiḥ  NarP tattatsaptamanīcāni prāṅmadhyāntyāṃśakāḥ kramāt vargottamāścarādheṣu bhāvāddvādaśa mūrtimān  NarP siṃhokṣāvisraścatau likubhāḥ sūryātrikoṇabham caturasraṃ tūryamṛtyutrikoṇaṃ navapañcamam  NarP riḥphaāṣṭaṣaṭkaṃ trikabhaṃ kendraṃ prākturyasaptakham nṛpādaḥ kīṭapaśavo balāḍhyāḥ kendragāḥ kramāt  NarP kendrātparaṃ paṇapharamāpoklimamataḥ param raktaḥ śvetaḥ śukanibhaḥ pāṭalo dhūmrapāṇḍurau  NarP citraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pītapiṅgau babhruḥ svacchaḥ prabhākriyāt sāmyāśākhyaplavatvaṃ syāddvitīye vaśirarkabhāt  NarP kālātmārke manaścadraḥ kujaḥ satvaṃ vacobudhaḥ jīvo jñānaṃ sukhaṃ śukraḥ kāmo duḥkhaṃ kujasūryauṃ ca vedo jño varṇapāḥ kramāt saurāeṃtyajādhipaḥ prokto rāhurmlecchādhipastathā  NarP candrārkajīvājñasitau kujārkī sāttvikādikāḥ devatendvagniraivalābhūkosakhāyoparādhipāḥ  NarP vasraṃ tryāśatrikoṇaturyāṣṭasaptamānyena vṛddhitaḥ saurejyārāpare pūrṇe kramātpaśyanti nārada  NarP ayanakṣaṇaghasrartumāsārddhaśarado raveḥ kaṭutiktakṣāramiśramadhurāmlakaṣāyakāḥ  NarP trikoṇātsāṃtyadhādharmāyuḥ sukhakhodyapaḥ suhṛt jīvo jīvajñau sitajñau vyarkā vyārāḥ kramādamī  NarP vīndvarkā vikujendvarkāḥ suhṛdo nyeraverdhṛtāḥ mithodhanavyayāyatribandhuvyāpāragaḥ suhṛt  NarP lagnāṃśādgrahayugdṛṣṭvā varṇānbalayutādvadet dṛksamānapramāṇāṃśca iṣṭe rekhāṃ smarasthitaiḥ  NarP khagatryaṃśe balāgnege caramāṃśe grahānvite vāṃśe sthalāṃbujaḥ saurerdvīkṣāyogabhavā dvijāḥ  NarP kuryādvilomago vāpi svāṃśoktaparagaiḥ samam kujenduhetukaṃ srīṇāṃ pratimāsamihārtavam  NarP neṣṭasthejye nyathāste srīyuṅktāsannarekṣite pāpayuktekṣite dyūne ruṣā prītyā śubhagrahaiḥ  NarP śukrārkendujaiḥ svāṃśasthairījya cāṅgatrikoṇage bhavedapatyaṃ viprendra puṃsāṃ sadvīryaśālinām  NarP asrerkendo kujārkī cetpuṃsriyorāmayapradau vyayakhago yuktau caikadṛṣṭyā nṛtyupradau tayoḥ  NarP NarP sapāpagorke jāyo vā paravīryaprasūtikṛt pāpabhasthau pāpakheṭaiḥ sūryārghānatrikoṇagau  NarP videśagaḥ pitāvṛddhaḥ khevā rāśivaśātyaye pūrṇa iṇḍhau svabheśejñe śubhe muvyaṃvuje tanau  NarP dhātā tathaiva ca  NarP īśvaro bahudhānyaśca pramāthī vikramo vṛṣaḥ citrabhānuḥsubhānuśca tāraṇaḥ pārthivo vyayaḥ  NarP sarvajitsarvadhārī ca virodhī vikṛtaḥ kharaḥ nandano vijayaścaiva jayo manmathadurmukhau  NarP hemalaṃbo vilaṃbaśca vikārī śārvarī lavaḥ śubhakṛcchobhanaḥ krodhī viśvāvasuparābhavau  NarP plavaṅgaḥ kīlakaḥ saumyaḥ sāmāptaśca virodhakṛt paribhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso nalaḥ  NarP piṅgalaḥ kālayuktaśca siddhārtho raudradurmatīḥ dundubhīrudhirodgarī raktākṣaḥ krodhanaḥ kṣayaḥ  NarP nāmatulyaphalāḥ sarve vijñeyāḥ ṣaṣṭivatsarāḥ yugaṃ syātpañcabhirvarṣairyugānyevaṃ tu dvādaśa  NarP teṣāmīśāḥ kramājjñeyā viṣṇurdevapurohitaḥ purandaro lohitaśca tvaṣṭāhirbudhnyasaṃjñakaḥ  NarP pitaraśca tato viśve śaśīndrādgnayaśino bhagaḥ tathā yugasya varṣe śāstvagninenduvidhīśvarāḥ  NarP athādveśacamūnāthasasyapānāṃ balābalam tatkālaṃ grahacāraṃ ca samyak jñātvā phalaṃ padet  NarP saumyā yanaṃ māsaṣaṭkaṃ mṛgādyaṃ bhānubhuktitaḥ ahaḥ surāṇāṃ tadrātriḥ karkādyaṃ dakṣiṇāyanam  NarP gṛhapraveśavaivāhapratiṣṭāmaiñjibandhanam madhādau maṅgalaṃ karma vidheyaṃ cottarāyaṇe  NarP yāmyāyane garhitaṃ ca karma yatnātpraśasyate mādhādi māsau dvau dvau ca ṛtavaḥ śiśirādayaḥ  NarP mṛgācchiśiravasaṃtaśca grīṣmāḥ syuścottarāyaṇe varṣā śaraśca hemantaḥ karkādvai dakṣiṇāyane  NarP cāndro darśīvadhiḥ sauraḥ saṃkrātyā sāvano dineḥ triṃśadbhiścandrabhagaṇo māso nākṣatrasaṃjñakaḥ  NarP madhuśca mādhavaḥ śukraḥ śuciścātha nabhastataḥ nabhasya iṣa ūrjaśca sahāścaiva sahasyakaḥ  NarP tapāstapasya kramaśaścaitrādīnāṃ samāhvayā yasminmāse paurṇamāsī yena dhiṣṇena saṃyutā  NarP vināyakayamau nāgacandrau skandorkavāsavau mahendravāsavau nāgadurgādaṇḍadharāhvayaḥ  NarP śivaviṣṇūhariravīkāmaḥ sarvaḥ kalītataḥ candraviśvedarśasaṃjñatithīśāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ  NarP nandābhadrājayāriktā pūrṇāḥ syutithayaḥ punaḥ trirāvṛttyā kramājjñeyā neṣṭamadhyeṣṭadāḥ site  NarP kṛṣṇapakṣe tviṣṭamadhyāniṣṭadāḥ kramaśastadā aṣṭamī dvādaśī ṣaṣṭī caturthī ca caturdaśī  NarP putrahānirbhavettasya traṃyodaśyāṃ dhanakṣayaḥ arthaputrakṣayastasya dvitīyāyāṃ na saṃśayaḥ  NarP amāyāṃ ca navamyāṃ ca saptamyāṃ ca kulakṣayaḥ yā paurṇimā divā candramatī sānumatī smṛtā  NarP rātrau kramādamī  NarP yogāḥ svasaṃjñāphaladā aṣṭāviṃśatirīritāḥ ravivāre kramādeva dasrabhārdidubhādvidhau  NarP sārpāddhaume pudhe hastānmaitrabhātsuramantriṇi vaiśvadevādbhagusute vāruṇādbhāskarātmaje  NarP hastarkṣaṃ ca khārvidau candrabhaṃ dasrabhaṃ kuje saumye mitrabhamācāryaṃ tiṣyaḥ pauṣṇaṃ bhṛgoḥ sute  NarProhiṇī mandavāre ca siddhiyogāhvayā amī ādityabhaumayornandā bhadrā śukraśaśāṅkayoḥ  NarP jayāsaumye gurau riktā śanaupūrṇeti no śubhāḥ nandā tithiḥ śukravāre saumye bhadrā kuje jayā  NarP riktā mande gurorvāre pūrṇā siddhāhvayā amī ekādaśyāminduvāro dvādaśyāmarkavāsaraḥ  NarP ṣaṣṭī gurau tṛtīyā jñe ṣṭamī śukre śanaiścare navamī pañcamī bhaume dagdhayogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  NarP bharaṇyarkadine candre citrābhaumetu viśvabham budhe śraviṣṭāryamabhe gurau jyeṣṭā bhṛgordine  NarP revatī mandavāre tu grahajanmarkṣanāśanam viśākhādicaturvargamarkamarkavārādiṣu kramāt  NarP utpātamṛtyukāraṇākhyasiddhiyogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ tithivārodbhavā neṣṭā yogā vārarkṣasaṃbhavāḥ  NarP hūṇavaṅgakhaseṣvanyadeśeṣvatiśubhapradāḥ ghorāṣṭākṣīmahodaryo mandā mandākinī tathā  NarP miśrā rākṣasikā sūryavārādiṣu yathākramam śūdrataskaravaiśyakṣmādevabhūpagavāṃ kramāt  NarP anuktānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ghorādyāḥ sukhadāḥ smṛtāḥ pūrvāhne nṛpatīnhanti viprānmadhyandine viśaḥ  NarP aparāhne stage śūdrānpradoṣe ca piśācakān niśi rātricarānnāṭyakārānapararātrike  NarP gopānuṣasi saṃdhyāyāṃ liṅgino ravisaṃkramaḥ divā cenmeṣasaṃkrāntiranarthakalahapradā  NarP rātrau subhikṣamatulaṃ saṃdhyayorvṛṣṭināśanam hariśārdūlavārāhakharakuñjaramāhiṣāḥ aśvaśpavājavṛṣāḥ pādāyudhāḥ karaṇavāhanāḥ  NarP bhuśuḍī ca gadākhaḍgau daṇḍa iṣaavāsatomarau  NarP kuntapāśāṅkuśāstreṣūnbibharti karayostvinaḥ annaṃ ca pāyasaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ sayūṣaṃ ca payo dadhi  NarP miṣṭānnaṃ guḍamadhvājyaśarkarā vavato haviḥ vavovīvaṇijeviśvāṃ bālave gocarasthitau  NarP kaulave śakunau bhānuḥ kiṃstughne corddhasaṃsthitathaḥ catuḥ pāde tilenāge suptaḥ krāntiṃ karoti hi  NarP dharmāyurvṛṣṭiṣu samaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kramāt āyudhaṃ vāhanāhārau yajjātīyaṃ janasya ca  NarP svāpopaviṣṭāstiṣṭhantaste lokāḥ kṣemamāpnuyuḥ andhakaṃ mandasaṃjñaṃ ca madhyasaṃjñaṃ sulocanam  NarP papīyādgaṇayodbhāni rohiṇyādicaturvidham sthirabheṣvarkasaṃkrāntirjñeyā viṣṇupadāhvayā  NarP ṣaḍaśītimukhā jñeyā dvisvabhāveṣu rāśiṣu tulāghaṭājayorjñeyo viṣuvatsūryasaṃkramaḥ  NarP yāmyāyane sthire tvādyāḥ parāḥ saumyendumūrtibhaiḥ medhyā viṣuvati proktāḥ puṇyanāḍyastu ṣoḍaśa  NarP saṃdhyā trināḍī pramitārkabiṃborddhodayāstataḥ prākpaścādyāmyasaumye cetpuṇyaṃ pūrvāṃpare hani  NarP yādṛśenendunā bhānoḥ saṃkrāntistādṛśaṃ phalam naraḥ prāpnoti tadrāśau śītāṃśoḥ sādhvasādhu ca  NarP saṃkrānteḥ parato bhānurbhuktvā yāvadbhiraṃśakaiḥ raverayanasaṃkrāntistadā tadrāśisaṃkramāt  NarP sakrāntigrahagarkṣaṃvā janmanyubhayapārśvayoḥ vratodvāhādikeṣveva dvayaṃ neṣṭaṃ tu tatkramāt  NarP tiloparilikheccakraṃ tritriśūlaṃ trikoṇakam tatra hema vinikṣipya dadyāddoṣāpavṛttayeḥ  NarP tārābalena śītāṃśurbalavāṃstadvaśādraviḥ balī saṃkramamāṇastu tadvatkheṭā balādhikāḥ  NarP śubhorke janmatastryāyadaśaṣaṭsu munīśvara navapañcāṃburiṣphasthairvyarkibhirvidhyate na cet  NarP śubho janmarkṣataścandro dyūnāṅgāyārisvatriṣu yatheṣṭāntyāṃbudharmasthaivibudhairvidhyate na cet  NarP tryāyāriṣu kujaḥ śreṣṭho janmanā cenna vidhyate vyayeṣvaṅkasthitaiḥ saurisaumyasūryaiḥ śubhauṣadhāt  NarP jñaḥ svāyāryaṣṭaravayiṣu janmataścenna vidhaayate dhītryakādigajāntasthaiḥ śaśāṅkarahitaiḥ śubhaiḥ  NarP janmarāśerguruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ svāyago dhyastago na cet vidhyatentyāṣṭaravāṃbutrigataiḥ ravaiṭairmunīśvarā  NarP janmabhādāsutāṣṭāṅkāntyāyeṣviṣṭo bhṛgoḥsutaḥ cenna viddho ṣṭasaptāṅgam ravāṅkādyāyārirāmagaiḥ  NarP na dadāti śubhaṃ kiñcidgocare vedhasaṃyute tasmādvedhaṃ vicāryātha kathanīyaṃ śubhāśubham  NarP vāmabhedavidhānena duṣṭo pi syācchubhaṅkaraḥ saumyekṣito niṣṭaphalaḥ śubhadaḥ pāpavīkṣitaḥ  NarP niṣphalau tau grahau svena śatruṇā ca vilokitau nīcarāśigataḥ svasya śatroḥ kṣetragato pi vā  NarP śubhāśubhaphalaṃ naiva dadyādastamitopi vā graheṣu viṣamastheṣu śāntiṃ kuryātprayatnataḥ  NarP hānirvṛddhirgrahādhīnā tasmātpūjyatamā grahāḥ maṇirmuktāphalaṃ vidrumākhyaṃ maraka taṃ tathā  NarP puṣparāgaṃ tathā vajraṃ nīlaṃ gomedasaṃjñitam dūryyaṃ bhāskarādīnāṃ tuṣṭya dhāryaṃ yathākramam  NarP śuklapakṣādidivase candro yasya śubhapradaḥ sa pakṣastasya śubhadaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣonyathāśubhaḥ  NarP śuklapakṣe śubhaścandro dvitīyanavapañcame riḥpharandhrāṃbusaṃsthaiścainna viddho gagane caraiḥ  NarP janma saṃpadvipat kṣema pratyariḥ sādhako vadhaḥ mitraṃ paramamitraṃ ca janmabhāttu punaḥ puna  NarP janmatripañcasaptākhyāstārā neṣṭa phalapradāḥ śākaṃ guḍaṃ ca lavaṇaṃ satilaṃ kāñcanaṃ kramāt  NarP aniṣṭaphalanāśāya dadyādetaddvijātaye kṛṣṇe balavatī tārā śuklapakṣe balū śaśī candrasya dvādaśāvasthā rāśaurāśau yathākramam  NarP yātrodvāhādikāryeṣu nāmatulyaphalapradāḥ ṣaṣṭighnaṃ gatacandrarkṣaṃ tatkālaghaṭikānvitam vedaghnamiṣuvedāntyamavasthā bhānubhāgataḥ  NarP pravāsanaṣṭākhyamṛtā jayo hāsyaṃ ratimudā śinibhuktirjvaraḥ kaṃpaḥ susthitirnāmasannibhāḥṛ  NarP paṭṭabandhanayānograsaṃdhivigrahabhūṣaṇam dhātvākaraṃ yuddhakarma meṣalagne prasiddhyati  NarP maṅgalāni sthirāṇyaṃvuveśmakarmapravartanam kṛṣivāṇijyapaśvādiduṣṭalagne prasiddhyati  NarP kalāvijñānaśilpāni bhūṣaṇāhavasaṃśravam gajodvāhābhiṣekādyaṃ karttavyaṃ mithunodaye  NarP vāpīkūpataḍāgādi vāribandhanamokṣaṇam pauṣṭikaṃ lipilekhādi kartavyaṃ karkaṭodaye  NarP ikṣudhānyavaṇikpaṇyakṛṣisevādayaḥsthire sāhasāhavabhūpādyaṃ siṃhalagne prasiddhyati  NarP vidyāśilpauṣadhaṃ kṛtyaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ ca carasthiram kanyā lagne vidheyaṃ ca pauṣṭikākhilamaṅgalam  NarP kṛṣivāṇijyayānaṃ ca paśūdvāhavratādikam tulāyāmakhilaṃ karma tulābhārāśrite ca yat  NarP sthirakarmākhilaṃ kāryaṃ rājasevābhiṣecanam cauryakarmasthirāraṃbhāḥ kartavyā vṛścikodaye  NarP vratodvāhaprayāṇāśvagajaśilpakalādikam carasthiravimiśraṃ ca kartavyaṃ kārmukodaye  NarP cāpabandhanamokṣāstrakṛṣigośvādikam yat prasthānaṃ paśudāsādi kartavyaṃ makarodaye  NarP kṛṣivāṇijyapaśvaṃbuśilpaṅkarmakalādikam jalapātrāstrāśastrādi kartavyaṃ kalaśodaye  NarP vratodvāhābhiṣekāṃbusthāpanaṃ sanniveśanam bhūṣaṇaṃ jalapātrāśvakarma mīnodaye śubham  NarP meṣādiṣu kligneṣu śuddheṣvevaṃ prasiddhyati krūragrahekṣiteṣūgrasaṃyuteṣūgrameva hi  NarP goyugmakarkakanyāntyatulācāpadharāḥ śubhāḥ śubharkṣatvāśubhāsatya itarā pāparāśayaḥ  NarP grahayogāvalokābhyāṃ rāśirdhatte grahodbhavam phalaṃ tābhyāṃ vihīno sau svabhāvamupasarpati  NarP ādau saṃpūrṇaphaladaṃ madhye madhyaphalapradam ante tucchaphale lagne sarvasminnevameva hi  NarP sarvatra prathamaṃ lagnaṃ kartuścandrabalaṃ tataḥ kalpyāmadindau balini saptame balino grahāḥ  NarP candrasya valimādhāramādheya cānyakheṭakam ādhārabhūtenādheyaṃ dhīyate paridhiṣṭinam  NarP cendinduḥ śubhadaḥ sarve grahāḥ śubhaphalapradāḥ aśubhaścedaśubhadā varjayitvā dhanādhipam  NarP lagnasyābhyuditā yeṃśāsteṣvaṃśeṣu sthito grahaḥ lagnodbhavaṃ phalaṃ dhatte dhanātīto dvitīyakam  NarP evaṃ sthāneṣu śeṣeṣu caivamevaṃ prakalpayet lagnaṃ sarvaguṇopetaṃ labhyate lpairdinairno  NarP doṣālpatvaṃ guṇādhikyaṃ bahu saṃtatamiṣyate doṣādduṣṭo hi kālastamapi mārṣṭuṃ pitāmahaḥ  NarP apyaśaucatuṇādhikyaṃ doṣānyatte tato hi te amāriktāṣṭamīṣaṣṭīdvādaśīpratipatsvapi  NarP parighasya ca pūrvārddhaṃ vyatīpāte savaidhṛtau saṃdhyāsūpaplave viṣṭyāmaśubhaṃ prathamārttavam  NarP rugṇā patipriyā duḥkhī putriṇī bhogamī tathā pativratā keśayuktā sūryavārādiṣu kramāt  NarP yāmāgniraudrabhāgyayāhidvīśendrādihyupadviṣāḥ tārakā na hitā māsā madhūrjaśucipauṣakāḥ  NarP bhadrā ca saṃkramonidrā rātriścandrārkayorgrahaḥ kulaṭā pāpabhogeṣu nindyarkṣe nindyavāsare  NarP tilājyadūrvā juhuyādgāyatryāṣṭaśataṃ budhaḥ suvarṇagotilāndadyātsarvadoṣāpanuttaye  NarP ādyā niśaścatasrastu tyājyā hyapi samāḥ paraiḥ ojarāśyaṃśage candre lagne puṅgrahavīkṣite  NarP upavītī yugmatithāvanagnaḥ kāmayetstriyam putrārthī puruṣaśastyaktvā pauṣṇamūlāhipitryabham  NarP prasiddhe prathame garbhe tṛtīye vā dvitīyake māse puṃsavanaṃ kāryaṃ sīmantaṃ ca yathā tathā  NarP caturthe māsi ṣaṣṭe vāpyaṣṭame vā tadīśvare balopapanne daṃpatyoścandratārābalānvite  NarP ariktāparvadivase kujajīvārkavāsare tīkṣṇamiśrārkavarjyeṣu puṃbhāṃśerātrināyake  NarP śuddhe ṣṭame janmalagnāttayorlagne na naidhane śubhagrahayute dṛṣṭe pāpadṛṣṭivivarjite  NarP śubhagraheṣu dhīdharmakendreṣvaribhave triṣu pāpeṣu satsu candretyanidhanādyarivarjite  NarP krūragrahāṇāmekopi lagnādantyātmajāṣṭagaḥ sīmantinīṃ vā tadgarbhaṃ balī hṝnti na saṃśayaḥ  NarP tasmiñjanmamuhūrte pi sūtakāntepi vā śiśoḥ jātakarma prakartavyaṃ pitṛpūjanapūrvakam  NarP sūtakānte nāmakarma vidheyaṃ tatkulocitam nāmapūrvaṃ praśastaṃ syānmaṅgalaiḥ susamīkṣitaiḥ  NarP deśakālopaghātādyaiḥ kālātikramaṇaṃ yadā anastage bhṛgāvījye tatkārye cottarāyaṇe  NarP carasthiramṛdukṣipranakṣatre śubhavāsare candrātārābalopete divase ca śiśoḥ pituḥ  NarP śubhalagne śubhāṃśe ca nidhane śuddhisaṃyute ṣaṣṭe māsyaṣṭame vāpi puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ tu pañcame  NarP saptame māsi vā kāryaṃ navānnapraśanaṃ śubham riktāṃ dinakṣayaṃ nandāṃ dvādaśīmaṣṭamīmatha  NarP tyaktvānyatithiṣu proktaṃ praśanaṃ śubhavāsare carasthiramṛdukṣipranakṣatre śubhanaidhane  NarP daśame śuddhisaṃyukte śubhalagne śubhāṃśake pūrvārddhe saumyakheṭena saṃyukte vīkṣitepi vā  NarP triṣaṣṭalābhagaiḥ krūraiḥ kendradhīdharmagaiḥ śubhaiḥ vyayārinidhanasthe ca candre nnaprāśanaṃ śubham  NarP tṛtīye pañcame cābde svakulācārato pi vā bālānāṃ janmataścaulaṃ svagṛhyoktavidhānataḥ  NarP saumyāyane nāstagayoḥ surārisuramantriṇoḥ aparvariktātithiṣu śukrejyajñenduvāsare  NarP dasrāditījyacandrendrapūṣabhāni śubhāni ca caulakarmaṇi hastakṣārrtrīṇitrīṇi ca viṣṇubhāt  NarP paṭṭabandhanacaulānnaprāśane copanāyane śubhadaṃ janmanakṣatramaśubhaṃ tvanyakarmaṇi  NarP aṣṭame śuddhisaṃyukteṃ śubhalagne śubhāṃśake janmāṣṭame na śītāṃśau ṣaṣṭāṣṭāntyavivarjite  NarP dhanatrikoṇakendrasthaiḥ śubhaistryāyārigaiḥ paraiḥ abhyakte sandhyayornāre niśi bhuktvā na vāhave  NarP notkaṭe bhūṣite naiva yāne na navame hni ca kṣaurakarma mahīpānāṃ pañcamepañcame hani  NarP kartavyaṃ kṣoranakṣatre pyatha vāsyodaye śubham nṛpaviprājñayā yajñe maraṇe bandhamokṣaṇeṃ  NarP udvāhe khilavārarkṣatithiṣu kṣauramiṣṭadam kartavyaṃ maṅgaleṣvādau maṅgalāya kṣurārpaṇam  NarP navame saptame vāpi pañcame divase pi vā tṛtīye bījanakṣatre śubhavāre śubhodaye  NarP samyaggṛhāṇyalaṅkṛtya vitānadhvajatoraṇaiḥ āśiṣo vācanaṃ kāryaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyāṅganādibhiḥ  NarP sahavāditranṛtyādyairgatvā prāguttarāṃ diśam tatra mṛdatatastīkṣṇā gṛhītvā punarāgataḥ  NarP mṛṇyaye pyathavā vaiṇave pi pātre prapūrayet anekabījasaṃyuktaṃ toyaṃ puṣpābhiśobhitam  NarP ādhānādaṣṭame varṣe janmato vāgrajanmanām rājñā mekādaśe maiñjībandhanaṃ dvādaśe viśām  NarP janmataḥ pañcame varṣe vedaśāstrariṃśāradaḥ upavītī yataḥ śrīmānkāryaṃ tatropanāyanam  NarP bālasya balahīno pari sito jīvaḥ śubhapradaḥ yathoktavatsare kāryamanukte nopanāyanam  NarP dṛśyamānagurau śukre śākheśe cottarāyaṇe vedānāmadhipā jīvaśukrabhaumabudhāḥ kramāt  NarP śaradgrīṣmavasaṃteṣu vyutkramāttu dvijanmanām mukhyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ tapomāsādipañcasu  NarP svakulācāradharmajño mādhamāse tu phalgune vidhijñaścārthavāṃścaitre vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ  NarP vaiśāṣe dhanavānvendaśāstravidyāviśāradaḥ upanīto balāḍhyaśca jyeṣṭhe vidhividāṃ varaḥ  NarP śuklapakṣe dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā pañcamī tathā trayodaśī ca daśamī saptamī vratabandhane  NarP śreṣṭhā tvekādaśī ṣaṣṭī dvādaśyanyāstu madhyamāḥ kṛthaṣṇe dvitrīṣusaṃkhyāśca tithyo nyā hyatininditāḥ  NarP dhiṣṇānyarkatrayāntejyarudrādityuttarāṇi ca viṣṇutrayāṃśvimitrābjayonibhānyupanāyane  NarP janmabhāddaśamaṃ karma saṃghātarkṣaṃ tu ṣoḍaśam aṣṭādaśaṃ samudayaṃ trayoviṃśaṃ vināśanam  NarP mānasaṃ mānasaṃ pañcaviṃśarkṣaṃ nācarecchubhameṣu tu ācāryasaumyakāvyānāṃ vārāḥ śastāḥ śaśīnayoḥ  NarP vārau tu madhyamau caiva vrate nyau ninditau matau tridhā vibhajya divasaṃ tatrādau karma daivikam  NarP dvitīye mānuṣaṃ kāryaṃ tṛtīye ḥṃśe ca paitṛkam svanīcage tadaṃśe vā svāribhe vā tadaṃśake  NarP guruśikhinośca śākheśe kalāśīlavivarjitaḥ svādhiśatrugṛhasthe vā tadaṃśasthe tha vā vratī  NarP śākheśe vā gurau śukre mahāpātakakṛdbhavet svoccasaṃsthe tadaṃśe vā svarāśau rāśige gaṇe  NarP śākheśe vā gurau śukre kendrage vā trikoṇage atīva dhanavāṃścaiva vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ  NarP paramoccagate jīve śākheśe vātha vā sate vratī viśuddhe nidhane vedaśāstraviśāradaḥ  NarP svādhimitragṛhasthe vā tasyoñcasthe tadaṃśage gurau bhṛgau vā śākheśe vidyādhanasamanvitaḥ  NarP śākhādhipativāraśca śākhādhipabalaṃ śiśoḥ śaākhādhipatilagnaṃ ca durlabhaṃ tritayaṃ vrate  NarP tasmādvedvāṃśage candre vratī vidyāviśāradaḥ pāpāṃśage vā daridro nityaduḥkhitaḥ  NarP śravaṇādini nakṣatre karkāṃśasthe niśākare tadā vratī vedaśāstradhanadhānyasamṛddhimān  NarP śubhalagne śubhāṃśe ca naidhane śuddhisaṃyute lagne tu nidhane saumyaiḥ saṃyute vā nirīkṣite  NarP iṣṭairjīvārkacandrādyaiḥ pañcabhirbalibhirgrahai ākhugomahiṣavyāghrakālīvyāghramṛgadvayam  NarP śvānaḥ kaparirbabhruyuge kapisiṃhaturaṅgamāḥ siṃhagodantino bhānāṃ yonayaḥ syuryathāśvibhāt  NarP śvaiṇaṃ babhraragaṃ meṣavānarau siṃhavāraṇam govyāghramākhumārjāraṃ mahiṣāścaṃ ca śātravam  NarP jhaṣālikarkaṭā viprāsta dūrdhvāḥ kṣatriyādayaḥ puṃvarṇarāśeḥ strīrāśau satihīne yathāśubham  NarP catustrivdyaṅghribhotthāyāḥ kanyāyāścāśvibhātkramāt vahnibhādindubhānnāḍītricatuḥpañcaparvasu  NarP gaṇayetsaṃkhyayā caikanāḍyāṃ mṛtyurna pārśvayoḥ prājāpatyabrāhmadaivā vivāhāścārṣasaṃyutāḥ  NarP uktakāle tu kartavyāścatvāraḥ phaladāyakāḥ gandharvāsurapaiśācarākṣasākhyāstu sarvadā  NarP caturthamabhijillagnamudayarkṣāñca saptamam godhūlikaṃ tadubhayaṃ vivāhe putrapautradam  NarP prācyā na ca kaliṅgānāṃ mukhyaṃ godhūlikaṃ smṛtam abhijitsarvadeśeṣu mukhyo doṣavināśakṛt  NarP madhyandinagate bhānau muhūrto bhijidāhvayaḥ nāśayatyakhilāndoṣānpinākī tripuraṃ yathā  NarP putrodvāhātparaṃ putrīvivāho na ṛtutraye na tayorvratamudvāhānmaṅgale nānyamaṅgalam  NarP vivāhaścaikajanyānāṃ ṣaṇmāsābhyantare yadi asaṃśayaṃ tribhirvarṣaistatraikā vidhavā bhavet  NarP pratyudvāho naiva kāryo naikasmai duhitṛdvayam na caikajanyayoḥ puṃsorekajanye tu kanyake  NarP naivaṃ kadācidudvāho naikadā muṇḍanadvayam divājātastu pitaraṃ rātrau tu jananīṃ tathā  NarP ātmānaṃ saṃdhyayorhanti nāsti gaṇḍe viparyayaḥ sutaḥ sutā vā niyataṃ śvasuraṃ hṝnti mūlajaḥ  NarP tadantyapādajo naiva tathāśleṣādyapādajaḥ jyeṣṭāntyapādajau jyeṣṭaṃ bālo hṝnti na bālikā  NarP na bālikāṃbumūlarkṣe mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā saindrī dhavāgrajaṃ hṝnti devaraṃ tu dvidaivajā  NarP ārabhyodvāhadivasāt ṣaṣṭe vāpyaṣṭame dine vadhūpraveśa saṃpattyaidaśame saptame dine  NarP hāyanadvitayaṃ janmabhalagnadivasānapi saṃtyajya hyatiśukre pi yātrā vaivāhikī śubhā  NarP śrīpradaṃ sarvagīrvāṇasthāpanaṃ cottarāyaṇe gīrvāṇapūrvagīrvāṇamatriṇordṛśyamānayoḥ  NarP vicaitreṣveva māseṣu māghādiṣu ca pañcasu śuklapakṣeṣu kṛṣṇeṣu tadādiṣvaṣṭasu śubham  NarP dineṣu karmagā duḥkhadāḥ pāpā saumyāścandraśca kīrtidāḥ lābhasthānagatāḥ sarve bhūrilābhapradā grahāḥ  NarP vyayasthānagatāḥ śaśvadbahūvyayakarā grahāḥ hṝntyarthahīnāḥ kartāraṃ mantrahīnāstu ṛtvijam  NarP sriyaṃ lakṣaṇahīnāstu na pratiṣṭāsamo ripuḥ guṇādhikatare lagne doṣaḥ svalpataro yadi  NarP surāṇāṃ sthāpanaṃ tatra karturiṣṭārthasiddhidam nirmāṇāyatanagrāmagṛhādīnāṃ samāsataḥ  NarP kṣetramādau parīkṣeta gandhavarṇarasāṃśakaiḥ madhupuṣpāmlapiśitagandhaṃ viprānupūrvakam  NarP sitaṃ raktaṃ ca haritaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ yathākramam madhuraṃ kaṭukaṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyakarasaṃ kramāt  NarP atyantavṛddhidaṃ nṝṇāmīśānaprāgudagplavam anyadikṣu plave teṣāṃ śaśvadatyantahānidam  NarP samagartāratnimātraṃ khanitvā tatra pūrayet atyantavṛddhiradhike hīne hāniḥ same samam  NarP tathā niśādau tatkṛtvā pānīyena prapūrayet prātardṛṣṭe jale vṛddhiḥ samaṃ paṅke kṣayaḥ kṣaye  NarP evaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ samyak kṣetraṃ samīkṣyate diksādhanāya tanmadhye samaṃ maṇḍalamālikhet  NarP dvādaśāṅgulakaṃ śaṅkuṃ sthāpyekṣettatra diktramam caturasrīkṛte kṣetre ṣaḍvargapariśodhite  NarP rekhāmārge ca karttavyaṃ prākāraṃ sumanoharam āyāmeṣu caturdikṣu prāgādiṣu ca satsvapi  NarP aṣṭāvaṣṭau pratidiśaṃ dvārāṇi bhītirarthāptirddhanavarddhanam anāntakaṃ vyādhibhayaṃ niḥsattvaṃ dakṣiṇādiśi  NarP putrahāniḥ śatruvṛddhirlakṣmīprāptirddhanāgamaḥ saubhāgyamatidaurbhāgyaṃ duḥkhaṃ śokaśca paścime  NarP kalatrahānirniḥ sattvaṃ hānirddhānyadhanāgamaḥ saṃpadvṛddhirmāsabhītirāmayaṃ diśi śītagoḥ  NarP evaṃ gṛhādiṣu dvāravistārāddviguṇocchritam paścime dakṣiṇe vāpi kapāṭaṃ sthāpayedgṛhe  NarP prākārāntaḥ kṣitiṃ kuryādekāśītipadaṃ yathā madhye navapade brahmasthānaṃ tadatininditam  NarP dvātriṃśadaṃśāḥ prākārasamīyāṃśāḥ samantataḥ piśācāṃśe gṛhāraṃbhe duḥkhaśokabhayapradaḥ  NarP śeṣāśāḥ syuśca nirmāṇe sapokhugajaśāśakāḥ digvargāṇāmiyaṃ yoniḥ svavargātpañcamo ripuḥ  NarP sādhyavargaḥ puraḥ sthāpya pṛṣṭataḥ sādhakaṃ nyaset vyatyaye nāśanaṃ tasya ṛṇamadhyaṃ dhanācchubham  NarP ārabhya sādhakaṃ pūjyāstatrāntaḥsthāsrayodaśa  NarP teṣāṃ sthānāni nāmāni vakṣyāmi kramaśodhunā īśānakoṇato bāhyo dvātriṃśatrridaśā amī  NarP kṛpīṭayoniḥ parjanyo jayantaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ sūryaḥ śaśī mṛgākāśau vāyuḥ pūṣā āpaḥ sāvitraghasaṃjñaśca jayo rudraḥ kramādamī ekāntarā syuḥ prāgādyāḥ parito brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ  NarP aryamā savitā biṃbavivattkānvaktudhādhipaḥ mitrotha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharāhvayaḥ  NarP āpavatso ṣṭamaḥ pañcacatvāriṃśatsurā amī āpaścaivāpavatsaśca parjanyo gnirditiḥ kramāt  NarP yaddikkānāṃ ca vargo yamevaṃ koṇeṣvaśeṣataḥ tanmadhye viṃśatirbāhyā dvipadāste tu sarvadā  NarP aryamā ca brahmamantreṇa vā śvetavastrayugmaṃ pradāpayet āvāhanādisarvopacārāṃśca kramaśastathā  NarP naivedyaṃ trividhānnena vādyaiḥ sahasamarpayet tāmbūlaṃ ca tataḥ kartā prārthayedvāstupūruṣam  NarP vāstupuruṣa namaste stu bhūśayyānirata prabho madgṛhe dhanadhānyādisamṛddhaṃ kuru sarvadā  NarP iti prārthya yathāśaktyā dakṣiṇāmarcakāya ca dadyāttadagre viprebhyo bhojanaṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ  NarP anena vidhinā samyagvāstupūjāṃ karoti yaḥ ārogyaṃ putralābhaṃ ca dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ labhennaraḥ  NarP akṛtvā vāstupūjāṃ yaḥ praviśennavamandiram rogānnānāvidhānkleśānaśnute sarvasaṃkaṭam  NarP akapāṭamanācchannamadattabalibhojanam gṛhaṃ na praviśedevaṃ vipadāmākaraṃ hi tat  NarP atho yātrā nṛpādīnāmabhīṣṭaphalasiddhaye syāttathā tāṃ pravakṣyāmi samyagvijñātajanmanām  NarP ajñātajanmanāṃ nṝṇāṃ phalāptirghuṇavarṇavat praśnodayanimittādyaisteṣāmapi phalodayaḥ  NarP ṣaṣṭyaṣṭamīdvādaśīṣu riktāmāpūrṇimāsu ca yātrā śuklapratipadi nirddhanāya kṣayāya ca  NarP maitrāditīndvārkāntyāśvihāgitiṣyavasūḍuṣu asaptapañcatryādyeṣu yātrābhīṣṭaphalapradāḥ  NarP na mandendudine prācīṃ na vrajeddakṣiṇaṃ gurau sitārkayerna pratīcīṃ nodīcīṃ jñārayorddine  NarP indrājapādacaturāsyāryamarkṣāṇi pūrvataḥ śūlāni sarvadvārāṇi mitrārkejyāśvabhāni ca  NarP kramāddigdvārabhāni syuḥ saptasaptāgnidhiṣṇyataḥ parighaṃ laṅghayeddaṇḍaṃ nāgniśvasanardiggamam  NarP āgneyaṃ pūrvadigdhiṣṇyairvidiśaścaivameva hi digrāśayastu kramaśo meṣādyāśca punaḥ punaḥ  NarP digīśvare lalāṭasthe yāturna punarāgamaḥ lagnastho bhāskaraḥ prācyāṃ diśi yāturlalāṭagaḥ  NarP dvādaśaikādaśaḥ śukro pyāgneyyāntu lalāṭagaḥ daśamasthaḥ kujo lagnādyābhyāṃ yāturlalāṭagaḥ  NarP navamāṣṭamago rāhurnaiṛtyāṃ tu lalāṭagaḥ lagnātsaptamagaḥ sauriḥ pratīcyāṃ tu lalāṭagaḥ  NarP ṣaṣṭaḥ pañcamagaścandro vāyavyāṃ ca lalāṭagaḥ caturthasthānagaḥ saumyaścottarasyāṃ lalāṭagaḥ  NarP dvitristhānagato jīva īśānyāṃ vai lalāṭagaḥ lalāṭaṃ tu parityajya jīvitecchurvrajennaraḥ  NarP vilomago graho yasya yājanādhyāpane ratāḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne ekonaṣaṣṭitamo dhyāyaḥsanadana uvācaavatīrṇeṣu vipreṣu yāsaḥ putrasahāyavān tūrṣṇīṃ dhyānaparo dhīmānekānte samupāviśat  NarP tamuvācāśarī rī vāk vyāsaṃ putrasamanvitam bho bho maharṣe bāsiṣṭha brahmaghoṣo na vartate  NarP eko dhyānaparastūṣṇī kimāḥse cintayanniva brahmaghoṣairvirahitaḥ parvato yaṃ na śobhate  NarP tasmādadhīṣva bhagavansārddha putreṇa dhīmatā vedānvedavidā caiva suprasannamanāḥ sadā  NarP tacchutvā vacanaṃ vyāso nabhovāṇīsamīritam śukena saha putreṇa vedābhyāsamathākarot  NarP tayorabhyasatorevaṃ bahukālaṃ dvijottama vāto timātraṃ pravavau samudrānilavījitaḥ  NarP tato nadhyāya iti taṃ vyāsaḥ putramavārayat śuko vāritamātrastu kautūhalasamanvitaḥ  NarP apṛcchatpitaraṃ tatra
