saśarīreṣvanityeṣu nityaṃ kimanucintayet bhūteṣu bhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye buddhyā tamasaḥ param  NarP na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyanti paramāṃ gatim saṃcinvannekamevainaṃ kāmānāvitṛptakam  NarP vyāghra paśumivāsādya mṛtyurādāya gacchati athāpyupāyaṃ saṃpaśyedduḥkhasyāsya vimokṣaṇe  NarP aśocannārabhennaiva yuktaścāvyasanī bhavet śabde sparśe rase rūpe gandhe ca paramaṃ tathā  NarP nopabhogātparaṃ kiñciddhanino vādhanasya vā vāksaṃprayogādbhṛtānāṃ nāsti duḥkhamanāmayam  NarP viprayogaśca sarvasya na vācā na ca vidyayā praṇayaṃ parisaṃhṛtya saṃstuteṣvitareṣu ca  NarP vicaredasamunnaddhaḥ sa sukhī sa ca paṇḍitaḥ adhyātmagatamālīno nirapekṣo nirāmiṣaḥ  NarP ātmanaiva sahāyena caścaretsa sukhī bhavet sukhaduḥkhaviparyāso yadā samupapadyate  NarP nainaṃ prajñā suniyataṃ trāyate nāpi pauruṣam svabhāvādyatnamātiṣṭhedyatnavānnāvasīdati  NarP upadrava ivāniṣṭo yoniṃ garbhaḥ prapadyate tāni pūrvaśarīrāṇi nityamekaṃ śarīriṇam  NarP prāṇināṃ prāṇasaṃrodhe māṃsaśleṣmaviceṣṭitam nirdagdhaṃ paradehena paradeṃhaṃ balābalam  NarP vinaśyati vināśānte nāvi nāvamivācalām saṃgatyā jaṭhare nyastaṃ retobindumacetanam  NarP kena yatnena jīvantaṃ garbhaṃ tvamiha paśyasi annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣyāśca bhakṣitāḥ  NarP tasminnevodare garbhaḥ kiṃ nānnamiva jīryati garbhe mūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ svabhāvaniyatā gatiḥ  NarP dhāraṇe vā visarge ca na kartuṃ vidyate vaśaḥ prabhavantyudare garbhā jāyamānāstathāpare  NarP āgamena mahānyeṣāṃ vināśa upapadyate etasmādyonisaṃbandhādyo jīvanparimucyate  NarP pūjāṃ na labhate kāñcitpunarddhandveṣu majjati garbhasya saha jātasya saptamīmīdṛśīṃ daśām  NarP prāpnuvanti tataḥ pañca na bhavanti śatāyuṣaḥ nābhyutthāne manuṣyāṇāṃ yogāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP vyādhibhiśca vivadhyante vyāghraiḥ kṣudramṛgā iva vyādhibhirbhakṣyamāṇānāṃ tyajatāṃ vipulandhanam  NarP vedanā nāpakarṣanti yatamānāścikitsakāḥ  NarP te cāpi vividhā vaidyāḥ kuśalā saṃmatauṣadhāḥ vyādhibhiḥ parikṛṣyante mṛgā jyāghrairivārditāḥ  NarP te pibanti kaṣāyāṃśca sarpīṣi vividhāni ca dṛśyante jarayā bhagnā nāgairnāgā ivottamāḥ  NarP kairvā bhuvi cikitsyenta rogārttā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ śvāpadāśca daridrāśca prāyo nārtā bhavanti te  NarP ghorānapi durādharṣānnṛpatīnugratejasa ākramya roga ādatte paśūnpaśupaco yathā  NarP iti lokamanākrandaṃ mohaśokapariplutam srotasā mahasā kṣipraṃ hriyamāṇaṃ balīyasā  NarP na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasā tathā svabhāvā hyativartante ye nirmuktāḥ śarīriṣu  NarP uparyapari lokasya sarvo bhavitumicchati yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tadvartate tathā  NarP na mriyerannajīryeransarve syuḥ sārvakāmikāḥ nāpriyaṃ pratipadyerannutthānasya phalaṃ prati  NarP aiśvaryamadamattāśca mānānmayamadena ca apramattāḥ śaṭhāḥ krūrā vikrāntāḥ paryupāsate  NarP śokāḥ pratinivartante keṣāñcidasamīkṣatām svaṃ svaṃ ca punaranyeṣāṃ na kañcidatigacchati  NarP mahañca phalavaiṣamyaṃ dṛśyate karmasaṃdhiṣu vahṝnti śibikāmanye yāntyanye śibikāruhaḥ  NarP sarveṣāmṛddhikāmānāmanye rathapuraḥ sarāḥ manujāśca gataśrīkāḥ śataśo vividhāḥ striyāḥ  NarP dvandvārāmeṣu bhūteṣu gacchantyekaikaśo narāḥ idamanyatparaṃ paśya nātra mohaṃ kariṣyasi  NarP dharmaṃ cāpi tyajā dharmaṃ tyaja satyānṛtāṃ dhiyam sarvaṃ tyaktvā svarūpasthaḥ sukhī bhava nirāmayaḥ  NarP etatte paramaṃ guhyamākhyātamṛṣisattama yena devāḥ parityajya bhartyalokaṃ divaṃ gatāḥ  NarP sanandana uvācaityuktvā vyāsatanayaṃ samāpṛcchya mahāmuniḥ sanatkumāraḥ prayayau pūjitastena sādaram  NarP śuko pi yogināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ samyagjñātvā hyavasthitam brahmaṇaḥ padamanveṣṭumutsukaḥ pitaraṃ yayau  NarP tataḥ pitrā samāgamya praṇamya ca mahāmuniḥ śukaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yayau kailāsaparvatam  NarP vyāsastadvirahāddūnaḥ putrasnehasamāvṛtaḥ kṣaṇaikaṃ sthīyatāṃ putra iti ca krośa durmanāḥ  NarP nirapekṣaḥ śuko bhūtvā niḥsneho muktabandhanaḥ mokṣamevānusaṃcitya gata eva paraṃ padam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ekaṣaṣṭitamo dhyāyaḥsūta uvācaetacchrṛtvā tu vacanaṃ nārado bhagavānṛṣiḥ punaḥ papraccha taṃ vipra śukābhipatanaṃ munim  NarP nārada uvācabhagavansarvamākhyātaṃ tvayātikaruṇātmanā yacchrṛtvā mānasaṃ me dya śāntimagryāmupāgatam  NarP punaśca mokṣaśāstraṃ me tvamādiśa mahāmune nahi sampūrṇatāmeti tṛṣṇā kṛṣṇaguṇārṇave  NarP ye tu saṃsāranirmuktā mokṣa śāstraparāyaṇāḥ kutra te nivasaṃtīha saṃśayo me mahānayam  NarP taṃ chindhi sumahābhāgatvatto nānyo vidāṃvaraḥ sanaṃudhārayāmāsa cātmānaṃ yathāśāstraṃ mahāmuniḥ  NarP pādātprabhṛti gātreṣu krameṇa kramayogavit tataḥ sa prāṅmukho vidvānādityena virocite  NarP pāṇipādaṃ samādhāya vinītavadupāviśat na tatra pakṣisaṃghāto na śabdo na ca darśanam  NarP yatra vaiyāsakirddhāmni yoktuṃ samupacakrame sa dadarśa tadātmānaṃ sarvasaṃgaviniḥsṛtaḥ  NarP prajahāsa tato hāsaṃ śukaḥ samprekṣya bhāskaram sa punaryogamāsthāya mokṣamārgopalabdhaye  NarP mahāyogīśvaro bhūtvā so tyakrāmadvihāyasam antarīkṣacaraḥ śrīmānvyāsaputraḥ suniścitaḥ  NarP tamundyantaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ vainateyasamadyutim dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni manomārutaraṃhasam  NarP yathāśakti yathānyāyaṃ pūjayāñcakrire tathā puṣpa varṣaiśca divyaistamavacakrurdivaukasaḥ  NarP taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ ṛṣayaścaiva saṃsiddhāḥ ko yaṃ siddhimupāgataḥ  NarP tato sau svāhrayaṃ tebhyaḥ kathayāmāsa nārada uvāca ca mahātejāstānṛṣīnsaṃpraharṣitaḥ  NarP pitā yadyanugacchenmāṃ krośamānaḥ śuketi vai tasmai prativacodeyaṃ bhavadbhistu samāhitaiḥ  NarP bāḍhamuktastatastaistu lokānhitvā caturvidhān tamo hyaṣṭavidhaṃ tyaktvā jahau pañcavidhaṃ rajaḥ  NarP tataḥ satvaṃ jahau dhīmāṃstadadbhutamivābhavat tatastasminpade nitye nirguṇe liṅgapūjite  NarP tataḥ sa śṛṅge pratime himavanmerusannibhe saṃśliṣṭe śvetapīte ca rukmarūpyamaye śubhe  NarP śatayojanavistāre tiryāgūrddhca nārada so viśaṅkena manasā tathaivābhyapatacchukaḥ  NarP te śṛṅge tyantasaṃśliṣṭe sahasaiva dvidhākṛte adṛśyetāṃ dvijaśreṣṭha tadadbhutamivābhavat  NarP tataḥ parvataśṛṅgābhyāṃ sahasaiva viniḥsṛtaḥ na ca pratijaghānāsya sa gatiṃ parvatottamaḥ  NarP tato mandākinīṃ divyā mupariṣṭādabhivrajan śuko dadarśa dharmātmā puṣpitadrumakānanam  NarP tasyāṃ krīḍāsu niratāḥ snānti caivāpsarogaṇāḥ nirākāraṃ tu sākārādadṛśustaṃ vivāsasaḥ  NarP taṃ prakramantamājñāya pitā snehasamanvitaḥ uttamāṃ gatimāsthāya pṛṣṭato nusasāra ha  NarP śukastu mārutādūrddhvaṃ gatiṃ kṛtvāṃ tarikṣagām darśayitvā prabhāvaṃ svaṃ sarvabhūto bhavattadā  NarP atha yogagatiṃ vyāsaḥ samāsthāya mahātapāḥ nimeṣāntaramātreṇa śukābhipatanaṃ yayau  NarP sa dadarśa dvidhā kṛtvā parvatāgraṃ gataṃ śukam śaśaṃsurmunayaḥ siddhā gatiṃ tasmai sutasya tām  NarP tataḥ śuketiśabdena dīrgheṇa kranditaṃ tadāḥ svayaṃ pitrā svareṇoñcaistrīṃllokānanunādya vai  NarP śukaḥ sarvagatirbhūtvā sarvātmā sarvatomukhaḥ pratyabhāṣata dharmātmā bhoḥ śabdenānunādayan  NarP tata ekākṣaraṃ nādaṃ bhorityevamudīrayan pratyāharajjagatsarvamuñcaiḥ sthāvarajaṅgamam  NarP tataḥ prabhṛti vādyāpi śabdānuñcāritānpṛthak girigahvarapṛṣṭeṣu vyājahāra śukaṃ prati  NarP antarhitaprabhāvaṃ taṃ darśayitvā śukastadā guṇānsaṃtyajya sattvādīnpadamadhyagamatparam  NarP mahimānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā putrasyāmitatejasaḥ so nunīto bhagavatā vyāso rudreṇa nārada  NarP kimu tvaṃ tāmyasi mune putraṃ prati samākulaḥ paśyasi vipra nāyāntaṃ brahmabhūtaṃ nijāntire  NarP ityevamanunīto sau vyāsaḥ punaruprāvrajat śvāśramaṃ sa śuko brahmabhūto lokāṃścacāra ha  NarP tata kālāntare brahmanvyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ yayau badarikāśramam  NarP tatra dṛṣṭvā tu tau devau tapyamāno mahattapaḥ svayaṃ ca tatra tapasi sthitaḥ śukamanusmaran  NarP yāvattatra sthito vyāsaḥ śukaḥ paramayogavit śvetadvīpaṃ gatastāta yatra tvamagamaḥ purā  NarP tatra dṛṣṭaprabhāvastu śrīmānnārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ śrutivimṛgyo hi devadevo janārdanaḥ  NarP stutaśca śukadevena prasannaḥ prāha nārada śrībhagavānuvācatvayā dṛṣṭo smi yogīndra sarvadevarahaḥsthitaḥ  NarP sanatkumārādiṣṭena siddho yogena vāḍava tvaṃ sadāgatimārgastho lokānpaśya yathecchayā  NarP ityukto vāsudevena taṃ natvāraṇisaṃbhavaḥ vaikuṇṭhaṃ prayayau vipra sarvalokanamaskṛtam  NarP vaimānikaiḥ surairjuṣṭaṃ virajāpariceṣṭitam yaṃ bhāntamanubhāntyete lokāḥ sarve pi nārada  NarP yatra vidumasopānāḥ svarṇaratnavicitritāḥ vāpya utpalaṃsaṃchannāḥ surastrīkrīḍanākulāḥ  NarP divyairhaṃsakulairghuṣṭāḥ svacchāṃbunibhṛtāḥ sadā tatra dvāḥsthaiścaturhastenārnābharaṇabhūṣitaiḥ  NarP viṣvaksenānugaiḥ siddhaiḥ kumudādyairavā ritaḥ praviśyābhyāntaraṃ tatra devadevaṃ caturbhujam  NarP śāntaṃ prasannavadanaṃ pītakauśeyavāsasam śaṅkhacakragadāpadmairmūrtimadbhirupāsitam  NarP vakṣasthalasthayā lakṣmyā kaustubhena virājitam kaṭīsūtrabrahmasūtrakaṭakāṅgadabhūṣitam  NarP bhrājatkirīṭavalayaṃ maṇinūpuraśobhitam dadarśa siddhani karaiḥ sevyamānamaharniśam  NarP taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaktibhāvena tuṣṭāva madhusūdanam śuka uvācanamaste vāsudevāya sarvalokaikasākṣiṇe  NarP jagadbījasvarūpāya pūrṇāya nibhṛtātmane haraye vāsukisthāya śvetadvīpanivāsine  NarP haṃsāya matsyarūpāya vārāhatanudhāriṇe nṛsiṃhāya dhruvejyāya sāṃkhyayogeśvarāya ca  NarP catuḥsanāya kūrmāya pṛthave svasuravātmane nābheyāya jagaddhātre vidhātreṃtakāraya ca  NarP bhārgavendrāya rāmāya rāghavāya parāya ca kṛṣṇāya vedakartre ca buddhakalkisvarūpiṇe  NarP caturvyuhāya vedyāya dhyeyāya paramātmane naranārāyaṇākhyāya śiṣiviṣṭāya viṣṇave  NarP ṛtadhāmne vidhāmne ca suparṇāya svarociṣe ṛbhave suvratākhyāya sudhāmne cājitāya ca  NarP viśvarūpāya viśvāya sṛṣṭisthityantakāriṇe yajñāya yajñabhokte ca sthaviṣṭhāyāṇave rthine  NarP ādityasomanetrāya sahaojobalāya ca ījyāya sākṣiṇe jāyabahuśīrṣāṅghribāhave  NarP śrīśāya śrīnivāsāya bhaktavaśyāya śārṅgiṇe aṣṭaprakṛtyadhīśāya brahmaṇe nantasaktaye  NarP bṛhadāraṇyavedyāya hṛṣīkeśāya vedhase puṇḍarīkanibhākṣāya kṣetrajñāya vibhāsine  NarP govindāya jagatkartre jagannāthāya yogine satyāya satyasaṃdhāya vaikuṇṭhāyācyutāya ca  NarP adhokṣajāya dharmāya vāmanāya tridhātave ghṛtārciṣe viṣṇave te nantāya kapilāyaya ca  NarP viriñcaye trikakude ṛgyajuḥsāmarūpiṇe ekaśṛṅgāya ca śuciśravase śāstrayonaye  NarP vṛṣākapaya ṛddhāya prabhave viśvakarmaṇe bhūrbhuvuḥsvaḥsvarūpāya daityaghne nirguṇāya ca  NarP nirañjanāya nityāya hyavyayāyākṣarāya ca namaste pāhi māmīśa śaraṇāgatavatsala  NarP iti stutaḥ sa bhagavāñcchaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ āraṇeyamuvācedaṃ bhṛśaṃ praṇatavatsalaḥ  NarP śrībhagavānuvācavyāsaputra mahābhāga prīto smi tava suvrata vidyāmāpnuhi bhaktiṃ ca jñānī tvaṃ mama rūpadhṛk  NarP yadrūpaṃ mama dṛṣṭaṃ prāk śvetadvīpe tvayā dvija so hamevāvatārārthaṃ sthito viśvaṃbharātmakaḥ  NarP siddho si tvaṃ mahābhāga mokṣadharmānunucintayā varalokānyathā vāyuryathā ravaṃ savitā tathā  NarP nityamuktasvarūpastvaṃ pūjyamānaḥ surairnaraiḥ bhaktirhi durlabhā loke mayi sarvaparāyaṇe  NarP tāṃ labdhvā nāparaṃ kiñcillabdhavyamavaśiṣyate ākalpāntaḥ tapaḥ saṃsthau naranārāyaṇāvṛṣī  NarP tayornideśato vyāso janaka stava suvrataḥ kartā bhāgavataṃ śāstraṃ tadadhīṣva bhuvaṃ vraja  NarP sa tapyati tapastvadya parvate gandhamādane tvadviyogena khinnātmā taṃ prasādaya matpriyam  NarP evamuktaḥ śuko vipra namaskṛtya caturbhujam yathāgataṃ nivṛtto sau piturantikamāgamat  NarP atha taṃ svantike dṛṣṭvā pārāśaryyaḥ pratāpavān putraṃ prāpya prahṛṣṭātmā tapaso nivavarta ha  NarP nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam āraṇeyasamāyuktaḥ svāśramaṃ samupāgamat  NarP nārāyaṇaniyogāttu tvanmukhena munīśvara cakāra saṃhitāṃ divyāṃ nānākhyānasamanvitām  NarP vedatulyāṃ bhāgavatīṃ haribhaktivivarddhinīm nivṛttinirataṃ putraṃ śukamadhyāpayañca tām  NarP ātmārāmo pi bhagavānpārāśaryātmajaḥ śukaḥ adhītavānsaṃhitāṃ vai nityaṃ viṣṇujanapriyām  NarP evamete samākhyātā mokṣadharmāstavānadha paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ cāpi haribhaktivivarddhanāḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne mokṣadharṃmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo dhyāyaḥsamāptaścāyaṃ dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ śaunaka uvācasūta sādho ciraṃ jīva sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ yattvayā pāyitā vidvanvayaṃ kṛṣṇakathāmṛtam  NarP śrutvā tu mokṣadharmānvai nārado bhagavatpriyaḥ sanandanamukhodgītānkiṃ papracchaṃ tataḥ param  NarP mānasā brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ sanakādyā munīśvarāḥ caranti lokānantasiddhā lokoddharaṇatatparāḥ  NarP nārado pi mahābhāga nityaṃ kṛṣṇaparāyaṇaḥ teṣāṃ samāgame bhadrā kā kathā lokapāvanī  NarP sūta uvācasādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahābhāga tvayā lokopakāriṇā kathayiṣyāmi tatsarvaṃ yatpṛṣṭa nāradarṣiṇā  NarP śrutvā sanandanaproktānmokṣadharmānsanātanān nārado bhārgavaśreṣṭha punaḥ papraccha tānmunīn  NarP nārada uvācasarvadeveśvaro viṣṇurvede tantre ca kīrtitaḥ samārādhyaḥ sa evātra sarvaiḥ sarvārthakāṅkṣibhiḥ  NarP kairmantrairbhagavānviṣṇuḥ samārādhyo munīśvarāḥ ke devāḥ pūjanīyāśca viṣṇupādaparāyaṇaiḥ  NarP tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ viprā guruśiṣyaprayojakam dīkṣaṇaṃ prātarādyaṃ ca kṛtyaṃ syādyattaducyatām  NarP yairmāsaiḥ karmabhiryairvā japyairhemādibhistathā prīyeta paramātmā vai tadbrūta mama mānadāḥ  NarP sūta uvācaetacchrutvā vacastasya nāradasya mahātmanaḥ sanatkumāro bhagavānuvācārkasamadyutiḥ  NarP sanatkumāra uvācaśṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ tava yajjñātvāmalayā bhaktyā sādhayedviṣṇumavyayam  NarP tripadārthaṃ catuṣpādaṃ mahātantraṃ pracakṣate bhogamokṣakriyācaryāhvayā pādāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  NarP pādārthāstu paśupatiḥ paśupāśāstraya eva hi patistatra śivohyeko jīvāstu paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ  NarP yāvanmohādisaṃyogāḥ svarūpābodhalakṣaṇāḥ tāvatpaśutvameteṣāṃ dvaitavatpaśya nārada  NarP pāśāḥ pañcavidhāstveṣāṃ pratyekaṃ teṣu lakṣaṇam paśavastrividhāścāpi vijñātāḥ kalasaṃjñikāḥ  NarP talapākalasaṃjñaśca sakalaśceti nāmataḥ tatrādyo malasaṃyukto malakarmayutaḥ paraḥ  NarP malamāyākarmayutastṛtīyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ādyastu dvividhastatra samāsakaluṣastathā  NarP asamāsamalaśceti dvitīyo pi punastathā pakvāpakvamalenaiva dvividhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ  NarP śuddhe dhvani gatāvetau vijñānapralayākalau kalāditattvaniyataḥ sakalaḥ paryaṭatyayam  NarP karmānugaśarīreṣu tattadbhuvanageṣu ca pāśāḥ pañca tathā tatra prathamau malakarmajau  NarP māyeyaśca tirodhānaśaktijo bindujaḥ paraḥ eko pyanekaśaktirdṛkkriyācchādanakomalaḥ  NarP tuṣakañcukavaddehanimittaṃ cātmanāmiha dharmādharmātmakaṃ karma vicitraphalabhogadam  NarP pravāhanityaṃ tadbījāṅkuranyāyena saṃsthitam ityetau prathamau cātha māyeyādyān śṛṇudvija  NarP sañcidānandavibhavaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ patirjayati sarveṣāmeko bījaṃ vibhuḥ param  NarP manasyati na codeti nivṛttiṃ ca prayacchati varvarti dṛkkriyārūpaṃ tattejaḥ śāṃbhavaṃ param  NarP śakto mayā harau bhukto paśugaṇasya hi tacchaktimādyāmekāntāṃ vidrūpākhyāṃ vadanti hi  NarP tayā cojjṛṃbhito bindurdikkriyātmā śivābhidhaḥ aśeṣatattvajātasya kāraṇaṃ vibhuravyayam  NarP asminnilīnā nikhilā icchāyāḥ śaktayaḥ svakam kṛtyaṃ kurvanti tenedaṃ sarvānugrāhakaṃ mune  NarP cijjaḍānugrahārthāya yasya viśvaṃ sisṛkṣataḥ ādyonmeṣo sya nādātmā śāntyādibhuvanātmakaḥ  NarP tacchaktitattvaṃ viprendra proktaṃ sāvayavaṃ param tato jñānakriyāśaktyostathotkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ  NarP prasaraścāpyabhāvena tattvaṃ caitatsadāśivam dṛkśaktiryatra nyagbhūtā kriyāśaktirviśiṣyate  NarP īśvarākhyaṃ tu tattattvaṃ proktaṃ sarvārthakartṛkam yatra kriyā hi nyagbhūtā jñānākhyodrekamaśnute  NarP tattattvaṃ caiva vidyākhyaṃ jñānarūpaṃ prakāśakam nādo binduśca sakalaḥ sadākhyaṃ tattvamāśritau  NarP vidyeśāḥ punaraiśaṃ tu mantrā vidyābhidhaṃ punaḥ imāni caiva tattvāni śuddhādhveti prakīrtitam  NarP sākṣānnimittamīśo tretyupādānasabindurāṭ pañcānāṃ kālarāhityākramo nāstīti niścitam  NarP vyāpāravasato hyeṣāṃ vihitā khalu kalpanā tattvaṃ vastuta ekaṃ tu śivākhyaṃ citraśaktikam  NarP śaktaṃ yāṃ vṛttibhedāttuvihitāḥ khalu kalpanāḥ cijjaḍānugrahārthāya kṛtvā rūpāṇi vai prabhuḥ  NarP anādimalaruddhānāṃ kurute nugrahaṃ citām muktiṃ ca viśveṣāṃ svavyāpāre samarthetām  NarP vidhatte jaḍavargasya sarvānugrāhakaḥ śivaḥ śivasāmānyarūpo hi mokṣastu cidanugrahaḥ  NarP so nāditvātkarmaṇo hi tattadbhogaṃ vinā bhavet tenānugrāhakaḥ śambhustadbhuktyai prabhurvyayaḥ  NarP kurute sūkṣmakaraṇabhuvanotpattimañjasā karttopādānakaraṇairvinā kārye na dṛśyate  NarP śaktayaḥ karaṇaṃ cātra māyopādānamiṣyate nityaikā ca śivā śaktyā hyanādinidhanā satī  NarP sādhāraṇī narāṇāṃ vai bhuvanānāṃ ca kāraṇam svabhāvānmohajananī svacitājanakarmabhiḥ  NarP viśvī sūkṣmā parā māyā vikṛtaiḥ parattu sā karmāṇyāvekṣya vidyeśo māyāṃ vikṣobhya śaktibhiḥ  NarP vidhatte jīvabhogārthaṃ vapūṃṣi karaṇāni ca sṛjatyādo kālatattvaṃ nānāśaktimayī ca sā  NarP bhāvi bhūtaṃ mavañcedaṃ jagatkalayate layam sūte hyanantaraṃ māyā śaktiṃ niyamanātmikām  NarP sarvaṃ niyamayatyeṣā teneyaṃ niyatiḥ smṛtā anantaraṃ ca sā māyā nityā viśvavimohinī  NarP anādinidhanā tattvaṃ kalākhyaṃ janayatyapi ekatastu nṛṇāṃ yena kalayitvā malaṃ tataḥ  NarP kartṛśaktiṃ vyañjayati tenedaṃ tu kalābhidham kālena ca niyatyopasargatāṃ samupetayā  NarP vyāpāraṃ vidadhātyeṣā bhūparyantaṃ svakīyakam pradarśanātha vai puṃso viṣayāṇāṃ ca sā punaḥ  NarP prakāśarūpaṃ vidyākhyaṃ tattvaṃ sūte kalaiva hi vidyā tvāvaraṇaṃ bhitvā jñānaśakteḥ svakarmaṇā  NarP viṣayāndarśayatyeṣātmanāṃśākāraṇaṃ hyataḥ karoti bhogyaṃ yānāsau karaṇena pareṇa vai  NarP udbuddhaśaktiḥ puruṣaḥ pracodya mahadādikān bhogye bhogaṃ ca bhoktāraṃ tatparaṃ karaṇaṃ tu sā  NarP bhogyesya bhogyatirmāsāñcidvyaktirbhoga ucyate sukhādirūpo viṣayākārā buddhiḥ samāsataḥ  NarP bhogyaṃ bhoktuśca svenaiva vidyākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ tu tat yadyarkavatprakāśā dhīḥ karmatvāñca tathāpi hi  NarP karaṇāntarasāpekṣā śaktā grāhayituṃ ca tam saṃbandhātkāraṇādyaistadbhogautsukyena codanāt  NarP tañcaṣṭāphalayogāñca saṃsiddhā kartṛtāsya tu akartṛtvābhyupagame bhoktṛtvākhyā vṛthāsya tu  NarP kiṃ ca pradhānacaritaṃ vyarthaṃ sarvaṃ bhavettataḥ kartṛtvarahite puṃsi karaṇādyaprayojake  NarP bhogasyāsaṃbhavastasmātsa evātra pravartakaḥ karaṇādiprayoktṛātvaṃ vidyayaivāsya saṃmatam  NarP anantaraṃ kalārāgaṃ sūte bhidyaṅgarūpakam yena bhogyāya janitā bhidyaṅge puruṣe punaḥ  NarP kriyāpravṛttirbhavati tenedaṃ rāgasaṃjñikam ebhistattvaiśca bhoktṛtvadaśāyāṃ kalito yadā  NarP nityastadāyamātmā tu labhate puruṣābhidhām kalaiva praścādavyaktaṃ sūte bhogyāya cāsya tu  NarP saptagranthividhānasya yattadgauṇasyakāraṇam guṇānāmavibhāgo tra hyādhāre kṣmādibhāgavat  NarP ādhāro pi ca yasteṣāṃ tadavyaktaṃ ca gīyate traya eva guṇā hyaṣāmavyaktādeva saṃbhavaḥ  NarP sattvaṃ rajastamaḥprakhyā vyāpāraniyamātmikā guṇato dhīśca viṣayādhyavasāyasvarūpiṇī  NarP guṇatastrividhā sāpi proktā karmānusārataḥ mahattattavādahṝṅkāro jātaḥ saṃraṃbhavṛttimān  NarP saṃbhodādasya viṣayaḥ prāpnoti vyavahāryatām sattvā dviguṇabhedena sa punastrividho bhavet  NarP taijaso rājasaścaiva tāmasaśceti nāmataḥ tatra taijasato jñānendriyāṇi manasā saha  NarP prakāśānva yatastasmādvodhakāni bhavanti hi rājasāñca kriyāhetostathā karmendriyāṇi tu  NarP tāmasāñcaiva jāyante tanmātrā bhūtayonayaḥ icchārūpaṃ ca saṃkalpavyāpāraṃ tatra vai manaḥ  NarP dvidhādhikāri tañcittaṃ bhoktṛbhogopapādakam bahiḥ karaṇabhāvena svocitena yataḥ sadā  NarP indriyāṇāñca sāmarthyaṃ saṃkalpenātmavṛttinā karotyantaḥsthitaṃ bhūyastato ntaḥ karaṇaṃ manaḥ  NarP mano hṝṅkārabuddhyākhyamastyantaḥ kāraṇaṃ tridhā icchāsaṃraṃbhabodhākhyā vṛttayaḥ kramato sya tu  NarP jñānendriyāṇi śrotraṃ tvak cakṣurjihvā ca nāsikā grāhyāśca viṣayā hyeṣāṃ jñeyāḥ śabdādayo mune  NarP śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ śabdādayo matāḥ vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāstu karmendriyāṇyapi  NarP vacanādānagamanotsargānandeṣu karmasu karaṇāni ca siddhinā na kṛtiḥ karaṇairvinā  NarP daśadhā karaṇaiśceṣṭāṃ kāryamāviśya kāryate ceṣṭante kāryamālaṃbya vibhutvātkaraṇāni tu  NarP tanmātrāṇi tu khavāyustejo mbhaḥ kṣmeti pañca vai tebhyo bhūtānyekaguṇānyākhyātāni bhavanti hi  NarP iti pañcasu śabdo yaṃ sparśo bhūtacatuṣṭaye rūpaṃ triṣu rasaścaiva dvayorgandhaḥ kṣitau tathā  NarP kāryāṇyeṣāṃ krameṇaivāvakāśo vyūhakalpanam pākaśca saṃgrahaścaiva dhāraṇaṃ ceti kathyate  NarP āśītoṣṇau mahā vādyau śītoṣṇau vāritejasoḥ bhāsvadagnau jale śuklaṃ kṣitau śuklādyanekadhā  NarP rūpaṃ triṣu rasoṃbhaḥ su madhuraḥ ṣaḍidhaḥ kṣitau gandhaḥ kṣitāvasurabhiḥ surabhiśca prakīrtitaḥ  NarP tanmātraṃ tadbhūtaguṇaṃ karaṇaṃ poṣaṇaṃ tathā bhūtasya tu viśeṣo yaṃ viśeṣarahitaṃ tu tat  NarP imāni pañcabhūtāni saṃniviṣṭāni sarvataḥ pañcabhūtātmakaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam  NarP śarīrasaṃniviṣṭatvameṣāṃ tāvannirūpyate dehe sthimāṃsakeśatvaṅnakhadantāśca pārthivāḥ  NarP mūtraraktakaphasvedaśukrādiṣu jalasthitiḥ hṛdi paṅktau dṛśoḥ pitte tejastaddharmadarśanāt  NarP prāṇādivṛttibhedena vāyuścaivātra saṃsthitaḥ viyatsarvāsu nāḍīṣu garbhavṛtyanuṣaṅgataḥ  NarP prayoktyādimahīprāntametadaṇḍārthasādhanam pratyātmaniyataṃ bhogabhedato vyavasīyate  NarP tattvānyevaṃ kalādyāni pratipuṃniyatāni hi deheṣu karmavaśataḥ sarveṣu vicaranti hi  NarP māyeyaścaiva pāśo yaṃ yenāvṛtamidaṃ jagat aśuddhādhvāmato hyeṣa dharaṇyādikalāvadhiḥ  NarP tatra bhūmaṇḍalastho sau sthāvaro jaṅgamātmakaḥ sthāvarā girivṛkṣādyā jaṅgamastrividhaḥ punaḥ  NarP svedajāścāṇḍajāścaiva tathaiva ca jarāyujāḥ carācareṣu lakṣāṇāṃ caturāśītiyonayaḥ  NarP bhramamāṇasteṣu jīvaḥ kadācinmānuṣaṃ vapuḥ prāpnoti karmavaśataḥ paraṃ sarvārthasādhakam  NarP tatrāpi bhārate khaṇḍe brāhmaṇādikuleṣu ca mahāpuṇyavaśenaiva janirbhavati durlabhā  NarP janiśca puṃstriyoryogaḥ śukraśoṇitayogataḥ bindurekaḥ praviśati yadā garbhe dvayātmakaḥ  NarP tadā rajo dhike nārī bhavedreto dhike pumān malakarmādipāśena kaścidātmā niyantritaḥ  NarP jīvabhāvaṃ tadā tasminsakalaḥ pratipadyate atha tatrāhṛtairmātrā pānānnādyaiśca poṣitaḥ  NarP pakṣamāsādikālena vardhate vapuratra hi duḥkhādyaḥ pīḍitaścaivācchannadeho jarāyuṇā  NarP evaṃ tatra sthito garbhe prāgjanmotthaṃ śubhāśubham smaraṃstiṣṭati duḥkhātmāpīḍyamāno muhurmuhuḥ  NarP kālakrameṇa bālo sau mātaraṃ pīḍayannapi saṃpīḍito niḥsarati yoniyantrādavāṅmukhaḥ  NarP kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭati niśceṣṭastato roditumicchati tataḥ krameṇa sa śiśurvardhamāno dinedine  NarP bālapaugaṇḍabhedena yuvatvaṃ pratipadyate evaṃ krameṇa loke smindehināṃ dehasaṃbhavaḥ  NarP mānuṣaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya sarvalokopakārakam yastārayati nātmānaṃ tasmātpāpataro tra kaḥ  NarP āhāraścaiva nidrā ca bhayaṃ maithunameva ca paśvādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhāraṇamitīritam  NarP caturṣvevānurakto yaḥ sa mūrkho hyātmadhātakaḥ manuṣyāṇāmayaṃ dharmaḥ ravabandhacchedanātmakaḥ  NarP pāśabandhanavicchedo dīkṣayaiva prajāyate ato bandhanavicchittyai mantradīkṣāṃ samācaret  NarP dīkṣājñānākhyayā śaktyā hyapadhvaṃsitabandhanaḥ śuddhātmatattvanāmāsau nirvāṇapadamaśnute  NarP svaśaktyātmikayā dṛṣṭyā śivaṃ dhyāyati paśyati yajate śivaṃ mantraiśca ravapareṣāṃ hitāya saḥ  NarP śivārkaśaktidīdhityā samarthīkṛtacidṛśā śivaśaktyādibhiḥ sārddhaṃ paśyatyātmagatāvṛttiḥ  NarP antaḥkaraṇavṛttiryā bodhākhyā sā maheśvaram na prakāśayituṃ śaktā pāśatvānnigaḍādivat  NarP dīkṣaiva paramo hetuḥ pāśavicchedane punaḥ ataḥ śāstroktavidhinā matradīkṣāṃ samācaret  NarP dīkṣitastantravidhinā svavarṇācāratatparaḥ anuṣṭānaṃ prakurvīta nityanamittikātmakam  NarP nijavarṇāśramācārānmanasāpi na laṅghayet yo yasminnāśrame tiṣṭandīkṣāṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ  NarP sa tasminnāśrame tiṣṭhettaddharmānanupālayet kṛtānyapi na karmāṇi bandhanāya bhavanti hi  NarP ekaṃ tu phaladaṃ karma mantrānuṣṭhānasaṃbhavam dīkṣito bhilaṣedbhogānyadyallokagatānasau  NarP mantrārādhanasāmarthyāttadbhuktvā mokṣamaśnute nityaṃ naimittikaṃ dīkṣāṃ prāpya yo nācarennaraḥ  NarP kañcitkālaṃ piśācatvaṃ prāpyānte mokṣamaśnute tasmāttu dīkṣitaḥ kuryyānnityanaimittikādikam  NarP anuṣṭhānaṃ ca tenāsya dīkṣāṃ prāpyānumīyate nityanaimittikācāra pālakasya narasya tu  NarP dīkṣāvaikalyavirahātsadyo muktistu jāyate tatrāpi gurubhaktasya gatirbhavati nānyathā  NarP dīkṣayā gurumūrtisthaḥ sarvānugrāhakaḥ śivaḥ dṛṣṭādyarthatayā yasya gurubhaktistu kṛtrimā  NarP kṛte pi viphalaṃ tasya prāyaścittaṃ pade pade kāyena manasā vācā gurubhaktiparasya ca  NarP prāyaścittaṃ bhavennaiva siddhistasya pade pade gurubhaktiyute śiṣye sarvasvavinivedake  NarP mithyāprayuktamantrastu prāyāścittī bhavedguruḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde triṣaṣṭitamo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācaatha jīvasya pāśaughacchedanāyeṣṭasiddhidam dīkṣāvidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi mantrasāmarthyadāyakam  NarP divyaṃ bhāvaṃ yato dadyātkṣiṇuyā dduritāni ca ato dīkṣeti sā proktā sarvāgamaviśāradaiḥ  NarP mananaṃ sarvaveditvaṃ trāṇaṃ saṃkhāryanugrahaḥ mananātrāṇadharmattvānmantra ityabhidhīyate  NarP strīpuṃnapuṃsakātmānaste mantrāstu tridhā matāḥ strīmantrāstu dviṭhāntāḥ syuḥ puṃmantrā huṃphaḍantakāḥ  NarP klībāścaiva narmo tāḥ smurmantrāṇāṃ jātayaḥ smṛtāḥ pundaivatāstu mantrā syurvidyāḥ strīdaivatā matāḥ  NarP ṣaṭ kramasu praśastāste manavastrividhāḥ punaḥ tārāntyarephaḥ svāhāstu tatrāgneyāḥ samīritāḥ  NarP saumyāstu bhṛgupīyūṣabījaḍhyāḥ kathitā mune agnīṣomātmakā hyevaṃ mantrā jñeyā manīṣibhiḥ  NarP bodhamāyānti cāgneyāḥ śvasane piṅgalāśrite saumayāścaiva prabudhyante vāme vahati māruteḥ  NarP sarve mantrāḥ prabudhyante vāyau nāḍidvayāśrite svāpakāle tu mantrasya japo narthaphalapradaḥ  NarP pratyekaṃ mantramuñcārya nāvyānāṃ tānsamuñcaret anulobhe binduyuktānvilobhe sargasaṃyutān  NarP japto yadi sa vai devaṃ prabuddhaḥ kṣiprasiddhidaḥ anayā mālayā japto duṣṭamantro pi siddhyati  NarP krūre karmāṇi cāgneyāḥ saumyāḥ saumya phalapradāḥ śāntajñānetiraudreyaśāntijāti samanvitaḥ  NarP śānto pi raudratāmeti huṃphaṭīpallavayojanāt chinnādidoṣayuktāste naiva rakṣanti sādhakam  NarP chinno ruddhaḥ śaktihīnastataścaiva parāṅmukhaḥ karmahīno netrahīnaḥ kīlitaḥ staṃbhitastathā  NarP dagdhaḥ srastaśca bhītaśca malinaśca tiraskṛtaḥ bheditaśca suṣuptaśca madonmattaśca mūrcchitaḥ  NarP hatavīryo bhrāntasaṃjñaḥ pradhvasto bālakastathā kumāro tha yuvā prauḍho vṛddho nistriṃśakastathā  NarP nirbījaḥ sidvihīnaśca mandaḥ kūṭo niraṃśakaḥ sattvahīnaḥ kekaraśca bījahīnaśca dhṛmitaḥ  NarP āliṅgito mohitaśca kṣudhārtaścātidīptakaḥ aṅgahīno tikruddhaścātikrūre vrīḍitastathā  NarP praśāntamānasaḥ sthānabhraṣṭaśca vikalastathā ativṛddho tiniḥsnehaḥ pīḍitaśca tathā punaḥ  NarP doṣā hyete samākhyātā vakṣyāmyeṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇam saṃyuktaṃ vā viyuktaṃ vā tridhā vā svarasaṃyutam  NarP manoryasyādimadhyanti vahnibījaṃ tathocyate caturddhā pañcadhā vāpi sa mantraśchinnasaṃjñakaḥ  NarP manoryasyādimadhyānte bhūbījadvayamucyate sa tu ruddho manujñeyo hyatiklaśena siddhidaḥ  NarP tāravarmatrayā lakṣmīrevaṃ hīnastu yo manuḥ śaktihīnaḥ sa vijñeyaścirakālaphavapradhaḥ  NarP kāmabījaṃ mukhe māyāhyante caivāṅkuśaṃ tathā asau parāṅmukho jñeyo bhajatāṃ cirasiddhidaḥ  NarP ādimadhyāvasāneṣu sakāro dṛśyate yadi sa mantro badhiraḥ proktaḥ kaṣṭenālpaphalapradaḥ  NarP pañcārṇo yadi repharkabinduvarjitavigrahaḥ netrahīnastu vijñeyaḥ kleśenāpi na siddhidaḥ  NarP ādimadhyāvasāneṣu haṃsaḥ prāsādavāgbhavau haṃseṃdurvā sakāro vā phakāro varma vā puna  NarP māprā namāmi ca padaṃ nāsti yasminsa kīlitaḥ evaṃ madhye dvayaṃ mūrghni yasminnasralakārakau  NarP na vidyete sa mantrastu staṃbhitaḥ siddhirodhakṛt agniḥ pavanasaṃyukto manoryasya tu mūrddhani  NarP sa sārṇo dṛśyate yastu sa mantro dagdhasaṃjñakaḥ asraṃ dvābhyāṃ tribhiḥ ṣaḍbhiraṣṭābhirdṛśyate kṣareḥ  NarP trastaḥ sa mantro vijñeyo mukhe tāravivarjitaḥ hakāraḥ śaktirathavā bhīto mantraḥ sa eva hi  NarP manoryasyādimadhyānte syānmakāracatuṣṭayam malinastu sa vijñeyo hyatikleśena siddhidaḥ  NarP dārṇo yasya manormadhye mūrdhni krodhayugaṃ tathā asraṃ cāsti sa mantrastu tiraskṛta udīritaḥ  NarP myodvayaṃ hṛdayaṃ śīrṣe vaṣaḍvauṣaṭkamadhyamaḥ yasya syādbhedito mantrastyājyaḥ kliṣṭaphalapradaḥ  NarP tryakṣaro haṃsahīno yaḥ suṣuptaḥ kīrtitastu saḥ vidyā vāpyathavā mantro bhavetsaptadaśākṣaraḥ  NarP ṣaṭkārapañcakādiryo madonmattastu sa smṛtaḥ yasya madhye sthitaṃ cāsraṃ sa mantro mūrcchitaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP virāmasthānagaṃ cāsraṃ hatavīryaḥ sa ucyate mantrasyādau ca madhye ca mūrdhni cāsracatuṣṭayam  NarP jñātavyo bhrānta ityeṣa yaḥ syādaṣṭā daśākṣaraḥ punarviśativarṇo vā yo mantraḥ smarasaṃyutaḥ  NarP hṛllekhākuṃśabījāḍhyaḥ pradhvastaḥ sa kathyate saptārṇo bālamantrastu kumāro vasuvarṇavān  NarP ṣoḍaśārṇo yuvā prauḍhaścatvāriṃśativarṇakaḥ triṃśadvarṇaścatuḥṣaṣṭivarṇaścāpi śatākṣaraḥ  NarP catuḥśatākṣaro mantro vṛddha ityabhidhīyate navārṇastārasaṃyukto mantro nistriṃśa ucyate  NarP yasyānte hṛdayaṃ proktaṃ śiromantro tha madhyagaḥ śikhā varma ca yasyānte netramasraṃ ca dṛśyate  NarP śiva śaktyārṇahīno vā nirbījaḥ sa manuḥ smṛtaḥ ādyantamadhye phaṭkāraḥ ṣoḍhā yasminpradṛśyate  NarP sa manuḥ siddhihīnaḥ syānmandaḥ paṅktyakṣaro manuḥ kūṭa ekākṣaro mantraḥ sa evokto niraṃśakaḥ  NarP dvivarṇaḥ sattvahīnaḥ syātkekaraścaturakṣaraḥ ṣaḍvarṇo bījahīno vā sārddhasaptākṣaro pi vā  NarP sārddhadvādaśavarṇo vā dhūmito rniditastu saḥ sārddhabījatrayayuto mantro viṃśativarṇavān  NarP triṃśadvarṇaścaikaviṃśadvarṇaścārliṅgitastu saḥ yo mantro dantavarṇastu mohitaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ  NarP caturviśativarṇo vā saptaviṃśativarṇavān kṣudhārtaḥ sa tu vijñeyo mantrasiddhivivarjitaḥ  NarP ekādaśākṣaro vāpi pañcaviṃśativarṇakaḥ trayorviṃśativarṇo vā sa manurdṛptasaṃjñakaḥ  NarP ṣaḍviṃśatyakṣaro vāpi ṣaṭtriṃśadvarṇaṅko pi vā ekona triṃśadarṇo vā mantro hīnāṅgakaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP aṣṭāviṃśativarṇo vā tathaikatriṃśadarṇakaḥ atikrūraḥ sa vijñeyo khilakarmasu garhitaḥ  NarP catvāriṃśatsamārabhya triṣaṣṭyantastu yo manuḥ vrīḍitaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ sarvakarmasu na kṣamaḥ  NarP pañcaṣaṣṭyakṣarā mantrā jñeyā vai śāntamānasāḥ pañcaṣaṣaaṭyarṇamārabhya navanandākṣarāvadhi  NarP ye mantrāste tu vijñeyāḥ sthānabhraṣṭā munīśvara trayodaśārṇā ye mantrāstithyarṇāśca tathā punaḥ  NarP vikasāsteṃ samākhyātāḥ sarvatantraviśāradaiḥ śataṃ sārddhaśataṃ vāpi śatadvayamathāpi vā  NarP dvinavatyekahīno vā śatatrayamathāpi vā ye mantrā varṇasaṃkhyākā niḥsnehāste prakīrtitāḥ  NarP catuḥśataṃ samārabhya sahasrārṇāvadhi dvija ativṛddhāḥ prayogeṣu śithilāste samīritāḥ  NarP sahasravarṇadadhikā mantrāste pīḍitāhvayāḥ tadvarddhvaṃ caiva ye mantrāḥ stotrarūpāstu te smṛtāḥ  NarP evaṃ vidhāḥ samākhyātā manavo doṣa saṃyutāḥ doṣānetānavijñāya mantrānetāñjapanti ye  NarP siddhirna jāyate teṣāṃ kalpakoṭiśatairapi chinnādidoṣaduṣṭānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ bruve  NarP yonimudrāsane sthitvā prajapedyaḥ samāhitaḥ yaṃ kañcidapi vā mantraṃ tasya syuḥ sarvasiddhayaḥ  NarP savyapāṣṇi gude sthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ ca dhvajopari yonimudrābandha evaṃ bhavedāsanamuttamam  NarP anyo pyatra prakāro sti yonimudrānibandhane tadagre sarahasyaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi nārada  NarP pāraṃparyakramaprāpto nityānuṣṭānatatparaḥ gurvanujñārataḥ śrīmānabhiṣekasamanvitaḥ  NarP suṃdaraḥ sumukhaḥ śāntaḥ kulīnaḥ sulabho vaśī mantratantrārthatattvajño nigrahānugrahakṣamaḥ  NarP nirapekṣo munirdānto hitavādī vicakṣaṇaḥ tattvaniṣkāsane dakṣo vinayī ca suveṣavān  NarP āśramī dhyānanirataḥ saṃśayacchitsuvuddhimān nityānuṣṭānasaṃyuktastvācāryaḥ parikīrtitaḥ  NarP śānto vinītaḥ śuddhātmā sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyutaḥ śamādisādhanopetaḥ śraddhāvān susthirāśayaḥ  NarP śuddhadeho nnapānadyairddhārmikaḥ śuddhamānasaḥ dṛḍhavratasamācāraḥ kṛtajñaḥ pāpabhīrukaḥ  NarP gurudhyānastutikathāsevanāsaktamānasaḥ evaṃvidho bhavecchiṣyastvanyathā guruduḥkhadaḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde catuḥṣaṣṭitamo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācaparīkṣya śiṣyaṃ tu gururmantraśodhanamācaret prākpratyagdakṣiṇodakcapañcasūtrāṇi pātayet  NarP catuṣṭayaṃ catuṣkānāṃ syādevaṃ nṛpakoṣṭake tatrādyaprathame tvādyaṃ dvitīyādye dvitīyakam  NarP tṛtīyādye tṛtīyaṃ syāñca turthādye turīyakam tattadāgneyakoṣṭeṣu tattatpañcamamakṣaram  NarP vilikhya kramato dhīmānmanuṃ saṃśodhayettataḥ nāmādyakṣaramārabhya yāvanmantrādi varṇakam  NarP catuṣke yatra nāmārṇastatsyātsiddhicatuṣkakam prādakṣiṇyāttaddvitīyaṃ sādhyākhyaṃ parikīrtitam  NarP tṛtīyaṃ puṃsi siddhākhyaṃ turīyamarisaṃjñakam dvayorvarṇāvekakoṣṭe siddhasiddheti tanmatam  NarP taddvitīye tu mantrārṇe siddhasādhyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ tṛtīye tatsusiddhaḥ syātsiddhāristañcaturthake  NarP nāmārṇānyacatuṣkāttu dvitīye mantravarṇake catuṣke cettadā pūrvaṃ yatra nāmākṣaraṃ sthitam  NarP tatra tatkoṣṭamārabhya gaṇayetpūrvavatkramāt sādhyasiddhaḥ sādhyasādhyastatsusiddhaśca tadripruḥ  NarP tṛtīye ceñcatuṣke tu yadi syānmantravarṇakaḥ tadā pūrvoktarītyā tu kramāddveyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ  NarP susiddhasiddhastatsādhyastatsusiddhaśca tadṛṣiḥ turīye ceñcatuṣke tu tadaivaṃ gaṇayetsudhīḥ  NarP arisiddho risādhyaśca tatsusiddhaśca tadripuḥ riddhasiddho yathoktena dviguṇātsiddhisādhyakaḥ  NarP siddhaḥ susiddhorddhatayātsiddhārirhati gotrajān dviguṇātsādhyasiddhastu sādhyasādhyo vilaṃbataḥ  NarP sādhyaḥ susiddho dviguṇātsādhyārirhanti bāndhavān susiddhasiddhorddhatayā tatsādhyo dviguṇājjapāt  NarP tatsusiddhaprāptimātrātsusiddhāriḥ kuṭuṃbahṛt arisiddhastu putradhno riśādhyaḥ kanyakāpahaḥ  NarP tatsusiddhaḥ kalatradhnaḥ sādhakadhnore pyariḥ smṛtaḥ anye pyatra prakārā hi saṃti vai bahavoṃ mune  NarP sarveṣu mukhyo yaṃ te tra kathito kathahābhidhaḥ evaṃ saṃśodhya mantraṃ tu śuddhe kāle sthale tathā  NarP dīkṣayeñca guruḥ śiṣyaṃ tadvidhānamudīryate nityakṛtyaṃ vidhāyātha praṇamyagurupādukām  NarP prārthayetsadguruṃ bhaktyābhīṣaaṭārthamādṛtaḥ saṃpūjya vastrālaṅkāragohiraṇyadharādibhiḥ  NarP kṛtvā svasti vidhānaṃ tu maṇḍalādi ca tuṣṭimān guruḥ śiṣyeṇa sahitaḥ śuciryāgagṛhaṃ viśet  NarP sāmānyārghodakenātha saṃprokṣya dvāramastrataḥ divyānutsārayedvighnānnabhasthānarcya vāriṇā  NarP pārṣṇighātaistribhirbhauṃmāṃstataḥ karma samācaret varṇakaiḥ sarvatobhadre yathoktaparikalpite  NarP vahnimaṇḍalamabhyarcya tatkalāḥ paripūjya ca astraprakṣālitaṃ kuṃbhaṃ yathāśakti vinirmitam  NarP tatra saṃsthāpya vidhivattatra bhānoḥ kalāṃ yajet vilomamātṛkāmūlamuñcaran śuddhavāriṇā  NarP āpūrya kuṃbhaṃ tatrārcetsomasya vidhivatkalāḥ dhūmrārcirūṣmā jvalinī jvālinī visphuliṅginī  NarP suśrīḥ surūpā kapilā havyakavyavahā tathā vahnerdaśa kalāḥ proktāḥ procyante tha raveḥ kalāḥ  NarP tapinī tāpinī dhūmrā marīcijvālinī ruciḥ suṣumṇā bhogadā viśvā bodhinī dhāriṇī kṣamā  NarP athendrośca kalā jñeyā hyamṛtā mānadā punaḥ pūṣā tuṣṭiśca puṣṭiśca ratiśca dhṛtisaṃjñikāḥ  NarP śaśinī candrikā kātirjyotsnā śrīḥ prītiraṅgadā pūrṇāpūrṇāmṛtā ceti proktāścandramasaḥ kalāḥ  NarP vasrayugmena saṃveṣṭya tasminsarvaiṣadhīḥ kṣipet navaratnāni nikṣipya vinyasetpañcapallavān  NarP panasāmravaṭāśvatthavakuleti ca tān viduḥ muktāmāṇikyavaiḍūryagomedānvajravidrumau  NarP padmarāgaṃ marakataṃ nīlaṃ ceti yathākram evaṃ ratnāni nikṣipya tatrāvāhyeṣṭadevatām  NarP saṃpūjya vidhivanmantrī tataḥ śiṣyaṃ svalaṅkṛtam vedyāṃ saṃveśya saṃprokṣya prokṣaṇīsthena vāriṇā  NarP bhūtaśuddhyādikaṃ katvā taccharīre vidhānataḥ nyāsajālena saṃśodhya mūrdhni vinyasya pallavān  NarP aṣṭottaraśatenātha mūlamantreṇa mantritaiḥ abhiṣiñcetpriyaṃ śiṣyaṃ japanmūlamanuṃ hṛdi  NarP śiṣṭodakena vācamya paridhāyāṃbaraṃ śiśuḥ guruṃ praṇamya vidhivatsaṃviśetpurataḥ śuciḥ  NarP atha śiṣyasya śirasi hastaṃ datvā gurustataḥ japedaṣṭottaraśataṃ deyamantraṃ vidhānataḥ  NarP samo stvityakṣarāndadyāttataṛ śiṣyorcayedgurum tataḥ sacandanaṃ hastaṃ datvā śiṣyasya mastake  NarP tatkarṇe pravadedvidyāmaṣṭavāraṃ samāhitaḥ saṃprāptavidyaḥ śiṣyo pi nipatedgurupādayoḥ  NarP uttiṣṭha vatsa mukte si samyagācāravānbhava kīrtiśrīkāntiputrāyurbalārogya sadāstu te  NarP tataḥ śiṣyaḥ samutthāya gandhādyairgurumarcayet dadyāñca dakṣiṇāṃ tasmai vittaśāṭhyavivarjitaḥ  NarP saṃprāpyaivaṃ gurormantraṃ tadārabhya dhanādibhiḥ dehaputrakalatraiśca gurusevāparo bhavet  NarP svaṣṭadevaṃ yajenmadhye datvā puṣpāñjaliṃ tataḥ agninairṛtivāgīśān krameṇa paripījayet  NarP yadā madhye yajedviṣṇuṃ bāhyādiṣu vināyakam raviṃ śivāṃ śivaṃ caiva yadā madhye tu śaṅkaram  NarP raviṃ gaṇeśamaṃbāṃ ca hariṃ cātha yadā śivām īśaṃ vighnārkagovindānmadhye cedgaṇanāyakam  NarP śivaṃ śivāṃ raviṃ viṣṇuṃ ravau madhyagate punaḥ gaṇeṣaṃ viṣṇumaṃbāṃ ca śivaṃ ceti yathākramam  NarP evaṃ nitya samabhyarcya devapañcakamādṛtaḥ brāhme muhūrtte hyutthāya kṛtvācā vaśyakaṃ budhaḥ  NarP aśaṅkito vā śayyāyāṃ svakīyaśirasi smaret sahasradalaśuklābjakārṃṇakāsthadumaṇḍale  NarP akathāditrikoṇasthaṃ varābhayakaraṃ gurum dvinetraṃ dvibhujaṃ śuklagandhamālyānuṃlepanam  NarP vāme śaktyā yutaṃ dhyātvā mānasairupacārakaiḥ ārādhya pādukāmantraṃ daśadhāprajapetsudhīḥ  NarP vā māyā śrīrbhagendvāḍhyā viyaddhaṃsakhakāgnayaḥ hasakṣamalavāryagnivāmakarṇaiduyugmarut  NarP tato bhṛgvākāśaravāgnibhagendvāḍhyāḥ parantimaḥ sahakṣamalatoyāgnicandraśāntiyuto marut  NarP tataḥ śrīścāmukānte tu nandanāthāmukī punaḥ devyaṃbānte śrīpāndukāṃ pūjayāmi hṛdantime  NarP ayaṃ śrīpādukāmantraḥ sarvasiddhiprado nṛṇām guhyeti ca samarpyātha mantrairetairnametsudhīḥ  NarP akhaṇḍamaṇḍalākāraṃ vyāptaṃ yena carācaram tatpadaṃ darśitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ  NarP ajñānatimirāndhasya jñānāñjanaśalākayā cakṣurunmīlitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ  NarP namo stu gurave tasmā iṣṭadevasvarūpiṇe yasya vāgamṛtaṃ hṝnti viṣaṃ saṃsārasaṃjñakam  NarP iti natvā paṭhetstotraṃ sadyaḥ pratyayakārakam oṃ namaste nātha bhagavān śivāya gururūpiṇe  NarP vidyāvatārasaṃsiddhyai svīkṛtānekavigraha navāya tanarūpāya paramārthaikarūpiṇe  NarP sarvājñānatamobhedabhānave ciddhanāya te statantrāya dayākḷptavigrahāya śivātmane  NarP paratra trāya bhaktānāṃ bhavyānāṃ bhāvarūpiṇe vivekināṃ vivekāya vimarśāya vimarśinām  NarP prakāśānāṃ prakāśāya jñānināṃ jñānarūpiṇe purastātpārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭe namastubhyamuparyadhaḥ  NarP sadā sañcitsvarūpeṇa vidhehi bhavadāsanam tvatprasādādahaṃ deva kṛtākṛtyo smi sarvataḥ  NarP māyāmṛtyumahāpāśādvimukto smi śivo smi vaḥ iti stutvā tataḥ sarva gurave vinivedayet  NarP prātaḥ prabhṛti sāyāntaṃ sāṃyādiprātarantataḥ yatkaromi jagannātha tadastu tava pūjanam  NarP tataśca gurupādābjagalitāmṛtadhārayā kṣālitaṃ nijamātmānaṃ lirmalaṃ bhāvayetsudhīḥ  NarP mūlādibrahmarandhrāntaṃ mūlavidyāṃ vibhāvayet mūlādhārādadho bhāge vartulaṃ vāyumaṇḍalam  NarP tatrasthavāyubījotthavāyunā ca tadrūrddhvakam trikoṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vahnestatrasthavahnibījataḥ  NarP utpannenāgninā mūlādhārāvasthitavigrahām prasuptabhujagākārāṃ svayaṃbhūliṅgaveṣṭinīm  NarP visatantunibhāṃ koṭividyudābhāṃ tanīyasīm kulakuṇḍalinīṃ dhyātvā kūrcenotthāpayeñca tām  NarP suṣumṇāvartmanātāṃ ca ṣaṭcakrakramabhedinīm gurupadiṣṭavidhinā brahmarandhraṃ nayetsudhīḥ  NarP tatrasthāmṛtasaṃmagnīkṛtyātmānaṃ vibhāvayet tatprabhāpaṭalavyāptaivimalaṃ cinmayaṃ param  NarP punastāṃ svasthalaṃ nītvā hṛdidevaṃ vicintayan dṛṣṭvā ca mānasairdravyaiḥ prārthayenmanunāmunā  NarP trailokyacaita nyamayādideva śrīnātha viṣṇo bhavadājñayaiva prātaḥ samutthāya tava priyārthaṃ saṃsārayātrāṃ tvanuvartayiṣye  NarP viṣṇoriti sthale vipra kārya ūho nyadaivate tatataḥ kuryātsarvasiddhyai tvajapāyā nivedanam  NarP ṣaṭśatāni divā rātrau sahasrāṇyekaviṃśatiḥ ajapākhyāṃ tu gāyatrīṃ jīvojapati sarvadā  NarP ṛṣirhaṃsastathāvyaktagātrīchanda īritam devatā paramohaṃsaścādyante bījaśaktikam  NarP tataḥ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ kurvīta sūryaḥ somonirañjanaḥ nirābhāsaśca dharmaśca jñānaṃ ceti tathā punaḥ  NarP kramādetānhaṃsapūrvānātmanepadapaścimān jātayuktānsādhakendra ṣaḍaṅgeṣu niyojayet  NarP hakāraḥ sūryasaṃkāśatejāḥ saṃgacchate bahiḥ sakārastādṛśaścaiva praveśe dhyānamīritam  NarP evaṃ dhyātvārpayeddhīmānvahnyarkeṣu vibhāgaśaḥ mūlādhāre vādisāṃtabījayukte caturdale  NarP bandhūkābhe svaśaktyā tu sahitāpāsvagāya ca pāśāṅkuśasudhāpātramodakollāsapāṇaye  NarP ṣaṭśataṃ tu gaṇeśāya vāgadhīśāya cārpayet svādhiṣṭāne vidrumābhe vādilāntārṇasaṃyute  NarP vāmāṅgaśaktiyuktāya vidyādhipataye tathā sruvākṣamālālasitabāhave padmajanmane  NarP brahmaṇe ṣaṭsahasraṃ tu haṃsārūḍhāya cārpayet vidyullasitameghābhe ḍādiphaāntārṇapatrake  NarP maṇipūre śaṅkhacakragadāpaṅkadhāriṇe saśriye ṣaṭsahasraṃ ca viṣṇave vinivedayet  NarP anāhaterkapatre ca kādiṭhāntārṇasaṃyute śukle śūlābhayavarasadhākalaśadhāriṇe  NarP vāmāṅge śaktiyuktāya vidyādhipataye sudhīḥ vṛṣārūḍhāya rudrāya ṣaṭsahasraṃ nivedayet  NarP viśudde ṣoḍaśadale svarāḍhye śuknatraṇake mahājyotiprakāśāyendriyādhipataye tataḥ  NarP sahasramarpayetprāṇaśaktyā yukteścarāya ca ājñācakre hakṣayukte dvidile bje sahasrakam  NarP sadāśivāya gurave parāśaktiyutāya vai sahasrāre mahāpadme nādabindudvayānvite  NarP vilasanmātṛkāvarṇe varāmayakarāya ca praramādye ca gurave sahasraṃ vinivedayet  NarP culukeṃbu punarddhṛtvā svabhāvādeva sidhyataḥ ekaviṃśatisāhasrapramitasya japasya ca  NarP ṣaṭśatādhikasaṃkhyāsyā dajapāyā vibhāgaśaḥ saṃkalpena mokṣadātā viṣṇurme prīyatāmiti  NarP asyāḥ saṃkalpamātreṇa mahāpāpaiḥ pramucyate brahmaivāhaṃ na saṃsārī nityamukto na śokabhāk  NarP sañcidānandarūpo hamātmānamiti bhāvayet tataḥ samācareddehakṛtyaṃ devārcanaṃ tathā  NarP taddhidhānaṃ pravakṣyāmi sadācārasya lakṣaṇam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde pañcaṣaṣṭimo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācatataḥ śvāsānusāreṇa datvā pādaṃ mahītale samudramekhale devi parvatastanamaṇḍale  NarP viṣṇuvatni namastubhyaṃ pādasparśaṃ kṣamasva me iti bhūmiṃ tu saṃprārthya vihareñca yathāvidhi  NarP rakṣaḥ koṇe tato grāmādgatvā mantramudīrayet gacchantu ṛṣayo devāḥ piśācā samupācaret  NarP ekā liṅge gude tisro daśa vāmakare mṛdaḥ karayoḥ sapta vai dadyātritrivaraṃ ca pādayoḥ  NarP evaṃ śaucaṃ vidhāyātha gaṇḍūṣāndvādaśaiva tu kṛtvā vanaspatiṃ cātha prārthayenmanunāmunā  NarP āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca śriyaṃ prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvaṃ no dehi vanaspate  NarP saṃprārthyaivaṃ dantakāṣṭaṃ dvādaśāṅgulasaṃmitam gṛhītvā kāmamantreṇa kuryānmantrī samāhitaḥ  NarP kāmadevapadaṃ ṅentaṃ tathā sarvajanapriyam hṛdantaḥ kāmabījāḍhyaṃ dantāṃścānena śodhayet  NarP jihvollekho vāgbhavena mūlena kṣālayenmukham devāgāraṃ tato gatvā nirmālyamapasārya ca  NarP paridhāyāṃbaraṃ śuddhaṃ maṅgalārārtikaṃ caret asreṇa pātraṃ saṃprokṣya mūlena jvālayeñca tam  NarP saṃpūjya pātramādāyotthāya ghaṇṭāṃ ca vādayet sugoghṛtapradīpena bhrāmitena samantataḥ  NarP vādyairgītairmanojñaiśca devasyārārtikaṃ bhavet iti nīrājanaṃ kṛtvā prārthayitvā nijeśvaram  NarP snātuṃ yāyānnimragādau kīrtayandevatāguṇān gatvā tīrthaṃ namaskṛtya snānīyaṃ ca nidhāya vai  NarP śūrpakarṇastathomayā  NarP virocanastejovatyā satyā lambodareṇa ca mahānandaśca vighneśyā caturmūrtisvarūpiṇī  NarP sadāśivaḥ kāmadayā hyāmodo madajihvayā dumukho bhūtisaṃyuktaḥ sumukho bhautikīyutaḥ  NarP pramodadhaḥ sitayā yukta ekapādo ramāyutaḥ dvijihvo mahiṣīyukto jabhinyā śūranāmakaḥ  NarP vīro vikarṇayā yuktaḥ ṣaṇmukho bhṛkuṭīyutaḥ varado lajjayā vāmadevaṃśo dīrghaghoṇayā  NarP dhanurddharyā vakratuḍo dviṃraṇḍo yāminīyutaḥ senānī rātrisaṃyuktaḥ kāmāndho grāmaṇīyutaḥ  NarP mattaḥ śaśiprabhāyukto vimatto lolanetrayā mattavāhaścañcalayā jaṭī dīptisamanvitaḥ  NarP muṃhī subhagayā yuktaḥ khaḍgī durbhagayā yutaḥ vareṇyaśca śivāyukto bhagayā vṛṣaketanaḥ  NarP bhakṣyapriyo bhaginyā ca gaṇeśo bhaginīyutaḥ meghanādaḥ subhagayā vyāpī syātkālarātriyuk  NarP gaṇeśvaraḥ kāliṅkayā proktā vighneśamātṛkāḥ gaṇeśamātṛkāyāstu gaṇo munibhirīritaḥ  NarP trivṛdgāyatrikāchando devaḥ śaktigaṇeśvaraḥ ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena kṛtvāṅgāni tataḥ smaret  NarP pāṃśāṅkuśābhayavarāndadhānaṃ kañjahastayā patnyāśliṣṭaṃ raktatanuṃ trinetraṃ gaṇape bhavet  NarP evaṃ dhyātvā nyasetsvīyabījapūrvākṣarānvitam nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntistatedhikāḥ  NarP dīpikā recikā cāpi mocikā ca parābhidhā sūkṣmāsūkṣmāmṛtā jñānāmṛtā cāpyāyinī tathā  NarP vyāpinī vyomarūpā cānantā sṛṣṭiḥ samṛddhikā smṛtirmedhā tataḥ kāntirlakṣmīrddhṛtiḥ sthirā sthitiḥ  NarP siddhirjarā pālinī ca kṣāntirīśvarīkā ratiḥ kāmiko varadā vātha hlādinī prītisaṃyutā  NarP dīrghā tīkṣṇā tathā raudrā proktā nidrā ca tandrikā kṣudhā ca krodhinī paścākriyākārī samṛtyukā  NarP pītā śretāruṇā paścādasitānantayā yutā uktā kalāmātṛkaivaṃ tattadbhaktaḥ samācaret  NarP kalāyuṅmātṛkāyāstu muniḥ proktaḥ prajāpatiḥ gāyatrīchanda ākhyātaṃ devatā śāradābhidhā  NarP hrasvadīrghāntarasthaiśca tāraiḥ kuryātṣaḍaṅgakam padmacakraguṇaiṇāṃśca dadhatīṃ ca trilocanām  NarP pañcavakrāṃ bhāratīṃ tāṃ muktābhūṣāṃ bhajetsudhīḥ dhyātvaivaṃ tārapūrvāṃ tāṃ nyasenṅantakalānvitām  NarP tataśca mūlamantrasya ṣaḍaṅgāni samācaret hṛdayādicaturthyante jātīḥ saṃyojya vinyaset  NarP namaḥ svāhā vaṣaṭ huṃ vauṣaṭ phaṭ jātaya īritāḥ tato dhyātveṣṭadevaṃ taṃ bhūṣāyudhasamanvitam  NarP nyasyāṅgaṣaṭkaṃ tanmūrtauṃ tataḥ pūjanamārabhet  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge buhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde saṃdhyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācaatha vakṣye devapūjāṃ sādhakābhīṣṭasiddhidām trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ vā vāmabhāge prakalpya ca  NarP sampūjyā sreṇa saṃkṣālya hṛdādhāraṃ nidhāya ca tatrāgnimaṇḍalaṃ cedvā pātraṃ saṃkṣālya cāsrataḥ  NarP ādhāre nāmasaṃ sthāpya tatra cedravimaṇḍalam klimamātṛkā mūlakhaṇḍatrayenāthādhāraśaktiṃ tu madhyagām  NarP evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivadasraṃsaṃkṣālitaṃ hṛdā pratiṣṭāpya tripadikāṃ pūjayenmanunāmunā  NarP maṃ vahnimaṇḍalā yeti tato deśakalātmane amukārdhyeti pātrānte sanāpahṛdayoṃtime  NarP caturviṃśativarṇo yamādhārasyārcane manuḥ svamantrakṣālitaṃ śaraṃvaṃ saṃsyāpyāya samarcayet  NarP tāraḥ kārṃmamahāṃste tu tato jalacarāya ca varma phaṭ hṛdayaṃ pāñcajanyāya hṛdayaṃ maneḥ  NarP tatrārkamaṇḍalāyeti dvādaśānte kalāramane amukārdhyeti pātrānte namontastryakṣivarṇavān  NarP sampūjya tena tatrārceddvādaśārkakalāḥ kramāt tataḥ śuddhajalairmūlaṃ NarP tatastu tīrthānyāvāhya gaṅge cetyādipūrvavat gomudrayāmṛtīkṛtyācchādayenmatsmamudrayā  NarP kavacenāvaguṇṭhyātha rakṣedastreṇa tatpunaḥ cintayitveṣṭadevaṃ ca tato mudrāḥ pradarśayet  NarP śaṅkhamauśalacakākhyāḥ paramīkaraṇaṃ tataḥ mahāmudrāṃ yonimudrāṃ darśayetkramataḥ sudhīḥ  NarP gāruḍī gālinī caiva mukhye mudre prakīrtite gandhapuṣpādibhistatra pūjayeddevatāṃ smaranaṭ  NarP aṣṭakṛtvo japenmūlaṃ praṇavaṃ cāṣṭadhā tathā śaṅkhāddakṣiṇadigbhāge prokṣaṇīpātramādiśet  NarP prokṣaṇyāṃ tajjalaṃ kiñcitkṛtvātmānaṃ tridhā tataḥ ātmatattvātmane hṛñca vidyātattvātmane namaḥ  NarP śivatattvātmane hṛñca ityetairmanubhistribhiḥ prokṣetpuṣpākṣataiścāpi maṇḍalaṃ vidhivatsudhīḥ  NarP athavā mūlagāyatryā pūjādravyāṇi prokṣayet pādyārdhyācamanūyārthaṃ madhuparkārthamapyuta  NarP pātrāṇyādhārayuktāni sthāpayedvidhinā puraḥ pādyaṃ śyāmākadūrvābjaviṣṇukrāntajalaiḥ smṛtam  NarP ardhyaṃ puṣpākṣatayavaiḥ kuśāgratilasarṣapaiḥ gandhadūrvādalaiḥ proktaṃ tataścācamanīyakam  NarP jātīphalaṃ ca kaṅkolaṃ lavaṅgaṃ ca jalānvitam kṣaudrājyadadhisaṃmiśraṃ madhuparkasamīritam  NarP ekasminnathavā pātre pādyādīni prakalpayet śaṅkarārkārcane śaṅkhamayenaiva praśasyate  NarP aṅguṣṭādivitastyantamānā svarṇādidhātubhiḥ nirmitā śubhadā gehe pūjanāya dine dine  NarP vakrāṃ dagdhāṃ khaṇḍitāṃ ca bhinnamūrddhadṛśaṃ punanaḥ spaṣṭāṃ vāpya ntyajādyaiśca pratimāṃ naiva pūjayet  NarP bāṇādiliṅge vābhyarcetsarvalakṣaṇalakṣite mūlena mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya dhyātvā devaṃ yathoditam  NarP āvāhā pūjayetasyāṃ parivāragaṇaiḥ saha śālagrāme sthāpitāyāṃ nāvāhanavisarjane  NarP puṣpāñjaliṃ samādāya dhyātvā mantramudīrayet  NarP ātmasaṃsthamajaṃ śuddhaṃ tvāmahaṃ parameśvara araṇyāmiva havyāśaṃ mūrtāvāvāhayāmyaham  NarP taveyaṃ hi mahāmūrtistasyāṃ tvāṃ sarvagaṃ prabho bhaktirevahasamākṛṣṭaṃ dīpavatsthāpayāmyaham  NarP sarvāntaryāmiṇe devaṃ sarvabījamaya śubham ravātmasthaāya paraṃ śuddhamāsanaṃ kalpayāvyaham  NarP ananyā tava deveśa mūrtiśaktiriyaṃ prabho NarP āmradāḍimajaṃbīrajaṃbūpanasabhūruhāḥ eteṣāṃ tu phalaiḥ kuryāddevatāpūjanaṃ budhaḥ  NarP śuṣkaistu nārcayeddevaṃ patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalairapi  NarP dhātrī khadirabitvānāṃ tamālasya dalāni ca yadāśābhimukho bhūtvā pūjanaṃ tu samācaret saiva prācī tu vijñeyā tato nyā vidiśo daśa  NarP keśareṣvagnikoṇādi hṛdayādīni pūjayet netramagre dikṣu cāstraṃ aṅgamantrairyathākramam  NarP guhyātiguhyagoptā tvaṃ gṛhāṇāsmatkṛtaṃ japam siddhirbhavatu me deva tvatprasādāttvayi sthitā  NarP tataḥ parāṅmukhaṃ cārghaṃ kṛtvā puṣpaiḥ prapūjayet dorbhyāṃ pabhdyāṃ ca jānubhyāmurasā śirasādṛśā samarpaye tāraṃ tatsadato brahmarpaṇamastu manurmataḥ  NarP praṇavādyo ṣṭavasvarṇo hyanenātmānamarpayet ajñānādvā pramādādvā vaikalyātsādhanasya ca  NarP yannyūnamatiriktaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ kṣantumarhasi sthaiḥ ṣaḍaṅgakam  NarP śiṣṭāraujaṭhare pṛṣṭe tayorṅeṃtākhyayā nyaset ādityaṃ ca raviṃ paścādbhānuṃ bhāskarameva ca  NarP sūryaṃ ca mūrdhni vadane hṛdi guhye ca pādayoḥ sadyādipañca hrasvādyān nyaseñcāndrimanuspraran  NarP sparśānseṃdūnsamuñcārya ṅeṃtaṃ bhāskaramaṇḍalam nyasetkaṇṭhādinābhyantaṃ dhyāyanpradyotanaṃ hṛdi  NarP yādīnsacandrānuñcārya ṅetaṃ ca vahnimaṇḍalam nābhyādipādaparyantaṃ nyasedvahnimanusmaran  NarP prokto yaṃ maṇḍalanyāso mahātejovidhāyakaḥ ādiṭhāntārṇapūrvaṃ ṅeṃnamontaṃ somamaṇḍalam  NarP mūrddhādihṛdayāntaṃ tu vinyasetsādhakottamaḥ ḍakārādikṣakārāntavarṇādyaṃ pahnimaṇḍalam  NarP ṅeṃtaṃ hṛdādipādāntaṃ vinyasetsusamāhitaḥ agrīṣomātmako nyāsaḥ kathitaḥ sarvasiddhidaḥ  NarP nyasetseṃdūnmātṛkārṇāñjayāntapuruṣātmane namonte vyāpakaṃ mantrī haṃsnayāso yamīritaḥ  NarP aṣṭāvaṣṭau svarāñśeṣānpañcapañca mitānpunaḥ uktādityamukhānetānvinyaseñca navagrahān  NarP ādhāraliṅgayornābhau hṛdi kaṇṭhe mukhāntare bhrūmadhye ca tathā bhāle brahmaraṅghre nyasetkramāt  NarP haṃsākhyamagnīṣomākhyaṃ maṇḍalatrayameva ca punarnyāsatrayaṃ kuryānmūlena vyāpakaṃ caret  NarP evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā dhyāyetsūryaṃ hṛdabuje dānābhayābjayugalaṃ dhārayantaṃ karai ravim  NarP kuṇḍalāṃ gadakeyūrahāriṇaṃ ca trayītanum dhyātvaivaṃ prajapenmantrī vasulakṣaṃ daśāṃśataḥ  NarP raktāṃbhojaistilairvāpi juhuyādvidhivadvasau prathamaṃ pīṭhayajane dharmādīnāṃ sthale yajet  NarP prabhūtaṃ vimalaṃ śāraṃ samārādhyamanantaram paramādimukhaṃ madhye khabiṃbāntaṃ prapūjayet  NarP somāgnimaṇḍalaṃ pūjyaravimaṇḍalamarcayet dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtirvimalā tathā  NarP amoghā vidyutā sarvatomukhī pīṭhaśaktayaḥ hrasvatrayoktijāḥ klībahī nā vahnīndusaṃyutāḥ  NarP svarā bījāni śaktīnāṃ tadādyāḥ pūjayettuḥ tāḥ brahmaviṣṇuśivātmā te sṛṣṭiḥ śeṣānvitāpyasau  NarP evaṃ cānte yoga pīṭhātmane hṛdayamīrayet tārādyo yaṃ pīṭhamantrastvanenāsanamādiśet  NarP dhruvo viyadbinduyutaṃ khaṃ khakholkāya dṛnmanuḥ navārṇāya ca manave mūrtiṃ saṃkalpayetsudhīḥ  NarP sākṣiṇaṃ jagatāṃ tasyāmāvāhya vidhivadyajet tataḥ ṣaḍaṅgāmārādhya dvikṣvaṣṭāṅgaṃ prapūjayet  NarP saṃpūjya madhye vādityaṃ raviṃ bhānuṃ ca bhāskaram sūryaṃ diśāsu sadyādipañca hrasvādikānimān  NarP svasvanāmādivarṇādyāḥ śaktayorcyā vidikṣu ca uṣāṃ prajñāṃ prabhāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tato brahmādikānyajet  NarP purato ruṇamabhyarcya somaṃ jñaṃ ca guruṃ bhṛgum dikṣvaryamādikāniṣṭvā bhūmijaṃ ca śanaiścaram  NarP rāhuṃ ketuṃ ca koṇeṣu pūrvavatparipūjayet indrādyānapi vajrādyānpūjayetpūrvavatsudhīḥ  NarP itthaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivadbhāskaraṃ bhaktavatsalam samāhito dineśāya dadyādardhyaṃ dine dine  NarP putrānpautrānabhīṣṭaṃ ca yadyatsarvaṃ prayacchati ardhyadānamidaṃ proktamāyurārogyavarddhanam  NarP dhanadhānyapaśukṣemakṣetramitrakalatradam tejovīryayaśaḥkīrtividyāvibhavabhogadam  NarP gāyatryārādhanāsaktaḥ saṃdhyāvandanatatparaḥ evaṃ manuṃ japanvipro duḥkhaṃ naivāpnuyātkvacit  NarP vikartanāya nirmālyamevaṃ saṃpūjya dāpayet viyadvahnimarutsādyāntārvīseṃdusamanvitam  NarP mārtaṇḍabhairavākhyaṃ hi bījaṃ trailokyamohanam biṃbabījena puṭitaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam  NarP pūrvavatsakalaṃ cānyadatra jñeyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ bhṛgurjalendumanvāḍhyaḥ somāya hṛdayāntimaḥ  NarP ṣaḍakṣaro mantrarājo munirasya bhṛgurmataḥ chandaḥ paṅktistu somo sya devatā parikīrtitā  NarP ādyaṃ bījaṃ namaḥ śaktirviniyogo khilāptaye ṣaḍdīrgheṇa svabījena ṣaḍaṅgāni samācaret  NarP pūrṇedvāsyaṃ suśuklamālyavasanāmuktāhāravibhūṣitāḥ sarvāḥstanabharākrāntā racitāñjalayaḥ śubhāḥ  NarP svapriyāsaktamanaso madavibhramamantharāḥ samabhyarcyāḥ sarojākṣyaḥ pūrṇendusadṛśānanāḥ  NarP dalāgreṣu ekonaviṃśatyarṇāḍhyo mantro vahnipriyāntimaḥ varāho sya muniśchando gāyatrī nivṛdādikā  NarP devatā dharaṇī bījaṃ tāraḥśaktirvasupriyā rāmavedāgnibāṇākṣinevārṇairaṅgakalpanam  NarP śyāmāṃ aṅgānyādau samārādhya dikpatreṣu yajetpunaḥṛ garaḍādīn śrīmukhāṃśca vidikṣu lokapānbahiḥ  NarP evaṃ saṃsādhito mantraḥ sarvānkāmānprapūrayet saumye kārye smaretsaumyaṃ krūraṃ krūre smaredbudhaḥ  NarP pūrvamṛtyupade śatrornāma kṛtvā svayaṃ hariḥ niśitairnakhadaṃṣṭrāgraiḥ khādyamānaṃ ca saṃsmaret  NarP aṣṭottaraśataṃ nityaṃ japenmantramatandritaḥ jāyate maṇḍalādarvāk śatrurvai śamanātithiḥ  NarP dhyānabhedānatho vakṣye sarvasiddhipradāyakān śrīkāmaḥ satataṃ dhyāyetpūrvoktaṃ nṛhariṃ sitam  NarP vāmāṅkasthitayā lakṣmyāliṅgataṃ padmahastayā viṣamṛtyūparogādisarvopadravanāśanam  NarP narasiṃhaṃ mahābhīmaṃ kālānala samaprabham āntramālādharaṃ raudraṃ kaṇṭhahāreṇa bhūṣitam  NarP nāgayajñopavītaṃ ca pañcānanasuśobhitam candramauliṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ prativaktraṃ trinetrakam  NarP bhujaiḥ parighasaṃkāśairddaśabhiścopaśobhitam akṣasūtraṃ gadāpadmaṃ śaṅkhaṃ gokṣīrasannibham  NarP dhanuśca muśalaṃ caiva bibhrāṇaṃ cakrasuttamam khaḍgaṃ śūlaṃ ca bāṇaṃ ca nṛhariṃ rudrarūpiṇam  NarP indragopābhanīlābhaṃ candrābhaṃ svarṇasannibham pūrvādi cottaraṃ yāvadūddhvārsyaṃ sarvavarṇakam  NarP evaṃ dhyātvā japenmantrī sarvavyādhivimuktaye sarvamṛtyuharaṃ divya smaraṇātsarvasiddhidam  NarP dhyāyedyadā mahātkarma tadā ṣoḍaśahastavān nṛsiṃhaḥ sarvalokeśaḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ  NarP dvau vidāraṇakarmāptau dvau cāntroddharaṇānvitau śaṅkhacacakradharau dvau tu dvau ca bāṇaghanurddharau  NarP khaḍgakheṭadharau dvau ca dvau gadāpadmadhāriṇau pāśāṅkuśadharau dvau ca dvau ripormukuṭārpitau  NarP iti ṣoḍaśadordaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ nṛhariṃ vibhum dhyāyennārada nīlābhamugrakarmamaṇyananyadhīḥ  NarP dhyeyo mahatame kārye dvātriṃśaddhastavānbudhaiḥ nṛsiṃhaḥ sarvabhūteśaḥ sarvasiddhikaraḥ paraḥ  NarP dakṣiṇe cakrapadme ca paraśuṃpāśameva ca halaṃ ca muśalaṃ caiva abhayaṃ cāṅkuśaṃ tathā  NarP paṭṭiśaṃ bhindipālaṃ ca khaḍgamudgaratomarān vāmabhāge karaiḥ śaṃṅkhaṃ kheṭaṃ pāśaṃ ca śūlakam  NarP agniṃ ca varadaṃ śaktiṃ kuṇḍikāṃ ca tataḥ param kārmukaṃ tarjanīmudrāṃ gadāṃ ḍamaruśūrpakau  NarP dvābhyāṃ karābhyāṃ ca riporjānumastakapīḍanam ūrddhvīkṛtābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ āntramālādharaṃ vibhum  NarP adhaḥ sthitābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ hiraṇyakavidāraṇam priyaṅkaraṃ ca bhaktānāṃ daityānāṃ ca bhayaṅkaram  NarP nṛsihaṃ taṃ smareditthaṃ mahāmṛtyubhayāpaham evaṃ dhyātvā japenmantrī sarvakāryārthasiddhaye  NarP athocyate dhyānamanyanmukharogaharaṃ śubham svarṇavarṇasuparṇasthaṃ vidyunmālāsaṭānvitam  NarP koṭipūrṇenduvarṇaṃ ca sumukhaṃ tryakṣivīkṣaṇam pītavastrorubhūṣāḍhyaṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ śāntavigraham cakraśaṅkhābhayavarāndadhataṃ karapallavaiḥ  NarP kṣveḍarogādiśamanaṃ svairdhyānaiḥ sukhanditam śatroḥ senānirodhena yatnaṃ kuryāñca sādhakam  NarP akṣakāṣṭairedhite gnau vicintya ripumardanam devaṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ saṃpūjya kusumādyupacārakaiḥ  NarP samūlamūlairjuṃhuyāccarairdaśaśataṃ pṛthak ripuṃ khādanniva praklarvīta yāvadāyāti sā punaḥ  NarP nirjatya nikhilāñchatrūnsaha vīraśriyāsukhāt prīṇayenmantriṇaṃ rājā vibhavaiḥ prītamānasaḥ  NarP gajāśvaratharatnaiśca grāmakṣetradhanādibhiḥ yadi mantrī na tuṣyeta tadānartho mahīpateḥ  NarP jāyate tasya rāṣṭreṣu prāṇebhyo pi mahābhayam aṣṭottaraśatamūlamantramantritabhasmanā  NarP nāśayenmūṣikālūtāvṛścikādyutthitaṃ viṣam liptāṅgaḥ sarvarogaiśca mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP sevantīkusumairhutvā mahatīṃ śriyamāpnuyāt audumbarasamidbhistu bhaveddhānyasamṛddhimān  NarP apūpalakṣahome tu bhavedvaiśravaṇopamaḥ kruddhasya sannidhau rājño japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam  NarP sadyo nairmalyamāpnoti prasādaṃ cādhigacchati kundaprasūnairudayaṃ mocābhirvighnanāśanam  NarP tulasīpatrahomena mahatīṃ kīrtimāpnuyāt śālyutthasaktuhomena vaśayedakhilaṃ jagat  NarP madhūkapuṣpairiṣṭaṃ syātstaṃbhanaṃ dhātrikhaṇḍakaiḥ dadhimadhvājyamiśrāṃ tu guḍūcīṃ caturaṅgulām  NarP juhuyā dayutaṃ yo sau śataṃ jīvati rogajit śanaiścaradine śvatthaṃ spṛṣṭvā cāṣṭottaraṃ śatam  NarP japejjitvāso pamṛtyuṃ śatavarṣāṇi jīvati atha te saṃpravakṣyāmi yantraṃ trailokyamohanam  NarP yasya saṃdhāraṇādeva bhaveyuḥsarvasaṃpadaḥ śvetabhūrjje likhetpadmaṃ dvātriṃśatsiṃhasaṃyutam  NarP madhye siṃhe svabījaṃ ca likhetpūrvavadeva tu śrībījena tu tusaṃvedya valayatrayasaṃyutam  NarP pāśāṅkuśaiśca saṃveṣṭya pūjayedyantramuttamam trailokyamohanaṃ nāma sarvakāmārthasādhanam  NarP cakrarājaṃ mahārājaṃ sarvacarkeśvareśvaram dhāraṇājjayamāpnoti satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  NarP atha yantrāntaraṃ vakṣye śṛṇu nārada siddhidam aṣṭāraṃ vilikhedyantraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ karṇikayā yutam  NarP mūlamantraṃ likhettatra praṇavena samanvitam ekākṣaraṃ nārasiṃhaṃ madhye caiva sasādhyakam  NarP japedaṣṭasahasraṃ tu sūtreṇāveṣṭya tadbahiḥ svarṇaraupyasutāmraiśca veṣṭayetkramataḥ sudhīḥ  NarP lākṣayā veṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā punarmantreṇa mantrayet kaṇṭhe bhuje śikhāyāṃ vā dhārayedyantramuttamam  NarP naranārīnaredrāśca sarve syurvaśagā bhuvi duṣṭāstaṃ naiva bādhante piśācoragarākṣasāḥ  NarP yantrarājaprasādena sarvatra jayamāpnuyāt athānyatsaṃpravakṣyāmi yantraṃ sarvavaśaṅkaram  NarP dvādaśāraṃ mahācakraṃ pūrvavadvilikhetsudhīḥ mātrādvādaśasaṃbhinnadalena vilikhedrudhaḥ  NarP madhye mantraṃ śaktiyuktaṃ śrībījena tu veṣṭayeta kālāntakaṃ nāma cakraṃ surāsukhaśaṅkaram  NarP cakramullekhayedbhūrje sarvaśatrunivāraṇam yasya dhāraṇamātreṇa sarvatra vijayī bhavet  NarP atha sarveṣṭadaṃ jvālāmālisaṃjñaṃ vadāmyaham bījaṃ hṛdbhagavānṅeṃto narasiṃhāya tatparam  NarP jvāline māline dīptadaṃṣṭrāya agnine padam trāya sarvādirakṣoghnāya ca naḥ sarvabhūpadam  NarP harirvināśanāyānte sarvajvaravināśanaḥ nāmānte dahayugmaṃ ca pacadvayamudīrayet  NarP rakṣayugmaṃ ca varmāstraṭhadūyānto dhruvādikaḥ aṣṭaṣaṣṭyakṣaraiḥ prokto jvālāmālī manūttamaḥ  NarP puṇyādikaṃ tu pūrvoktaṃ trayodaśabhirakṣaraiḥ paṅktibhī rudrāsaṃkhyākairaṣṭādaśabhirakṣaraiḥ  NarP bhānubhiḥ karaṇairmantrī varairaṅgāni kalpayet pūrvoktarūpiṇaṃ jvālāmālina nṛhariṃ smaret  NarP lakṣaṃ japo daśāṃśaṃ ca juhuyātkapilāghṛtaiḥ raudrāpasmārabhūtādināśako yaṃ manūttamaḥ  NarP prāṇo māyā nṛsiṃhaśca sṛṣṭirbrahmāstramīritaḥ ṣaḍakṣaro mahāmantraḥ sarvābhīṣṭapradāyakaḥ  NarP munirbrahmā tathā chandaḥ paṅktirdevo nṛkesarī ṣaḍdīrghabhājā bījena ṣaḍaṅgāni samācaret  NarP pūrvoktenaiva vidhinā dhyānaṃ pūjāṃ samācaret siddhena manunānena sarvasiddhirbhavennṛṇām  NarP ramābījādiko nuṣṭuptrayastriṃśārṇavānmanuḥ prajāpatirmuniścchando nuṣṭup lakṣmīnṛkesarī  NarP devatā caja padaiḥ sarveṇāṅgakalpanamīritam vinyasyaivaṃ tu pañcāṅgaṃ svātmarakṣāṃ samācaret  NarP saṃspṛśan dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ śarabhasya manuṃ japet praṇavo hṛcchivāryanti mahate śarabhāya ca  NarP vahnipriyānto mantrastu rakṣārthe samudāhṛtaḥ athavā rāmamantrānte paraṃ kṣadvitayaṃ paṭhet  NarP athavā keśavādyaistu rakṣāṃ kuryātprayatnataḥ keśavaḥ pātu pādau me jaṅghe nārāyaṇo vatu  NarP mādhavo me kaṭiṃ pātu govindo guhyameva ca nābhiṃ viṣṇuśca me pātu jaṭharaṃ madhusūdanaḥ  NarP ūrū trivikramaḥ pātu hṛdayaṃ pātu me naraḥ śrīdharaḥ pātu kaṇṭhaṃ ca hṛṣīkeśo mukhaṃ mama  NarP padmanābhaḥ stanau pātu śīrṣaṃ dāmodaro vatu evaṃ vinyasya cāṅgeṣu japakāle tu sādhakaḥ  NarP nirbhayo jāyate bhūtavetālagraharākṣasāt punarnyasetprayatnena dhyānaṃ kurvansamāhitaḥ  NarP purastātkeśavaḥ pātuḥ cakrī jāṃbūnadaprabhaḥ paścānnārāyaṇaḥ śaṅkhī nīlajīmūtasannibhaḥ  NarP urddhvamindīvaraśyāmo mādhavastu gadādharaḥ givindo dakṣiṇe pārśve dhanvī candraprabho mahān  NarP uttare haladhṛgviṣṇuḥ padmakiñjalkasannibhaḥ āgneyyāmaravindākṣo musalīmadhusūdanaḥ  NarP trivikramaḥ khaḍgapāṇirnairṛtyāṃ dhyānapūjādikaṃ caret jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namaste viśvabhāvana  NarP namaste stu hṛṣīkeśa mahāpuruṣa te namaḥ itthaṃ saṃprārthya japtvā ca paṭitvā visṛjedvibhum  NarP evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī jāyate punaḥ ṣaḍvīrghāḍhye na kurvīta ṣaḍaṅgāni viśāladhīḥ  NarP tato dhyāyeddhṛdi vibhuṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ candraśekharam  NarP śrīmannṛkesaritano jagadekabaṃndho śrīnīlakaṇṭha karuṇārṇave sāmarāja kahayugma ca madvayam bandhadvayaṃ ghātayeti dvayaṃ varmāstramīrayet  NarP nṛsiṃhaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ bhadraṃ mṛtyumṛtyuṃ namāmyaham pañcāśītyakṣaro mantro bhajatāmiṣṭadāyakaḥ  NarP ṛṣī hyaghorabrahmaṇau tathā triṣṭubanuṣṭubhau chandasī ca tathā ghoranṛsiṃho devatā mataḥ  NarP dhyānārcanādikaṃ cāsya kuryādānuṣṭubhaṃ sudhīḥ viśeṣānmantravaryo yaṃ sarvarakṣākaro mataḥ  NarP bījaṃ jayayugaṃ  NarP mūrte nṛsiṃha śabdānte mahāpuruṣa īrayet pradhānadharmādharmānte nigaḍetipadaṃ vadet  NarP nirmocanānte kāleti tatataḥ puruṣa īrayet kālāntakasadṛktoyaṃ sveśvarānte sadṛgjalam  NarP śrāntānte tu dānavendrāntakāvahniṇaśoṇitapadaṃ tataḥ saṃ saktivigrahānte tu bhūtāpasmārayātudhān  NarP surāsuravandyamānapādapaṅkajaśabdataḥ bhagavanvyomacakreśvarānte tu prabhavāpyaya  NarP rūpeṇottiṣṭa cottiṣṭa  NarP evaṃ pañcadaśāvṛttyā saṃpūjya turagānanam vāgīśvarasamo vāci dhanairdhanapatirbhavet  NarP evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī prayogānkartumarhati aṣṭottarasahasraṃ tu śuddhaṃ vāryabhimantritam  NarP tadrogānmucyate kṣaṇām  NarP nadītīre ca goṣṭhe vā japellakṣaṃ payobrataḥ pāyasenājyayuktena hutvā vidyānidhirbhavet  NarP parikṣīṇādhipatyo yaḥ śākāhāro jalāntare japellakṣaṃ ca madhuratrayasaṃyuktairādajyaśriyamavāpnuyāt  NarP mārgamāse jale sthitvā kandamūlaphalāśanaḥ lakṣaṃ japtvā daśāṃśena pāyasairjuhuyādvasau  NarP śrīrāmacandrasadṛśaḥ putraḥ pautro pi jāyate anye pi bahavaḥ saṃti prayogāmantrarājake  NarP kintu prayogakartṛāṇāṃ paraloko na vidyate ṣaṭkoṇaṃ vasupatraṃ ca tadbāhyārkadalaṃ likhet  NarP ṣaṭkoṇeṣu ṣaḍarṇāni mantrasya vilikhed budhaḥ aṣṭapatre tathāṣṭārṇāṃllikhetpraṇavagarbhitān  NarP kāmabījaṃ ravidale madhye mantrāvṛtābhidhām sudarśanāvṛtaṃ bāhye dikṣu yugmāvṛtaṃ tathā  NarP vajrollasadbhūmigehaṃ kandarpāṅkuśapāśakaiḥ bhūmyā ca sudarśanamahāśabdāccakrarājeśvareti ca  NarP duṣṭāntakaduṣṭabhayānakaduṣṭabhayaṅkaram chindhidvayaṃ bhindhiyugmaṃ vidārayayugaṃ tataḥ  NarP paramantrān grasadvandvaṃ bhakṣayadvitayaṃ tataḥ mantrāvaṣṭākṣarau hyetau tārāntyau cennavākṣarau eteṣāṃ yajanaṃ sarvaṃ kuryānmantrī ṣaḍarṇavat  NarP jānakīvallabho ṅeṃto dviṭhāntaḥ kavacādikaḥ daśārṇo yaṃ mahāmantro viśiṣṭo sya muniḥ svarāṭ  NarP NarP devatā rāmabhadro jaṃ bījaṃ śaktirnama iti mantrotthitaiḥ kramādvarṇaistato dhyāyeñca pūrvavat  NarP pūjanaṃ kāmyakarmādi sarvamasya ṣaḍarṇavat tāraḥ svabījaṃ kamalā rāmabhadreti saṃpaṭhet  NarP rāmapādābjasevārthaṃ kṛtodyogamatho smaran prajapallaṅkṣamekānte mahārogātpramucyate  NarP trimāsaṃ vijitāhāro nityaṃ saptasahasrakam aṣṭottaraśataiḥ puṣpairniśchedraiḥ śātapatrakaiḥ  NarP pūjayitvā vidhānena pāyasaṃ ca saśarkaram nivedya prajapenmantraṃ kuṣṭarogātpranucyate  NarP vijane vijitāhāraḥ ṣaṇmāsaṃ vidhināmunā kṣayarogātpramucyeta satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  NarP abhimantrya jalaṃ prātarmantreṇa triḥ samāhitaḥ trisaṃdhyaṃ vā pibennityaṃ mucyate sarvarogataḥ  NarP dāridrayaṃ ca parābhūtaṃ jāyate dhanadopamaḥ viṣādidoṣasaṃsparśo na bhavettu kadācana  NarP manunā mantritaistoyaiḥ pratyehaṃ kṣālayenmukham mukhanetrādisaṃbhūtāñjayeddvrogāṃśca dāruṇān  NarP pītvābhimantritaṃ tvaṃbhaḥ kukṣirogān jayeddhruvam lakṣmaṇapratimāṃ kṛtvā dadyādbhaktyā vidhānataḥ  NarP sa sarvebhyo tha rogebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ kanyārthī vimalāpāṇigrahaṇāsaktamānasaḥ  NarP dhyāyan lakṣaṃ japenmantrī abjairhutvā daśāṃśataḥ īpsitāṃ labhate kanyāṃ śīgrameva na saṃśayaḥ  NarP dīkṣitaṃ juṃbhaṇāstrāṇāṃ mantreṣu niyatavratam dhyātvā ca vidhivannityaṃ japenmāsatrayaṃ manum  NarP pūjāpuraḥsaraṃ saptasahasraṃ vijitendriyaḥ sarvāsāmapi vidyānāṃ tattvajño jāyate naraḥ  NarP viśvāmitrakratuvare kṛtādbhutaparākramam dhyāyaṃllakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ mucyate mahato bhayāt  NarP kṛtanityakriyaḥ śuddhastrikālaṃ prajapenmanum sarvapāpavinirmukto yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam  NarP dīkṣito vidhivanmantrī guṇairvigatakalmaṣaḥ svācāraniyato dānto gṛhastho vijitendriyaḥ  NarP aihikānanapekṣyaiva niṣkāmo yorcayedvibhum sa sarvānpuṇyapāpaudhāndagdhvā nirmalamānasaḥ  NarP punarāvṛttirahitaḥ śāśvataṃ padamaśvataṃ padamaśnute sakāmo vāñchitān labdhvā bhuktvā bhogān manogatān  NarP jātiramaraściraṃ bhūtvā yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam nidrācandrānvitā paścādbharatāya hṛdantimaḥ  NarP saptākṣaro manuścāsya munyādyarcādi pūrvavat bakaḥ seṃduśca śatrudhnaparaṃ ṅetaṃ hṛdantimaḥ  NarP saptākṣaro yaṃ śatrudhnamantraḥ sarveṣṭasiddhidaḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge buhadupākhyāne sanatkumāravibhāge tṛtīyapāde rāmādyupāsanāvarṇanaṃ nāma trisaptatitamo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācaathocyante hanumato mantrāḥ sarveṣṭadāyakāḥ yānsamārādhya viprendra tattulyācaraṇā narāḥ  NarP manuḥ svaredusaṃyuktaṃ gaganaṃ ca bhagānvitāḥ hasaphaāgniniśādhīśāḥdvitīyaṃ bījamīritam  NarP svaphaāgnayo bhagendvāḍhyāstṛtīyaṃ bījamīritam viyadbhṛgvagnimanvinduyuktaṃ syāñca caturthakam  NarP pañcamaṃ bhagacandrāḍhyāviyadbhṛgusvakāgnayaḥ manvindvāḍhyau hasau ṣaṣṭaṃ ṅeṃtaḥ syāddhanumāṃstataḥ  NarP hṛdayānto mahāmantrarājo yaṃ dvādaśākṣaraḥ rāmacandro muniścāsya jagatīchanda īritam  NarP devatā hanumānbījaṃ ṣaṣṭaṃ śaktirdvatīyakam ṣaḍbījaiśca ṣaḍaṅgāni śirobhāle dṛśormukhe  NarP galabāhudvaye caiva hṛdi kukṣau ca nābhitaḥ dhvaje jānudvaye pādadvaye varṇānkramānnyaset  NarP ṣaḍbījāni padadvandvaṃ mūrdhni bhāle mukhe hṛdi nābhāvūrvorjaṅghayośca pādayorvinyasetkramāt  NarP añjanīgarbhasaṃbhūtaṃ tato dhyāyetkapīśvaram udyatkoṭyarkasaṃkāśaṃ jagatprakṣobhakārakam  NarP śrīrāmāṅghridhyānaniṣṭaṃ sugrīvapramukhārcitam vitrāsayantaṃ nādena rākṣasānmārutiṃ bhajet  NarP dhyātvaivaṃ prajapedbhānusahasraṃ vijitaindriyaḥ daśāṃśaṃ juhuyādbīhīnpayodadhyājyamiśritān  NarP pūrvokte vaiṣṇave pīṭhe mūrttiṃ saṃkalpya mūlataḥ āvāhya tatra saṃpūjya pādyādibhirupāyanaiḥ  NarP keśareṣvaṅgapūjā syātpatreṣu ca tatorcayet rāmabhakto mahātejāḥ kapirājo mahābalaḥ  NarP droṇādrihārako merupīṭhakārcanakārakaḥ dakṣiṇāśābhāskaraśca sarvavighnavināśakaḥ  NarP itthaṃ sampūjya nāmāni dalāgreṣu tatorcayet sugrīvamaṅgada nīlaṃ jāṃbavantaṃ nalaṃ tathā  NarP suṣeṇaṃ dvividaṃ maindaṃ lokapālastatorcayet vajrādyānapi saṃpūjya siddhaścaivaṃ manurbhavet  NarP mantraṃ navaśataṃ rātrau japeddaśadināvadhi yo narastasya naśyanti rājaśatrūtthabhītayaḥ  NarP mātuliṅgāmrakadalīphalairhutvā sahasrakam dvāviṃśatibrahmacāri viprānsaṃbhojayecchucīn  NarP evaṅkṛte bhūtaviṣagraharogādyupadravāḥ naśyanti tatkṣaṇādeva vidveṣigrahadānavāḥ  NarP aṣṭottaraśatenāṃbu mantritaṃ viṣanāśanam bhūtāpasmārakṛtyotthajvare tanmantramantritaiḥ  NarP bhasmabhiḥ salilairvāpi tāḍayejjvariṇaṃ krudhā tridinājjvaramukto sau sukhaṃ ca labhate naraḥ  NarP auṣadhaṃ vā jalaṃ vāpi bhuktvā tanmantramantritam sarvānrogānparābhūya sukhī bhavati tatkṣaṇāt  NarP tajjaptabhasmaliptāṅgo bhuktvā tanmantritaṃ payaḥ yoddhuṃ gacchecca yo mantrī śastrasaṃghairṃna bādhyate  NarP śaskṣataṃ vraṇasphoṭo lūtāsphoṭo pi bhasmanā trirjaptena ca saṃspṛṣṭāḥ śuṣyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ  NarP japedarkāstamārabhya yāvadarkedayo bhavet mantraṃ saptadinaṃ yāvañcādāya bhasmakīlakau  NarP nikhanedabhimantryāśuśatrūṇāṃ dvāryalakṣitaḥ vidveṣaṃ mitha āpannāḥ palāyante rayo cirāt  NarP bhasmāṃbu candanaṃ mantrī mantreṇānena mantritam bhakṣyādiyojitaṃ yasmai dadāti sa tu dāsavat  NarP krūrāśca jantavo pyevaṃ bhavanti vaśavartinaḥ gṛhītveśanadiskaṃsthaṃ karañjatarumūlakam  NarP kṛtvā tenāṅguṣṭamātrāṃ pratimāṃ ca hanūmataḥ kṛtvā prāṇapratiṣṭāṃ ca siṃdūrādyaiḥ prapūjya ca  NarP gṛhasyābhimukhī dvāre nikhanenmantramuñcaran grahābhicārarogāgniviṣacauranṛpodbhavāḥ  NarP na jāyante gṛhe tasmin kadācidapyupadravāḥ tadgṛhaṃ dhanaputrādyairedhate pratyahaṃ ciram  NarP niśi yatra vane bhasma mṛtsnayā vāpi yatnataḥ śatroḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā hṛdi nāma samālikhet  NarP kṛtvā prāṇapratiṣṭāntaṃ bhindyācchastrairmanuṃ japan mantrānte proñcarecchatrornāma chindhi ca bhindhi ca  NarP mārayeti ca tasyānte dantairoṣṭaṃ nipūḍya ca pāṇyostale prapīḍyātha tyaktvā taṃ svagṛhaṃ vrajet  NarP kurvansaptadinaṃ caivaṃ hanyācchatruṃ na saṃśayaḥ rājikālavaṇairmuktacikuraḥ pitṛkānane  NarP dhattūraphalapuṣpaiśca nakharomaviṣairapi dvikakākakauśikagṛdhrāṇāṃ pakṣaiḥ śleṣmāntakākṣajaiḥ  NarP samiddhistriśataṃ yāmayadiṅmukho juhuyānniśi evaṃ saptadinaṃ kurvanmārayeduddhataṃ ripun  NarP vitrāsastridinaṃ rātrau śmaśāne ṣaṭśataṃ japet tato vetāla utthāya vadedbhāvi śubhāśubham  NarP kiṅkarībhūya vartteta kurute sādhakoditam bhāsmāṃbumantritaṃ rātrau sahasrāvṛttikaṃ punaḥ  NarP dinatrayaṃ ca tatpaścātprakṣipetpratimāsu ca yāsu kāsu ca sthūlāsu laghuṣvapi viśeṣataḥ  NarP mantraprabhāvāñcalanaṃ bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ aṣṭamyāṃ vā caturdaśyāṃ kuje vā ravivāsare  NarP hanumatpratimāṃ paṭṭe māṣaiḥ snehapariplutaiḥ kuryādramyāṃ viśuddhātmā sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitām  NarP tailadīpaṃ vāmabhāge ghṛtadīpaṃ tu dakṣiṇe saṃsthāpyāvāhayetpaścānmūlamantreṇa mantravit  NarP prāṇapratiṣṭāṃ kṛtvā ca pādyādīni samarpayet raktacandanapuṣpaiśca siṃdūrādyaiḥ samarcayet  NarP dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ pradāyātha naivedyaṃ ca samarpayet apūpamodanaṃ śākamodakānvaṭakādikam  NarP sājyaṃ ca tatsamarpyātha mūlamantreṇa mantravit akhaṇḍitānyahilatādalāni saptaviṃśatim  NarP tridhā kṛtvā sapūgāni mūlenaiva samarpayet evaṃ saṃpūjya mantrajño japeddaśaśanta manum  NarP karpūrārārtikaṃ kṛtvā stutvā ca bahudhā sudhīḥ nijepsitaṃ nivedyātha vidhivadvisṛjettataḥ  NarP naivedyānnena saṃbhojya brāhmaṇānsaptasaṃkhyayā niveditāni parṇāni tebhyo dadyādvibhajya ca  NarP dakṣiṇāṃ ca yathā śakti dattvā tān visṛjetsudhīḥ tata iṣṭagaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ  NarP taddine bhūmiśayyāṃ ca brahmacaryyaṃ samācaret evaṃ yaḥ kurute martyaḥ so cirādeva niścitam  NarP prāpnuyātsakalānkāmānkapīśasya prasādataḥ hanumatpratimāṃ bhūmau vilikhettatpuro manum  NarP sādhyanāma dvitīyāntaṃ vimocaya vimocaya tatpūrvaṃ mārjayedvāmapāṇinātha punarlikhet evamaṣṭottaraśataṃ likhitvā mārjayetpunaḥ  NarP evaṃ kṛte mahākārāgṛhācchīghraṃ vimucyate evamanyāni karmāṇi kuryyāntpallavamullikhan  NarP sarṣapairvaśyakṛddhomo vidveṣe hayamārajaiḥ kuṅkumairidhmakāṣṭhairvā marīcairjīrakairapi  NarP jvare dūrvāguḍūcībhirdadhnā kṣīreṇa vā ghṛtaiḥ śūle karañjavātārisamidbhistailalolitaiḥ  NarP tailāktābhiśca nirguṇḍīsamidbhirvā prayatnataḥ saubhāgye candanaiścendralocanairvā lavaṅgakaiḥ  NarP sugandhapuṣpairvastrāptyai tattaddhānyaistadāptaye ripupādarajobhiśca rājīlavaṇamiśritaiḥ  NarP homayetsaptarātraṃ ca ripuryāti yamālayam dhānyaiḥ saṃprāpyate dhānyamannairannasamucchrayaḥ  NarPtilājyakṣīramadhubhirmahiṣīgosamṛddhaye kiṃ bahūktairviṣe vyādhau śāntau mohe ca māraṇe  NarP vivāde staṃbhane dyūte bhūtabhītau ca saṃkaṭe vaśye yuddhe kṣate divye bandhamokṣe mahāvane  NarP sādhito yaṃ nṛṇāṃ dadyānmantraḥ śreyaḥ suniścitam vakṣye tha hanumadyantraṃ sarvasiddhipradāyakam  NarP lāṅgūlākārasaṃyuktaṃ valayatritayaṃ likhet sādhyanāma likhenmadhye pāśibīja praveṣṭitam  NarP uparyaṣṭacchadaṃ kṛtvā patreṣu kavacaṃ likhet tadbahirdaṃhamālikhya tadbahiścaturasrakam  NarP caturasasrasya rekhāgre triśūlāni samālikhet saiṃ bījaṃ bhūpurasyāṣṭavajreṣu vilikhettataḥ  NarP koṇeṣvakuṃśamālikhya mālāmantreṇa veṣṭayet tatsarvaṃ veṣṭayedyantravalayatritayena ca  NarP śilāyāṃ phalake vastre tāmrapatre tha kuḍyake tāḍapatre tha bhūrje vā rocanānābhikuṅkubhaiḥ  NarP yantrametatsamālikhya nirāhāro jitendriyaḥ kapeḥ prāṇānpratiṣṭāpya pūjayettadyathāvidhi  NarP aśeṣaduḥkhaśāntyarthaḥ yantraṃ saṃdhārayed budhaḥ mārījvarābhicārādisarvopadravanāśanam  NarP yoṣitāmapi bālānāṃ dhṛtaṃ janamanoharam bhūtakṛtyāpiśācānāṃ darśanādeva nāśanam  NarP mālāmantramatho vakṣye tāro vāgviṣṇugehinī dīrghatrayānvitā māyā prāguktaṃ kūṭapañcakam  NarP dhruvo hṛddhanumānṅeṃto tha prakaṭaparākramaḥ ākrāntadigmaṇḍalānte yaśovitānasaṃvadet  NarP dhavalīkṛtavarṇānte jagattritayavajra ca dehajvaladagnisūrya koṭyante ca samaprabha  NarP tanūruhapadānte tu rudrāvatāra saṃvadet laṅkāpurī tataḥ paścāddahanodadhilaṅghana  NarP daśagrīvaśiraḥ paścātkṛtāntakapadaṃ vadet sītānte śvasanapadaṃ vāyvante sutamīrayet  NarP añjanāgarbhasaṃbhūtaḥ śrīrāmalakṣmaṇānvitaḥ nandanti kara varṇānte sainyaprākāra īrayet  NarP sugrīvasakhyakādūrṇādraṇavālinivarhaṇa kāraṇadroṇaśabdānte parvatotpāṭaneti ca  NarP aśokavanavīthyante dāruṇākṣakumāraka chedanānte vanarakṣākarānte tu samūha ca  NarP vibhañjanānte brahmāstrabrahmaśakti graseti ca lakṣmaṇānte śaktibhedanivāraṇapadaṃ vadet  NarP viśalyoṣadhiśabdānte samānayana saṃpaṭhet bālodita tato bhānumaṇḍalagrasaneti ca  NarP meghanādahomapadādvidhvaṃsanapadaṃ vadet indrajidūdhakārānte ṇasītāsakṣaketi ca  NarP rākṣasīsaṃghaśabdānte vidāraṇapadaṃ vadet kuṃbhakarṇādisaṃkīrtyavadhānte ca parāyaṇa  NarP śrīrāmabhaktivarṇānte tatpareti samudra ca vyomadrumalaṅghaneti mahāsāmarthya saṃvadet  NarP mahātejaḥpuñjaśabdādvirājamānavoñcaret svāmivacanasaṃpāditārjunānte ca saṃyuga  NarP sahāyānte kumāreti brahmacārinpadaṃvadet gaṃbhīraśabdodayānte dakṣiṇāpatha saṃvadet mārttāṇḍameru śabdānte vadetparvatapīṭikā  NarP arcanānte tu sakalamantrānte mapadaṃ vadet ācāryamama śabdānte sarvagrahavināśana  NarP sarvajvaroñcāṭanānte sarvaviṣavināśana sarvāpattinivāraṇa sarvaduṣṭanibarhaṇa  NarP sarvavyādhyādi samprocya bhayānte ca nivāraṇa  NarP sarvaśatrucchedaneti tato mama parasya ca  NarP tatastribhuvanānte tu puṃstrīnapuṃsakātmakam sarvajīvapadānte tu jātaṃ vaśayayugmakam  NarP mamājñākārakaṃ paścātsaṃpādaya yugaṃ punaḥ tato nānānāmadheyānsarvān rājñaḥ sa saṃpaṭhet  NarP parivārānmametyante sevakān kuru yugmakam sarvaśastravītyante ṣāṇi vidhvaṃsaya dvayam  NarP lajjādīrghatrayopetā hotrayaṃ caihi yugmakam vilomaṃ pañcakūṭāni sarvaśatrūnhanadvayam  NarP parabalāni parānte sainyāni kṣobhayadvayam  NarP mama sarvaṃ kāryajātaṃ sādhayeti dvayaṃ tataḥ  NarP sarvaduṣṭadurjanānte mukhāni kīlayadvayam dhetrayaṃ varmatritayaṃ phaṭtrayaṃ hāntrayaṃ tataḥ  NarP vahnipriyānto mantro yaṃ mālāsaṃjño khileṣṭadaḥ  NarP vasvaṣṭabāṇavarṇo yaṃ mantraḥ sarveṣṭāsādhakaḥ  NarP mahābhaye mahotpāte smṛto yaṃ duḥkhanāśanaḥ dvādaśārṇasya ṣaṭkūṭaṃ tyaktvā bījaṃ tathādimam  NarP pañcakūṭātmako mantraḥ sarvakāmapradāyakaḥ rāmacandro muniścāsya gāyatrī chanda īritam  NarP hanumāndevatā prokto viniyogo khilāptaye pañcabījaiḥ samastena ṣaḍaṅgāni samācaret  NarP rāmadūto lakṣmaṇānte prāṇadātāñjanīsutaḥ sītāśokavināśo yaṃ laṅkāprāsādabhañjanaḥ  NarP hanumadādyāḥ pañcaite bījādyā ṅeyutāḥ punaḥ ṣaḍaṅgamanavo hyete dhyānapūjādi pūrvavat  NarP praṇavo vāgbhavaṃ padmā māyā dīrghatrayānvitā pañcakūṭāni mantro yaṃ rudrārṇaḥ sarvasiddhidaḥ  NarP dhyānapūjādikaṃ sarvamasyāpi pūrvavanmatam ayamārādhito mantraḥ sarvābhīṣṭapradāyakaḥ  NarP namo bhagavate paścādanantaścandraśekharāṃ janeyāya mahānte tu balāyānte gnivallabhā  NarP aṣṭādaśārṇo mantro yaṃ sunirīśvarasaṃjñakaḥ chando nuṣṭupdevatā tu hanumānpavanātmajaḥ  NarP haṃ bījaṃ vahnivanitā śaktiḥ proktā manīṣibhiḥ āñjaneyāya hṛdayaṃ śiraśca rudramūrtaye  NarP śikhāyāṃ vāyuputrāyāgnigarbhāya varmaṇi rāmadūtāya netraṃ syādbahyāstrāyāstramīritam  NarP tatpacāmīkaranibhaṃ bhīghnasaṃvihitāñjalim calatkuṇḍaladīptāsyaṃ padmakṣaṃ mārutiṃ smaret  NarP dhyātvaivamayutaṃ japtvā daśāṃśaṃ juhuyāttilaiḥ vaiṣṇave pūjayetpīṭhe prāguddiṣṭena vartmanā  NarP aṣṭottaraśataṃ nityaṃ naktabhojī jitendriyaḥ japitvā kṣudrarogebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP mahāroganivṛttyai tu sahasraṃ pratyahaṃ japet rākṣasaughaṃ vinighnantaṃ kapiṃ dhyātvādhanāśanam  NarP ayutaṃ prajapennityamacirājja yati dviṣam sugrīveṇa samaṃ rāmaṃ saṃdadhānaṃ kapiṃ smaran  NarP prajapedayutaṃ yastu saṃdhiṃ kuryāddvipadvayoḥ dhyātvā laṅkāṃ dahṝntaṃ tamayutaṃ prajapenmanum  NarP acirādeva śatrūṇāṃ grāmānsaṃpradahetsudhīḥ dhyātvā prayāṇasamaye hanumantaṃ japenmanum  NarP yo yāti so cirātsveṣṭaṃ sādhayitvā gṛhe vrajet hanumantaṃ sadā gehe yorcayejjapatatparaḥ  NarP ārogyaṃ ca śriyaṃ kāntiṃ labhate nirupadravam kānane vyāghracaurebhyo rakṣenmanurayaṃ smṛtaḥ  NarP prasvāpakāle śayyāyāṃ smarenmantramananyadhīḥ tasya duḥsvapnacaurādibhayaṃ naiva bhavetkvacit  NarP viyatseṃdurhanumate tato rudrātmakāya ca varmāstrānto mahāmantro dvādaśārṇo ṣṭasiddhikṛt  NarP rāmacandro muniścāsya jagatī chanda īritam hanumāndevatāṃ bījamādyaṃ śaktirhumīritā  NarP ṣaḍdīrghabhājā bījena ṣaḍaṅgāni samācaret mahāśailaṃ samutpāṭya dhāvantaṃ rāvaṇaṃ prati  NarP lākṣāraktāruṇaṃ raudraṃ kālāntakayamopamam jvaladagnisamaṃ jaitraṃ sūryakoṭisamaprabham  NarP aṅgadādyairmahāvīrairveṣṭitaṃ rudrarūpiṇam tiṣṭha tiṣṭha raṇe duṣṭa sṛjantaṃ ghoraniḥ svanam  NarP śaivarūpiṇamabhyarcya dhyātvā lakṣa japenmanum daśāṃśaṃ juhuyādvīhīnpayodadhyājyamiśritān  NarP pūrvokte vaiṣṇave pīṭhe vimalādisamanvite mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya mūlena pūjā kāryā hanūmataḥ  NarP dhyānaikamātro pi nṛṇāṃ siddhireva na saṃśayaḥ athāsya sādhanaṃ vakṣye lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā  NarP hanumatsādhanaṃ puṇyaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam etadguhyatamaṃ loke śīghrasiddhikaraṃ param  NarP mantrī yasya prasādena trailokyavijayī bhavet prātaḥ snātvā nadītīre upaviśya kuśāsane  NarP prāṇāyāmaṣaḍaṅge ca mūlena sakalaṃ caret puṣpāñjalyaṣṭakaṃ datvā dhyātvā rāmaṃ sasītakam  NarP tāmrapātre tataḥ padmamaṣṭapatraṃ sakeśaram kucandanena ghṛṣṭena saṃlikhettacchalākayā  NarP karmikāyāṃ likhenmantraṃ tatrāvāhya kapīśvaram mūrtiṃ mūlena saṃkalpya dhyātvā pādyādikaṃ caret  NarP gandhapuṣpādikaṃ sarvaṃ nivedya mūlamantrataḥ kesareṣu ṣaḍaṅgāni daleṣu ca tatorcayet  NarP sugrīvaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva hyaṅgadaṃ nalanīlakau jāṃbavantaṃ ca kumudaṃ kesarīśaṃ dalercayet  NarP dikpālāṃścāpi vajrādīnpūjayettadanantaram evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī sādhayetsveṣṭamātmani  NarP nadītīre kānane vā parvate vijane thavā sādhayetsādhaka śreṣṭho bhūmigrahaṇapūrvakam  NarP jitāhāro jitaśvāso jitavākca jitendriyaḥ digbandha nādikaṃ kṛtvā nyāsadhyānādipūrvakam  NarP lakṣaṃ japenmantrarājaṃ pūjayitvā tu pūrvavat lakṣānti divasaṃ prāpya kuryyāñca pūjanaṃ mahat  NarP ekāgramanasā samyagdhyātvā pavananandanam divārātrau japaṃ kuryādyāvatsaṃdarśanaṃ bhavet  NarP sudṛḍhaṃ sādhakaṃ matvā niśīthe pavanātmajaḥ suprasannastato bhūtvā prayāti sādhakāgrataḥ  NarP yathepsitaṃ varaṃ datvā sādhakāya kapīśvaraḥ varaṃ labdhvā sādhakandro viharedātmanaḥ sukhaiḥ  NarP etaddhi sādhanaṃ puṇyaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā prakāśitaṃ rahasyaṃ vai devānāmapi durlabham  NarP anyānapiprayogāṃśca sādhayedātmano hitān viyadinduyutaṃ paścānṅeṃtaṃ pavananandanam  NarP vahnipriyānto mantro yaṃ daśārṇaḥ sarvakāmadaḥ munyādikaṃ ca pūrvoktaṃ ṣaḍaṅgānyapi pūrvavat  NarP dhyāyedraṇe hanūmantaṃ sūryakoṭisamaprabham dhāvantaṃ rāvaṇaṃ jetuṃ dṛṣṭvā satvaramutthitam  NarP lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāvīraṃ patitaṃ raṇabhūtale guruṃ ca krodhamutpādya grahotuṃ guruparvatam  NarP hāhākāraiḥ sadarpaiśca kaṃpayantaṃ jagattrayam ābrahmāṇḍaṃ samākhyāpya kṛtvā bhīmaṃ kalevaram  NarP lakṣaṃ japeddaśāṃśena juhuyātpūrvavatsudhīḥ pūrvavatpūjanaṃ proktaṃ mantra syāsya vidhānataḥ  NarP evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī sādhayedātmano hitam asyāpi mantravaryasya rahasyaṃ sādhanaṃ tu vai  NarP sugopyaṃ sarvatantreṣu na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit brāhme muhūrte cotthāya kṛtanityakriyaḥ śuciḥ  NarP gatvā nadīṃ taḥ snātvā tīrthamāvāhya cāṣṭadhā mūlamantraṃ tato japtvā siṃcedādityasaṃkhyayā  NarP evaṃ snānādikaṃ kṛtvā gaṅgātīre thavā punaḥ parvate vā vane vāpi bhūmigrahaṇapūrvakam  NarP ādyavarṇaiḥ pūrakaṃ syātpañcavargaiśca kumbhakam recakaṃ ca punaryādyairevaṃ prāṇānniyanya ca  NarP vidhāya bhūtaśuddhyādi pīṭhanyāsāvadhi punaḥ dhyātvā pūrvoktavidhinā saṃpūjya ca kapīśvaram  NarP tadagre prajapennityaṃ sādhako yutamādarāt saptame divase prāpte kuryāñca pūjanaṃ mahat  NarP ekāgramanasā mantrī divārātraṃ japenmanum mahābhayaṃ pradatvā tribhāgaśeṣāsu niścitam  NarP yāminīṣu samāyāti niyataṃ pavanātmajaḥ yathepsitaṃ varaṃ dadyātsādhakāya kapīśvaraḥ  NarP vidyāṃ vāpi dhanaṃ vāpi rājyaṃ vā śatrunigraham tatkṣaṇādeva cāpnoti satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ  NarP iha loke khilānkāmānbhuktvānte muktimāpnuyāt sadyācitaṃ vāyuyugmaṃ hanūmanteti coddharet  NarP phalānte phakriyānetrayuktā ca kāmikā tataḥ dhaggante dhagitetyuktvā āyurāsva padaṃ tataḥ  NarP lohito garuḍo hetibāṇanetrākṣaro manuḥ munyādikaṃ tu pūrvoktaṃ plīharogaharo hariḥ  NarP devatā ca samuddiṣṭā plīhayuktodare punaḥ nāgavallīdalaṃ sthāpyamuparyācchādayettataḥ  NarP vastraṃ caivāṣṭaguṇitaṃ tataḥ sādhakasattamaḥ śakalaṃ vaṃśajaṃ tasyopari muñcetkapiṃ smaret  NarP āraṇyasāṇakotpanne vahnau yaṣṭiṃ pratāpayet badarībhūruhotthāṃ tāṃ mantreṇānena saptadhā  NarP tayā saṃtāḍayedvaṃśaśakalaṃ jaṭharasthitam saptakṛtvaḥ plīharogo nāśamāyāti niścitam  NarP tāro namo bhagavate āñjaneyāya coñcaret amukasya śṛṅkhalāṃ troṭayadvitayamīrayet  NarP bandhamokṣaṃ kuruyugaṃ svāhānto yaṃ manurmataḥ īśvaro sya muniśchando nuṣṭupca devatā punaḥ  NarP śṛṅkhalāmocaraḥ śrīmānhanūmānpavanātmajaḥ haṃ bījaṃ ṭhadvayaṃ śaktirbandhamokṣe niyogatā  NarP ṣaḍdīrghavahriyuktena bījenāṅgāni kalpayet vāme śailaṃ vairibhidaṃ viśuddhaṃ ṭaṅkamanyataḥ  NarP dadhānaṃ svarṇavarṇaṃ ca dhyāyetkuṇḍalinaṃ harim evaṃ dhyātvā japellakṣadaśāṃśaṃ cūtapallavaiḥ  NarP juhuyātpūrvavatproktaṃ yajanaṃ vāsya sūribhiḥ mahākārāgṛhe prāpto hyayutaṃ prajapennaraḥ  NarP śīghraṃ kārāgṛhānmuktaḥ sukhī bhavati niścitam yantraṃ cāsya pravakṣyāmi bandhamokṣakaraṃ śubham  NarP aṣṭacchadāntaḥ ṣaṭkoṇaṃ sādhyanāmasamanvitam ṣaṭkoṇeṣu dhruvaṃ ṅeṃtamāñjaneyapadaṃ likhet  NarP aṣṭacchadeṣu vilikhetpraṇavo vātuvātviti gorocanākuṅkumena likhitvā yantramuttamam  NarP dhṛtvā mūrdhni japenmantramayutaṃ bandhamuktaye yantrametallikhitvā tu mṛttikopari mārjayet  NarP dakṣahastena mantrajñaḥ pratyahaṃ maṇḍalā vadhi evaṃ kṛte mahākārāgṛhānmantrī vimucyate  NarP gaganaṃ jvalanaḥ sākṣī markaṭeti dvayaṃ tataḥ toyaṃ śaśeṣe makare parimuñcati
