 NarP munyādyarcādikaṃ sarvamasya pūrvavadācaret lakṣaṃ japo daśāṃśena śubhairdravyaiśca homayet  NarP pucchākāre suvastre ca lekhanyā kṣurakotthayā gandhāṣṭakairlikhedvūpaṃ kapirājasya sundaram  NarP tanmadhye ṣṭadaśārṇaṃ tu śatrunāmānvitaṃ likhet tena mantrābhijaptena śirobaddhvena bhūmipaḥ  NarP jayatyarigaṇaṃ sarvaṃ darśanādeva niścitam candrasūryo parāgādau pūrvoktaṃ lekhayeddhvaje  NarP dhvajamādāya mantrajñaḥ saṃsparśānmokṣaṇāvadhi mātṛkāṃ jāpayetpaścāddaśāṃśena ca homayet  NarP tilaiḥ sarṣapasaṃmiśraiḥ saṃskṛte havyavāhane gaje dhvajaṃ samāropya gacchedyuddhvāya bhūpatiḥ  NarP gajasthaṃ taṃ dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyante rayo dhruvam mahārakṣākaraṃ yantraṃ vakṣye samyagdhanūmataḥ  NarP likhedvasudalaṃ padmaṃ sādhyākhyāyutakarṇikam dale ṣṭakoṇamālikhya mālāmantreṇa veṣṭayet  NarP tadbahir māyayāveṣṭya prāṇasthāpanamācaret likhitaṃ svarṇalekhanyā bhūrjapatre suśobhane  NarP kāśmīrarocanābhyāṃ tu trilohena ca veṣṭitam sampātasādhitaṃ yantraṃ bhuje vā mūrdhni dhārayet  NarP raṇe durodare vāde vyavahāre jayaṃ labhet grahairvighnairviṣaiḥ śastraiścaurairnaivābhibhūyate  NarP sarvānro gānapākṛtya ciraṃ jīvecchataṃ samāḥ ṣaḍdīrghayuktaṃ gagana vahnyākhyaṃ tārasaṃpuṭam  NarP aṣṭārṇo yaṃ mahāmantro mālāmantro tha kathyate praṇavo vajrakāyeti vajratuṇḍeti saṃpaṭhet  NarP kapilānte piṅgaleti urddhvakeśamahāpadam balaraktamukhānte tu taḍijjihva mahā tataḥ  NarP raudradaṃṣṭrotkaṭaṃ paścātkahadvandvaṃ karāliti mahadṛḍhaprahāreṇa laṅkeśvaravadhāttataḥ  NarP vāyurmahāsetupadaṃ bandhānte ca mahā punaḥ śailapravāha gaganecara ehyehi saṃvadet  NarP bhagavanmahābalānte parākramapadaṃ vadet bhairavājñāpayaihyehi mahāraudrapadaṃ tataḥ  NarP dīrghapucchena varṇānte vadedveṣṭaya vairiṇam jaṃbhayadvayamābhāṣya varmāstrānto manurmataḥ  NarP mālāhvayo labhate kāmānde vairapi sudurlabhān dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutānpautrānsaubhāgyamatulaṃ yaśaḥ  NarP medhāṃ vidyāṃ prabhāṃ rājyaṃ vivāde vijayaṃ tathā vaśyādyāni ca karmāṇi saṃgare vijayaṃ tathā  NarP upāsitoṃjanāgarbhasaṃbhūtaḥ pradadātyalam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne sanatkumāravibhāge tṛtīyapāde hanumanmantrakathanaṃnāma catuḥsaptatitamo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācaatha dīpavidhiṃ vakṣye sarahasyaṃ hanūmataḥ yasya vijñānamātreṇa siddho bhavati sādhakaḥ  NarP dīpapātrapramāṇaṃ ca tailamānaṃ krameṇa tu dravyasya ca pramāṇaṃ vai tattu mānamanukramāt  NarP sthānabhedaṃ ca mantraṃ ca dīpadānamanuṃ pṛthak puṣpavāsitatailena sarvakāmapradaṃ matam  NarP tilatailaṃ śriyaḥ prāptyai pathikāgamanaṃ prati atasītailamuddiṣṭaṃ vaśyakarmaṇi niścitam  NarP sārṣāpaṃ roganāśāya kathitaṃ karmakovidaiḥ māraṇe rājikotthaṃ vā vibhītakasamudbhavam  NarP uñcāṭane karajotthaṃ vidveṣe madhuvṛkṣajam alābhe sarvatailānāṃ tilajaṃ tailamuttamam  NarP godhūmāśca tilā māṣā mudgā vai taṇḍulāḥ kramāt pañcadhānyamidaṃ proktaṃ nityadīpaṃ tu māruteḥ  NarP pañcadhānyasamudbhūtaṃ piṣṭamātraṃ suśobhanam sarvakāmapradaṃ proktaṃ sarvadā dīpadānake  NarP vaśye taḍulapiṣṭotthaṃ māraṇe māṣapiṣṭajam uñcāṭane kṛṣṇatilapiṣṭajaṃ ca prakīrtitam  NarP pathikāgamane proktaṃ godhūmotthaṃ sataṇḍulam mohane tvāḍhakījāta vidveṣe ca kulatthajam  NarP saṃgrāme kevalā māṣāḥ proktā dīpasya pātrake saṃdhau tripiṣṭajaṃ lakṣmīhetoḥ kastūrikābhavam  NarP elālavaṅgakarpūramṛganābhisamudbhavam kanyāprāptyai tathā rājavaṃśye sakhye tathaiva ca  NarP alābhe sarvavastūnāṃ pañcadhānyaṃ varaṃ smṛtam aṣṭamuṣṭirbhavetkiñcitkiñcidaṣṭau caḥ puṣkalam  NarP puṣkalānāṃ caturṇāṃ ca hyāḍhakaḥ parikīrtitaḥ caturāḍhako bhaveddroṇaḥ khārī droṇacatuṣṭayam  NarP khārīcatuṣṭaya prasthasaṃjñā ca parikīrtitā athavānyaprakāreṇa mānamatra nigadyate  NarP paladvayaṃ tu prasṛtaṃ dviguṇaṃ kuḍavaṃ matam caturbhiḥ kuḍavaiḥ prasthastaiścaturbhistathāḍhakaḥ  NarP caturāḍhako bhaveddroṇaḥṛ khārī droṇacatuṣṭayam krameṇaitena te jñeyāḥ pātre ṣaṭkarmasaṃbhave  NarP pañca sapta nava tathā pramāṇāste yathākramam saugandhe naiva mānaṃ syāttadyathāruci saṃmatam  NarP nityapātre tu tailānāṃ niyamo vārtikodbhavaḥ somavāre gṛhītvātaddhvānyaṃ toyaplutaṃ dharet  NarP paścātpramāṇato jñeyaṃ kumārīhastapeṣaṇam tatpiṣṭaṃ śuddhapātre tu nadītoyena piṇḍitam  NarP dīpapātraṃ tataḥ kuryācchuddhaḥ prayatamānasaḥ dīpapātre jvālyamāne māruteḥ kavacaṃ paṭhet  NarP śuddhabhūmau samāsthāpya bhaume dīpaṃ pradāpayet mālāmanūnāṃ ye varṇāḥ sādhyanāmasamanvitāḥ  NarP vartikāyāṃ prakarttavyāstantavastatpramāṇakāḥ tattriṃśāṃśena vā grāhyā gurukārye khilāḍhyatā  NarP kūṭatulyāḥ smṛtā nitye sāmānye tha viśeṣake rudrāḥ kūṭagaṇāḥ proktā na pātre niyamo mataḥ  NarP ekaviṃśatisaṃkhyākāstantavo thādhvani smṛtāḥ raktasūtraṃ hanumato dīpadāne prakīrtitam  NarP kṛṣṇamuñcāṭane dveṣe ruṇaṃ māraṇakarmaṇi kūṭatulyapalaṃ tailaṃ gurukārye śivairguṇam  NarP nitye pañcapalaṃ proktamathavā mānasī ruciḥ  NarP hanumatpratimāyāstu sannidhau dīpadāpanam śivālaye thavā kuryānnityanaimittike sthale  NarP viśeṣo styatra yaḥ kaścinmārute rucyate mayā  NarP pratimāgre pramodena grahabhūtagraheṣu ca catuṣpathe tathā proktaṃ ṣaṭsu dīpapradāpanam  NarP sannidhau sphaāṭike liṅge śālagrāmasya sannidhau nānābhogaśriyai proktaṃ dīpadānaṃ hanūmataḥ  NarP gaṇeśasannidhau vighnamahāsaṃkaṭanāśane viṣavyādhibhaye ghore hanumatsannidhau smṛtam  NarP durgāyāḥ sannidhau proktaṃ saṃgrāme dīpadāpanam catuṣpathe vyādhinaṣṭau duṣṭadṛṣṭau tathaiva ca  NarP rājadvāre bandhamuktau kārāgāre thavā matam aśvatthavaṭamūle tu sarvakāryaprasiddhaye  NarP vaśye bhaye vivāde ca veśmasaṃgrāmasaṃkaṭe dyūte dṛṣṭistaṃbhane ca vidveṣe māraṇe tathā  NarP mṛtakotthāpane caiva pratimācālane nirgame caiva rājadvāre prakīrtitam  NarP dīpadānaṃ hanumato nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  NarP rudraikaviṃśapiṇḍāṃśca tridhā maṇḍalamānakam laghumānaṃ smṛtaṃ pañca sapta vā nava vā tathā  NarP kṣīreṇa navanūtena dadhnā vā gomayena ca pratimākaraṇaṃ proktaṃ māruterdīpadāpane  NarP dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ vīraṃ kṛtvā kesarivikramam  NarP ṛkṣavinyastapādaṃ ca kirīṭena virājitam likhedbhittau paṭe vāpi pīṭhe vā māruteḥ śubhe  NarP mālāmantreṇa dātavyaṃ dīpadānaṃ hanūmataḥ nityadīpaḥ prakarttavyo dvādaśākṣaravidyayā  NarP viśeṣastatra yastaṃ vai dīpadāne vadhāraya ṣaṣṭyādau ca dvitīyādāvimaṃ dīpamitīrayet  NarP gṛhāṇeti padaṃ paścāccheṣaṃ pūrvavaduñcaret kūṭādau nityadīpe ca mantraṃ sūryākṣaraṃ vadet  NarP tatra mālākhyamanunā tattatkāryeṣu kārayet gomayenopaliptāyāṃ bhūmau tadgatamānasaḥ  NarP ṣaṭkoṇaṃ vasupatraṃ ca bhūmau rekhāsamanvitam kamalaṃ ca likhedbhadraṃ tatra dīpaṃ nidhāpayet  NarP śaive vā vaiṣṇave pīṭhe pūjayedañjanāsutam kūṭaṣaṭkaṃ ca ṣaṭkoṇe antarāle paralikhet  NarP ṣaṭkoṇeṣu ṣaḍaṅgāni bījayuktāni saṃlikhet saumyaṃ madhyagataṃ lekhyaṃ tatra saṃpūjya mārutim  NarP ṣaṭkoṇeṣu ṣaḍaṅgāni nāmāni ca puroktavat vasupatre kramātpūjyā aṣṭāvete ca vānarāḥ  NarP sugrīvāyāṅgadāyātha suṣeṇāya nalāya ca nīlāyātho jāṃbavate prahastāya tathaiva ca  NarP suveṣāya tataḥ paścādyajetṣaḍaṅgadevatāḥ ādāvañjanāputrāya tataśca rudramūrtaye  NarP tato vāyusutāyātha jānakījīvanāya ca rāmadūtāya brahmāstranivāraṇāya tatparam  NarP pañcopacāraiḥ saṃpūjya deśakālau ca kīrtet kuśodakaṃ samādāya dīpamantraṃ samuñcaret  NarP uttagabhimukho japtvā sādhayetsādhakottamaḥ taṃ mantraṃ kūṭadhā japtvā jalaṃ bhūmau vinikṣipet  NarP tataḥ karapuṭaṃ kṛtvā yathāśakti japenmanum anena dīpavaryeṇa udaṅmukhagatena vai  NarP tathā vidhehi hanumanyathā syurme manorathaāḥ trayodaśaivaṃ dravyāṇi gomayaṃ mṛttikā masī  NarP alaktaṃ daradaṃ raktacandanaṃ candanaṃ madhu kastūrikā dadhi kṣīraṃ navanītaṃ ghaṛtaṃ tathā  NarP gomayaṃ dvividhaṃ tatra proktaṃ gomahiṣībhavam śālaniryāsasaṃbhavaḥ  NarP kuryyāñca tailadīpaṃ tu vartipañcakasaṃyutam dadhyodanena naivedyaṃ dadyātsādhakasattamaḥ  NarP vāratrayaṃ kaṇṭhadeśe saśeṣaviṣamuñcaran evaṃ kṛte tu naṣṭānāṃ mahiṣīṇāṃ NarP sarpastu paścime dvāre vyāghraścaivottare tathā evaṃ krameṇa khaḍgaṃ ca kṣurikādaṇḍamudgarān  NarP vilikhya madhye mūrtiṃ ca mahiṣīgomayena vai kṛtvā ḍamaruhastāṃ ca cakitākṣīṃ prayatnataḥ  NarP payasā snāpanaṃ raktacandanenānulepanam jātīpuṣpaistu saṃpūjya śuddhadhūpa prakalpayet  NarP ghṛtena dīpaṃ dattvātha pāyasānnaṃ nivedayet gaganaṃ dīpikendvāḍhyāṃ śāstraṃ ca purato japet  NarP evaṃ saptadinaṃ kṛtvā mucyate mahato bhayāt anayorbhauṃmavāre tu kuryādāraṃbhamādarāt  NarP śatrusenābhaye prāpte gairikeṇa tu maṇḍalam kṛtvā tadantare tālamīṣṭannamraṃ samālikhet  NarP tatrāvalaṃbamānāṃ  NarP tāraḥ śrīhanumatyaścādastraracabhujākṣaraḥ brahmā muniḥ syādgāyatrī chando tra devatā punaḥ  NarP hanumānkamalā bījaṃ phaṭ śaktiḥ parikīrtitaḥ ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena ṣaḍaṅgāni samācaret  NarP āñjaneya pāṭalāsyaṃ svarṇādrisamavigraham pārijātadrumūlasthaṃ cintayetsādhakottamaḥ  NarP evaṃ dhyātvā japellakṣaṃ daśāṃśaṃ juhuyāttilaiḥ trimadhvaktairyañjatpīṭhe pūrvoktepūrvavatsudhīḥ  NarP anena hanumadbhajanāsaktaḥ kārtavīryārjunaṃ sudhīḥ viśeṣataḥ samārādhya yathoktaṃ phalamāpnuyāt  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde dīpavidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcasaptatitamo tithimānādāsahasraṃ tantusaṃkhyā vinirmitā  NarP goghṛtaṃ prakṣipettatra śuddhavastraviśodhitam sahasrapalasaṃkhyādidaśāṃśaṃ kāryagauravāt  NarP suvarṇādikṛtāṃ ramyāṃ śalākāṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulām tadarddhāṃ ye smānbādhitumicchanti sedhyāsu ca divā niśi  NarP te sarve kārtavīryasya gadāsāhasradāritāḥ dūrādeva vinaśyantu vinaṣṭagatipauruṣāḥ  NarP ye cākṣemapradātāraḥ kūṭamāyāvinaśca ye yāntu vinaṣṭabalasāhasāḥ  NarP ye meghā ye mahāvarṣā ye vātā yāśca vidyutaḥ ye mahāśanayo dīptā ye nirghātāśca dāruṇāḥ  NarP ulkāpātāśca ye ghorā ye mahendrāyudhādayaḥ sūryendukujasaumyāśca vahnayaḥ  NarP ṛtavo lokapālāśca pitaro devasaṃhatiḥ vidyāścaiva catuḥṣaṣṭibhedā yā bhuvanatraye  NarP ye tvatra kīrtitāḥ sarve caye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ te saṃtu naḥ sadā saumyāḥ sarvakālasukhāvahāḥ  NarP ājñayā kārtavīryasya yogīndrasyāmitadyuteḥ kārtavīryārjuno dhanvī rājendro haihayeśvaraḥ  NarP daśāsyadarpahā revālīlādṛptakaḥ sudurjayaḥ duḥkhahā cauradamano rājarājeśvaraḥ prabhuḥ  NarP sarvajñaḥ sarvadaḥ śrīmān sarvaśiṣṭeṣṭadaḥ kṛtī rājacūḍāmaṇiryogī saptadvīpādhināyakaḥ  NarP vijayī viśvajidvāgmī mahāgatiralolupaḥ yajvā viprapriyo vidvān brahmajñeyaḥ sanātanaḥ  NarP māhiṣmatīpatiryodhā mahākīrtirmahābhujaḥ sukumāro mahāvīro mārīghno madirekṣaṇaḥ  NarP śatrughnaḥ śāśvataḥ śūraḥ śaṅkhabhṛdyogivallabhaḥ mahābhāgavato dhīmānmahābhayavināśanaḥ  NarP asādhyī vigraho sarvajñānanidhiḥ sarvasiddhvidānakṛtodyamaḥ  NarP ityaṣṭaśatanāmottyā mūrtayo daśa dikpathi samyagdaśadiśo vyāpya pālayantu ca māṃ sadā  NarP svasthāḥ sarvendriyāḥ saṃtuṃ śāntirastu sadā mama śeṣādyā vāñchāptiratikalyāṇamavaiṣamyamanāmayam  NarP anālasyamabhīṣṭaṃ syānmṛtyuhānirbalonnatiḥ bhayahāniryaśaḥ kāntirvidyā ṛddhirmahāśriyaḥ  NarP anaṣṭadravyatā caiva naṣṭasya punarāgamaḥ dīrghāyuṣyaṃ yātrākāle paṭhitvedaṃ mārge gacchati yaḥ pumān na duṣṭacauravyāghrādyairbhayaṃ syātparipanthibhiḥ  NarP japannāsecanaṃ kurvañjalenāñjalinā tanau na cāsau viṣakṛtyādirogasphoṭaiḥ prabādhyate  NarP kārtavīryaḥ khaladveṣī kṛtavīryasuto balī sahasrabāhuḥ śatrughno raktavāsā dhanurdharaḥ  NarP raktagandhoraktamālyo rājā smarturabhīṣṭadaḥ dvādaśaitāni nāmāni kārtavīryasya yaḥ paṭhet  NarP saṃpadastasya jāyante janāstasya vaśe sadā yaḥ sevate sadā vipra śrīmañcakrāvatārakam  NarP tasya rakṣāṃ sadā kuryāñcakraṃ viṣṇormahātmanaḥ mayaitatkavacaṃ vipra dattātreyānmunīśvarāt  NarP śrutaṃ tubhyaṃ nigaditaṃ dhārayasvākhileṣṭadam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde kārtavīryakavacakathanaṃ nāma saptasaptatitomo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācakārtavīryasya kavacaṃ kathitaṃ te munīśvara mohavidhvaṃsanaṃ jaitraṃ māruteḥ kavacaṃ śṛṇu  NarP yasya saṃdhāraṇātsadyaḥ sarve naśyantyupadravāḥ bhūtapretārijaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāśameti na saṃśayaḥ  NarP ekadāhaṃ gato kapiśreṣṭhaḥ kesaripriyanandanaḥ adhastādviṣṇubhaktastu pātu madhye ca pāvaniḥ  NarP laṅkāvidāhakaḥ pātu sarvāpadbhyo nirantaram sugrīvasacivaḥ pātu mastakaṃ vāyunandanaḥ  NarP bhālaṃ pātu mahāvīro bhruvormadhye nirantaram netre chāyāpahārī ca pātu naḥ plavageśvaraḥ  NarP kapolau karṇamūle ca pātu śrīrāmakiṅkaraḥ nāsāgramañjanāsūnuḥ pātu vaktraṃ harīśvaraḥ  NarP pātu kaṇṭhe tu daityāriḥ skandhau pātu surārijit bhujau pātu mahātejāḥ karau ca caraṇāyudhaḥ  NarP nakhānnākhāyudhaḥ pātu kukṣau pātu kapīśvaraḥ vakṣo mudrāpahārī ca pātu pārśve bhujāyudhaḥ  NarP laṅkānibhañjanaḥ pātu pṛṣṭadeśe svayamaṇurbṛhat  NarP ṛgyajuḥsāmarūpaśca praṇavastrivṛdadhvaraḥ tasmai svasmai ca sarvasmai nato smyātmasamādhinā  NarP anekānantabrahmāṇḍadhṛte brahmasvarūpiṇe samīraṇātmane tasmai nato NarP kaupīnavāsase tubhyaṃ rāmabhaktiratāya ca dakṣiṇāśābhāskarāya satāṃ candrodayātmane  NarP kṛtyākṣatavyathāghnāya sarvakleśaharāya ca svāmyājñāpārthasaṃgrāmasakhyasaṃjayakāriṇe  NarP bhaktānāṃ divyavādeṣu saṃgrāme jayakāriṇe kilkilāvuvakārāya ghoraśabdakarāya ca  NarP sarvāgnivyādhisaṃstaṃbhakāriṇe bhayahāriṇe sadā vanaphalāhārasaṃtṛptāya viśeṣataḥ  NarP mahārṇavaśilābaddhvasetubandhāya te NarP parīte tra sakhāyo me sakhyaśca vigatajvarāḥ krīḍanti sarvadā cātra prākaṭye pi rahasyapi  NarP kasmiṃścidavatāre tu yadvṛttaṃ ca raho mama tadatra prakaṭaṃ tubhyaṃ karomi prītamānasaḥ  NarP āvirbhūto smyahaṃ pūrvaṃ rājño daśarathakṣaye caturyūhātmakastakatra tasya bhāryātraye mune  NarP tataḥ katipayairabdairāgato dvijapuṅgavaḥ viśvāmitrorthayāmāsa pitaraṃ mama bhūpatim  NarP astragrāmaṃ dadau mahyaṃ māsaṃ cāvāsayattathā tato gādhisutodhīmān jñātvā bhāvyarthamādarāt  NarP mithilāmanayattatra raudraṃ cādarśayaddhvanuḥ tasya kanyāṃ paṇībhūtāṃ sītāṃ surasutopamām  NarP vīrabhadraḥ samāgataḥ kimarthaṃ rudyate bhadra rudite kāraṇaṃ vada  NarP tacchrutvā prāha hanumānvīrabhadraṃ manogatam pīṭhahīnamidaṃ liṅgaṃ paśya me pāpasaṃcayam  NarP vīrabhadrastataḥ prāha śrutvā kapisamīritam yadi nāyāti pīṭhaṃ te liṅge mā sāhasaṃ kuru  NarP dāhayiṣyāmyahaṃ lokānyadi nāyāti pīṭhakam paśya darśaya me liṅgaṃ pīṭhaṃ cātrāgataṃ na vā  NarP ata dṛṣṭvā vīrabhadro liṅge pīṭhamanāgatam dagdhukāmo khilāṃllokānvīrabhadraḥ prātāpavān  NarP analaṃ bhuvi cikṣepa kṣaṇāddagdhā mahī tadā atha saptatalāndagdhvā punarūrddhvamavartata  NarP pañcorddhvalokānadahajjanalokanivāsinaḥ lalāṭanetrasaṃbhūtaṃ nakhenādāya cānalam  NarP jaṃbīraphalasaṃkāśaṃ kṛtvā karatale vibhuḥ tapaḥ satyaṃ ca saṃdagdhumudyato bhūnmunīśvaraḥ  NarP tatastu munayo dṛṣṭvātapolokanivāsinaḥ dagdhukāmaṃ vīrabhadraṃ gautamāśramamāgatāḥ  NarP na dṛṣṭvā tatra deveśaṃ śaṅkaraṃ svātmani sthitam astuvanbhaktisaṃyuktāḥ stotrairvedasamudbhavaiḥ  NarP oṃ vedavedyāya devāya tasmai śuddhaprabhācintyarūpāya kasmai brahmādyadhīśāya sṛṣṭyādikartreviṣṇupriyāyārtihṝntreṃtakartre  NarP namaste khilādhīśvarāyāṃbarāya namaste carasthāvaravyāpakāya namo vedaguhyāya bhaktapriyāya namaḥ pākabhoktre makheśāya tubhyam  NarP namaste śivāyādidevāya kurmo namo vyālayajñopavītapradhartne namaste surābinduvarṣāpanāya trayīmūrtaye kālakālāya nātha  NarP dharitrīmarudvyomatoyenduvahniprabhāmaṇḍalātmāṣṭadhāmūrti dhartre śivāyāśivaghnāya vīrāya bhūyātsadā naḥ prasanno jagannāthakejyaḥ  NarP kalānāthabhālāya ātmā mahātmā mano hyagrayāno nirūpyo na vāgbhiḥ jagajjāḍyavidhvaṃsanobhuktimuktipradaḥ stātprasannaḥ sadā śuddha kīrtiḥ  NarP yataḥ saṃprasūtaṃ jagajjātamīśātsthitaṃ yena rakṣāvatā bhāvitaṃ ca layaṃ yāsyate yatra vācāṃ vidūre sa vai naḥ prasanno stu kālatrayātmā  NarP yadārdi ca madhyaṃ tathāntaṃ na ke pi vijānanti vijñā api svānumānāḥ sa vai sarvamūrtiḥ sadā no vibhūtyeprasanno stu kiṃ jñāpayāmo tra kṛtyam  NarP etāṃ stutimathākarṇya bhaganetrapradaḥ śivaḥ viṣṇumāha munīnetānānayasva madantikam  NarP atha viṣṇuḥ samāgatya tapolokanivāsinaḥ munīnsāṃtvayya viśveśaṃ darśayāmāsa śaṅkaram  NarP tānāha śaṅkaro vākyaṃ kimarthaṃ yūyamāgatāḥ tapolokādbhūmilokaṃ munayo muktakilbiṣāḥ  NarP tacchrutvā śūlino vākyaṃ procuste munisattamāḥ deva dvādaśalokānāṃ dṛśyante bhasmarāśayaḥ  NarP sthitamekaṃ vanamidaṃ paśya dīyatāmiti  NarP gandharvo pyāha na mayā tyājyā vīṇā priyā mama mamāpīṣṭehaṃ gandharva vīṇetyāha kapīśvaraḥ  NarP yadā na datte gandharvo vallakīṃ kapaye priyām tadā muṣṭiprahāreṇa gandharvaḥ pātitaḥ kṣitau  NarP vīṇāmādāya mahatīṃ svaratantusamanvitām hanumānvānaraśreṣṭho gāyanprāgācchivāntikam  NarP tato gānena mahatā prasādya jagadīśvaram bṛhatīkusumaiḥ śuddhair devapādāvapūjayat  NarP tataḥ prasanno viśvātmā munīnāṃ sannidhau tadā daityānāṃ devatānāṃ ca nṛpāṇāṃ śaṅkaro pi ca  NarP tasmai varamatha prādātkalpāntaṃ jīvitaṃ punaḥ samullaṅghane śaktiṃ śāstrajñatvaṃ balonnatim  NarP evaṃ dattaṃ varaṃ prāpya maheśena mahātmanā pratyakṣaṃ mama viprendra hanumānharṣamāgagataḥ  NarP samastabhūṣāsu ṣitāṅgaḥ svadīptirmadīkṛtadevadīptiḥ prasannamūrtistaruṇaḥ śivāṃśaḥ saṃbhāvayāmāsa NarP mantreṇa puṭitāṃ tāṃ ca gāyatrīṃ vinyasetkramāt mātṛkāpuṭitaṃ mūlaṃ vinyasetsādhakottamaḥ  NarP mūlena puṭitāṃ caiva mātṛkāṃ vinyasetkramāt tṛcaṃ na mātṛkāvarṇānpūrvaṃ tattatsthale sudhīḥ  NarP śāntyādikāṃstataḥ patrāgragā mahiṣyo ṣṭau yajetsādhakasattamaḥ  NarP tataḥ ṣoḍaśasāhasraṃ sakṛdevārcayetpriyāḥ indranīlamukundāṃśca karālānandakacchapān  NarP śaṅkhapadmau tataḥ padmānnidhīnaṣṭau kramādyajet tadbahirlokapālāṃśca vajrādyānapi pūjayet  NarP evaṃ saptāvṛttivṛtaṃ kṛṣṇamabhyarcya cādarāt prīṇayeddadhikhaṇḍājyamiśreṇa tu payoṃdhasā  NarP divyopacāraṃ datvātha stutvā natvā ca keśavam udvāsayetsvahṛdaye parivāragaṇaiḥ saha  NarP nyasyātmānaṃ samabhyarcya tanmayo viharetsudhīḥ ratnābhiṣekadhyānejyā viṃśatyarṇāśrite ritā  NarP evaṃ yo bhajate mantraṃ sa samṛddheḥ padaṃ bhavet japahomārcanadhyānairyo manuṃ prajapedamum  NarP tadveśma pūryate ratnaiḥ ravarṇadhānyairanāratam pṛthvī pṛthvī kare tasya sarvasasyasamākulā  NarP putrairmitraiḥ susaṃpannaḥ prayātyante parāṃ gatim vahnāvabhyarcya govindaṃ śuklapuṣpaiḥ satandulaiḥ  NarP ājyāktairayutaṃ hutvā bhasma tanmūrdhni dhārayet tasyānnādisamṛddhiḥ syāttadūśe sarvayoṣitaḥ  NarP raktāṃbhojaistrimadhvaktairhunellakṣaṃ sādhayenmanunāmunā mantrarājamatho vakṣye daśārṇaṃ sarvasiddhidam  NarP smṛtiḥ sadyānvitā sākṣirlohito janavallabhā pavano gnipriyānto yaṃ daśārṇo mantra īritaḥ  NarP nārado sya muniśchando virāṭ kṛṣṇo sya devatā kāmo bījaṃ vahnijāyā śaktiḥ proktā manīṣibhiḥ  NarP ācakraṃ ca vicakraṃ ca sucakraṃ tadanantaram trailokyarakṣaṇaṃ cakramasurāntakagacakrakam  NarP etairṅeṭhadvayāntaiśca cakraiḥ pañcāṅgakaṃ manoḥ tatastārapuṭaṃ mantraṃ vyāpayya karayostriśaḥ  NarP seṃdūnhṛdantānmantrārṇānpraṇavāntaritānnyaset dakṣāṅguṣṭhācca vāmāṅguṣṭhāntamaṅguliparvasu  NarP sṛṣṭinyāso yamuditaḥ sthitinyāso dhunocyate nyasedvāmakaniṣṭhādikaniṣṭāntaṃ sthitau sudhīḥ  NarP vāmāṅguṣṭhānnyaseddakṣāṃ guṣṭhāntaṃ saṃhṛtau tathā saṃhṛtirdeṣasaṃghātahāriṇī parikīrtitā  NarP vidyāpradaśca sṛṣṭyanto varṇināṃ karayornyaset tato mūlena puṭitānmātṛkārṇānsabindukān  NarP vinyasenmātṛkānyāsasthāneṣu praṇataḥ sudhīḥ tatastārapuṭaṃ mūlaṃ vyāpakatvena vinyaset  NarP saṃhārasṛṣṭibhedena daśatattvāni vinyaset namontamūlamantrārṇapadāyāmyāni cātmane  NarP matyantāni ca tattvāni pṛthivyādyāni ca kramāt pṛthvī jalaṃ tathā vahnirvāyurākāśameva ca  NarP ahṝṅkāro mahattatvaṃ prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ param pravinyasenmastake ca netrayoḥ śrotrayornasoḥ  NarP vadane hṛdaye nābhau liṅge jānvośca pādayoḥ praṇavāntaritānvarṇānhṛdantānvijyasenmanoḥ  NarP sṛṣṭinyāso yamākhyātaḥ sthitinyāsaṃ śṛṇu dvija hṛdi kecidvirakte gṛhage saṃhārāntaṃ vidurbudhāḥ  NarP vibhūtipañjaraṃ nyāsaṃ kuryādiṣṭāptaye tataḥ manordaśāvṛttimayaṃ kṛṣṇasāṃnidhyakārakam  NarP ādhāre ca dhvaje nābhau hṛdi kaṇṭhe mukhe śaye ūrvośca tatpūrvādyāṃśāsu svakalāsu ca  NarP doṣṇoḥ sakthnoḥ śirokṣyāsyakaṇṭhahṛjjaṭhareṣu ca mūlādhāre liṅgadeśe jānunoḥ pādayostathā  NarP śrotragaṇḍāṃsavakṣojapārśvaliṅgeṣu vinyaset ūrvorjānvorjaṅghayośca pādayorvinyasetkramāt  NarP vibhūtipañjarākhyo yaṃ nyāsaḥ sarvārthasiddhidaḥ anena nyāsavaryeṇa sākṣātkṛṣṇatanurbhavet  NarP mūrti pañjaranāmānaṃ nyāsaṃ pūrvoditaṃ nyaset tato daśāṅgapañcāṅgau nyāsavaryauṃ nyase kramāt  NarP hṛdi mūrdhni śikhāyāṃ ca sarvāṅge dikṣu pārśvayoḥ kaṭyāṃ pṛṣṭhe tathā mūrdhni vinyasedvaiṣṇavottamaḥ  NarP pañcāṅgāni nyasedbhūyaścakraiḥ prāgvatsamāhitaḥ anyo pyaṣṭādaśārṇoktaḥ kartavyo nyāsasaṃcayaḥ  NarP tataḥ kirīṭamantreṇa vyāpakaṃ racayetsudhīḥ veṇubilvādimudrāṃśca darśayetsādhakottamaḥ  NarP sudarśanasya mantreṇa kuryāddigbandhanaṃ tataḥ anaṅguṣṭhāśca ṛjavaḥ karaśākhā bhavanti cet  NarP hṛnmudreyaṃ samākhyātā śiromudrā tathā bhavet adhoṅguṣṭhā tu yā muṣṭiḥ śikhāmudreyamīritā prasāritakarāṅgulyorvarmamudreyamīritā  NarP nārācamuṣṭyā dhṛtabāhuyugmaḥ aṅguṣṭhatarjanyudito dhvanistu viṣvagvimuktā kathitāstramudrā yatrākṣiṇī tarjanimadhyame ca  NarP oṣṭhe vāmakarāṅguṣṭo lagnastasya kaniṣṭikā dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭasaṃsaktā tatkaniṣṭhā prasāritā  NarP tarjanī madhyamānāmā kiñcitsakuñcya cālitā veṇumudreyamuditā suguptā preyasī hareḥ nocyante tatra siddhatvānmālāśrīvatsakaustubhāḥ  NarP vāmāṅguṣṭhaṃ samudraṃ tamaparakarāṅguṣṭhakenātha baddhvā saṃpīḍyāgraṃ ca dakṣāṅgulibhirapi ca tāṃ vāmahastāṅgulībhiḥ gāḍhaṃ baddhvā svakīye hṛdayasarasije sthāpayetkāmabījaṃ proccāryaiṣā tu gopyā sakalasukhakarī vilvamudrā munīndraiḥ  NarP kāyena manasā vācā yatpāpaṃ prayogānkartumarhati uddaṇḍabāhudordaṃhadhṛtagovarddhanācalam  NarP anyahastāgulīvyaktasvaravaṃśārpitānanam dhyāyankṛṣṇaṃ japenmantraṃ vrajecchatraṃ vinā sudhīḥ  NarP varṣavātāśanibhyo pi bhayaṃ tasya na jāyate moghamedhaughavrātādgagatendraṃ taṃ smaranhunet  NarP loṇairayutasaṃkhyaiḥ syādanāvṛṣṭirna saṃśayaḥ krīḍantamarkajātīre majjanasnāpanādibhiḥ  NarP tacchīkarajalāsāraiḥ sicyamānaṃ priyājanaiḥ tatkāṣṭhairedhite vahnau sutāndīrghāyuṣo labhet  NarP kṣīradruktvāthasaṃpūrṇamabhyarcya kalaśaṃ niśi prātarjjaptvāyutaṃ nārīmabhiṣiñceddiṣaḍdinam  NarP evaṃ kṛte tu vandhyāpi labhetputrāṃścirāyuṣaḥ ṣṭasiddhīśvaro bhavet  NarP tasya darśanamātreṇa vādino niṣprabhāḥ smṛtāḥ vasetsarasvatī vakre gṛhe cāpi sabhāsadaḥ  NarP bhuktvā nānāvidhānbhogānante viṣṇupadaṃ vrajet  NarP iti NarP śaktiśrīmārapūrvaśca śrīśaktismarapūrvakaḥ māraśaktiramāpūrvo daśārṇā manavastrayaḥ  NarP muniḥ syānnā radacchando gāyatrī devatā punaḥ kṛṣṇo govindanāmātra sarvakāmaprado nṛṇām  NarP cakraiḥ dvāviṃśatyakṣaro mantro vāgīśatvapradāyakaḥ ṛṣiḥ syānnāradaśchando gāyatrī devatā punaḥ  NarP vidyāpradaśca gopālaḥ kāmo bījaṃ prakīrtitam śaktistu vāgbhavaṃ vidyāprāptaye viniyojanā  NarP padam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde kṛṣṇādimantrabhedanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikāśītitamo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācakiṃ tvaṃ nārada jānāsi pūrvajanmani yattvayā prāptaṃ smīti tadbhaktau viniyoga udāhṛtaḥ  NarP nāsya siddhādikaṃ vipra śodhanaṃ nyāsakalpanam kevalaṃ cintanaṃ sadyo nityalīlāprakāśakam  NarP ābhyantarasya dharmasya sādhanaṃ vacmi sāṃpratam  NarP saṃgṛhya sarvasiddhayaḥ  NarP yo lakṣaṃ prajapenmantraṃ śavamāruhya mantravit tasya siddho manuḥ sadyaḥ sarvepsitaphalapradaḥ  NarP tenāśvamedhapramukhairyāgauriṣṭaṃ sujanmanā dattaṃ dānaṃ tapastaptaṃ upāste yastu kālikām  NarP brahmā viṣṇuḥ śivo gaurī lakṣmīrgaṇapatī raviḥ pūjitāḥ sakalā devā yaḥ kālīṃ pūjayetsadā  NarP athāparaḥ sarasvatyā hyavatāro nigadyate yāṃ niṣevya narā loke kṛtārthāḥ syurna saṃśayaḥ  NarP āpyāyinī candrayuktā māyā ca vadanāntare sakāmikā krudhā śāntiścandrālaṅkṛtamastakā  NarP dīpikā sāsanā candrayugastraṃ manurīritaḥ munirakṣobhya uddiṣṭaśchandastu bṛhatī matam  NarP tārākhyā devatā bījaṃ dvitīyañca caturthakam śaktiḥ ṣaḍdīrghayuktena dvitīyenāṅgakalpanam  NarP ṣoḍhā nyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryāttārāyāḥ sarvasiddhim śrīkaṇṭhādīnnyasedrudrānmātṛkāvarṇapūrvakān  NarP mātṛkoktasthale māyā tṛtīyakrodhapūrvakān caturthīnamasāyuktānprathamo nyāsa īritaḥ  NarP śavapīṭhasamāsīnāṃ nīlakāntiṃ trilocanām arddhenduśekharāṃ nānābhūṣaṇāḍhyāṃ smarannyaset  NarP dvitīye tu grahanyāsaṃ kuryāttāṃ samanusmaran tribījasvarapūrvaṃ tu raktasūya hṛdi nyaset  NarP tathā pavargapūrvaṃ tu śuklaṃ lomaṃ bhruvodveye kavargapūrvaṃ raktābhaṃ maṅgalaṃ locanatrayam  NarP cavargādyaṃ budhaṃ śyāmaṃ nyasedvakṣaghasthale budhaḥ ḍhavargādyaṃ pītavarṇaṃ kaṭhṇakūpe bṛhaspatim  NarP tavargādyaṃ śvetavarṇaṃ ghaṭikāyāṃ tu bhārgavam nīlavarṇaṃ pavargādyaṃ nābhideśe śanaiścaram  NarP śavargādyaṃ dhūmravarṇaṃ dhyātvā rāhuṃ mukhe nyaset tribījapūrvakaścaivaṃ grahanyāsaḥ samīritaḥ  NarP tṛtīyaṃ lokapālānāṃ nyāsaṃ kuryātprayatnataḥ māyādibījatritayapūrvakaṃ sarvasiddhaye  NarP svamastake lalāṭādi dikṣvaṣṭasvadhaurddhvataḥ hrasvadīrghakādikāṣṭavargapūrvāndiśādhipān  NarP śivaśaktyabhidhe nyāsaṃ caturthe tu samācaret tribījapūrvakānnyasyetṣaṭśivāñchaktisaṃyutān  NarP ādhārādiṣu cakreṣu svacakravarṇapūrvakān brahmāṇaṃ ḍākinīyuktaṃ vādisāṃtārṇapūrvakam  NarP mūlādhāre vinyasecca caturddalasamanvitam śrīviṣṇuṃ rākiṇīyuktabādilāntārṇapūrvakam  NarP svādhiṣṭhanābhidhe cakre liṅgasthe ṣaḍdale nyaset rudraṃ tu ḍākinīyuktaṃ ḍādiphaāntārṇapūrvakam  NarP cakre daśadale nyasyennābhisthe maṇipūrake īśvaraṃ kādiṭhāntārṇapūrvakaṃ śākinīyutam  NarP vinyaseddvādaśadalehṛdayasthe tvanāhate sadāśivaṃ śākinīṃ ca ṣoḍaśasvarapūrvakam  NarP kaṇṭhasthe ṣoḍaśadale viśuddhākhye pravinyaset ājñācakre paraśivaṃ hākinīsaṃyutaṃ nyaset  NarP lakṣārṇapūvaṃ bhrūmadhyasaṃsthite timanohare tārādipañcamaṃ nyāsaṃ kuryātsarveṣṭasiddhaye  NarP aṣṭau vargānsvaradvandvapūrvakān bījasaṃyutān tārādyā nyāsapūrvāśca prayojyā aṣṭaśaktayaḥ  NarP tārāthogrā mahogrāpi vajrā kālī sarasvatī kāmeśvarī ca cāmuṇḍā ityaṣṭau tārikāḥ smṛtāḥ  NarP brahmarandhre lalāṭe ca bhrūmadhye kaṇṭhadeśataḥ hṛdi nābhau phale mūlādhāre cetāḥ kramānnyaset  NarP aṅganyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryātpīṭhākhyaṃ sarvasiddhidam ādhāre kāmarūpākhyaṃ bījaṃ hrasvārṇapūrvakam  NarP hṛdi jālandharaṃ bījaṃ dīrghapūrvaṃ pravinyaset lalāṭe pūrṇagiryākhyaṃ kavargādyaṃ nyasetsudhīḥ  NarP uḍḍīyānaṃ cavargādyaṃ keśasandhau pravinyaset kaṇṭhe tu mathurāpīṭhaṃ daśama yādikaṃ nyaset  NarP ṣoḍhā nyāsastu tārāyāḥ prokto bhīṣṭapradāyakaḥ hṛdi śrīmadekajaṭāṃ tāriṇīṃ śirasi nyaset  NarP vajrodake śikhāṃ pātu ugratārāṃ tu varmaṇi mahogrā vatsare netre piṅgāgraikajaṭāstrake  NarP ṣaḍradīrgayuktamāyāyā etānyaṣṭau ṣaḍaṅgake aṅguṣṭhādiṣvaṅgulīṣu pūrvaṃ vinyasya yatnataḥ  NarP tarjanīmadhyamābhyāṃ tu kṛtvā tālatrayaṃ tataḥ choṭikāmudrāyā kuryāddigbandhaṃ devatāṃ smaran  NarP vidyayā tārapuṭayā vyāpakaṃ saptadhā caret ugratārāṃ tato dhyāyetsadyo vāde tisiddhidām  NarP layābdhāvaṃbujanmasthāṃ nīlābhāṃ divyabhūṣaṇām kambuṃ khaḍgaṃ kapālaṃ ca nīlābjaṃ dadhatīṃ karaiḥ  NarP nāgaśreṣṭhālaṅkṛtāṅgīṃ raktanetratrayāṃ smaret japellakṣacatuṣkaṃ hi daśāṃśaṃ raktapadmakaiḥ  NarP hunetkṣīrājyasaṃmiśraiḥ śaṅkhaṃ saṃsthāpya saṃjapet nārīṃ paśyanspṛśangacchanmahāniśi baliṃ caret  NarP śmaśāne śūnyasadane devāgāre tha nirjane parvate vanamadhye vā śavamāruhya mantravit  NarP samare śatrunihataṃ yadvā ṣāṇyāsikaṃ śiśum vidyāṃ sādhayataḥ śīghraṃ sādhitaivaṃ prasiddhyati  NarP medhā prajñā prabhā vidyā dhīvṛttismṛtibuddhayaḥ viśveśvarīti saṃproktāḥ pīṭhasya nava śaktayaḥ  NarP bhṛgumanvindusaṃyuktaṃ meghavartma sarasvatī yogapīṭhātmane hārddaṃ pīṭhasya manurīritaḥ  NarP dattvānenāsanaṃ mūrtiṃ mūlamantreṇa kalpayet pūjayedvidhivaddevīṃ tadvidhānamathocyate  NarP tāro māyā bhagaṃ brahmā jaṭe sūryaḥ sadīrghakam yakṣādhipataye tandrīsopanītaṃ baliṃ tataḥ  NarP gṛhayugmaṃ śivā svāhā balimantro yamīritaḥ dadyānnityaṃ baliṃ tena madhyarātre catuṣpathe  NarP jaladānādikaṃ mantrairvidadhyāddaśabhistataḥ dhruvo vajrodake varma phaṭsaptārṇo jalagrahe  NarP tārādyā vahnijāyāntā māyā hi kṣālane matā tāro māyāḥ bhṛguḥ karṇoviśuddhaṃ dharmavarmataḥ  NarP sarvapāpāni śāmyante cheto netrayutaṃ jalam kalpāntanayanasvāhā mantra ācamane mataḥ  NarP dhruvo maṇidharītyante vajriṇyakṣiyutā mṛtiḥ kharividyāyugrijaśva sarvavānte bako bjavān  NarP kāriṇyante dīrghavarma astraṃ vahnipriyāntimaḥ trayoviṃśativarṇātmā śikhāyā bandhane manuḥ  NarP praṇavo rakṣayugalaṃ dīrghavarmāstraṭhadvayam navārṇenāmunā mantrī kuryādbhūmiviśodhanam  NarP nārānte sarvavighnānutsārayeti padaṃ tataḥ huṃ phaṭ svāhā guṇendvarṇo manurvighnanivāraṇam  NarP māyābījaṃ japāpuṣpanibhaṃ nābhau viciṃyet tadutthenāgninā dehaṃ dahetsāddhasvapāpmanā  NarP tārābījaṃ suvarṇābhaṃ cintayeddhṛdi mantravit pavanena tadutthena pāpabhasma kṣipedbhuvi  NarP turīyaṃ candrakundābhaṃ bījaṃ dhyātvālalāṭataḥ tadutthasudhayāde haṃ svayaṃ vai devatānibham  NarP anayā bhūtaśuddhyā tu devīsādṛśyamāpnuyāt tāro nanto bhaguḥ karṇo padmanābhayuto balī  NarP khe vajrarekhe krodhākhyaṃ bījaṃ pāvakallabhā amunā dvādaśārṇena racayenmaṇḍalaṃ śubham  NarP tāro yathāgatā nidrā sadṛkṣekabhṛgurviṣam sadīrghasmṛtirau sākṣau mahākālo bhagānvitaḥ  NarP krodho straṃ manuvarṇo yaṃ manuḥ puṣpādiśodhane tāraḥ pāśaḥ parā svāhā pañcārṇaścittaśodhane  NarP manavo daśa saṃproktā ardhyasthāpanamucyate seṃdubhyāṃ māsato māyā bhuvaṃ saṃsṛjya bhūgṛham  NarP vṛtaṃ trikoṇasaṃyuktaṃ kuryānmaṇḍalamantrataḥ yajettatrādhāraśaktiṃ vahnimaṇḍalamadhyagām vahnimaṇḍalamabhyarcya mahāśaṅkhaṃ nidhāpayet  NarP vāmakarṇenduyuktena phaḍantena vihāyasā prakṣālitaṃ bhṛgurdaṇḍī trimūrtīntuyutaṃ paṭhet  NarP tatorcayenmahāśaṅkhaṃ japanmantracatuṣṭayam dīrghatrayānvitā māyā kālī sṛṣṭiḥ sadīrghasaḥ  NarP pratimāsaṃyutaṃ māsaṃ yavanaṃ hṛdayaṃ tataḥ ekādhaśārṇaḥ prathamo mahāśaṅkhārcane manuḥ  NarP haṃso haribhujaṅgeśayukto dīrghantrayenduyuk tāriṇyante kapālāya namonto dvādaśākṣaraḥ  NarP svaṃ dīrghatrayamanvāḍhyameṣo vāmadaganvitaḥ lokapālāya hṛdayaṃ tṛtīyo yaṃ śivākṣaraḥ  NarP māyāstrībījamarddhaiduyutaṃ svaṃ svargakhādimaḥ pālāya sarvādhārāya sarvaḥ sarvodbhavastathā  NarP sarvaśuddhimayaśceti ṅeṃtāḥ sarvāsurāntikam rudhirā ratidīrghā ca vāyuḥ śubhrānilaḥ surā  NarP bhājanāya bhagī satyā vikapālāya hṛnmanuḥ turyo raseṣu varṇo yaṃ mahāśaṅkhaprapūjane  NarP navārkamaṇḍalaṃ ceṣṭvā salilaṃ mūlamantrataḥ prapūrayetsudhābuddhyā gandhapuṣpākṣatādibhiḥ  NarP mudrāṃ trikhaṇḍāṃ saṃdarśya pūjayeccandramaṇḍalam vāksatyapadmāgagane rephaānugrahabinduyuk  NarP mūlamantro vipaddhvaṃsamanusargasamanvitam aṣṭakṛtvo munā mantrī mantrayetprayato jalam  NarP māyayā madiśaṃ kṣiptvā khaṃ yoniṃ ca pradarśayet tatra vṛttāṣṭaṣaṭkoṇaṃ dhyātvā devīṃ vicintayet  NarP pūrvoktāṃ pūjayettvenāṃ mūlenātha pratarpayet tarjanūmadhyamānāmākaniṣṭhābhirmaheśvarīm  NarP sāṃguṣṭhāniścuturvāraṃ mahāśaṅkhasthite jale khaṃrephamanubindvāḍhyāṃ bhṛgumanvinduyuktayā  NarP dhruvādyena namontena tarpyādānandabhairavam tatastenārdhatoyena prokṣetpūjanasādhanam  NarP yomimudrāṃ pradarśyāpi praṇamedbhavatāriṇīm vidhānamarghe saṃproktaṃ sarvasiddhipradāyakam  NarP pūrvokte pūjayetpīṭhe padme ṣaṭkoṇakarṇike dharāgṛhāvṛte ramye devīṃ ramyopacārakaiḥ  NarP mahīgṛhe caturdikṣu gaṇeśādīnprapūjayet pāśāṅkuśau kapālaṃ ca triśūlaṃ dadhataṃ karaiḥ  NarP alaṅkāracayopetaṃ gaṇeśaṃ prāktamarcayet kapālaśūle hastābhyāṃ dadhataṃ sarpabhūṣaṇam  NarP svayūthaveṣṭitaṃ ramyaṃ baṭukaṃ dakṣiṇercayet asiśūlakapālāni ḍamaruṃ dadhataṃ karaiḥ  NarP kṛṣṇaṃ digaṃbaraṃ krūraṃ kṣetrapālaṃ ca paścime kapālaṃ ḍamaruṃ pāśaṃ liṅgaṃ śaṃbibhratīṃ karaiḥ  NarP adhyākanyā raktavastrā yoginīruttare yajet akṣobhyaṃ prayajenmūrdhni devyā mantraṛṣiṃ śubham  NarP akṣobhyaṃ vastrapuṣpaṃ ca pratīcchānavallabhā akṣobhyapūjane mantraḥ ṣaṭkogakam  NarP vairācanaṃ cāmitābhaṃ padmanābhibhidhaṃ tathā śaṅkhaṃ pāṇḍurasaṃjñaṃ ca digdaleṣu prapūjayet  NarP lābhakāṃ mānakāṃ caiva pāṇḍurāṃ tārakāṃ tathā vidiggatābjapatreṣu pūjayediṣṭasiddhaye  NarP bindunāmādivarṇādyāḥ saṃbuddhyantāstathābhidhāḥ vrajapuṣpaṃ pratīcchāgnipriyāntāḥ praṇavādikāḥ  NarP vairācanādi pūjāyāṃ manavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ bhūdharaśca caturdvārṣu padmāntakayamāntakau  NarP vidyāntakābhidhaḥ paścānnarāntaka imānyajet śakrādīṃścaiva vajrādīnprajapettadanantaram  NarP evaṃ saṃpūjayandevīṃ pāṇḍityaṃ dhanamadbhutam putrānpautrāñchubhāṃ kīrtiṃ labhate janavaśyatām  NarP tāro māyā śrīmadakajaṭe nīlasarasvatī mahopratāre devāsaḥ sanetro gadiyugmakam  NarP sarvadevapiśākarmo dīrghogrirmarusānmasa abhragumama jāḍyaṃ ca chedayadvitayaṃ ramā  NarP māyāstrāgnipriyānto yaṃ dvipañcāśallipirmanuḥ anena nityaṃ pūjatinvahaṃ devyai baliṃ haret  NarP evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī prayogānvidadhāti ca jātamātrasya bālasya divasatritayādadhaḥ  NarP jihvāyāṃ vilikhenmantraṃ madhvājyābhyāṃ śalākayā suvarṇa kṛtayā yadvā mantrī dhavaladūrvayā  NarP gate ṣṭame bde bālo pi jāyate kaviradbutam tathāparairajeyo pi bhūpasaṃghairddhanārcitaḥ  NarP uparāge datānīva naradārusarojale nirmāya kīlakaṃ tena tailamadhvamṛtairlikhet  NarP sarojinīdale mantraṃ veṣṭayenmātṛkākṣaraiḥ nikhāya tadalaṃ kuṇḍe caturasre samekhale  NarP saṃsthāpya pāvakaṃ tatra juhuyānmanunāmunā sahasraṃ raktapadmānāṃ dhenudugdhajalāplutam  NarP homānte vivadhai ratnaiḥ palairapi baliṃ haret baliṃ mantreṇa vidhivadbalimantraḥ prakāśyate  NarP tāraḥ padme yuga tandrī viyaddīrghaṃ ca lohitaḥ atrirviṣabhagārūḍho vadatpadmāvatīpadam  NarP jhiṇṭīśāḍhyonilasvāhā ṣoḍaśārṇo balermanuḥ tato niśīthe ca baliṃ pūrvoktamanunā haret  NarP evaṃ kṛte paṇḍitānāṃ sa jayī kavirāḍ bhavet nivāso bhāratīlakṣmyorjanatārañjanakṣamaḥ  NarP śatābhijaptyā yo mantrī rocanāṃ mastāke dharet yaṃ yaṃ paśyati tasyāsau dāsavajjāyate kṣaṇāt  NarP śmaśānāṅgāramāśritya pūrvāyāṃ kujavāsare tena matreṇa saṃveṣṭya nibaddhaṃ raktatantubhiḥ  NarP śatābhijaptaṃ mūlena nikṣipedvairiveśmani uccāṭayati saptāhātsakuṇṭubānvirodhinaḥ  NarP kṣīrāḍhyayā niśāmantraṃ likhitvā pauruṣe sthani ravivāre niśīthinyāṃ sahasramabhimantrayet  NarP tatkṣiptaṃ śatrusadane maṇḍalādbhraṃśakaṃ bhavet kṣetre kṣiptaṃ sasyahānyojavahṛtturamālayet  NarP ṣaṭkoṇāntarlikhenmūlaṃ sādhyārṇaṃ keśare svaraiḥ bāhye ṣṭavargayukpatraṃ padmabhūmiparāvṛtam  NarP yantraṃ bhūrje jahurasairlikhetpūtāmbarāvṛtam paṭṭasūtreṇa sannaddhaṃ śiśukaṇṭhagataṃ dhruvam  NarP bhūtabhītiharaṃ vāmavāhau strīṇāṃ ca putradam nṛṇāṃ dakṣiṇabāhusthaṃ nirdhanānāṃ dhanapradam  NarP jñānadaṃ jñānamicchūnāṃ rājñāṃ tu vijayapradam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde yakṣiṇīmantrabhedanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācasarasvatyavatārāste kathitāḥ siddhidā nṛṇām atha lakṣmyavatārāṃste vakṣye sarvārthasiddhidān  NarP vāṇīmanmathaśaktyākhyaṃ bījatritayamīritam ṛṣiḥ syāddakṣiṇāmūrtiḥ paṅktiśchandaḥ prakīrtitam  NarP devatā tripurā bālā madhyānte śaktibījake nābherāpādamādyaṃ tu nābhyantaṃ hṛdayātparam  NarP mṛrdhno hradantaṃ tartīyaṃ kramāddeheṣu vinyaset ādyaṃ vāmakare dakṣakare tadubhayoḥ param  NarP punarbījatrayaṃ nyasya mūrdhni guhye ca vakṣasi nava yonpābhidhaṃ nyāse navakṛtvo manuṃ nyaset  NarP karṇayościbuke nyasyecchaṅkhayormukhapaṅkaje netrayornāsikāyāṃ ca skandhayorudare tathā  NarP nyasetkūrparayornābhau jānunorliṅgamastake pādayorapi guhye ca pārśvayorhṛdaye punaḥ  NarP stanayoḥ kaṇṭhadeśe ca vāmāṅgādiṣu vinyaset vāgbhavādyāṃ ratiṃ guhye prītimatyādikāṃ hṛdi  NarP kāmabījādikānpaśyedbhūmadhye tu manobhavām punarvāgakātmamādyāstisraeva ca vinyaset  NarP amṛteśīṃ ca yogeśīṃ viśvayoniṃ tṛtīyakām mūrdhniṃ vaktre hṛdi nyasyedguhye caraṇayorapi  NarP kāmeśī pañcabījāḍhyāṃ smarātpañcanyasetkramāt māyākāmau ca vāglakṣmī kāmeśī pañcabījakam  NarP manobhavaśca makaradhvajakandarpamanmathāḥ kāmadevaḥ smaraḥ pañca kīrtitānyāsasiddhidāḥ  NarP śiraḥpanmukhāguhyeṣu hṛdaye bāṇadevatāḥ drāviṇyādyāḥ kramānnyasyedvāṇeśībījapūrvakaḥ  NarP drāndrīṃ klīñjūṃsa iti vaibāṇeśabījakaṃ ca kam drāviṇī kṣobhiṇī vaśīkaraṇyāṅkarṣaṇī tathā  NarP saṃmohanī ca bāṇānāṃ devatāḥ pañca kīrtitāḥ tārtīyavāgmadhyagena kāmena syātṣaḍaṅgakam  NarP ṣaḍdīrghasvarayuktena tato devīṃ vicintayet dhyāyedraktasarojasthāṃ raktavastrāṃ trilocanam  NarP udyadarkanibhāṃ vidyāṃ mālābhayavarodvahām lakṣatrayaṃ japenmantraṃ daśāṃśaṃ kiṃśukodbhavaiḥ  NarP puṣpairhayārijairvāpi juhuyānmadhurānvitaiḥ navayonyātmakaṃ yantraṃ bahiraṣṭadalāvṛtam  NarP kesareṣu svarānnyasyedvargānaṣṭaudaleṣvapi dalāgreṣu triśūlāni padma tu mātṛkāvṛtam  NarP evaṃ vilikhite yantre pīṭhaśaktīḥ prapūjayet icchā jñānā kriyā caiva kāminī kāmadāyinī  NarP ratī ratipriyā nandā manonmanyapi coditāḥ pīṭhaśaktīrimā iṣṭvā pīṭhaṃ tanmanunā diśet  NarP vyomapūrve tu tārtīyaṃ sadāśivamahāpadam pretapadmāsanaṃ ṅeṃtaṃ namontaḥ pīṭhamantrakaḥ praṣṭumicchasi  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde durgāmantracatuṣṭayavarṇanaṃ nāma saptāśītitamo dhyāyaḥsūta uvācaśrutvetthaṃ yajanaṃ viprā mantradhyānapuraḥsaram pajjaganmātṛmantrāṇāṃ vaibhavaṃ śrutavānmune  NarP yathā lakṣmīmukhānāṃ tu avatārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ tathā rādhāvatārāṇāṃ śrotumicchāmi vaibhavam  NarP yatsaṃkhyākāśca yadrūpā yatprabhāvā vidāṃvara rādhāvatārāstānsatyaṃ kīrtayāśeṣasiddhidān  NarP etacchutvā vacastasya nāradasya vidheḥ sutaḥ sanatkumāraḥ provāca dhyātvā rādhāpadāṃbujam  NarP sanatkumāra uvācaśṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi rahasyātirahasyakam rādhāvatāracaritaṃ bhajatāmiṣṭisiddhidam  NarP candrāvalī ca lalitā dve sakhyau supriye sadā mālāvatīmukhāṣṭānāṃ candrāvalyadhipāsmṛtā  NarP kalāvatīmukhāṣṭānāmīśvarī lalitā matā rādhācaraṇapūjāyāmuktā mālāvatīmukhāḥ  NarP lalitādhīśvarīṇāṃ tu nāmāni śṛṇu sāṃpratam kalāvatī madhumatī viśākhā śyāmalābhidhā  NarP śaibyā vṛndā śrīdharākhyā sarvāstuttulyavigrahāḥ suśīlāpramukhā ścānyāḥ sakhyo dvātriṃśadīritāḥ  NarP tāḥ śṛṇuṣva mahābhāga nāmataḥ pravadāmi te suśīlāṃ śaśilekhā ca yamunā mādhavī ratiḥ  NarP kadambamālā kuntī ca jāhnavī ca svayaṃprabhā candrānanā padmamukhī sāvitrī ca sudhāmukhī  NarP śubhā padmā pārijātā gauriṇī sarvamaṅgalā kālikā kamalā durgā virajā bhāratī surā  NarP gaṅgā madhumatī caiva sundarī candanā satī aparṇā manasānandā dvātriṃśadrādhikāpriyāḥ  NarP kadācidchalilā devī puṃrūpā kṛṣṇavigrahā sasarja ṣoḍaśakalāstāḥ sarvāstatsamaprabhāḥ  NarP tāsā mantraṃ tathā dhyānaṃ yantrārcādikramaṃ tathā varṇaye sarvatantreṣu rahasyaṃ munisattama  NarP vāto maruccāgrivahnī dharākṣme jalacāriṇī vimukhaṃ caraśucivibhū vanasvaśaktayaḥ svarāḥ  NarP prāṇastejaḥ sthirā vāyurvāyuścāpi prabhā tathā jyakumabhraṃ tathā nādo dāvakaḥ pātha ityatha  NarP vyomarayaḥ śikhī gotrā toyaṃ śūnyajavīdyutiḥ bhūmī raso namo vyāptaṃ dāhaścāpi rasāṃbu ca  NarP viyatsparśaśca hṛddhaṃsahalāgrāso halātmikāḥ candrāvalī ca lalitā haṃselā nāyake mate  NarP grāsasthitā svayaṃ rādhā svayaṃ śaktisvarūpiṇī śeṣāstu ṣoḍaśakalā dvātriṃśattatkalāḥ smṛtāḥ  NarP vāṅmayaṃ nikhilaṃ vyāptamābhireva munīśvara lalitāpramukhāṇāṃ tu ṣoḍaśītvamupāgatā  NarP śrīrādhā sundarī devī tāntrikaiḥ parikīrtyate kurukullā ca vārāhī candrālilalite ubhe  NarP saṃbhūte mantravargaṃ te bhidhāsye haṃ yathātatham hṛtprāṇelāhaṃsadāvahnisvairlaliteritā  NarP trividhā haṃsabhedeva śṛṇu tāṃ ca yathākramam haṃsādyayādyā madhyā syādādimadhyasthahaṃsayā  NarP tṛtīyā prakṛtiḥ saiva turyā tairantyamāyayā āsu turyābhavanmuktyai tisro nyāḥ syuścasaṃpade  NarP iti tripurasuṃdaryā vidyā sarumatasamīritā dāhabhūmīrasākṣmāsvairvaśinībījamīritam  NarP prāṇo rasāśaktiyutaḥ kāmeśvaryakṣaraṃ mahat śūnyamaṃburasāvahnisvayogānmohanīmanuḥ  NarP vyāptaṃ rasākṣmāsvayutaṃ vimalābījamīritam jyānabhodāhavahnisvayogaiḥ syādaruṇāmanuḥ  NarP jayinyāstu samuddiṣṭaḥ sarvatra jayadāyakaḥ kaṃ nabhodāhasahitaṃ vyāptakṣmāsvayutaṃ manuḥ  NarP sarveśvaryāḥ samākhyātaḥ sarvasiddhikaraḥ paraḥ grāso nabhodāhavahnisvairyuktaḥ kaulinīmanuḥ  NarP etairmanubhiraṣṭābhiḥ śaktibhirvargasaṃyuktaiḥ vāgdevatāntairnyāsaḥ syādyena devyātmako bhavet  NarP randhre bhāle tathājñāyāṃ gale hṛdi tathā nyaset nābhāvādhārake pādadvaye mūlāgrakāvadhi  NarP ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena kuryāścaiva ṣaḍaṅgakam lohitāṃ lalitāṃ bāṇacāpapāśasṛṇīḥ karaiḥ  NarP dadhānāṃ kāmarājāṅke yantrītāṃ mudutāṃ smaret madhyasthadevī tvekaiva ṣoḍaśākārataḥ sthātā  NarP yatastasmāttanau tasyāstvanyāḥ pañcadaśārcayet ṛṣiḥ śivaśchanda uktā devatā lalitādikāḥ  NarP sarvāsāmapi nityānāmāvṛtīrnāmasaṃcaye paṭale tu prayogāṃśca vakṣyāmyagre savistaram  NarP atha ṣoḍaśanityāsu dvitīyā yā samīritā kāmeśvarīti tāṃ sarvakāmadāṃ śṛṇu nārada  NarP śuciḥ svena yutastvādyo lalitā syāddvitīyakaḥ śūnyamagniyutaṃ paścādrayovyāptena saṃyutam  NarP prāṇo rasāgnisahitaḥ śūnyayugmaṃ carānvitam nabhogotrā punaścaiṣāṃ dāhena samayojitā  NarP aṃbu syāccarasaṃyuktaṃ navaśaktiyutaṃ ca hṛt eṣā kāmeśvarī nityā kāmadaikādaśākṣarī  NarP mūlavidyākṣaraireva kuryādaṅgāni ṣaṭ kramāt ekena hṛdayaṃ śīrṣaṃ tāvatātho dvayaṃ dvayāt  NarP caturbhirnayanaṃ tadvadastramekena kīrtitam dṛkśrotranāsādvitaye jihvāhṛnnābhiguhyake  NarP vyāpakatvena sarvāṅge mūrddhādiprapadāvadhi nyasedvidyākṣarāṇyeṣu sthāneṣu tadanantaram  NarP samastena vyāpakaṃ tu kuryāduktakrameṇa tu atha dhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi nityapūjāsu coditam  NarP yena devī suprasannā dadātīṣṭamayatnataḥ bālārkakoṭisaṃkāśāṃ māṇikyamukuṭojjvalām  NarP hāragraiveyakāñcībhirūrmikānūpurādibhiḥ maṇḍitāṃ raktavasanāṃ ratnābharaṇaśobhitām  NarP ṣaḍbhujāṃ trīkṣaṇāmindukalākalitamaulikām pañcāṣṭaṣoḍaśadvandvaṣaṭkoṇacaturasragām  NarP mandasmitalasadvaktrāṃ dayāmantharavīkṣaṇām pāśāṅkuśau ca puṇḍrekṣucāpaṃ puṣpaśilīmukham  NarP ratnapātraṃ sīdhupūrṇaṃ varadaṃ bibhratīṃ karaiḥ tataḥ prayogānkurvīta siddhe matre tu sādhakaḥ  NarP tṛtīyāmatha vakṣyāmi nāmnā tu bhagamālinī kāmeśvaryādirādiḥ syādrasaścāpasthirārasaḥ  NarP dharāyuksacarā paścātsthirā paścādrasaḥ smṛtaḥ sthirāśūnye gnisaṃyukte rasaḥ syāttadanantaram  NarP sthirā bhūsahitā gotrā sadāho gnirasaḥ sthirā nabhaśca marutā yuktaṃ rasavarṇasamanvitam  NarP tato rasaḥ sthirā paścānmarutā saha yojitā aṃbahaṃsacaro thikto raso tha syātsthirā punaḥ  NarP sthirādharānvitā haṃso vyāptena ca careṇa ca rasaḥ sthirā tato vyāptaṃ bhūyutaṃ śūnyamagniyuk  NarP rasaḥ sthirā tataḥ sāgniśūnyaṃ taviyuto marut rayaḥ śūnyaṃ cāgniyutaṃ hṛdāhaṃsācca tatparam  NarP rasaḥ sthirāṃbu ca viyatsvayutaṃ prāṇa eva ca dāho griyugrasastasmāsthirākṣmā dāhasaṃyutā sacaraḥ syājjavīpūrvavidyā tartīyataḥ kramāt  NarP catuṣṭayamathārṇānāṃ rasastadanu ca sthirā hṛdaṃbuyuk kṣmayā dāhaḥ sacaraḥ syājjavī ca hṛt  NarP dāho ṃbumarutā yukto vyomni sāgnirasastutaḥ sthirā tu marutā yuktā śūnyaṃ sāgninabhaścarau  NarP haṃso vyāptamarudyuktaḥ śūnyaṃ vyāptamatoṃbu ca dāho gotrācarayutā tathā dāhastathā rayaḥ  NarP hṛddharāsahitaṃ dāharayau carasamanvitau rasaḥ sthirā tataḥ prāṇo rasāgnisahito bhavet  NarP śūnyayugmaṃ carayutaṃ tataḥ pūrvamataḥ param śūnyayugmaṃ ca gotrā syādvāhayuktāṃbunā caraḥ  NarP prāṇo rasā carayuto gotravyasimataḥ param gotrādāhamarudyuktā tvaṃbunyāsamato bhavet  NarP yuktonāṃbhaśca bhūyuktaṃ vāścareṇa samanvitam grāso dharāyutaḥ paścādrasaḥ śaktyā samanvitaḥ  NarP grāso bhūsahito vipra raso vyāptaṃ tataśca hṛt dāhonāṃbu ca hṛtpaścādrayeṃbumarudanvitaḥ  NarP śūnyaṃ ca kevalaṃ caiva rasaśca sacarasthirā viyadaṃbuyutaṃ dāhastvagniyuksayutaḥ śuciḥ  NarP bhūmī rasākṣmāsvayutā pañcaikāntaritāḥ sthirāḥ tadantarita bījāni svasaṃyuktāni pañca vai  NarP tāni kramājjyāsacaro raso bhūśca nabhoyutā haṃsaścarayuto dviḥ syāttataḥ prāṇo rasāgniyuk  NarP śūnyayugmaṃ carayutaṃ hṛddāho mbumarudyutaḥ vyomāgnisahitaṃ paścādrasaśca marutā sthirā  NarP śūnyaṃ sāgninabhaścaiva careṇa sahitaṃ tathā aṃbu paścādviyattasmānnabhaśca marudanvitam  NarP śūnyaṃ vyāptaṃ ca dadyuktaṃ rayadāhasvavahnibhiḥ haṃsaḥ sadāho mbagurasā carasvaiḥ saṃyuto bhavet  NarP haṃsaḥ sadāhavahnisvairyuktamantyamudīritam saptatriṃśacchatārṇaiḥ syānnityā saubhāgamālinī  NarP aṅgāni mantravarṇaiḥ syurādyena hṛdudīritam tataścatṛrbhiḥ śīrṣaṃ syācchikhā tribhirudīritā  NarP guṇavedākṣaraiḥ śeṣāṇyaṅgāni ṣaḍiti kramāt aruṇāmaruṇākalpāṃ suṃdarīṃ susmitānanām  NarP trinetrāṃ bāhubhiḥ ṣaḍbhirupetāṃ kamalāsanām kahlārapāśapuṇḍrekṣukodaṇḍānvāmabāhubhiḥ  NarP dadhānāṃ dakṣiṇaiḥ caturthavarṇādisaptabhistvakṣaraistathā  NarP kuryādaṅgāni yugmārṇaiḥ ṣaṭkrameṇa karāṅgayoḥ śirolalāṭakaṇṭheṣu hṛnnābhyādhārake tathā  NarP ūruyugme tathā jānudvaye jaṅghādvaye tathā pādayugme tathā kalpitābharaṇojjvalaiḥ  NarP tāṭaṅkamaṅgadaṃ tadvadrasanā nūpuraṃ ca taiḥ viprakṣatriyaviṭśūdrajātibhirbhīmavigrahaiḥ  NarP pallavāṃśukasaṃvītāṃ śikhipicchakṛtaiḥ śubhaiḥ valayairbhūṣitabhujāṃ vidhnaduḥsvapraśamanī sarvābhīṣṭapradāyinī śuciḥ svena yutastvādyo rasāvahnisamanvitaḥ  NarP prāṇo dvitīyaḥ svayuto vanaducchaktibhiḥ paraḥ itīritā tryakṣarākhyā nityeyaṃ kulasuṃdarī  NarP yasyāḥ kuryātkarāṅgavaktrāṇāṃ nyāsaṃ proktaṃ yathāvidhi ūrddhvaprāgdakṣiṇodakca paścimādhasnāgnabhiḥ  NarP suvinadyantarasthaistannadātmasu yathākramam ādhārarandhrahṛtsvekaṃ dvitīyaṃ locanatraye  NarP bhujairdvādaśabhiryuktāṃ sarveṣāṃ sarvavāḍhmayīm pravālākṣasrajaṃ padmaṃ kuṇḍikāṃ ratnanirmitām  NarP ratnapūrṇaṃ tu caṣakaṃ luṅgīṃ vyākhyānamudrikām dadhānāṃ dakṣiṇairvāmaiḥ pustakaṃ cāruṇotpalam  NarP haimīṃ ca lekhanīṃ ratnamālāṃ kaṃbuvaraṃ bhujaiḥ abhitaḥ stūyamānāṃ ca devagandharvakinnaraiḥ  NarP yakṣarākṣasadaityarṣisiddhavidyādharādibhiḥ dhyātvaivamarcannityāṃ vāglakṣmīkāntisiddhaye  NarP svatantrāya dayākḷptavigrahāya śivātmane  NarP paratantrāya bhaktānāṃ bhavyānāṃ bhavyarūpiṇe vivekināṃ vivekāya vimarśāya vimarśinām  NarP prakāśānāṃ prakāśāya jñānināṃ jñānarūpiṇe purastātpārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhe namaḥ kuryāmuparyadhaḥ  NarP sadā mañcittasadane vidhehi bhavadāsanam iti stutvā guruṃ bhaktyā parāṃ devīṃ vicintayet  NarP gaṇeśagrahanakṣatrayoginīrāśirūpiṇīm devīṃ mantramayīṃ naumi mātṛkāpīṭharūpiṇīm  NarP praṇamāmi mahādevīṃ mātṛkāṃ parameśvarīm kālahṛlloholollohakalānāśanakāriṇīm  NarP yadakṣarai kamātre pi saṃsiddhe sparddhate naraḥ ravitārkṣyendukandarpaiḥ śaṅkarānalaviṣṇubhiḥ  NarP yadakṣaraśaśijyotsnāmaṇḍitaṃ bhuvanatrayam vande sarveśvarīṃ devīṃ mahāśrīsiddhamātṛkām  NarP yadakṣaramahāsūtraprotametajjagattrayam brahmāṇḍādikaṭāhāntaṃ tāṃ vande siddhamātṛkām  NarP yadekādaśamādhāraṃ bījaṃ koṇatrayodbhavam brahmāṇḍādikaṭāhāntaṃ jagadadyāpi dṛśyate  NarP akacādiṭatonnaddhapayaśākṣaravargiṇīm jyeṣṭhāṅgabāhuhṛtkaṇṭhakaṭipādanivāsinīm  NarP naumīkārākṣaroddhārāṃ sārātsārāṃ parātparām praṇamāmi mahādevīṃ paramānandarūpiṇīm  NarP athāpi yasyā jānanti na manāgapi devatāḥ keyaṃ kasmātkva keneti sarūpārūpabhāvanām  NarP vande tāmahamakṣayyāṃ kṣakārākṣararūpiṇīm devīṃ kulakalollolaprollasantīṃ śivāṃ parām  NarP vargānukramayogena yasyākhyomāṣṭakaṃ sthitam vande tāmaṣṭavargotthamahāsiddhyādikeśvarīm  NarP kāmapūrṇajakārākhya supīṭhāntarnnivāsinīm caturājñākośabhūtāṃ naumi śrītripurāmaham  NarP etatstotraṃ tu nityānāṃ yaḥ paṭhetsusamāhitaḥ pūjādau tasya sarvātā varadāḥ syurna saṃśayaḥ  NarP atha te kavacaṃ devyā vakṣye navaratātmakam yena devāsuranarajayī syātsādhakaḥ sadā  NarP sarvataḥ sarvadātmānaṃ lalitā pātu sarvagā kāmeśī purataḥ pātu bhagamālī tvanantaram  NarP diśaṃ pātu tathā dakṣapārśvaṃ me pātu sarvadā nityaklinnāthaṃ bheruṇḍādiśaṃ me pātu kauṇapīm  NarP tathaiva paścimaṃ bhāgaṃ rakṣatādvahnivāsinī mahāvajreśvarī nityā vāyavye māṃ sadāvatu  NarP vāmapārśvaṃ sadā pātu itīmelaritā tataḥ māheśvarī diśaṃ pātu tvaritaṃ siddhidāyinī  NarP pātu māmūrdhvataḥ śaścaddaivatākulasuṃdarī adho nīlapatākākhyā vijayā sarvataśca mām  NarP karotu me maṅgalāni sarvadā sarvamaṅgalā dehṝndriyamanaḥ prāṇāñjvālāmālinivigrahā  NarP pālayatvaniśaṃ cittā cittaṃ me sarvadāvatu kāmātkrodhāttathā lobhānmohānmānānmadādapi  NarP pāpānmāṃ sarvataḥ śokātsaṃkṣayātsarvataḥ sadā asatyātkrūracintātohiṃsātaścauratastathā staimityācca sadā pāntu prerayantyaḥ śubhaṃ prati  NarP nityāḥ ṣoḍaśa māṃ pāntu gajārūḍhāḥ svaśaktibhiḥ tathā hayasamārūḍhāḥ pāntu māṃ sarvataḥ sadā  NarP siṃhārūḍhāstathā pāntu pāntu ṛkṣagatā api rathārūḍhāśca māṃ pāntu sarvataḥ sarvadā raṇe  NarP tārkṣyārūḍhāśca māṃ pāntu tathā vyomagatāśca tāḥ bhūtagāḥ sarvagāḥ pāntu pāntu devyaśca sarvadā  NarP bhūtapretapiśācāśca parakṛtyādikān gadān drāvayantu svaśaktīnāṃ bhūṣaṇairāyudhairmama  NarP gajāśvadvīpipañcāsyatārkṣyārūḍhākhilāyudhāḥ asaṃkhyāḥ śaktayo devyaḥ pāntu māṃ sarvataḥ sadā  NarP sāyaṃ cāpi kāmeśī mohinī vimalāruṇā  NarP tapinī ca tathā sarveśvarī cāpyatha kaulinī mudrāṇantanuriṣvarṇarūpā cāpārṇavigrahā  NarP pāśavarṇaśarīrā cākurvarṇasuvapurddharā trikhaṇḍā sthāpanī sannirodhanī cāvaguṇṭhanī  NarP sannidhāneṣu cāpākhyā tathā pāśāṅkuśābhidhā namaskṛtistathā saṃkṣobhaṇī vidrāvaṇī tathā  NarP ākarṣaṇī ca vikhyātā tathaivāve śakāriṇī unmādinī mahāpūrvā kuśātho khecarī matā  NarP bījā śaktyutthāpanā ca sthūlasūkṣmaparābhidhā aṇimā laghimā caiva mahimā garimā tathā  NarP prāptiḥ prakāmitā cāpi ceśitā vaśitā tathā bhuktiḥ siddhistathaivecchā siddhirūpā ca kīrtitā  NarP brāhmī smṛtidehātmarūpiṇī kusumā mekhalā cāpi madanā madanāturā  NarP rekhā saṃveginī caiva hyaṅkuśā mālinīti ca saṃkṣobhiṇī tathā vidrāviṇyākarṣaṇarūpiṇī  NarP āhlādinīti ca proktā tathā samohinīti ca staṃbhinījaṃbhinīcaiva vaśaṅkaryatha rañjinī  NarP unmādinī tathaivārthasādhinīti prakīrtitā saṃpattipūrṇā sā mantramayī dvandvakṣayaṅkarī  NarP siddhiḥ saṃpatpradācaiva priyamaṅgalakāriṇī kāmapradā nigaditā tathā duḥkhavimocinī  NarP mṛtyupraśamanīcaiva tathā vighnanivāriṇī aṅgasuṃdarikā caiva tathā saubhāgyadāyinī  NarP jñānaiśvaryapradā jñānamayī caiva ca pañcamī vindhyavāsanakā ghorasvarūpā NarP chāgī mārjārikā mūṣī vṛṣabhā māhiṣī tathā śārdūlī sairibhī vyāghrī hariṇī ca mṛgī śunī  NarP kapirūpā ca goghaṇṭā vānarī ca narāśvinī nagā gaurhastinī ceti tathā ṣaṭcakravāsinī  NarP trikhaṇḍā sarvamevātra yantrasādhanapūrvakam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde nityāpaṭalakathanaṃ nāma navatitamo dhyāyaḥsanatkumāra uvācaatha vakṣye maheśasya mantraṃ sarvārthasādhakam yaṃ samārādhya manujo bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati  NarP hṛdayaṃ sabakaḥ sūkṣmo lānto nantānvito marut pañcākṣaro manuḥ proktastārādyo yaṃ ṣaḍakṣaraḥ  NarP vāmadevī munīśchandaḥ paṅktirīśo sya devatā ṣaḍbhirvarṇaiḥ ṣaḍaṅgāni kuryānmantreṇa deśikaḥ  NarP mantravarṇādikānnyasyenmantramūrtiryathākramam tarjanīmadhyayorantyānāmikāṅguṣṭhake punaḥ  NarP tāḥ syustatpuruṣāghorabhavavāmeśasaṃjñikāḥ vaktrahṛtpādaguhyeṣu nijamūrddhani tāḥ punaḥ  NarP prāgyāmyavāruṇodīcyamadhyavaktreṣu pañcasu mantrāṅgāninyasetpaścājjātiyuktāni ṣaṭ kramāt  NarP kurvīta golakanyāsaṃ rakṣāyai tadanantaram hṛdi vaktreṃsayorūrvoḥ kaṇṭhe nābhau dvipārśvayoḥ  NarP pṛṣṭhe hṛdi tathā mūrdhni vadane netrayornasoḥ doḥpatsaṃdhiṣu sāgreṣu vinyasettadanantaram  NarP śirovadanahṛtkukṣisorupādadvaye punaḥ hṛdi vaktrāṃbuje ṭaṅkamṛgā bhayavareṣvatha  NarP vaktrāṃsahṛtsapādorujaṭhareṣu kramānnyaset mūlamantrasya ṣaḍa varṇānyathāvaddeśikottamaḥ  NarP mūrdhni bhālodarāṃseṣu hṛdaye tāḥ punarnyaset paścādanena mantreṇa kurvīta vyāpakaṃ sudhīḥ  NarP namostvanantarūpāya jyotirliṅgāmṛtātmane caturmūrtivapuśchāyābhāsitāṅgāya śaṃbhave  NarP evaṃ nyastaśarīro sau cintayetpārvatīpatim dhyāyennityaṃ maheśānaṃ raupyaparvatasannibham  NarP cārucandrāvataṃsaṃ ca ratnākalpojjvalāṅgakam paraśvadhavarābhītimṛgahastaṃ śubhānanam  NarP padmāsīnaṃ samantāttu stutaṃ sumanasāṃ gaṇaiḥ vyāghrakṛtiṃ vasānaṃ ca viśvādyaṃ viśvarūpakam  NarP trinetraṃ pañcavaktraṃ ca sarvabhītiharaṃ śivam tattvalakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ dīkṣitaḥ śaivavartmanā  NarP tāvatsaṃkhyasahasrāṇi juhuyātpāyasaiḥ śubhaiḥ tataḥ siddho bhavenmantraḥ sādhakābhīṣṭasiddhidaḥ  NarP devaṃ saṃpūjayetpīṭhe vāmādinavaśaktike vāmā jyeṣṭhā tathā raudrī kālī kalapadādikā  NarP vikāriṇyāhvayā proktā balādyā vikariṇyatha balapramathanī paścātsarvabhūtadamanyatha  NarP manonmanīti saṃproktāḥ śaivapīṭhasya śaktayaḥ namo bhagavate paścātsakalādi vadettataḥ  NarP guṇātmaśaktibhaktāya tato nantāya tatparam yogapīṭhātmane bhūyo namastārādiko manuḥ  NarP amunā manunā dadyādāsanaṃ girijāpateḥ mūrtiṃ mūlena saṃkalpya tatrāvāhya yajecchivam  NarP karṇikāyāṃ yajenmūrtirīśamīśānadiggajam śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ dikṣu tatpuruṣādikā  NarP pītāñjanaśvetaraktāḥ pradhānasadṛśāyudhāḥ caturvaktrasamāyuktā yathāvattāḥ prapūjayet  NarP koṇeṣvarcennivṛttyādyāstejorūpāḥ kalāḥ kramāt aṅgāni kesarasthāni vighneśānpannagānyajet  NarP anantaṃ sukhanāmānaṃ śivottamamanantaram ekanetramekarudraṃ trimūrtiṃ tadanantaram  NarP paścācchīkaṇṭhanāmānaṃ śikhaṇḍinamiti kramāt raktapītasitāraktakṛṣṇaraktāñjanāsitān  NarP kirīṭārpitabālendūnpadmasthānbhūṣaṇānvitān trinetrāñchūlavajrāstracāpahastānmanoramān  NarP uttarādi yajetpaścādrudraṃ caṇḍeśvaraṃ punaḥ tato nandimahākālau gaṇeśaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ punaḥ  NarP atha bhṛṅgiṃ riṭiṃ skandametānpadmāsanasthitān svarṇatoyāruṇaśyāmamuktendusitapāṭalān  NarP indrādayastataḥ pūjyā vajrādyāyudhasaṃyutāḥ itthaṃ saṃpūjayeddevaṃ sahasraṃ nityaśo japet  NarP sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ prāpnuyādvāñchitaṃ śriyam dvisahasraṃ japan rogānmucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP trisanmantraṃ japanmantraṃ dīrghamāyuravāpnuyāt sahasravṛddhayā prajapansarvakāmānavāpnuyāt  NarP ājyānvitaistilaiḥ śuddhairjuhuyāllakṣamādarāt utpātajanitān kleśānnāśayennātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP śatalakṣaṃ japansākṣācchivo bhavati mānavaḥ ṣaḍakṣaraḥ śaktiruddhaḥ kathito ṣṭākṣaro manuḥ  NarP ṛṣiśchandaḥ purā prokto devatā syādumāpatiḥ aṅgāni pūrvamuktāni saumyamīśaṃ vicintayet  NarP bandhūkābhaṃ trinetraṃ ca śaśikhaṇḍadharaṃ vibhum smerāsyaṃ svakaraiḥ śūlaṃ kaṃpālaṃ varadābhaye  NarP vahṝntaṃ cārubhūpāḍhyaṃ vāmorusthādrikanyayā bhujenāśliṣṭadehaṃ taṃ cintayenmanasā hṛdi  NarP manulakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ tatsahasraṃ yathāvidhi juhuyānmānmadhusasiktairāragvadhasamidvaraiḥ  NarP prākprokte pūjayetpīṭhe gandhapuṣpairumāpatim aṅgāvṛtairbahiḥ pūjyā hṛllekhādyā yathāpurā  NarP madhyaprāgdakṣiṇodīcyapaścimeṣu vidhānataḥ yajetpūrvādipatreṣu vṛṣabhādyānanukramāt  NarP śūlaṭaṅkākṣavalayakamaṇḍalulasatkaram raktākāraṃ trinayanaṃ caṇḍeśamatha pūjayet  NarP cakraśaṅkhābhayābhīṣṭakarāṃ marakataprabhām durgāṃ prapūjayetsaumyāṃ trinetrāṃ cārubhūṣaṇām  NarP kalpaśākhāntare ghaṇṭāṃ dadhānaṃ dvādaśekṣaṇam bālārkābhaṃ śiśuṃ kāntaṃṣaṇmukhaṃ pūjayettataḥ  NarP nanditaṃ ca yajetsaumyāṃ ratnabhūṣaṇamaṇḍitam paraśvadhavarābhītiṭaṅkinaṃ śyāmavigraham  NarP pāśāṅkuśavarābhīṣṭadhāriṇaṃ kuṅkumaprabham vighnanāyakamabhyarceccandrārddhakṛtaśekharam  NarP śyāmaṃ raktotpalakaraṃ vāmāṅkanyastatatkaram dvinetraṃ raktavastrāḍhyaṃ senāpatimathārcayet  NarP tato ṣṭamātaraḥ pūjyā brāhmādyāḥ proktalakṣaṇāḥ indrādikānlokapālānsvasvadikṣu samarcayet  NarP vajrādīni tadastrāṇi tadbahiḥ kramatorcayet evaṃ yo bhajate mantrī devaṃ śaṃbhumumāpatim  NarP sa bhavetsarvalokānāṃ saubhāgyaśreyasāṃ padam sāṃtasadyāntasaṃyukto bindubhūṣitamastakaḥ  NarP prāsādākhyo manuḥ prokto bhajatāṃ sarvasiddhidaḥ ṣaḍdīrghayuktabījena ṣaḍaṅgavidhirīritaḥ  NarP ṣaḍarṇavattu munyādyāḥ proktāścāsyāpi nārada īśānādyā nyasenmūrtīraṅguṣṭhādiṣu deśikaḥ  NarP īśānākhyaṃ tatpuruṣamaghoraṃ tadanantaram vāmadevāhvayaṃ sadyojātabījaṃ kramādviduḥ  NarP ukārādyaiḥ pañcahrasvaurvilomānsaṃyutaṃ ca yat tattadaṅgulibhirbhūyastattadikānnyaset  NarP śirovadanahṛdguhyapādadeśe yathākramāt urddhaprāgdakṣiṇodīcyapaścimeṣu mukheṣu ca  NarP tataḥ pravinyasedvidvānaṣṭatriṃśatkalāstanau īśānādyā ṛcaḥ samyagaṅgulīṣu yathākramāt  NarP aṅguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāntaṃ nyaseddeśikasattamaḥ mūrddhāsyahṛdayāṃbhojaguhyapāde tu tāḥ punaḥ  NarP vaktre mūrdhādiṣu nyasya bhūyo ṅgāni prakalpayet tārapañcakamuccārya sarvajñāya hṛdīritam  NarP amṛte tejo mālini tṛptāyeti padaṃ punaḥ tadante brahmaśiḥse śirogaṃ jvalitaṃ tataḥ  NarP śikhiṃ śikhāya parato nādibodhāya tacchikhā vajriṇe vajrahastāya svatantrāya tanucchadam  NarP saiṃ saiṃ haumiti saṃbhāṣya parato toṃ guhyaśaktaye netramuktaṃ ślīpaśuṃ huṃ phaḍante netraṃ śaktaye  NarP astramuktaṃ ṣaḍaṅgāni kuryādevaṃ samāhitaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścātprāksaumyamadhyeṣu pañcasu  NarP vaktreṣu pañca vinyasyedīśānasya kalāḥ kramāt īśānaḥ sarvavidyānāṃ śaśinī prathamā kalā  NarP īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ maṅgalā tadanantaram brahmādhipatiḥ śabdānte brahmaṇo dhipatiḥ punaḥ  NarP brahmeṣṭadā tṛtīyāsyācchivo me astu tatparā marīciḥ kathitā vipra caturthī ca sadāśive  NarP aṃśumālinyatha parā praṇavādyā namonvitāḥ pūrvapaścimayāmyodagvaktreṣu tadanantaram  NarP catasro vinyasenmantrī puruṣasya kalāḥ kramāt ādyā tatpurupāyeti vidmahe śāntirīritā  NarP mahādevāya śabdānte dhīmahi syāttataḥ param vidyā dvitīyā kathitā tanno rudraḥ padaṃ tataḥ  NarP pratiṣṭhā kathitā paścāttṛtīyā syātpracodayāt nivṛttistatparā sarvā praṇavādyā namonvitā  NarP hṛdi cāṃsadvaye nābhikukṣau pṛṣṭhe tha vakṣasi athorasi kalā nyasyedaṣṭau mantrī yathāvidhi  NarP aghorebhyastathā pūrvamīritā prathamā kalā atha ghorebhya ityante mohāsyāttadanantaram  NarP aghorānte kṣamā paścāttṛtīyā parikīrtitā ghoratarebhyo nidrā syātsarvebhyaḥ sarvatatparā  NarP vyādhistu pañcamī proktā śarvebhyastadanantaram mṛtyurnigaditā ṣaṣṭhī namaste astu tatparam  NarP kṣudhā syātsaptamī rudrarūpebhyaḥ kathitā tṛṣā aṣṭamī kathitā etādhruvādyā namasānvitāḥ  NarP guhyayugmoruyugmeṣu jānujaṅghāsphijoḥ punaḥ kaṭyāṃ pārśvadvaye vāmakalā nyasyettrayodaśa  NarP prathamā vāmadevāya namonte syādrujā kalā syājjyeṣṭhāya namo rakṣā dvitīyā parikīrtitā  NarP kalakāmā pañcamī syāttato vikaraṇāya ca namaḥ saṃyamanī ṣaṣṭhī kathitā tadanantaram  NarP balakriyā saptamīṣṭā kalā vikaraṇāya ca namo vṛddhistvaṣṭamī syādbalānte ca sthirā kalā  NarP paścātpramathanāyānte namo rātrirudīritā sarvabhūtadamanāya namonte bhrāmaṇī kalā  NarP namonte mohinī proktā mantrajñairdvādaśī kalā manonmanyai namaḥ paścājjvarā proktā trayodaśī  NarP praṇavādyāścaturthyantā namontāstu prakīrtitāḥ pādadostananāsāsu mūrdhni bāhuyuge nyaset  NarP sadyojātabhavāḥ samyagaṣṭau mantrāḥ kalāḥ kramāt sadyojātaṃ prapadyāmi siddhiḥ syātprathamā kalā  NarP sadyojātāya vai bhūyo namaḥ syād vṛddhirīritā bhavedyutistṛtīyā syādabhave tadanandaram  NarP lakṣmī caturthī kathitā tato nātibhavepadam medhā syātpañcamī proktā kalābhūyo bhavasva mām  NarP prājñā samīritā ṣaṣṭhī bhavānte syātprabhā kalā udbhavāya namaḥ paścātsudhā syādaṣṭamī kalā  NarP praṇavādyāścaturthyantā kalāḥ sarvā namonvitāḥ aṣṭātriṃśatkalāḥ proktāḥ pañca brahmapadādikāḥ  NarP iti vinyastadeho sau bhavedgaṅgādharaḥ svayam tataḥ samāhito bhūtvā dhyāyedevaṃ sadāśivam  NarP sitapītāsitaśvetajapābhaiḥ pañcabhirmukhaiḥ akṣairyutaṃ glaumukuṭaṃ koṭipūrṇendusaṃprabham  NarP śūlaṃ ṭaṅkaṃ kṛpāṇaṃ ca vajrāgnyahipatīnkaraiḥ dadhānaṃbhūṣaṇoddīptaṃ ghaṇṭāpāśavarābhayān  NarP evaṃ dhyātvā japenmantraṃ pañcalakṣaṃ madhuplutaiḥ prasūnaiḥ karavīrotthairjuhuyāttahṛśāṃśataḥ  NarP pūrvodite yajetpīṭhe martiṃ mūlena kalpayet āvāhya pūjayettasyāṃ mūrtāvāvaraṇaiḥ saha  NarP śaktiṃ ḍamarukābhītivarānsaṃdadhataṃ karaiḥ īśānaṃ trīkṣaṇaṃ śubhramaiśānyāṃ diśi pūjayet  NarP paraśveṇavarābhītīrdadhānaṃ vidyudujjvalam caturmukhaṃ tatpuruṣaṃ trinetraṃ pūrvantorcayet  NarP akṣasrajaṃ vedapāśau ṛṣiṇḍamarukaṃ tataḥ khaṭvāṅgaṃ niśitaṃ śūlaṃ kapālaṃ bibhrataṃ karaiḥ  NarP añjanābhaṃ caturvaktraṃ bhīmadantaṃ bhayāvaham aghoraṃ trīkṣaṇaṃ yāmye pūjayenmantravittamaḥ  NarP kuṅkumābhacaturvaktraṃ vāmadevaṃ trilocanam hariṇākṣaguṇābhītivarahastaṃ caturmukham  NarP bālenduśekharollāsimukuṭaṃ paścime yajet karpūredunibhaṃ saumyaṃ sadyojātaṃ trilocanam  NarP varābhayākṣavalayakuṭhārāndadhataṃ karaiḥ vilāsinaṃ smeravaktraṃ saumye samyaksamarcayet  NarP koṇeṣvarcennivṛttyādyāstejorūpāḥ kalāḥ kramāt vighneśvarānanantādyānpatreṣu parito yajet  NarP umādikāstato bāhye śakrādyānāyudhaiḥ saha iti saṃpūjya deveśaṃ bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ  NarP praṇīyennṛtyagītādyaiḥ stotramairtrīṃ manoharaiḥ tāro māyāviyadbindumanusvarasamanvitaḥ  NarP pañcākṣarasamāyukto vasuvarṇo manurmataḥ pañcākṣaroktavatkuryādaṅganyāsādikaṃ budhaḥ  NarP siṃdūrābhaṃ lasadratnamukuṭaṃ candramaulinam divyabhūṣāṅgarāgaṃ ca nāgayajñopavītinam  NarP vāmorusthapriyorojanyastahastaṃ ca bibhratam vedaṭaṅkeṣmabhayaṃ dhyāyetsarveśvaraṃ śivam  NarP aṣṭalakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ tatsahasraṃ ghṛtānvitaiḥ pāyasairjuhuyātpīṭhemūrtiṃ saṃkalpya mūlataḥ  NarP aṅgairāvaraṇaṃ pūrvamanantādyairanantaram umādibhiḥ samuddiṣṭaṃ tṛtīyaṃ lokanāyakaiḥ  NarP caturthaṃ pañcamaṃ teṣāmāyudhaiḥ parikīrtitam evaṃ pratidinaṃ devaṃ pūjayetsādhakottamaḥ  NarP putrapautrādigāṃ lakṣmīṃ saṃprāpyahyatra modate tāraḥ sthirā sakarṇendurbhaghṛguḥ sargasamanvitaḥ  NarP akṣarātmā nigadito mantro mṛtyuñjayātmakaḥ ṛṣaiḥ kaholo devyādigāyatrī chanda īritam  NarP mṛtyuñjayo mahādevo devatāsya samīritaḥ bhṛguṇā dīrghayuktena ṣaḍaṅgāni samācaret  NarP candrārkahutabhuṅnetraṃ smitāsyaṃ yugmapadmagam amṛtāśakalaiḥ śuddhadugdhājyasamabhiplutaiḥ  NarP śaive saṃpūjayetpīṭhe mūrtiṃ saṃkalpamūlataḥ aṅgāvaraṇamārādhyapaścāllokeśvarānyajet  NarP tadastrāṇi tato bāhye pūjayetsādhakottamaḥ japapūjādibhiḥ siddhe mantre sminmunisattama  NarP kuryātprayogānkalyoktānabhīṣṭaphalasiddhaye dugdhasiktaiḥ sudhākhaṇḍairhutvā pratyahamādarāt  NarP sahasramāsaparyantaṃ labhedāyurdhanaṃ sutān sudhāvaṭatitānpūrvā payaḥ sarpiḥ payo haviḥ  NarP sapta dravyāṇi vāreṣu kramāddaśaśataṃ hunet saptādhikān dvijānnityaṃ bhojayenmadhurānvitam  NarP ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadyādaruṇāṃ gāṃ payasvinīm guruṃ kṣveḍārtauṃ mohe dāhe mahābhaye  NarP homo yaṃ śāntidaḥ proktaḥ sarvābhayapradāyakaḥ dravyairetaiḥ prajuhuyāttrijanmasu yathāvidhi  NarP bhojayenmadhurairbhojyairbrāhmaṇānvedapāragān homaḥ sarvamṛtyugadāpahaḥ  NarP siddhārthairvihito homo mahājvaravināśanaḥ apāmārgasamiddhomaḥ sarvāmayaniṣūdanaḥ  NarP dakṣiṇāmūrtaye pūrvaṃ tubhyaṃ padamanantaram vaṭamūlapadasyānte pravadecca nivāsine  NarP dhyānaikaniratāṅgāya paścād brūyānnamaḥ padam rudrāya śaṃbhave tāraśaktiruddho yamīritaḥ  NarP ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣaro mantraḥ sarvakāmaphalapradaḥ muniḥ śukaḥ samuddiṣṭaśchando nuṣṭupprakīrtitam  NarP devatā dakṣiṇāmūrtirnāmnā śaṃbhurudīritaḥ tāraśaktiyuktaiḥ pūrvaṃ hrīmādyantaiśca mantrajaiḥ  NarP ṣaṭṣaṣṭhāṣṭeṣu vahnyarṇairhṛdayādyaṅgakalpanam mūrdhni bhāle dṛśoḥ śrotre gaṇḍayugme sanāsike  NarP āsyadoḥsaṃdhiṣu gale stanahṛnnābhimaṇḍale kaṭyāṃ guhye punaḥ pādasaṃdhiṣvarṇānnyasenmanoḥ  NarP vyāpakaṃ tāraśaktibhyāṃ kuryāddehe tataḥ param himācalataṭe ramye daśasāhasramucyate  NarP devānāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca yatrotpattiḥ prakīrtitā prajāpatīnāṃ ca tathā dakṣādīnāṃ munīśvara  NarP tato lokeśvarasyātra sūryasya paramātmanaḥ vaṃśānukīrtanaṃ puṇyaṃ  NarP dvīpānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ varṣāṇāṃ cāpyaśeṣataḥ varṇanaṃ yatra pātālasvargāṇāṃ ca pradṛśyate  NarP narakāṇāṃ samākhyānaṃ sūryastutikathānakam pārvatyāśca tathā janma vivāhaśca nigadyate  NarP dakṣākhyānaṃ tataḥ proktamekāmrakṣetravarṇanam pūrvabhāgo yamuditaḥ purāṇasyāsya nārada  NarP asyottare vibhāge tu puruṣottamavarṇanam vistareṇa samākhyātaṃ tīrthayātrāvidhānataḥ  NarP atraiva kṛṣṇacaritaṃ vistarātsamudīritam varṇanaṃ yamalokasya pitṛśrāddhavidhistathā  NarP varṇāśramāṇāṃ dharmāśca kīrtitā yatra vistarāt viṣṇudharmayugākhyānaṃ pralayasya ca varṇanam  NarP yogānāṃ ca samākhyānaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāpi varṇanam brahmavādasamuddeśaḥ purāṇasya praśaṃsanam  NarP etadbrahmapurāṇaṃ tu bhāgadvayasamanvitam varṇitaṃ sarvapāpaghnaṃ sarvasaukhyapradāyakam  NarP sūtaśaunakasaṃvādaṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakam likhitvetatpurāṇaṃ yo vaiśākhyāṃ hemasaṃyutam  NarP jaladhenuyutaṃ cāpi bhaktyā dadyāddvijātaye paurāṇikāya saṃpūjya vastrabhojyavibhūṣaṇaiḥ  NarP sa vasedbrahmaṇo loke yāvaccandrārkatārakam yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi brāhmānukramaṇīṃ dvija  NarP so pi sarvapurāṇasya śroturvaktuḥ phalaṃ labhet śṛṇoti yaḥ purāṇaṃ tu brahmaṃ sarvaṃ jitendriyaḥ  NarP haviṣyāśī ca niyamātsa labhedbrahmaṇaḥ padam kimatra bahunoktena yadyadicchati mānavaḥ tatsarvaṃ labhate vatsa purāṇasyāsya kīrtanāt  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde brāhmapurāṇetihāsakathanaṃ nāma dvinavatitamo dhyāyaḥbrahmovācaśṛṇu putra pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ padmasaṃjñakam mahatpuṇyapradaṃ nṝṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ mudā  NarP yathā cañcendriyaḥ sarvaḥ śarīrīti nigadyate tathedaṃ pañcabhiḥ khaṇḍairuditaṃ pāpanāśanam  NarP pulastyena tu bhīṣmāya sṛṣṭyādikramato dvija nānākhyānetihāsādyairyatrokto dharmavistaraḥ  NarP puṣkarasya ca māhātmyaṃ vistareṇa prakīrtitam brahmayajñavidhānaṃ ca vedapāṭhādilakṣaṇam  NarP dānānāṃ kīrtanaṃ yatra vratānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak vivāhaḥ śailajāyāścatārakākhyānakaṃ mahat  NarP māhātmyaṃ ca gavādīnāṃ kīrtitaṃ sarvapuṇyadam kālakeyādidaityānāṃ vadho yatra pṛthakpṛthak  NarP grahāṇāmarcanaṃ dānaṃ yatra proktaṃ dvijottama tatsṛṣṭikhaṇḍamuddiṣṭaṃ vyāsena sumahātmanā  NarP pitṛmātrādipūjyatve śivaśarmakathā purā suvratasya kathā paścādvṛtrasya ca vadhastathā  NarP pṛthorvainasya cākhyānaṃ sunūthāyāḥ kathā tathā sukalākhyānakaṃ caiva dharmākhyānaṃ tataḥ param  NarP pitṛśuśrūṣaṇākhyānaṃ nahuṣasya kathā tataḥ yayāticaritaṃ caiva gurutīrthanirūpaṇam  NarP rājñā jaiminisaṃvādo bahvāścaryyakathāyutaḥ kathā hyaśokasuṃdaryāhuṇḍadaityavadhānvitā  NarP kāmodākhyānakaṃ tatra vihuṇḍavadhasaṃyutam kuñjalasya ca saṃvādaścyavanena mahātmanā  NarP siddhākhyānaṃ tataḥ proktaṃ khaṇḍasyāsya phalohanam sūtaśaunakasaṃvādaṃ bhūmikhaṇḍamidaṃ smṛtam  NarP brahmāṇḍotpattiruditā yatrarṣibhiśca sautinā sabhūmilokasaṃsthānaṃ tīrthākhyānaṃ tataḥ param  NarP narmadotpattikathanaṃ tattīrthānāṃ kathāḥ pṛthak kurukṣetrāditīrthānāṃ kathā puṇyā prakīrtitā  NarP kālindīpuṇyakathanaṃ kāśīmāhātmyavarṇanam gayāyāścaiva māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya ca puṇyakam  NarP varṇāśramānurodhena karmayoganirūpaṇam vyāsajaminisaṃvādaḥ puṇyakarmakathānvitaḥ  NarP samudramathanākhyānaṃ vratākhyānaṃ tataḥ param ūrjjapañcāhamāhāmyaṃ stotraṃ sarvāparādhanut  NarP etatsvargābhidhaṃ vipra sarvapātakanāśanam rāmāśvamedhaṃ prathamaṃ rāmarājyābhiṣecanam  NarP agastyādyāgamaścaiva paulastyānvayakīrttanam aśvamedhopadeśaśca hayacaryā tataḥ param  NarP nānārājakathāḥ puṇyā jagannāthānuvarṇanam vṛndāvanasya māhātmyaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam  NarP nityalīlānukathanaṃ yatra kṛṣṇāvatāriṇaḥ mādhavasnānamāhātmyaṃ snānadānārcane phalam  NarP dharāvarāhasaṃvādo yamabrahmaṇayoḥ kathā saṃvādo rājadūtānāṃ kṛṣṇastotranirūpaṇam  NarP śivaśaṃbhusamāyogī dadhīcākhyānakaṃ tataḥ bhasmamāhātmyamatulaṃ śivamāhātmyamuttamam  NarP devarātasutākhyānaṃ purāṇajñapraśaṃsanam gautamākhyānakaṃ caiva śivagītā tataḥ smṛtā  NarP kalpāntare rānakathā bhāradvājāśramasthitā pātālakhaṇḍametaddhi śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ sadā  NarP sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ sarvābhīṣṭaphalapradam parvatākhyānakaṃ pūrvaṃ gaurthai proktaṃ śivena vai  NarP jālandharakathā paścācchrīśailādyanukīrtanam sagarasya kathā puṇyā tataḥ paramudīritam  NarP gaṅgāprayāgakāśīnāṃ gayāyāścādhipuṇyakam annādi dānamāhātmyaṃ tanmahādvādaśīvratam  NarP caturviṃśaikādaśīnāṃ māhātmyaṃ pṛthagīritam viṣṇudharmasamākhyānaṃ viṣṇunāmasahasrakam  NarP kārtikavratamāhātmyaṃ māghasnānaphalaṃ tataḥ jambṛdvīpasya tīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ pāpanāśanam  NarP sābhramatyāśca māhātmyaṃ nṛsiṃhotpattivarṇanam devaśarmādikākhyānaṃ gītāmāhātmyavarṇanam  NarP bhaktyākhyānaṃ ca māhātmyaṃ śrīmadbhāgavatasya ha indraprasthasya māhātmyaṃ bahutīrthakathānvitam  NarP mantraratnābhidhānaṃ ca tripādbhūtyanuvarṇanam avatārakathāḥ puṇyā matsyādīnāmataḥ param  NarP rāmanāmaśataṃ divyaṃ tanmāhātmyaṃ ca vāḍava parīkṣaṇaṃ ca bhṛguṇā śrīviṣṇorvaibhavasya ca  NarP ityetaduttaraṃ khaṇḍaṃ pañcamaṃ sarvapuṇyadam pañcakhaṇḍayutaṃ pādmaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti narottamaḥ  NarP sa labhedvaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma bhuktvā bhogānihepsitān etadvai pañcapañcāśatsahasraṃ padmasaṃjñakam  NarP purāṇaṃ lekhayitvā vai jyeṣṭhyāṃ svarṇābjasaṃyutam yaḥ pradadyātsusatkṛtya purāṇajñāya mānada  NarP sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ padmānukramaṇīmetāṃ yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyāttathā  NarP so pi padmapurāṇasya labhecchravaṇajaṃ phalam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde padmapurāṇānukramaṇikāvarṇanaṃ nāma trinavatitamo dhyāyaḥśrībrahmovācaśṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ mahat trayoviṃśatisahasraṃ sarvapātakanāśanam  NarP yatrādibhāge nirviṣṭāḥ ṣaḍaṃśāḥ śaktijena ha maitreyāyādime tatra purāṇasyāvatārikām  NarP ādikāraṇasargaśca devādīnāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ samudramathanākhyānaṃ dakṣādīnāṃ tato nvayaḥ  NarP dhruvasya caritaṃ caiva pṛthoścaritameva ca pracetasaṃ tathākhyānaṃ prahlādasya kathānakam  NarP pṛthagrājyādhikārākhyā prathamoṃśaitīritaḥ priyavratānvayākhyākhyānaṃ dvīpavarṣanirūpaṇam  NarP pātālanarakākhyānaṃ saptasvarganirūpaṇam sūryādivārakathanaṃ pṛthaglakṣaṇasaṃyutam  NarP caritaṃ bharatasyātha muktimārganidarśanam nidāghaṛbhusaṃvādo dvitīyoṃśa udāhṛtaḥ  NarP manvantarasamākhyānaṃ vedavyāsāvatārakam narakoddhārakaṃ karma gaditaṃ ca tataḥ param  NarP sagarasyaurvasaṃvāde sarvadharmanirūpaṇam śrāddhakalpaṃ tathoddiṣṭaṃ varṇāśramanibandhanam  NarP sadācāraśca kathito māyāmohakathā tataḥ tṛtīyoṃśo yamuditaḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanaḥ  NarP sūryavaṃśakatha puṇyā somavaṃśānukīrtanam caturtheṃśemuniśreṣṭha nānārājakathānvitam  NarP kṛṣṇāvatārasaṃpraśno gokulīyā kathā tataḥ pūtanādivadho bālye kaumāre ghādihiṃsanam  NarP kaiśore kaṃsahananaṃ māthuraṃ caritaṃ tathā tatastu yauvane proktā līlā dvāravatībhavā  NarP sarvadaityavadho yatra vivāhāśca pṛthagvidhāḥ yatra sthitvājagannāthaḥ kṛṣṇo yogeśvareśvaraḥ  NarP bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cakre pareṣāṃ hananādibhiḥ aṣṭāvakrīyamākhyānaṃ pañcamoṃśa itīritaḥ  NarP kalijaṃ caritaṃ proktaṃ cāturvidhyaṃ layasya ca brahmajñānasamuddeśaḥ khāṇḍikyasya nirūpitaḥ  NarP keśidhvajena cetyeṣa ṣaṣṭhāeṃśaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ataḥ paraṃ tu sūtena śaunakādibhirādarāt  NarP pṛṣṭena coditāḥ śaśvadviṣṇudharmottarāhvayāḥ nānādharmakathāḥ puṇyā vratāni niyamā yamāḥ  NarP dharmaśāstraṃ cārthaśāstraṃ vedāntaṃ jyotiṣaṃ tathā vaṃśākhyānaṃ prakaraṇāt stotrāṇi manavastathā  NarP nānāvidyāstathā proktāḥ sarvalokopakārikāḥ etadviṣṇupurāṇaṃ vai sarvaśāstrārthasaṃgraham  NarP vārāhakalpavṛttāntaṃ vyāsena kathitaṃ tviha yo naraḥ paṭhate bhaktyā yaḥ śṛṇoti ca sādaram  NarP tāvubhau viṣṇulokaṃ hi vrajetāṃ bhuktabhogakau tallikhitvā ca yo dadyādāṣāḍhyāṃ ghṛtadhenunā  NarP sahitaṃ viṇubhaktāya purāṇārthavidedvija sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma vimānenārkavarcasā  NarP yaśca viṣṇupurāṇasya samanukramaṇīṃ dvija kathayecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa purāṇaphalaṃ labhet  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde viṣṇupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo dhyāyaḥbrahmovācaśṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vāyavīyakam yasmiñcchrute labhaddhāma rudrasya paramātmanaḥ  NarP caturviṃśatisāhasraṃ tatpurāṇaṃ prakīrtitam śvetakalpaprasaṃgena dharmānatrāha mārutaḥ  NarP tadbāyavīyanuditaṃ bhāgadvayasamanvitam sargādilakṣaṇaṃ yatra proktaṃ vipra savistaram  NarP manvantareṣu vaṃśāśca rājñāṃ ye yatra kīrtitāḥ gayāsurasya hananaṃ vistarādyatra kīrtitam  NarP māsānāṃ caiva māhātmyaṃ māghasyoktaṃ phalādhikam dānadharmā rājadharmā vistareṇoditā stathā  NarP bhūpātālakakubvyomacāriṇāṃ yatra nirṇayaḥ vratādīnāṃ ca pūrvo yaṃ vibhāgaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ  NarP uttare tasya bhāgetu narmadātīrthavarṇanam śivasya saṃhitoktā vai vistareṇa munīśvara  NarP yo devaḥ sarvadevānāṃ durvijñeyaḥ sanātanaḥ sa tu sarvātmanā yasyāstīre tiṣṭhati saṃtatam  NarP idaṃ brahmā hārīridaṃ sākṣāccedaṃ paro haraḥ idaṃ brahma nirākāraṃ kaivalyaṃ narmadājalam  NarP dhruvaṃ lokahitārthāya śivena svaśarīrataḥ śaktiḥ kāpi saridṛpā reveyamavatāritā  NarP ye vasaṃtyuttare kūle rudrasyānucarā hi te vasaṃti yāmyatīre ye lokaṃ te yānti vaiṣṇavam  NarP oṅkāreśvaramārabhyayāvatpaścimasāgaraḥ saṃgamāḥ pañca ca triṃśannadīnāṃ pāpanāśanī  NarP daśaikamuttare tīre trayoviṃśatirdakṣiṇe pañcatriṃśattamaḥ prokto revāsāgarasagamaḥ  NarP saṃgamaiḥ sahitānyeva revātīradvaye pi ca catuḥśatāni tīrthāni prasiddhāni ca saṃti hi  NarP ṣaṣṭitīrthasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭikoṭyo munīśvara saṃti cānyāni revāyāstīrayugme pade pade  NarP saṃhiteyaṃ mahāpuṇyā śivasya paramātmanaḥ narmadācaritaṃ yatra vāyunā parikīrtitam  NarP likhitvedaṃ purāṇaṃ tu guḍadhenusamanvitam śrāvaṇyāṃ yo dadedbhaktyā brāhmaṇāya kuṭuṃbine  NarP rudraloke vasetso pi yāvadindrāścaturddaśa yaḥ śrāvayedvā śṛṇuyādvāyavīyamidaṃ naraḥ  NarP niyamena haviṣyāśī sa rudro nātra saṃśayaḥ yaścānukramaṇīmetāṃ śṛṇoti śrāvayettathā  NarP so pi sarvapurāṇasya phalaṃ śravaṇajaṃ labhet  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāyupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcanavatitamo dhyāyaḥbrahmovācamarīce śṛṇu vakṣyāmi vedavyāsena yatkṛtam śrīmadbhāgavataṃ nāma purāṇaṃ brahmasaṃmitam  NarP tadaṣṭādaśasāhasraṃ kīrtitaṃ pāpanāśanam surapādaparūpo yaṃ skandhairdvādaśabhiryutaḥ  NarP bhagavāneva viprendra viśvarūpīsamīritaḥ tatra tu prathamaskandhe sūtarṣīṇāṃ samāgame  NarP vyāsasya caritaṃ puṇyaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca parīkṣitamupākhyānamitīdaṃ samudāhṛtam  NarP parīkṣicchukasaṃvāde sṛṣṭidvayanirūpaṇam brahmanāradasaṃvāde devatācaritāmṛtam  NarP purāṇalakṣaṇaṃ caiva sṛṣṭikāraṇasaṃbhavaḥ dvitīyo yaṃ samuditaḥ skandho vyāsena dhīmatā  NarP caritaṃ vidurasyātha maitreyeṇāsya saṃgamaḥ sṛṣṭiprakaraṇaṃ paścādbahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ  NarP kāpilaṃ sāṃkhyamapyatra tṛtīyo yamudāhṛtaḥ satyāścaritamādau tu dhruvasya caritaṃ tataḥ  NarP pṛthoḥ puṇyasamākhyānaṃ tataḥ prācīnabarhiṣam ityeṣa turyo gadito visarge skandha uttamaḥ  NarP priyavratasya caritaṃ tadvaṃśyānāṃ ca puṇyadam brahmāṇḍāntargatānāṃ ca lokānāṃ varṇanaṃ tataḥ  NarP narakasthitirityeṣa saṃsthāne pañcamo mataḥ ajāmilasya caritaṃ dakṣasṛṣṭinirūpaṇam  NarP vṛtrākhyānaṃ tataḥ paścānmarutāṃ janma puṇyadam ṣaṣṭho yamuditaḥ skandhovyāsena paripoṣaṇe  NarP prahlādacaritaṃ puṇyaṃ varṇāśramanirūpaṇam saptamo gadito vatsa vāsanākarmakīrtane  NarP gajendramokṣaṇākhyānaṃ manvantaranirūpaṇe samudramathanaṃ caiva balivaibhavabandhanam  NarP matsyāktāracaritamaṣṭamo yaṃ prakīrtitaḥ sūryavaṃśasamākhyānaṃ somavaṃśanirūpaṇam  NarP vaṃśyānucarite prokto navamo yaṃ mahāmate kṛṣṇasya bālacaritaṃ kaumāraṃ ca vrajasthitiḥ  NarP kaiśoraṃ mathurāsthānaṃ yauvanaṃ dvārakāsthitiḥ bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cātra nirodhe daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP nāradena tu saṃvādo vasudevasya kīrtitaḥ yadośca dattātreyeṇa śrīkṛṣṇonoddhavasya ca  NarP yādavānāṃ mithontaśca muktāvekādaśaḥ smṛtaḥ bhaviṣyakalinirddeśo mokṣo rājñaḥ parīkṣitaḥ  NarP vedaśākhāpraṇayanaṃ mārkaṇḍeyatapaḥkriyā saurī vibhūtiruditā sātvatī ca tataḥ param  NarP purāṇasaṃkhyākathanamāśraye dvādaśo hyayam ityevaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa śrīmadbhāgavataṃ tava  NarP vaktuḥ śrotuścopadeṣṭuranumoditureva ca sāhāyyakarturgaditaṃ bhaktibhuktivimuktidam  NarP prauṣṭhapadyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ hemasiṃhasamanvitam deyaṃ bhāgavatāyedaṃ dvijāyaprītipūrvakam  NarP saṃpūjya vastrahemādyairbhagavadbhaktimicchatā yo pyanukramaṇīmetāṃ śrāvayecchṛṇuyāttathā sa purāṇaśravaṇajaṃ prāpnoti phalamuttamam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde śrīmadbhāgavatānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo dhyāyaḥśrībrahmovācaśṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ nāradīyakam pañcaviṃśatisāhasraṃ bṛhatkalpakathāśrayam  NarP sūtaśaunakasaṃvādaḥ sṛṣṭisaṃkṣepavarṇanam nānādharmakathāḥ puṇyāḥ pravṛtte samudāhṛtāḥ  NarP prāgbhāge prathame pāde sanakena mahātmanā dvitīye mokṣadharmākhye mokṣopāyanirūpaṇam  NarP vedāṅgānāṃ ca kathanaṃ śukotpattiśca vistarāt sanandanena gaditā nāradāya mahātmane  NarP mahātantre samuddiṣṭaṃ paśupāśavimokṣaṇam mantrāṇāṃ śodhanaṃ dīkṣāmantroddhāraśca pūjanam  NarP prayogāḥ kavacaṃ nāmasahasraṃ stotrameva ca gaṇeśasūryaviṣṇūnāṃ śivaśaktyoranukramāt  NarP sanatkumāramuninā nāradāya tṛtīyake purāṇalakṣaṇaṃ caiva pramāṇaṃ dānameva ca  NarP pṛthakpṛthak samuddiṣṭaṃ dānakālapuraḥsaram caitrādisarvamāseṣu tithīnāñcapṛthakpṛthak  NarP proktaṃ pratipadādīnāṃ vrataṃ sarvāghanāśanam sanātanena muninā nāradāya caturthake  NarP pūrvabhāgo yamudito bṛhadākhyānasaṃjñitaḥ asyottare vibhāge tu praśna ekādaśīvrate  NarP vasiṣṭhenātha saṃvādo māndhātuḥ parikīrtitaḥ rukmāṅgadakathā puṇyāmohinyutpattikarma ca  NarP vasuśāpaśca mohinyai paścāduddharaṇakriyā gaṅgākathā puṇyatamā gayāyātrānukīrtanam  NarP kāśyā māhātmyamatulaṃ puruṣottamavarṇanam yātrāvidhānaṃ kṣetrasya bahvākhyānasamanvitam  NarP prayāgasyātha māhātmyaṃ kurukṣetrasya tatparam haridvārasya cākhyānaṃ kāmodākhyānakaṃ tathā  NarP badarītīrthamāhātmyaṃ kāmākṣāyāstathaiva ca prabhāsasya ca māhātmyaṃ puṣkarākhyānakaṃ tataḥ  NarP gautamākhyānakaṃ paścādvedapādastavastataḥ gokarṇakṣetramāhātmyaṃ lakṣmaṇākhyānakaṃ tathā  NarP setumāhātmyakathanaṃ narmadātīrthavarṇanam avantyāścaiva māhātmyaṃ madhurāyāstataḥ param  NarP bṛndāvanasya mahimā paśorbrahmāntike gatiḥ mohinīcaritaṃ paścādevaṃ paścādevaṃ vai nāradīyakam  NarP yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyāśrāvayedvā samāhitaḥ sa yāti brahmaṇo dhāma nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  NarP yastvetadiṣupūrṇāyāṃ dhenūnāṃ saptakānvitam pradadyāddijarṃyāya saṃlabhenmokṣameva ca  NarP yaścānukramaṇīmetāṃ nāradīyasya varṇayet śṛṇuyadvaikacittena so pi svargagatiṃ labhet  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge yatrādhikṛtya śakunīnsarvadharmanirūpaṇam mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇaṃ tannavasāhasramīritam  NarP mārkaṇḍeyamuneḥ praśno jaimineḥ prāksamīritaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ dharmasaṃjñānaṃ tato janmanirūpaṇam  NarP pūrvajanmakathā caiṣāṃ vikriyā cā divaspateḥ tīrthayātrā balasyātha draupadeyakathānakam  NarP hariścandrakathā puṇyā yuddhamāḍībakābhidham pitāputrasamākhyānaṃ dattātreyakatha tataḥ  NarP haihasasyātha caritaṃ janmākhyātanmāhātmyasamanvitā vaivasvatānvayaścāpi vatsaprīścaritaṃ tataḥ  NarP khanitrasya tataḥ proktā kathā puṇyā mahātmanaḥ avikṣiccaritaṃ caiva kimicchavratakīrttanam  NarP nariṣyantasya caritaṃ sauvarṇakarisaṃyutam kārtikyāṃ dvijavaryāya sa labhendbrahmaṇaḥ padam  NarP śṛṇoti śrāvayedvāpi yaścānukramaṇīmimām mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇasya sa labhedvāñchitaṃ phalam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe NarP tatpañcadaśasāhasraṃ nānā caritamadbhutam paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpaharaṃ nṛṇām  NarP praśnaḥ pūrvaṃ purāṇasya kathā sarvāvatārajā sṛṣṭiprakaraṇaṃ cātha viṣṇupūjādikaṃ tataḥ  NarP agnikāryaṃ tataḥ paścānmantramudrādilakṣaṇam sarvadīkṣāvidhānaṃ ca abhiṣekanirūpaṇam  NarP lakṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalādīnāṃ kuśāpāmārjanaṃ tataḥ pavitrāropaṇavidhirdevālayavidhistataḥ  NarP śālagrāmādipūjā ca svāryabhuvaḥ purā  NarP sa māṃ praṇamya papraccha dharmaṃ sarvāthasādhakam ahaṃ tasmai tadā prītaḥ prāvocaṃ dharmasaṃhitām  NarP purāṇānāṃ yadā vyāso vyāsaṃ caktre mahāmatiḥ tadā tāṃ saṃhitāṃ sarvāṃ dvyuttaraśatatamo dhyāyaḥbrahmovācaśṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi vārāhaṃ vai purāṇakam bhāgadvayayutaṃ śaśvadviṣṇumāhātmyasūcakam  NarP mānavasya tu kalpasya prasaṃgaṃ matkṛtaṃ purā nibabandha purāṇe tatpaścācchrāddhakalpa udīritaḥ  NarP mahātapasa ākhyānaṃ gauryutpattistataḥ parā vināyakasya nāgānāṃ senānyādityayorapi  NarP gaṇānāṃ ca tathā devyā dhanadasya vṛṣasya ca ākhyānaṃ satyatapaso vratākhyānasamanvitam  NarP agastyagītā tatpaścādrudragītā prakīrtitā mahiṣāsuravidhvaṃsamāhātmyaṃ ca triśaktijam  NarP parvādhyāyastataḥ śvetopākhyānaṃ gopradānikam ityādi kṛtavṛttāntaṃ prathame darśitaṃ mayā  NarP bhagavaddharmake paścādvatatīrthakathānakam dvātriṃśadaparādhānāṃ prāyaścittaṃ śarīragam  NarP tīrthānāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ māhātmyaṃ pṛthagīritam mathurāyā viśeṣeṇa śrāddhādīnāṃ vidhistataḥ  NarP varṇanaṃ yamalokasya ṛṣiputraprasaṃgataḥ vipākaḥ karmaṇāṃ caiva viṣṇuvratanirūpaṇam  NarP gokarṇasya ca māhātmyaṃ kīrtitaṃ pāpanāśanam ityevaṃ pūrvabhāgo yaṃ purāṇasya nirūpitaḥ  NarP uttare pravibhāge tu pulastyakururājayoḥ saṃvāde sarvatīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ vistarātpṛthak  NarP aśeṣadharmāścākhyātāḥ pauṣkaraṃ puṇyaparva ca ityevaṃ tava vārāhaṃ proktaṃ pāpavināśanam  NarP paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva bhagavadbhaktivardhanam kāñcanaṃ garuḍa kṛtvā tiladhenusamanvitam  NarP likhitvaitacca yo dadyāccaitryāṃ viprāya bhaktitaḥ sa labhedvaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma devarṣigaṇavanditaḥ  NarP yo vānukramaṇīmentāṃ śṛṇotyapi paṭhatyapi so pi bhaktiṃ labhedviṣṇau saṃsārocchedakāriṇīm  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vārāhapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma tryuttaraśatatamo dhyāyaḥbrahmovācaśṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ skandasaṃjñakam yasminpratipadaṃ sākṣānmahādevo vyavasthitaḥ  NarP purāṇe śatakoṭo tu yacchaivaṃ varṇitaṃ mayā lakṣaṃ tasyārthaṃ jātasya sāro vyāsena kīrtitaḥ  NarP skandāhvayastatra khaṇḍāḥ saptaiva parikalpitāḥ ekāśītisahasraṃ tu skāndaṃ sarvoghakṛtaṃnam  NarP yaḥ śṛṇoti paṭhedvāpi sa tu sākṣācchivaḥ sthitaḥ yatra māheśvarā dharmāḥ ṣaṇmukhena prakāśitāḥ  NarP kalpe tatpuruṣe vṛttāḥ sarvasiddhividhāyakāḥ tasya māheśvaraścātha khaṇḍaḥ pāpapraṇāśanaḥ  NarP kiñcinnyūnārkasāhasro bahupuṇyo bṛhatkathaḥ sucaritraśatairyuktaḥ yugadharmānukathanaṃ vyāsajaiminikīrtanam vārāṇasyāśca māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya tataḥ param  NarP trailokyavarṇanaṃ caiva vedaśākhānirūpaṇam uttare syā vibhāge tu purā gītaiśvarī tataḥ  NarP vyāsagītā
