varṇānāṃ pṛthakvṛttirudāhṛtā pādasyāḥ prathame proktā brāhmaṇānāṃ vyavasthitiḥ  NarP sadā cāgatmikā vatsa bhogasaukhyavivarddhanī dvitīye kṣattriyāṇāṃ tu vṛttiḥ samyakprakīrtitā  NarP yayā tvāśritayā pāpaṃ vidhūyeha vrajeddivam tṛtīye vaiśyajātīnāṃ vṛttiruktā caturvidhā  NarP yayā caritayā samyaglabhe gatimuttamām caturthe syāstathā pāde śūdravṛttirudāhṛtā  NarP yayā saṃtuṣyati śrīśo nṛṇāṃ śreyovivarddhanaḥ pañcame syāstataḥ pāde vṛttiḥ saṃkarajoditā  NarP yayā caritayāpnoti bhāvinīṃ gatimuttamām ityeṣā pañcapadyuktā dvitīyā saṃhitā mune  NarP tṛtīyātroditā saurī nṝṇāṃ kāryavidhāyinī ṣoḍhā ṣaṭkarmasirddhi bodhayantī ca kāminām  NarP caturthīvaiṣṇavo nāma mokṣadā parikīrtitā catuṣpadī dvijātīnāṃ sākṣādbrahmasvarūriṇī  NarP tāḥ kramātṣaṭcaturdvīṣusāhasrāḥ parikīrtitāḥ  NarP etatkūrmapurāṇaṃ tu caturvargaphalapradam paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṝṇāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭagatipradam  NarP likhitvaitattu yo bhaktyā hemakūrmasamanvitam brāhmaṇāyā yane dadyātsa yāti paramāṃ gatim  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde kūrmaparāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍuttaraśatatamo dhyāyaḥbrahmovācaatha mātsyaṃ purāṇaṃ te pravakṣye dvijasattama yatroktaṃ saptakalpānāṃ vṛttaṃ saṃkṣipya bhūtale  NarP vyāsena vedaviduṣā nārasiṃhopavarṇane upakramya taduddiṣṭaṃ caturddaśasahasrakam  NarP manumatsyasusaṃvādo brahmāṇḍakathanaṃ tataḥ brahmadevāsurotpattirmārutotpattireva ca  NarP madanadvādaśī tadvallokapālābhipūjanam manvantarasamuddeśo vaiśyarājyābhivarṇanam  NarP sūryavaivasvatotpattirbudhasaṃgamanaṃ tathā pitṛvaṃśānukathanaṃ śraddhākālastathaiva ca  NarP pitṛtīrthapracāraśca somotpattistathaiva ca kīrtanaṃ somavaṃśasya yayāticaritaṃ tathā  NarP pitṛvaṃśānukathanaṃ sṛṣṭavaṃśānukīrtanam bhṛguśāpastathā viṣṇordaśadhā janmane kṣitau  NarP kīrttanaṃ pūruvaṃśasya vaṃśo hautāśanaḥ param kriyāyogastataḥ paścātpurāṇaparikīrtanam  NarP vrataṃ nakṣatrapuruṣaṃ mārtaṇḍaśayanaṃ tathā kṛṣṇāṣṭamīvrataṃ tadvadrohiṇīcandrasaṃjñitam  NarP taḍāgavidhi māhātmyaṃ pādapotsarga eva ca saubhāgyaśayanaṃ tadvadagastyavratameva ca  NarP tathānantatṛtīyāyā rasakalyāṇinīvratam tathaivānaṃ dakaryāśca vrataṃ sārasvataṃ punaḥ  NarP uparāgābhiṣekaśca saptamīśanaṃ tathā bhīmākhyā dvādaśī tadvadanaṅgaśayanaṃ tathā  NarP aśūnyaśayanaṃ tadvattathaivāṅgārakavratam saptamīsaptakaṃ tadvadviśokadvādaśīvratam  NarP merupradānaṃ daśadhā grahaśāntistathaiva ca grahasvarūpakathanaṃ tathā śivacaturdaśī  NarP tathā sarvaphalatyāgaḥ sūryavāravrataṃ tathā saṃkrāntisnapanaṃ tadvadvibhūtidvādaśīvratam  NarP ṣaṣṭīvratānāṃ māhātmyaṃ tathā snānavidhikamaḥ prayāgasya tu māhātmyaṃ dvīpalokānuvarṇanam  NarPtathāntarikṣacāraśca dhruvamāhātmyameva ca bhavanāni suredrāṇāṃ tripurodyotanaṃ tathā  NarP pitṛpravaramāhātmyaṃ manvantaravinirṇayaḥ caturyugasya saṃbhūtiryugadharmanirūpaṇam  NarP vajrāṅgasya tu saṃbhūti stārakotpattireva ca tārakāsuramāhātmyaṃ brahmadevānukīrtanam  NarP pārvatīsaṃbhavastadvattathā śivatapovanam anaṅgadehadāhaśca ratiśokastathaiva ca  NarP gaurītapovanaṃ tadvacchivenātha prasādanam pārvatīṛṣisaṃvādastathairodvāhamaṅgalam  NarP kumārasaṃbhavastadvatkumāravijayastathā tārakasya vadho ghoro narasiṃhopavarṇanam  NarP padmodbhavavisargastu tathaivāndhakaghātanam vārāṇasyāstu māhātmyaṃ narmadāyāstathaiva ca  NarP pravarānukramastadvatpitṛgāthānukīrtanam tathobhayamukhīdānaṃ dānaṃ kṛṣṇājinasya ca  NarP tataḥ sāvitryupākhyānaṃ rājadharmāstathaiva ca vividhotpātakathanaṃ grahaṇāntastathaiva ca  NarP yātrānimittakathanaṃ svapnamaṅgalakīrtane vāmanasya tu māhātmyaṃ vārāhasya tataḥ param  NarP samudramathanaṃ tadvatkālakūṭābhiśāntanam devāsuravimardaśca vāstuvidyā tathaiva ca  NarP pratimālakṣaṇaṃ tadvaddevatāyatanaṃ tathā prāsādalakṣaṇaṃ tadvanmaṇḍapāna ca lakṣaṇam  NarP bhaviṣyarājñāmuddeśo mahādānānukīrtanam kalpānukīrtanaṃ tadvatpurāṇe sminprakīrtitam  NarP pavitrametatkalyāṇamāyuḥ kīrtivivarddhanam yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ  NarP likhitvaitattu yo dadyāddhemamatsyagavānvitam viprāyābhyarcya viṣuve sa yāti paramaṃ padam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde matsyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo dhyāyaḥbrahmovācamarīce śṛṇu vakṣyābhi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham garuḍāyābravītpṛṣṭo bhagavāngaruḍāsanaḥ  NarP ekonaviṃśasāhasraṃ tārkṣyakalpakathānvitam purāṇopakramapraśnaḥ sargaḥ saṃkṣepatastataḥ  NarP sūryādipūjanavidhirdīkṣāvidhirataḥ param śrāddhapūjā tataḥ paścānnavavyūhārcanaṃ dvija  NarP pūjāvidhānaṃ ca tathā vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ tataḥ yogādhyāyastato viṣṇornāmasāhasrakīrtanam  NarP dhyānaṃ viṣṇostataḥ sūryapūjā mṛtyuñjayārcanam mālāmantraḥ śivārcātha gaṇapūjā tataḥ param  NarP gopālapūjā trailokyamohanaśrīdharārcanam viṣṇvarcā pañcatattvārcā cakrārcā devapūjanam  NarP nyāsādisaṃdhyopāstiśca durgārcātha surārcanam pūjā māheśvarī cātaḥ pavitrāropaṇārcanam  NarP mūrtidhyāṃnavāstumānaṃ prāsādānāṃ ca lakṣaṇam pratiṣṭhā sarvadevānāṃ pṛthakpūjā vidhānataḥ  NarP yogo ṣaṭāṅgo dānadharmāḥ prayaścittavidhikriyā dvīpeśanarakākhyānaṃ sūryavyūhaśca jyotiṣam  NarP sāmudrikaṃ svarajñānaṃ navaratnaparīkṣaṇam māhātmyamatha tīrthānāṃ gayāmāhātmyamuttamam  NarP tato manvantarākhyānaṃ pṛthakpṛthagvibhāgaśaḥ pitrākhyānaṃ varṇadharmā dravyaśuddhiḥ samarpaṇam  NarP śrāddhaṃ vināyakasyārcā grahayajñastathaā śramāḥ jananākhyaṃ pretaśaucaṃ nītiśāstraṃ vratoktayaḥ  NarP sūryavaṃśaḥ somavaṃśo vatārakathanaṃ hareḥ rāmāyaṇaṃ harervaṃśo bhāratākhyānakaṃ tataḥ  NarP āyurvedanidānaṃ prāk cikikatsā dravyajā guṇāḥ rogaghnaṃ kavacaṃ viṣṇorgāruḍaṃ traipuro manuḥ  NarP praśnacūḍāmaṇiścānto hayāyurvedakīrtanam oṣaghīnāma kathanaṃ tato vyākaraṇohanam  NarP chandaḥ śāstraṃ sadācārastataḥ snānavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ tarpaṇaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca saṃdhyā pārvaṇakarma ca  NarP nityaśrāddhaṃ sarpiḍākhyaṃ dharmasāro ghaniṣkṛtiḥ pratisaṃkrama uktāḥ sma yugadharmāḥ kṛteḥ phalam  NarP yogaśāstraṃ viṣṇubhaktirnamaskṛtiphalaṃ hareḥ māhātmyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ cātha nārasiṃhastavottamam  NarP jñānāmṛtaṃ guhuṣṭakaṃ stotraṃ viṣṇvarcanāhvayam vedāntasāṃkhyasiddhānto brahmajñānaṃ tathālmakam  NarP gītāsāraḥ phalotkīrtiḥ pūrvakhaṇḍo yamīritaḥ athāsyaivottare khaṇḍe pretakalpaḥ puroditaḥ  NarP yatra tārkṣyeṇa saṃpṛṣṭo bhagavānāha vāḍavāḥ dharmaprakaṭanaṃ pūrvaṃ yogināṃ gatikāraṇam  NarP dānādikaṃ phalaṃ cāpi proktamantrorddhadaihikam yamalokasthamārgasya varṇana ca taḥ param  NarP ṣoḍaśaśrāddhaphalako vṛttāntaścātra varṇitaḥ niṣkṛtiryamamārgasya dharmarājasya vaibhavam  NarP pretapīḍāṃvinirddeśaḥ pretacihnanirūpaṇam pretānāṃ caritākhyānaṃ kāraṇaṃ pretatāṃ prati  NarP pretakṛtyavicāraśca sarpiḍīkaraṇoktayaḥ pretatvamokṣaṇākhyānaṃ dānāni ca vimuktaye  NarP āvaśyakottamaṃ dānaṃ pretasaukhyakarohanam śārīrakavinirdeśo yamalokasya varṇanam  NarP pretatvoddhārakathanaṃ param  NarP vṛṣṇivaṃśānukathanaṃ sagarasyātha saṃbhavaḥ bhārgavasyānucaritaṃ pitṛkāryavadhāśrayam  NarP sagarasyātha caritaṃ bhārgavasya kathā punaḥ devāsurāhavakathā kṛṣṇāvirbhāvavarṇanam  NarP sminprāvartayadanuttamam ya idaṃ kīrtayedvatsa śṛṇoti ca samāhitaḥ  NarP sa vidhūyeha pāpāni yāti lokamanāmayam likhitvaitatpurāṇaṃ tu svarṇasiṃhāsanasthitam  NarP vastreṇācchāditaṃ yastu brāhmaṇāya kathayedvā vidhānena neha bhūyaḥ sa jāyate  NarP sūtrametatpurāṇānāṃ yanmayoktaṃ tavādhunā tannityaṃ śīlanīyaṃ hi purāṇaphalamicchatā  NarP na dāṃbhikāya pāpāya devagurvanusūyave deyaṃ kadāpi sādhūnāṃ krameṇa devebhyaḥ pūjā kāryā pṛthakpṛthak  NarP kṛtvoṅkāra namaskāraṃ kuśodakatilākṣataiḥ savastraṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca tato dadyāddijātaye  NarP dakṣiṇāṃ vedaviduṣe vratasaṃpūrtihetave evaṃ pūjāviśeṣeṇa divasodaye  NarP devodyānabhavaṃ hṛdyaṃ karavīraṃ samarcayet raktatanturīdhānaṃ gandhadhūpavilepanaiḥ  NarP prarūḍhasaptadhānyaiśca nāragairbījapūrakaiḥ abhyukṣyākṣatatoyena mantreṇetthaṃ kṣamāpayet vatsarānvai kṛtyā bhavedbhūmipatirdvijendra surūparūpo rigaṇapratāpī dharmābhirāmo nṛpavargamukhyaḥ  NarP rādhaśukladvitīyāyāṃ brahmaṇaṃ viṣṇurūpiṇam samarcya saptadhānyānyāḍhyakuṃbhopari vidhānataḥ  NarP viṣṇulokamavāpnoti bhuktvā bhogānmanoramān jyeṣṭhaśukladvitīyāyāṃ bhāskaraṃ bhuvanādhipam  NarP catuvaktrasvarūpaṃ ca samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ bhojayitvā dvijān bhaktyā bhāskaraṃ lokamāpnuyāt  NarP āṣāḍhasya site pakṣe dvitīyā puṇyasaṃyutā tasyāṃ rathaṃ samāropya rāmaṃ saha subhadrayā  NarP dvijādibhirvratī sārdhaṃ parikramya purādikam jalāśayāntikaṃ gatvā kārayecca mahotsavam  NarP tadante mārgaśukladvitīyāyāṃ śrāddhena pitṛpūjanam ārogyaṃ labhate cāpi putrapautrasamanvayaḥ  NarP pauṣaśukladvitīyāyāṃ gośṛṅgodakamārjanam sarvakāmapradaṃ nṝṇāmāste bālendudarśanam  NarP yorghyadānena evamabhyarcya deveśaṃ martyo vyādhivivarjitaḥ dhanadhānyasamāyukto jīvedvirṣaśataṃ dhruvam  NarP yadvidhānaṃ dvitīyāsu śuklapakṣagatāsu vā proktaṃ tadeva kṛṣṇāsu karttavyaṃ vidhikovidaiḥ  NarP vahnireva pṛthaṅmāḥsu nānārūpavapurddharaḥ pūjyate hi dvitīyāsu brahmacaryyādi pūrvavat  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsadvitīyāvratanirūpaṇaṃ NarP etadvrataprabhāveṇa bhuktvā bhogānmanoramān devīlokaṃ samāsādya modate ca tayā saha  NarP pauṣaśuklatṛtīyāyāṃ brahmagaurīvrataṃ caret pūrvoktena vidhānena pūjitāpi dvijottama  NarP brahmagaurīprasādena modate tatra saṃgatā māghaśuklatṛtīyāyāṃ pūjyā saubhāgyasuṃdarī  NarP pūrvoktena vidhānena nālikerārghyadānataḥ prasannā diśati svīyaṃ lokaṃ tu vratatoṣitā  NarP phaālgunasya site pakṣe tṛtīyā kulasaukhyadā pūjitā gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ sarvamaṅgaladā bhavet  NarP sarvāsu ca tṛtīyāsu vidhiḥ sādhāraṇo mune devīpūjā viprapūjā dānaṃ homo visarjanam  NarP ityevaṃ kathitānīha tṛtīyāyā vratāni te bhaktyā kṛtāni ceṣṭāṃstu kāmāndardyumanogatān  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsatṛtīyāvratakathanaṃ nāma dvādaśādhikaśatatamo dhyāyaḥsanātana uvācaśṛṇu vipraṃ pravakṣyāmi caturthyāste vratānyaham yāni kṛtvā narā nāryo bhīṣṭānkāmānavāpnuyuḥ  NarP caitramāsacaturthyāṃ tu vāsudevasvarūpiṇam gaṇapaṃ samyagabhyarcya dattvā kāñcanadakṣiṇām  NarP viprāya viṣṇulokaṃ tu gaccheddevanamaskṛtaḥ vaiśākhasya caturthyāṃ tu prārthyaṃ saṃkarṣaṇāhvayam  NarP gṛhasthadvijamukhyebhyaḥ śaṅkhaṃ dattvā vidhānavit prāpya saṃkarṣaṇaṃ lokaṃ modate bahukalpakam  NarP jyeṣṭhamāsacaturthyāṃ tu prārcya pradyumnarūpiṇam phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca yuthebhyo dattvā svargaṃ labhennaraḥ  NarP āṣāḍhasya caturthyāṃ tu saṃprapūjyāniruddhakam yatibhyo lābupātrāṇi dattvābhīṣṭaṃ labhennaraḥ  NarP caturmūrtivratānyevaṃ kṛtvā dvādaśavatsaram udyāpanaṃ vidhānena kartavyaṃ phalamicchatā  NarP anyajjyeṣṭhacaturthyāṃ tu satīvratamanuttamam kṛtvā gaṇapatermāturloke modeta tatsamam  NarP tathāṣāḍhacaturthyāṃ tu vratamanyacchubhāvaham rathantarāhvakalpasya hyādibhūtaṃ dinaṃ yataḥ  NarP śraddhāpūtena manasā gaṇeśaṃ vidhinā naraḥ pūjayitvā labheccāpi phalaṃ devādidurgamam  NarP śrāvaṇasya caturthyāṃ tu jāti candrodaye mune  NarP gaṇeśāya pradadyācca hyarghyaṃ vidhividāṃvaraḥ lambodaraṃ caturbāhuṃ trinetraṃ raktavarṇakam  NarP nānāratnavibhūṣāḍhyaṃ prasannāsyaṃ vicintayet āvāhanādibhiḥ sarvairupacāraiḥ samarcayet  NarP naivedyaṃ modakaṃ dadyādgaṇeśaprītidāyakam evaṃ vrataṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā modakameva ca  NarP sukhaṃ svapyānniśāyāṃ tu bhūmāveva kṛtārcanaḥ vratasyāsya prabhāveṇa kāmānmanasi cintitān  NarP labdhvā leke paraṃ cāpi gaṇeśapadamāpnuyāt nānena sadṛśaṃ cānyadvratamasti jagattraye  NarP tasmātkāryaṃ prayatnena sarvānkāmānabhīpsatā athāsminneva divase dūrvāgaṇapati vratam  NarP kecidicchanti devarṣe tadvidhānaṃ vadāmi te haimaṃ nirmāya gaṇapaṃ tāmrapātropari sthitam  NarP veṣṭitaṃ raktavastreṇa sarvatobhadramaṇḍale pūjayedraktakusumaiḥ patrikābhiśca pañcabhiḥ  NarP bilvapatramapāmārgaṃ śamī dūrvā haripriyā ābhiranyaśca kusumairabhyarcya phalamodakaiḥ  NarP ācāryāya vidhijñāya satkṛtya vinivedayet upahāraṃ prakalpyātha dadyādarghaṃ samudyate tataḥ saṃprārathya vighneśamūrtiṃ sopaskarāṃ mune  NarP ācāryāya vidhijñāya satkṛtya vinivedayet kṛtvaivaṃ pañca varṣāṇi samupāsya yathāvidhi  NarP bhuktveha bhogānakhilān lokaṃ gaṇapatervrajet atha bhādracaturthyāṃ tu bahulādhenusaṃjñakam  NarP pūjanī yo tra yatnena sraggandhayavasādibhiḥ tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya śaktaśceddānamācaret  NarP aśaktaḥ puretāṃ tu namaskṛtya visarjayet pañcābdaṃ vādaśābdaṃ vā ṣoḍaśābdamathāpi vā  NarP vrataṃ kṛtvā samudyāpya dhenuṃ dadyātpayasvinīm prabhāveṇa vratasyāsya bhuktvā bhogānmanoramān  NarP satkṛto devatāvṛndairgolokaṃ samavāpnuyāt atha śukla caturthyāṃ tu siddhavaināyakavratam  NarP āvāhanādibhiḥ sarvairupacāraiḥ samarcanam ekāgramānaso bhūtvā dhyāyetsiddhivināyakam  NarP ekadantaṃ śūrpakarṇaṃ gajavaktraṃ caturbhujam pāśāṅkuśadharaṃ devaṃ taptakāñcanasannibham  NarP ekaviṃśati patrāṇi caikaviṃśatināmabhiḥ samarpayedbhaktiyuktastāni nāmāni vai śṛṇu  NarP sumukhāya śamīpatraṃ gaṇādhīśāya bhṛṅgajam umāputrāya bailvaṃ tu dūrvāṃ gajamukhāya ca  NarP laṃbodarāya badarīṃ dhattūraṃ harasūnave śūrpakarṇāya tulasīṃ vakratuṇḍāya śiṃbijam  NarP guhāgrajāyāpāmārgamekadantāya bārhatam herambāya tu siṃdūraṃ catirhetre ca patrajam  NarP sarveśvarāyāgastyasya patraṃ prītivivarddhanam dūrvāyugmaṃ tato gṛhya gandhapuṣpākṣatairyutam  NarP pūjāṃ nivedayedbhaktiyukto modakapañcakam ācamayya namaskṛtya saṃprārthya ca visarjjayet  NarP vināyakasya pratimāṃ haimīṃ sopaskarāṃ mune nivedayecca gurave dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadet  NarP evaṃ kṛtārcano bhaktyā pañca varṣāṇi nārada upāsya labhate kāmānaihikāmuṣmikān śubhān  NarP asyāṃ caturthyāṃ śaśinaṃ na paśyecca kadācana paśyan mithyābhiśāpa tu labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ atha taddoṣanāśāya mantraṃ paurāṇikaṃ paṭhet  NarP siṃhaḥ prasenamamadhītsiṃho jāṃbavatā hataḥ sakumāraka mā rodīstava hyeṣa syamantakaḥ  NarP iṣaśuklacaturthyāṃ tu kaparddīśaṃ vināyakam  NarP pauruṣiṇa tu sūktena pūjayedupacārakaiḥ akāraṇānmuṣṭigatāṃstaṇḍulānsakaparddikān  NarP viprāya baṭave dadyādgandhapuṣpārcitāya ca taṇḍulā vaiśvadaivatyā haradaivatyamiśritāḥ  NarP kapardigaṇanātho sau prīyatāṃ taiḥ samarpitaiḥ caturthyāṃ kārtike kṛṣṇe karakākhyaṃ vrataṃ smṛtam  NarP strīṇāmevādhikāro tra tadvidhānamudīryate pūjayecca gaṇādhīśaṃ snātā strīsamalaṅkṛtā  NarP tadagre pūrṇapakvānnaṃ vinyasetkarakāndaśa samarpya devadevāya bhaktyā prayatamānasā  NarP devo me prīyatāmevamuccāryyātha samarpayet suvāsinībhyo viprebhyo yathākāmaṃ ca sādaram  NarP tataścandrodaye rātrau dattvārghaṃ vidhipūrvakam bhuñjīta miṣṭamannaṃ ca vratasya paripūrtaye  NarP yadvā kṣīreṇa karakaṃ pūrṇaṃ toyena vā mune sapūgākṣataratnāḍhyaṃ dvijāya pratipādayet  NarP etatkṛtvā vrataṃ nārī ṣoḍaśadvādaśābdakam upāyanaṃ vidhāyātha vratametadvisarjjayet  NarP yāvajjīvaṃ tu vā nāryā kāryyaṃ saubhāgyavāñchayā vratenānena sadṛśaṃ strīṇāṃ saubhāgyadāyakam  NarP vidyate bhuvaneṣvanyattasmānnityamiti sthitiḥ ūrjjaśuklacaturthyāṃ tu nāgavratamudāhṛtam  NarP prātarvrataṃ tu saṃkalpya dhenuśṛñjagalaṃ śuci pītvā snātvātha madhyāhne śaṅkhapālādipannagān  NarP śeṣaṃ cāhvāmapūrvaistu pūjayedupacārakaiḥ kṣīreṇāpyāyanaṃ kuryādetannāgavrataṃ smṛtam  NarP evaṅkṛte tu viprendra nṛbhirnāgavrate śubhe viṣāṇi naśyantyacirānna daśanti ca pannagāḥ  NarP mārgaśuklacaturthyāṃ tu varṣaṃ yāvanmunīśvarā kṣapayedekabhaktena naktenātha dvitīyakam  NarP ayācitopavāsābhyāṃ tṛtīyakacaturthake evaṃ krameṇa vidhivaccatvāryabdāni mānavaḥ  NarP samāpya ca tato syānte vratasnāto mahāvratī kārayeddhemaghaṭitaṃ bhūgaṇermūṣakaṃ ratham  NarP aśakto varṇakaireva śubhraṃ cābjaṃ supatrakam tasyopari ghaṭaṃ sthāpya tāmrapātreṇa saṃyutam  NarP pūrayettaṇḍalaiḥ śubhraistasyopari gaṇeśvaram nyasedvastrayugācchannaṃ gandhādyaiḥ pūjayecca tam  NarP naivedyaṃ modakaṃ kalpyaṃ gaṇeśaḥ prīyatāmiti jāgarairśītavādyādyaiḥ purāṇākhyānakaiścaret  NarP prabhāte vimale snātvā homaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ tilavrīhiyavaśvetasurṣapājyaiḥ sakhaṇḍakaiḥ  NarP gaṇo gaṇādhipaścaiva kūṣmāṇḍastripurāntakaḥ laṃbodaraikadantau ca rukmadaṃṣṭraśca vighnapaḥ  NarP brahmā yamo tha varuṇaḥ somasūryahutāśanāḥ gandhamādī parameṣṭhītyevaṃ ṣoḍaśanāmabhiḥ  NarP praṇavādyairṅeṃnamoṃtaiḥ pratyekaṃ dahane hunet vakratuṇḍeti ṅeṃtena barmāntenāṣṭayukchatam  NarP tato vyāhṛtibhiḥ śaktyā hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret dikpālānpūjayitvā ca brāhmaṇānbhojayettataḥ  NarP catutviṃśatisaṃkhyākān modakaiḥ pāyasaistathā savatsāṃ gāṃ tato dadyādācāryāya sadakṣiṇām  NarP anyobhyo pi yathāśakti bhūyasīṃ ca tato dadet praṇamya dakṣiṇīkṛtya pravisṛjya dvijottamām  NarP bandhubhiḥ saha bhuñjīta svayaṃ ca prītamānasaḥ etadvrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā bhuktvā bhogānihottamān  NarP sāyujyaṃ labhate viṣṇorgaṇeśasya prasādataḥ kecidvaravrataṃ nāma prāhuretasya nārada  NarP vidhānametadevāpi phalaṃ cāpīha tatsamam pauṣamāsacaturthyāṃ tu vighneśaṃ prārthya bhaktitaḥ  NarP vipraikaṃ bhojayeccaivaṃ modakairdakṣiṇāṃ dadet evaṃ kṛte mune bhūyādvratī saṃpattibhājanam  NarP māghakṛṣṇacaturthyāṃ tu saṃkaṣṭavratamucyate tatropavāsaṃ saṃkalpya vratī niyamapūrvakam  NarP candrodayamabhivyāpya tiṣṭhetprayatamānasaḥ tataścandrodaye prāpte mṛnmayaṃ gaṇanāyakam  NarP vidhāya vinyasetpīṭhe sāyudhaṃ ca savāhanam upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ  NarP modakaṃ cāpi naivedyaṃ saguḍaṃ tilakuṭṭakam tatorghyaṃ tāmraje pātre raktacandanamiśritam  NarP sakuśaṃ ca sadūrvaṃ ca puṣpākṣatasamanvitam saśamīpatradadhi ca kṛtvā candrāya dāpayet  NarP gaganārṇavamāṇikya candra dākṣāyaṇīpate gṛhāṇārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ gaṇeśapratirūpaka  NarP evaṃ dattvā gaṇeśāya divyārghyaṃ pāpanāśanam śaktyā saṃbhojya viprāgryānsvayaṃ bhuñjīta cājñayā  NarP evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saṃkaṣṭākhyaṃ śūbhāvaham samṛddho dhanadhānyaiḥ bhoktavyaṃ bandhubhiḥ saha  NarP idaṃ gaurīvrataṃ vipra saubhāgyārogyavarddhanam prativarṣaṃ prakarttavyaṃ nārībhiśca naraistathā  NarP ḍhuṇḍhivrataṃ paraiḥ proktaṃ kaiścitkuṇḍavrataṃ smṛtam tilaṣiṣṭairdvijān bhojya svayaṃ cāśnīta mānavaḥ  NarP gaṇeśārādhanaparo dānahomaprapūjanaiḥ tilaireva kṛtaiḥ siddhiṃ prāpnuyāttatprasādataḥ  NarP sauvarṇaṃ gajavaktraṃ ca kṛtvā saṃpūjya yatnataḥ dvijāgryāya pradātavyaṃ sarvasaṃpatsamṛddhaye  NarP yasminkasminbhavenmāsi caturthī ravivārayuk sāṃgārakā vā viprendra sā viśeṣaphalapradā  NarP sarvāsu ca caturthīṣu śuklāsvapyasitāsu ca vighneśa eva deveśaḥ saṃpūjyo bhaktitatparaiḥ  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādśanāsa caturthīvratānirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayodaśādhikasatatamo dhyāyaḥsanātana uvācaśṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi pañcamyāste vratānyaham yāni bhaktyā samāsthāya sarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt  NarP proktā matsyajayantī tu pañcamī madhuśuklagā asyāṃ matsyāvatārārcā bhaktaiḥ kāryā mahotsavā  NarP śrīpañcamīti caiṣoktā tatra kāryaṃ śriyorcanam gandhādyairupacāraistu naivedyaiḥ pāyasādibhiḥ  NarP yo lakṣmīṃ pūjayeccātra taṃ vai lakṣmīrna muñcati pṛthvīvrataṃ tathā cāndraṃ hayagarīvavrataṃ tathā  NarP kāryaṃ sarvakāmaphalāvāptirbhavedvai viprabhojanaiḥ athāṣāḍhasya pañcamyāṃ vāyuṃ sarvagataṃ mune  NarP grāmādbahirvinirgatya dharopasthe samāstitaḥ dhvajaṃ ca pañcavarṇaṃ tu vaṃśadaṇḍāgrasaṃsthitam  NarP samucchritaṃ nidadhyāttu kalpitābje tu madhyataḥ tatastanmūladeśe tu dikṣu sarvāsu nārada  NarP lokapālānsamabhyarcya kuryādvāyuparīkṣaṇam prathamādiṣu yāmeṣu yo yo vāyuḥ pravartate  NarP tasmai jāyate tasyāṃ rātrau yāme caturthake sa eva bhavitā nūnaṃ svapna ityāha vai śivaḥ  NarP aśubhe tu samutpanne śivapūjāparāyaṇaḥ sopavāso nayedaṣṭayāmaṃ taddinameva vā  NarP bhojayitvā dvijānaṣṭau tataḥ kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ nāgān kṣīreṇa tarpayet  NarP yastasyāsaptamaṃ yāvatkulaṃ sarpātsunirbhayam bhādrasya śuklapañcamyāṃ pūjayedṛṣisattamān  NarP prātarnadyādike snātvā kṛtvā nityamatandritaḥ gṛhamāgatya cādyāttadeva hi  NarP anena vidhinā sapta varṣāṇi prativatsaram kṛtvā vratānte varayedācāryān sapta vaidikān  NarP pratimāḥ saptakurvīnta suvarṇena svaśaktitaḥ jaṭilāḥ sākṣasūtrāśca kamaṇḍalusamanvitāḥ  NarP saṃsthāpya kalaśeṣvetāṃstāmreṣu mṛnmayeṣu vā snāpayedvidhi vadbhaktyā pṛthakpañcāmṛtairapi  NarP upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhistataḥ saṃpūjya bhaktitaḥ arghyaṃ datvā tato homaṃ tilavrīhiyavādibhiḥ  NarP ṭhasahastomāiti ṛkhā nāmanantraistu vā pṛthak puṇyairmantraistathaivānyairhutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret  NarP tatastu sapta gā dadyādvastrālaṅkārasaṃyutāḥ ācāryaṃ pūjayejjaiva vastrālaṅkārabhūṣaṇaiḥ  NarP anujñayā guroḥ paścānmūrtīrvipreṣu cārpayet bhojayitvā tu tānbhaktyā praṇipatya visarjayet  NarP tataśceṣṭaiḥ sahāsīnaḥ svayaṃ brāhmaṇaśeṣitam bhuṅktvā vai ṣaḍrasopetaṃ pramudyātsaha bandhubhiḥ  NarP etatkṛtvā vrataṃ gāṅgaṃ bhogānbhuktvātha vāñchitān saptarṣīṇāṃ prasādena vimānavarago bhavet  NarP āśvine śuklapañcamyāmupāṅgalalitāvratam  NarP tasyāḥ svarṇamayīṃ mūrtiṃ śaktyā nirmāya nārada upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ pūjayettāṃ vidhānataḥ  NarP pakvānnaṃ phalasaṃyuktaṃ saghṛtaṃ dakṣiṇānvitam dvijavaryāya dātavyaṃ vratasaṃpūrtihetave  NarP savāhanā śaktiyutā varadā pūjitā mayā mātarmāmanugṛhyātha gamyatāṃ nijamandiram  NarP kārtike śuklapañcamyāṃ jayāvratamanuttamam kartavyaṃ pāpanāśāya śraddhayā dvijasattama  NarP pūjayitvā jayāṃ vipra yathāvidhi samāhitaḥ upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhistataḥ śuciralaṅkṛtaḥ  NarP vipraikaṃ bhojayeccāpi tasmai dattvā ca dakṣiṇām visarjayettataḥ paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ  NarP yastu vai bhaktisaṃyuktaḥ snānaṃ kuryāj jayādine naśyanti tasya pāpāni siṃhākrāntā mṛgā yathā  NarP yadaśvamedhāvabhṛthe phalaṃ snānena kīrtitam tatphalaṃ prāpyate viprasnānenāpi jayādine  NarP aputro labhate putraṃ vandhyā gabha ca vindati rogī rogātpramucyeta baddho mucyeta bandhanāt  NarP mārgaśukle ca pañcamyāṃ nāgāniṣṭvā vidhānataḥ nāgebhyo hyabhayaṃ labdhvā modate saha bāndhavaiḥ  NarP pauṣe pi śuklapañcamyāṃ sampūjya madhusūdanam labhate bāñchitānkāmānnātra kāryā vicāraṇā  NarP pañcamyāṃ pratimāse tu śukle kṛṣṇe ca nārada pitṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ śastaṃ nāgānāṃ cāpi sarvathā  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthapañcamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturdaśādhikaśatatamo dhyāyaḥsanātana uvācaśṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhyāścaiva vratāni te yāni samyagvidhāyātra labhaghetsarvānmanorathān  NarP caitramāse śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ kumāravratamuttamam tatreṣṭvā ṣaṇmukhaṃ devaṃ nānāpūjā vidhānataḥ  NarP putraṃ sarvaguṇopetaṃ prāpnuyāccirajīvinam vaiśākhaśuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca pūjayitvā ca kārtikam  NarP labhate mātṛjaṃ saukhyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā jyeṣṭhamāse śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ vidhineṣṭvā divākaram  NarP labhate vāñchitānkāmāṃstatprasādānna saṃśayaḥ āṣāḍhaśuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ vai skandavratamanuttamam  NarP upoṣya pūjayitvainaṃ śivomāpriyamātmajam labhate bhīpsitānkāmānputrapautrādisaṃtatīḥ  NarP śrāvaṇe śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu śarajanmānamarcayet upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirbhaktyā paramayānvitaḥ  NarP labhate bhīpsitānarthānṣaṇmukhasya prasādataḥ bhādramāse kṛṣṇaṣaṣṭyāṃ lalitāvratamucyate  NarP prātaḥ snātvā vidhānena nārī śuklāmbarāvṛtā śuktamālyayadharā vāpi nadyāḥ saṃgamavālukām  NarP gṛhītvā vaṃśapātre tu dhṛtvā piṇḍākṛtiṃ ca tām pañcadhā lalitāṃ tatra dhyāyedvanavilāsinīm  NarP paṅkajaṃ karavīraṃ ca nepālīṃ mālatīṃ tathā nīlotpalaṃ ketakīṃ ca saṃgṛhya tagaraṃ tathā  NarP ekaikāṣṭaśataṃ grāhyamaṣṭāviṃśatireva ca akṣatāḥ kalikā gṛhya tābhirdevīṃ prapūjayet  NarP prārthayedagrataḥ sthitvā devīṃ tāṃ giriśapriyām gaṅgādvāre kuśāvartte vilvake nīlaparvate  NarP snātvā kanakhale devi harariṃ labdhavatī patim lalite subhagaṃ devi sukhasaubhāgyadāyini  NarP anataṃ dahi saubhāgyemahyaṃ tubhyaṃ namo namanaḥ mantreṇānena kusumaiśvaṃpakasya suśobhanaiḥ  NarP abhyarcya vidhivattasyā navaidyaṃ purato nyaset trapuṣairapi kūṣmāṇḍairnālikeraiḥ sudāḍimaiḥ  NarP bījapūraiḥ sutuḍīraiḥ kāravallaiḥ sacirbhaṭaiḥ phalaistatkālasaṃbhūtaiḥ kṛtvā śobhāṃ tadagrataḥ  NarP virūḍhadhānyāṅkurakaiḥ sudīpāvalibhistathā sāddhai sargaṇakaidhūpaḥ sauhālakakarañjakaiḥ  NarP guḍapuṣpaiḥ karṇaveṣṭaḍairmodakairupamodakaiḥ bahuprakārairnaivedyairyathā vibhavasārataḥ  NarP evamabhyarcya vidhivadrātrau jāgaraṇotsavam gītavādyanaṭairnṛtyaiḥ prokṣaṇīyairanekadhā  NarP sakhībhiḥ sahitā sādhvī tāṃ rātriṃ prasabhaṃ nayet na ca saṃmīlayennetre nārīyāmacatuṣṭayam  NarP durbhagā duṣkṛtā vandhyā netrasaṃmīlanādbhavet evaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saptamyāṃ saritaṃ nayet  NarP gandhapuṣpaistathābhyarcya gītavādyapuraḥsaraiḥ tacca dadyāddvijendrāya naivedyādi dvijottama  NarP snātvā gṛhaṃ samāgatya hutvā vaiśvānaraṃ tataḥ devānpitṝnmanuṣyāṃśca pūjayitvā suvāsinīḥ  NarP kanyakāścaiva saṃbhojya brāhmaṇāndaśa pañca ca bhakṣyabhojyairbahuvidhairdatvā dānāni bhūriśaḥ  NarP lalitā me stu suprītā ityuktvā tānvisarjayet yaḥ kaścidācaredetadvrataṃ saubhāgyadaṃ param  NarP naro vā yadi vā nārī tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu yadvrataiśca tapobhiśca dānairvā niyamairapi  NarP tadeteneha labhyeta kiṃ bahūktena nārada mṛteranantaraṃ prāpya śivalokaṃ sanātanam  NarP modate lalitādevyā śaive vai sakhivacciram nabhasye māsi yā śuklā ṣaṣṭhī sā candanāhvayā  NarP tasyāṃ devīṃ samabhyarcya labhate tatsalokatām rohiṇī pātabhaumaistu saṃyutā kapilā bhavet  NarP tasyāṃ raviṃ samabhyarcya vratī niyamatatparaḥ labhate vāñchitānkāmānbhāskarasya prasādataḥ  NarP annadānaṃ japo homaṃ pitṛdevarṣitarpaṇam sarvamevākṣayaṃ jñeyaṃ kṛtaṃ devarṣisattama  NarP kapilāṃ dhenumabhyarcya vastramālyānule panaiḥ pradadyādvedaviduṣe dvādaśātmapratuṣṭaye  NarP atheṣuśuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu pūjyā kātyāyanī dvija gandhādyairmaṅgaladravyairnaivedyairvividhaistathā  NarP tataḥ kṣamāpya deveśīṃ praṇipatya visarjayet pūjyātra saikatī mūrtiryadvā dvijasatī mudā  NarP vastrālaṅkaraṇairbhavyaiḥ kātyāyinyāḥ pratuṣṭaye kanyā varaṃ prāpnuyācca vāñcitaṃ putramaṅganā  NarP kātyāyinīprasādādvai nātra kāryā vicāraṇā kārtike śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu ṣaṇmukhena mahātmanā  NarP devasenā mahābhāgā labdhā sarvusurārpitā atastasyāṃ suraśreṣṭhāṃ devasenāṃ ca ṣaṇmukham  NarP saṃpūjya nikhilaireva upacārairmanoharaiḥ prāpnuyādatulāṃ siddhiṃ manobhīṣṭāṃ dvijottama  NarP atraiva vahnipūjoktāṃ tāṃ ca sampaksamācaret vividhadravyahomaiśca vahnipūjāpuraḥ saram  NarP mārgaśīrṣe śaklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ nihatastārakāsuraḥ skandena satkṛtiḥ prāptā brahamādyaiḥ parikalpitā  NarP tato syāṃ pūjayetskandaṃ gandhapuṣpākṣataiḥ phalaiḥ vastrairābhūṣaṇaścāpi naivedyairvividhaistathā  NarP ravivāreṇa saṃyuktā tathā śatabhiṣānvitā yadi cetsā samuddiṣṭā caṃpāhvā munisattama  NarP tasyāṃ viśveśvaro devo draṣṭavyaḥ pāpanāśanaḥ pūjanīyo vedanīyaḥ smartavyaḥ saukhyamicchatā  NarP snānadānādikaṃ cātra sarvamakṣayyamucyate pauṣamāse śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ devo dinapatirdvija  NarP viṣṇurūpī jagattrātā pradurbhūtāḥ sanātanaḥ  NarP sa tasmātpūjanīyo syāṃ dravyairgandhapuraskṛtaiḥ naivedyairvasttrabhūṣādyaiḥ sarvasaukhyamabhīpsubhiḥ  NarP māghamāse sitā ṣaṣṭhī varuṇāhvā smṛtā tu sā tasyāṃ varuṇamabhyarcyedviṣṇurūpaṃ sanātanam  NarP raktairgandhāṃśukaiḥ puṣpairnaivedyairdhūpadīpakaiḥ evamabhyarcya vidhivadyadyaccābhilaṣennaraḥ  NarP tattacca phalato labdhvā modate tatprasādataḥ phaālgune śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu devaṃ paśupatiṃ dvija  NarP mṛnmayaṃ vidhinā kṛttvā pūjayedupacārakaiḥ saṃsnāpya śatarudreṇa pṛthakpañcāmṛtairjalaiḥ  NarP gandhairālipya suśvetairakṣataiḥ śvetapuṣpakaiḥ bilvapatraiśca dhattūrakusumaiśca phalaistathā  NarP sampūjya nānānaivedyairnīrājya vidhivattataḥ kṣamāpya praṇipatyainaṃ kailāsāya visarjayet  NarP evaṃ kṛta śivārcastu naro nāryathavā mune iha bhuktvā varānbhogānante śivagatiṃ labhet  NarP  iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitaṣaṣṭhīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśādhikaśatatamo dhyāyaḥ sanātana uvācaśṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi saptamyāste vratānyaham yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā sūryasāyujyamāpnuyāt  NarP caitre tu śuklasaptamyāṃ bahiḥ snānaṃ samācaret sthaṇḍile gomayālipte gauramṛttikayāstṛte  NarP likhitvāṣṭadalaṃ padmaṃ karṇikāyāṃ vibhāvam vinyasetpūrvapatre tu devau dvau kṛtadhātukau  NarP āgneyaṃ ca nyasenpatre gandharvauṃ kṛtakārakau dakṣiṇe ca nyasetpatre tathaiva rākṣasadvayam  NarP ākṛtau dvau nyasetpatre nairṛte munisattama kādraveyau mahānāgau paścime kṛtacārakau  NarP vāyavya yātudhānau dvau uttare ca ṛṣidvayam aiśānye vinyasetpatpe grahameko dvijottama  NarP teṣāṃ saṃpūjanaṃ kāryaṃ gandhamālyānulepanaiḥ dīpairdhūpaiḥ sanaivedyaistāṃbūlakramukādibhiḥ  NarP evaṃ saṃpūjya homaṃ tu ghṛtenāṣṭaśataṃ caret sūryasyāṣṭāṣṭa cānyeṣāṃ pradadyādāhutīḥ kramāt  NarP nāmamantreṇa vedyāṃ vā tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ dadet dakṣiṇā ca tato deyā dvijebhyaḥ śaktito dvija  NarP etatkṛtvā vidhaānaṃ tu sarvasaukhyamavāpnuyāt dehānte maṇḍalaṃ bhānorbhattvā gacchetparaṃ padam  NarP vaiśākhaśuklasaptamyāṃ jahnunā jāhnavī svayam krodhātpītā punastyaktā karṇarandhrāttu dakṣiṇāt  NarP tāṃ tatra pūjayetsnātvā pratyūṣe vimale jale gandhapuṣpākṣatādyaiśca sarvairevopacārakaiḥ  NarP tato ghaṭasahasraṃ tu deyaṃ gaṅgāvrate tvidam bhaktyā kṛtaṃ saptakulaṃ nayetsvargamasaṃśayaḥ  NarP kamalavratamapyatra proktaṃ tadvidhirucyate tilamātraṃ tu sauvarṇaṃ vidhāya kamalaṃ śubham  NarP vastrayugmāvṛtaṃ kṛtvā gandhadhūpādinārcayet namaste padmahastāya namaste viśvadhāriṇe  NarP divākara namastubhyaṃ prabhākara namo stu te iti saṃprārthya deveśaṃ sūrye cāstamupāgate  NarP sodakuṃbhaṃ tu tatpadmaṃ kapilāṃ ca dvijerpayet taddine tūpavastavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ ca pare hani  NarP saṃbhojya brāhmaṇānbhaktyā vratasākalyamāpnuyāt nibavrataṃ ca tatreva tadvidhānaṃ śṛṇuṣva me  NarP niṃbapatraiḥ smṛtā pūjā bhāskarasya dvijottama khakholkāyeti mantreṇa praṇavādyena nārada  NarP niṃbapatraṃ tato śnīyācchayedbhūmau ca vāgyataḥ dvijānpare hni saṃbhojya svayaṃ bhuñjīta bandhubhiḥ  NarP niṃbapatravrataṃ caitatkartṛāṇāṃ sarvasaukhyadam saptamī śarkarākhyaiṣā proktā taccāpi me śṛṇu  NarP amṛtaṃ pibato hastātsūryasyāmṛtabindavaḥ niṣpeturbhuvi cotpannāḥ śālimudgayavekṣavaḥ  NarP śarkarā ca tatastasmādikṣusārāmṛtopamā iṣṭā raverataḥ puṇyā śarkarā havyakavyayoḥ  NarP śarkarāsaptamī caiva vājimedhapalapradā sarvaduḥkhopaśamanī putrasaṃtativardhinī  NarP asyāntu śarkarādānaṃ śarkarābhojanaṃ tathā kartavyaṃ hi prayatnena vratame tadravipriyam  NarP yaḥ kuryātparāyā bhaktyā sa vai sadgatimāpnuyāt jyeṣṭhe tu śuklasaptamyāṃ jāta indro raviḥ svayam  NarP taṃ saṃpūjya vidhānena sopavāso jitendriyaḥ svargatiṃ labhate vipra devendrasya prasādataḥ  NarP āṣāḍhaśuklasaptamyāṃ vivasvānnāma bhāskaraḥ jātastaṃ tatra saṃprārcya gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ pṛthak  NarP labhate sūryasāyujyaṃ viprendrātra na saṃśayaḥ śrāvaṇe śuklasaptamyāmavyaṅgākhyaṃ vrataṃ śubham  NarP kārpāsaṃ tu caturhastaṃ sārddha vastraṃ hi gopateḥ pūjānte prītaye deyaṃ vratametacchubhāvaham  NarP yadi ceddhastayukteyaṃ tadā syātpāpanāśinī asyāṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvaṃ cākṣayyatāṃ vrajet  NarP bhādre tu śuklasaptamyāmamuktābharaṇavratam somasya tu maheśasya pūjanaṃ cātra kīrtitam  NarP gaṅgādibhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirupacāraiḥ samarcanam prārthya praṇamya visṛjetsarvakāmasamṛddhaye  NarP phalasaptamikā ceyaṃ tadvidhānamudīryate nālikeraṃ ca vṛntākaṃ nāraṅgaṃ bījapūrakam  NarP kūṣmāṇḍaṃ bṛhatīpūgamiti sapta phalāni vai mahādevasya purato vinyasyāparadorakam  NarP saptatantukṛtaṃ saptagranthiyuktaṃ dvijottama saṃpūjya parayā bhaktyā dhārayedvāmake kare  NarP strī naro dakṣiṇe caiva yāvadvarṣaṃ samāpyate saṃbhojya viprānsaptaiva pāyasena visṛjyasa tān  NarP svayaṃ bhuñjīta matimān vratasaṃpūrtihetave phalāni tāni deyāni saptasvapi dvijeṣu ca  NarP evaṃ tu sapta varṣāṇi kṛtvopāsya yathāvidhi sāyujyaṃ labhate vipra mahādevasya tadvratī  NarP āśvine śuklapakṣe tu vijñeyā śubhasaptamī tasyāṃ kṛtasnānapūjo vācayitvā dvijottamān  NarP ārabhya kapilāṅgāṃ ca saṃpūjya prārthayettataḥ tvāmahaṃ dadmi kalyāṇi prīyatāmaryamā svayam  NarP pālaya tvaṃ jagatkatsnaṃ yato si dharmasambhavā ityuktvā vedaviduṣe dattvā kṛtvā ca dakṣiṇām  NarP namaskṛtya svayaṃ vipra visṛjetprāśayetvaravayam pacagavyaṃ vrataṃ cetthaṃ vidhāya śvo dvijottamān  NarP bhojayitvā svayaṃ cādyāttadannaṃ dvijaśeṣitam kṛtaṃ hyetadgataṃ vipra subhāṣyaṃ śraddhayānvitaḥ  NarP devadevaprasādena bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt atha kārtikaśuklāyāṃ śākākhyaṃ saptamīvratam  NarP tasyāṃ tu saptaśākānisasvarṇakamalāni ca pradadyātsaptaviprebhyaḥ śākāhārastataḥ svayam  NarP dvitīye hni dvijānbhojya datvā tebhyo nnadakṣiṇām visṛjya bandhubhiḥ sārddhaṃ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ  NarP mārgasya sitasaptamyāṃ mitravratamudāhṛtam yadviṣṇordakṣiṇaṃ netraṃ tadeva kṛtavāniha  NarP adityāṃ kaśyapājjajñe mitro nāmā divākaraḥ ato syāṃ pūjanaṃ tasya yathoktavidhinā dvija  NarP kṛtvā dvijānbhojayitvā saptaiva madhurādinā suvarṇadakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam  NarP kṛtvaitadvidhinā lokaṃ sṛryyasya vrajati dhruvam dvijobrāhmaṃ tathā śūdraḥ satkulejanma cāpnuyāt  NarP pauṣasya śuklasaptamyāṃ vrataṃ cābhayasaṃjñitam upoṣya bhānuṃ triḥsandhyaṃ samabhyarcya dharāsthitaḥ  NarP kṣīrasiktānnasaṃbaddhaṃ modakaṃ prasthasaṃmitam dvijāya datvā bhojyānyānsaptāṣṭabhyaśca dakṣiṇām  NarP pṛthavī vā suvarṇaṃ vā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam abhayākhyaṃ vrataṃ tvetatsarvasyābhayadaṃ smṛtam  NarP mārtaṇḍākhyaṃ vrataṃ nāma kathayanti dvijāḥ pare ekameveti ca proktamekadaivatayā budhaiḥ  NarP māghe tu kṛṣṇasaptamyāṃ vrataṃ sarvāptisaṃjñakam samupoṣya dine tasminsampūjyādityabimbakam  NarP sauvarṇaṃ gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ kṛtvā rātrau ca jāgaram pare hni viprānsambhojya pāyasena tu sapta vai  NarP dakṣiṇāṃ nālikerāṇi tebhyo datvā guruṃ tataḥ sauvarṇaṃ tu raverbimbaṃ yuktaṃ dakṣiṇayā nyayā  NarP samarpya ca bhṛśaṃ prārthya visṛjyādyātsvayaṃ tataḥ etatsarvāptidaṃ nāma saṃproktaṃ sārvakāmikam  NarP vratasyāsya prabhāveṇa dvaitaṃ sidhyeddhi sarvathā māghasya śuklasaptamyāmacalākhyaṃ vrataṃ smṛtam  NarP trilocanajayantīyaṃ sarvapāpaharā smṛtā rathākhyā saptamī ceyaṃ cakravartitvadāyinī  NarP asyāṃ samarcya savituḥ pratimāṃ tu haimīṃ haimāśvayuktarathagāṃ tu dadetsahebhām yo bhāvabhaktisahitaḥ sa gato hi lokaṃ śambhoḥ sa modata ihāpi ca bhuktabhogaḥ  NarP bhāskarī saptamī ceyaṃ koṭibhāsvadgrahopamā aruṇodayavelāyāmasyāṃ snānaṃ vidhīyate  NarP arkasya ca badaryāśca sapta sapta dalāni vai nidhāya śirasi snāyātsaptajanmāghaśāntaye  NarP putrapradaṃ vrataṃ cātra prāhādityaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ yo māghasitaptamyāṃ pūjayenmāṃ vidhānataḥ  NarP tasyāhaṃ putratāṃ yāsye svāṃśena bhṛśatoṣitaḥ tasmājjitendriyo bhūtvā samupoṣya divāniśam  NarP pūjayedapare cāhni homaṃ kṛtvā dvijāṃ stataḥ dadhyodanena payasā pāyasena ca bhojayet  NarP anena vidhinā yamtu kurute putrasaptamīḥ labhate sa tu satputraṃ cirāyuṣamanāmayam  NarP tapasyaśuklasaptamyāṃ vratamarkapuṭaṃ caret arkapatrairyajedarkamarkapatrāṇi cāśnuyāt  NarP arkanāma japecchaśvaditthaṃ cārkapuṭavratam dhanadaṃ putradaṃ caitatsarvapāpapraṇāśanam  NarP trivargadāmiti pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitasappamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśādhikaśatatamo dhyāyaḥsanātana uvācaśuklāṣṭamyāṃ caitramāse bhavānyāḥ procyate janiḥ pradakṣiṇaśataṃ kṛtvā kāryo NarP mahāṣṭamīti ca proktā devyāḥ pūjāvidhānataḥ vaiśākhasya sitāṣṭamyāṃ samupoṣyātra vāriṇā  NarP snātvāparājitāṃ devīṃ māṃsībālakavāribhiḥ snāpayitvārcya gandhādyairnaivedyaṃ śarkarāmayam  NarP kuryānnaktabhojanam pakṣayorupavāsaṃ vā kaumārīṃ caṇḍikāṃ yajet  NarP evaṃ pāpaharāṃ gandhaiḥ puṣpairdhūpaiśca dīpakaiḥ naivedyairvividhaiścaiva kumārībhojanaistathā  NarP evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā kaumārīvratamuttamam sa vimānena gacchedvai devīlokaṃ sanātanam  NarP bhādre tu navamī śuklā nandāhvā parikīrtitā tasyāṃ yaḥ pūjayeddurgāṃ vidhivaccopacārakaiḥ  NarP so śvamedhaphalaṃ labdhvā viṣṇuloke mahīyate āśvine śuklanavamī mahāpūrvā prakīrtitā  NarP aparāhne śamīpūjā kāryāsyāṃ prāgdiśi dvija tato niśāyāṃ prāgyāme khaḍgaṃ dhanuriṣūngadām  NarP śūlaṃ śaktiṃ ca paraśuṃ chirikāṃ carma kheṭakam chatraṃ dhvajaṃ gajaṃ cāśva govṛṣaṃ pustakaṃ tulām  NarP daṇḍaṃ pāśaṃ cakraśaṅkhau gandhādyairupacārakaiḥ saṃpūjya mahiṣaṃ tatra bhadrakālyai samālabhet  NarP evaṃ baliṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā pakkānna meva ca dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ datvā vrataṃ tatra samāpayet  NarP evaṃ yaḥ pūjayeddurgāṃ nṝṇāṃ durgatināśinīm iha bhuktvā varānbhogānante svargatimāpnuyāt  NarP kārtike śuklanavamī yākṣayā sā prakīrtatā tasyāmaśvatthamūle vai tarppaṇaṃ samyagācaret  NarP devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ cāpi nārada svaśākhoktaistathā mantraiḥ sūryāyārghyaṃ tatorpayet  NarP tato dvijānbhojayitvā miṣṭānnena munūśvara svayaṃ bhuktvā ca vihareddvijebhyo dattadakṣiṇaḥ  NarP evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā japadānaṃ dvijārcanam homaṃ ca sarvamakṣayyaṃ bhavediti vidhervayaḥ  NarP mārge tu śuklanavamī nandinī parikīrtitā tasyāmupoṣito yastu jagadaṃbāṃ prapūjayet  NarP gandhādyaiḥ so śvamedhasya phalabhāṅnātra saṃśayaḥ pauṣe śuklanavamyāṃ tu mahāmāyāṃ prapūjayet  NarP ekabhaktaparo vipra vājapeyaphalāptaye māghamāse tu vā śuklā navamī lokapūjitā  NarP mahānandeti sā proktā sadānandakarī nṛṇām tasyāṃ snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ japo homa upoṣaṇam  NarP sarvamakṣayatāṃ yāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā phaālgunāmalapakṣasya navamī yā dvijottama  NarP ānandā sā mahāpuṇyā sarvapāpaharā smṛtā sopavāsorcayettatra yastvānandāṃ dvijottama  NarP sa labhedvāñchitānkāmānsatyaṃ satyaṃ mayoditam  NarP iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitanavamīvratakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśādhikaśatatamo dhyāyaḥsanātana uvācaatha te haṃ pravakṣyāmi daśamyā vai vratāni ca yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā dharmarājapriyo bhavet  NarP caitraśuklada śamyāṃ tu dharmarājaṃ prapūjayet tatkālasaṃbhavaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalairgandhādibhistathā  NarP sopavāso vaikabhakto bhojayitvā dvijottamān caturddaśatatastebhyaḥ śaktyā dadyācca dakṣiṇām  NarP evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra dharmarājaprapūjanam sa dharmasyājñayāgaccheddevaiḥ sādharmyamacyutaḥ  NarP daśamyāṃ mādhave śukle viṣṇumabhyarcya mānavaḥ gandhādyairupacāraiśca śvetapuṣpaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ  NarP śataṃ pradakṣiṇāḥ kṛtvā vipransaṃbhojya yatnataḥ labhate vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  NarP jyeṣṭhe śukladaśamyāṃ tu jāhnavī saritāṃ varā samāyātā dharāṃ svargāttasmātsā puṇyadā smṛtā  NarP jyeṣṭhaḥ śukladalaṃ hasto budhaśca daśamīḥ tithiḥ garānandavyatīpātāḥ kanyenduvṛṣabhāskarāḥ  NarP daśayogaḥ samākhyāto mahāpuṇyatamo dvija harate daśa pāpāni tasmāddaśaharaḥ smṛtaḥ  NarP asyāṃ yo jāhnavīṃ prāpya snāti saṃprītamānasaḥ vidhinā jāhnavītoye sa yāti harimandiram  NarP āṣāḍhaśukladaśamī puṇyā manvā dikaiḥ smṛtā tasyāṃ snānaṃ japo dānaṃ homo vā svargatipradāḥ  NarP śrāvaṇe śukladaśamī sarvāśāparipūrtidā asyāṃ śivārcanaṃ śastaṃ gandhādyai rupacārakaiḥ  NarP tatropavāso naktaṃ vā dvijānāṃ bhojanaṃ japaḥ hemno dāna ca dhenvādeḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam  NarP atho nabhasyaśuklāyāṃ daśamyāṃ dvijasattama vrataṃ daśāvatārākhyaṃ tatra snānaṃ jalāśaye  NarP kṛtvā saṃdhyādiniyamaṃ devarṣipitṛtarpaṇam tato daśāvatārāṇi samabhyarcetsa māhitaḥ  NarP matsyaṃ kūrmaṃ varāhaṃ ca narasiṃhaṃ trivikramam rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca bauddhaṃ kalkinameva ca  NarP daśamūrtistu sauvarṇīḥ pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ daśabhyo vipravaryebhyo dadyātsatkṛtya nārada  NarP upavāsaṃ caikabhaktaṃ kṛtvā saṃbhojya vāḍavān visṛjya paścādbhuñjīta svayaṃ sveṣṭaiḥ samāhitaḥ  NarP bhaktyā kṛtvā vrataṃ tvetadbhuktvā bhogānihottamān vimānena vrajedante viṣṇulokaṃ sanātanam  NarP āśvine śukladaśamī vijayā sā prakīrtitā caturgomayapiṇḍāni prātarnyasya gṛhāṅgaṇe  NarP cakravālasvarūpeṇa tanmadhye rāmalakṣmaṇau tathā bharataśatrughnau pūjayeccaturo pi hi  NarP sapidhānāsu pātrīṣu gomayīṣu catasṛṣṭa kinnaṃ dhānyaṃ saraupyaṃ tu dhṛtvā dhautāṃśukāvṛtam  NarP pitṛmātṛbhrātṛputrajāyā bhṛtyasamanvitam saṃpūjyaṃ gandhapuṣpādyairnaivedyaiśca vidhānataḥ  NarP namaskṛtyātha bhuñjīta dvijānsaṃbhojya pūjitān evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānaṃ tu naro varṣaṃ suravānvitaḥ  NarP dhanadhānyasamṛddhaśca niścitaṃ jāyate dvija athāpārāhnasamaye navamyāṃ saṃnimantritām  NarP pūrvadikṣu śamīṃ vipra gatvā tanmūlajāṃ mṛdam gṛhītvā svagṛhaṃ prāpya gītavāditraniḥsvanaiḥ  NarP saṃpūjya tāṃ vidhānena sajjīkṛtya svakaṃ balam nirgatya pūrvadvāreṇa grāmādbrahiranākulaḥ  NarP tataḥ śatrupratikṛtiṃ nirmitāṃ patrakādibhiḥ manasā kalpitāṃ vāpi svarṇaṃ puṃravaṃśareṇa vai  NarP vidhyediti bhṛśaṃ prītaḥ prāpnuyātsvagṛhaṃ niśi evaṃ kṛtavidhirvāpi gacchedvā śatrunigrahe  NarP eṣaivaṃ daśamī vipra vidhinācaritā sadā dhanaṃ jayaṃ sutān gāśca gajāśvaṃ vāpyajāvikam  NarP dadyādiha śarīrānte svargatiṃ cāpi nārada daśamyāṃ kārtike śukle sārvabhaumavrataṃ caret  NarP kṛtopavāso vaikāśī niśīthe pūpakādibhiḥ daśadikṣu baliṃ dadyād gṛhadvāpi purādbrahiḥ  NarP maṇḍale ṣṭadale kḷpte goviḍliptadharātale mantrairebhirdvijaśreṣṭha gaṇeśādikṛtārcanaḥ  NarP yo me pūrvagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā tamindro devarā jo dya nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP yo me vahnigataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā tejorājo tha vahnistaṃ nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP yo me dakṣagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā taṃ yamaḥ pretarājo vai nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP yo me nairṛtigaḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā rakṣorājo nairṛtistaṃ nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP yo me paścimagaḥ pāpmā pāpakenehakarmaṇā yādaḥ patistaṃ varuṇo nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP yo me vāyugataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā vāyustaṃ marutāṃ rājo nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP yo me saumyagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā somastamṛkṣayakṣeśo nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP yo ma īśagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā īśāno bhūtanāthastaṃ nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP yo maṃ ūrddhvagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā brahmā prajāpatīśastaṃ nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP yo me dhaḥsaṃsthitaḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā ananto nāgarājastaṃ nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ  NarP ityevaṃ dikṣu daśasu baliṃ datvā samāhitaḥ kṣetrapālāya tadbāhye kṣipedbalimatandritaḥ  NarP evaṃ kṛtavidhiḥ śeṣaṃ niśāyāṃ ninayetsudhīḥ gītaiḥ sumaṅgalaprāyaiḥ stavapāṭhairjapādibhiḥ  NarP prātaḥ snātvā samabhyarcya lokapālān dvijottamān dvādaśābhyarcya saṃbhojya śaktito dakṣiṇāṃ dadet  NarP itthaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra bhogānbhuktaihikāñchubhān yugaṃ svargasukhaṃ bhuktvā sārvabhaumo nṛpo bhavet  NarP mārgaśukladaśamyāṃ tu caredā rogyakaṃ vratam gandhādyairarcayedviprān daśa taccaraṇodakam  NarP pītvātha dakṣiṇāṃ datvā visūjedekabhojanaṃ etatkṛtvā vrataṃ vipra hyārogyaṃ prāpya bhūtale  NarP dharmarājaprasādena modate divi devavat pauṣe daśamyāṃ śuklāyāṃ viśvedevān samarcayet  NarP ṛtuṃ dakṣaṃ vasūnsatyaṃ kālaṃ kāmaṃ muniṃ gurum vipraṃ rāmaṃ ca daśadhā keśavastānsamāsthitaḥ  NarP svāpayitvā darbhamayānāsaneṣu ca saṃsthitān gandhairdhūpaistathā dīpairnaivedyaiścāpi nārada  NarP pratyekaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ datvā praṇiyatya visarjayet dakṣiṇāṃ tāṃ dvijāgryebhyo gurave vā samarpayet  NarP evaṃ kṛtavidhi ścaikabhakto bhogī vratī bhavet lokadvayasya viprarṣe nātra kāryā vicāraṇā  NarP māghaśukladaśamyāṃ tu sopavāso jitendriyaḥ devāṃnagiraso nāma daśa samyaksamarcayet  NarP kṛtvā svarṇamayānvipra gandhādyairupacārakaiḥ ātmā hyāyurmano dakṣo madaḥ prāṇastathaiva ca  NarP barhiṣmāṃśca gaviṣṭhaśca dattaḥ satyaśca te daśa daśa viprānbhojayitvā madhurānnena nārada  NarP mūrtīstebhyaḥ pradadyāttāḥ svargalokāptaye kramāt antyaśukladaśamyāṃ tu caturdaśaṃ yamānyajet  NarP yamaśca dharmarājaśca mṛtyuścaivāntakastathā vaivasvataśca kālaśca sarvabhūtakṣayastathā  NarP audumbaraśca daghnaśca dvau nīlaparameṣṭhinau vṛkodaraścacitraśca citraguptaścaturdaśa  NarP gandhādyairupacāraiśca samabhyarcyāthatarpayet tilāṃbumiśrāñjalibhirdarbhaiḥ pratyekaśastribhiḥ  NarP tataśca dadyātsūryārghaṃ tāmrapātreṇa nārada raktacandanasaṃmiśratilākṣatayavāṃbubhiḥ  NarP ehi sūryasahasrāṃśo tejorāśe jagatpate gṛhāṇārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ bhaktyā māmanukaṃpaya  NarP iti mantreṇa datvārghyaṃ viprānbhojya caturddaśa raupyāṃ sudakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam  NarP evaṃ kṛtavidhirvipra dharmarājaprasādataḥ bhuktvā bhogāṃśca putrārthānaihikāndevadurlabhān  NarP vimānavaramāsthāya dehānte viṣṇulokabhāk  NarP  iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitadaśamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo dhyāyaḥ sanātana uvācaekādaśyāṃ tu dalayornirāhāraḥ samāhitaḥ nānāpuṣpairmune kṛtvā vicitraṃ maṇḍapaṃ śubham  NarP srātvā samyagvidhānena sopavāso jitendriyaḥ saṃpūjya vidhivadviṣṇuṃ śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ  NarP upacārairbahuvidhairjapairhemaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ stotrapāṭhairbahuvidhairgītavādyairmanoharaiḥ  NarP daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiśca jayaśabdairmanoharaiḥ rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam  NarP caitrasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ sopavāso narottamaḥ kṛtvā ca niyamānsarvānvakṣyamāṇāndinatraye  NarP dvādaśyāmarcayedbhaktayā vāsudevaṃ sanātanam upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhistataḥ saṃbhojya bāndhavān  NarP datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam iyaṃ tu kāmadā nāma sarvapātakanāśinī  NarP bhuktimuktipradā vipra bhaktyā samyagupoṣitā vaiśākhakṛṣṇaikādaśyāṃ samupoṣya vidhānataḥ  NarP varūthinīṃ paradine pūjayenmṛdhusūdanam svarṇānnakanyādhenūnāṃ dānamatra praśasyate  NarP varūthinīvrataṃ kṛtvā naro niyamatatparaḥ sarvapāpa vinirmukto vaiṣṇavaṃ labhate padvam  NarP vaiśākhaśuklaikādaśyāṃ samupoṣya ca mohinīm snātvā pare hni saṃpūjya gandhādyaiḥ puruṣottamam  NarP saṃbhojya viprānmucyeta pātakebhyo na saṃśayaḥ jeṣṭhasya kṛṣṇakādaśyāṃ samupoṣya parāṃ nṛpa  NarP dvādaśyāṃ naityikaṃ kṛtvā samabhyarcya trivikramam tato dvijāgryānsaṃbhojya datvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām  NarP sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ vrajennaraḥ jyeṣṭhasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ nirjalāṃ samupoṣya tu  NarP udayādudayaṃ yāvadbhāskarasya dvijottama prabhāte kṛtanityastu dvādaśyāmupacārakaiḥ  NarP hyaṣīkeśaṃ samabhyarcya viprān saṃbhojya bhaktitaḥ caturviṃśaikādaśīnāṃ phalaṃ yattatsamāpnuyāt  NarP āṣāḍhakṛṣṇaikādaśyāṃ yoginīṃ samupoṣya vai nārāyaṇaṃ samabhyarcya dvādaśyāṃ kṛtanityakaḥ  NarP tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām sarvadānaphalaṃ prāpya modate viṣṇumandire  NarP āṣāḍhaśuklaikādaśyāṃ yadbidhānaṃ śṛṇuṣva tat upoṣya tasmin divase vidhivanmaṇḍape śubhe  NarP sthāpayetpratimāṃ viṣṇoḥ śaṅkhacakragadāṃbujaiḥ lasaccaturbhujāmagryāṃ kāñcanīṃ vātha rājatīm  NarP pītāṃbaradharāṃ śubhre paryyaṅke svāstṛte dvija tataḥ pañcāmṛtaiḥ snāpya mantraiḥ śuddhajalena ca  NarP pauruṣeṇaiva sūktena hyupacārān prakalpayet nīrājanāntānpādyādīṃstataḥ saṃprārthayeddharim  NarP supte tvayi jagannātha jagatsuptaṃ bhavedidam vibuddhe tvayi buddhaṃ ca jagatsarvaṃ carācaram  NarP iti saṃprārthya devāgre cāturmāsyapracoditān niyamāṃstu yathāśakti gṛhṇīyādbhaktimānnaraḥ  NarP tataḥ prabhāte dvādaśyāṃ samarceccheṣaśāyinam upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhistataḥ saṃbhojya vāḍavān  NarP pratoṣya dabhiṇābhiśca svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ tataḥ prabhṛti viprendra gandhādyaiḥ pratyahaṃ yajet  NarP kṛtvaivaṃ vidhinā vipra devasya śayanīvratam bhuktimuktiyuto martyo bhavedviṣṇoḥ prasādataḥ  NarP śrāvaṇe kṛṣṇapakṣe tu ekādaśyāṃ dvijottama kāmikāṃ samupoṣyaiva niyamena narottama  NarP dvādaśyāṃ kṛtanityastu śrīdharaṃ pūjayeddharim upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśa bhistataḥ saṃbhojya vai dvijān  NarP datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta bāndhavaiḥ evaṃ yaḥ kurute viprakāmikāvratamuttamam  NarP sa sarvakāmāṃllabdhveha yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam ekādaśyāṃ nabhaḥśukle pavitrāṃ samupoṣya vai  NarP dvādaśyāṃ niyato bhūtvā pūjayecca janārdanam upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhistataḥ saṃbhojya vāḍavān  NarPdatvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyaḥ putraṃ prāpyeha sadguṇam yāti viṣṇoḥ padaṃ sākṣātsarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ  NarP nabhasyakṛṣṇaikā daśyāmajākhyāṃ samupoṣya vai arcedurpendraṃ dvādaśyāmupacāraiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ  NarP viprānsaṃbhojya miṣṭānnairvisṛjetprāptadakṣiṇān evaṃ kṛtavrato viprabhaktyājāyāḥ samāhitaḥ  NarP bhuktveha bhogānakhilānyātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ kṣayam nabhasyaśuklaikādaśyāṃ padmākhyāṃ samupoṣya vai  NarP kṛtvā nityārcanaṃ tatra kaṭidānamathācaret pūrvaṃ saṃsthāpitāyāstu pratimāyā dvijottama  NarP samutsavavidhānena nītvā tāṃ salilāśaye kṛtāṃbusparśanāṃ tatra saṃprapūjya vidhānataḥ  NarP ānīya maṇḍape tasmin vāmapārśvena śāyayet tataḥ prabhāpte dvādaśyāṃ gandhādyairarcya vāmanam  NarP saṃbhojya vāḍavāndatvā dakṣiṇāṃ ca visarjayet evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra padmāvratamanuttamam  NarP bhuktiṃ prāpyeha muktiṃ tu labhateṃte prapañcataḥ iṣasya kṛṣṇaikā daśyāmindirāṃ samupoṣya vai  NarP śālagrāmaśilāgre tu madhyāhne śrāddhamācaret viṣṇoḥ prītikaraṃ vipra tataḥ prātarharerdine  NarP padnanābhaṃ samabhyarcya bhūdevānbhojayetsudhīḥ visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā tāṃstato śnīta ca svayam  NarP evaṃ kṛtavrato martyo bhuktvā bhogānihepsitān pitṝṇāṃ koṭimuddhṛtya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ gṛham  NarP ekādaśyāmiṣe śukle vipra pāśāṅkuśāhvayām upoṣya vidhivadviṣṇordine viṣṇuṃ samarcayet  NarP tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām bhaktyā praṇamya visṛjedaśnīyācca svayaṃ tataḥ  NarP evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā naraḥ pāśāṅkuśāvratam sa bhuktveha varānbhogānyāti viṣṇoḥ salokatām  NarP kārtike kṛṣṇapakṣe tu ekādaśyāṃ dvijottama ramāmupoṣya vidhivaddvādaśyāṃ prātararcayet  NarP keśavaṃ keśihṝntāraṃ devadevaṃ sanātanam bhojayecca tato viprānvisṛjellabdhadakṣiṇān  NarP evaṃ kṛtavrato vipra bhogānbhuktveha vāñchitān vyomayānena sāṃnidhyaṃ labhate ca ramāpateḥ  NarP ūrjasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ samupoṣya prabodhinīm keśavaṃ bodhayedrātrau suptaṃ gītādimaṅgalaiḥ  NarP ṛgyajuḥsāmamantraiśca vādyairnānāvidhairapi drākṣekṣudāḍimaiścānyai raṃbhāśṛṅgāṭakādibhiḥ  NarP samarpaṇaistato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ pare hani snātvā nityakriyāṃ kṛtvā gadādāmodaraṃ yajet  NarP upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ pauruṣeṇāpi sūktataḥ saṃbhojya viprānvisṛjeddakṣiṇābhiḥ pratoṣitān  NarP tatastāṃ pratimāṃ haimīṃ sadhenuṃ guraverpayet evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā bodhinīvratamādṛtaḥ  NarP sa bhuktveha varānbhogānvaiṣṇavaṃ labhate padam mārgasya kṛṣṇaikādaśyāmutpannāṃ samupoṣya vai  NarP dvādaśyāṃ kṛṣṇamabhyarcedgandhādyairupacārakaiḥ tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām  NarP visṛjya paścādbhuñjīta svayamiṣṭaiḥ samāhitaḥ evaṃ yo bhaktibhāvena utpannāvratamācaret  NarP sa vimānaṃ samāruhya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ padam mārgasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ mokṣākhyāṃ samupoṣya vai  NarP dvādaśyāṃ prātarabhyarcya hyanantaṃ viśvarūpakam sarvairevopacāraistu viprānsaṃbhojayeddvijaḥ  NarP visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra bhuktvā bhogānihepsitān  NarP daśa pūrvāndaśa parānsamuddhṛtya vrajeddharim paupasya kṛṣṇaikādaśyāṃ saphalāṃ samupoṣya vai dvādaśyāmacyutaṃ prārcya sarvairevopacārakaiḥ  NarP saṃbhojya viprānmadhurairvisṛjellabdhadakṣiṇān evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saphalāyā vidhānataḥ  NarP bhuktveha bhogānakhilānyātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ padam pauṣasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ putradāṃ samupoṣya vai  NarP dvādaśyāṃ cakriṇaṃ prāryedarghādyairupacārakaiḥ tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyastu dakṣiṇām  NarP visṛjya svayamaśnīyāccheṣānnaṃ sveṣṭabāndhavaiḥ evaṃ kṛtavrato vipra bhukvā bhogānihepsitān  NarP vimānavaramāruhya yātyante harimandiram māghamya kṛṣṇaikādaśyāṃ ṣaṭtilāṃ samupoṣya vai  NarP snātvā datvā tarpayitvā hutvā bhuktvā samarcya ca tilaireva dvijaśreṣṭha dvādaśyāṃ prātareva hi  NarP vaikuṇṭhaṃ samyagabhyarvya sarvairevopacārakaiḥ dvijānsaṃbhojya visṛjeddatvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām  NarP evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra vidhinā susamāhitaḥ bhuktveha vāñchitānbhogānante viṣṇupadaṃ labhet  NarP māghasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ samupoṣya jayāhvayām prātarhari dine bhyarccecchrīpatiṃ puruṣaṃ dvija  NarP bhojayitvā dakṣiṇāṃ ca datvā viprānvisṛjya ca svayaṃ bhuñjīta taccheṣaṃ prayato nijabāndhavaiḥ  NarP ya evaṃ kurute vipra vrataṃ keśavatoṣaṇam sa bhuktveha varānbhogānante viṣṇoḥ padaṃ vrajet  NarP tapasyakṛṣṇaikādaśyāṃ vijayāṃ samupoṣya vai dvādaśyāṃ prātarabhyarcya yogīśaṃ gandhapūrvakaiḥ  NarP tataḥ saṃbhojya bhūdevāndakṣiṇābhiḥ pratoṣya tān visṛjya bāndhavaiḥ sārddhaṃ svayamaśnīta vāgyataḥ  NarP evaṃ kṛtavrato martyo bhuktvā bhogānihepsitān dehānte vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ yāti devaiḥ susatkṛtaḥ  NarP phaālgunasya site pakṣe ekādaśyāṃ dvijottama upoṣyāmalakīṃ bhaktyā dvādaśyāṃ prātararcayet  NarP puṇḍarīkākṣamakhilairupacāraistato dvijān bhojayitvā varānnena dadyāttebhyastu dakṣiṇām  NarP evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānenāmalakyāṃ pūjanādikam sitaikādaśyāṃ tapasye vrajedviṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam  NarP caitrasya kṛṣṇaikādaśīṃ pāpamocanikāṃ dvija upāṣya dvādaśyāṃprātargovindaṃ pūjayettathā  NarP upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirdvijānsaṃbhojya dakṣiṇām datvā tebhyo visṛjyātha svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ  NarP eva yaḥ kurute vipra pāpamocanikāvratām sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ vimānena tu bhāsvatā  NarP itthaṃ kṛṣṇo tathā śukle vrataṃ caikādaśībhavam mokṣadaṃ kīrtitaṃ vipra nāstyasminsaṃśayaḥ kvacit  NarP yatastridinasaṃsādhyaṃ kīrtinaṃ pāpanāśanam sarvavratottamaṃ vipra tato jñeyaṃ mahāphalam  NarP tyajeccatvāri bhuktāni nāradai taddinatraye ādyantayorekamekaṃ madhyame dvayameva hi  NarP atha te niyamānvacmi vrate hyasmindinatraye kāṃsyaṃ māṃsaṃ masūrānnaṃ caṇakānkodravāṃstathā  NarP śākaṃ madhu parānnaṃ ca punarbhojanamaithune daśamyāṃ daśa vastūni varjayedvaiṣṇavaṛ sadā  NarP dyūtakrīḍāṃ ca nidrāṃ ca tāṃbūlaṃ dantadhāvanam parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ steyaṃ hiṃsāṃ tathā ratim  NarP kopaṃ hyanṛtavākyaṃ ca ekādaśyāṃ vivarjjayet kāṃsyaṃ māṃsaṃ surāṃ kṣaudraṃ tailaṃ viṇmlecchabhāṣaṇam  NarP vyāyāmaṃ ca pravāsaṃ ca punarbhojanamaithune aspṛśyasparśamāśūre dvādaśyāṃ dvādaśa tyajet  NarP evaṃ niyamakṛdvipra upavāsaṃ samācaret śakto śaktustu matimānekabhuktaṃ na naktakam  NarP ayācitaṃ vāpi carenna tyajedvratamīdṛśam  NarP  iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthabhāge dvādaśamāsastitaikādaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma viṃśatyadhikaśatatamo dhyāyaḥ sanātana uvācaatha vratāni dvādaśyāḥ kathayāmi tavānagha yāni kṛtvā naro loke viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet  NarP caitrasya śukladvādaśyāṃ madanavratamācaret sthāpayedavraṇaṃ kuṃbhaṃ sitatandulapūritam  NarP nānāphalayutaṃ tadvadikṣudaṇḍasamanvitam sitavastrayugacchannaṃ sitacandanacarccitam  NarP nānābhakṣyasamopetaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ svaśaktitaḥ tāmrapātraṃ guḍopetaṃ tasyopari niveśayet  NarP tatra saṃpūjayeddevaṃ kāmarūpiṇamacyutam gandhādyairupacāraistu sopavāso pare hani  NarP punaḥ prātaḥ samabhyarcya brāhmaṇāya nivedayet brahmaṇānbhojayeccaiva tebhyo dadyācca dakṣiṇām  NarP varṣamevaṃ vrataṃ kṛtvā ghṛtadhenusamanvitām śayyāṃ tu dadyādgurave sarvopaskarasaṃyutām  NarP kāñcanaṃ kāmadevaṃ ca śuktāṃ gāṃ ca payasvinīm vāsobhirdvijadāṃpatyaṃ pūjayitvā samarpayet  NarP prīyatāṃ kāmarūpī me harirityevamuccaran yaḥ kuryādvidhinānena madanadvādaśīvratam  NarP sa sarvapāpanirbhuktaḥ prāpnoti harisāmyatām asyāmeva samuddiṣṭaṃ bhartṛdvādaśikāvratam  NarP svāstṛtāṃ tatra śayyāṃ tu kṛtvātra śrīyutaṃ harim saṃsthāpya maṇḍapaṃ puṣpaistaduparpyupakalpayet  NarP tataḥ saṃpūjya gandhādyairvratī jāgaraṇaṃ niśi nṛtyavāditragītādyaistataḥ prātaḥ pare hani  NarP saśayyaṃ śrīhariṃ haimaṃ dvijagryāya nivedayet dvijānsaṃbhojya visṛjaddakṣiṇābhiḥ pratoṣitān  NarP evaṃ kṛtavratasyāpi dāṃpatyaṃ jāyate sthiram saptajanmasu bhuṅkte ca bhogān lokadvayepsitān  NarP vaiśākhaśukladvādaśyāṃ sopavāso jitendriyaḥ saṃpūjya mādhavaṃ bhaktyā gandhādyairupacārakaiḥ  NarP pakkānnaṃ tṛptijanakaṃ madhuraṃ sodakuṃbhakam viprāya dadyādvidhivanmādhavaḥ prīyatāmiti  NarP dvādaśyāṃ jyeṣṭhaśuklāyāṃ pūjayitvā trivikramam gandhādyairmadhurānnāḍhyaṃ karaka vinivedayet  NarP vratī dvijāya tatpaścādekabhaktaṃ samācaret vratenānena saṃtuṣṭo devadevastrivikramaḥ  NarP dadāti vipulānbhogānante mokṣaṃ ca nārada āṣāḍhaśukladvādaśyāṃ dvijāndvādaśa bhojayet  NarP madhurānnena tānpūjya pṛthaggandhādikaiḥ kramāt tabhyo vāsāṃsi daṇḍāṃśca brahmasūtrāṇi mudrikāḥ  NarP pātrāṇi ca dadedbhaktyā viṣṇumeṃ prīyatāmiti dvādaśyāṃ tu nabhaḥśukle śrīdharaṃ pūjayedvratī  NarP gandhādyaistatparo bhaktyā dadhibhaktairdvijottamān saṃbhojya dakṣiṇā raupyāṃ datvā natvā visarjjayet  NarP vratenānena deveśaḥ śrīdharaḥ prīyatāmiti dvādaśyāṃ nabhasyaśukle vratī saṃpūjya vāmanam  NarP tadagre bhojayedviprānpāyasairdvādaśaiva ca sauvarṇī dakṣiṇāṃ datvā viṣṇuprītikaro bhavet  NarP dvādaśyāmiṣaśuklāyāṃ padmanābhaṃ samarcayet gandhādyairupacāraistu tadagre bhojayeddvijān  NarP madhurānnena vastrāḍhyāṃ sauvarṇīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadet vratenaitena saṃtuṣṭaḥ padmanābho dvijottama  NarP śvetadvīpagatiṃ dadyāddehabhogāṃśca vāñchitān kārtike kṛṣṇapakṣe tu govatsadvādaśīvratam  NarP tatra vatsayutāṃ gāṃ tu samālikhya sugandhibhiḥ candanādyaistathā puṣpamālābhiḥ prārcya tāmrake  NarP pātre puṣpākṣatatilairarghyaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ pradadyātpādamūle syā mantreṇānena nārada  NarP kṣīrodārṇavasaṃbhūte surāsuranamaskṛte sarvadevamaye devi sarvadevairalaṅkṛte  NarP mātarmātargavāṃ mātargṛhāṇārghyaṃ namo stu te tato māṣādisaṃsiddhānvaṭakāṃśca nivedayet  NarP evaṃ pañca daśaikaṃ vā yathāvibhavamātmanaḥ surabhi tvaṃ jaganmātā nityaṃ viṣṇupade sthitā  NarP sarvadevamaye grāsaṃ mayā dattamimaṃ grasa sarvadevamaye devi sarvadevairalaṅkṛte  NarP mātarmamābhilaṣitaṃ saphalaṃ kuru nandinī taddine tailapakvaṃ ca sthālīpakvaṃ dvijottama  NarP gokṣīraṃ goghṛtaṃ caiva dadhi takraṃ ca varjayet dvādaśyāmūrjaśuklāyāṃ devaṃ dāmodaraṃ dvija  NarP samabhyarcyopacāraistu gandhādyaiḥ susamāhitaḥ tadagre bhojayedviprānpakvānnenārkasaṃkhyakān  NarP tataḥ kuṃbhānapāṃpūrṇānvastrācchannānsamarcitān sapūgamodakasvarṇāṃstebhyaḥ prītyā samarpayet  NarP evaṃ kṛte priyo viṣṇorjāyate khilabhogabhuk dehānte viṣṇusāyujyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ  NarP nīrājanavrataṃ cātra gaditaṃ tannibodha me suptotthitaṃ jagannāthamalaṅkṛtya niśāgame  NarP alaṅkṛto navaṃ vahnimutpādyābhyarcya mantrataḥ hutvā tatra samuddīpte raupya dīpikayā mune  NarP gandhapuṣpādyarcitayā janairnīrājayeddharim tatraivānugatāṃ lakṣmīṃ brahmāṇīṃ caṇḍikāṃ tathā  NarP ādityaṃ śaṅkaraṃ gaurīṃ yakṣaṃ gaṇapatiṃ grahān mātṝḥ pitṝnnagānnāgānsarvānnīrājayetkramāt  NarP gavāṃ nīrājanaṃ kuryānmahiṣyādeśca maṇḍalam namo jayeti śabdaiśca ghaṇṭāśaṅkhā diniḥsvanaiḥ  NarP siṃdūrāliptaśṛṅgāṇāṃ citrāṅgāṇāṃ ca varṇakaiḥ gavāṃ kolāhale vṛtte nīrājanamahotsave  NarP turagāṃllakṣaṇopetām gajāṃśca madaviplutān rājacihnāni sarvāṇi cchatrādīni ca nārada  NarP rājā purodhasā sārdhaṃ mantribhṛtyaparaḥ saraḥ pūjayitvā yathānyāyaṃ nīrajya svayamādarāt  NarP śaṅkhatūryādighoṣaiśca nānāratnavinirmite siṃhāsane nave kḷpte tiṣṭhetsamyagalaṅkṛtaḥ  NarP tataḥ sulakṣaṇairyuktā veśyā vātha kulāṅganā śīrṣopari naredrasya tayā nīrājayecchanaiḥ  NarP evameṣā mahāsāṃtiḥ kartavyā prativatsaram rājñā vittavatānyena varṣamārogyamicchatā  NarP yeṣāṃ rāṣṭre pure grāme kriyate śāntiruttamā nīrājanābhidhā vipra tadrogā yānti saṃkṣayam  NarP dvādaśyāṃ mārgaśuklāyāṃ sādhyavratamanuttamam manobhavastathā prāṇo naro yātaśca vīryavān  NarP citirhayo nṛpaścaiva haṃso nārāyaṇastathā vibhuścāpi prabhuścaiva sādhyā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ  NarP pūjayedgandhapuṣpādyairetāṃstandulakalpitān tato dvijāgryānsaṃbhojya dvādaśātra sudakṣiṇāḥ  NarP datvā tebhyastu visṛjetprīyānnārayaṇastviti etasyāmeva viditaṃ dvādaśādityasaṃjñitam  NarP vrataṃ tatrārcayeddhīmānādityāndvādaśāpi ca dhātāmitroryamā pūṣā śakroṃśo varuṇo bhagaḥ  NarP tvaṣṭā vivasvānsavitā viṣṇurdvādaśa īritāḥ pratimāsaṃ tu śuklāyāṃ dvādaśyāmarcya yatnataḥ  NarP varṣaṃ nayedvratānte tu pratimā dvādaśāpi ca haimīḥ saṃpūjya vidhinā bhojayitvā dvijottamān  NarP madhurānnaiḥ susatkṛtya pratyekaṃ cārpayedvratī eva vrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā dvādaśādityasaṃjñakam  NarP sūryalokaṃ samāsādya bhuktvā bhogāṃścaraṃ tataḥ jāyate bhuvi dharmātmā mānuṣye rogavarjitaḥ  NarP tato vratasya puṇyena punareva labhedvratam tatpuṇyena ravenbhitvā maṇḍalaṃ dvijasattama  NarP nirañjanaṃ nirā kāraṃ nirdvandvaṃ brahma cāpnuyāt atraivākhaṇḍasaṃjñaṃ ca vratamukta dvijottama  NarP mūrtiṃ nirmāya sauvarṇīṃ janārdanasamāhvayām abhyarcya gandhapuṣpādyaistadagre bhojayeddvijān  NarP dvādaśa pratimāsaṃ tu naktāśīḥ syājjitendriyaḥ tataḥ samānte tāṃ mūrtiṃ samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ  NarP gurave dhenusahitāṃ dadyātsaṃprārthayettathā śatajanmasu yatkiñcinmayākhaṇḍavrataṃ kṛtam  NarP bhagavaṃstvatprasādena tadakhaṇḍamihāstu me tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryānsakhaṇḍāḍhyaistu pāyasaiḥ  NarP dvādaśaiva hi sauvarṇīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ pradadennamet iti kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra prīṇayitvā janārdanam  NarP sauvarṇena vimānena yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam pauṣasya kṛṣṇadvādaśyāṃ rūpavratamudīritam  NarP daśamyāṃ vidhivatsnātvā gṛhṇīyādgomayaṃ vratī śvetāyā vaikavarṇāyā antarikṣagataṃ dvija  NarP aṣṭottaraśataṃ tena piṇḍikāḥ kalpya nārada śoṣayedātape dhṛtvā pātre tāmre tha mṛnmaye  NarP ekādaśyāṃ sopavāsaḥ samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ viṣṇorniśāyāṃ jāgaraṃ caret  NarP sumaṅgalairgītavādyaiḥ stotrapāṭhairjapādibhiḥ tataḥ prabhāte dvādaśyāṃ tilapātropari sthitām  NarP aṃbupūrṇe ghaṭe nyasya pūjayedupacārakaiḥ tato gniṃ navamutpādya kāṣṭhasaṃgharṣaṇādibhiḥ  NarP taṃ samabhyarcya vidhivadekaikāṃ piṇḍikāṃ sudhīḥ homayetsatilājyāṃ ca dvādaśākṣaravidyayā  NarP vaiṣṇavyātha ca pūraṇāṃ ca śatamaṣṭottara tataḥ bhojayetpāyasairviprānprītyā susnigdhamānasaḥ  NarP sahitāṃ ca ghaṭenaiva pratimāṃ guravapeyet viprebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visarjayet naro vā yadi vā nārī vrataṃ kṛtvaivamādarāt  NarP labhate rūpasaubhāgyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā sahasye śuklapakṣe tu sujanmadvādaśīvratam  NarP snātvā vidhānena gṛhṇoyādvārṣikavratam pītvā gaśṛṅgavāryādau tāṃ ca kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam  NarP pratimāsaṃ tataḥ śukledvādaśyāṃ dānamācaret ghṛtaprasthaṃ taccatuṣkaṃ kramādvīheryavasya ca  NarP dviraktikaṃ hema tilāḍhakārddhaṃ payasāṃ ghaṭam raupyasya māṣamekaṃ ca tṛptikṛnmiṣṭapakvakam  NarP chatraṃ māṣārdhahemnaśca prasthaṃ phaāṇitamuttamam candanaṃ palikaṃ vastraṃ pañcahastonmitaṃ tanum  NarP evaṃ tu māsikaṃ dānaṃ kṛtvā prāśya yathākramam gomūtraṃ jalamājyaṃ vā paktvā śākaṃ caturvidham  NarP dadhiyuktaṃ ca yāvānnaṃ tilājyaṃ śarkarānvitām darbhāṃbukṣīramuditaṃ prāśanaṃ pratimāsikam  NarP evaṃ kṛtavrato varṣaṃ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ raveḥ kṛtvā vai tāmrapātrasthāṃ nyasyābhyarcya vidhānataḥ  NarP gurave dhenusahitāṃ pratyarpya praṇametpuraḥ viprāndrādaśa saṃbhojya tebhyo dadyācca dakṣiṇām  NarP evaṃ kṛtavrato vipra janmāpnotyuttame kule nirogo dhanadhānyāḍhyo bhaveccāvikaledriyaḥ  NarP māghasya śukladvādaśyāṃ śālagrāmaśilāṃ dvija nāradena dvijottamaḥ praśasya bhrātaraṃ prāha mahābhāgavataṃ muniḥ  NarP sanātana uvācasādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhrātaḥ sādhūnāṃ saṃśayacchidā vakṣye mahādvādaśīnāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca phalaṃ pṛthak  NarP ekādaśī nivṛttā cetsūryasyodayataḥ purā tadā tu trispṛśā nāma dvādaśī sā mahāphalā  NarP asyāmupoṣya govindaṃ yaḥ pūjayati nārada aśvamedhasahasrasya phalaṃ labhate dhruvam  NarP yadāruṇodaye viddhā daśamyaikādaśī tithiḥ tadā tāṃ saṃparityajya dvādaśīṃ samupoṣayet  NarP tatreṣṭvā vāsudevākhyaṃ samyakpūjāvidhānataḥ rājasūyasahasrasya phalamunmīlite labhet  NarP yadodaye tu savituryāmyā tvekādaśīṃ kṣabhyairnānāvidhaiścāpi mantreṇānena nārada namo mārāya kāmāya kāmadevasya mūrttaye  NarP brahmaviṣṇuśivendrāṇāṃ manaḥbhobhakarāya vai tattasyāgrato bhaktyā pūjayedaṅganāpatim  NarP NarP oṅkāreśvarayātrā ca kāryātraiva munīśvara durlabhaṃ vārcanaṃ tatra darśanaṃ pāpanāśanam  NarP kimatra bahunoktena pūjādhyānajapekṣaṇam yadbhavettatsamuddiṣṭaṃ jñānamokṣapradaṃ nṛṇām  NarP atra saubhāgyotsavakelibhiḥ  NarP tasmānnaraḥ puṣyayoge sarvasaubhāgyavṛddhaye gaurasarṣapakalkena samālabhya svakāṃ tanum  NarP snāyātsarvauṃṣadhijalairdhārayecca navāṃśuke dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalaṃ dravyaṃ spṛṣṭvā natvā tatorcayet  NarP hariśakrendupuṣyejyāngandhādyarupacārakaiḥ vidhāya homaṃ viprāṃśca tarpayetpāyasāśanaiḥ  NarP etatkṛtvā vrataṃ vipra ramāprītivivarddhanam alakṣmīnāśanaṃ caiva modateha paratra ca  NarP paurṇamāsyāṃ tato mādhyāṃ tilakārpāsakaṃbalam ratnāni kañcukoṣṇīṣapādatrāṇāni vā dhanam  NarP datvā pramodate svarge dānaṃ vittānusārataḥ yastvatra śaṅkaraṃ devaṃ pūjayedvidhipūrvakam  NarP so śvamedhaphalaṃ prāpyaviṣṇuloke mahīyate phaālgune pūrṇimāyāṃ tu holikāpūjanaṃ matam  NarP saṃcayaṃ sarvakāṣṭhānāmupalānāṃ ca kārayet tatrāgniṃ vidhivaddhrutvā rakṣoghnairmantravistaraiḥ  NarP asṛkpābhayasaṃtrastaiḥ kṛtā tvaṃ holi bāliśaiḥ atastvāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi bhūte bhūtipradā bhava  NarP iti mantreṇa sandīpya kāṣṭhādikṣepaṇaistataḥ parikramyotsavaḥ kāryyo gītavāditraniḥsvanaiḥ  NarP holikā rākṣasī ceyaṃ prahlādabhayadāyinī tatastāṃ pradahṝntyevaṃ kāṣṭhādyairgītamaṅgalaiḥ  NarP saṃvatsarasya dāho yaṃ kāmadāho matāntare iti jānīhi viprendra loke sthitiranekadhā  NarP pakṣānte dve pṛthagvaive tato māvratamucyate pṛthakchṛṇuṣva me vipra pitṝṇāmativallabham  NarP caitravaiśākhayostatra darśe pitṛsamarcanam pārvaṇena vidhānena śrāddhaṃ vittānusārataḥ  NarP dvijānāṃ bhojanaṃ dānaṃ gavādīnāṃ viśeṣataḥ sarvamāseṣvamāyāṃ vai bahupuṇyapradaṃ yataḥ  NarP jyeṣṭhāmāyāṃ vrataṃ proktaṃ sāvitryāḥ kasya nārada vidhānaṃ jyeṣṭhapūrṇāvadihāpi parikīrtitam  NarP śucau nabhasi bhādre ca māse pūrṇāntike dvija pitṛśrāddhaṃ dānahomasurārcānantyaśnute  NarP bhādradarśe parāhne tu tilakṣetrasamudbhavān viriñcimanunāmantrya huṃphaṭ chinnānkuśān dvija  NarP sarvadā sarvakāryeṣu yojayedekadāparān iṣāmāyāṃ viśeṣaṇa pitṝṇāṃ śrāddhatarpaṇam  NarP vidheyaṃ jāhnavītoye muktidaṃ ca gayāsthale ūrjjāmāyāṃ dīpadānaṃ devā gāragṛheṣu ca  NarP nadyārāmataḍāgeṣu caityagoṣṭhāpaṇeṣu ca samarcanaṃ tathā śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitapaurṇamāsya māvāsyāvratakathanaṃ nāma caturviṃśatyadhikaśatamo sūta uvācaityevamuktvā muninā hi pṛṣṭāste vai kumārāḥ kila nāradena saṃpūjitāḥ śāstravidāṃ variṣṭhāḥ kṛtāhnikā jagmurumeśalokam  NarP tatreśamagryarkanibhairmunīndraiḥ śrīvāmadevādibhirarcitāṅghrim surāsurendrairabhivandyamugraṃ natvājñayā tasya niṣedururvyām  NarP śrutvātha tatrākhilaśāstrasāraṃ śivāgamaṃ te paśupāśamokṣaṇam jagmustato jñānaghanasvarūpā natvā purāriṃ svapiturnikāśam  NarP tatpādapadme praṇatiṃ vidhāya pitrāpi satkṛtya sabhājitāste kumārebhyaḥ śrutaṃ yacca jñānaṃ vijñānasaṃyutam varṇayāmāsa tattvena so pi śrutvā mumoda ca  NarP atha praṇamya śirasā labdhāśīrmunisattamaḥ ājagāma ca kailāsaṃ munisiddhaniṣevitam  NarP nānāścaryamayaṃ śaśvatsarvarttukusumadrumaiḥ mandāraiḥ pārijātaiśca caṃpakāśokavañjulaiḥ  NarP anyaiśca vividhairvṛkṣairnānāpakṣigaṇāvṛtaiḥ vātoddhūtaśikhaiḥ pānthānāhvayadbhirivāvṛtam  NarP
